00008179-c6a7-46d0-be2f-b4b3b748afc2.Name: Searching the Woods
00008179-c6a7-46d0-be2f-b4b3b748afc2.Text:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.

Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.

Response: After you quest successfully, discard a non-unique location in any staging area.

0002f646-cdaf-40cf-9993-faccb260c583.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
0002f646-cdaf-40cf-9993-faccb260c583.Name: Gate of Gondor
0002f646-cdaf-40cf-9993-faccb260c583.Text: Immune to player card effects.  While Gate of Gondor is the active location, each enemy in play gets -30 engagement cost. Forced: When Gate of Gondor is explored, return each engaged enemy to the staging area.

001dbc8b-3b8e-4f02-bdbd-7e78c6ecd348.Name: The Mountains' Peaks
001dbc8b-3b8e-4f02-bdbd-7e78c6ecd348.Text:
When Revealed: Shuffle all copies of Snowstorm in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

Characters are discarded from play if their Ò is ever 0.

Players cannot defeat this stage unless they have 5 victory points. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

0071049b-ca5b-4083-b955-a74da4aad5f1.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
0071049b-ca5b-4083-b955-a74da4aad5f1.Name: Red River-bank
0071049b-ca5b-4083-b955-a74da4aad5f1.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, place the top card of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck and raise each player's threat by that card's $.

007721bf-3e80-4857-aaf4-aabb65d1827d.Name: Departure from the Havens
007721bf-3e80-4857-aaf4-aabb65d1827d.Text:
Sailing.
While you are on-course (º), each Ship objective gets +2 Ò.
When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

00a0a007-10dd-4a05-bedf-3a4e8ff972dc.Name: Rescue from the Trolls
00a0a007-10dd-4a05-bedf-3a4e8ff972dc.Text:
When Revealed: Each player places the lowest-threat-cost hero he controls facedown underneath Rescue from the Trolls, out of play.
Response: After a Troll enemy is destroyed, place 3 progress on Rescue from the Trolls.
Forced: When Rescue from the Trolls is defeated, each player takes control of each of his heroes underneath it.

00c52eae-b536-4458-abed-5b69e9283b11.Name: Dúnedain Pipe
00c52eae-b536-4458-abed-5b69e9283b11.Text: Attach to a Dúnedain character. Limit 1 per character. Action: Exhaust Dúnedain Pipe and place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck to draw a card.

00d81c85-395e-4990-b0ff-7cbd9908f541.Name: Cornered Orc
00d81c85-395e-4990-b0ff-7cbd9908f541.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character is damaged).
00d81c85-395e-4990-b0ff-7cbd9908f541.Text: Forced: After Cornered Orc engages a player, it makes an immediate attack.

00e25526-9804-4b05-89d6-557d9ef7ad77.Name: Profane Dead
00e25526-9804-4b05-89d6-557d9ef7ad77.Text: Forced: When you travel to the right, Profane Dead makes an immediate attack against the engaged player.

011a4573-f21a-4897-9b23-8b64391f5136.Name: Shrine to Morgoth
011a4573-f21a-4897-9b23-8b64391f5136.Text:
Shrine to Morgoth cannot have attachments and cannot enter the staging area.

Forced: If Shrine to Morgoth is the active location at the end of the quest phase, raise each player's threat by 5.

When Shrine to Morgoth is placed in the victory display, the players have escaped from the flooded grotto and win the game.

0140d146-771e-4f19-9de8-d7cf0b4d8268.Name: The Corsair Fleet
0140d146-771e-4f19-9de8-d7cf0b4d8268.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the staging step, place 1 resource on this objective. Then, each player must choose: either reveal an encounter card, or assign X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of resources on this objective. ...ships of great draught with many oars, and with black sails bellying in the breeze. -The Return of the King

019ebbd1-9632-4c0a-bd98-4ecef29afb1a.Name: Warg's Den
019ebbd1-9632-4c0a-bd98-4ecef29afb1a.Text: Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Warg enemy, reveals it, and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

01a43351-0e36-4175-9a94-693ff91404ad.Name: Overgrown
01a43351-0e36-4175-9a94-693ff91404ad.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the highest $ location in the staging area without a copy of Overgrown attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached location gets +1 $ and gains ‘Immune to player card effects.’”)

01b1d42b-11a4-4030-988d-064673169fec.Name: Western Road
01b1d42b-11a4-4030-988d-064673169fec.Text: Western Road gets +5 quest points while it is in the staging area. Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

021affba-a51d-48f1-ac86-354f3e82d38d.Name: Orc of Citith Ungol
021affba-a51d-48f1-ac86-354f3e82d38d.Text: When Revealed: Either discard 1 random card from each player’s hand, or Orc of Cirith Ungol makes an immediate attack against you.

021d423c-d9e4-4b7f-bca3-ee1ec4361a23.Name: Ending and Failing
021d423c-d9e4-4b7f-bca3-ee1ec4361a23.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
021d423c-d9e4-4b7f-bca3-ee1ec4361a23.Text: When Revealed: At the end of the phase, raise each player's threat by X where X is the number of enemies in the staging area.

022c654e-9d4d-40ff-9d67-8e465fda0e78.Name: Double Dealings
022c654e-9d4d-40ff-9d67-8e465fda0e78.Text:
Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this quest, reduce each player's threat elimination level by 10 for the remainder of the game. Then, place 4 time counters on this stage.

Forced: After 1 or more progress is placed on this quest, cancel all progress and reduce each player's threat by an equal amount.

When all players have 0 threat, immediately proceed to stage 2.

0238e687-61a4-4e2f-a858-70251cc88552.Name: Defender of Cair Andros
0238e687-61a4-4e2f-a858-70251cc88552.Text: Defender of Cair Andros gets +X Ú, where X is the tens digit of your threat. (Limit +4 Ú.) Valour Response: After Defender of Cair Andros is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

026a36ed-0979-4422-a581-a4decdc3c102.Name: Corsair Skirmisher
026a36ed-0979-4422-a581-a4decdc3c102.Text: Immune to player card effects. Response: After Corsair Skirmisher is destroyed as an enemy, the engaged player may discard allies he controls with a total of at least 3 Ò to take control of Corsair Skirmisher as a Ship-Objective with Ò equal to its $. (It loses the Ship-Enemy card type and gains the Ship-Objective card type).

02cae27a-3b0c-4396-aea3-8fc2bdd4ffe8.Name: Shadow of Dwimorberg
02cae27a-3b0c-4396-aea3-8fc2bdd4ffe8.Text:
Dusk. Shadow of Dwimorberg gets +2 $.

Midnight. Shadow of Dwimorberg gets +4 $.

02d8e441-0c70-4ecb-886f-9ba6f673ac9d.Keywords: X is 1 more than the number of resources on Battering Ram. Immune to player card effects.
02d8e441-0c70-4ecb-886f-9ba6f673ac9d.Name: Battering Ram
02d8e441-0c70-4ecb-886f-9ba6f673ac9d.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource on Battering Ram. Then, deal X damage to Annúminas.

Travel: Reveal 1 encounter card per player to travel here.

02e56cef-e78d-4dbd-bd4d-6ec43e4b1d2b.Name: Gandalf's Staff
02e56cef-e78d-4dbd-bd4d-6ec43e4b1d2b.Text: Action: Exhaust Gandalf's Staff to (choose one): choose a player to draw 1 card, add 1 resource to a hero's resource pool, or discard a shadow card from a non-unique enemy.

03587572-2760-48b5-9b08-e01ccdc9788f.Name: Sewers
03587572-2760-48b5-9b08-e01ccdc9788f.Text: When Revealed: Place the top card of the underworld deck facedown underneath the active location, if able.

0377297f-ce7d-47ce-9166-29f5872d5c97.Name: Secret Antechamber
0377297f-ce7d-47ce-9166-29f5872d5c97.Text:
Immune to player card effects.
While Secret Antechamber is in the staging area, no more than 5 progress can be placed on the main quest each round.
Travel: Raise each player's threat by 3 to travel here.

037cd2ac-cb12-4905-bd2b-86ae57350a1b.Name: Overrun Village
037cd2ac-cb12-4905-bd2b-86ae57350a1b.Text:
While Overrun Village is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced" After an enemy engages a player, discard 1 villager token from Overrun Village."
Travel: Place 1 damage token on Dead Villagers.

03a7152b-e6af-4aaf-a064-7e814fc181d5.Name: Merry
03a7152b-e6af-4aaf-a064-7e814fc181d5.Text: Response: After an enemy is revealed from the top of the encounter deck, exhaust Merry to lower your threat by that enemy’s $.

03b6d303-7722-4319-9623-e182b50c90b2.Name: Pinned Down
03b6d303-7722-4319-9623-e182b50c90b2.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, that character's controller must return a location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area.
03b6d303-7722-4319-9623-e182b50c90b2.Text: When Revealed: Add X to the archery total this round. X is the number of locations the players control. If the players control less than 4 locations, Pinned Down gains surge.

04029ea1-9780-4335-a8a2-74c08710c3f2.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
04029ea1-9780-4335-a8a2-74c08710c3f2.Name: Great Reed Thicket
04029ea1-9780-4335-a8a2-74c08710c3f2.Text:
Forced: When Great Reed Thicket is discarded by the Mire keyword, either flip Sméagol to Gollum, or Gollum makes an immediate attack.
Travel: Exhaust Sméagol to travel here.

045cf035-2ebf-4ebf-a7a3-7d44d3f9b2dc.Name: Rath Celerdain
045cf035-2ebf-4ebf-a7a3-7d44d3f9b2dc.Text: While Rath Celerdain is in the staging area is gains: "Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, reveal the top card of the underworld deck.  If it is an objective, discard it."

047ca6cd-733d-46aa-b2db-48a9c63bfc24.Name: Search the Ruins
047ca6cd-733d-46aa-b2db-48a9c63bfc24.Text:
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, raise each player’s threat by 2.

Response: After Search the Ruins is defeated, reduce each player’s threat by 3.

0484e428-6a72-4841-b2d5-d8df7cfb51bf.Name: Veteran of Osgiliath
0484e428-6a72-4841-b2d5-d8df7cfb51bf.Text: Veteran of Osgiliath gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú while your threat is 40 or higher.

048b6a57-f577-4dbe-a090-6eca1f266767.Name: Mûmak Elite
048b6a57-f577-4dbe-a090-6eca1f266767.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.
Mumak Elite cannot take more than 3 damage each round.

04a23a2e-a14f-4c54-b54f-eeef36d3a92b.Name: Southron Archer
04a23a2e-a14f-4c54-b54f-eeef36d3a92b.Text: Forced: After Southron Archer engages you, either remove 2 progress tokens from the main quest, or discard an ally you control.

04eb1904-64a4-4b89-ae71-38ee175aa093.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
04eb1904-64a4-4b89-ae71-38ee175aa093.Name: Orc Ravager
04eb1904-64a4-4b89-ae71-38ee175aa093.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control. Deal attacking enemy another shadow card.
04eb1904-64a4-4b89-ae71-38ee175aa093.Text: Forced: When Orc Ravager is dealt a shadow card, it gets +2 Ú until the end of the phase.

04f24d17-9764-4385-b22c-0e45f6fa5654.Name: Watch Tower
04f24d17-9764-4385-b22c-0e45f6fa5654.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a ally, add resources to a Raider enemy in play equal to that character’s printed resource cost.
04f24d17-9764-4385-b22c-0e45f6fa5654.Text: While Watch Tower is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: When a Raider enemy enters play, add 1 resource to it.”

0507932f-0030-4763-8478-29bb407103d4.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
0507932f-0030-4763-8478-29bb407103d4.Name: Rohan has Come!
0507932f-0030-4763-8478-29bb407103d4.Text: Progress that would be placed on this stage by questing successfully is instead assigned as damage among enemies in play. (Progress must be placed on the active location first.) Forced: At the end of the quest phase, advance to stage 5A.

052b1f85-8b9c-4bb0-a735-bdbd5ac1b2c4.Name: Merry
052b1f85-8b9c-4bb0-a735-bdbd5ac1b2c4.Text:
Merry get +1 Û for each Hobbit hero you control.

Response: After Merry participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, ready another character that participated in that attack.

053357f5-4192-4a35-bf2c-7f48d584f292.Name: Gimli
053357f5-4192-4a35-bf2c-7f48d584f292.Text: Response: After Gimli is declared as a defender, spend 1 resource from Gimli’s resource pool to ready another hero. If that hero is Legolas, he gets +1 Û until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

054189b9-c165-4561-9b62-f0384145da97.Name: Todd the Troll
054189b9-c165-4561-9b62-f0384145da97.Text: Cannot have attachments. Excess combat damage dealt by Todd the Troll (damage dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by this attack) must be assigned as an increase to your threat.

0554f2f9-c578-4644-9c28-b617e846b787.Name: The Lonely Mountain
0554f2f9-c578-4644-9c28-b617e846b787.Text:
While at least 1 card is stacked underneath, The Lonely Mountain is immune to player card effects, cannot leave the staging area, and gets -2 $ for each card stacked under it.

Action: While making a burgle attempt, the first player may spend 2 Í resources to take the revealed card into hand and reveal the next card of his deck.

05577e9f-477b-4842-8491-32c748c1a0e4.Name: Henneth Annun Guard
05577e9f-477b-4842-8491-32c748c1a0e4.Text: You may give Henneth Annun Guard doomed 1 when you play it from your hand. If you do, it gains: "Response: After you play Henneth Annun Guard, choose a character. Until the end of the round, that character gets +2 Ú and gains sentinel."

0567c2df-677c-4529-985a-54621088fe58.Name: Westfold Horse-breeder
0567c2df-677c-4529-985a-54621088fe58.Text: Response: After Westfold Horse-breeder enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Mount attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

0569374c-0f0d-461e-8047-cf467393c38f.Name: Protect the Bree-landers
0569374c-0f0d-461e-8047-cf467393c38f.Text:
Every step brings the Orcs closer to Bree-land. If you can't find some way to delay the enemy, the war party will reach the village before you can stop them.
Surge.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed on Protect the Bree-landers, place 1 resource on it. Then, raise each player's threat by the number of resources on Protect the Bree-landers.

05738935-2cd4-4ce3-a977-9e4f59689a32.Name: On Track
05738935-2cd4-4ce3-a977-9e4f59689a32.Text:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, place 1 progress here. Then, either return the topmost location in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, or raise each player's threat by 1 for each resource here.  
 
Progress cannot be placed on the main quest.

058a5508-6b20-4305-94ea-53d5d2f33595.Name: Gundabad Wolf Rider
058a5508-6b20-4305-94ea-53d5d2f33595.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each quest stage in play with no progress on it.
058a5508-6b20-4305-94ea-53d5d2f33595.Text: Forced: When this enemy attacks, remove 1 progress from the current quest.

05a0e539-e140-4dfc-a151-21cd8aaef094.Name: Methedras
05a0e539-e140-4dfc-a151-21cd8aaef094.Text:
While Methedras is the active location, each location in the staging area gets +1 $.

Forced: When Methedras leaves play as an explored location, each player Searches 3.

05bf91b3-8e8e-4a45-a6cf-ac8b936b032d.Name: Explore the Island
05bf91b3-8e8e-4a45-a6cf-ac8b936b032d.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on Explore the Island except by quest effects.
Forced: After a location is explored, add progress to Explore the Island equal to that location’s printed quest points.
Forced: When an Uncharted location becomes the active location, add 1 copy of Lost Island from the top of the Uncharted deck to the staging area.

066ed12c-00f8-4a8c-bb38-0acd926ccf51.Name: Haradrim Marksman
066ed12c-00f8-4a8c-bb38-0acd926ccf51.Text:
While the current quest has battle, Haradrim Marksman gets +2 $ and gains archery 2.
While the current quest has siege, Haradrim Marksman gets +2 Û and allies cannot be declared as defenders against its attacks.

068e0590-6bb4-429e-8a2b-2ef0869c7c4f.Name: Hirgon
068e0590-6bb4-429e-8a2b-2ef0869c7c4f.Text: Response: After Hirgon quests successfully, play a Ï ally from your hand and reduce the cost to play it by 1 (to a minimum of 1). Then, you may raise your threat by 1 to give that ally +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

06baca74-330a-4038-9387-32ce8657dd8f.Name: Guthlaf
06baca74-330a-4038-9387-32ce8657dd8f.Text: If there is at least 1 Rohan hero in play, lower the cost to play Guthlaf by 1. If there is at least 1 Gondor hero in play, Guthlaf gains sentinel.

06badf71-8e85-479e-8ddf-1dec7a40e325.Name: City of Corsairs
06badf71-8e85-479e-8ddf-1dec7a40e325.Text: X is the highest number of resources on a Raider enemy in play.Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Corsair enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

06c4f297-b2a4-43a6-8d56-aa3385da3b69.Name: Tombs of Carn Dûm
06c4f297-b2a4-43a6-8d56-aa3385da3b69.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of each player’s deck. Each player must reanimate each ally discarded by this effect.

Travel: Deal 1 shadow card to each Undead enemy in play to travel here.

06ff6757-f80c-499b-8450-1e85e793d02c.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
06ff6757-f80c-499b-8450-1e85e793d02c.Name: No Turning Back
06ff6757-f80c-499b-8450-1e85e793d02c.Shadow: Shadow: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
06ff6757-f80c-499b-8450-1e85e793d02c.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or discard an ally you control.

0700c66d-3fe6-4619-9512-edb0241e6203.Name: The Weather Turns Foul
0700c66d-3fe6-4619-9512-edb0241e6203.Text:
Forced: At the end of the staging step, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), reveal an additional encounter card from the top of the encounter deck. 

When you defeat this stage, if the Stormcaller is still at stage 3, you have caught up to the Stormcaller and win the game. Otherwise, advance to the next stage.

07067901-5306-47f0-8863-3c9cb194e1c6.Keywords:
Surge. 
Eye of the Beast cannot attack.
07067901-5306-47f0-8863-3c9cb194e1c6.Name: Eye of the Beast
07067901-5306-47f0-8863-3c9cb194e1c6.Text: While Eye of the Beast is engaged with a player, The Thing in the Depths attacks that player during the combat phase (deal and resolve a shadow card for this attack).

074cad39-ce55-4dc1-9775-e95363682ef7.Name: Fear of Discovery
074cad39-ce55-4dc1-9775-e95363682ef7.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by 3.
074cad39-ce55-4dc1-9775-e95363682ef7.Text: When Revealed: The first player must either exhaust the Ring-bearer or an additional encounter card.

07690f5d-cc91-437e-bcdf-5010bc69d712.Name: Boar Clan Warrior
07690f5d-cc91-437e-bcdf-5010bc69d712.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each shadow card on it.
07690f5d-cc91-437e-bcdf-5010bc69d712.Text: Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards, deal Boar Clan Warrior a shadow card.

076b47e8-6bbe-41b3-9af8-edeca28e2c0c.Name: Raging Squall
076b47e8-6bbe-41b3-9af8-edeca28e2c0c.Text: When Revealed: Attach Raging Squall to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: After an ally is committed to the quest, deal 1 damage to that ally if you are off-course.”)

076e69c7-156b-46ef-8d11-d6a659da68b2.Name: The Cape of Andrast
076e69c7-156b-46ef-8d11-d6a659da68b2.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of the encounter deck. the Stormcaller places progress on this stage equal to its $ plus the $ of the discarded card. 

If the Stormcaller defeats this stage, Captain Sahír has gotten away with the key, and the players lose the game.

0771f1dc-4baa-4181-9344-4ddd1e59136b.Name: Dwimmerlaik
0771f1dc-4baa-4181-9344-4ddd1e59136b.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reanimate that character and deal it 1 shadow card.
0771f1dc-4baa-4181-9344-4ddd1e59136b.Text: Forced: After Dwimmerlaik attacks and destroys a character, the defending player reanimates that character and deals it 1 shadow card.

07a8f60f-926c-4342-bf04-e3af9a24df10.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel.
07a8f60f-926c-4342-bf04-e3af9a24df10.Name: Dream-chaser
07a8f60f-926c-4342-bf04-e3af9a24df10.Text:
The Dream-chaser can always be committed to Sailing tests (even if you are not the first player), and counts as 2 characters when committed to a Sailing test. 

If the Dream-chaser is destroyed, the players lose the game.

07c4aed0-1673-438f-8e2b-371f34f215b4.Name: Flight to the Ford
07c4aed0-1673-438f-8e2b-371f34f215b4.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

The players cannot win while Ford of Bruinen is in play.

07d3df19-30b4-493c-a8b0-b38695322e71.Name: The White Council
07d3df19-30b4-493c-a8b0-b38695322e71.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.  
  
 Action: Starting with the first player, each player chooses 1 different option: ready a hero he controls, add 1 resource to the resource pool of a hero he controls, draw 1 card, or shuffle 1 card from his discard pile into his deck.

0801c2c0-2bf7-4a0a-838a-13740f6cdbaf.Name: Against the Shadow
0801c2c0-2bf7-4a0a-838a-13740f6cdbaf.Text:
Play only if each hero you control has the printed Ê resource icon.

Action: Until the end of the phase, Ê characters use their Ò instead of Ú.

080f86b2-8cea-4134-8e79-de6312b51ed6.Name: Rescue the Captives
080f86b2-8cea-4134-8e79-de6312b51ed6.Text:
X is the pursuit value.

Response: After an enemy is defeated, reduce the pursuit value by 1.

The players cannot defeat this stage while Uglúk is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they have rescued each Captive hero and won the game.

0834d564-c1f1-4f16-8bc7-d7249d665d5c.Name: Coal-Black Orc
0834d564-c1f1-4f16-8bc7-d7249d665d5c.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û. X is the number of points in the victory display.
0834d564-c1f1-4f16-8bc7-d7249d665d5c.Text: X is the number of victory points in the victory display.

088b62be-0f26-4a87-805a-277edd463c8c.Name: The Old Forest
088b62be-0f26-4a87-805a-277edd463c8c.Text: Resolution: If there are at least 12 damage tokens on Old Man Willow, the players have earned the Old Bogey-Stories boon card.

08af0240-fb38-4a33-a1f0-af07fd496b42.Name: Terror Drives Them
08af0240-fb38-4a33-a1f0-af07fd496b42.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each progress token on To the Tower.
08af0240-fb38-4a33-a1f0-af07fd496b42.Text: When Revealed: Place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

08b55b0b-93e5-42d3-a746-703c7ce9146f.Keywords: Indestructible. Immune to player card effects.
08b55b0b-93e5-42d3-a746-703c7ce9146f.Name: Old Man Willow
08b55b0b-93e5-42d3-a746-703c7ce9146f.Text: Forced: When Old Man Willow attacks, discard a random location from the victory display. The defending player raises his threat by X, where X is that location's victory point value.

09046590-21d9-4e12-ae30-767b759b7ba4.Name: Man the Walls
09046590-21d9-4e12-ae30-767b759b7ba4.Text:
This stage gets -10 quest points for each Host of Angmar in a victory display.

Forced: At the beginning of the round, add 1 set aside Host of Angmar (from any stage's set aside area) to this staging area.

Response: At the end of the round, choose a stage. Each player at that stage draws 1 card.

09134509-191b-4903-b4b5-5e650f8143c1.Keywords: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Limit 1 per hero.
09134509-191b-4903-b4b5-5e650f8143c1.Name: Gondorian Shield
09134509-191b-4903-b4b5-5e650f8143c1.Text: Attached hero gains +1 Ú. (+2 Ú instead if attached hero has the Gondor trait.)

0950c29d-a9f3-4cb4-a61a-0122be9d26f6.Name: Guarded Ceaselessly
0950c29d-a9f3-4cb4-a61a-0122be9d26f6.Text: Action: Exhaust a Ranger or Scout character to give attached location -2 $ until the end of the phase.

097b7d54-bfa9-4b13-a1b8-337b03cac21d.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
097b7d54-bfa9-4b13-a1b8-337b03cac21d.Name: Southron Champion
097b7d54-bfa9-4b13-a1b8-337b03cac21d.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to Minas Tirith.
097b7d54-bfa9-4b13-a1b8-337b03cac21d.Text: Forced: After Southron Champion is dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect, either deal 3 damage to Minas Tirith, or it makes an additional attack after this one.

09aeff64-6e0d-4dfa-af21-2e7805441376.Name: Black Steed
09aeff64-6e0d-4dfa-af21-2e7805441376.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a Nazgul enemy in play, if able. (Counts a Mount attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per enemy. Attached enemy gets -10 engagement cost and gains. 'Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, return attached enemy to the staging area.'")

09b27f8f-60ab-4764-8c78-52fb09597921.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
09b27f8f-60ab-4764-8c78-52fb09597921.Name: Grond
09b27f8f-60ab-4764-8c78-52fb09597921.Text: Immune to player card effects.  X is the number of resources here. Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 resource on Grond. Then, deal X damage to Minas Tirith. Travel: The Witch-king makes an immediate attack against each player, in turn order.

09ebd71c-8286-4838-b661-36a8633c9f0c.Keywords: Each enemy engaged with you gets -1 Ú.
09ebd71c-8286-4838-b661-36a8633c9f0c.Name: Aragorn
09ebd71c-8286-4838-b661-36a8633c9f0c.Text: Response: After Aragorn participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, choose an enemy not engaged with you and engage that enemy.

0a0e6044-c5ab-43ed-832a-71516c7d035a.Name: Boar Clan Stalker
0a0e6044-c5ab-43ed-832a-71516c7d035a.Text:
Boar Clan Stalker gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for each resource token on it (limit +4). 
  
 Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards, put a resource token on Boar Clan Stalker.

0a1166fb-fb90-4651-a8ae-7d532e41c2b6.Name: Fallen Stones
0a1166fb-fb90-4651-a8ae-7d532e41c2b6.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each progress token on the active location.
0a1166fb-fb90-4651-a8ae-7d532e41c2b6.Text: When Revealed: The first player (choose 1): removes all progress tokens from play, or reveals 2 cards from the encounter deck and adds them to the staging area.

0a53cafe-3137-4475-98f8-37818d1b91a5.Name: Nest of Horrors
0a53cafe-3137-4475-98f8-37818d1b91a5.Text:
While Nest of Horrors is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: When one or more cards are attached to a Nameless enemy from the top of a player's deck, attach an additional card from the top of that player's deck." 

Travel: Each player at this stage discards the top card of the encounter deck to travel here. Reveal each Nameless enemy discarded by this effect.

0a6774e7-f110-4917-84b5-1f81a7aefbf8.Name: Patrol Room
0a6774e7-f110-4917-84b5-1f81a7aefbf8.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending player’s threat is 20 or higher).
0a6774e7-f110-4917-84b5-1f81a7aefbf8.Text: Travel: Each player raises his threat by 3 to travel here.

0acfc1ee-22f6-41d9-8cce-594830b42ba8.Name: Fire and Foul Fumes
0acfc1ee-22f6-41d9-8cce-594830b42ba8.Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control. X is the $ of the active location.
0acfc1ee-22f6-41d9-8cce-594830b42ba8.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among questing characters he controls, where X is the $ of the active location. If there is no active location, Fire and Foul Fumes gains surge.

0ae0d2d5-b082-4cc7-b227-9b60c60de8b4.Name: The Hunt is Up!
0ae0d2d5-b082-4cc7-b227-9b60c60de8b4.Text:
During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able.
Forced: After a location enters play, place 1 damage on it.

Forced: After an enemy engages a player, place 1 damage on the active location, if able.

0ae9f4f9-eec9-404f-ae93-7a54287d1bc2.Name: Pillaging and Burning
0ae9f4f9-eec9-404f-ae93-7a54287d1bc2.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards an attachment he controls (each attachment he controls instead if this attack is undefended.
0ae9f4f9-eec9-404f-ae93-7a54287d1bc2.Text: When Revealed: Each player draws a card. Each player raises his threat by 1 for each card in his hand.

0b179f39-f202-4fe7-b930-0f3db582bc3e.Name: The Red Arrow
0b179f39-f202-4fe7-b930-0f3db582bc3e.Text:
Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a Gondor hero. 
Attached hero gets +1 Ò. 
Valour Response: After attached hero quests successfully, add The Red Arrow to the victory display to search the top 5 cards of your deck for an ally and put it into play.

0b229535-c078-4f47-b781-7e84de1f0eb5.Name: The Road Goes Ever On
0b229535-c078-4f47-b781-7e84de1f0eb5.Text: Attach to a quest card in play. Response: When attached quest is defeated, the first player chooses a player. That players searches his deck for a side quest, adds it to his hand, and shuffles his deck.

0b483cda-22e0-418d-b906-8a93e94fe95d.Keywords: Attach to a quest card in play. Limit 1 per quest.
0b483cda-22e0-418d-b906-8a93e94fe95d.Name: The Long Defeat
0b483cda-22e0-418d-b906-8a93e94fe95d.Text: Response: After attached quest card is defeated, each player either draws 2 cards or heals up to 5 damage from characters he controls.

0b6022c0-c46c-411f-90b3-b6ad267ebb8e.Name: Angmar Raider
0b6022c0-c46c-411f-90b3-b6ad267ebb8e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Ú until the end of the phase.
0b6022c0-c46c-411f-90b3-b6ad267ebb8e.Text: Forced: After a character the engaged player controls is healed, Angmar Raider makes an immediate attack.

0bb77cd5-0340-4411-9e1f-997b1d6cb35a.Name: Escape into the Jungle
0bb77cd5-0340-4411-9e1f-997b1d6cb35a.Text: Uruk Chieftain cannot take non-combat damage.Each non-unique Orc enemy gets -10 engagement cost.Forced: After Uruk Chieftain engages a player, it makes an immediate attack.The players cannot defeat this stage while Uruk Chieftain is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

0bc8f9e4-7eac-4ac6-ae91-f5ba5d5052aa.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
0bc8f9e4-7eac-4ac6-ae91-f5ba5d5052aa.Name: Howling of Wargs
0bc8f9e4-7eac-4ac6-ae91-f5ba5d5052aa.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 shadow card to each enemy engaged with you that has not attacked this phase.
0bc8f9e4-7eac-4ac6-ae91-f5ba5d5052aa.Text: When Revealed: Either deal 1 shadow card to each enemy in the staging area, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a side quest and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck if it is searched.

0bd34136-ae3d-44aa-b48f-7190c14f4b3b.Keywords: X is the number of locations in the staging area.
0bd34136-ae3d-44aa-b48f-7190c14f4b3b.Name: Plains of Rohan
0bd34136-ae3d-44aa-b48f-7190c14f4b3b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, increase the pursuit value by 1.

0c030b4b-1012-4b80-a942-0177e3923903.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
0c030b4b-1012-4b80-a942-0177e3923903.Name: Wraith on Wings
0c030b4b-1012-4b80-a942-0177e3923903.Text: Setup: Add Wraith on Wings to the staging area. Cannot have non-Morgul attachments. Wraith on Wings gets +1 $ and -1 engagement cost for each resource on it. (Limit 5.) Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 resource on Wraith on Wings.

0c0f7215-3a7f-489c-9edc-4fd5b896e635.Name: Lost and Helpless
0c0f7215-3a7f-489c-9edc-4fd5b896e635.Shadow: Shadow: If you have no cards in your hand, discard defending character from play.
0c0f7215-3a7f-489c-9edc-4fd5b896e635.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Lost: Discard attached hero.")

0c0fdef7-f55a-4bcf-91f9-317cd7a00777.Name: The Council of Elrond
0c0fdef7-f55a-4bcf-91f9-317cd7a00777.Text: Forced: At the end of the planning phase, each player places the top card of his deck faceup in front of him, in player order, until there are a total of 4 faceup cards between the players. The first player chooses 1 faceup card to player for 0 cost, 1 to add to its owners hand, 1 to discard, and 1 to shuffle into its owner's deck. Then, either shuffle Lust for the Ring into the encounter deck, or raise each player's threat by 5. Advance to stage 2.

0c15f99d-9066-4e7c-b364-104a0083d997.Name: Midnight
0c15f99d-9066-4e7c-b364-104a0083d997.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 progress on Midnight. Then, raise each player's threat by the number of progress on Midnight.

0c44ed2b-976a-4b17-b7e7-e64b20f74fd7.Name: Ancient Harbor
0c44ed2b-976a-4b17-b7e7-e64b20f74fd7.Text:
Combat Action: Exhaust a hero to place 1 progress token on Ancient Harbor.

Forced: After the player who controls Ancient Harbor lets an attack go undefended, return Ancient Harbor to the staging area.

0c4b67f7-6bd3-452b-8a7d-8b1e206dca0e.Name: Overcome by Grief
0c4b67f7-6bd3-452b-8a7d-8b1e206dca0e.Text:
Setup: Add Overcome by Grief to the staging area.
Forced: After a character is destroyed, if Overcome by Grief is unattached, attach to a hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After a character you control is destroyed, exhaust attached hero. Until the end of the round, attached hero cannot ready.")

0c6923ad-efbd-46b0-b5fc-93f90334ecf5.Name: Isengard Orc
0c6923ad-efbd-46b0-b5fc-93f90334ecf5.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, attacking enemy gets +2 Ú.
0c6923ad-efbd-46b0-b5fc-93f90334ecf5.Text:
Peril. Archery 1.
When Revealed: Either discard 1 random card from your hand, or reveal an encounter card.

0ca1652a-2733-4a38-9eff-53b527fb94a9.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
0ca1652a-2733-4a38-9eff-53b527fb94a9.Name: Writhing Tentacle
0ca1652a-2733-4a38-9eff-53b527fb94a9.Text: Forced: When Writing Tentacle engages a player, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy, Writhing Tentacle makes an immediate attack, then attaches to the defending character as a Tentacle attachment with the text: "Attached character cannot commit to the quest."

0cb30c28-b71c-4337-a4d1-6d5bc491bf81.Name: Prison Cell
0cb30c28-b71c-4337-a4d1-6d5bc491bf81.Text: While Prison Cell is the active location, it gains: "Planning Action" Rescue a random card from underneath Prison Cell. Then, raise each player's threat by X, where X is that card's printed cost. (Limit once per round)."

0cb6d866-50dd-4eb0-a86a-8ed84bfeae0e.Name: Grishnákh
0cb6d866-50dd-4eb0-a86a-8ed84bfeae0e.Text:
Forced: After Grishnákh enters play, the first player attaches 1 of the Captives to him. If Grishnákh is defeated, place the attached Captive faceup underneath To Isengard! 

Forced: At the end of the quest phase, deal 1 damage to the attached Captive.

0cdc4034-738d-487d-9a8c-8ef364772076.Name: Hold the Fords
0cdc4034-738d-487d-9a8c-8ef364772076.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard the top X cards of the encounter deck.  X is the number of card's in the first player's hand.  Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.  Put 3 time counters on this stage.

While there is at least 1 enemy in play, the players cannot defeat this stage.  If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

0d0b210e-995a-4ded-b7b0-d32b59dbaa4f.Name: Free to Choose
0d0b210e-995a-4ded-b7b0-d32b59dbaa4f.Text: Response: After your threat is raised by an encounter card effect, reduce your threat by an equal amount.

0d30fbf1-6e8f-480f-9f2f-3196777f6e11.Name: Bag End
0d30fbf1-6e8f-480f-9f2f-3196777f6e11.Text: Response: After Bag End leaves play, each player draws 1 card for each Hobbit hero he controls.

0d3586ef-3159-4066-8417-aba5c379739a.Name: Very Weary
0d3586ef-3159-4066-8417-aba5c379739a.Text: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a questing character he controls. Until the end of the phase, each damaged character gets -2 Ò.

0d74f863-83c9-4342-ac98-5bbaae0a573f.Name: Heavy Cruiser
0d74f863-83c9-4342-ac98-5bbaae0a573f.Text: Cannot have attachments. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dol Amroth objective and add it to the staging area. Then, attach Heavy Cruiser to that objective, guarding it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

0da6ffc3-cbf5-427f-af9a-60f4f6bd1fb9.Name: Dour-handed
0da6ffc3-cbf5-427f-af9a-60f4f6bd1fb9.Text: Action: Deal X damage to an enemy engaged with you. X is the number of side quests in the victory display.

0daf1963-a45f-4fe1-bd0b-ad901a1213fa.Name: Giant Arm
0daf1963-a45f-4fe1-bd0b-ad901a1213fa.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, either put Giant Arm into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card, or resolve its Grapple ability.
0daf1963-a45f-4fe1-bd0b-ad901a1213fa.Text: Giant Arm gets +2 Û when attacking allies.

0db0ef38-f9c4-47b1-a6a9-0aa5b9c1f538.Name: Little Snuffler
0db0ef38-f9c4-47b1-a6a9-0aa5b9c1f538.Text:
When Revealed: Trigger Little Snuffler's Scour effect.
Scour: The first player discards a random card from his hand and assigns X damage among locations in the staging area. X is the discarded card's cost.

0e0b125c-ffed-4473-9a64-7d709b16cca5.Name: Orders from Orthanc
0e0b125c-ffed-4473-9a64-7d709b16cca5.Text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck for a Mountain location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then, advance to Stage 2

0e12b3e5-d330-4a13-be7b-5a07a57a2273.Name: The Enemy is Upon Us!
0e12b3e5-d330-4a13-be7b-5a07a57a2273.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.
0e12b3e5-d330-4a13-be7b-5a07a57a2273.Text: When Revealed: Each engaged enemy makes an immediate attack.  If no attack is made this way, The Enemy is Upon Us! gains surge.

0e1451ba-5fa6-4a13-869b-d23d9ecef15e.Name: Shady Bree-Lander
0e1451ba-5fa6-4a13-869b-d23d9ecef15e.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ú (-2 Ú instead if The One Ring is exhausted).
0e1451ba-5fa6-4a13-869b-d23d9ecef15e.Text: While the One Ring is exhausted, Shady Bree-lander gains: "Cannot be optionally engaged."

0e192334-fa2b-4c1a-bfab-0aa44bf88db4.Name: Find Shelter
0e192334-fa2b-4c1a-bfab-0aa44bf88db4.Text: Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this quest card, each player deals 4 damage to a hero he controls. Then, place 4 time counters on this quest card.

0e205159-5e62-4d24-b0df-635853aea9c0.Name: Forbidden Descent
0e205159-5e62-4d24-b0df-635853aea9c0.Text:
While Forbidden Descent is in the staging area, the first 2 progress that would be placed on a quest each round must be placed on Forbidden Descent, instead.

Forced: If Forbidden Descent leaves play from the staging area, raise each player’s threat by 2.

0e3ce28a-df4b-461e-b47a-299e4c730cc2.Name: Groping Dead
0e3ce28a-df4b-461e-b47a-299e4c730cc2.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, place 1 mire token on the active location.
0e3ce28a-df4b-461e-b47a-299e4c730cc2.Text:
The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.

Forced: After Groping Dead destroys a character, place 1 mire token on the active location.

0e58ae5a-0670-4c00-836a-3bef017bf279.Name: Port of Harad
0e58ae5a-0670-4c00-836a-3bef017bf279.Text: X is the number of engaged enemies.Travel: Assign X damage among characters in play to travel here.

0e9fb174-59a2-4e7b-8eab-1f9185f75ea7.Name: Hithaeglir Foothills
0e9fb174-59a2-4e7b-8eab-1f9185f75ea7.Text:
X is the number of resource tokens on this card.  
  
 Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, place 1 resource token here.

0eb36ad6-db76-4e69-b77c-77ff7da8661d.Name: The Mines of Belegost
0eb36ad6-db76-4e69-b77c-77ff7da8661d.Text:
During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able.

Forced: After resolving the Discover keyword, if no Hazard card was revealed by that effect, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

Forced: When this stage is defeated, if Blue Mountain Gem is attached to a hero advance to stage 4A. Otherwise, advance to stage 3A.

0ebedc5b-fd8b-46b8-a2a1-1a6f739e8819.Name: Ancestral Clearing
0ebedc5b-fd8b-46b8-a2a1-1a6f739e8819.Text:
The cost to play each player card is increased by 1.

Travel: Exhaust a hero to travel here.

0ec5f691-e5b3-41b5-bcec-2f963786ef4d.Name: Up the Pass
0ec5f691-e5b3-41b5-bcec-2f963786ef4d.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add it to the staging area.

0ee09c42-34c9-41aa-aa98-b582608b15bb.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 3
0ee09c42-34c9-41aa-aa98-b582608b15bb.Name: Flight to the Ford
0ee09c42-34c9-41aa-aa98-b582608b15bb.Text: Resolution: Add each burden card in player, in the encounter deck, and in the discard pile to the Campaign Pool.  Then added cards have been earned by the players.

0ee1f1e6-1952-4bad-8ecd-631e80f4ccc0.Name: Firefoot
0ee1f1e6-1952-4bad-8ecd-631e80f4ccc0.Text:
Attach to a Ï or Rohan hero. Restricted.  
  
 Attached hero gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if attached hero is Éomer).  
  
 Response: After attached hero attacks alone, exhaust Firefoot to choose a non-unique enemy engaged with you. Excess damage dealt by this attack is assigned to the chosen enemy

0ef9e385-b7e5-4676-a690-2dd8031aa8c8.Name: Ring of Barahir
0ef9e385-b7e5-4676-a690-2dd8031aa8c8.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 hit point for each Artifact attachment attached to it.

If attached hero is Aragorn, he also gains a Î resource icon.

0f02460f-4ab8-4060-b520-0f82cbb8ce37.Name: Rest by Night?
0f02460f-4ab8-4060-b520-0f82cbb8ce37.Text: When Revealed: Either immediately end the quest phase and increase the pursuit value by 3, or deal 1 damage to each character committed to the quest. This effect cannot be canceled.

0f027b32-f63f-4d37-8305-5ba2b059289d.Name: Well-Equipped
0f027b32-f63f-4d37-8305-5ba2b059289d.Text: Action: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. You may attach 1 attachment card discarded by this effect to an eligible Dwarf character in play.

0f201650-6d15-4909-9d06-0a87ab94f327.Name: Hired Muscle
0f201650-6d15-4909-9d06-0a87ab94f327.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a Brigand enemy without a copy of Hired Muscle attacked and return that enemy to the staging area. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Attached enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú and gains: 'Forced: When attached enemy is defeated, look at the bottom of the Investigation deck.)'

0f2501c7-16ad-4fee-bea6-17b767fb0d14.Name: Guardian of Arnor
0f2501c7-16ad-4fee-bea6-17b767fb0d14.Text: Guardian of Arnor gets +1 Ú for each enemy engaged with you.

0f5ffc36-fe0f-4097-ad67-dafda700d96f.Name: Arador's Bane
0f5ffc36-fe0f-4097-ad67-dafda700d96f.Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must either engage an enemy in the staging area with a higher engagement cost than his threat, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Troll or Giant enemy and add it to the staging area. Deal each enemy that engages a player through this effect 2 shadow cards.

0f6dfe98-9645-4c52-93d1-cd6e9089c640.Name: Shadowy Thicket
0f6dfe98-9645-4c52-93d1-cd6e9089c640.Text:
Shadowy Thicket gets +2 $ for each facedown card under The Black Gate.
Travel: The first player reveals the top facedown card under The Cross-roads and adds it to the staging area to travel here.

0f7ce386-9510-4fd5-93aa-145190f8d1de.Name: Slave Ship
0f7ce386-9510-4fd5-93aa-145190f8d1de.Text: Boarding 1. Cannot have attachments.For each point of damage that is dealt to a Ship objective by Slave Ship’s attack, deal 1 point of damage to a non-Ship character controlled by the defending player, as well.

0f939a7b-8a2e-4358-b3b1-e50b3eef7c0b.Name: Twisting Shadows
0f939a7b-8a2e-4358-b3b1-e50b3eef7c0b.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each Dark location in play.
0f939a7b-8a2e-4358-b3b1-e50b3eef7c0b.Text:
X is the number of Dark locations in play.
When Revealed: Remove all progress from each Dark location in play.

0f9b520c-f5c8-4704-a887-feb72fe7cba5.Name: A Horrible Battle
0f9b520c-f5c8-4704-a887-feb72fe7cba5.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against the defending player after this one.
0f9b520c-f5c8-4704-a887-feb72fe7cba5.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either give 1 poison to each hero he controls, or reveal an encounter card.

0fc7db5e-c389-4636-8c34-3d1dee3508ce.Name: Gríma
0fc7db5e-c389-4636-8c34-3d1dee3508ce.Shadow: Shadow: This attack is considered undefended.
0fc7db5e-c389-4636-8c34-3d1dee3508ce.Text:
Doomed 2.
Forced: After Grima attacks a player, that player shuffles Gríma back into the encounter deck and reveals an encounter card.

10557685-71b2-4f2e-b831-4b19d023ee46.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
10557685-71b2-4f2e-b831-4b19d023ee46.Name: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
10557685-71b2-4f2e-b831-4b19d023ee46.Text:
Forced: When the players advance to stage 5B, add each set aside Harad enemy to the staging area.
Resolution: Add 1 copy, per player, of Wraith on Wings to the campaign pool. The players have earned those burdens. If Esquire of Gondor, or Esquire of Rohan, is attached to a hero, that hero's controller has earned that boon.
10557685-71b2-4f2e-b831-4b19d023ee46.Traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 15

10c41b09-adf9-4a78-a67a-a9a1e04d7e8d.Name: Weighed Down
10c41b09-adf9-4a78-a67a-a9a1e04d7e8d.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character is destroyed by this attack, its controller must raise his threat by 5.
10c41b09-adf9-4a78-a67a-a9a1e04d7e8d.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, exhausted characters get -1 Ò, -1 Û, and -1 Ú.

10dc0c5d-a434-4d77-a06f-5ed0c1d4ac46.Keywords: Discover 5. Immune to player card effects.
10dc0c5d-a434-4d77-a06f-5ed0c1d4ac46.Name: Naurlhûg's Lair
10dc0c5d-a434-4d77-a06f-5ed0c1d4ac46.Text:
Forced: When Naurlhûg's Lair is explored, add the Loot objective from underneath Stalking the Ruins to the staging area faceup.
Travel: Place X resources on Stalking the Ruins, where X is the number of players.

10e7e890-727f-49ae-bd5d-d769812d9dce.Name: Down From The Hills
10e7e890-727f-49ae-bd5d-d769812d9dce.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: Either remove 1 time counter from the current quest, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dunland enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. If any player has 5 or more cards in hand, this effect cannot be canceled.

1156ac5f-09cf-418b-9486-030b397a5514.Name: Hidden Eyot
1156ac5f-09cf-418b-9486-030b397a5514.Text:
Response: After Hidden Eyot leaves play as an explored location, place 2 time counters on the current quest.

Travel: Each player must exhaust a character he controls to travel here.

118672b6-c6e2-43ec-ae3d-8657d8b659d5.Name: The Blood of Gondor
118672b6-c6e2-43ec-ae3d-8657d8b659d5.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Setup: Each player takes 1 hidden card. The players cannot win the game unless The Crossroads and Black Númenórean are in the victory display.

119cfabc-2cbf-4ffd-a25e-00ec140b8f26.Name: Orc Hound
119cfabc-2cbf-4ffd-a25e-00ec140b8f26.Text: Forced:  After Orc Hound engages a player, that player must exhaust a character he controls.

11cb3eda-b7fa-493f-a9fd-cd31e5ae41f2.Name: Were-worm
11cb3eda-b7fa-493f-a9fd-cd31e5ae41f2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the temperature is 40 or higher).
11cb3eda-b7fa-493f-a9fd-cd31e5ae41f2.Text: X is the tens digit of the temperature.Forced: After Were-worm engages you, it makes an immediate attack. (Do not deal it a shadow card.)

11e8544f-fe65-4365-8f51-10a3ef267dc8.Name: Staddle Hiding Hole
11e8544f-fe65-4365-8f51-10a3ef267dc8.Text: Immune to player card effects. While Staddle Hiding Hole is in the victory display, each player not engaged with a Suspect cannot declare attackers against that Suspect. Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Greenway Footpad, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

1208f735-6984-4c4d-ab8c-429664e4e060.Name: Raven Chief's Camp
1208f735-6984-4c4d-ab8c-429664e4e060.Text: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, exhaust each damaged character. Place 3 time counters on this location.

123bc772-2c27-4f26-a7f2-a3c4928a9dc4.Name: Restless Evil
123bc772-2c27-4f26-a7f2-a3c4928a9dc4.Shadow: Shadow: Each Undead enemy engaged with you gets +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round.
123bc772-2c27-4f26-a7f2-a3c4928a9dc4.Text: When Revealed: Each Undead enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú until the end of the round. If there are no Undead enemies in play, Restless Evil gains surge.

12429164-0155-45e4-aa1c-e94292084bdf.Name: Gathering Forces
12429164-0155-45e4-aa1c-e94292084bdf.Shadow: Put the top card of the Raven deck into play, engaged with you.
12429164-0155-45e4-aa1c-e94292084bdf.Text: When Revealed: Add the top 2 cards of the Raven Deck to the staging area. If any player has 5 or more cards in hand, this effect cannot be canceled.

125e7884-7f75-42cd-80ba-065cf88eef9a.Name: The Great Hall
125e7884-7f75-42cd-80ba-065cf88eef9a.Text: Forced: When The Great Hall is explored, each player discards the top 5 cards of the encounter deck and chooses an Undead enemy he discarded in this way to add to the staging area.

128f940d-8a71-4a80-83c2-bdbc014d95c9.Name: Gather Information
128f940d-8a71-4a80-83c2-bdbc014d95c9.Text: Response: After this stage is defeated, each player may search his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Each player shuffles his deck.

12946b30-a231-4074-a524-960365081360.Name: Thurindir
12946b30-a231-4074-a524-960365081360.Text:
Thurindir gets +1 Ò for each side quest in the victory display.
Setup: Search your deck for a side quest and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

129f6237-c00c-41a2-af6e-98a6f966aad1.Name: Kahliel’s Tribesman
129f6237-c00c-41a2-af6e-98a6f966aad1.Text: Action: Exhaust Kahliel’s Tribesman to choose another Harad character. That character gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

12ce640e-dd4e-4c02-be87-f273252cc9be.Keywords: Attach to a location. Limit 1 per location.
12ce640e-dd4e-4c02-be87-f273252cc9be.Name: Hithlain
12ce640e-dd4e-4c02-be87-f273252cc9be.Text: Response: After a player plays a Silvan ally from his hand, place 1 progress on attached location.

12d436ac-15e6-47c5-8288-357c918071a7.Keywords: Attach to a Silvan character with the ranged keyword.  Restricted.
12d436ac-15e6-47c5-8288-357c918071a7.Name: Bow of the Galadhrim
12d436ac-15e6-47c5-8288-357c918071a7.Text: Attached character gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if attacking an enemy not engaged with you.)

12d51424-0edd-4977-9df1-5f6a7a5a96e1.Name: Mithril Shirt
12d51424-0edd-4977-9df1-5f6a7a5a96e1.Text: Attached hero gets +1 Ú and +1 hit point.

12dd413b-fe0f-40ca-b871-480ca88ade09.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
12dd413b-fe0f-40ca-b871-480ca88ade09.Name: A Knife in the Dark
12dd413b-fe0f-40ca-b871-480ca88ade09.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

While Bill Ferny is in the staging area, he gains: "Immune to player card effects."

130df5c3-a050-4690-8dac-d1ae937a2e3c.Keywords: Attach to a Dúnedain or Noldor hero. Limit 1 per hero.
130df5c3-a050-4690-8dac-d1ae937a2e3c.Name: Star Brooch
130df5c3-a050-4690-8dac-d1ae937a2e3c.Text: While you are engaged with an enemy, attached hero gets +1 Ò and cannot have its Ò reduced.

1339dfb5-49c1-46ce-a4c9-970d0e118cfa.Keywords:
Guarded. Safe.
Immune to player card effects.
1339dfb5-49c1-46ce-a4c9-970d0e118cfa.Name: Abandoned Camp
1339dfb5-49c1-46ce-a4c9-970d0e118cfa.Text: Response: After you travel to Abandoned Camp, each player may return 1 card from his discard pile to his hand.

1371a0af-e085-42e4-8cd7-a2007da158e1.Name: To Isengard!
1371a0af-e085-42e4-8cd7-a2007da158e1.Text:
Treat each Captive’s text box as blank. Captive heroes are in play but are not under any player’s control. If there are no Captives in play, the players lose the game.

Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, increase the pursuit value by 1. Then, if the pursuit value is 30 or greater, the players lose the game.

1384425f-206b-47ab-96ed-c322e7295a75.Name: Orc Abductor
1384425f-206b-47ab-96ed-c322e7295a75.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
1384425f-206b-47ab-96ed-c322e7295a75.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, if Orc Abductor is in the staging area, search the encounter, discard pile and victory display for Rescue Iârion, and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

13a4b435-fa14-42b8-975e-804d3b8b929d.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. X is the number of players in the game.
13a4b435-fa14-42b8-975e-804d3b8b929d.Name: The Argonath
13a4b435-fa14-42b8-975e-804d3b8b929d.Text: The players cannot travel here while Sarn Gebir is in play. While The Argonath is the active location, skip the combat phase.

13b4d81e-1bd7-4a56-a418-b60e58767c12.Name: Dunland Battlefield
13b4d81e-1bd7-4a56-a418-b60e58767c12.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
13b4d81e-1bd7-4a56-a418-b60e58767c12.Text: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of cards in his hand.

13c23487-ad49-437b-be41-1c09dd5c30e4.Name: Black Númenorean
13c23487-ad49-437b-be41-1c09dd5c30e4.Text:
X is the total number of hidden cards in the game. 

Forced: When Black Númenórean engages you, turn all hidden cards in your play area faceup. 
Forced: At the end of the round, each player must raise his threat by 1 for each hidden card in his play area.

14531c46-aad5-4090-bb7d-2edf9f78e5ff.Name: Blooded Berserker
14531c46-aad5-4090-bb7d-2edf9f78e5ff.Text: Forced: When Bloodied Berserker is dealt a shadow card with no effect, either place 2 progress on the active location, or Blooded Berserker makes an additional attack against you.

14820d35-cb36-499b-80ec-da6442548f7b.Name: Elfhelm
14820d35-cb36-499b-80ec-da6442548f7b.Text:
Each Ê hero with an attached Mount gets +1 Ò.
Each Ï hero with an attached Mount gets +1 Û.
Each Ì hero with an attached Mount gets +1 Ú.

14936075-9e6a-43af-9497-dbee9df95781.Name: Feigned Voices
14936075-9e6a-43af-9497-dbee9df95781.Text: Combat Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

14be3661-3f3c-4a89-b27f-ab7c15f92e4e.Name: Fell Voices
14be3661-3f3c-4a89-b27f-ab7c15f92e4e.Text: When Revealed: Return the top 2 Snow cards in the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck. If this effect returned less than 2 Snow treachery cards, Fell Voices gains surge.

14cbe0e1-0916-427f-8f19-abef59232dd2.Keywords: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.
14cbe0e1-0916-427f-8f19-abef59232dd2.Name: Phial of Galadriel
14cbe0e1-0916-427f-8f19-abef59232dd2.Text: Action: Add Phial of Galadriel to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool, to give each enemy engaged with you –4 Û until the end of the round.

14f7c98c-b425-4fac-850a-729d8fcdaa0c.Name: Banks of Morthond
14f7c98c-b425-4fac-850a-729d8fcdaa0c.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, add 1 progress to the current Night objective.
14f7c98c-b425-4fac-850a-729d8fcdaa0c.Text: While Banks of Morthond is the active location, each location in the staging area gets -1 $

14fb1fba-dd55-4511-80f3-14808fc0f174.Name: Chamber of Mazarbul
14fb1fba-dd55-4511-80f3-14808fc0f174.Text:
The players cannot advance to the next stage.

Travel: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different enemy and adds it to the staging area to travel here. One of those enemies must be Orc-chieftan, if able.

152a0b0a-7e01-41ce-98a4-3e7b0d6eaac4.Name: Curse of the Years
152a0b0a-7e01-41ce-98a4-3e7b0d6eaac4.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if the defending player does not control at least 1 Clue objective).
152a0b0a-7e01-41ce-98a4-3e7b0d6eaac4.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. Each player with a threat of 35 or higher must also discard each exhausted attachment he controls.

15602096-12af-47a0-9f9a-01778d2b0a7b.Name: Hills of Dunland
15602096-12af-47a0-9f9a-01778d2b0a7b.Text:
While Hills of Dunland is in the staging area, it gains: 'Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is a Dunland enemy, put it into play engaged with that player. This ability does not stack with other copies of Hills of Dunland. 
  
 Travel: Each player draws a card to travel here.

156ed210-ab6e-4da9-b8c0-48984711edf2.Name: Ranger of the North
156ed210-ab6e-4da9-b8c0-48984711edf2.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a player to take control of Ranger of the North. Then, either deal 2 damage to an enemy or place 2 progress tokens on a location.

15734584-04cf-41b7-8a86-d1a435d6f8dc.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
15734584-04cf-41b7-8a86-d1a435d6f8dc.Name: The Witch-king
15734584-04cf-41b7-8a86-d1a435d6f8dc.Text:
Only the engaged player can declare attackers against The Witch-king.

Forced: At the beginning of the envounter phase, The Witch-king engages the first player. Then, it makes an immediate attack.

1589883f-87ae-4f4d-a92b-e5e23c25c8e0.Name: The Orcs' Search
1589883f-87ae-4f4d-a92b-e5e23c25c8e0.Text:
When a location has damage equal to its printed quest points, place it facedown underneath The Orcs’ Search.

Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, raise each player’s threat by 1 for each card underneath The Orcs’ Search.

159f5a8f-1e1f-4282-9936-94b10e348176.Name: Throngs of Unfaithful
159f5a8f-1e1f-4282-9936-94b10e348176.Text: Forced: When Throngs of Unfaithful is destroyed, discard the bottom card of the engaged player’s deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, return Throngs of Unfaithful to the top of the encounter deck.

159f7a00-2c31-4e64-8adc-6143a5a7d8bb.Name: Necromancer of Carn Dûm
159f7a00-2c31-4e64-8adc-6143a5a7d8bb.Text: Forced: When Necromancer of Carn Dûm would attack you, instead reanimate the top card of your deck and deal it each of the Necromancer of Carn Dûm's shadow cards.

15ccb88a-9a78-4aac-a1f2-839070a19016.Name: Relentless Attack
15ccb88a-9a78-4aac-a1f2-839070a19016.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Each enemy gets -X engagement cost. X is the number of locations controlled by players. Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, if there are fewer than X enemies in the staging area, reveal an encounter card.")

15e5feb5-73f4-4472-b279-1887ff29f691.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
15e5feb5-73f4-4472-b279-1887ff29f691.Name: Pine Slopes
15e5feb5-73f4-4472-b279-1887ff29f691.Shadow: Shadow: Deal attacking enemy 2 additional shadow cards for this attack.
15e5feb5-73f4-4472-b279-1887ff29f691.Text: Forced: Each time a Í resource is spent or discarded, raise each player's threat by 1.

1600dd03-7b19-4dd2-924c-30c30b09cb9d.Name: Black Sails
1600dd03-7b19-4dd2-924c-30c30b09cb9d.Text: When Revealed: Each Ship location in the staging area gets +1 $. If there are no non-unique Ship locations in the staging area, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ship location and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

160c8dcb-baa1-4176-9308-7328e500d62e.Name: Wraith of Carn Dûm
160c8dcb-baa1-4176-9308-7328e500d62e.Text: Forced: When Wraith of Carn Dûm leaves play, attach it to a character in play. (Counts as a Sorcery attachment with the text: “Attached character has –1 Ò, –1 Û, and –1 Ú. If the attached character leaves play, return Wraith of Carn Dûm to the staging area as an enemy.”)

16361c0e-f422-44d4-8f25-bc32b7a9aadd.Name: Scouting Ship
16361c0e-f422-44d4-8f25-bc32b7a9aadd.Text: Scouting Ship gets –15 engagement cost while you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾).

16381c8d-c437-4bde-b7da-284c5216bcb6.Name: The Houses of Healing
16381c8d-c437-4bde-b7da-284c5216bcb6.Text: You may exhaust any number of Healer characters you control as part of this card’s cost. Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 for each Healer character you exhaust in this way. Refresh Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that hero into play under its owner's control, with 1 damage token on it.

1665d088-793c-4350-82f3-e35fd307463d.Name: Beyond All Hope
1665d088-793c-4350-82f3-e35fd307463d.Text:
Setup: Attach to a hero.

Attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, +1 Ú and cannot have treachery card attachments.

168c62d8-bb38-4258-9d2b-6b46aef6c700.Name: Fearless Scout
168c62d8-bb38-4258-9d2b-6b46aef6c700.Text: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero gains the Scout trait. Response: After you play Fearless Scout from your hand, draw a card.

1698dbfd-7649-44ef-b618-6171e626caa6.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
1698dbfd-7649-44ef-b618-6171e626caa6.Name: The Ring's Will
1698dbfd-7649-44ef-b618-6171e626caa6.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player then makes an immediate attack.
1698dbfd-7649-44ef-b618-6171e626caa6.Text: When Revealed: Raise each player's threat by 5. This effect cannot be canceled by the Ring-bearer's effect, or if The One Ring is exhausted.

16ae4f56-d8bb-41b8-a992-1da3b6ec1fdb.Name: To me! O my kinsfolk!
16ae4f56-d8bb-41b8-a992-1da3b6ec1fdb.Text: Action: If you control at least 1 Dwarf hero, put a Dwarf ally from your discard pile into play under your control. Put that ally on the bottom of your deck at the end of the phase.

16b71211-85c1-4ad4-8879-831bc7b50ac4.Name: Mugash
16b71211-85c1-4ad4-8879-831bc7b50ac4.Text:
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. Attach Mugash to that hero.

Forced: After attached hero takes damage, return Mugash to the top of the encounter deck.

17039c31-d3fd-4730-8b74-8f08458071fe.Name: Goblin Ambush
17039c31-d3fd-4730-8b74-8f08458071fe.Text:
X is 1 plus the number of players in the game.
Forced: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 progress on this stage.
Progress cannot be placed on Goblin Ambush except by the above effect.

1733be6c-2101-4f83-816b-f730b4afc183.Name: Caught in the Press
1733be6c-2101-4f83-816b-f730b4afc183.Shadow: Shadow: Either remove 2 progress from the main quest, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
1733be6c-2101-4f83-816b-f730b4afc183.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either deal 1 damage to each questing character you control or each questing character you control gets -1 Ò until the end of the phase.

17353135-52af-42a8-a6af-3b2e9148bf5f.Name: Devil's Mirk
17353135-52af-42a8-a6af-3b2e9148bf5f.Text:
While Devil's Mirk is in the staging area, characters cannot be healed.
While Devil's Mirk is the active location, each Wose enenemy gets +2 Ú.

174507ac-5617-4e3c-998b-75eeceb9db33.Name: The Road to Tharbad
174507ac-5617-4e3c-998b-75eeceb9db33.Text: Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, each player discards his hand and draws 2 cards. Place 2 time counters on this stage.

178fd61d-ebb3-40b1-b854-4c7bc43c121e.Name: Defend the City
178fd61d-ebb3-40b1-b854-4c7bc43c121e.Text:
This stage gets -10 quest points for each Host of Angmar in a victory display.

Forced: After the players have committed characters to the quest, the highest Û enemy in the staging area makes an attack against each player in turn order. If no attacks are made in this way, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

Response: At the end of the round, choose a stage. Each player at that stage heals 1 damage from a character he controls.

17cb8a9a-6369-4ea9-a614-02908bd7b77f.Name: Wingfoot
17cb8a9a-6369-4ea9-a614-02908bd7b77f.Text: Response: After attached hero commits to a quest, name enemy, location, or treachery. If a card of the named type is revealed during this quest phase, ready attached hero.

17ed9b53-19f5-4ad1-ab91-14c2859e5a60.Keywords: Attach to Galadriel. She gains a Î resource icon.
17ed9b53-19f5-4ad1-ab91-14c2859e5a60.Name: Nenya
17ed9b53-19f5-4ad1-ab91-14c2859e5a60.Text: Quest Action: Exhaust Nenya and Galadriel to add her Ò to another character's Ò until the end of the phase.

18150bb4-3157-429c-b958-af1210acd4b2.Name: Noxious Fumes
18150bb4-3157-429c-b958-af1210acd4b2.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, place 1 progress on To the Tower.
18150bb4-3157-429c-b958-af1210acd4b2.Text: When Revealed: Place 1 progress token on To the Tower. Each player must assign damage among characters he controls equal to the number of progress token on To the Tower.

18484359-d4b5-4ed6-b7be-e013fae4df43.Name: Hunting the Orcs
18484359-d4b5-4ed6-b7be-e013fae4df43.Text:
Forced: After Savage Counter-attack enters play, advance to stage 2A.

Forced: After an enemy attacks and destroys a character, discard 1 resource token here.

If there are no resource tokens here, the players lose the game.

1851fafb-7f9a-46d7-a0f0-7fb2ad9ee567.Name: Rode Like a Gale
1851fafb-7f9a-46d7-a0f0-7fb2ad9ee567.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
1851fafb-7f9a-46d7-a0f0-7fb2ad9ee567.Text: When Revealed: Return each engaged Nazgul enemy to the staging area.  If no enemies were returned to the staging area by this effect, Rode Like a Gale gains surge.

185d7d65-ebec-4d7a-aca0-b5b2e3449c3c.Name: Farewell to the Shire
185d7d65-ebec-4d7a-aca0-b5b2e3449c3c.Text: When Revealed: Each player draws 1 card. Advance to a random stage 2A.

1866ce74-8552-4ac5-8b0a-1e7a6f3b4338.Name: Into Mirkwood
1866ce74-8552-4ac5-8b0a-1e7a6f3b4338.Text: Unconscious characters cannot quest, attack, defend, collect resources, trigger abilities, be poisoned, or ready (except by effects that target unconscious characters).

1877b069-7015-4172-b5df-bbfd235b976f.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
1877b069-7015-4172-b5df-bbfd235b976f.Name: Lost Island
1877b069-7015-4172-b5df-bbfd235b976f.Text:
While Jagged Cliffs is the active location, the location to its right is not considered to be in the staging area.
Forced: When Jagged Cliffs is flipped over while active, look at the facedown side of each adjacent copy of Lost Island.

18d5f7fd-9d6e-44aa-9463-3530278f8c51.Name: Erebor Guard
18d5f7fd-9d6e-44aa-9463-3530278f8c51.Text: Response: When you play Erebor Guard from your hand, discard the top 2 cards of your deck to reduce its cost by 2.

18d6f0aa-a62e-4ce5-b169-cae8836d8442.Name: Prison Cell
18d6f0aa-a62e-4ce5-b169-cae8836d8442.Text: Response: After the players travel to Prison Cell, look at the captured card(s) underneath it and choose 1 to put into play at no cost. Place the other cards back underneath Prison Cell.

18fea279-cd38-4a5e-b271-b94d4f64eda1.Name: Rossiel
18fea279-cd38-4a5e-b271-b94d4f64eda1.Text:
If the active location shares a Trait with a location in the victory display, Rossiel gets +2 Ò.

If an attacking enemy shares a Trait with an enemy in the victory display, Rossiel gets +2 Ú.

1919025a-6f04-497f-b024-8ed3fd91b0c9.Name: The Great Goblin
1919025a-6f04-497f-b024-8ed3fd91b0c9.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on the current quest.

Forced: When The Great Goblin attacks, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If it is a Goblin enemy, put it into play engaged with the defending player and deal it a shadow card.

19675b16-16ee-4477-a753-bd1cf7b51b7a.Name: Fate of The Dream-chaser
19675b16-16ee-4477-a753-bd1cf7b51b7a.Text: When Revealed: Shuffle the Corsair deck and Corsair discard pile into the second encounter deck. Search the encounter deck and discard pile for each copy of Battle-hardened and each copy of Watch Tower, and shuffle them into the second encounter deck. Set the current encounter deck and discard pile aside, inactive. The second encounter deck becomes the active encounter deck. Advance to stage 3.

196d6c69-845a-494d-a49d-54d3dc6c1b4b.Name: The Voice of Saruman
196d6c69-845a-494d-a49d-54d3dc6c1b4b.Text:
While Orthanc is the active location, Saruman is considered to be engaged with the first player. 
Forced: When Orthanc is explored, cancel any progress placed on the quest this phase and return Orthanc to the staging area.

If a player has 0 cards in his hand, he is eliminated from the game. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

196e8d0a-70c6-49f9-b26c-2ed2b7d3ac87.Name: The Uruk's Trail
196e8d0a-70c6-49f9-b26c-2ed2b7d3ac87.Text:
While the Uruk's Trail is the active location, it gains: "Response: After The Uruk's Trail is explored, reduce the pursuit value by 3."
Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a non-unique Uruk-hai enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

1987caf1-aedd-4fe0-bbe9-41539c2a7910.Name: Déorwine
1987caf1-aedd-4fe0-bbe9-41539c2a7910.Text: Action: While Déorwine is defending, spend 1 Ì resource to cancel a shadow effect dealt to the attacking enemy. Any player may trigger this action.

19b732b9-a26a-4535-a438-7dd83cd4ecf2.Name: Drû-buri-Drû
19b732b9-a26a-4535-a438-7dd83cd4ecf2.Text:
Allies cannot defend against Drû-buri-Drû.

While Drû-buri-Drû is in the victory display, characters get +1 Ò and +1 Ú.

Unless Drû-buri-Drû is in the victory display, the players cannot win.

19bcc176-d952-485b-9d28-12188c5a0bc1.Name: Desert Oasis
19bcc176-d952-485b-9d28-12188c5a0bc1.Text: While Desert Oasis is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Desert Oasis is explored, heal 4 damage from among characters in play.”Forced: After Desert Oasis becomes the active location, each player exhausts a character he controls.

19c23cd8-5935-4278-a5e1-943967004e0a.Name: Scenario Rules 1
19c23cd8-5935-4278-a5e1-943967004e0a.Text:
Discover X (continued)
If there are less than X cards remaining in the encounter deck when resolving the Discover keyword, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and continue resolving the Discover keyword. Loot Loot is a new keyword that appears on some objective cards in The Ruins of Belegost. Objectives with the Loot keyword are valuable treasures that can only be discovered by exploring the different locations in Belegost. A Loot card can only enter play by resolving the Discover keyword on a location. If a card with the Loot keyword is revealed from the encounter deck, discard it and reveal another card from the top of the encounter deck.

19e2470a-94c6-4f14-b824-7d2f952b60fd.Name: Heedless of Order
19e2470a-94c6-4f14-b824-7d2f952b60fd.Text: When Revealed: Choose a different quest to be the current quest until the end of the round, if able. If the current quest did not change as a result of this effect, this card gains Doomed 3.

19f36ec5-7ad4-4dab-80a7-4a7a6c716941.Name: The Front Gate
19f36ec5-7ad4-4dab-80a7-4a7a6c716941.Text:
Forced: Remove 2 progress from stage 2B at the end of each round, if able.

Travel: Spend 3 Í resources to travel here. (1 Í instead if stage 2B is the current quest.)

1a3d3725-9451-4c97-a8c7-5d2fa8e35c4c.Name: Bold and Grim
1a3d3725-9451-4c97-a8c7-5d2fa8e35c4c.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is non-unique, either attach a Harad objective you control to attacking enemy, or it makes an additional attack after this one.
1a3d3725-9451-4c97-a8c7-5d2fa8e35c4c.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each hero with an objective attached.

1a55452f-9e4c-4cdc-8ce1-549c862bf96e.Name: Hound of Sauron
1a55452f-9e4c-4cdc-8ce1-549c862bf96e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it was engaged this round).
1a55452f-9e4c-4cdc-8ce1-549c862bf96e.Text: Hound of Sauron gets -5 engagement cost for each enemy in the staging area.

1a71163f-eeb4-4992-bd9c-83349d93cd58.Name: Yazan
1a71163f-eeb4-4992-bd9c-83349d93cd58.Text: Response: After Yazan is declared as an attacker, deal 1 damage to a non-unique enemy in play. (Limit once per phase.)

1acf6790-b3bd-4768-b1fd-36d527b64037.Name: Arnor Battlefield
1acf6790-b3bd-4768-b1fd-36d527b64037.Text:
While Arnor Battlefield is in the staging area, each non-unique enemy gets -5 engagement cost.

Travel: Each player deals 1 damage to a hero he controls to travel here.

1b3b1063-e102-4fea-a29b-5692fbfb9cd6.Name: Conspicuous Lot
1b3b1063-e102-4fea-a29b-5692fbfb9cd6.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if the defending player's threat is 20 or less).
1b3b1063-e102-4fea-a29b-5692fbfb9cd6.Text: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each ally he controls. Then, if any player's threat is 20 or less, this card gains surge.

1b66485b-7d01-47b6-8504-7fee5c2f2729.Name: Hornburg Wall
1b66485b-7d01-47b6-8504-7fee5c2f2729.Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
1b66485b-7d01-47b6-8504-7fee5c2f2729.Text:
Each enemy gains Toughness 1.
Forced: When Hornburg Wall is explored, exhaust each ally in play.

1b770413-a3b1-41ae-b843-b3b9e78b2906.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
1b770413-a3b1-41ae-b843-b3b9e78b2906.Name: Dread Has Come!
1b770413-a3b1-41ae-b843-b3b9e78b2906.Text: When Revealed: Bolg makes an attack against each player in turn order. If at least 1 character is destroyed by one of these attacks, the players cannot place progress on the current quest this round.

1b93017d-9590-4515-80da-970f396e0a45.Name: Epic Multiplayer Mode
1b93017d-9590-4515-80da-970f396e0a45.Text:
Each stage 2 can only be defeated at the beginning of the round, and only if each other stage 2 is complete.

While the players are at stage 2, each stage gains: "Forced: At the end of the round, each Host of Angmar in the staging area moves to the next staging area in descending alphabetical order. If it cannot move, discard it and deal 9 damage to Annúminas."

For example: At the end of the round, there is a Host of Angmar in the staging area at stage 2F. After the teams at stage 2B and 2D resolve their end-of-round effects, the Host of Angmar in the staging area at stage 2F moves to the staging area of stage 2D.

If the last player at a stage is eliminated, the enemy has broken through the city's defenses and all teams lose the game.

1b9e02cc-d46e-4816-bdbd-9daa05590173.Name: Barrow-wight
1b9e02cc-d46e-4816-bdbd-9daa05590173.Text:
While Barrow-wight is engaged with a player, that player's threat cannot be reduced.

Forced: After Barrow-wight attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller raises his threat by 2.

1ba09574-9d2a-4687-bd58-ca37ceadb023.Name: Swaying Without Wind
1ba09574-9d2a-4687-bd58-ca37ceadb023.Text: When Revealed: Choose a location in the victory display and return it to the staging area. If no location was returned to the staging area this way, Swaying Without Wind gains surge.

1bac61b0-ee27-43eb-bb39-85f64c6b4c94.Name: Flight from Moria
1bac61b0-ee27-43eb-bb39-85f64c6b4c94.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

When a quest card is bypassed, shuffle it into the quest deck instead of placing it on the bottom.
While the Escape from Darkness quest card is in play, the Refresh Action on Abandoned Tools can only be triggered once each round.

1c028523-9f37-4e16-83cf-c9ea1cfbc9d3.Name: Susie the Spider
1c028523-9f37-4e16-83cf-c9ea1cfbc9d3.Text: Cannot have attachments. X is the number of Brigand enemies in play. While at least 1 other Brigand is in play, Susie the Spider cannot take damage.

1c149f93-9e3b-42fa-878c-80b29563a283.Name: Ethir Swordsman
1c149f93-9e3b-42fa-878c-80b29563a283.Text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 Ò.

1c240b63-841f-4b76-9808-13c0ee0f986e.Name: Unnatural Fog
1c240b63-841f-4b76-9808-13c0ee0f986e.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either discard 1 card from the top of his deck for each questing character he controls, or remove each character he controls from the quest.

1c31e98f-1c81-4d10-b434-3b4e66c49f3c.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
1c31e98f-1c81-4d10-b434-3b4e66c49f3c.Name: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
1c31e98f-1c81-4d10-b434-3b4e66c49f3c.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

The objective cards Troll Key and Troll Purse gain surge.

1c446c6e-5665-446a-80f1-68cceaed05eb.Name: Faithless Conspirator
1c446c6e-5665-446a-80f1-68cceaed05eb.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
1c446c6e-5665-446a-80f1-68cceaed05eb.Text: If the active location has at least 1 facedown card underneath it, Faithless Conspirator cannot take damage.

1c5f4854-c10c-430b-9c40-2d84c5997b8f.Name: The Ring Draws Them
1c5f4854-c10c-430b-9c40-2d84c5997b8f.Text: When Revealed: At the end of the phase, each enemy in the staging area engages the first player.  If The One Ring is exhausted, this effect cannot be cancelled.

1c65b78b-6b68-458f-9510-a00a9576a042.Name: Great Hall
1c65b78b-6b68-458f-9510-a00a9576a042.Text:
While Great Hall is the active location, it gains: "Forced: Put 1 progress on Smaug the Golden at the end of each round."

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 3 cards from his hand that match the revealed card's type.

1c692a1a-4ccf-4185-b5bd-d2b8d300de42.Keywords: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.
1c692a1a-4ccf-4185-b5bd-d2b8d300de42.Name: Leaf Brooch
1c692a1a-4ccf-4185-b5bd-d2b8d300de42.Text: The first event card you play each round that matches the attached hero’s printed sphere gains secrecy 1.

1c6d209d-8ff3-4b81-a03f-e81e132e3b5e.Name: Rallying Cry
1c6d209d-8ff3-4b81-a03f-e81e132e3b5e.Text:
Response: After an ally leaves play, add it to its owner’s hand instead of placing it in the discard pile.

Valour Action: Until the end of the phase, add each ally that leaves play to its owner’s hand instead of placing it in the discard pile.

1c765fa8-9cb8-4cf4-8e93-daac5bae4fce.Keywords:
Mire 2.
Forced: When Haunted Mere is discarded by the Mire keyword, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
1c765fa8-9cb8-4cf4-8e93-daac5bae4fce.Name: Haunted Mere
1c765fa8-9cb8-4cf4-8e93-daac5bae4fce.Text: Travel: Exhaust Smeagol to travel here.

1c824f05-d8be-40e4-be13-5cea37128bf8.Name: Interrogation
1c824f05-d8be-40e4-be13-5cea37128bf8.Text: Action: Choose an enemy with an attached Trap card. Look at the top X cards of the encounter deck, where X is that enemy's printed $. You may discard 1 of those cards. Return the rest to the top of the deck, in the same order.

1c95d49a-5638-4f31-a42f-f93a5d1f50db.Name: Southron Phalanx
1c95d49a-5638-4f31-a42f-f93a5d1f50db.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each location the defending player controls.
1c95d49a-5638-4f31-a42f-f93a5d1f50db.Text: While engaged with a player, Southron Phalanx gets +1 Û for each location that player controls.

1c9d4501-fa65-41b9-977f-896f2286511d.Name: No Rest
1c9d4501-fa65-41b9-977f-896f2286511d.Text: When Revealed: Attach to an exhausted hero, or to a ready hero if there are no exhausted heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot ready and does not collect resources during the resource phase. Discard No Rest if the players travel to a safe location.”)

1ccd4cc5-9e8a-41ea-b897-61e47bba5ae6.Name: Grappling Hook
1ccd4cc5-9e8a-41ea-b897-61e47bba5ae6.Text: Quest Action: Discard Grappling Hook and exhaust attached character to commit attached character to the quest, using its Û instead of its Ò (or instead of its Ú if the current quest has the siege keyword).

1cdc36d4-fd78-4ebe-850b-13f24ee73244.Keywords: While Daechanar is in play, progress cannot be placed on Altar of Midwinter.
1cdc36d4-fd78-4ebe-850b-13f24ee73244.Name: Altar of Midwinter
1cdc36d4-fd78-4ebe-850b-13f24ee73244.Text: Forced: At the end of the staging step, the first player must either reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck, or reanimate the top card of his deck.

1ce63cb5-0022-48b2-a864-af49bdf18bef.Name: Celebdil
1ce63cb5-0022-48b2-a864-af49bdf18bef.Text: While Celebdil is the active location, remove 2 progress tokens from it at the end of each round.

1d1ab8a3-ad76-4992-ae5c-6a89fd0ed463.Name: Skilled Healer
1d1ab8a3-ad76-4992-ae5c-6a89fd0ed463.Text:
Setup: Attach to a hero.

Attached hero gets +2 hit points and gains the Healer trait.

1d1adc93-c364-41d0-b987-6038d9df0c07.Name: The Empty Mug
1d1adc93-c364-41d0-b987-6038d9df0c07.Text: While the Empty Mug is in the victory display, the current quest gains "Forced: After a player card effect reduces a player's threat, remove it from the game."

1d23916d-4e14-4b1f-ab4b-02a231870465.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
1d23916d-4e14-4b1f-ab4b-02a231870465.Name: Night Wanes Slow
1d23916d-4e14-4b1f-ab4b-02a231870465.Text:
Forced: When this card is discarded from the top of the encounter deck as a result of a quest card effect, immediately stop making progress and end the quest phase.
