When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Reveal 1 additional encounter card.

1dab3395-7a34-4b66-aa7f-7834045a7eba.Name: Umbar Square
1dab3395-7a34-4b66-aa7f-7834045a7eba.Text: While Umbar Square is the active location, it gains: “Response: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 progress on the main quest, bypassing the active location.” Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

1db13c26-879b-49cd-9f94-8ba1a0c4f5a4.Name: Driven to the Brink
1db13c26-879b-49cd-9f94-8ba1a0c4f5a4.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
1db13c26-879b-49cd-9f94-8ba1a0c4f5a4.Text: When Revealed: Either immediately end the quest phase (without resolving the quest), or assign X damage among questing characters you control. X is the number of resources on The Corsair Fleet.

1dcf16e8-8882-4b61-93ac-a7da643c52bd.Name: Up in Flames
1dcf16e8-8882-4b61-93ac-a7da643c52bd.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource token on Up in Flames and discard the top X cards of each player's deck. X is the number of resource tokens on Up in Flames.

If any player has no cards in his deck, the players have lost the game.

1ddaf688-b39b-4d15-8058-1e2957e021ca.Name: Taste it Again!
1ddaf688-b39b-4d15-8058-1e2957e021ca.Text: Response: After a hero you control defends an attack made by an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, ready that hero. Until the end of the phase, that hero gets +2 Û while attacking that enemy.

1de51c4f-659d-465f-bf45-4d6c00c6bdf1.Name: Chetwood Outlaw
1de51c4f-659d-465f-bf45-4d6c00c6bdf1.Shadow: Shadow: Either raise your threat by 2, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
1de51c4f-659d-465f-bf45-4d6c00c6bdf1.Text: Forced: After you optionally engaged Chetwood Outlaw, raise your threat by 4.

1e2560ab-00ce-45c3-a374-f7bb6a3e6889.Name: Den of Night
1e2560ab-00ce-45c3-a374-f7bb6a3e6889.Text:
While Den of Night is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a ‘When Revealed’ effect is canceled, place 1 resource on Shelob.”

Travel: Place 1 resource on Shelob to travel here.

1e28318c-e82a-4d50-b6db-d08e6e9a6b53.Name: Ingold
1e28318c-e82a-4d50-b6db-d08e6e9a6b53.Text: Ingold gets +1 Ò for each hero you control with at least 1 resource in its resource pool.

1e2c314d-2673-41d5-9905-3d60b5f33d98.Name: Desolate Meadow
1e2c314d-2673-41d5-9905-3d60b5f33d98.Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.
1e2c314d-2673-41d5-9905-3d60b5f33d98.Text: While Desolate Meadow is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After any number of time counters are removed from the current quest, heal 2 damage on each Creature enemy in play."

1e392c0d-2fc3-4d57-8209-3a5e64292f3d.Name: Brutal Assault
1e392c0d-2fc3-4d57-8209-3a5e64292f3d.Shadow: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control. X is the number of cards in your hand.
1e392c0d-2fc3-4d57-8209-3a5e64292f3d.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of cards in his hand.

1e54fa6e-c2a1-4456-ac48-8912ecc4722a.Name: Western Slopes
1e54fa6e-c2a1-4456-ac48-8912ecc4722a.Text:
Response: When Western Slopes leaves play as an explored location (choose one): the first player draws 2 cards, or remove 1 progress token from Smaug the Golden.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 2 cards from his hand that match the revealed card's sphere.

1e5d3385-4362-4e76-91fc-30e5aebab5e2.Name: Calm Waters
1e5d3385-4362-4e76-91fc-30e5aebab5e2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if attacking enemy is a Ship enemy).
1e5d3385-4362-4e76-91fc-30e5aebab5e2.Text: While Calm Waters is the active location, look at 2 additional cards from the top of the encounter deck during each Sailing test.

1e88c101-4e02-4f9a-8447-15a6f2a4e566.Name: Eryn Galen Settler
1e88c101-4e02-4f9a-8447-15a6f2a4e566.Text: Response: When the active location leaves play as an explored location, discard Eryn Galen Settler to discard a location in the staging with the same title as the just explored location.

1e96a8e3-ad11-48d5-8554-7cb1a90937a7.Name: Sinking Bog
1e96a8e3-ad11-48d5-8554-7cb1a90937a7.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets –1 Ú for each attachment attached to it.
1e96a8e3-ad11-48d5-8554-7cb1a90937a7.Text: While Sinking Bog is in the staging area, each character gets –1 Ò, –1 Û, and –1 Ú for each Item attached to it. This ability does not stack with other copies of Sinking Bog.

1e9a6c59-8dc7-4dc4-a5a4-f5f4f9ccdc55.Name: Palantir
1e9a6c59-8dc7-4dc4-a5a4-f5f4f9ccdc55.Text: Planning Action: Exhaust Palantir and attached hero to name a card type and look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that matches the named type, draw a card. For each of those cards that does not match the named type, raise your threat by 2.

1eaee222-8d0d-4fcd-b630-4e349347ed85.Name: Last Stand
1eaee222-8d0d-4fcd-b630-4e349347ed85.Text: Response: After a Warrior character is destroyed while defending against an enemy attack, deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to that character’s printed Û.

1edaecb1-72e8-49db-98fd-6fc377815c4b.Name: Driven Back
1edaecb1-72e8-49db-98fd-6fc377815c4b.Text: When Revealed: Remove all progress from each location in the staging area. Increase the total $ in the staging area by 1 for each progress removed this way. If no progress was removed by this effect, Driven Back gains surge.

1ee75e10-bcc5-4243-ab28-3dc1978a50af.Name: Battle with the Spiders
1ee75e10-bcc5-4243-ab28-3dc1978a50af.Text:
Unconscious characters cannot quest, attack, defend, collect resources, trigger abilities, be poisoned, or ready (except by effects that target unconscious characters).

Progress cannot be placed on this stage while The Spider's Glade is in play.

Action: Spend 2 Í resources to ready an unconscious character you control.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game and discovered the treasure card Bilbo's Magic Ring.

1f1ad7bb-68ca-4b48-b7fa-516e5314e272.Name: Counter-attack
1f1ad7bb-68ca-4b48-b7fa-516e5314e272.Text: When Revealed: Each player must return the location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area, or raise his threat by the total $ of all locations he controls.

1f28f098-09d4-43fa-8fba-eae551a5d4fe.Name: Pelargir Ship Captain
1f28f098-09d4-43fa-8fba-eae551a5d4fe.Text: Response: After Pelargir Ship Captain enters play, move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another hero's resource pool.

1f71a208-836b-4bf9-8cdb-a3f9bfa05667.Name: Sterner than Steel
1f71a208-836b-4bf9-8cdb-a3f9bfa05667.Text: Response: Exhaust a Weapon or Armor card attached to the defending character to cancel a shadow effect just triggered in combat.

1f7fc118-94a7-48a0-bd0c-9c15a36ddc23.Name: Bill the Pony
1f7fc118-94a7-48a0-bd0c-9c15a36ddc23.Text:
Lower the cost to play Bill the Pony by 2 if you control Sam Gamgee.

Each Hobbit character gets +1 hit point.

1fa7117f-2e41-45ae-b81e-75da3ad36cf2.Name: Dense Fern-brake
1fa7117f-2e41-45ae-b81e-75da3ad36cf2.Text: While Dense Fern-brake is the active location, enemies in the staging area are immune to player card effects.

1fbeb20b-0018-4d18-ab53-66982543b04b.Name: Unseen Barrier
1fbeb20b-0018-4d18-ab53-66982543b04b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, increase the pursuit value by 1.
1fbeb20b-0018-4d18-ab53-66982543b04b.Text: When Revealed: The players cannot place more than 3 progress on the current quest this round. (This does not count progress placed on any active location.)

1fc9cfde-aff7-4210-b3da-c7ddb00a9c1e.Name: Dark Corner of Fangorn
1fc9cfde-aff7-4210-b3da-c7ddb00a9c1e.Text: While Dark Corner of Fangorn is in the staging area, each Huorn enemy loses the hunder keyword. Forced: After Dark Corner of Fangorn becomes the active location, each engaged Huorn enemy makes an immediate attack.

1fe22408-2fbc-40f8-a88c-980ab90137d8.Name: Assassination
1fe22408-2fbc-40f8-a88c-980ab90137d8.Text: When Revealed:  Attached Assassination to the hero with the highest threat cost. (Counts as a Plot attachement with the text: "Each enemy gets +1 Û.  Attached hero cannot be healed. Damage from undefended attacks and A Knife in the Back must be assigned to attached hero.  If attached hero leaves play, the players lose the game.")

1ff3c8f4-e472-4c48-a1d4-5c239f5bb119.Name: The Redhorn Gate
1ff3c8f4-e472-4c48-a1d4-5c239f5bb119.Text:
You are playing in Nightmare mode.

Setup: Remove all copies of Blinding Blizzard from the encounter deck and set them aside, out of play. During this game, player cards in the victory display do not count their victory points.

Forced: When stage 2b is revealed, shuffle each set aside copy of Blinding Blizzard into the encounter deck.

2002b5d3-57b1-429a-a19a-2d10a564bc31.Name: Coney in a Trap
2002b5d3-57b1-429a-a19a-2d10a564bc31.Text: Play only if you control a unique character with the Ranger trait and another unique character with the Warrior trait.

200ec48a-dd14-41c4-994b-2f5b753f47de.Name: Gap of Rohan
200ec48a-dd14-41c4-994b-2f5b753f47de.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û.  If this attack destroys a character, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.
200ec48a-dd14-41c4-994b-2f5b753f47de.Text: While Gap of Rohan is in the staging area, Dunland enemies get +1 Û

201569b2-d203-4a2a-b3e4-5dd396b8341a.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
201569b2-d203-4a2a-b3e4-5dd396b8341a.Name: Lost Island
201569b2-d203-4a2a-b3e4-5dd396b8341a.Text: While Cursed Temple is the active location, characters with less than 2 Ò do not ready during the refresh phase.

20250f12-5bfc-4ffc-8e7e-4e3d71276509.Keywords: Doomed 3. At the end of the round, discard Saruman from play.
20250f12-5bfc-4ffc-8e7e-4e3d71276509.Name: Saruman
20250f12-5bfc-4ffc-8e7e-4e3d71276509.Text: Response: After Saruman enters play, choose a non-unique enemy or location in the staging area. While Saruman is in play, the chosen enemy or location is considered to be out of play.

205f938d-8dc8-4366-adc0-35897aaef600.Name: Death and Calamity
205f938d-8dc8-4366-adc0-35897aaef600.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the number of Sorcery cards in play.
205f938d-8dc8-4366-adc0-35897aaef600.Text: When Revealed: Attach Death and Calamity to the current quest. Then, the first player reanimates the top X cards of his deck, where X is the number of copies of Death and Calamity in play.

207b12bd-20b4-470d-81cc-7896904334d5.Name: Amarthiúl
207b12bd-20b4-470d-81cc-7896904334d5.Text:
Response: After an enemy engages a player, give control of Amarthiúl to that player.

If Amarthiúl leaves play, the player lose the game.

207b3e48-c42c-42a8-b1ac-20950e6588d9.Name: Into the Pit
207b3e48-c42c-42a8-b1ac-20950e6588d9.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Forced: After Cave Torch exhausts, place 1 damage token on this card. Then, if there are 5 or more damage tokens on this card, remove Cave Torch from the game.

2087cb2d-ce6f-4d3a-befc-01859ec82e6c.Name: A Well Laid Trap
2087cb2d-ce6f-4d3a-befc-01859ec82e6c.Text:
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Boar Clan enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck. Each player shuffles his discard pile into his draw deck and draws 1 card. 
  
Forced: At the end of the combat phase, advance to stage 3A.

20a4504c-13c1-4129-b04e-2025a0a180ff.Name: Methedras Lookout
20a4504c-13c1-4129-b04e-2025a0a180ff.Shadow: Shadow: Either exhaust a character you control, or return attacking enemy to the staging area.
20a4504c-13c1-4129-b04e-2025a0a180ff.Text: While Methedras Lookout is in the staging area, it gains: 'Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.'

20c5f7b7-cfc4-44e1-aaf5-0010ceb9a1b9.Name: Edge of Fangorn
20c5f7b7-cfc4-44e1-aaf5-0010ceb9a1b9.Text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Huorn enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here (2 Huorn enemies instead if there are 3 or more players in the game).

20e1ee03-f6c4-4b63-a816-4c9660e51eb0.Name: Devilry of Saruman
20e1ee03-f6c4-4b63-a816-4c9660e51eb0.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û and gains Toughness 2 until the end of the round.
20e1ee03-f6c4-4b63-a816-4c9660e51eb0.Text: When Revealed: Place 3 progress on the current quest (bypassing any active location). Until the end of the round, treat each character’s text box as it was blank (except for Traits).

2163f5ef-63a3-4afc-8084-fe730774d216.Keywords: Cannot have attachments or take more than 3 damage each round.
2163f5ef-63a3-4afc-8084-fe730774d216.Name: Oliphaunt
2163f5ef-63a3-4afc-8084-fe730774d216.Text: Forced: After Oliphaunt engages you, exhaust each ally you control.

21a5e7e1-013b-478e-a1c3-ab0300541f39.Name: Moria Orc
21a5e7e1-013b-478e-a1c3-ab0300541f39.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 1 for each enemy engaged with him.
21a5e7e1-013b-478e-a1c3-ab0300541f39.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 damage from Doom, Doom, Doom, or reveal an additional encounter card.

21b27ec8-a778-4bac-8228-aa013043b8ed.Name: Tom Bombadil
21b27ec8-a778-4bac-8228-aa013043b8ed.Text: When Revealed: Choose a player. That player gains control of Tom Bombadil, ready and committed to the quest. At the end of the round, discard Tom Bombadil. Then, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. This effect cannot be canceled.

21c68054-6070-49cd-be5f-7d432842a879.Keywords: Play only after the staging step.
21c68054-6070-49cd-be5f-7d432842a879.Name: Scouting Party
21c68054-6070-49cd-be5f-7d432842a879.Text: Response: After you commit characters to the quest, if each character you have committed to the quest is a Scout, each of those characters gets +2 Ò until the end of the phase.

21cfb9e9-6777-4bc6-ace6-08fe68e949a4.Name: Éomer
21cfb9e9-6777-4bc6-ace6-08fe68e949a4.Text: Response: After a character leaves play, Éomer gets +2 Û attack until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

21eb71b5-6b96-4388-bd95-e2576483a95a.Name: Furious Charge
21eb71b5-6b96-4388-bd95-e2576483a95a.Text:
Forced: When at least 1 progress is placed on Furious Charge, each character gets –2 Ú until the end of the round. If Thaurdir is Captain side faceup, flip him.

Response: After Furious Charge is defeated, add 10 progress to the main quest.

21ee317d-9aca-43be-9782-521539827cb8.Name: The Grand Design
21ee317d-9aca-43be-9782-521539827cb8.Text:
When Revealed: Make Roots of Mindolluin the active location, returning any other active location to the staging area.

Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location place 1 resource token on this quest.

If there are 4 or more resource tokens on The Grand Design, advance to the next stage.

21f0ac18-21ea-44b7-b67b-4d1c5baaae0f.Name: Arwen Undómiel
21f0ac18-21ea-44b7-b67b-4d1c5baaae0f.Text: Action: Discard a card from your hand to add 1 resource to a Noldor hero's resource pool, or to Aragorn's resource pool. (Limit once per round.)

21f0acdb-5d11-409e-80f8-c717fab87ab9.Keywords: Attach to a location in the staging area.
21f0acdb-5d11-409e-80f8-c717fab87ab9.Name: Explorer's Almanac
21f0acdb-5d11-409e-80f8-c717fab87ab9.Text: Progress from questing successfully may be placed on the attached location before it is placed on the current quest.

21f520fd-5efe-41f9-9f02-7a65e36eb31f.Name: The Hand of Castamir
21f520fd-5efe-41f9-9f02-7a65e36eb31f.Text:
Forced: After The Hand of Castamir attacks, reveal the top card of the encounter deck, resolve its effects, and discard it.

Forced: After a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, The Hand of Castamir makes an immediate attack against the first player.

21fec323-3155-4b64-8506-fa87d44f01fc.Name: Cursed Dead
21fec323-3155-4b64-8506-fa87d44f01fc.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if there is a copy of the defending character in its owner’s discard pile).
21fec323-3155-4b64-8506-fa87d44f01fc.Text: When Revealed: Put each copy of Cursed Dead in the discard pile into play in the staging area.

2223ef81-40c3-422d-a593-a861c3af39fc.Name: Warrior of Dunland
2223ef81-40c3-422d-a593-a861c3af39fc.Text:
When Revealed: Warrior of Dunland makes an immediate attack against you. 
Forced: After Warrior of Dunland attacks and destroys a character, place 3 progress on the active location.

22511a31-8420-4f18-b834-be80c89d5e6a.Name: Trapped Villagers
22511a31-8420-4f18-b834-be80c89d5e6a.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û. If this attack destroys an ally, place 1 damage token on Dead Villagers.
22511a31-8420-4f18-b834-be80c89d5e6a.Text: When Revealed: Place 3 damage tokens on Dead Villagers. Until the end of the round, add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each damage token on Dead Villagers.

2251670c-c03c-4fd7-9621-c179c9ce79f8.Name: Pelargir Quays
2251670c-c03c-4fd7-9621-c179c9ce79f8.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 damage token here. Then, if there are 4 damage tokens here, discard Pelargir Quays and assign 4 damage among characters in play.

227857db-5332-4c3a-b253-93f5886d8451.Name: Shelob's Lair
227857db-5332-4c3a-b253-93f5886d8451.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Do not discard unresolved shadow cards from Shelob at the end of the combat phase.
While Cleft of Cirith Ungol is in the staging area, players cannot travel to locations not named Cleft of Cirith Ungol.

228a03b8-ec05-4562-90f5-0c7d969490b0.Name: The Guardian's Fury
228a03b8-ec05-4562-90f5-0c7d969490b0.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Guardian, it makes an additional attack after this one.
228a03b8-ec05-4562-90f5-0c7d969490b0.Text: When Revealed: Each Guardian enemy makes an immediate attack. If there are no Guardian enemies in play, return a random Guardian enemy from the victory display, and add it to the staging area.

22c55625-210c-4843-81ee-d8d6430885b0.Name: Corsair of Umbar
22c55625-210c-4843-81ee-d8d6430885b0.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the active location is a Ship).
22c55625-210c-4843-81ee-d8d6430885b0.Text: If the active location is a Ship, Corsair of Umbar gets +2 Û and +2 Ú.

22d6a151-ee2a-4ad0-9d97-5eddd5cc0391.Name: White Warg
22d6a151-ee2a-4ad0-9d97-5eddd5cc0391.Shadow: Shadow: If it is Night, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
22d6a151-ee2a-4ad0-9d97-5eddd5cc0391.Text: Forced: After White Warg engages you, deal 1 damage to a character you control (2 damage instead if it is Night).

22f6fc49-6a00-4104-a9fa-4823435175a1.Name: The Cross-roads
22f6fc49-6a00-4104-a9fa-4823435175a1.Text: The Cross-roads gets -1 $ for each facedown card under it. The players cannot travel here unless there are no facedown cards under The Cross-roads and at least 20 progress tokens on stage 1B.

231bf335-bf9b-44d9-a919-e59aa1d46473.Name: Arwen Undómiel
231bf335-bf9b-44d9-a919-e59aa1d46473.Text:
The first player gains control of Arwen Undómiel, as an ally.

Response: After Arwen Undómiel exhausts, choose a hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

If Arwen Undómiel leaves play, the players are defeated.

232256cb-40ee-4cec-84ac-995b3ba43eb2.Name: Great Warg Chief
232256cb-40ee-4cec-84ac-995b3ba43eb2.Text: Forced: After Great Warg Chief engages you, discard cards from the encounter deck until a Warg enemy is discarded. Put that enemy into play engaged with you.

233a2687-04a8-4c18-90cc-e90b9574b282.Name: Break Through the Fleet!
233a2687-04a8-4c18-90cc-e90b9574b282.Text: Sailing. Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost. Break Through the Fleet! has +5 quest points for each Ship enemy in play. If this stage is defeated, or if Raider Flagship is in the victory display, the players have broken through the Corsair fleet and win the game!

23522905-189e-4f08-a19f-5f9cf0dae9c4.Name: Guard the Gate
23522905-189e-4f08-a19f-5f9cf0dae9c4.Text:
This stage gets -10 quest points for each Host of Angmar in a victory display.

Forced: Reveal 1 additional card during the quest phase.

Response: At the end of the round, choose a stage. Each player at that stage chooses a hero and adds 1 resource to that hero's pool.

2362af02-42b8-43fe-b3b6-f11f011b3197.Name: Vicious Marauder
2362af02-42b8-43fe-b3b6-f11f011b3197.Text:
Forced: When Vicious Marauder engages you, discard a random card from your hand and place resources on it equal to that card’s printed cost.

Forced: When Vicious Marauder attacks you, distribute damage among characters you control equal to the number of resources on it.

23670d99-7a26-4838-a112-2f6d8a7186f8.Name: Blight of Carn Dûm
23670d99-7a26-4838-a112-2f6d8a7186f8.Shadow: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is Thaurdir, heal 3 damage from him.
23670d99-7a26-4838-a112-2f6d8a7186f8.Text:
Forced: After an enemy attacks, heal 1 damage from it.
Travel: Deal each enemy in play 1 shadow card to travel here.

23768a0d-bf6c-4405-9b09-ea8fdbfded31.Name: The Ambush
23768a0d-bf6c-4405-9b09-ea8fdbfded31.Text: At the beginning of the quest phase, each player takes 1 hidden card. At the beginning of the combat phase, each player must either turn each of his hidden cards faceup or take 1 hidden card.

237b31e7-d0b0-4c1e-bd4a-40a175f7d7d1.Name: Knight of Minas Tirith
237b31e7-d0b0-4c1e-bd4a-40a175f7d7d1.Text:
If each of your heroes has a printed Ï resource icon, Knight of Minas Tirith gains: 
"Response: After Knight of Minas Tirith enters play, choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage that enemy and exhaust Knight of Minas Tirith to declare it as attacker (and resolve its attack) against that enemy."

2387ac72-763b-47e0-b9f3-29a08dbeb200.Name: The Drúadan Forest
2387ac72-763b-47e0-b9f3-29a08dbeb200.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Heroes do not collect resources during the resource phase.

Setup: Add resources to each hero's resource pool until each hero has 5 resources. Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Garden of Poisons and add it to the staging area.  Shuffle the encounter deck.

Forced: After stage 2B is revealed, each hero with fewer than 3 resources gains resources until it has 3.

23acfc2e-3262-4f22-8496-a753fa9089bd.Name: Mithril Shirt
23acfc2e-3262-4f22-8496-a753fa9089bd.Text: Attached hero gets +1 Ú and +1 hit point.

23c33968-01db-4f79-94bd-45ea1e0d50d0.Name: A Prisoner
23c33968-01db-4f79-94bd-45ea1e0d50d0.Text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective, add it to the victory display, and place 2 resource tokens on the current quest.

23dec64e-9e30-4329-9df7-4d2628d2a7a8.Name: Cruel Mountain-troll
23dec64e-9e30-4329-9df7-4d2628d2a7a8.Text: For each excess point of combat damage dealt by Cruel Mountain-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) you must remove 1 progress from each quest card in play.

240a9f5b-17dc-4182-b854-3d2dd5a33f68.Name: Thieves! Fire! Murder!
240a9f5b-17dc-4182-b854-3d2dd5a33f68.Text: Forced: After placing the 7th progress token on this stage, remove all damage from Smaug the Magnificent and set him aside, out of play. Then, add Smaug the Golden to the staging area and reset the quest deck to stage 2B.

246b941e-f8a7-46ba-966d-d0515111ab46.Name: Collapsed Tower
246b941e-f8a7-46ba-966d-d0515111ab46.Shadow: Shadow: Excess damage dealt by this attack must be placed on the active location, if able.
246b941e-f8a7-46ba-966d-d0515111ab46.Text: Scour: Return this location to the staging area and place 2 damage on it.

24772594-75f3-4789-aeec-41526d845e11.Name: In Hostile Territory
24772594-75f3-4789-aeec-41526d845e11.Text:
Each player cannot have more than 5 cards in his hand. (If you have more than 5, immediately choose and discard cards from hand until you have only 5.)
Response: When this stage is defeated, each player draws a card.

2491fe6d-38e2-4767-8e09-0174deb85ff8.Name: Into Ithilien
2491fe6d-38e2-4767-8e09-0174deb85ff8.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Setup: Set both copies of Mumak Elite aside, out of play.
Forced: When quest stage 2A or 4A are revealed, add 1 of the previously set aside copies of Mumak Elite to the staging area.

24a816f2-172f-4945-8d9b-21eb7fb68263.Keywords: The first player gains control of Calphon.
24a816f2-172f-4945-8d9b-21eb7fb68263.Name: Calphon
24a816f2-172f-4945-8d9b-21eb7fb68263.Text:
Action: Exhaust Calphon to look at the bottom card of your deck. Then, you may switch that card with a card in your hand.

If Calphon leaves play, the players lose.

24a841df-854e-444b-9b2f-0214f0e26002.Keywords: X is 1 plus the number of facedown cards under this location.
24a841df-854e-444b-9b2f-0214f0e26002.Name: Ancient Barrow
24a841df-854e-444b-9b2f-0214f0e26002.Text: Forced: After Ancient Barrow enters play, each player places an ally he controls facedown under this location. When Ancient Barrow leaves play as an explored location, return each ally under this location to its owner's hand.

24e431be-cde9-4f93-943a-de5e5ca9108b.Name: Men in the Dark
24e431be-cde9-4f93-943a-de5e5ca9108b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each hero the defending player controls with no resources.
24e431be-cde9-4f93-943a-de5e5ca9108b.Text: When Revealed: Each hero must pay 1 resource or take 1 damage. If no hero takes damage from this effect, Men in the Dark gains surge.

24eabbac-62b1-4d2c-93a0-f97c04a2aefa.Keywords: Attach to a Noble hero or Aragorn. Restricted.
24eabbac-62b1-4d2c-93a0-f97c04a2aefa.Name: Andúril
24eabbac-62b1-4d2c-93a0-f97c04a2aefa.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.
Response: After an attack in which the attached hero defended resolves, exhaust Andúril to target the enemy that just attacked. Declare attached hero as an attacker agaisnt that enemy (and resolve the attack).

2522fc59-6617-4c74-9723-4a120431aa3f.Name: The Black Gate
2522fc59-6617-4c74-9723-4a120431aa3f.Text:
Forced: At the end of the planning phase, place each Harad enemy in the staging area facedown under The Black Gate.

If there are at least X facedown cards under The Black Gate, the players lose the game. X is 3 more than the number of players.

25641d97-e196-40d5-8481-727602aa2da2.Name: Descendants of Kings
25641d97-e196-40d5-8481-727602aa2da2.Text: Action: Ready X Dúnedain characters you control. X is the number of enemies engaged with you.

2573b8e3-d3a1-47c0-acc8-e6151f223383.Name: Street Fighting
2573b8e3-d3a1-47c0-acc8-e6151f223383.Text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an Osgiliath location is discarded. The first player may exhaust a hero to take control of that location. Otherwise, add that location to the staging area. This effect cannot be canceled.

257f9b44-2744-4f02-bbf6-115d12b52e8d.Name: The Ringwraiths Attack
257f9b44-2744-4f02-bbf6-115d12b52e8d.Text: If there are no Nazgul enemies in play, the players win the game.

257ffa68-7458-4f3c-bc7e-8d46b27cd837.Name: Territorial Ape
257ffa68-7458-4f3c-bc7e-8d46b27cd837.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if a location was explored this round).
257ffa68-7458-4f3c-bc7e-8d46b27cd837.Text: Territorial Ape gets +X $ and + X Û, where X is the $ of the active location.

2591dde9-00c6-488e-a109-94136e4f9876.Name: The Dark Lord's Summons
2591dde9-00c6-488e-a109-94136e4f9876.Text: When Revealed: Either place the lowest Û Harad enemy engaged with you facedown under The Black Gate, or reveal the top facedown card from under The Cross-roads and put it into play engaged with you.

25940aea-cc56-43bf-a8d6-f9d349b0c01f.Name: Into the Storm
25940aea-cc56-43bf-a8d6-f9d349b0c01f.Text:
Sailing.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each player must distribute 5 damage among characters he controls.
When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

25ae9bce-b4c0-4ff8-aeb3-d0b57d3914d2.Name: Angry Huorn
25ae9bce-b4c0-4ff8-aeb3-d0b57d3914d2.Text: Forced:  At the beginning of each resource phase, Angry Huorn attacks the engaged player.

25aec3b5-3221-411c-83a0-b3ceed2b5c06.Name: Rugged Country
25aec3b5-3221-411c-83a0-b3ceed2b5c06.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each quest card in play.
25aec3b5-3221-411c-83a0-b3ceed2b5c06.Text: If the current quest is a side quest, Rugged Country gets +2 $.

25b9113d-1096-4b8d-a2d3-1eb134fbca62.Name: Racing Warg
25b9113d-1096-4b8d-a2d3-1eb134fbca62.Text: When Revealed: Attach to an Orc enemy. Limit 1 per enemy. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: “Attached enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, +1 Ú, and +1 hit point. Forced: When attached enemy leaves play, return Racing Warg to the staging area.”)

25eb1da3-b559-4e47-ae20-e6096a8cbc96.Name: Elven Caravel
25eb1da3-b559-4e47-ae20-e6096a8cbc96.Text:
Travel: Each player must assign damage among characters he controls equal to the amount of damage on Elven Caravel.
Forced: When Elven Caravel is placed underneath The Havens Burn, deal 1 damage to each character in play.

2608ba25-8375-4093-9d93-3c8cfa7b697c.Name: Lawless Ruffian
2608ba25-8375-4093-9d93-3c8cfa7b697c.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
2608ba25-8375-4093-9d93-3c8cfa7b697c.Text: While engaged with a player with threat 35 or higher, Lawless Ruffian gets +2 Û.

262d615b-5b5d-4f16-975e-335d34e6c733.Name: Trapped Inside a Barrow
262d615b-5b5d-4f16-975e-335d34e6c733.Text:
Forced: When a location is revealed at this stage, cancel its effects and discard it. Then, raise your threat by that card's $ (including modifiers).

Forced: After this stage is defeated, advance to stage 3B at the beginning of the travel phase (combining staging areas) and place 1 progress on a Great Barrow at that stage.

264adf61-31e1-46db-a655-7fee1d4282ae.Name: Southron Commander
264adf61-31e1-46db-a655-7fee1d4282ae.Text: When Revealed: Southron Commander makes an immediate attack from the staging area against each player who controls at least 1 location.

265b6ab0-446c-4090-a7e1-341ce987c903.Keywords: Attach to a location. Limit 1 per location.
265b6ab0-446c-4090-a7e1-341ce987c903.Name: Ranger Provisions
265b6ab0-446c-4090-a7e1-341ce987c903.Text: Response: After attached location is explored, the first player adds 1 resource to each of his heroes’ resource pools.

26642db7-c3a2-47f3-989d-27396e586d06.Keywords: While Shrine to Morgoth is the active location, players cannot draw cards or search their decks.
26642db7-c3a2-47f3-989d-27396e586d06.Name: Lost Island
26642db7-c3a2-47f3-989d-27396e586d06.Text: Forced: After Shrine to Morgoth is flipped over while active, exhaust each ally in play with printed cost 2 or less. Then, each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

26a52bdc-f8e4-40a3-8047-8d696b842cdf.Name: Island Amid Perils
26a52bdc-f8e4-40a3-8047-8d696b842cdf.Text: Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to reduce your threat by X where X is the printed cost of the ally returned to your hand.

26bb74c2-3c66-4828-8188-404bc42e713e.Keywords:
Guarded. Safe.
Immune to player card effects.
26bb74c2-3c66-4828-8188-404bc42e713e.Name: Secluded Cave
26bb74c2-3c66-4828-8188-404bc42e713e.Text: Response: After you travel to Secluded Cave, each player draws 3 cards.

26fcc4f7-16bc-4134-b184-ede9bfe82906.Name: Ware! Ware!
26fcc4f7-16bc-4134-b184-ede9bfe82906.Shadow: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage that enemy and deal it a shadow card.
26fcc4f7-16bc-4134-b184-ede9bfe82906.Text: When Revealed: Either place this card facedown under The Black Gate, or put the top card under The Cross-roads into play engaged with you.

27299002-f9b0-4f9d-a87b-012a6a6993ca.Name: Gates of Isengard
27299002-f9b0-4f9d-a87b-012a6a6993ca.Text: Forced: When Gates of Isengard is explored, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

27393c24-6278-4202-91ef-ef3d708387e6.Name: Deadly Marsh Adder
27393c24-6278-4202-91ef-ef3d708387e6.Text:
Forced: After Deadly Marsh Adder engages you, discard a damaged character you control.
Forced: After the players advance to a quest stage, return Deadly Marsh Adder to the staging area.

275c7232-3671-4092-bb9a-9a62f9538225.Name: Sound the Alarm!
275c7232-3671-4092-bb9a-9a62f9538225.Text: When Revealed: If there are no enemies in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area. Until the end of the round, each enemy gets –10 engagement cost and +1 Û.

276e1411-be34-44fa-af2b-ebe9b36541f0.Name: Raider Flagship
276e1411-be34-44fa-af2b-ebe9b36541f0.Text: Immune to player card effects. Only Ship objectives can be declared as attackers against Raider Flagship. Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, the engaged player reveals the top card of the Corsair deck and engages it.

27748abf-80e8-4928-b506-53d7c23d76c6.Name: Uruk Chieftain
27748abf-80e8-4928-b506-53d7c23d76c6.Text: Cannot have player card attachments or be optionally engaged.While the engaged player is engaged with another Orc enemy, Uruk Chieftain cannot take damage.Forced: At the end of the encounter phase, Uruk Chieftain engages the player engaged with the most non-unique Orc enemies.

27843323-c7d0-4f9e-a67e-4494f8926203.Name: Azain Silverbeard
27843323-c7d0-4f9e-a67e-4494f8926203.Text: Response: After Azain Silverbeard participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, spend 1 Ï resource to deal 2 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the destroyed enemy. Any player may trigger this response.

278a52c1-d52e-4084-b985-dbf24eb35901.Name: Yazan
278a52c1-d52e-4084-b985-dbf24eb35901.Text:
Response: After Yazan is declared as an attacker, deal 1 damage to a non-unique enemy in play. (Limit once per phase.)
If Yazan leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

27bdece4-dfac-438e-87cd-1dc653eab8d6.Name: Umbar Captain
27bdece4-dfac-438e-87cd-1dc653eab8d6.Text: While you are engaged with Umbar Captain, characters you control cannot attack Ship enemies.

27cc1cc1-17a9-4dcf-990a-fd3c44c7b163.Keywords: Play only after the staging step.
27cc1cc1-17a9-4dcf-990a-fd3c44c7b163.Name: Elevenses
27cc1cc1-17a9-4dcf-990a-fd3c44c7b163.Text: Quest Action: Choose X questing Hobbit characters you control. Ready each chosen character and remove them from the quest. Then, reduce your threat by X.

27d6c3df-c7dc-4ea0-941f-dcad65b3f1eb.Name: Mordor Warg
27d6c3df-c7dc-4ea0-941f-dcad65b3f1eb.Text: When Revealed: Attach to an Orc enemy and return that enemy to the staging area. Limit 1 per enemy. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: “Attached enemy gets +2 $, +2 Û, +2 Ú and +2 hit points. Forced: When attached enemy leaves play, add Mordor Warg to the staging area.”)

27da4ea2-7892-409e-b6e0-38ad215d5d0c.Name: Exposed Ridge
27da4ea2-7892-409e-b6e0-38ad215d5d0c.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damaged character the defending player controls.
27da4ea2-7892-409e-b6e0-38ad215d5d0c.Text: While Exposed Ridge is the active location, it gains: “Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, each player deals 1 damage to a character he controls.”

27f961dd-c360-418e-9aac-6756d3a46dde.Name: Poison-darts
27f961dd-c360-418e-9aac-6756d3a46dde.Text: When revealed: Attach to athe enemy in play with the highest engagement cost. (Counts as a Weapon attachement with the text: "Attached enemy gets +2 Û and gains archery 2.")

2809f147-b000-419c-bbb2-39e6221d72de.Name: Mountain Goblin
2809f147-b000-419c-bbb2-39e6221d72de.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if the active location is a Mountain.)
2809f147-b000-419c-bbb2-39e6221d72de.Text: Mountain Goblin gets +1 Û for each Mountain location in the staging area.

2843c312-f8c7-4b07-ba60-2372a3c658c4.Name: Justice Shall Be Done
2843c312-f8c7-4b07-ba60-2372a3c658c4.Text: Limit 1 per deck. Planning Action: Add Justice Shall Be Done to the victory display to draw 3 cards and add 3 resources to the resource pool of each hero you control. At the end of the round, you are eliminated from the game.

284838f8-1ea0-466f-a373-032c7ad6e836.Name: Greyflood Wanderer
284838f8-1ea0-466f-a373-032c7ad6e836.Text:
You may give Greyflood Wanderer doomed 2 when you play it from your hand. If you do, it gains:
“Response: After you play Greyflood Wanderer, place 1 progress token on each location in play.”

2867f4c6-b458-4caa-bde2-1a6266c094d6.Name: Power of Orthanc
2867f4c6-b458-4caa-bde2-1a6266c094d6.Text: Action: Each player may choose and discard a Condition attachment from play.

2872a8fb-53e6-4e0d-855d-4e1f32cdcfa0.Name: Southron Refugee
2872a8fb-53e6-4e0d-855d-4e1f32cdcfa0.Text: Action: Exhaust Southron Refugee to reduce the cost of the next Harad ally you play this phase by 1.

2878bd63-b20b-419a-85a2-dff419864e08.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
2878bd63-b20b-419a-85a2-dff419864e08.Name: The Forbidden Door
2878bd63-b20b-419a-85a2-dff419864e08.Text: When Revealed: Each player may add 1 resource to the resource pool of each hero he controls. Each player who does so must raise his threat by 3. Forced: At the end of the planning phase, discard all cards in each player’s hand and advance to stage 2A.

28a27a2b-d9c9-40ab-95ec-b44eca301102.Name: Needful to Know
28a27a2b-d9c9-40ab-95ec-b44eca301102.Text: Action: Raise your threat by 1 to look at the top card of the ecnounter deck. Then, reduce your threat by X, where X is the threat of that card.

28a4721b-3696-4fae-9eea-01b5a250c892.Name: Into the Wild
28a4721b-3696-4fae-9eea-01b5a250c892.Text:
When Revealed: Add Midgewater to the staging area.  Each player places 1 progress on the current quest.

Forced: At the end of the round, either remove X progress from the current quest or shuffle 1 out of play Ringwraith into the encounter deck.  X is the number of players in the game.

The players cannot advance while Midgewater is in play.

28b27afb-c966-4960-a4e7-5e5364e45c05.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
28b27afb-c966-4960-a4e7-5e5364e45c05.Name: Ghosts of Men
28b27afb-c966-4960-a4e7-5e5364e45c05.Text: When Revealed: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or Ghosts of Men makes an immediate attack against you.

28ba7c20-b660-40cb-9e2c-bf6ebaec723e.Name: Boarding Party
28ba7c20-b660-40cb-9e2c-bf6ebaec723e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you control an exhausted Ship objective).
28ba7c20-b660-40cb-9e2c-bf6ebaec723e.Text: When Revealed: Each player reveals the top card of the Corsair deck and puts it into play, engaged with him.

28baceac-b941-4921-96ad-5df8dfb96544.Name: Sorcery of Carn Dûm
28baceac-b941-4921-96ad-5df8dfb96544.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
28baceac-b941-4921-96ad-5df8dfb96544.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard the highest cost attachment you control, or assign X damage among characters you control, where X is the number of attachments you control.

28fcf3a8-febd-46bb-9a80-89dfe762f03f.Name: Knife-work
28fcf3a8-febd-46bb-9a80-89dfe762f03f.Text: Action: Choose a player. Each enemy engaged with that player gets –1 Ú until the end of the phase. Then, the players as a group may spend 2 Î resources to have the chosen player draw 1 card each time he attacks and destroys an enemy this phase.

29005ca1-107a-4473-8769-ce7d944e9844.Name: Northern Slopes
29005ca1-107a-4473-8769-ce7d944e9844.Text:
While Northern Slopes is in the staging area, each Goblin enemy gets +1 Û and +1 Ú.

While Northern Slopes is the active location, it gains: "Forced: When a character leaves play, remove 1 progress from the current quest, if able."

2935fd55-6945-4c20-8586-c435ceec52f3.Name: Raven Village
2935fd55-6945-4c20-8586-c435ceec52f3.Shadow: Shadow: Deal attacking enemy 2 additional shadow cards from the Raven deck.
2935fd55-6945-4c20-8586-c435ceec52f3.Text: Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, reveal the top card of the Raven deck and add it to the staging area.

29562ee1-56d9-4a46-ba4b-1af24f85deb6.Name: Dark-wight
29562ee1-56d9-4a46-ba4b-1af24f85deb6.Text:
While Dark-wight is engaged with a player, that player's heroes cannot gain resources from card effects.

Forced: After Dark-wight attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller discards all resources from each hero he controls.

298c3181-5f6f-487c-adbd-741bb202b8e0.Name: Cunning Informant
298c3181-5f6f-487c-adbd-741bb202b8e0.Text:
While Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero, Cunning Informat gets +3 Û.
During the encounter phase, if Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero, that hero's controller is considered to have +10 threat for the purpose of engagement checks.

29a12054-527c-41a3-9dd8-25565288fb4d.Name: Gollum's Betrayal
29a12054-527c-41a3-9dd8-25565288fb4d.Text:
If Gollum is defeated, add him to the victory display. (Do not flip him over.)

While Shelob has at least 1 resource on her, she gains: “Forced: When Shelob is dealt any amount of damage, cancel that damage and discard 1 resource from Shelob instead.” 

The players cannot defeat this stage unless Shelob and Gollum are in the victor display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

29b76593-0ef3-410b-aa85-1c282d4b1582.Name: Captain of Gondor
29b76593-0ef3-410b-aa85-1c282d4b1582.Text: Response: After you optionally engage an enemy, exhaust Capatain of Gondor to give attached hero +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

29baa3ae-f954-49c1-b127-f364887f80a7.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
29baa3ae-f954-49c1-b127-f364887f80a7.Name: Embattled Valley
29baa3ae-f954-49c1-b127-f364887f80a7.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, each player assigns X damage among heroes he controls. X is the number of quest stages with no progress on them.
Travel: The players (as a group) exhaust X characters. X is the number of quest stages with no progress on them.

29d5feef-6165-4077-bb80-692526a8a924.Name: Théoden
29d5feef-6165-4077-bb80-692526a8a924.Text: Each hero with a printed Ï resource icon gets +1 Ò.

2a49f405-1431-44ff-8316-573c23aaffcb.Name: Treacherous Bluffs
2a49f405-1431-44ff-8316-573c23aaffcb.Shadow: Shadow: Excess damage dealt by this attack must be assigned to Arwen Undómiel.
2a49f405-1431-44ff-8316-573c23aaffcb.Text: Forced: When an engaged enemy with the ambush keyword engages a player, Treacherous Bluffs gets +2  $ until the end of the phase.

2aa91555-4734-400e-ac9f-babe55b1e2dc.Name: Knight of the White Tower
2aa91555-4734-400e-ac9f-babe55b1e2dc.Text: Knight of the White Tower’s resource cost must be paid from a single hero’s resource pool.

2b38254c-e992-4fb5-89e8-e7f636658ce0.Name: Stock-Brook
2b38254c-e992-4fb5-89e8-e7f636658ce0.Text: When Revealed: Immediately travel to Stock-Brook.  If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.

2b3973f5-e6f6-4611-87b7-b6e3dc33eb66.Name: Rough Waters
2b3973f5-e6f6-4611-87b7-b6e3dc33eb66.Shadow: Shadow: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
2b3973f5-e6f6-4611-87b7-b6e3dc33eb66.Text: While Rough Waters is in the staging area, cancel the first ¹ symbol found during each Sailing test.

2b81f105-3712-4326-ac9f-ed7aa18aace1.Name: Injured Companion
2b81f105-3712-4326-ac9f-ed7aa18aace1.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player’s threat by 1.
2b81f105-3712-4326-ac9f-ed7aa18aace1.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1 for each character you control, or discard a character you control.

2b93afb6-38fd-4ded-bf92-ed86bc03635d.Name: Journey to the Cross-roads
2b93afb6-38fd-4ded-bf92-ed86bc03635d.Text: Resolution: Each player who chose to shuffle a copy of Brace of Coneys into his deck during setup has earned that boon. Add each earned copy to the campaign pool. Record the name and quantity of each enemy underneath The Black Gate in the notes section of the campaign log.

2b9c8fa1-a5c3-441e-95c1-c10c85948dc1.Name: Southward Road
2b9c8fa1-a5c3-441e-95c1-c10c85948dc1.Text:
While Southward Road is the active location, each player may optionally engage an additional enemy during the encounter phase. 

Travel: The first player reveals the top facedown card underneath The Cross­roads and adds it to the staging area to travel here.

2ba77eca-870d-41d9-84cb-f0f33b6d9f15.Name: Hithaeglir Stream
2ba77eca-870d-41d9-84cb-f0f33b6d9f15.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Deal it an additional shadow card.
2ba77eca-870d-41d9-84cb-f0f33b6d9f15.Text: While Hithaeglir Stream is the active location, players draw 2 cards during the resource phase instead of 1.

2bb2c224-3d72-455f-9ec6-89670d372660.Name: Ravenhill Scout
2bb2c224-3d72-455f-9ec6-89670d372660.Text: Action: Exhaust Ravenhill Scout to move up to 2 progress tokens from 1 location to another location.

2bc9f441-e922-4509-aef9-a27e485ed227.Name: Bellach's Hunter
2bc9f441-e922-4509-aef9-a27e485ed227.Text:
While a player controls 5 or more allies, Bellach's Hunter gets –20 engagement cost.
Forced: When Bellach's Hunter engages a player, that player must either remove all time counters from the current quest or deal 5 damage to a hero he controls.

2bf5a4d1-9d74-4e1a-8725-cf4a3a47dde9.Name: Unholy Alliance
2bf5a4d1-9d74-4e1a-8725-cf4a3a47dde9.Text:
Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area during the staging step each round.

If a hero is destroyed by an enemy attack, the players have lost the game.

2c012cbe-2e29-4b5f-9828-0cf8a325a604.Name: Undead Thrall
2c012cbe-2e29-4b5f-9828-0cf8a325a604.Shadow: Shadow: Put Undead Thrall into play engaged with the defending player and deal it a shadow card.

2c1b7d82-e14e-4e2d-9270-86b59f95e0a9.Name: Rhovanion Outrider
2c1b7d82-e14e-4e2d-9270-86b59f95e0a9.Text: Response: After Rhovanion Outrider commits to the quest, place 1 progress on a location in the staging area. If that location is not explored by this effect, give Rhovanion Outrider +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

2c1f75cf-a6b5-4aa6-abbd-e1beb803e2e2.Name: Mirage
2c1f75cf-a6b5-4aa6-abbd-e1beb803e2e2.Text: When Revealed: Discard a the active location. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a location is discarded. Make that location the active location.

2c20ea14-e7bc-4a38-a809-8834d659adf5.Name: Wicked Spider
2c20ea14-e7bc-4a38-a809-8834d659adf5.Text: Forced: When this enemy attacks, defending player must attach 1 poison to a character he controls.

2c3f8a11-c7a5-4709-ab8d-7435763f558b.Name: Haradrim Pirate
2c3f8a11-c7a5-4709-ab8d-7435763f558b.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ú for each damage on it.
2c3f8a11-c7a5-4709-ab8d-7435763f558b.Text: Forced: When Haradrim Pirate engages you, deal 1 damage to a character you control (2 damage instead if the active location is a Ship).

2c5991ac-1f8d-4b5d-a7dc-91ea664102d1.Name: Well Warned
2c5991ac-1f8d-4b5d-a7dc-91ea664102d1.Text: Play only if you control a unique character with the Noble trait and another unique character with the Scout trait.Response: After a player engages an enemy, he reduces his threat by X, where X is the just engaged enemy’s printed $.

2c6e85b4-18e3-4c21-95eb-5d74b9eebb5b.Name: Sarn Ford Sentry
2c6e85b4-18e3-4c21-95eb-5d74b9eebb5b.Text: Response: After Sarn Ford Sentry enters play, draw 1 card for each enemy engaged with you.

2c7390c5-06a8-451e-9895-88fb705e18e8.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
2c7390c5-06a8-451e-9895-88fb705e18e8.Name: Orc Saboteur
2c7390c5-06a8-451e-9895-88fb705e18e8.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, deal 2 damage to a Battleground location in play.
2c7390c5-06a8-451e-9895-88fb705e18e8.Text: Damage dealt by Orc Saboteur's attacks must be assigned to a Battleground location in play, if able.

2c7e2c6c-ecaa-48dc-a19e-4477d4fc693d.Name: The King's Road
2c7e2c6c-ecaa-48dc-a19e-4477d4fc693d.Text:
While any player has 3 or more cards in hand, The King's Road gets +3 quest points.

While any player has 5 or more cards in hand, the King's Road gains: 'When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to The King's Road, if able.'

2ce0c7c6-e7ae-4847-a02d-2be874afa3d4.Name: Howling at their Heels
2ce0c7c6-e7ae-4847-a02d-2be874afa3d4.Text: When Revealed: If the players are not at the same stage as the Orcs, add the total $ of each card in the Orc’s area to the total $ in the staging area until the end of the phase. If the players are at the same stage as the Orcs, each enemy gets +1 $ until the end of the phase.

2d2e4f42-009d-4fde-ab42-3cd9351a4d0f.Name: Brutal Uruk
2d2e4f42-009d-4fde-ab42-3cd9351a4d0f.Text: Forced: After Brutual Uruk attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller turns all hidden cards in his play area faceup. Deal a shadow card to each enemy turned faceup by this effect and resolve their attacks as normal.

2d550e71-f2a6-41f2-8aac-4533a965eb71.Keywords: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.
2d550e71-f2a6-41f2-8aac-4533a965eb71.Name: Expert Treasure-hunter
2d550e71-f2a6-41f2-8aac-4533a965eb71.Text: Response: After attached hero quests successfully, name a card type and discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card is the named type, take it into your hand.

2d819f76-77dd-47a2-9a3f-ac8b8018f0df.Name: Ringwraith
2d819f76-77dd-47a2-9a3f-ac8b8018f0df.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
2d819f76-77dd-47a2-9a3f-ac8b8018f0df.Text: Forced: When Ringwraith attacks, deal it an additional shadow card if The One Ring is exhausted.

2d85efc7-b619-4376-a7ac-be797b874fba.Name: Shadow Dweller
2d85efc7-b619-4376-a7ac-be797b874fba.Shadow: Shuffle Shadow Dweller back into the encounter deck.
2d85efc7-b619-4376-a7ac-be797b874fba.Text: Shadow Dweller does not make engagement checks while Cave Torch is in play.

2dbe66bc-a6bf-42d7-92a5-d186dfe954c6.Name: Crew Quarters
2dbe66bc-a6bf-42d7-92a5-d186dfe954c6.Text: Travel: Add 1 resource to each Raider card in play to travel here.

2e156c1b-5227-4dfd-a076-ee9b236c86da.Keywords: Attach to a Ranger character. Limit 1 per character
2e156c1b-5227-4dfd-a076-ee9b236c86da.Name: Weather-stained Cloak
2e156c1b-5227-4dfd-a076-ee9b236c86da.Text: While attached character is committed to the quest, Weather-stained Cloak gains: “Response: Exhaust Weather-stained Cloak to cancel 1 point of damage just dealt to attached character.”

2e1bb6cc-2f05-47f1-8ea5-78955cd0cbf2.Keywords: X is the number of cards in play with 1 or more captured cards underneath it.
2e1bb6cc-2f05-47f1-8ea5-78955cd0cbf2.Name: Goblin Tormentor
2e1bb6cc-2f05-47f1-8ea5-78955cd0cbf2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it has no captured cards underneath it).

2e502d3d-5cf5-47eb-9577-3c14d74995fa.Name: Eastern Quarter
2e502d3d-5cf5-47eb-9577-3c14d74995fa.Text:
Forced: When you take control of Eastern Quarter, discard each event card in your hand. 

While a player controls Eastern Quarter it gains: "Forced: After the 'when revealed' effect of a treachery is canceled, return Easter Quarter to the staging area."

2e5e6e97-003b-4500-8372-495f5ee86051.Name: Heirloom of Iârchon
2e5e6e97-003b-4500-8372-495f5ee86051.Text:
Action: Exhaust Amarthiúl or a hero to claim Heirloom of Iârchon. Then, attach Heirloom of Iârchon to that character.

Attached character gets +1 Ò.

2e778689-9e3f-4da8-a473-781c777f6473.Name: Aragorn
2e778689-9e3f-4da8-a473-781c777f6473.Text: The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game. While Aragorn has an Artifact attached to him, he gains sentinel and does not exhaust to quest.

2e77da31-a3ef-4bea-9af8-3f663c608a62.Name: The Front Gate
2e77da31-a3ef-4bea-9af8-3f663c608a62.Text:
Forced: When The Front Gate is explored, each Dragon enemy in play makes an attack against the first player. (Deal and resolve a shadow card for this attack.)
Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 3 cards from his hand that match the revealed card's cost.

2e7f22cc-218e-4dad-b4e4-00b2208713d9.Name: Gwaihir
2e7f22cc-218e-4dad-b4e4-00b2208713d9.Text: Response: After Gwaihir enters play, search your discard pile for an Eagle ally and put it into play under your control. At the end of the round, if that ally is still in play, add it to your hand.

2e810a9b-5d79-4828-8268-33e82c5fc1fa.Name: Freezing Cold
2e810a9b-5d79-4828-8268-33e82c5fc1fa.Text: When Revealed: The first player attaches this card to a hero he controls. Counts as a Condition Attachment with the text: "Attached hero gets -2 Ò and cannot commit to a quest. If attached hero has more than 1 copy of Freezing Cold attached, discard attached hero from play."

2e84d805-365c-47ea-9c4f-e3f75daeb9a6.Name: Warrior of Lossarnach
2e84d805-365c-47ea-9c4f-e3f75daeb9a6.Text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 Ú.

2e944d64-3612-4b5f-8fed-50cae0471fd5.Name: In Service of the Steward
2e944d64-3612-4b5f-8fed-50cae0471fd5.Text: Attached character gains the Gondor trait.

2efa631a-eb16-4078-84a5-18c7033b86f3.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 2
2efa631a-eb16-4078-84a5-18c7033b86f3.Name: A Knife in the Dark
2efa631a-eb16-4078-84a5-18c7033b86f3.Text: Resolution: Starting with the first player, each player may choose one of the following boon cards and attach it to a hero he controls: Tireless Ranger, Skilled Healer, Valiant Warrior, Noble Hero. The chosen cards have been earned by the players.

2f0a3f18-c84f-4458-b6f7-2e6be9acee6b.Name: Visionary Leadership
2f0a3f18-c84f-4458-b6f7-2e6be9acee6b.Text: While attached hero has at least 1 resource in its resource pool, Gondor characters get +1 Ò.

2f1ba4e7-ddc6-4d97-93d3-31907840aed0.Encounter Set: Over the Misty Mountains Grim - Nightmare
2f1ba4e7-ddc6-4d97-93d3-31907840aed0.Name: Narrow Ledge
2f1ba4e7-ddc6-4d97-93d3-31907840aed0.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle all copies of Galloping Boulders from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
2f1ba4e7-ddc6-4d97-93d3-31907840aed0.Text: While Narrow Ledge is the active location, each player cannot commit more than 3 characters to the quest.

2f273bdf-2c16-43e6-8845-5899cac1e3ab.Name: Guard Wolf
2f273bdf-2c16-43e6-8845-5899cac1e3ab.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
2f273bdf-2c16-43e6-8845-5899cac1e3ab.Text: Forced: After the engaged player discards any number of cards from his out-of-play deck, Guard Warg makes an immediate attack.

2f2e6076-2636-485b-874c-fd3bc4bcf5f0.Name: Lead a Sortie
2f2e6076-2636-485b-874c-fd3bc4bcf5f0.Text:
Progress cannot be placed here while Battering Ram is in play.

Response: At the end of the round, raise each player's threat by 1 and reveal an encounter card to choose a non-unique enemy worth no victory points at another stage. Discard the chosen enemy.

If Lieutenant of Angmar is in a victory display at the end of the round, the players have routed the enemy and win the game.

2f380c3c-7de7-4961-b5f5-878f3e4e58c8.Name: Pathless Wilderness
2f380c3c-7de7-4961-b5f5-878f3e4e58c8.Text:
Pathless Wilderness enters play with 3 resource tokens on it.
Forced: At the end of the round, discard 1 resource token here. Then, if there are no resource tokens here, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 3.

2f3a59dd-d404-426e-9e40-1589cf690618.Name: Barren and Desolate
2f3a59dd-d404-426e-9e40-1589cf690618.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a side quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per quest. While attached quest is the current quest, each character gets -1 Ò.")

2f7770cd-3102-4f35-a3bc-bd9afcab8303.Name: Get That Dwarf!
2f7770cd-3102-4f35-a3bc-bd9afcab8303.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, deal 2 damage to Nalir.
2f7770cd-3102-4f35-a3bc-bd9afcab8303.Text: When Revealed: The enemy in the staging area with the highest Û engages the first player and makes an immediate attack against Nalir. If there are no enemies in the staging area, Get That Dwarf! Gains surge.

2f9c24db-2ee4-4368-99fa-db49a0add8f5.Keywords: Attach to a Warrior character. Raiment of War counts as 2 Restricted attachments.
2f9c24db-2ee4-4368-99fa-db49a0add8f5.Name: Raiment of War
2f9c24db-2ee4-4368-99fa-db49a0add8f5.Text: Attached character gets +1 Û, +1 Ú, and +2 hit points.

2fc8a29f-1de3-4821-8ea9-97d7385fa4d1.Name: Thaurdir's Hunter
2fc8a29f-1de3-4821-8ea9-97d7385fa4d1.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, either remove 1 time counter or 5 progress from a quest.
2fc8a29f-1de3-4821-8ea9-97d7385fa4d1.Text: Forced: When Thaurdir's Hunter attacks, either remove 1 time counter from the main quest, or treat this attack as undefended.

2fd16de8-3286-4003-9978-574738b2a337.Name: Umbar Slaver
2fd16de8-3286-4003-9978-574738b2a337.Text: Umbar Slaver gets +1 Û and +1 $ for each resource on it.Forced: After the engaged player spends any number of resources, place 1 of those resources on Umbar Slaver.

2fd9f511-463b-42c8-bc6f-9bd1b3b91057.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
2fd9f511-463b-42c8-bc6f-9bd1b3b91057.Name: Banks of Sirannon
2fd9f511-463b-42c8-bc6f-9bd1b3b91057.Shadow: Shadow: For each point of damage dealt by this attack, the defending player must discard a random card from his hand.
2fd9f511-463b-42c8-bc6f-9bd1b3b91057.Text: While Banks of Sirannon is in the staging area, each Tentacle enemy gets +2 Ú.

30252ae6-2652-45b9-a245-41abd03d05d6.Name: The Nîn-in-Eilph
30252ae6-2652-45b9-a245-41abd03d05d6.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: When the players advance to stage 2A, add Ancient Marsh-dweller to the staging area (from out of play or engaged with a player).

3029e445-173b-481b-9a62-61f79185ab30.Name: Trollshaw Forest
3029e445-173b-481b-9a62-61f79185ab30.Text:
While Trollshaw Forest is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a 'when revealed' effect is canceled, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1."
Travel: Reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1 to travel here.

303b01b8-2d61-4c20-81a0-50800e18d617.Name: Sudden Assault
303b01b8-2d61-4c20-81a0-50800e18d617.Text: When Revealed: If the total Ò of characters committed to the quest is greater than the total $ in the staging area, each enemy in the staging area makes an immediate attack against the first player. If no attack is made this way, shuffle Sudden Assault and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

3065a397-5346-4148-8e0a-47009fe9b87d.Name: The Stormcaller
3065a397-5346-4148-8e0a-47009fe9b87d.Text:
When the Stormcaller advances to the next quest stage, return it to the Stormcaller's area. 

If the Stormcaller leaves play, the players win the game.

307411f3-4a45-44ae-bc64-4e16deb97d10.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 1
307411f3-4a45-44ae-bc64-4e16deb97d10.Name: A Shadow of the Past
307411f3-4a45-44ae-bc64-4e16deb97d10.Text: Resolution: Choose Gandalf's Delay or The Ring Draws Them and add it to the Campaign Pool.  Then, choose Gildor Inglorion or Mr. Underhill and add it to the Campaign Pool.  The chosen cards have been earned by the players.

30a319ff-6092-4d5f-9b94-2a9b4f44f9c1.Name: The Rearguard
30a319ff-6092-4d5f-9b94-2a9b4f44f9c1.Text: Murzag cannot leave play unless destroyed. If Murzag is defeated, advance to the next stage.

30ccffbd-b86a-4f6e-a286-8e8c753266ed.Name: Bones of Hollin
30ccffbd-b86a-4f6e-a286-8e8c753266ed.Text:
Forced: After any amount of damage is placed on Bones of Hollin, raise each player's threat by that amount.
Travel: Place 2 damage on an Ost-in-Edhil location in play to travel here.

30e0c679-3ced-4862-a681-b67ceb8939d3.Name: Poisoned Stakes
30e0c679-3ced-4862-a681-b67ceb8939d3.Text: Play Poisoned Stakes into the staging area unattached. If unattached, attach Poisoned Stakes to the next eligble enemy that enters the staging area. At the end of each round, deal 2 damage to attached enemy.

3104ef1f-4f1c-4603-87cb-f3a70f5e6710.Name: Have You Seen Baggins?
3104ef1f-4f1c-4603-87cb-f3a70f5e6710.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Forced: After a player fails a Hide test, discard attached hero.")

31406925-1626-4c17-b3ee-2e2700a99c14.Name: Don't be Hasty!
31406925-1626-4c17-b3ee-2e2700a99c14.Text: Response: When an encounter card is revealed but before resolving any of that card's keywords or "when revealed" effects, choose a character committed to the quest. Ready that character and remove it from the quest.

314e7260-ca85-4842-af5f-913ecbaa13d4.Keywords:
Immune to Player card effects.
X is the number of players in the game.
314e7260-ca85-4842-af5f-913ecbaa13d4.Name: Hallowed Circle
314e7260-ca85-4842-af5f-913ecbaa13d4.Text:
Travel: The players must exhaust 3 Key objectives.

Forced: After the players travel here, each engaged Guardian enemy makes an immediate attack.

314eaf40-1554-4c1a-b643-1f4353e25633.Name: Emery
314eaf40-1554-4c1a-b643-1f4353e25633.Text: Action: Discard the top 3 card of your deck to put Emery into play from your hand, under any player's control. Then, if any of the discarded cards have the Tactics, Lore or Leadership sphere, discard Emery.

315ddd38-e50f-4db0-8e5c-8030998e4f7f.Name: Full Sail Ahead!
315ddd38-e50f-4db0-8e5c-8030998e4f7f.Text:
No more than 8 progress can be placed here each round. If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), no more than 4 progress can be placed here each round instead. 

When you defeat this stage, if the Stormcaller is at stage 2, you have caught up to the Stormcaller and win the game. Otherwise, advance to the next stage.

31ada226-448d-48f8-9f9a-c1f5046ad041.Name: Poisoned by Spiders
31ada226-448d-48f8-9f9a-c1f5046ad041.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an unconscious character you control.
31ada226-448d-48f8-9f9a-c1f5046ad041.Text: When Revealed: Each character takes damage equal to the number of poison it has. If no characters were damaged by this effect, this card gains surge.

31bd075d-e116-4a0f-81dd-942b52a6267c.Name: The Grotto
31bd075d-e116-4a0f-81dd-942b52a6267c.Text:
While an Underwater location is the active location, players cannot play attachments or allies.

Forced: After a double-sided location is explored, add the top location from the Grotto deck to the staging area, Grotto side faceup.

You cannot advance unless there are at least 3 Underwater locations in the victory display.

31cd848b-a1bc-4ccd-af0c-eb3cc3ba593b.Name: White Tower Watchman
31cd848b-a1bc-4ccd-af0c-eb3cc3ba593b.Text: If each hero you control belongs to the same sphere of influence, you may assign damage from undefended enemy attacks to White Tower Watchman instead of a hero you control.

31da2071-cc8e-4fb4-a3f8-062a235eb209.Name: Torech Ungol
31da2071-cc8e-4fb4-a3f8-062a235eb209.Text:
While Torech Ungol is in the staging area, Shelob gets +1 Û and +1 Ú.
Travel: Exhaust Sméagol to travel here.

31f8955f-40d5-41de-b886-77018b59d717.Name: The Under-way
31f8955f-40d5-41de-b886-77018b59d717.Shadow: Shadow: Deal the attacking enemy 2 additional shadow cards.
31f8955f-40d5-41de-b886-77018b59d717.Text: While The Under-way is in the staging area, each Orc enemy gets -5 engagement cost and gains: “Forced: After this enemy engages a player, deal it a shadow card.”

3217a119-6b86-47dd-b451-c5e45be3f874.Name: Frodo Baggins
3217a119-6b86-47dd-b451-c5e45be3f874.Text: Response: Spend 1 ☺ resource and exhaust The One Ring to cancel the effects of an encounter card just revealed from the encounter deck.  Shuffle that card back into the encounter deck and reveal another encounter card.

321abaed-0b0c-465b-9f2a-bb9796e6b8c5.Name: Narrow Alleyway
321abaed-0b0c-465b-9f2a-bb9796e6b8c5.Text: Response: After the player travel here, choose a non-unique enemy engaged with a player and place it faceup under this location. While an enemy is under this location, that enemy is considered to be out of play.Forced: After Narrow Alleyway leaves play, put each enemy under it into play, engaged with the first player.

32267333-091c-4bbf-bb29-5f21c8b79188.Name: The One Ring
32267333-091c-4bbf-bb29-5f21c8b79188.Text: Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer. Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero. If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

323842f5-457f-4dd4-95b8-eb19c24664cb.Name: Dark Bats
323842f5-457f-4dd4-95b8-eb19c24664cb.Shadow: Shadow: Attach this card to the defending character.
323842f5-457f-4dd4-95b8-eb19c24664cb.Text: Forced: After Dark Bats damages a character, attach it to that character. (While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached character gets -1 Ò, -1 Û, and -1 Ú.")

323ebfa3-57e5-4394-9f55-284b2f7ee0be.Name: Faramir
323ebfa3-57e5-4394-9f55-284b2f7ee0be.Text: Faramir gets +1 Û for each enemy in the staging area.

32416ec8-b50d-4cd2-a62f-10f97c87be73.Name: Pathless Country
32416ec8-b50d-4cd2-a62f-10f97c87be73.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, the attacking enemy engages the next player then makes an immediate attack.
32416ec8-b50d-4cd2-a62f-10f97c87be73.Text: Pathless Country gets +4 quest points while in the staging area.

3254a776-09e5-4576-9b3c-164cc93e1e26.Keywords:
Mire 1.
Forced: When Soft Mires is discarded by the Mire keyword, the first player reveals the top card of the encounter deck.
3254a776-09e5-4576-9b3c-164cc93e1e26.Name: Soft Mires
3254a776-09e5-4576-9b3c-164cc93e1e26.Text: Travel: Each player must raise his threat by 1 to travel here.

32873634-3a91-4d6f-988a-fb8bb5c16ef3.Name: Cleft of Cirith Ungol
32873634-3a91-4d6f-988a-fb8bb5c16ef3.Text:
While The Cleft of Cirith Ungol is in the victory display, Shelob gets +2 Û, loses Indestructible, and gains: “Shelob engages the first player.”

Travel: Place 1 resource on Shelob to travel here.

32993141-956c-4426-98d9-8705de6fee00.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. The first player gains control of Smeagol.
32993141-956c-4426-98d9-8705de6fee00.Name: Gollum
32993141-956c-4426-98d9-8705de6fee00.Text:
Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, flip Smeagol to Gollum.

If Smeagol is destroyed, the players lose the game.

32ab123f-b12f-4f9d-a6e5-556f54eb6c06.Name: Steward of Orthanc
32ab123f-b12f-4f9d-a6e5-556f54eb6c06.Text: Response: When you play an event, give it Doomed 1 to draw a card. You cannot trigger this ability if you have already triggered the ability of a Steward of Orthanc this round.

32ac7351-b154-4e94-8348-ed31385fb3a4.Name: Frenzied Attack
32ac7351-b154-4e94-8348-ed31385fb3a4.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, attacking enemy cannot take damage.
32ac7351-b154-4e94-8348-ed31385fb3a4.Text: When Revealed: Each player draws a card. Each player discards each ally from his hand. If no allies are discarded this way, Frenzied Attack gains surge.

32bd5a1d-7273-4916-aa3b-cb152c1cd6f1.Name: Great East Road
32bd5a1d-7273-4916-aa3b-cb152c1cd6f1.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player then makes an immediate attack.
32bd5a1d-7273-4916-aa3b-cb152c1cd6f1.Text:
X is 1 plus the number of Nazgûl enemies in play.
While Great East Road is in the staging area, each Nazgûl enemy gets -5 engagement cost.

32db1af6-e214-4958-9ca4-bdf3a73758b5.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel.
32db1af6-e214-4958-9ca4-bdf3a73758b5.Name: Nárelenya
32db1af6-e214-4958-9ca4-bdf3a73758b5.Text:
Reduce the cost of the first ally you play each round by 1.

If Nárelenya is destroyed, its controller is eliminated from the game.

3309e01a-db7f-4754-bd41-21a0b4316415.Name: Serpent's Blade
3309e01a-db7f-4754-bd41-21a0b4316415.Text: Forced: When the Stormcaller advances to the next quest stage, Serpent's Blade makes an immediate attack against the engaged player.

330cc524-6e48-4aa8-a201-d80e1b67570e.Name: Uruk Marksman
330cc524-6e48-4aa8-a201-d80e1b67570e.Text: Forced: After Uruk Marksman is turned faceup as a hidden card, deal 3 damage to a character controlled by the engaged player and return Uruk Marksman to the staging area.

3342238a-2680-4044-822e-39a7d3d767b3.Name: The Steward's Fear
3342238a-2680-4044-822e-39a7d3d767b3.Text:
You are playing Nightmare Mode.

Setup: Shuffle each copy of False Accusations into the underworld deck.  When randomly determining which Plot is the "hidden" plot cards, include the 2 new Plot cards from this Nightmare Deck, as well as the 3 Plot cards from the original scenario.

Forced: After an enemy is destroyed, shuffle it into the underworld deck if you are not at stage 3.

Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, if there is a Clue card in the staging area, shuffle it back into the underworld deck.

3371c102-4aab-4b15-a738-a4b3483a6004.Keywords: Uncharted. Immune to player card effects.
3371c102-4aab-4b15-a738-a4b3483a6004.Name: Temple of the Deceived
3371c102-4aab-4b15-a738-a4b3483a6004.Text:
While Temple Halls is the active location, each character gets –1 Û and –1 Ú.
Forced: When Temple Halls is flipped over while active, put Temple Guardian into play from the victory display, engaged with the player with the highest threat.

337906ff-c49f-4768-ad9f-57561a4c1eb1.Name: Flies and Spiders
337906ff-c49f-4768-ad9f-57561a4c1eb1.Text:
You are playing Nightmare Mode.

Setup: Each player gives 1 poison to a hero he controls.

3385b644-5fd6-4473-9fec-45d7262f5824.Name: Unholy Crypt
3385b644-5fd6-4473-9fec-45d7262f5824.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reanimate that character and deal it 1 shadow card.
3385b644-5fd6-4473-9fec-45d7262f5824.Text: Unholy Crypt gets +1 $ for each Reanimated Dead in play.

33a1b9de-6b17-49f8-8eb3-7dd98feaf1cb.Name: Raven Clan Druid
33a1b9de-6b17-49f8-8eb3-7dd98feaf1cb.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the Time X value on the active location.
33a1b9de-6b17-49f8-8eb3-7dd98feaf1cb.Text: Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards, remove 1 time counter from a location in play.

33a575b4-e373-46db-b11e-90f8fc41ef6e.Name: Rider of Mordor
33a575b4-e373-46db-b11e-90f8fc41ef6e.Text:
While Rider of Mordor is engaged with a player, characters that player controls get -1 Ò.

While The One Ring is exhausted, Rider of Mordor gets -10 engagement cost.

3459889b-48a2-4401-b511-6e11dabec437.Name: Surrounded by Shadow
3459889b-48a2-4401-b511-6e11dabec437.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either take 1 hidden card for each questing hero he controls, or remove one hero he controls from the quest for each hidden card in his play area.

3467d57f-412b-482a-8176-3d396a3a44f1.Name: Orthanc Archer
3467d57f-412b-482a-8176-3d396a3a44f1.Text: When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand and assign X damage among characters you control. X is the discarded card's printed cost.

346f832a-27ba-4c71-83b5-f690d0953911.Name: Power Beyond Death
346f832a-27ba-4c71-83b5-f690d0953911.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, resolve this card's 'when revealed' effect.
346f832a-27ba-4c71-83b5-f690d0953911.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the main quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Daechanar gets +2 Ú.")

346fda89-94df-410a-8027-41eacbf27238.Name: An Untimely End
346fda89-94df-410a-8027-41eacbf27238.Text: Archery damage must be assigned to allies, if able.

3470ed02-38dc-4387-8fe0-265b13fe96a1.Name: Ice Storm
3470ed02-38dc-4387-8fe0-265b13fe96a1.Shadow: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control. X is the number of quest cards in play.
3470ed02-38dc-4387-8fe0-265b13fe96a1.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of quest cards in play. Then, exhaust each damaged character.

34a59958-0d34-49a9-8beb-b6f8ba8dcd4c.Name: Amarthiúl
34a59958-0d34-49a9-8beb-b6f8ba8dcd4c.Text:
Response: After an enemy engages a player, give control of Amarthiúl to that player.

If Amarthiúl leaves play, the players lose the game.

34bfcbad-5557-48bc-8abd-3ac472ee4d3b.Name: Cave Eel
34bfcbad-5557-48bc-8abd-3ac472ee4d3b.Text:
Cave Eel cannot be engaged unless the active location is Underwater.

Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, return Cave Eel to the staging area unless the active location is Underwater.

34e81b70-82c4-4fb4-8e6b-e3df7f587181.Name: Pale-Green Tentacle
34e81b70-82c4-4fb4-8e6b-e3df7f587181.Text:
Cannot have attachments.
Watcher in the Water Cannot take damage.
Forced: After Pale-green Tentacle attacks and destroys a character, return Pale-green Tentacle to the staging area.

35055e3e-d806-4c21-ad37-8177d70be329.Name: Houses of the Dead
35055e3e-d806-4c21-ad37-8177d70be329.Text: Forced: After Houses of the Dead becomes the active location, exhaust all characters.

35376ae0-c807-4c16-8f4d-e14d36aec142.Name: Huorn of Fangorn
35376ae0-c807-4c16-8f4d-e14d36aec142.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
35376ae0-c807-4c16-8f4d-e14d36aec142.Text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: At the beginning of each resource phase, the engaged player discards 1 attachment he controls.

354f9e8d-aa47-4493-a697-b59f0bd178ea.Name: Boar Clan Skirmisher
354f9e8d-aa47-4493-a697-b59f0bd178ea.Shadow: Deal 1 damage to a hero you control (2 damage instead if undefended).
354f9e8d-aa47-4493-a697-b59f0bd178ea.Text: Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards, he deals 1 damage to a hero he controls.

356f37d9-34c9-4fae-864d-c34dff7eaaa4.Name: Giant Swamp Adder
356f37d9-34c9-4fae-864d-c34dff7eaaa4.Text: Forced: After any number of time counters are removed from the current quest, Giant Swamp Adder attacks the engaged player.

3574e1dd-d730-485e-8c2b-16fb7d52f78b.Name: Bill Ferny
3574e1dd-d730-485e-8c2b-16fb7d52f78b.Shadow: Shadow: Either raise your threat by 4, or this attack is considered undefended.
3574e1dd-d730-485e-8c2b-16fb7d52f78b.Text: Cannot be optionally engaged. The first treachery revealed each round gains doomed 1 and its effects cannot be canceled.

35787b76-d4d5-4bff-bc05-a270b6e4d98e.Name: Enemy Pursuit
35787b76-d4d5-4bff-bc05-a270b6e4d98e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
35787b76-d4d5-4bff-bc05-a270b6e4d98e.Text: When Revealed: Either remove all progress from the main quest, or assign X damage among characters in play. X is the number of progress tokens on the main quest.

35a5ec34-97ea-4b9e-9fdc-6a00c39c504d.Name: Darkened Mine
35a5ec34-97ea-4b9e-9fdc-6a00c39c504d.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 random card from your hand.
35a5ec34-97ea-4b9e-9fdc-6a00c39c504d.Text: While Darkened Mine is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

35b3cfde-9964-4173-88c5-e5e5cb8f84ac.Name: Barren Moorland
35b3cfde-9964-4173-88c5-e5e5cb8f84ac.Text:
While Barren Moorland is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: When an ally enters play, you must either exhaust it or deal 1 damage to it.”

Travel: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

35ea4640-1019-409c-b6a4-8a9906def475.Name: Shelob's Poison
35ea4640-1019-409c-b6a4-8a9906def475.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Shelob, resolve the ‘When Revealed’ effect on Shelob’s Poison.
35ea4640-1019-409c-b6a4-8a9906def475.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero you control and exhaust that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Limit 1 per hero. Treat attached hero’s text box as blank, except for Traits. Attached hero cannot ready.”)

35ed8128-584c-43cc-ae7c-a4430e78940c.Name: Stone Barrow
35ed8128-584c-43cc-ae7c-a4430e78940c.Text: Forced: After a Guardian enemy attacks, raise each player’s threat by X, where X is that enemy’s $.

3612e715-a474-4911-a247-58c76f2ef277.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
3612e715-a474-4911-a247-58c76f2ef277.Name: Pelennor Field
3612e715-a474-4911-a247-58c76f2ef277.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it has the Harad trait).
3612e715-a474-4911-a247-58c76f2ef277.Text: While at least 1 enemy is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

36384b25-2c8d-4999-9c38-70a461a45518.Name: Mauhúr
36384b25-2c8d-4999-9c38-70a461a45518.Text: Forced: After Mauhúr attacks, increase the pursuit value by 1.

364e43b7-1ae3-4d3e-a73b-55d8f1f94f7c.Name: Mirkwood Explorer
364e43b7-1ae3-4d3e-a73b-55d8f1f94f7c.Text:
Response: After Mirkwood Explorer quests successfully, place 1 progress on it.

Action: Exhaust Mirkwood Explorer to move all progress from it to a location in play.

364ef18d-2a93-4ea9-a2f6-799a4e1b7617.Encounter Set: Over the Misty Mountains Grim - Nightmare
364ef18d-2a93-4ea9-a2f6-799a4e1b7617.Name: Lightning Splinters
364ef18d-2a93-4ea9-a2f6-799a4e1b7617.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and discard 3 cards from his hand. Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the combined printed cost of the cards he discarded.

365efac0-2631-483c-91ce-19da7585bd1a.Name: Unbearable Heat
365efac0-2631-483c-91ce-19da7585bd1a.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.
365efac0-2631-483c-91ce-19da7585bd1a.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.

366f0662-7776-4b1a-bb09-334e06e0e174.Name: Vanguard of Carn Dûm
366f0662-7776-4b1a-bb09-334e06e0e174.Shadow: Shadow: Defender cannot ready this round.
366f0662-7776-4b1a-bb09-334e06e0e174.Text: While Vanguard of Carn Dûm is in the staging area, no more than 5 progress can be placed on the main quest each round.

36905f8f-3807-432b-bd0f-892c97504afd.Name: Under the Merciless Sun
36905f8f-3807-432b-bd0f-892c97504afd.Text: If you cannot make it across the desert soon, you are certain to die of thrist...Forced: At the end of the round, increase the temperature by 4. Then, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.If the temperature is 60 or higher, the players lose the game.

36a22f2b-56d9-4148-a962-f7fbdf60f3a1.Name: Eventide
36a22f2b-56d9-4148-a962-f7fbdf60f3a1.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 progress on Eventide.

If there are 4 or more progress on Eventide, add it to the victory display and put Dusk into play.

36b26228-1c01-4064-a109-d110e00d8e4b.Name: Boromir
36b26228-1c01-4064-a109-d110e00d8e4b.Text:
Boromir gets +2 Ú while defending against an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat.

Response: After Boromir takes any amount of damage, ready him.

36becc00-6e06-4b75-985e-9073f009defd.Name: Impenetrable Dark
36becc00-6e06-4b75-985e-9073f009defd.Shadow: Exhaust a character you control. Until the end of the round, that character cannot ready.
36becc00-6e06-4b75-985e-9073f009defd.Text: When Revealed: Each player removes a character he controls from the quest and exhausts that character. Until the end of the round, characters cannot be readied by player card effects.

36dd0d2a-ba57-4ca0-b750-967c958e8bfb.Name: The Troll's Camp
36dd0d2a-ba57-4ca0-b750-967c958e8bfb.Text: While The Troll's Camp is the active location, each hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û +1 Ú.

36e1a766-7b31-4bb4-be01-4995a9f9c2f3.Name: Forest Clearing
36e1a766-7b31-4bb4-be01-4995a9f9c2f3.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
36e1a766-7b31-4bb4-be01-4995a9f9c2f3.Text: Forced: When Forest Clearing is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, add that enemy to the staging area.

36ed632c-33be-452c-97a5-17201a5cc381.Name: Hands of a Healer
36ed632c-33be-452c-97a5-17201a5cc381.Text:
Setup: Attach to a Healer hero.

Action: Exhaust attached hero and Hands of a Healer to heal up to 3 damage from a hero.

371e29be-17a9-4535-a9e0-bc13126522bb.Name: Heed the Dream
371e29be-17a9-4535-a9e0-bc13126522bb.Text: Action: Choose a player. That player searches the top 5 cards of his deck for a card, adds it to his hand, and shuffles his deck. Then, players as a group may spend 3 Ì resources to have that player search his deck for another card, add it to his hand, and shuffle his deck.

37488d87-8c07-4f13-b354-66bbdc9e5263.Keywords: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.
37488d87-8c07-4f13-b354-66bbdc9e5263.Name: Three Golden Hairs
37488d87-8c07-4f13-b354-66bbdc9e5263.Text: Action: Add Three Golden Hairs to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool, to lower each player’s threat by 3. Then, each player draws 3 cards.
