3748b1e3-625d-4752-831d-4d52b2366359.Name: Northern Chetwood
3748b1e3-625d-4752-831d-4d52b2366359.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 card at random from your hand for each point of damage dealt by this attack.
3748b1e3-625d-4752-831d-4d52b2366359.Text: Forced: After progress is placed on Northern Chetwood (and it is still in play), search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for Lost in the Wilderness, and reveal it.

377d8e17-1c0d-4871-86a5-a69b9dee40d2.Name: The Thieves' Ploy
377d8e17-1c0d-4871-86a5-a69b9dee40d2.Text: When Revealed: If Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero, choose an enemy engaged with that hero's controller, if able.  Attach Alcaron's Scroll to that enemy, then add 1 progress to that enemy.

3798030e-df23-45db-ab29-0ef8a2a35cd6.Name: Prison Guard
3798030e-df23-45db-ab29-0ef8a2a35cd6.Text: While you are engaged with Prison Guard, it gains: "Planning Action: Rescue a random card from underneath Prison Guard. Then, raise each player's threat by X, where X is that card's printed cost. (Limit once per round)."

37cd1ae2-e0fc-428b-9918-a4466f9a9d4c.Name: Forgotten CourtYard
37cd1ae2-e0fc-428b-9918-a4466f9a9d4c.Text:
Forgotten Courtyard gets +1 $ for each resource on it.
Forced: After an Undead enemy enters play, place 1 resource on Forgotten Courtyard.

37f205e5-5144-4987-8764-46909460797b.Name: Nowhere to Hide
37f205e5-5144-4987-8764-46909460797b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it was engaged this round).
37f205e5-5144-4987-8764-46909460797b.Text: When Revealed: The first player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded, and puts that enemy into play engaged with him.

381569ad-e2bf-4fb5-a045-a36b918deac4.Name: Raven Clan Elite
381569ad-e2bf-4fb5-a045-a36b918deac4.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 time counter from a location in play, or Raven Clan Elite makes an immediate attack against the first player.

381821e5-7bf6-44cd-91d7-e5a5e9ff8066.Keywords: Setup: The first player adds this card to his hand.
381821e5-7bf6-44cd-91d7-e5a5e9ff8066.Name: Ho! Tom Bombadil!
381821e5-7bf6-44cd-91d7-e5a5e9ff8066.Text: Response: Add this card to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool to cancel the "when revealed" effects of an encounter card just revealed from the encounter deck.

3820df8d-531b-4c37-815d-536f645bb289.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
3820df8d-531b-4c37-815d-536f645bb289.Name: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
3820df8d-531b-4c37-815d-536f645bb289.Text:
Assault: Progress cannot be placed on the quest stage by player card effects or by questing successfully. However, progress can still be placed on the active location as normal.
When the players quest unsuccessfully, each player does not raise his threat. Instead, the players must deal X damage to Minas Tirith. X is the amount by which the total threat in the staging area was greater than the total willpower of each character committed to the quest.

38421493-b5f5-4399-b543-b59f69bbb43a.Name: Under-gate Sentry
38421493-b5f5-4399-b543-b59f69bbb43a.Shadow: Either discard a random card from your hand, or exhaust a character you control.
38421493-b5f5-4399-b543-b59f69bbb43a.Text: Forced: After Under-gate Sentry attacks and destroys a character you control, discard a random card from your hand.

38853a8e-09c2-44f8-a76e-62aac1809d18.Name: Mines of Moria
38853a8e-09c2-44f8-a76e-62aac1809d18.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls (2 non-objective attachments instead if his threat is 35 or higher).
38853a8e-09c2-44f8-a76e-62aac1809d18.Text: While Mines of Moria is in the staging area, progress must be placed on Mines of Moria before it can be placed on the current quest.

389072e7-d59a-4a04-bed8-568cc367b06f.Name: Falling Branches
389072e7-d59a-4a04-bed8-568cc367b06f.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending characters is an ally).
389072e7-d59a-4a04-bed8-568cc367b06f.Text: When Revealed: Each player removes a character he controls from the quest and deals 2 damage to that character (3 damage instead if that character is an ally).

3892b2e4-358c-42af-b5be-2f54d252ea2a.Name: Leader of Men
3892b2e4-358c-42af-b5be-2f54d252ea2a.Text:
Setup: Attach to a Noble hero. 

Response: After attached hero quests successfully, exhaust Leader of Men to add 1 resource to attached hero’s pool.

38e03ed2-9492-4522-8ef1-014f0444b40e.Name: Wooded Glade
38e03ed2-9492-4522-8ef1-014f0444b40e.Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
38e03ed2-9492-4522-8ef1-014f0444b40e.Text: While WoodedGlade is the active location, treat each non-objective attachment's text box as if it were blank.

38ed7520-8749-47ab-b3b4-34ec96441475.Name: Elf-friend
38ed7520-8749-47ab-b3b4-34ec96441475.Text: Attached character gains the Noldor and Silvan traits.

3903cf5b-0ca8-4cd9-8943-490a7af601e5.Name: Prince of Dol Amroth
3903cf5b-0ca8-4cd9-8943-490a7af601e5.Text: Attach to Prince Imrahil.Prince Imrahil gains the Outlands trait.While you control Outlands allies that belong to 4 different spheres, add 1 additional resource to Prince Imrahil’s pool when you collect resources during the resource phase (if Prince Imrahil is a hero).

39262ffc-6819-422c-a72a-9baed00f648a.Keywords:
Mire 5.
Forced: When Stagnant Pools is discarded by the Mire keyword, raise each player’s threat by 5.
39262ffc-6819-422c-a72a-9baed00f648a.Name: Stagnant Pools
39262ffc-6819-422c-a72a-9baed00f648a.Text:
Stagnant Pools gets +1 $ for each mire token on it. 

Travel: Exhaust Smeagol to travel here.

39773513-ff69-4918-9323-6f04b7109b2f.Name: Ancient Foundation
39773513-ff69-4918-9323-6f04b7109b2f.Text:
Scour: Assign X damage among locations in play. X is the number of locations in play. This ability does not stack with other copies of Ancient Foundation.

Travel: Place 1 damage on this location to travel here.

39775f69-5cf4-4133-9cf4-45a1522aa9ea.Name: Galadhon Archer
39775f69-5cf4-4133-9cf4-45a1522aa9ea.Text: Response: After Galadhon Archer enters play, deal 1 damage to an enemy not engaged with you.

397ef92c-981b-4495-a2a0-681ea886d30c.Name: Lie Low
397ef92c-981b-4495-a2a0-681ea886d30c.Text:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed on Lie Low this round, each enemy gets –20 engagement cost until the end of the round.

Response: After this stage is defeated, choose an enemy in the staging area and shuffle it into the encounter deck.

39df5c92-f79e-4d39-b8a3-f93631e183db.Name: Full Sail Ahead!
39df5c92-f79e-4d39-b8a3-f93631e183db.Text:
If the players are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), the Stormcaller gets +2 $.
No more than 4 damage may be placed on the Stormcaller each round. 
Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of the encounter deck. the Stormcaller places progress on this stage equal to its $ plus the $ of the discarded card.

3a17475b-3238-4577-9fd5-83b67e2d0aa7.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
3a17475b-3238-4577-9fd5-83b67e2d0aa7.Name: Walls of Cair Andros
3a17475b-3238-4577-9fd5-83b67e2d0aa7.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û.  X is the amount of damage on the active location.
3a17475b-3238-4577-9fd5-83b67e2d0aa7.Text: If Walls of Cair Andros has 4 or more damage, discard it and each player must assign 4 damage among characters he controls.

3a8869dc-077e-4b8c-b3d5-474e4f9c14ba.Name: In Need of Rest
3a8869dc-077e-4b8c-b3d5-474e4f9c14ba.Text: When Revealed: Remove a hero from the quest and attach In Need of Rest to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Limit 1 per hero.  Forced:  After a time counter is removed from the current quest, attached hero takes 1 damage.')

3b05acf1-2c72-4e6c-9f59-a2bacde4820b.Name: Pursued by the Enemy
3b05acf1-2c72-4e6c-9f59-a2bacde4820b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
3b05acf1-2c72-4e6c-9f59-a2bacde4820b.Text: When Revealed: Each enemy engaged with a player, and not in the staging area, makes an immediate attack.

3b1df5e8-ce5e-4c66-a12b-25a322cfb0ba.Name: Blazing Grip
3b1df5e8-ce5e-4c66-a12b-25a322cfb0ba.Shadow: Shadow: Discard all cards attached to the defending character and deal it 1 damage. Cannot be canceled.

3b58bae1-8484-4be6-a75c-1d55c5199f72.Name: Mithlond Sea-watcher
3b58bae1-8484-4be6-a75c-1d55c5199f72.Text: While the top card of your discard pile is an ally, Mithlond Sea-watcher gets +2 Û and gains ranged.

3b63d940-fcbc-4741-8840-cc276fcb558b.Name: Come Back!
3b63d940-fcbc-4741-8840-cc276fcb558b.Shadow: Shadow: Either reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1, or this attack is considered undefended.
3b63d940-fcbc-4741-8840-cc276fcb558b.Text: When Revealed: Reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1 and remove all progress from the current quest.

3b736ea1-aaeb-4ad9-815c-d91488a82896.Name: Veteran Sword-elf
3b736ea1-aaeb-4ad9-815c-d91488a82896.Text: Veteran Sword-elf gains +1 Û and +1 Ú for each copy of Veteran Sword-elf in your discard pile.

3b803986-90bc-441c-aec0-932d661eb8eb.Name: Discord and Distrust
3b803986-90bc-441c-aec0-932d661eb8eb.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round defending character cannot ready.
3b803986-90bc-441c-aec0-932d661eb8eb.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, players cannot trigger Action or Response effects.

3ba15db9-9967-48b8-9b38-4fdfb4866676.Name: Distant Stars
3ba15db9-9967-48b8-9b38-4fdfb4866676.Text: Action: Exhaust a Ranger or Scout character to discard a non-unique active location. Then, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a non-unique location and make it the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.

3bc03452-6c37-45e2-9241-e626ea51f382.Name: The Forest's Malice
3bc03452-6c37-45e2-9241-e626ea51f382.Text: When Revealed: Each Huorn enemy engaged with a player makes an immediate attack.  If no attack was made as a result of this effect, each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Huorn enemy and put it into play engaged with him.  This effect cannot be canceled.

3bd3e9f2-6411-4ea3-9ff4-1ea1d51e202d.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
3bd3e9f2-6411-4ea3-9ff4-1ea1d51e202d.Name: Southron Mounted Archer
3bd3e9f2-6411-4ea3-9ff4-1ea1d51e202d.Text: Damage from each round's archery total may be assigned to Battleground locations, as well as characters

3c1bea1f-80b7-4857-9d0b-489376d4abab.Name: Book of Aulë's Children
3c1bea1f-80b7-4857-9d0b-489376d4abab.Text:
If unattached, the fist player claims Book of Aulë's Children and attaches it to a hero he controls.
Action: Exhaust Book of Aulë's Children to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

3c47d373-62bc-4321-9dc1-9b86b2046f68.Name: Mithrandir's Advice
3c47d373-62bc-4321-9dc1-9b86b2046f68.Text: Action: Draw 1 card for each hero you control with a printed Î resource icon.

3c53610e-0126-424f-a4cc-9e7710ebcffe.Name: Ancient Guardroom
3c53610e-0126-424f-a4cc-9e7710ebcffe.Text:
While Ancient Guardroom is the active location, each enemy in play gets –1 Û.

Travel: Discard the top card of the encounter deck to travel here. Each player raises his threat by X, where X is the discarded card's $.

3cd4bb66-1621-4534-aa25-421d0d8b7189.Name: Ford of Bruinen
3cd4bb66-1621-4534-aa25-421d0d8b7189.Text:
Response: After Ford of Bruinen leaves play as an explored location, all engaged enemies are discarded.

Travel: The first player must reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

3d09a998-9ad0-4b98-9c42-50c4226cc73b.Keywords: At the end of the round, discard Galadriel from play.
3d09a998-9ad0-4b98-9c42-50c4226cc73b.Name: Galadriel
3d09a998-9ad0-4b98-9c42-50c4226cc73b.Text: Response: After you play Galadriel from your hand, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an attachment of cost 3 or less and put it into play. Put the remaining cards back in any order.

3d19de02-b3a9-4612-a90a-30b37bd1e9b1.Name: Fen of Reeds
3d19de02-b3a9-4612-a90a-30b37bd1e9b1.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each time counter on the quest.
3d19de02-b3a9-4612-a90a-30b37bd1e9b1.Text: While Fen of Reeds is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After the players advance to a quest stage, each player must exhaust a character he controls.”

3d1a7e6f-382a-49cb-9873-e6e5e86d12d2.Name: Boar's Guardian
3d1a7e6f-382a-49cb-9873-e6e5e86d12d2.Text:
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from Boar’s Guardian, the engaged player must discard an ally he controls. Place 2
time counters on Boar’s Guardian.

3d25a41e-6a10-4fd7-a159-2b25bfc54454.Name: Ruins of the Second Age
3d25a41e-6a10-4fd7-a159-2b25bfc54454.Text:
While Ruins of the Second Age is in the staging area, City locations get +1 $.

While Ruins of the Second Age is the active location, deal engaged enemies 1 additional shadow card at the beginning of the combat phase.

3d3ced53-71af-46de-b7e7-1892a9c49747.Name: Rod of the Steward
3d3ced53-71af-46de-b7e7-1892a9c49747.Text: Action: Spend 2 resources from attached hero’s resource pool to draw 1 card.

3d64b8b8-4805-49d5-b308-4bf3fb472c1d.Name: Ettendales
3d64b8b8-4805-49d5-b308-4bf3fb472c1d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û. If this attack destroys a character, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.
3d64b8b8-4805-49d5-b308-4bf3fb472c1d.Text: Forced: When Ettendales is explored, shuffle the top card of the burden deck into the encounter deck.

3d7adc18-c9cb-4e93-8b1e-1574747ba8ce.Name: Concealed Spikes
3d7adc18-c9cb-4e93-8b1e-1574747ba8ce.Shadow: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control. X is the number of attachments you control. You may discard the highest cost attachment you control to cancel this effect.
3d7adc18-c9cb-4e93-8b1e-1574747ba8ce.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is 1 more than the Discover value on the active location.

3d948840-8118-4d63-b782-ba017e1cf5d5.Name: Darkened Tunnel
3d948840-8118-4d63-b782-ba017e1cf5d5.Text:
While Darkened Tunnel is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a 'when revealed' effect is canceled, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card has the Hazard trait, resolve its staging as if it was just revealed from the encounter deck."
Travel: Place 1 resource on Stalking the Ruins.

3d9db37c-4b51-4da8-be2b-25cd2d48e28b.Name: Towering Dunes
3d9db37c-4b51-4da8-be2b-25cd2d48e28b.Text: While Towering Dunes is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area not named Towering Dunes.Forced: After Towering Dunes becomes the active location, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

3dab12d3-6cf8-4d3c-9edc-df93db02eced.Name: Blocking Huorn
3dab12d3-6cf8-4d3c-9edc-df93db02eced.Shadow: Shadow: Put Blocking Huorn into play engaged with you.
3dab12d3-6cf8-4d3c-9edc-df93db02eced.Text: Cannot have attachments. While Blocking Huron is engaged with a player, it adds its Threat to the staging area.

3dd092db-4bb4-4f56-b3cd-447328ac97ac.Name: Paralyzing Fear
3dd092db-4bb4-4f56-b3cd-447328ac97ac.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero and exhaust that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: When attached hero would ready, it does not ready unless attached hero's controller discards a card from the top of his deck.")

3ddece75-2906-4456-8a5a-b20dce9b95dd.Name: Savage Werewolf
3ddece75-2906-4456-8a5a-b20dce9b95dd.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one
3ddece75-2906-4456-8a5a-b20dce9b95dd.Text: Forced: After Savage Werewolf attacks and destroys a character, remove 3 progress from the main quest.

3de80480-6316-4c43-824c-44d3ad424a7b.Name: Sahír’s Escort
3de80480-6316-4c43-824c-44d3ad424a7b.Text:
While Sahír's Escort is in the Stormcaller’s area, it contributes its $ to the amount of progress the Stormcaller places on its quest stage each round. 
When Revealed: Add Sahír’s Escort to the Stormcaller’s area, instead of the players’ staging area.

3dfaab4d-04b1-49a6-bd17-63c184784985.Name: Through the Marsh
3dfaab4d-04b1-49a6-bd17-63c184784985.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 2A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck. 

Each player cannot play more than 1 card each round.

Forced: When the players defeat this stage, advance to a random stage 3A.

3e055edf-4540-4cf1-94ce-afbf5fc28f82.Name: Gandalf
3e055edf-4540-4cf1-94ce-afbf5fc28f82.Text: Play with the top card of your deck faceup. Once per phase, you may play the top card of your deck as if it was in your hand. When playing a card this way, Gandalf is considered to have the printed Ì, Î, Ï, and Ê icons.

3e0b01f7-0870-4585-be26-4cd1860d3137.Name: Goblin Stalker
3e0b01f7-0870-4585-be26-4cd1860d3137.Text:
Forced: When Goblin Stalker attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card. 

Forced: When Goblin Stalker is dealt a shadow card with 'PASS' printed in its text box, it gets +2 Û until the end of the phase.

3e0e63ba-d11b-4c8a-aab6-047f19013ca7.Name: Morgul Road
3e0e63ba-d11b-4c8a-aab6-047f19013ca7.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
3e0e63ba-d11b-4c8a-aab6-047f19013ca7.Text: Response: After Morgul Road leaves play as an explored location, the first player may remove 1 progress token from To the Tower or deal 1 damage to an enemy in play.

3e1b7378-6be8-4e19-aacb-16cd61a90693.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
3e1b7378-6be8-4e19-aacb-16cd61a90693.Name: The Watcher in the Water
3e1b7378-6be8-4e19-aacb-16cd61a90693.Text:
You are playing in Nightmare mode. 

While Doors of Durin is in play, The Watcher cannot be engaged. 

Forced: When a Tentacle enemy is destroyed, deal 1 damage to The Watcher if it is in play. 

The players cannot win the game unless both Doors of Durin and The Watcher are in the victory display.

3e471bd0-5ee5-4846-815d-fd6a5cd5f921.Keywords: It is Night. Progress cannot be placed on quest cards. Encounter card effects cannot be canceled.
3e471bd0-5ee5-4846-815d-fd6a5cd5f921.Name: Daybreak
3e471bd0-5ee5-4846-815d-fd6a5cd5f921.Text:
Forced: When it becomes Night, reveal an encounter card.

Forced: At the end of the round, flip this objective.

3e8eaee9-6fdb-4207-864f-151f0f98807b.Name: Dwindling Supplies
3e8eaee9-6fdb-4207-864f-151f0f98807b.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -2 Ú for this attack.
3e8eaee9-6fdb-4207-864f-151f0f98807b.Text: When Revealed: Each player must randomly discard cards from his hand until he has no more than 3 cards in his hand. If no cards were discarded by this effect, Dwindling Supplies gains doomed 2.

3e905158-737c-45c4-a32d-e88061e94564.Name: A Miserable Journey
3e905158-737c-45c4-a32d-e88061e94564.Text: Reveal 1 additional encounter card during the quest phase unless there is an active location with the safe keyword.

3e99373a-ce10-4907-acd5-5a4b8dce425c.Name: The Gates of Moria
3e99373a-ce10-4907-acd5-5a4b8dce425c.Text:
There can be 2 active locations. During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able.
Forced: After an enemy engages a player, place 1 damage on each active location.

If Doors of Durin is explored, the players win the game.

3eb1141f-bf1f-401e-a69d-e4df0af2a8ab.Name: Ered Nimrais Prospector
3eb1141f-bf1f-401e-a69d-e4df0af2a8ab.Text: Response: After Ered Nimrais Prospector enters play, discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, choose and shuffle 1 card from your discard pile back into your deck.

3ef4f724-8f91-42d3-9ba2-5d731283c069.Name: Nazgûl of Minas Morgul
3ef4f724-8f91-42d3-9ba2-5d731283c069.Text:
Nazgûl of Minas Morgul cannot have attachments.

Reduce any amount of damage dealt to Nazgûl of Minas Morgul to 1.

3ef57050-0209-46de-8815-0c4d52b1aaf7.Name: Chaos in the Night
3ef57050-0209-46de-8815-0c4d52b1aaf7.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the main quest.
3ef57050-0209-46de-8815-0c4d52b1aaf7.Text: When Revealed: The first player must choose: either raise each player’s threat by 3, or progress cannot be placed on quest cards until the end of the round.

3f0b92d5-18d9-4a85-8efb-ce6e64172674.Name: Shivering River
3f0b92d5-18d9-4a85-8efb-ce6e64172674.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if there is more than one player at this staging area.)
3f0b92d5-18d9-4a85-8efb-ce6e64172674.Text: While Shivering River is in the staging area, it contributes its $ to the total $ in each other player's staging area.

3f24ad57-1c50-47dc-a117-5aee279b8451.Name: Song of Sleep
3f24ad57-1c50-47dc-a117-5aee279b8451.Text: When Revealed: Remove a questing hero you control from the quest and attach Song of Sleep to that hero. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Treat attached hero's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits). Attached hero cannot ready."

3f482b9c-aa18-415e-ab9b-58f9c3b328a1.Name: Damrod
3f482b9c-aa18-415e-ab9b-58f9c3b328a1.Text:
Reduce the cost of the first Trap card you play each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

Response: After a Trap card you control is attached to an enemy, draw 1 card.

3f78ed57-49cc-4886-b84f-3fe886203794.Name: Hidden Path
3f78ed57-49cc-4886-b84f-3fe886203794.Text:
While Hidden Path is the active location, locations in the staging area get -1 $.

Travel: Spend 2 Í resources to travel here.

3f8e889e-db35-4044-ac19-43fd146bffd1.Name: The Islet
3f8e889e-db35-4044-ac19-43fd146bffd1.Text: While The Islet is the active location, each Dunland enemy in play gets +1 $

3fa0b17f-a7d1-4f0c-a779-c20cb6084e78.Keywords: Attach to a Ranger character. Restricted.
3fa0b17f-a7d1-4f0c-a779-c20cb6084e78.Name: Ranger Bow
3fa0b17f-a7d1-4f0c-a779-c20cb6084e78.Text: Action: Exhaust Ranger Bow and attached character to deal 1 damage to an enemy in the staging area.

40046ed1-70c5-4a0e-914a-0a897f6cd644.Name: Quest phase - staging
40046ed1-70c5-4a0e-914a-0a897f6cd644.Text: Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck

4008f69c-fda2-4fe4-a8bd-373d38203c87.Name: Haunted Pillars
4008f69c-fda2-4fe4-a8bd-373d38203c87.Text:
When faced with the option to travek, players must travel to Haunted Pillars, if able.
When Revealed: Either return the active location to the staging area, or Haunted Pillars gains surge.

40299169-8b0f-4462-ae58-03db71c0970f.Name: Vengeful Hillman
40299169-8b0f-4462-ae58-03db71c0970f.Text: Forced: After Vengeful Hillman attacks and destroys a character, remove 1 progress the current quest card for each card in the defending player's hand.

408148e1-3391-4734-aeac-3e3a7b69c1c1.Name: Daughter of Berúthiel
408148e1-3391-4734-aeac-3e3a7b69c1c1.Text:
Daughter of Berúthiel cannot be optionally engaged.

Forced: After Daughter of Berúthiel attacks, return her to the staging area. The engaged player may raise his threat by 4 to prevent this effect.

40886c6a-0960-443b-8562-05b8fec9d34a.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
40886c6a-0960-443b-8562-05b8fec9d34a.Name: Death and Decay
40886c6a-0960-443b-8562-05b8fec9d34a.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of each player's deck. Each player discards each attachment he controls that has the same title as a card in his discard pile. If no attachments are discarded from play by this effect, Death and Decay gains surge.

40956aef-c093-489d-b74a-24502705c6bb.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
40956aef-c093-489d-b74a-24502705c6bb.Name: Gundabad Elite
40956aef-c093-489d-b74a-24502705c6bb.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, if Gundabad Elite is in the staging area, either remove 2 progress from the current quest, or Gundabad Elite makes an attack against the first player.

409bc89e-b5af-4626-ade6-60bcfcb290b7.Name: The Marish
409bc89e-b5af-4626-ade6-60bcfcb290b7.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending player failed a Hide test this round).
409bc89e-b5af-4626-ade6-60bcfcb290b7.Text: Forced: After a player fails a Hide test, shuffle a Nazgul enemy from the discard pile into the encounter deck, if able.

40bcc7a9-044e-44b6-83d2-6e09294c19c3.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
40bcc7a9-044e-44b6-83d2-6e09294c19c3.Name: Green-Hill Country
40bcc7a9-044e-44b6-83d2-6e09294c19c3.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player then makes an immediate attack.
40bcc7a9-044e-44b6-83d2-6e09294c19c3.Text:
While Green-Hill Country is in the staging area, add 1 to each Hide X value.
Travel: The first player makes a Hide 1 test.

40c7a675-d48f-4e71-8818-5f0ffb9fa0dd.Name: A Shortcut to Mushrooms
40c7a675-d48f-4e71-8818-5f0ffb9fa0dd.Text:
When Revealed: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Black Rider, reveals it (cannot be cancelled), and adds it to the staging area.  Shuffle the encounter deck.

When a player makes a Hide test, add 1 to the total $ for each ally that player controls.

When a player fails a Hide test, each Nazgul enemy in the staging area engages that player. (Trigger Forced effects after resolving this effect.)

40c95b3d-6216-4def-bb93-f44871f3ec70.Name: Weight of the Ring
40c95b3d-6216-4def-bb93-f44871f3ec70.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the Ring-bearer. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the beginning of each quest phase, either exhaust The One Ring or reveal an additional encounter card this phase.")

40efacf7-f3c1-434b-b31f-42b3721c90c0.Name: Fornost Bowman
40efacf7-f3c1-434b-b31f-42b3721c90c0.Text: Fornost Bowman gets +1 Û for each enemy engaged with you.

4101f975-3317-43f8-ba60-19785e01959c.Keywords: Play only if you control ☺ Aragorn.
4101f975-3317-43f8-ba60-19785e01959c.Name: The Three Hunters
4101f975-3317-43f8-ba60-19785e01959c.Text: Quest Action: Choose 3 heroes committed to the quest. Ready those heroes. Until the end of the round, each of the chosen heroes gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.

4124136c-8c86-4f86-830c-94c8c76df161.Name: Sam Gamgee
4124136c-8c86-4f86-830c-94c8c76df161.Text: Response: After you engage an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat, ready Sam Gamgee.  He gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

414353af-e004-4e7c-b288-e168e2acfee7.Name: Stop the Executioners!
414353af-e004-4e7c-b288-e168e2acfee7.Text: Time 4. Forced: When the last time counter is removed from this quest, discard its captured cards and remove this quest from the game. Then, raise each player’s threat by 3 for each of his characters that was discarded by this effect.

414a8370-1c4d-4e95-b33d-3b6f59db315c.Name: Wicked Huorn
414a8370-1c4d-4e95-b33d-3b6f59db315c.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy cannot take damage until the end of the round.
414a8370-1c4d-4e95-b33d-3b6f59db315c.Text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: At the beginning of each resource phase, the engaged player exhausts a hero he controls.

415e5671-e9fa-458e-bc46-e9f869bee87f.Name: Lurker of the Depths
415e5671-e9fa-458e-bc46-e9f869bee87f.Text:
Lurker of the Depths cannot be engaged or take more than 4 damage each round.

While Lurker of the Depths is in the staging area, it is considered to be engaged with each player.

418e1e02-52fe-4aef-b543-3875837dd38a.Name: Impenetrable Fog
418e1e02-52fe-4aef-b543-3875837dd38a.Text: When Revealed: The first player places 3 progress tokens on To the Tower or reveals X additional cards from the encounter deck and adds them to the staging area. X is the number of players in the game.

418e6de7-af19-4ea7-bfbe-2a02838c6de4.Name: Dagger of Westernesse
418e6de7-af19-4ea7-bfbe-2a02838c6de4.Text: Attached hero gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if attacking an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat).

41b47c87-94c4-47ff-b8c6-3f25dba0ca49.Name: Eriador Wastes
41b47c87-94c4-47ff-b8c6-3f25dba0ca49.Text:
While Eriador Wastes is in the staging area, no more than 5 progress can be placed on the current quest each round.

Travel: The first player engages a Warg enemy in the staging area and deals it a shadow card.

41b56fc4-6ecd-4c9a-80d4-3074c267e823.Keywords: Attach to a Ê hero. Restricted.
41b56fc4-6ecd-4c9a-80d4-3074c267e823.Name: Silver Harp
41b56fc4-6ecd-4c9a-80d4-3074c267e823.Text: Response: After a card is discarded from your hand, exhaust Silver Harp to return that card to your hand.

41c3779a-a28a-44db-8b9b-bc5e81d1111a.Name: Garden of Poisons
41c3779a-a28a-44db-8b9b-bc5e81d1111a.Text:
Heroes cannot gain resources from card effects.

Travel: Each player must pay 1 resource to travel here.

41cf7fb0-1194-4654-b23a-0b49259faf63.Name: The Dark Fire
41cf7fb0-1194-4654-b23a-0b49259faf63.Shadow: Shadow: For each point of damage dealt by this attack, heal 1 damage from Durin's Bane.

4233fe0f-ba63-4947-8c3c-f732ab09c472.Name: Blocked Passage
4233fe0f-ba63-4947-8c3c-f732ab09c472.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
4233fe0f-ba63-4947-8c3c-f732ab09c472.Text: While On Track is in play, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

424d4f29-d7c6-465f-9742-adb51177affc.Name: Erebor Bats
424d4f29-d7c6-465f-9742-adb51177affc.Text:
Forced: When Erebor Bats attacks, the defending player discards 1 random card from his hand.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 2 cards from his hand that match the revealed card's cost and type.

42621898-ffe0-435a-a0c2-34ed4383eadb.Name: “Seize them!”
42621898-ffe0-435a-a0c2-34ed4383eadb.Text: Forced: After an enemy attacks and destroys a character, remove X progress from the main quest. X is the attacking enemy’s $.At the end of the the round, if the main quest has been in play the entire round and there are no progress tokens on it, the players lose the game.

428256aa-e03e-4f57-9b38-b8f7b5f17578.Keywords: Attach to an Istari character. Limit 1 per character.
428256aa-e03e-4f57-9b38-b8f7b5f17578.Name: Wizard Pipe
428256aa-e03e-4f57-9b38-b8f7b5f17578.Text: Action: Exhaust Wizard Pipe to exchange a card in your hand with the top card of your deck.

4297aa1e-8d53-4bd4-a750-ae5490fbb82b.Name: Searching the Caves
4297aa1e-8d53-4bd4-a750-ae5490fbb82b.Text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until X locations are discarded, where X is the number of players. Add each location discarded by this effect to the staging area.

42d80e7e-8217-48a2-a386-c18b6bff1bf1.Name: Chill of the Roots
42d80e7e-8217-48a2-a386-c18b6bff1bf1.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Nameless, attach the top card of the defending player's deck to it.
42d80e7e-8217-48a2-a386-c18b6bff1bf1.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either discard his hand, or raise his threat by the number of cards in his hand. If no cards were discarded by this effect, Chill of the Roots gains surge.

42e22482-0281-4811-aa65-2b342319ee07.Name: We Hates Them
42e22482-0281-4811-aa65-2b342319ee07.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if the attacking enemy is Gollum).
42e22482-0281-4811-aa65-2b342319ee07.Text: When Revealed: Either flip Smeagol to Gollum, or Gollum makes an immediate attack. The first player may spend 1 ☺ resource and exhaust The One Ring to cancel this effect.

432c306a-7a68-45f9-8621-d7ea2126ae0b.Name: Dark Halls
432c306a-7a68-45f9-8621-d7ea2126ae0b.Shadow: Shadow: If there is a copy of the defending character in your discard pile, reanimate it and deal it 1 shadow card.
432c306a-7a68-45f9-8621-d7ea2126ae0b.Text: While Dark Halls is in the staging area, each Reanimated Dead gets +1 Û and +1 Ú.

43375421-21f6-4e77-855c-0d29d145c803.Name: Banks of Morgulduin
43375421-21f6-4e77-855c-0d29d145c803.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Captain, deal it 3 additional shadow cards for this attack.
43375421-21f6-4e77-855c-0d29d145c803.Text: Forced: When Banks of Morgulduin is explored, deal it facedown as a shadow card to a Captain enemy.

434cf78e-2e8e-4d79-9662-eb50e33bc3f9.Name: Sea-ward Tower
434cf78e-2e8e-4d79-9662-eb50e33bc3f9.Text: If Sea-ward Tower is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. While the players control Sea-ward Tower, look at 2 additional cards from the top of the encounter deck during each Sailing test.

43509bf0-3250-420f-b743-e56c3ad5cd90.Name: Howling at Night
43509bf0-3250-420f-b743-e56c3ad5cd90.Text:
Forced: When it becomes Day, each player draws 1 card.

Forced: When it becomes Night, discard 1 non-objective ally from play (discard 2 non-objective allies instead if there are 3 or more players in the game).

4355352b-307e-407b-98f9-3d4fb2a14a49.Name: The Burglar's Turn
4355352b-307e-407b-98f9-3d4fb2a14a49.Text:
Forced: After questing successfully, place 1 progress on Smaug the Golden. Then, the first player makes a burgle attempt. If successful, the first player takes the top treasure card from under The Lonely Mountain into his hand. Then, the players may advance to stage 3.

Forced: After the first player makes an unsuccessful burgle attempt, Smaug the Golden attacks the first player.

435e12a1-d479-42f6-a40d-8067615ec9e1.Name: Desolation of Smaug
435e12a1-d479-42f6-a40d-8067615ec9e1.Text:
While Desolation of Smaug is the active location, the first treachery card revealed each round gains surge.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 2 cards from his hand that match the revealed card's cost.

43622914-dd7f-4990-89d3-7f1ce7a6525f.Name: Firyal
43622914-dd7f-4990-89d3-7f1ce7a6525f.Text: Response: After Firyal commits to the quest, look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may discard the looked at card.

4362ef23-0ade-4eea-974b-2959803f8528.Name: Ill Tidings
4362ef23-0ade-4eea-974b-2959803f8528.Text: When Revealed: The first player draws this card into his hand.  Ill tidings cannot leave that player's hand. Then, if the first player has 5 or more cards in his hand, Ill Tidings gains surge.

43bb02ff-9fcc-47e8-822c-ffcd620c9fc4.Name: Whisperer
43bb02ff-9fcc-47e8-822c-ffcd620c9fc4.Text:
Dusk. Whisperer gets +1 $.

Midnight. Whisperer gets +2 $ and gains doomed 2.

43db612f-6c3c-4a3c-a4ba-816a85f47d16.Name: Slopes of Amon Hen
43db612f-6c3c-4a3c-a4ba-816a85f47d16.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy).
43db612f-6c3c-4a3c-a4ba-816a85f47d16.Text: Travel: A player at this staging area must engage an enemy in any staging area to travel here.

441a78e5-078f-433d-b092-5d94d1101aa1.Name: Sunken Ruins
441a78e5-078f-433d-b092-5d94d1101aa1.Text: When Revealed: Each Uncharted location in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. If the active location has the Ruins trait, discard 1 resource from each hero and objective ally in play.

4422e6ce-b272-4a2d-bd05-bf3f41063ea6.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
4422e6ce-b272-4a2d-bd05-bf3f41063ea6.Name: A Shadow of the Past
4422e6ce-b272-4a2d-bd05-bf3f41063ea6.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Forced: When stage 3A is revealed, if Khamul the Easerling is not in play, the first player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for Khamul the Easterling and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

447061f6-3399-4309-9885-1045f115820f.Name: Setting Out
447061f6-3399-4309-9885-1045f115820f.Text:
Uruk Chieftain cannot leave the Orc’s area.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Place X progress on this stage, where X is the discarded card’s $ plus the total $ in the Orc’s area.

447dd08d-693c-407f-8155-87164f212351.Name: Gate Key
447dd08d-693c-407f-8155-87164f212351.Text:
If unattached, return Gate Key to the staging area and it gains: “Action: Exhaust a hero to claim Gate Key and attach it to that hero.”
Action: Exhaust Gate Key and attached hero and spend 3 resources from attached hero’s resource pool to look at the facedown side of a Temple of the Deceived.

4489214b-775c-4e63-b8ec-c504526e478f.Name: Swift Departure
4489214b-775c-4e63-b8ec-c504526e478f.Text: Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), move 2 progress from Swift Departure to the Stormcaller's quest stage.

44b36766-fbb5-464d-bf9c-6a9cb9f48fad.Keywords: Play Entangling Nets into the staging area unattached.
44b36766-fbb5-464d-bf9c-6a9cb9f48fad.Name: Entangling Nets
44b36766-fbb5-464d-bf9c-6a9cb9f48fad.Text:
If unattached, attach Entangling Nets to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
Attached enemy gets –2 Û and –2 Ú.

44c49a79-6396-494c-a311-bf1b25263acb.Name: Cornered
44c49a79-6396-494c-a311-bf1b25263acb.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if the defending player's threat is 20 or less).
44c49a79-6396-494c-a311-bf1b25263acb.Text: When Revealed: The first player either removes 1 time counter from the current quest or each enemy gets -20 engagement cost and +1 Û until the end of the round.

44ca3879-246e-43c7-aa97-798be8dd193f.Name: Lieutenant of Orthanc
44ca3879-246e-43c7-aa97-798be8dd193f.Text: Forced: After Lieutenant of Orthanc attacks and destroys a character, that character’s controller discards 1 random card from his hand.

44d3c25c-e3ef-4ff0-a16a-8a75937bfffe.Name: Flee the City
44d3c25c-e3ef-4ff0-a16a-8a75937bfffe.Text: This stage cannot have more than 15 progress tokens on it.Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if any player is not engaged with an enemy, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded and add it to the staging area.While at least 1 player is engaged with an enemy, the players cannot defeat this stage. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

4530258b-c362-4efe-a0c0-92a4f74c75b3.Name: Strange Weariness
4530258b-c362-4efe-a0c0-92a4f74c75b3.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
4530258b-c362-4efe-a0c0-92a4f74c75b3.Text: When Revealed: Each character committed to the quest gets –1 Ò until the end of the round.

456329e9-c7c4-42ac-9edd-e769aea198ea.Name: Haradrim Soldier
456329e9-c7c4-42ac-9edd-e769aea198ea.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
456329e9-c7c4-42ac-9edd-e769aea198ea.Text: Forced: After Haradrim Soldier engages you, it makes an immediate attack.

4576db5c-fdc2-45f2-ac8b-d1edb8150678.Name: The Cape of Andrast
4576db5c-fdc2-45f2-ac8b-d1edb8150678.Text:
Forced: After a Weather treachery is revealed, deal 1 damage to each Ship objective and Ship enemy at this stage. 

If you defeat this stage, you have caught up to the Stormcaller and win the game.

458b755e-1d93-4586-bbca-bab905f895c0.Name: The Storm Comes
458b755e-1d93-4586-bbca-bab905f895c0.Text:
Limit 1 copy of The Storm Comes in the victory display.
While this quest is in the victory display, the first ally played by each player each round does not require a resource match.

45c91742-29a2-4409-a7e5-1f6234d73908.Name: Search for an Exit
45c91742-29a2-4409-a7e5-1f6234d73908.Text:
When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each questing character.
Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

45f8c9d9-4911-484b-b203-a55a32977af5.Name: Host of Isengard
45f8c9d9-4911-484b-b203-a55a32977af5.Text:
Cannot have attachments.
While Host of Isengard is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 progress on the current quest (bypassing any active location)."

460a1e18-8a57-44a5-bd06-f0c1b13c86b5.Name: The Trials Begin
460a1e18-8a57-44a5-bd06-f0c1b13c86b5.Text: When Revealed: The players advance to a stage 2A quest of their choice.

46ac76d7-4215-4840-a029-c4aceb051b94.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
46ac76d7-4215-4840-a029-c4aceb051b94.Name: The Battle of Five Armies
46ac76d7-4215-4840-a029-c4aceb051b94.Text:
You are playing Nightmare Mode.

While the players are at stage 5B, this card gains: "Forced: When the players are instruced to remove any amount of progress from a quest stage, place 1 progress here instead."

If there are X progress tokens here, the players lose the game. X depends on the number of players in the game:
1 player: X equals 5
2 players: X equals 7
3 players: X equals 9
4 players: X equals 11

46affe37-a561-4c15-bc0e-7c36d78ba056.Name: Deadmen's Gate
46affe37-a561-4c15-bc0e-7c36d78ba056.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
46affe37-a561-4c15-bc0e-7c36d78ba056.Text: While Deadmen’s Gate is the active location, it gains: “Forced: After a player triggers an ‘Action’ or ‘Response’ effect, he must discard the top card of his deck.”

46c7bfd7-96b7-4fe4-a110-3464ba6c0023.Name: Sleepless Malice
46c7bfd7-96b7-4fe4-a110-3464ba6c0023.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
46c7bfd7-96b7-4fe4-a110-3464ba6c0023.Text: When Revealed: Each player must discard 3 random cards from his hand or place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

46e10da4-a188-4502-b53f-6644495a1319.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
46e10da4-a188-4502-b53f-6644495a1319.Name: Haunted Path
46e10da4-a188-4502-b53f-6644495a1319.Shadow: Shadow: Either raise your threat by 2, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
46e10da4-a188-4502-b53f-6644495a1319.Text: Haunted Path gets +1 $ for each player with threat 35 or higher. Travel: Raise each player’s threat by 1 to travel here.

47360b1a-2428-4795-aec5-30f0a8805d76.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
47360b1a-2428-4795-aec5-30f0a8805d76.Name: Minas Tirith
47360b1a-2428-4795-aec5-30f0a8805d76.Text: Gondor. City Minas Tirith has 30 hit points plus 10 for each player. Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to Minas Tirith for each enemy in the staging area. Then, if Minas Tirith has no hit points remaining, the players lose the game.

474616b8-11f2-44fe-bad3-a9d3e2bdd208.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
474616b8-11f2-44fe-bad3-a9d3e2bdd208.Name: Whispers in the Dark
474616b8-11f2-44fe-bad3-a9d3e2bdd208.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if undefended).
474616b8-11f2-44fe-bad3-a9d3e2bdd208.Text: When Revealed: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or each character you control gets -1 Ò, -1 Û, and -1 Ú until the end of the round.

475d185f-403f-4b3e-9e8b-6b9f539c2423.Name: Fair and Perilous
475d185f-403f-4b3e-9e8b-6b9f539c2423.Text: Action: Choose a Noldor or Silvan character. Until the end of the phase, add that character’s Ò to its Û.

4765cbea-5ae8-4e39-a811-a67f1f6ca2a0.Name: Power In Their Terror
4765cbea-5ae8-4e39-a811-a67f1f6ca2a0.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
4765cbea-5ae8-4e39-a811-a67f1f6ca2a0.Text: When Revealed: Each ally gets -1 Ò until the end of the round. Deal 2 damage to each ally with 0 Ò.

47750277-6869-470c-9376-7eb7f0a706f5.Name: Lanwyn
47750277-6869-470c-9376-7eb7f0a706f5.Text: Response: After an encounter card with surge is revealed, either ready Lanwyn or give her +2 Ò until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)

478bc3aa-c148-4f20-8b4b-6b2a477a64b6.Name: Desperate Defense
478bc3aa-c148-4f20-8b4b-6b2a477a64b6.Text: Response: After a sentinel character is declared as a defender, it gets +2 Ú for this attack. If this attack deals no damage, ready the defending character.

47afd15f-ffe3-4a90-9128-f2a79ba3b070.Name: Corsair Skiff
47afd15f-ffe3-4a90-9128-f2a79ba3b070.Text: Forced: When Corsair Skiff engages you from the staging area, either raise your threat by 3 or it gains Boarding 1.

47b1cd0f-5d56-483c-956c-7851eb4b0a9a.Name: Southron Champion
47b1cd0f-5d56-483c-956c-7851eb4b0a9a.Text:
When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a Harad enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the staging area and place a resource token on it. That enemy is “the Champion.” While this stage is in play, the Champion gets +2 $, +2 Û, +2 Ú and gains: “Immune to player card effects. The main quest stage cannot be defeated while the Champion is in play.”
The champion cannot take damage unless there are at least 4 progress tokens here. This stage cannot be defeated while the champion is in play.

47c0a2e6-0b38-4142-9891-fcb3b3e0bbd8.Name: The Living Forest
47c0a2e6-0b38-4142-9891-fcb3b3e0bbd8.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, remove all progress from each location in play.

Forced: After placing progress as the result of questing successfully, if there are X or more total victory points on locations in the victory display, advance to stage 3A. Otherwise, advance to a different random stage 2A. X is the number of players in the game times 5.

47f627da-150c-41b2-9442-390d8d2a897a.Name: The Antlered Crown
47f627da-150c-41b2-9442-390d8d2a897a.Text:
Each Guardian enemy engages the player who controls the Key objective with a Trait shared by that enemy.

Players cannot defeat this stage unless Hallowed Circle is in the victory display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9001.Name: Alcaron's Scroll
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9001.Text:
If unattached, return Alcaron's Scroll to the staging area and it gains: "Action: Exhaust a hero to attach Alcaron's Scroll to that hero."

Forced: When the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached is damaged by an enemy attack, attach Alcaron's Scroll to that enemy.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9002.Name: A Watchful Peace
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9002.Text: Response: After a location leaves play as an explored location, return it to the top of the encounter deck.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9003.Name: Battering Ram
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9003.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to The Approach if it is in play. Otherwise, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9003.Text: When Revealed: If the active location is a Battleground, deal 3 damage to it.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9004.Name: Behind Strong Walls
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9004.Text: Action: Ready a defending Gondor character. That character gets +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9005.Name: Beregond
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9005.Text: Lower the cost to play Weapon and Armor attachments on Beregond by 2.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9006.Name: Blocking Wargs
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9006.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9006.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character committed to the quest.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9007.Keywords: Attach to a Gondor or Dunedain hero.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9007.Name: Blood of Númenor
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9007.Text: Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to give attached hero +1 Ú for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9008.Name: Boromir
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9008.Text: While Boromir has at least 1 resource in his resource pool, Gondor allies get +1 Û.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9009.Name: Celador
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9009.Text:
While Celador is in the staging area, he is committed to the current quest.

Forced: After players quest unsuccessfully or a character leaves play, deal 1 damage to Celador.

If Celador leaves play, remove him from the game.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9010.Name: Citadel Custodian
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9010.Text: Lower the cost to play Citadel Custodian by 1 for each Gondor ally in play.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9011.Name: City Street
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9011.Text: While City Street is in the staging area, players cannot travel to a location that does not have the title City Street.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9012.Name: Collateral Damage
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9012.Shadow: Shadow: Any damage dealt by this attack is dealt to the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached, if able.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9012.Text: When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the top of the encounter deck. Discard an additional 2 cards for each copy of Collateral Damage in the discard pile. Then, raise each player's threat by 2 for each location discarded by this effect.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9013.Name: Damrod
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9013.Text: Action: Discard Damrod from play to lower your threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9015.Name: Envoy of Pelargir
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9015.Text: Response: After Envoy of Pelargir enters play, add 1 resource to a Gondor or Noble hero's resource pool.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9016.Name: Errand-rider
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9016.Text: Action: Exhaust Errand-rider to move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another hero's resource pool.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9017.Name: Forest Bat
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9017.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by X where X is the attacking enemy's $.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9017.Text: When Revealed: The first player deals 2 damage to a questing hero and removes that hero from the quest.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9018.Name: Haradrim Elite
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9018.Shadow: Shadow: This enemy attacks again after this attack resolves. (Deal a new shadow card for that attack.)
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9018.Text: Forced: When Haradrim Elite enters play, it makes an immediate attack from the staging area against the first player.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9019.Name: Harbor Storehouse
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9019.Shadow: Shadow: Deal attacking enemy an additional shadow card for each Thug enemy in play.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9019.Text: Forced: Each time a location is discarded from the top of the encounter deck, raise each player's threat by 1.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9020.Name: Harbor Thug
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9020.Shadow: Shadow: Any damage dealt by this attack is dealt to the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached, if able.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9020.Text: Forced: When the player whose hero has Alcaron's Scroll attached raises his threat, Harbor Thug engages that player.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9021.Name: The Leaping Fish
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9021.Text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck for a copy of Harbor Thug and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9023.Name: Fighting in the Streets
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9023.Text:
The players cannot advance to the next stage unless Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero.

When Revealed: Attach Alcaron's Scroll to the highest engagement cost enemy in play, if able. Otherwise, add Alcaron's Scroll to the staging area.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9025.Name: Escape to the Quays
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9025.Text:
Enemies cannot be optionally engaged.

Forced: The first enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round makes an immediate attack against the player who controls Alcaron's Scroll from the staging area.

The players cannot defeat this stage unless Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9027.Name: Ambush in Ithilien
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9027.Text: If the players complete this stage with Celador in the staging area, advance to stage 3A (bypassing stage 2).

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9029.Name: Southron Counter-attack
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9029.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.

After this stage is completed, advance to stage 4A (bypassing stage 3).

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9031.Name: The Hidden Way
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9031.Text:
When Revealed: The first player takes control of all Ranger objectives in the staging area.

Enemies do not make engagement checks and cannot be optionally engaged.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9033.Name: Approaching Cair Andros
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9033.Text:
If any player's threat is 37 or higher, Approaching Cair Andros gains siege.

Forced: At the end of each round, raise each player's threat by 2.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9035.Name: The Defense
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9035.Text: Players must deal damage from undefended attacks to the lowest $ Battleground location in play. If there are no Battleground locations in play, immediately advance to the next stage.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9037.Name: Reinforcing the Banks
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9037.Text: Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area during the staging step each round.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9039.Name: Breakthrough at the Approach
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9039.Text: Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, instead of raising threat, each player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9041.Name: Breakthrough at the Citadel
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9041.Text: Breakthrough at the Citadel adds 5 $ to the staging area.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9043.Name: The Last Battle
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9043.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

If the players have collected 4 or more victory points, The Last Battle gains battle and loses siege.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9045.Name: Hunter of Lamedon
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9045.Text: Response: After you play Hunter of Lamedon from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Outlands card, add it to your hand. Otherwise, discard it.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9046.Name: Ithilien Guardian
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9046.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9046.Text:
While Ithilien Guardian is in the staging area, he is committed to the current quest.

When Revealed: Add Ithilien Guardian to the staging area and Ithilien Guardian gains surge.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9047.Name: Ithilien Road
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9047.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9047.Text: While Ithilien Road is the active location, the engagement cost of each enemy in the staging area is 0.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9048.Name: Ithilien Tracker
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9048.Text: Action: Exhaust Ithilien Tracker to lower the $ of the next enemy added to the staging area to 0 until the end of the phase.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9049.Name: Lieutenant of Mordor
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9049.Text:
Allies cannot defend against Lieutenant of Mordor.

When Revealed: Resolve the "when revealed" effect on the topmost treachery card in the encounter discard pile, if able. This effect cannot be canceled.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9050.Name: Light the Beacons
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9050.Text: Action: All characters get +2 Ú and do not exhaust to defend until the end of the round.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9051.Name: Local Trouble
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9051.Text: When Revealed: Attach this card to the hero with the highest threat cost without a copy of Local Trouble attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "When attached hero exhausts, readies, or triggers an ability, raise its controller's threat by 1.")

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9052.Name: Lossarnach Bandit
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9052.Text: Forced: When Lossarnach Bandit engages a player, that player discards 1 resource from each of his heroes' resource pools. (2 resources instead if Lossarnach Bandit was not optionally engaged.)

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9053.Name: Lost Companion
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9053.Text: When Revealed: Each player removes 1 character he controls from the quest, if able. Then, if any player has no characters committed to the quest, remove all characters from the quest.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9054.Name: Lost in the City
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9054.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards his hand.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9054.Text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 City location and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck. This effect cannot be canceled.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9055.Name: Lurking in Shadows
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9055.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9055.Text: When Revealed: Return all Brigand enemies engaged with players to the staging area. If this effect returned no Brigand enemies to the staging area, Lurking in Shadows gains surge.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9056.Name: Market Square
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9056.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards all resources in his heroes' resource pools.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9056.Text: Travel: Each player must spend 1 resource from one of his heroes' resource pools to travel here.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9057.Name: Master of Lore
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9057.Text: Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play the next Î card of that type by 1 until the end of the phase (to a minimum of 1).

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9058.Name: Morgul Spider
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9058.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, Morgul Spider gets +1 Û for each character not currently committed to a quest.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9059.Name: Mumak
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9059.Text:
No attachments can be attached to Mumak.

Mumak cannot take more than 3 damage each round.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9060.Name: Mutual Accord
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9060.Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Gondor card in play gains the Rohan trait, and each Rohan card in play gains the Gondor trait.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9061.Name: Orc Arbalesters
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9061.Text: X is the number of different resource icons (Ì, Ï, Ê, or Î) on heroes in play.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9062.Name: Orc Arsonist
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9062.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Deal it another shadow card.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9062.Text: Forced: When Orc Arsonist engages a player, deal 1 shadow card to each enemy engaged with that player.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9063.Name: Orc Assault

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9063.Text: When Revealed: Each character gets -2 Û and -2 Ú until the end of the round.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9064.Name: Orc Rabble
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9064.Shadow: Shadow: Deal the attacking enemy an additional shadow card for each player in the game.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9064.Text: Forced: When Orc Rabble is dealt a shadow card, it gets +2 Û until the end of the phase.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9065.Name: Orc Scramblers
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9065.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to The Citadel if it is in play. Otherwise, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9065.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each Battleground location in play, if able.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9066.Name: Orc Vanguard
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9066.Shadow: Shadow: Deal the attacking enemy two additional shadow cards.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9066.Text: While Orc Vanguard is in the staging area, resources cannot be spent from the resource pools of heroes who have a Ì, Ê, or Î resource icon.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9067.Name: Orc War Camp
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9067.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each shadow card dealt to it.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9067.Text: If an Orc enemy is in play, progress tokens cannot be placed on Orc War Camp while it is in the staging area.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9068.Name: Overgrown Trail
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9068.Shadow: Shadow: Remove X progress tokens from the current quest, where X is the attacking enemy's $.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9068.Text: Action: Exhaust a Ranger character to place 3 progress tokens on Overgrown Trail.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9069.Name: Pelargir Docks
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9069.Text: While Pelargir Docks is the active location, enemies get +1 Û and +1 Ú.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9070.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards 1 of his attachments. (Discard all of his attachments instead if undefended.)
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9070.Text: Forced: When Pickpocket attacks, the defending player discards 1 resource from one of his heroes' resource pools and 1 card at random from his hand.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9071.Name: Ranger Spikes
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9071.Text:
Play Ranger Spikes into the staging area unattached.

If unattached, attach Ranger Spikes to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.

Players do not make engagement checks against attached enemy. Attached enemy gets -2 $.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9072.Name: Scourge of Mordor
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9072.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Deal it another shadow card.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9072.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top card of his deck. Until the end of the phase, raise the total $ in the staging area by X, where X is the total cost of all cards discarded by this effect.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9073.Name: Secluded Glade
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9073.Shadow: Shadow: Remove X progress tokens from the current quest, where X is the attacking enemy's $.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9074.Name: Siege Raft
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9074.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to The Banks if it is in play. Otherwise, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9074.Text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to the lowest $ Battleground location in play, if able.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9075.Name: Southron Company
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9075.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if the current quest card has a keyword.)
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9075.Text: Southron Company gets +2 $ and +2 Û while the current quest card has the battle or siege keyword.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9076.Name: Southron Mercenaries
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9076.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if it has the Harad trait.)
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9076.Text: X is the number of players in the game.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9077.Name: Southron Support
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9077.Text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Harad enemy and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9078.Keywords: Attach to a Ï character. Restricted.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9078.Name: Spear of the Citadel
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9078.Text:
Limit 1 per character.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9079.Name: The Approach
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9079.Text:
If the Approach has 7 or more damage, remove it from the game (do not collect its victory points).

Response: After The Approach leaves play as an explored location, remove stage 3 from the quest deck, if able.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9080.Name: The Banks
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9080.Text:
If The Banks has 3 or more damage, remove it from the game (do not collect its victory points).

Response: After The Banks leaves play as an explored location, remove stage 2 from the quest deck, if able.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9081.Name: The Citadel
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9081.Text:
If The Citadel has 11 or more damage, remove it from the game (do not collect its victory points).

Response: After The Citadel leaves play as an explored location, remove stage 4 from the quest deck, if able.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9082.Name: The Leaping Fish
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9082.Text: If Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero, The Leaping Fish gains: "Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck where X is the number of players in the game. Add each enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area."

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9083.Name: The Master's Malice
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9083.Text: When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 sphere of influence (Ì, Ï, Ê, or Î). Each character a player controls that does not belong to his chosen sphere takes 3 damage.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9084.Name: The Power of Mordor
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9084.Text: When Revealed: Count the number of encounter cards in the staging area and shuffle them into the encounter deck. Then, reveal an equal number of cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area. This effect cannot be canceled.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9085.Name: Umbar Assassin
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9085.Text: Forced: When Umbar Assassin engages a player, that player must deal 3 damage to a hero he controls. (Discard that hero instead if Umbar Assassin was not optionally engaged.)

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9086.Name: Watcher in the Wood
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9086.Shadow: Shadow: Each player raises his threat by the number of enemies engaged with him.
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9086.Text: When Revealed: Raise each player's threat by the number of questing characters. (If the current quest has the battle or siege keyword, Watcher in the Wood gains surge.)

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9087.Name: Wealth of Gondor
4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9087.Text: Action: Choose a Gondor hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

4823aae3-46ef-4a75-89f9-cbd3aa1b9088.Name: Zealous Traitor

48384e79-d397-4dcd-9862-8a72acb448d0.Name: Lure of the Ring
48384e79-d397-4dcd-9862-8a72acb448d0.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if The One Ring is exhausted).
48384e79-d397-4dcd-9862-8a72acb448d0.Text: When Revealed: The first player must either exhaust The One Ring or raise his threat by 3.

4858bd5a-6d80-4351-849b-532fc2bc4ffe.Name: Flame of Udún
4858bd5a-6d80-4351-849b-532fc2bc4ffe.Shadow: Shadow: Deal Durin's Bane 3 additional shadow cards from the encounter deck (not the Balrog deck).

486a95af-e3af-4513-ae9a-d705d8557db6.Name: Peril in Pelargir
486a95af-e3af-4513-ae9a-d705d8557db6.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if Alcaron's Scroll is in the staging area, attach it to the enemeny in play with the highest Ú.

Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, if Alcaron's Scroll is attached to an enemy, place 1 progress on that enemy.

If at any point there are 3 or more progress tokens on an enemy, that enemy has escaped with the scroll, and the players lose the game.

486f9475-98e1-42d9-ac90-e6190545a5b9.Name: Southron Captain
486f9475-98e1-42d9-ac90-e6190545a5b9.Text: While Southron Captain is in the staging area, each other Harad enemy gets +1 $.While Southron Captain is engaged with you, each other Harad enemy engaged with you gets +1 Û.

487955be-4805-427c-984b-23bb88e697a6.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
487955be-4805-427c-984b-23bb88e697a6.Name: Eastern Ridge
487955be-4805-427c-984b-23bb88e697a6.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the phase, attacking enemy gets +1 Ú for each quest stage with no progress on it.
487955be-4805-427c-984b-23bb88e697a6.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, raise each player's threat by 1 for each quest stage with no progress on it.

48893e0f-bc7c-46f4-a5f7-18bd0d758d49.Name: Rebuild the Defenses
48893e0f-bc7c-46f4-a5f7-18bd0d758d49.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of the round (before the resource phase), place 1 resource here. Then, if there are 4 resources here, advance to stage 2.

Response: At the end of the round, remove 10 progress from this stage to increase the city strength of Annúminas by 10.

4893d105-fada-4bee-a4bb-d26463b97b63.Name: Sahír's Ravager
4893d105-fada-4bee-a4bb-d26463b97b63.Text: Forced: After Sahír’s Ravager attacks, place 1 resource on it. Then, deal X damage to the Aflame location in play with the lowest Aflame value, where X is the number of resources on Sahír’s Ravager.

48ce5ac0-3705-44a7-886a-24151a7de826.Name: Weary Warriors
48ce5ac0-3705-44a7-886a-24151a7de826.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets + 1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defender is damaged).
48ce5ac0-3705-44a7-886a-24151a7de826.Text: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a hero he controls. If that hero is questing, remove it from the quest. Until the end of the round, treat each damaged character's text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

49304bf6-63f3-4fd1-b3ec-072a034e4eb0.Name: The Living Forest
49304bf6-63f3-4fd1-b3ec-072a034e4eb0.Text:
Forced: The first player reveals 1 additional encounter card during the quest phase.

Forced: After placing progress as the result of questing successfully, if there are X or more total victory points on locations in the victory display, advance to stage 3A. Otherwise, advance to a different random stage 2A. X is the number of players in the game times 5.

496b62d9-2e7c-4206-bae5-2b180fec84d1.Keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
496b62d9-2e7c-4206-bae5-2b180fec84d1.Name: Wandering Ent

499195c5-389f-4a56-b67e-b6e5b8f2fb91.Name: Lord Alcaron
499195c5-389f-4a56-b67e-b6e5b8f2fb91.Text:
Forced: When Lord Alcaron attacks, place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

Forced: When Lord Alcaron is dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect, he makes an additional attack after this one (deal and resolve another shadow card).

49aa4e88-3774-43f7-ab8d-05268ed3fb7e.Name: The Betrayal
49aa4e88-3774-43f7-ab8d-05268ed3fb7e.Text: Lord Alcaron cannot leave play unless destroyed. If Lord Alcaron is defeated, advance to the next stage.

49d6a591-67b0-4d65-a384-ae0662b09814.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
49d6a591-67b0-4d65-a384-ae0662b09814.Name: Ruin and Wroth
49d6a591-67b0-4d65-a384-ae0662b09814.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
49d6a591-67b0-4d65-a384-ae0662b09814.Text: When Revealed: Deal 2 shadow cards to each enemy in play. Deal 2 damage to each battleground location in play.

49e734b0-3b71-45e4-8f31-ad1e09f1d9e4.Name: Ford of Bruinen
49e734b0-3b71-45e4-8f31-ad1e09f1d9e4.Text: Travel: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Nazgûl enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

49e857d2-b78f-4b5f-8c07-604af73fd616.Name: No Quarter
49e857d2-b78f-4b5f-8c07-604af73fd616.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, attach a Harad objective you control to a non-unique encounter card in the staging area.
49e857d2-b78f-4b5f-8c07-604af73fd616.Text: When Revealed: Either reveal 2 encounter cards, or detach a Harad objective from a hero, reveal it, and add it to the staging area.

4a18a702-0c0e-4be8-b26d-ccf5d4d95e2a.Name: Blistering Erg
4a18a702-0c0e-4be8-b26d-ccf5d4d95e2a.Text:
X is the stage number of the main quest.
Forced: After Blistering Erg becomes the active location, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls.

4a2696f1-65e1-41d5-8828-38ece23167df.Name: Smeagol's Secret Way
4a2696f1-65e1-41d5-8828-38ece23167df.Text:
Travel: Either exhaust Smeagol, or discard 1 random card from each player’s hand.

Forced: After Smeagol’s Secret Way is explored, each player either exhausts a character he controls, or discards 1 random card from his hand.

4a5c11eb-44b8-4c6e-a9fa-83112dbd57c0.Name: Pit Trap
4a5c11eb-44b8-4c6e-a9fa-83112dbd57c0.Text: Response: After the players travel to a location, if the active location’s printed $ is equal to or greater than the attached enemy’s remaining hit points, the engaged player adds Pit Trap and attached enemy to the victory display.

4a6539aa-2404-430f-94ab-0f674d965adc.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
4a6539aa-2404-430f-94ab-0f674d965adc.Name: Dread and Despair

4a6539aa-2404-430f-94ab-0f674d965adc.Text: When Revealed: Discard an ally you control. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each ally in your discard pile.

4a76ad60-35d1-4657-ab4a-2f7f15cc7ab7.Keywords: Setup: Add 2 resources to Denethor's resource pool.
4a76ad60-35d1-4657-ab4a-2f7f15cc7ab7.Name: Denethor
4a76ad60-35d1-4657-ab4a-2f7f15cc7ab7.Text: Action: Move 1 resource from Denethor’s resource pool to another Gondor hero’s resource pool. (Limit once per round.)

4a9282c0-44e5-4438-9b97-4b93dc29282d.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare

4aacc507-dfaf-4193-98c5-09dbf879423d.Name: Trial of Ancestors
4aacc507-dfaf-4193-98c5-09dbf879423d.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: Each non-unique character gets -1 Ò and cannot attack enemies that share a Trait with the current trial's key objective.")

4ae7d13b-4b73-477b-ab71-5bd6bfc7b912.Name: Overrun by Orcs
4ae7d13b-4b73-477b-ab71-5bd6bfc7b912.Shadow: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control, where X is the stage number of the main quest.
4ae7d13b-4b73-477b-ab71-5bd6bfc7b912.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, increase the total $ in the staging area by X, where X is twice the stage number of the main quest.

4b36df3f-d75b-4b3a-9324-9ab31c10d7b9.Name: Pale Blade
4b36df3f-d75b-4b3a-9324-9ab31c10d7b9.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a Nazgul enemy in play, if able. (Counts as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per enemy.  Attached enemy gets +1 Û and cannot take non-combat damage.")

4b3a4229-eb85-49b0-9f34-78cb17301b34.Keywords: Raid Leader gets +1 Ú for each resource on it.
4b3a4229-eb85-49b0-9f34-78cb17301b34.Name: Raid Leader
4b3a4229-eb85-49b0-9f34-78cb17301b34.Text: Forced: When Raid Leader engages you, move 1 resource from each of your heroes’ resource pools to Raid Leader.

4b748920-83c0-473a-a2fd-0ec8a6b3f1b8.Name: Waylaid by Agents
4b748920-83c0-473a-a2fd-0ec8a6b3f1b8.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if your threat is 20 or less).
4b748920-83c0-473a-a2fd-0ec8a6b3f1b8.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either remove 1 time counter from the quest or discard an ally he controls from play. Then, if any player's threat is 20 or less, Waylaid by Agents gained doomed 3.

4b794779-c6b6-4ee0-b13f-196b721e28a7.Name: Rúmil
4b794779-c6b6-4ee0-b13f-196b721e28a7.Text: Response: After you play Rúmil from your hand, choose an enemy engaged with a player. Deal X damage to that enemy where X is the number of ranged characters you control.

4bc78852-59b2-4126-86e1-96a1ee918a05.Name: Battle for Dunland
4bc78852-59b2-4126-86e1-96a1ee918a05.Text: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, remove 1 time counter from each location in play. Place 3 time counters on this stage.

4bcc7bde-4223-411e-a612-9459a1502743.Name: Poisoned Counsels
4bcc7bde-4223-411e-a612-9459a1502743.Text: At the end of each round, raise each player's threat by 2.

4bdcd185-ba8e-45f7-83e3-04325a07a5ed.Keywords: X equals the number of players in the game.
4bdcd185-ba8e-45f7-83e3-04325a07a5ed.Name: Wall of Trees
4bdcd185-ba8e-45f7-83e3-04325a07a5ed.Text: While Wall of Trees is in the staging area, progress must be placed on Wall of Trees before it can be placed on the current quest.

4be4e706-1bd2-455a-a712-833c1bbcea55.Name: Cursed Caverns
4be4e706-1bd2-455a-a712-833c1bbcea55.Text:
While Sunken Temple is the active location, treat each attachment as if its printed text box is blank (except for Traits).

Forced: If Sunken Temple is the active location at the end of the quest phase, discard 1 resource from each objective-ally and each hero's resource pool. Then, you may flip Sunken Temple to its Grotto side.

4bff71e7-f66c-4a2d-ba7d-633a6c77f765.Name: Lindir
4bff71e7-f66c-4a2d-ba7d-633a6c77f765.Text: Response: After Lindir enters play, if you have less than 3 cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand.

4c495965-946e-472f-841c-72f388a7ce65.Name: Shadowed Corridor
4c495965-946e-472f-841c-72f388a7ce65.Shadow: If the defending character is a hero, discard all resources in its resource pool. Deal attacking enemy another shadow card for each resource discarded in this way.
4c495965-946e-472f-841c-72f388a7ce65.Text: As an additional cost to bypass a quest card, each player must raise his threat by 2.

4c4cccd3-576a-41f1-8b6c-ba11b4cc3d4b.Name: Celeborn
4c4cccd3-576a-41f1-8b6c-ba11b4cc3d4b.Text: Response: After a Silvan ally enters play, that ally gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

4c68d3ef-2309-47db-ba21-08bf2f7336b9.Name: Northern Warg
4c68d3ef-2309-47db-ba21-08bf2f7336b9.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player, then makes an immediate attack (deal a new shadow card for that attack).
4c68d3ef-2309-47db-ba21-08bf2f7336b9.Text: When Revealed: Each Warg enemy gets +1 $ until the end of the phase.

4c7d7a31-250d-4e48-a97a-2aebb3b2b47d.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
4c7d7a31-250d-4e48-a97a-2aebb3b2b47d.Name: Lost Island
4c7d7a31-250d-4e48-a97a-2aebb3b2b47d.Text:
While Winding Caverns is the active location, each enemy gets +10 engagement cost.
When you would travel from Winding Caverns to another location, you may travel to a location up to 3 locations away. (You must still pay that location’s Travel cost in order to travel there.)

4c9ac5bd-1653-400c-9cd0-4da685da5c15.Name: Orc of Ered Luin
4c9ac5bd-1653-400c-9cd0-4da685da5c15.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player, then makes an immediate attack.
4c9ac5bd-1653-400c-9cd0-4da685da5c15.Text: When Revealed: Orc of Ered Luin makes an immediate attack against each player that controls at least 1 Loot objective (in turn order).

4cb4741d-c9d8-4d62-ab4f-50fa80c59fbb.Name: Anfalas Herdsman
4cb4741d-c9d8-4d62-ab4f-50fa80c59fbb.Text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 hit point.

4d31f077-9f08-435b-ad3c-95d5b7967fa4.Name: The Raiders’ Assault
4d31f077-9f08-435b-ad3c-95d5b7967fa4.Text: When Revealed: Choose a Ship enemy that is not currently guarding an objective. Attach that enemy to an unguarded objective in the staging area, guarding it (return that enemy to the staging area if it is engaged). If no Ship enemy is returned to the staging area by this effect, The Raiders’ Assault gains surge.󲂐

4d3d40e7-fc9a-414b-aaf9-2bae207a2e42.Name: Torrent of Hail
4d3d40e7-fc9a-414b-aaf9-2bae207a2e42.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 attachment you control (2 attachments instead if it is Night).
4d3d40e7-fc9a-414b-aaf9-2bae207a2e42.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each questing character. If it is Night, discard an attachment from each character damaged by this effect.

4d423c39-09c1-4c0b-b46f-6983fae4c07b.Name: The Spider's Glade
4d423c39-09c1-4c0b-b46f-6983fae4c07b.Text:
Travel: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins to travel here.

Forced: At the start of each quest phase, search the encounter deck for 1 Spider enemy and add it to the staging area. (2 Spider enemies instead if 3 or more players are at this stage.) Shuffle the encounter deck.

4d67feae-9070-4ed6-8b1a-3ddc3569e73a.Name: Sunken Treasury
4d67feae-9070-4ed6-8b1a-3ddc3569e73a.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
4d67feae-9070-4ed6-8b1a-3ddc3569e73a.Text:
Sunken Treasury gets +1 $ for each Loot objective attached to a hero. 
Travel: Each player discards 1 random card from his hand.

4d71af80-33cd-4df8-b6da-c479c8a3ae74.Name: Tale of Tinúviel
4d71af80-33cd-4df8-b6da-c479c8a3ae74.Text: Action: Exhaust a Noldor character to ready a Dúnedain character, or vice-versa. Until the end of the phase, add the exhausted character’s printed Ò to the other character’s Ò, Û, and Ú.

4d85bbe6-1bc7-4890-8974-e42e2d0f9431.Keywords: Cunning Pirate gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for each resource on it.
