4d85bbe6-1bc7-4890-8974-e42e2d0f9431.Name: Cunning Pirate
4d85bbe6-1bc7-4890-8974-e42e2d0f9431.Text: Forced: When Cunning Pirate engages you, discard an attachment you control and place resources on Cunning Pirate equal to that attachment’s printed cost.

4d904ec3-1c74-4091-861d-c543412b5443.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
4d904ec3-1c74-4091-861d-c543412b5443.Name: The Stone of Erech
4d904ec3-1c74-4091-861d-c543412b5443.Text: Immune to player card effects. Forced: After The Stone of Erech becomes the active location, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Oathbreaker enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Travel: Remove 5 progress from stage 3B to travel here.

4d925556-3a39-4e49-aafa-0adac6cacc52.Name: Waterspout
4d925556-3a39-4e49-aafa-0adac6cacc52.Text:
While your heading is at the worst setting (¾), when faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to Waterspout, if able.
Forced: After traveling to Waterspout, deal 4 damage to each Ship objective.

4de10000-6646-4e25-8208-4c277bbbcf80.Name: Foul-smelling Cave
4de10000-6646-4e25-8208-4c277bbbcf80.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if attacking enemy is Shelob).
4de10000-6646-4e25-8208-4c277bbbcf80.Text: Forced: When Foul-smelling Cave is explored, place 1 resource on Shelob, if able.

4e12f20f-aec3-4311-a656-10a517fd97fe.Name: Conspiracy
4e12f20f-aec3-4311-a656-10a517fd97fe.Text:
When revealed: Search the encounter deck for The Fourth Star and make it the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location, place 1 resource token on this quest.

If there are 4 or more resource tokens on Conspiracy, advance to the next stage.

4e309ae8-11c9-4326-a5ad-60e4d16e60c4.Name: Across the Ettenmoors
4e309ae8-11c9-4326-a5ad-60e4d16e60c4.Text:
Your are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: When resolving the 'when revealed' effect on stage 2A or stage 3A, also discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a location with the safe keyword is discarded. Attach that location to the newly revealed side quest, as a guarded objective.

4e61b160-2104-497f-9977-4b353e54fbb7.Keywords: If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players have lost the game.
4e61b160-2104-497f-9977-4b353e54fbb7.Name: Bilbo Baggins
4e61b160-2104-497f-9977-4b353e54fbb7.Text:
Bilbo Baggins does not count against the hero limit and cannot gain resources from non-treasure cards. The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins.

Action: Spend 1 Í resource to search your deck for a treasure card and add it to your hand.

4ebd8ec5-79fe-4305-9c33-e06d37b1c8d5.Name: Raven Warrior
4ebd8ec5-79fe-4305-9c33-e06d37b1c8d5.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards an attachment he controls.
4ebd8ec5-79fe-4305-9c33-e06d37b1c8d5.Text: Forced: After Raven Warrior engages a player, remove X time counters from locations in play. X is the number of cards in the engaged player’s hand.

4ed8bd53-0453-4490-a4bb-20a7d793c17f.Keywords: Attach to a Ï hero. Limit 1 per hero.
4ed8bd53-0453-4490-a4bb-20a7d793c17f.Name: Mighty Prowess
4ed8bd53-0453-4490-a4bb-20a7d793c17f.Text: Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the enemy just destroyed.

4ee09875-c105-4532-ba68-3701f3327696.Name: The Weather Hills
4ee09875-c105-4532-ba68-3701f3327696.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Setup: Shuffle each copy of Captive Villager and Rearguard Ambusher into the Orc deck.
The players cannot win the game while a Captive Villager is guarded by an encounter card. If a Captive Villager leaves play, the players lose the game.

4ee364f1-9e44-4dfb-a133-59d8d69fc9f6.Name: Orc of Angmar
4ee364f1-9e44-4dfb-a133-59d8d69fc9f6.Shadow: Shadow: Defender gets -2 Ú until the end of the round.
4ee364f1-9e44-4dfb-a133-59d8d69fc9f6.Text: Forced: When Orc of Angmar attacks, either remove 1 progress from the main quest, or it gets +2 Ú until the end of the phase.

4f03a84f-6665-435f-aa3a-5002c835d13b.Name: Deeper into the Past
4f03a84f-6665-435f-aa3a-5002c835d13b.Text:
The player cannot advance unless they control at least 2 Loot objectives and there are at least 3 resources here.

Forced: After the active location is explored, place 1 resource here.

Forced: When this stage is defeated, if Book of Aulë's Children is attached to a hero, advance to stage 3E. Otherwise, advance to stage 3C.

4f47ef56-46c8-4a6b-85dd-656eb71c5828.Name: Fool of a Took!
4f47ef56-46c8-4a6b-85dd-656eb71c5828.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck.
4f47ef56-46c8-4a6b-85dd-656eb71c5828.Text: When Revealed: Remove 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom, or The Balrog makes an attack, if able.

4f4df8ea-7f18-4a76-85b0-7ece828bb837.Name: Thrown Off Course
4f4df8ea-7f18-4a76-85b0-7ece828bb837.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, shift your heading off-course.
4f4df8ea-7f18-4a76-85b0-7ece828bb837.Text: When Revealed: Either remove all progress from the current quest and raise each player’s threat by 4, or shift your heading off-course.

4f73ca81-67c1-44db-a7ca-63a762748fc4.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
4f73ca81-67c1-44db-a7ca-63a762748fc4.Name: A Murder of Crows
4f73ca81-67c1-44db-a7ca-63a762748fc4.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal a random card from the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area, if able.

Forced: If A Murder of Crows would be destroyed, shuffle it back into the encounter deck instead.

4f945fb5-6307-4b31-91c5-5e6459f7e5bd.Name: Old Bogey-stories
4f945fb5-6307-4b31-91c5-5e6459f7e5bd.Text:
Setup: The first player attaches Old Bogey-stories to a hero in play. 

Action: Add Old Bogey-stories to the victory display to shuffle your hand of at least 6 cards into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

4fb48ed9-1651-4ae7-83d1-9d76a1dc27e7.Name: Charge of the Rohirrim
4fb48ed9-1651-4ae7-83d1-9d76a1dc27e7.Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Rohan character with a Mount attachment gets +3 Û.

4fc6111a-93c3-4407-b067-1b82396b802f.Name: Furious Rainstorm
4fc6111a-93c3-4407-b067-1b82396b802f.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by the attacking enemy’s $.
4fc6111a-93c3-4407-b067-1b82396b802f.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: raise his threat by the number of his characters committed to the quest, or deal 1 damage to each of his characters committed to the quest.

500d3f5b-2de3-4770-bb2a-7db2b104bbf2.Name: The Company Divided
500d3f5b-2de3-4770-bb2a-7db2b104bbf2.Text: Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, shuffle the Seat of Seeing and Frodo's Choice into the encounter discard pile. Then, place the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. Starting with the first player, each player creates his own staging area and advances to a different stage 3A of his choice. In player order, each player moves 1 encounter card from this staging area to his. When there are no encounter cards left at this stage, discard it.

503d55b2-1f02-46d2-b672-230912c8563e.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
503d55b2-1f02-46d2-b672-230912c8563e.Name: Spells of Ruin
503d55b2-1f02-46d2-b672-230912c8563e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, deal 2 damage to Minas Tirith.
503d55b2-1f02-46d2-b672-230912c8563e.Text: When Revealed: Either deal 1 damage to each exhausted character, or deal 5 damage to Minas Tirith.

5073c7a3-a3f6-4aca-b2a2-e0b830af3985.Name: Grasping Arm
5073c7a3-a3f6-4aca-b2a2-e0b830af3985.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, resolve Grasping Arm’s Grapple keyword.
5073c7a3-a3f6-4aca-b2a2-e0b830af3985.Text: Forced: When Grasping Arm attacks, the engaged player must exhaust a character he controls.

50950a5b-0002-432a-b6d6-4ac2ca12e501.Name: Expanse of Harad
50950a5b-0002-432a-b6d6-4ac2ca12e501.Text:
While the players are not at the same stage as the Orc’s stage, Expanse of Harad gets +2 $.
Forced: After Expanse of Harad becomes the active location, raise each player’s threat by 2.

509f3e41-385c-4b84-ad28-7cc2eed8028c.Name: Soldier of Isengard
509f3e41-385c-4b84-ad28-7cc2eed8028c.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
509f3e41-385c-4b84-ad28-7cc2eed8028c.Text: Forced: After Soldier of Isengard attacks and destroys a character, place 1 progress on the current quest.

50aa4aab-6daa-4cb5-bfb1-a13db03c1a23.Keywords: Play only if you control at least 1 Ranger character.
50aa4aab-6daa-4cb5-bfb1-a13db03c1a23.Name: Forest Patrol
50aa4aab-6daa-4cb5-bfb1-a13db03c1a23.Text: Action: Deal 3 damage to an enemy with at least 1 Trap card attached to it.

50c19cd1-3094-4bf7-b2dc-e21b145827b7.Name: Panicked
50c19cd1-3094-4bf7-b2dc-e21b145827b7.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player exhausts a character he controls.
50c19cd1-3094-4bf7-b2dc-e21b145827b7.Text: When Revealed: The first player raises his threat by 3 and passes the first player token to the next player.

50dda27b-1bf7-43d4-a6e2-eced8d60515a.Name: Obsidien Arrows
50dda27b-1bf7-43d4-a6e2-eced8d60515a.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û.  X is that enemy's archery value.
50dda27b-1bf7-43d4-a6e2-eced8d60515a.Text: When Revealed: The current quest gains archery 2 until the end of the round.  Then, assign all archery damage to characters in play as if it were the beginning of the combat phase.

50e62ade-1958-439d-9314-383d8621ecf5.Name: The Serpent’s Garb
50e62ade-1958-439d-9314-383d8621ecf5.Text: Guarded (enemy). Attached encounter card gets +2 $ and is immune to player card effects. Action: Exhaust The Serpent’s Garb and raise your threat by 1 to give a Harad enemy in the staging area -2 $ until the end of the phase.

50f22268-96bd-441f-bfab-b11f9e3c0f21.Name: Orc Trail
50f22268-96bd-441f-bfab-b11f9e3c0f21.Text: Forced: After Orc Trail leaves play as an explored location, choose an out of play Orc enemy, either set aside or in the victory display, and add it to the staging area. Then, the first player searches 4.

51124d05-205c-49e6-ad19-aa67185c8bdc.Name: Through the Marsh
51124d05-205c-49e6-ad19-aa67185c8bdc.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 2A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck. 

Player card effects cannot be used to gain resources or draw cards. 

Forced: When the players defeat this stage, advance to a random stage 3A.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9001.Name: Aragorn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9001.Text: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9002.Name: Théodred
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9002.Text: Response: After Theodred commits to a quest, choose a hero committed to that quest. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9003.Name: Glóin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9003.Text: Response: After Gloin suffers damage, add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9004.Name: Gimli
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9004.Text: Gimli gets +1 Û for each damage token on him.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9005.Name: Legolas
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9005.Text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9006.Name: Thalin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9006.Text: While Thalin is committed to a quest, deal 1 damage to each enemy as it is revealed by the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9007.Name: Éowyn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9007.Text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Eowyn +1 Ò until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9008.Name: Eleanor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9008.Text: Response: Exhaust Eleanor to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a treachery card just revealed by the encounter deck. Then, discard that card, and replace it with the next card from the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9009.Name: Dunhere
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9009.Text: Dunhere can target enemies in the staging area when he attacks alone. When doing so, he gets +1 Û.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9010.Name: Denethor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9010.Text: Action: Exhaust Denethor to look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may move that card to the bottom of the deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9011.Name: Glorfindel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9011.Text: Action: Pay 1 resource from Glorfindel's pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9012.Name: Beravor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9012.Text: Action: Exhaust Beravor to choose a player. That player draws 2 cards. Limit once per round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9014.Name: Faramir
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9014.Text: Action: Exhaust Faramir to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9015.Name: Son of Arnor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9015.Text: Response: After Son of Arnor enters play, choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9016.Name: Snowbourn Scout
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9016.Text: Response: After Snowbourn Scout enters play, choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9018.Name: Longbeard Orc Slayer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9018.Text: Response: After Longbeard Orc Slayer enters play, deal 1 damage to each Orc enemy in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9019.Name: Brok Ironfist
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9019.Text: Response: After a Dwarf hero you control leaves play, put Brok Ironfist into play from your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9020.Name: Ever Vigilant
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9020.Text: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9021.Name: Common Cause
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9021.Text: Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9022.Name: For Gondor!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9022.Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all characters get +1 Û. All Gondor characters also get +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9023.Name: Sneak Attack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9023.Text: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9024.Name: Valiant Sacrifice
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9024.Text: Response: After an ally card leaves play, that card's controller draws 2 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9025.Name: Grim Resolve
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9025.Text: Action: Ready all character cards in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9026.Name: Steward of Gondor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9026.Text:
Attached hero gains the Gondor trait.

Action: Exhaust Steward of Gondor to add 2 resources to attached hero's resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9027.Name: Celebrían's Stone
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9027.Text:
Attached hero gains +2 Ò.

If attached hero is Aragorn, he also gains a Ê resource icon.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9029.Name: Gondorian Spearman
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9029.Text: Response: After Gondorian Spearman is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9031.Name: Beorn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9031.Text: Action: Beorn gains +5 Û until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase in which you trigger this effect, shuffle Beorn back into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9032.Name: Blade Mastery
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9032.Text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +1 Û and +1 Ú.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9033.Name: Rain of Arrows
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9033.Text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9034.Name: Feint
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9034.Text: Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9035.Name: Quick Strike
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9035.Text: Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against any eligible enemy target.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9036.Name: Thicket of Spears
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9036.Text:
You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.

Action: Choose a player. That player's engaged enemies cannot attack that player this phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9037.Name: Swift Strike
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9037.Text: Response: After a character is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9038.Name: Stand Together
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9038.Text: Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9039.Name: Blade of Gondolin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9039.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 Û when attacking an Orc .

Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1  progress token on the current quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9041.Name: Dwarven Axe
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9041.Text: Attached hero gains +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if attached hero is a Dwarf.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9042.Name: Horn of Gondor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9042.Text: Response: After a character leaves play, add 1 resource to attached hero's pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9043.Name: Wandering Took
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9043.Text: Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Wandering Took to another player. Raise that player's threat by 3.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9044.Name: Lórien Guide
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9044.Text: Response: After Lórien Guide commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on the active location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9045.Name: Northern Tracker
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9045.Text: Response: After Northern Tracker commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9046.Name: The Galadhrim's Greeting
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9046.Text: Action: Reduce one player's threat by 6, or reduce each player's threat by 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9047.Name: Strength of Will
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9047.Text: Response: After you travel to a location, exhaust a Ê character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9048.Name: Hasty Stroke
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9048.Text: Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9049.Name: Will of the West
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9049.Text: Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that player's discard pile back into his deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9050.Name: A Test of Will
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9050.Text: Response: Cancel the "when revealed" effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9051.Name: Stand and Fight
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9051.Text: Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any player's discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control. (The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9052.Name: A Light in the Dark
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9052.Text: Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9053.Name: Dwarven Tomb
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9053.Text: Action: Return 1 Ê card from your discard pile to your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9054.Name: Fortune or Fate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9054.Text: Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that card into play, under its owner's control.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9057.Name: Unexpected Courage
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9057.Text: Action: Exhaust Unexpected Courage to ready attached hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9058.Name: Daughter of the Nimrodel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9058.Text: Action: Exhaust Daughter of the Nimrodel to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9059.Name: Erebor Hammersmith
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9059.Text: Response: After you play Erebor Hammersmith, return the topmost attachment in any player's discard pile to his hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9060.Name: Henamarth Riversong
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9060.Text: Action: Exhaust Henamarth Riversong to look at the top card of the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9061.Name: Miner of the Iron Hills
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9061.Text: Response: After Miner of the Iron Hills enters play, choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9062.Name: Gléowine
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9062.Text: Action: Exhaust Gléowine to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9063.Name: Lore of Imladris
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9063.Text: Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9064.Name: Lórien's Wealth
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9064.Text: Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9065.Name: Radagast's Cunning
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9065.Text: Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9066.Name: Secret Paths
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9066.Text: Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that location does not contribute its $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9067.Name: Gandalf's Search
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9067.Text: Action: Look at the top X cards of any player's deck, add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand, and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9068.Name: Beorn's Hospitality
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9068.Text: Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9069.Keywords: Attach to an enemy engaged with a player.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9069.Name: Forest Snare

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9070.Name: Protector of Lórien
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9070.Text: Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 Ú or +1 Ò until the end of the phase. Limit 3 times per phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9071.Keywords: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 Ò.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9071.Name: Dark Knowledge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9071.Text: Response: Exhaust Dark Knowledge to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9072.Name: Self Preservation
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9072.Text: Action: Exhaust Self Preservation to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9073.Keywords: At the end of the round, discard Gandalf from play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9073.Name: Gandalf
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9073.Text: Response: After Gandalf enters play, (choose 1): draw 3 cards, deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play, or reduce your threat by 5.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9074.Name: King Spider
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9074.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls. (2 characters instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9074.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9075.Name: Hummerhorns
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9075.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each character the defending player controls. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9075.Text: Forced: After Hummerhorns engages you, deal 5 damage to a single hero you control.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9076.Name: Ungoliant's Spawn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9076.Shadow: Shadow: Raise defending player's threat by 4. (Raise defending player's threat by 8 instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9076.Text: When Revealed: Each character currently committed to a quest gets -1 Ò until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9077.Name: Great Forest Web
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9077.Text: Travel: Each player must exhaust 1 hero he controls to travel here.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9078.Name: Mountains of Mirkwood
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9078.Text:
Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.

Response: After Mountains of Mirkwood leaves play as an explored location, each player may search the top 5 cards of his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Shuffle the rest of the searched cards back into their owners' decks.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9079.Name: Eyes of the Forest
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9079.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards all event cards in his hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9080.Name: Caught in a Web
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9080.Text: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat level attaches this card to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero does not ready during the refresh phase unless you pay 2 resources from that hero's pool.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9081.Name: Wolf Rider
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9081.Shadow: Shadow: Wolf Rider attacks the defending player. That player may declare 1 character as a defender. Deal Wolf Rider its own Shadow card. After combat, return Wolf Rider to the top of the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9082.Name: Hill Troll
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9082.Text: Excess combat damage dealt by Hill Troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) must be assigned as an increase to your threat.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9083.Name: Goblin Sniper
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9083.Text:
During the encounter phase, players cannot optionally engage Goblin Sniper if there are other enemies in the staging area.

Forced: If Goblin Sniper is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase, each player deals 1 point of damage to 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9084.Name: Marsh Adder
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9084.Text: Forced: Each time Marsh Adder attacks you, raise your threat by 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9085.Name: Wargs
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9085.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9085.Text: Forced: If Wargs is dealt a shadow card with no effect, return Wargs to the staging area after it attacks.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9086.Name: Despair
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9086.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character does not count its Ú.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9086.Text: When Revealed: Remove 4 progress tokens from the current quest card. (If there are fewer than 4 progress tokens on the quest, remove all progress tokens from that quest.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9087.Name: The Brown Lands
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9087.Text: Forced: After the players travel to The Brown Lands, place 1 progress token on it.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9088.Name: The East Bight
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9088.Text: When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to The East Bight if there is no active location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9089.Name: Dol Guldur Orcs
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9089.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9089.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 character currently committed to a quest. Deal 2 damage to that character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9090.Keywords: Chieftain Ufthak get +2Attack for each resource token on him.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9090.Name: Chieftan Ufthak
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9090.Text: Forced: After Chieftain Ufthak attacks, place 1 resource token on him.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9091.Name: Dol Guldur Beastmaster
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9091.Text: Forced: When Dol Guldur Beastmaster attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9092.Name: Driven by Shadow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9092.Shadow: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment from the defending character. (If this attack is undefended, discard all attachments you control.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9092.Text: When Revealed: Each enemy and each location currently in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. If there are no cards in the staging area, Driven by Shadow gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9093.Name: The Necromancer's Reach
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9093.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9094.Name: Necromancer's Pass
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9094.Text: Travel: The first player must discard 2 cards from his hand at random to travel here.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9095.Name: Enchanted Stream
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9095.Text: While Enchanted Stream is the active location, players cannot draw cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9096.Name: Forest Spider
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9096.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and discard 1 attachment he controls.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9096.Text: Forced: After Forest Spider engages a player, it gets +1 Û until the end of the round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9097.Name: East Bight Patrol
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9097.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (If this attack is undefended, also raise your threat by 3.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9098.Name: Black Forest Bats
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9098.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose 1 character currently committed to a quest, and remove that character from the quest. (The chosen character does not ready.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9099.Name: Old Forest Road
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9099.Text: Response: After you travel to Old Forest Road, the first player may choose and ready 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9100.Name: Forest Gate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9100.Text: Response: After you travel to Forest Gate, the first player may draw 2 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9101.Name: Dungeon Jailor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9101.Text: Forced: If Dungeon Jailor is in the staging area after the players have just quested unsuccessfully, shuffle 1 unclaimed objective card from the staging area back into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9102.Keywords: No attachments can be played on Nazgul of Dol Guldur.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9102.Name: Nazgûl of Dol Guldur
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9102.Text:
Forced: When the prisoner is "rescued", move Nazgul of Dol Guldur into the staging area.

Forced: After a shadow effect dealt to Nazgul of Dol Guldur resolves, the engaged player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9103.Name: Cavern Guardian
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9103.Shadow: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment you control. Discarded  objective cards are returned to the staging area. (If this attack is  undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9104.Name: Under the Shadow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9104.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by the number of enemies  with which he is engaged.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9104.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, raise the total $ in the  staging area by X, where X is the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9105.Name: Iron Shackles
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9105.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve the "When Revealed" effect of Iron Shackles.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9105.Text: When Revealed: Attach Iron Shackles to the top of the first player's deck. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "The next time a player would draw 1 or more cards from attached deck, discard Iron Shackles instead.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9107.Name: Tower Gate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9107.Text: Forced: After travelling to Tower Gate, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard", and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 Û, and 1 Ú.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9108.Name: Gandalf's Map
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9108.Text:
Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Gandalf's Map to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Gandalf's Map to the staging area.) 

Attached hero cannot attack or defend.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9109.Name: Dungeon Torch
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9109.Text:
Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Dungeon Torch to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Dungeon Torch to the staging area.)

Forced: At the end of each round, raise attached hero's controller's threat by 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9110.Name: Shadow Key
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9110.Text:
Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Shadow Key to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Shadow Key to the staging area.)

Forced: At the end of each round, attached hero suffers 1 damage.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9111.Name: Misty Mountain Goblins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9111.Shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest. (3 progress tokens instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9111.Text: Forced: After Misty Mountain Goblins attacks, remove 1 progress token from the current quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9112.Name: Massing at Night
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9112.Shadow: Shadow: Deal X shadow cards to this attacker. X is the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9112.Text: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9113.Name: Banks of the Anduin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9113.Text: Forced: If Banks of the Anduin leaves play, return it to the top of the encounter deck instead of placing it in the discard pile.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9114.Name: Gladden Fields
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9114.Text: Forced: While Gladden Fields is the active location, each player must raise his threat by an additional point during the refresh phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9115.Name: Eastern Crows
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9115.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if defending player's threat is 35 or higher.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9115.Text: Forced: After Eastern Crows is defeated, shuffle it back into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9116.Name: Evil Storm
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9116.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character controlled by each player with a threat of 35 or higher.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9117.Name: Pursued by Shadow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9117.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player chooses and returns 1 exhausted ally he controls to its owner's hand. If he controls no exhausted allies, raise his threat by 3.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9117.Text: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each character he controls that is not currently committed to a quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9118.Name: Treacherous Fog
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9118.Text: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. Then, each player with a threat of 35 or higher chooses and discards 1 card from his hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9119.Name: Flies and Spiders
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9119.Text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of the Forest Spider and 1 copy of the Old Forest Road, and add them to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9121.Name: A Fork in the Road
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9121.Text: Forced: When you defeat this stage, proceed to one of the 2 "A Chosen Path" stages, at random.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9123.Name: A Chosen Path
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9123.Text:
When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Spider card of his choice, and add it to the staging area.

The players must find and defeat Ungoliant's Spawn to win this game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9125.Name: A Chosen Path
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9125.Text: Players cannot defeat this stage while Ungoliant's Spawn is in play. If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9127.Name: The Necromancer's Tower
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9127.Text:
When Revealed: Randomly select 1 hero card (among all the heroes controlled by the players) and turn it facedown. That hero is now considered a "prisoner", cannot be used, cannot be damaged, and does not collect resources, until it is "rescued" (as instructed by card effects) later in this quest.

The players, as a group, cannot play more than 1 ally card each round.

Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have at least 1 objective card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9129.Name: Through the Caverns
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9129.Text:
Response: After placing any number of progress tokens on this card, flip the "prisoner" hero card face-up, and place 1 damage token on it. This hero has been "rescued", and may now be used by its controller.

The players, as a group, cannot play more than 1 ally card each round.

Players cannot advance to the next stage of this quest unless they have rescued the prisoner and have all 3 "Escape from Dol Guldur" objective cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9131.Name: Out of the Dungeons
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9131.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of each quest phase, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard", and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 Û, and 1 Ú.

Players cannot defeat this stage while Nazgul of Dol Guldur is in play. If this stage is defeated and Nazgul of Dol Guldur is not in play, the players have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9133.Name: To the River...
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9133.Text:
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 Hill Troll (if one is not already in play), and place it in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Players cannot defeat this stage while any Hill Troll cards are in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9135.Name: Anduin Passage
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9135.Text: Reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck each quest phase. Do not make engagement checks during the encounter phase. (Each player may still optionally engage 1 enemy each encounter phase.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9137.Name: Ambush on the Shore
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801200c9137.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 2 encounter cards per player, and add them to the staging area.

Skip the staging step of the quest phase for the remainder of the game.

Once there are no enemies in play, the players have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9001.Name: Bilbo Baggins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9001.Text: The first player draws 1 additional card in the resource phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9002.Name: Dúnedain Mark
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9002.Text:
Attached hero gains +1 Û.

Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Mark to another hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9004.Name: Mustering the Rohirrim
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9004.Text: Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for any 1 Rohan ally card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9005.Name: Rivendell Minstrel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9005.Text: Response: After you play Rivendell Minstrel from your hand, search your deck for 1 Song card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9006.Name: Song of Kings
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9006.Text: Attached hero gains a Ì resource icon.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9007.Name: Strider's Path
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9007.Text: Response: After a location is revealed from the encounter deck, immediately travel to that location without resolving its Travel effect. If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9008.Name: The Eagles Are Coming!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9008.Text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Eagle cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9009.Name: Westfold Horse-Breaker
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9009.Text: Action: Discard Westfold Horse-Breaker to choose and ready a hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9010.Name: Winged Guardian
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9010.Text:
Winged Guardian cannot have restricted attachments.

Forced: After an attack in which Winged Guardian defends resolves, pay 1 Ï resource or discard Winged Guardian from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9011.Name: False Lead
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9011.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses and shuffles a card with the printed Clue trait back into the encounter deck. If there are no Clue cards in play, False Lead gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9012.Name: Flooding
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9012.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve the "when revealed" effect of this card.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9012.Text: When Revealed: Remove all progress tokens from all Riverland locations.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9013.Name: Goblintown Scavengers
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9013.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of each player's deck. Until the end of the phase, increase Goblintown Scavenger's $ by the total printed cost of all cards discarded in this way.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9014.Name: Hunters from Mordor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9014.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each hero with a Clue card attached. (3 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9014.Text: Hunters from Mordor get +2 Û and +2 $ for each Clue card in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9015.Name: Old Wives' Tales
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9015.Text: When Revealed: Discard 1 resource from each hero's resource pool, if able. Exhaust any hero that could not discard a resource from its pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9016.Name: River Ninglor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9016.Shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest. (2 progress tokens instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9016.Text: While River Ninglor is the active location, remove 1 progress token from it and from the current quest at the end of each round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9017.Name: Signs of Gollum
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9017.Text: Response: After the players quest successfully, the players may claim Signs of Gollum if it has no attached encounters. When claimed, attach Signs of Gollum to any hero committed to the quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with: "Forced: After attached hero is damaged or leaves play, return this card to the top of the encounter deck.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9018.Name: The East Bank
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9018.Shadow: Shadow: If you do not control at least 1 hero with a Clue card attached, return this enemy to the staging area after its attack resolves.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9018.Text: While The East Bank is the active location, ally cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9019.Name: The Eaves of Mirkwood
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9019.Text: While The Eaves of Mirkwood is the active location, encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9020.Keywords: X is the number of ally cards in play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9020.Name: The Old Ford
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9020.Shadow: Shadow: Discard from play all allies with a printed cost lower than the number of Riverland locations in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9021.Name: The West Bank
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9021.Shadow: Shadow: If you do not control at least 1 hero with a Clue card attached, double this enemy's base Û for this attack.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9021.Text: While The West Bank is the active location, attachment and event cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9022.Name: The Hunt Begins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9022.Text: Forced: After the players quest successfully, the first player looks at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of those cards to the staging area, and discard the other 2 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9024.Name: A New Terror Abroad
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9024.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, the first player looks at the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of those cards to the staging area, and discard the other.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9026.Name: On the Trail
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801201c9026.Text:
Any player who does not control a hero with at least 1 Clue objective attached cannot commit characters to this quest. If there are ever no heroes with Clue objectives attached in play, reset the quest deck to stage 2B.

If the players defeat this stage, the players have once again found a true sign of Gollum's passing, and won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9001.Name: Frodo Baggins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9001.Text: Response: After Frodo Baggins is damaged, cancel the damage and instead raise your threat by the amount of damage he would have been dealt. (Limit once per phase.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9002.Name: A Frightened Beast
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9002.Text: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by the total $ of all cards in the staging area. Any player may choose to discard from play 1 Creature ally card he controls to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9003.Name: Against the Trolls
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9003.Text:
When Revealed: Place the unique Troll cards previously set aside into the staging area.

Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any Troll enemies in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9005.Name: Bee Pastures
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9005.Text: Response: After you travel to Bee Pastures, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Grimbeorn the Old and add him to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9006.Name: Beorning Beekeeper
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9006.Text: Action: Discard Beorning Beekeeper from play to deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9007.Name: Born Aloft
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9007.Text: Action: Discard Born Aloft from play to return attached ally to its owner's hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9008.Name: Dúnedain Warning
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9008.Text:
Attached hero gains +1 Ú.

Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Warning to another hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9009.Name: Éomund
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9009.Text: Response: After Eomund leaves play, ready all Rohan characters in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9010.Name: A Burning Brand
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9010.Text: While attached character is defending, cancel any shadow effects on cards dealt to the attacking enemy.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9011.Name: Grimbeorn the Old
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9011.Text:
Grimbeorn the Old does not exhaust to defend against Troll enemies.

If Grimbeorn the Old has 8 or more resource tokens on him, he joins the first player as an ally.

Action: Spend 1 Ì resource to place that resource on Grimbeorn the Old.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9012.Name: Grimbeorn's Quest
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9012.Text: Forced: After placing the 7th progress token on Grimbeorn's Quest, The Carrock becomes the active location. Discard the previous active location from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9014.Name: Longbeard Map-Maker
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9014.Text: Action: Spend 1 Î resource to give Longbeard Map-Maker +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9015.Name: Louis
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9015.Text:
While Louis is engaged with a player, all Troll enemies gain, "Forced: After this enemy attacks, the defending player must raise his threat by 3."

Response: After defeating Louis, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9016.Name: Morris
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9016.Text:
While Morris is engaged with a player, all Troll enemies get +1 Û.

Response: After defeating Morris, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9017.Name: Muck Adder
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9017.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ú for the duration of this attack.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9017.Text: Forced: If Muck Adder damages a character, discard that character from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9018.Name: Nor am I a Stranger
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9018.Text: Attached character gains the Rohan trait.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9019.Name: Oak-wood Grove
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9019.Text: While Oak-wood Grove is the active location, resource tokens from any sphere may be spent as Ì resource tokens.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9020.Name: River Langflood
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9020.Text: While it is in the staging area, River Langflood gets +1 $ for each Troll enemy in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9021.Name: Roasted Slowly
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9021.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, remove 2 damage tokens from it.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9021.Text: When Revealed: Destroy all heroes with the card "Sacked!" attached. Then, shuffle Roasted Slowly back into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9022.Name: Rupert
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9022.Text:
Forced: After Rupert attacks, shuffle all copies of the "Sacked!" card from the discard pile back into the encounter deck.

Response: After defeating Rupert, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9023.Name: Sacked!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9023.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, resolve this card's "when revealed" effect.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9023.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero with no "Sacked!" cards attached controlled by the first player. (Cannot be canceled.) Counts as a condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero cannot attack, defend, commit to a quest, trigger its effect, or collect resources."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9024.Name: Second Breakfast
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9024.Text: Action: Each player returns the topmost attachment card from his discard pile to his hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9025.Name: Song of Wisdom
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9025.Text: Attached hero gains a Î resource icon.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9026.Name: Stuart
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9026.Text:
While Stuart is engaged with a player, all Troll enemies get +1 Ú.

Response: After defeating Stuart, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9027.Name: The Carrock
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801202c9027.Text:
Players cannot travel to The Carrock except through quest card effects.

While The Carrock is the active location, Troll enemies get +1 Û and +1 Ú.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9001.Name: Prince Imrahil
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9001.Text: Response: After a character leaves play, ready Prince Imrahil. (Limit once per round.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9003.Name: Radagast
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9003.Text:
Radagast collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Creature cards played from your hand.

Action: Spend X resources from Radagast's pool to heal X wounds on any 1 Creature.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9004.Name: Landroval
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9004.Text:
Landroval cannot have restricted attachments.

Response: After a hero card is destroyed, return Landroval to his owner's hand to put that hero back into play, with 1 damage token on it. (Limit once per game.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9005.Name: Ancient Mathom
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9005.Text: Response: After attached location is explored, the first player draws 3 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9006.Name: Infighting
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9006.Text: Action: Move any number of damage from one enemy to another.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9007.Name: Parting Gifts
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9007.Text: Action: Move any number of resource tokens from a Ì hero's resource pool to any other hero's resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9008.Name: Dúnedain Quest
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9008.Text:
Attached hero gains +1 Ò.

Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Quest to another hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9009.Name: Escort from Edoras
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9009.Text:
While committed to a quest, Escort from Edoras gets +2 Ò.

Forced: After resolving a quest to which Escort from Edoras was committed, discard Escort from Edoras from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9010.Name: To the Eyrie
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9010.Text: Response: After an ally is destroyed, exhaust 1 Eagle character to move that ally from the discard pile to its owner's hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9011.Name: Festering Wounds
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9011.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each wounded character. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9011.Text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each wounded character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9012.Name: Athelas
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9012.Text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then, attach Athelas to that hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9013.Name: Black Forest Bats
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9013.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the damage must be placed on Wilyador.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9013.Text: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Black Forest Bats.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9014.Name: Exhaustion
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9014.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9014.Text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each exhausted character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9015.Name: Forest Grove
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9015.Text: Response: After the players explore Forest Grove, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 Athelas objective, and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9016.Name: Mirkwood Flock
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9016.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the damage must be placed on Wilyador.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9016.Text: Only Eagle characters or characters with ranged can attack or defend against Mirkwood Flock.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9017.Keywords: X is the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9017.Name: Rhosgobel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9017.Text:
While Rhosgobel is in the staging area, Wilyador cannot be healed.

Travel: Players must complete stage one of this quest before they can travel to Rhosgobel.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9018.Name: Swarming Insects
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9018.Shadow: Shadow: If a character (including Wilyador) has more damage than each other character, deal 3 additional damage to that character.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9018.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character without any attachments.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9019.Keywords: No attachments. The first player gains control of Wilyador, as an ally.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9019.Name: Wilyador
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9019.Text:
Forced: At the end of each round, Wilyador suffers 2 damage.
Wilyador cannot be healed of more than 5 wounds by a single effect. If Wilyador leaves play, the players have lost the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9020.Name: The Wounded Eagle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9020.Text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Rhosgobel and Wilyador, and add them to the staging area with 2 damage tokens on Wilyador. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9022.Name: Radagast's Request
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9022.Text:
Response: After the quest phase begins, the first player may place X damage tokens on Wilyador to look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Reveal and add 1 of these cards to the staging area, and discard the other 2. X is the number of players in the game.

Forced: After a card effect heals Wilyador, remove that card from the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9024.Name: Return to Rhosgobel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801203c9024.Text:
When Revealed: Heal 5 wounds from Wilyador for each Athelas objective card the players control.

If Wilyador is completely healed when this effect resolves, Wilyador survives and the players have won the game. Otherwise, the players have lost the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9001.Keywords: X is double the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9001.Name: Amon Hen
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9001.Text: While Amon Hen is the active location, players cannot play events.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9002.Keywords: X is double the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9002.Name: Amon Lhaw
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9002.Text: While Amon Lhaw is the active location, treat all attachments as if their printed text boxes were blank.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9003.Name: Brand son of Bain
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9003.Text: Response: After Brand son of Bain attacks and defeats an enemy engaged with another player, choose and ready one of that player's characters.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9004.Name: Descendant of Thorondor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9004.Text:
Descendant of Thorondor cannot have restricted attachments.

Response: After Descendant of Thorondor enters or leaves play, deal 2 damage to any 1 enemy in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9005.Name: Gildor Inglorion
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9005.Text: Action: Exhaust Gildor Inglorion to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Switch one of those cards with a card from your hand. Then, return the 3 cards to the top of your deck, in any order.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9006.Name: Gildor's Counsel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9006.Text:
Play during the Quest phase, before characters are committed to the Quest.

Action: Reveal 1 less card from the encounter deck this phase. (To a minimum of 1.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9007.Name: Impassable Chasm
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9007.Text: When Revealed: If there is an active location, remove all progress tokens from that location and return it to the staging area. If no location is moved by this effect, this card gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9008.Name: Keen-eyed Took
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9008.Text:
Response: After Keen-eyed Took enters play, reveal the top card of each player's deck.

Action: Return Keen-eyed Took to your hand to discard the top card of each player's deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9009.Name: Meneldor's Flight
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9009.Text: Action: Choose an Eagle ally. Return that character to its owner's hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9010.Name: Orc Horse Thieves
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9010.Text: Orc Horse Thieves get +1 Û for each location in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9011.Name: Rauros Falls
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9011.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9011.Text: While Rauros Falls is the active location, all characters must commit to the current quest during the quest phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9012.Name: Rear Guard
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9012.Text: Quest Action: Discard a Ì ally to give each hero committed to this quest +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9013.Name: Ride to Ruin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9013.Text: Action: Discard a Rohan ally to choose a location. Place 3 progress tokens on that location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9014.Name: Rockslide
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9014.Shadow: Shadow: Remove defending character from combat. This attack is considered undefended.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9014.Text: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each character committed to this quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9015.Name: Slick Footing
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9015.Text: When Revealed: Remove 1 progress token from each location in play. Then, discard the top card of each player's deck for each progress token removed by this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9016.Name: Song of Travel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9016.Text: Attached hero gains a Ê resource icon.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9017.Name: The East Wall of Rohan
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9017.Text: While The East Wall of Rohan is the active location, non-Rohan characters cost 2 additional matching resources to play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9018.Name: The Highlands
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9018.Text: Travel: In order to travel to The Highlands, the players must reveal the top card of the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9019.Name: The Hills of Emyn Muil
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9019.Text:
Forced: If there are no location cards in the staging area, the first treachery card revealed during the quest phase gains surge.

Players cannot defeat this stage unless there are no Emyn Muil locations in play, and they have collected at least 20 victory points.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9021.Name: The North Stair
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9021.Text: Forced: After traveling to The North Stair, move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the staging area. Resolve any "when revealed" effects on that card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9022.Name: The Outer Ridge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9022.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9022.Text: While The Outer Ridge is the active location, each location in the staging area gets +1 $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9023.Name: The Riddermark's Finest
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9023.Text: Action: Exhaust and discard The Riddermark's Finest to place 2 progress tokens on any location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9024.Name: The Shores of Nen Hithoel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9024.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack resolves, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801204c9024.Text: Travel: The first player must discard 1 event card from his hand to travel to this location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9001.Name: A Wisp of Pale Sheen
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9001.Text:
When Revealed: Place 2 resource tokens on Gollum. Any player may exhaust a Î hero to reduce this effect to 1 resource token.

Escape: 4

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9002.Name: Boromir
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9002.Text:
Action: Raise your threat by 1 to ready Boromir.

Action: Discard Boromir to deal 2 damage to each enemy engaged with a single player.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9003.Name: Dúnedain Cache
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9003.Text:
Attached hero gains ranged.

Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Cache to another hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9004.Name: Dúnedain Watcher
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9004.Text: Response: Discard Dunedain Watcher from play to cancel the shadow effects of a card just triggered.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9005.Name: Elfhelm
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9005.Text: While Elfhelm is ready, he gains: "Response: After your threat is raised as the result of questing unsuccessfully, or by an encounter or quest card effect, reduce your threat by 1."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9006.Name: Fast Hitch
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9006.Text: Action: Exhaust Fast Hitch to ready attached character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9007.Name: Fens and Mires
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9007.Text:
Forced: After the players travel to this location, place 1 resource token on Gollum.

Escape: 2

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9008.Name: Giant Marsh Worm
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9008.Text:
Forced: Remove 2 damage from Giant Marsh Worm at the end of each round.

Escape: 2

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9009.Name: Gollum
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9009.Text:
If Gollum ever has 8 or more resource tokens on him, shuffle him back into the encounter deck.

Forced: At the end of the quest phase, the party must make an escape test, dealing 1 card per player from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 2 resource tokens on Gollum.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9010.Name: Impassable Bog
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9010.Text:
When Revealed: Place 1 resource token on Gollum for each location card in the staging area.

Escape: 2

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9011.Name: Into the Marshes
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9011.Text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck, then reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9013.Name: Nightfall
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9013.Text:
When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 1 resource token on Gollum and raise each player's threat by 2.

Escape: 2

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9014.Name: Silvan Tracker
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9014.Text: Response: After a Silvan character readies during the refresh phase, heal 1 damage from that character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9015.Name: Song of Battle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9015.Text: Attached hero gains a Ï resource icon.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9016.Name: Song of Mocking
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9016.Text: Action: Exhaust Song of Mocking to choose another hero. Until the end of the phase, attached hero takes all damage assigned to the chosen hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9017.Name: The Capture
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9017.Text:
Forced: After this stage is defeated, the first player chooses a player. That player must pass an Escape test, dealing 1 card from the encounter deck for each resource token on Gollum, to capture him. If Gollum is not captured at this time, reset the quest deck to stage 1B.

If this final Escape test is passed, the players have captured Gollum and won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9019.Name: The Heart of the Marshes
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9019.Text:
While The Heart of the Marshes is the active location, all cards dealt from the encounter deck for escape tests get +1 Escape. (Cards receive this bonus even if they do not have a printed escape value.)

Escape: 1

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9020.Name: The Lights of the Dead
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9020.Text:
When Revealed: Each player must make an escape test, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck for each test. Each player that fails this test places 1 resource token on Gollum, and raises his threat by 1.

Escape: 5

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9021.Name: Through the Mist
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9021.Text:
When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test counting Û instead of Ò, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 1 resource token on Gollum and raise each player's threat by 1.

Escape: 3

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9022.Name: Vassal of the Windlord
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9022.Text:
Vassal of the Windlord cannot have restricted attachments.

Forced: After an attack in which Vassal of the Windlord attacked resolves, discard Vassal of the Windlord from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9023.Name: We Do Not Sleep
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801205c9023.Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, Rohan characters do not exhaust to commit to quests.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9001.Name: Ambush
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9001.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of the combat phase, all enemies in play engage the player guarding Gollum.

Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any enemies in play. If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9003.Name: Astonishing Speed
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9003.Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all Rohan characters get +2 Ò.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9004.Name: Attercop, Attercop
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9004.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Attercop, Attercop automatically engages the player guarding Gollum, regardless of his threat.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9005.Name: Dáin Ironfoot
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9005.Text: While Dain Ironfoot is ready, Dwarf characters get +1 Û and +1 Ò.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9006.Name: Dawn Take You All
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9006.Text:
Play after shadow cards have been dealt, before any attacks have resolved.

Combat Action: Each player may choose and discard 1 facedown shadow card from an enemy with which he is engaged.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9007.Name: Dry Watercourse
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9007.Text: While Dry Watercourse is the active location, all treachery card effects that target the player guarding Gollum also target each other player.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9008.Name: Dúnedain Signal
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9008.Text:
Attached hero gains sentinel.

Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Signal to another hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9009.Name: Eagles of the Misty Mountains
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9009.Text:
Eagles of the Misty Mountains cannot have restricted attachments. Eagles of the Misty Mountains gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for each facedown attachment it has.

Response: After another Eagle character leaves play, you may attach that card facedown to Eagles of the Misty Mountains.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9010.Name: Escape Attempt
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9010.Text:
The player guarding Gollum cannot commit characters to this quest (unless he is the only player remaining in the game).

If the players quest unsuccessfully, Gollum escapes and the players have lost the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9012.Name: Gollum
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9012.Text:
Damage from undefended attacks against you must be dealt to Gollum. If Gollum is destroyed, or if the player guarding Gollum is eliminated, the players have lost the game.

Forced: At the end of each round, raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 3. Then, that player may choose a new player to guard Gollum.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9013.Name: Gollum's Anguish
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9013.Shadow: Shadow: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 4.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9013.Text: When Revealed: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 8. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9014.Name: Gollum's Bite
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9014.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9014.Text: When Revealed: Deal 4 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9015.Name: Mirkwood Bats
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9015.Text: Forced: After Mirkwood Bats engages a player, deal 1 damage to each character controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9016.Name: Mirkwood Runner
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9016.Text: While Mirkwood Runner is attacking alone, the defending enemy does not count its Ú.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9017.Name: Rumour from the Earth
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9017.Text: Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may pay 1 Î resource to return Rumour from the Earth to your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9018.Name: Shadow of the Past
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9018.Text: Action: Move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9019.Name: Support of the Eagles
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9019.Text: Action: Exhaust Support of the Eagles to choose an Eagle ally. Until the end of the phase, attached hero adds that ally's Û or Ú (choose 1) to its own.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9020.Name: The Spider's Ring
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9020.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, return any current active location to the staging area. The Spider's Ring becomes the active location.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9020.Text: While The Spider's Ring is the active location, the player guarding Gollum cannot change.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9021.Name: Through the Forest
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9021.Text: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum. Choose a player to guard Gollum at the start of the game, and place Gollum in front of that player. Then shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9023.Name: To the Elvin King's Halls
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9023.Text: The player guarding Gollum cannot play cards from his hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9025.Name: Wasted Provisions
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9025.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the top 5 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9025.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top 10 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9026.Name: West Road Traveller
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9026.Text: Response: After you play West Road Traveller from your hand, switch the active location with any other location in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9027.Name: Wood Elf Path
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9027.Text: Response: After the players travel to Wood Elf Path, the player guarding Gollum may choose a new player to guard him.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9028.Name: Woodman's Glade
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801206c9028.Text:
Travel: The player guarding Gollum must exhaust a hero he controls to travel to Woodman's Glade.

Response: After exploring Woodman's Glade, reduce the threat of each player not guarding Gollum by 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9001.Name: A Foe Beyond
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9001.Shadow: Shadow: Deal damage equal to The Nameless Fear's Û to the defending character.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9001.Text: When Revealed: The last player deals damage equal to The Nameless Fear's attack to a hero he controls. This effect cannot be canceled.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9002.Name: A Presence in the Dark
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9002.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area. Then, add A Presence in the Dark to your victory display.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9004.Name: A Way Up
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9004.Text:
Heroes do not collect resources during the resource phase.

If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9006.Name: Abandoned Tools
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9006.Text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective if it has no encounters attached. Then, attach Abandoned Tools to that hero. (If detached, return Abandoned Tools to the staging area.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9007.Name: Ancestral Knowledge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9007.Text: Action: Exhaust a Dwarf character to place 2 progress tokens on the active location. (4 progress tokens instead if it is an Underground or Mountain location.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9008.Name: Bifur
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9008.Text: Action: Pay 1 resource from a hero's resource pool to add 1 resource to Bifur's resource pool. Any player may trigger this ability. (Limit once per round.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9009.Name: Bitter Wind
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9009.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must discard 2 resources from each hero he controls.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9009.Text: When Revealed: The first player must discard 3 resources from each hero he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9010.Name: Black Uruks
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9010.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, deal 2 additional shadow cards to attacking enemy.
