51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9010.Text: When Revealed: The first player must choose and discard an attachment from a questing character, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9011.Name: Book of Mazarbul
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9011.Text:
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then, attach Book of Mazarbul to that hero. (If detached, return Book of Mazarbul to the staging area.)

Attached hero cannot attack and does not exhaust to commit to a quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9012.Keywords: Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9012.Name: Boots from Erebor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9012.Text:
Limit 1 Boots from Erebor per character.

Attached character gets +1 hit point.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9013.Name: Branching Paths
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9013.Text:
While Branching Paths is in the staging area, each Dark location gets +1 $.

Forced: After Branching Paths leaves play as an explored location, look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Players must choose 1 of those to reveal and add to the staging area, moving the other 2 to the bottom of the deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9014.Name: Bridge of Khazad-dûm
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9014.Text: While Bridge of Khazad-dûm is the active location, players cannot play cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9015.Name: Burning Low
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9015.Text: When Revealed: Each enemy and location currently in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase. (+3 $ instead if it is a Dark location.) Players may exhaust a Cave Torch to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9016.Name: Cave In
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9016.Text: When Revealed: Remove all progress tokens from the current quest card and active location. If Cave In removed no progress tokens, it gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9017.Name: Cave Torch
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9017.Text:
Action: Exhaust Cave Torch to place up to 3 progress tokens on a Dark location.

Forced: After Cave Torch exhausts, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9018.Name: Cave-troll
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9018.Text: For each excess point of combat damage dealt by Cave-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) you must damage another character you control.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9019.Name: Chance Encounter
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9019.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if engaged with the first player.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9019.Text: When Revealed: Put the top enemy in the encounter discard pile into play, engaged with the first player. If this effect put no enemies into play, Chance Encounter gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9020.Name: Chieftain of the Pit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9020.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy attacks again after this attack. Deal it another shadow card for the next attack.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9020.Text: When Revealed: Chieftain of the Pit gets +3 Û until the end of the round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9021.Name: Crumbling Ruin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9021.Text: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust a character and discard the top card of his deck, if able. If the printed cost of the discarded card is equal to or higher than the remaining hit points of the exhausted character, discard the exhausted character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9022.Name: Dark and Dreadful
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9022.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character. (Attacking enemy gets +2 Û instead if this attack is undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9022.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. (2 damage instead if the active location is a Dark location.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9023.Name: Dreadful Gap
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9023.Text:
When Revealed: Immediately travel to Dreadful Gap. If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.

X is the number of characters in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9024.Name: Durin's Song
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9024.Text: Action: Choose a Dwarf hero. That hero gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú until the end of the round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9025.Name: Dwalin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9025.Text: Response: After Dwalin attacks and destroys an Orc enemy, lower your threat by 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9026.Keywords: Attach to a Dwarf character. Restricted.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9026.Name: Dwarrowdelf Axe
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9026.Text:
Attached character gets +1 Û.

Response: After attached character attacks, deal 1 damage to the defending enemy.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9027.Name: East-gate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9027.Text:
Players cannot optionally engage enemies and no engagement checks are made.

Forced: After East-gate leaves play as an explored location, add First Hall to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9028.Name: Entering the Mines
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9028.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area.

Players cannot advance to the next stage of the scenario unless Bridge of Khazad-dum is in their victory display.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9030.Name: Erebor Record Keeper
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9030.Text:
Erebor Record Keeper cannot attack or defend.

Action: Exhaust Erebor Record Keeper and pay 1 Î resource to choose and ready a Dwarf character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9031.Name: Ever Onward
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9031.Text: Response: After players quest unsuccessfully, choose a player. That player does not raise his threat.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9032.Name: First Hall
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9032.Text:
Travel: Each player must raise his threat by 3 to travel here.

Forced: After First Hall leaves play as an explored location, add Bridge of Khazad-dum to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9033.Name: Fouled Well
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9033.Text: When Revealed: Each player may choose and discard 1 card at random from his hand. If all players did not discard 1 card, Fouled Well gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9034.Keywords: Players cannot optionally engage Goblin Archer.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9034.Name: Goblin Archer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9034.Text:
Characters with ranged are eligible to attack Goblin Archer while it is in the staging area.

Forced: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, the first player must deal 1 damage to 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9035.Name: Goblin Follower
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9035.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if attacking the last player.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9035.Text: When Revealed: Goblin Follower engages the last player.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9036.Name: Goblin Patrol
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9036.Text:
When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 enemy of his choice, and add it to the staging area. One choice must be Patrol Leader, if able.

Forced: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, discard it instead of adding it to the staging area.

If there are no enemies in play, immediately advance to the next stage of the scenario. (Players can also advance by placing 11 progress tokens on Goblin Patrol.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9038.Name: Goblin Scout
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9038.Text: Each player with a threat of 25 or higher cannot optionally engage Goblin Scout.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9039.Name: Goblin Spearman
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9039.Shadow: Shadow: Add Goblin Spearman to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9039.Text: Goblin Spearman gets +2 Û if its attack is undefended.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9040.Name: Goblin Swordsman
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9040.Shadow: Shadow: Add Goblin Swordsman to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9040.Text: Goblin Swordsman gets +2 Û if its attack is undefended.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9041.Name: Goblin Tunnels
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9041.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if attacking enemy is a Goblin.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9041.Text: While Goblin Tunnels is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a Goblin is revealed from the encounter deck, remove a progress token from the current quest card."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9042.Name: Great Cave-troll
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9042.Text: No attachments can be played on Great Cave-troll.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9043.Name: Hidden Threat
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9043.Text: When Revealed: Each player must raise his threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area. Then, the last player discards an attachment he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9044.Name: Khazâd! Khazâd!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9044.Text: Action: Choose a Dwarf character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 Û.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9045.Name: Knees of the Mountain
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9045.Text: While Knees of the Mountain is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After an enemy engages a player, it gets +1 Û until the end of the round."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9046.Name: Lightless Passage
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9046.Shadow: Shadow: Cancel all combat damage dealt to attacking enemy.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9046.Text: Travel: Players must exhaust a Cave Torch to travel here.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9047.Name: Many Roads
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9047.Text: When Revealed: Shuffle all locations in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9048.Name: Massing in the Deep
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9048.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +X Û. X is the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9048.Text: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area. X is the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9049.Name: Mountain Warg
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9049.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if a Mountain is the active location.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9049.Text: If Mountain Warg is dealt a shadow card with no effect, return Mountain Warg to the staging area after it attacks.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9050.Name: Narvi's Belt
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9050.Text: Action: Exhaust Narvi's Belt to give attached hero a Ì, Î, Ï, or Ê icon until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9051.Name: New Devilry
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9051.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, raise your threat by The Nameless Fear's $.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9051.Text: When Revealed: If the players are not on stage 1, shuffle the current quest card into the quest deck, then reveal a new quest card. Otherwise, New Devilry gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9052.Name: Orc Drummer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9052.Text: While Orc Drummer is in the staging area, each enemy gets +X $. X is the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9053.Name: Orc Horn Blower
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9053.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9054.Name: Patrol Leader
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9054.Shadow: Shadow: Cancel all damage dealt to this enemy.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9054.Text: Forced: Before Patrol Leader is dealt damage, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is an enemy, cancel that damage.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9055.Name: Plundered Armoury
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9055.Text:
While Plundered Armoury is in the staging area, enemies get +1 Û.

Response: After Plundered Armoury leaves play as an explored location, each player may attach a Weapon or Armour attachment from his hand to 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9056.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9056.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9058.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9058.Text:
When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 of the following:
• Each player discards 1 card from the top of the encounter deck. If the card is a treachery card, the discarding player is eliminated from the game.
• Reveals the next quest card, putting Blocked by Shadow on the bottom of the quest deck.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase. If the players defeat this stage, they escape and win the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9060.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9060.Text:
Abandoned Tools gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust attached hero to put a progress token on Escape from Darkness."

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

Progress tokens cannot be placed on Escape from Darkness except by Abandoned Tools. If the players defeat this stage, they escape and win the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9062.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9062.Text: When Revealed: Shuffle all copies of A Foe Beyond from the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck. Reveal the top 2 cards of the quest deck. Choose 1 to become the active quest (flipped to side 2B) and put the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Then, add Hasty Council to your victory display.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9064.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9064.Text:
Forced: If Heading Up is in the player's victory display at the end of any quest phase, shuffle Heading Up back into the quest deck.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9066.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9066.Text:
Forced: If Heading Down is in the player's victory display at the end of any quest phase, shuffle Heading Down back into the quest deck.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9068.Name: Search for an Exit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9068.Text:
When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 questing character he controls. Each questing character not chosen does not count its Ò until the end of the turn.

Forced: After placing the 1st progress token on Narrow Paths, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Abandoned Tools and add it to the staging area, if able.

Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9070.Name: Search for the Chamber
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9070.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9072.Name: Shadow of Fear
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9072.Text: When Revealed: The first player attaches Shadow of Fear to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot exhaust or ready and its text box is treated as if it were blank. Action: Pay 3 resources from attached hero's pool to discard this card.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9073.Name: Signs of Conflict
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9073.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9074.Name: Stairs of Náin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9074.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9074.Text: Travel: The first player must exhaust 1 character he controls to travel here.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9075.Name: Stray Goblin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9075.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +X Û. X is the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9075.Text: X is the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9076.Name: Sudden Pitfall
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9076.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the defending character from play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9076.Text: When Revealed: The first player must discard 1 questing character he controls, if able. This effect cannot be canceled.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9077.Name: The Fate of Balin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9077.Text:
When Revealed: Remove Book of Mazarbul from the game.

Forced: At the end of the staging step, reveal the top X cards of the encounter deck, adding all enemies to the staging area. Discard the other revealed cards without resolving them. X is the number of players.

If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9079.Name: The Mountains' Roots
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9079.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +X Û. X is the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9079.Text: X is the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9080.Name: The Nameless Fear
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9080.Text:
The Nameless Fear cannot engage or be engaged.

X is the number of victory points in the victory display.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9081.Name: Turbulent Waters
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9081.Text: While Turbulent Waters is the active location, players cannot optionally engage enemies.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9082.Name: Undisturbed Bones
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9082.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character is an ally, discard it from play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9082.Text: When Revealed: Each player must deal X damage to 1 ally he controls. X is the number of allies he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9083.Name: Untroubled by Darkness
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9083.Text: Action: Each Dwarf character gets +1 Ò until the end of the phase. (+2 Ò instead if the active location is an Underground or Dark location.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9085.Name: Veteran of Nanduhirion
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9085.Text: Veteran of Nanduhirion enters play with 1 damage on it.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9086.Name: Warg Lair
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9086.Text:
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Mountain Warg and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Response: After Warg Lair leaves play as an explored location, each player draws 1 card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9087.Name: Watchful Eyes
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9087.Text: When Revealed: The first player attaches Watchful Eyes to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Forced: If attached hero is exhausted at the end of the combat phase, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9088.Name: Zigil Miner
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9088.Text: Action: Exhaust Zigil Miner and name a number to discard the top 2 cards of your deck. If at least one of those cards has cost equal to the named number, choose a hero you control. For each card that matches the named number, add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9089.Name: Zigil Mineshaft
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801207c9089.Text: Action: Raise each player's threat by 1 to place 1 progress token on Zigil Mineshaft.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9001.Name: Along the Misty Mountains
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9001.Text: Setup: Put Arwen Undómiel into play under the control of the first player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add them to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9003.Name: Approaching Rivendell
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9003.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add it to the staging area.

Characters cannot be healed.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9005.Name: Arwen Undómiel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9005.Text:
The first player gains control of Arwen Undómiel, as an ally.

Response: After Arwen Undómiel exhausts, choose a hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

If Arwen Undómiel leaves play, the players are defeated.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9006.Name: Barren Hills
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9006.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9006.Text: While Barren Hills is the active location, ignore ambush.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9007.Name: Bombur
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9007.Text: Action: Exhaust Bombur to choose a location. That location gets -1 $ until the end of the phase. (That location does not contribute its $ instead if it is an Underground location.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9008.Name: Crebain
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9008.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9008.Text: While Crebain is in the staging area, encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9010.Name: Elladan
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9010.Text:
While Elrohir is in play, Elladan gets +2 Û.

Response: After Elladan is declared as an attacker, pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9011.Name: Followed by Night
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9011.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9011.Text: When Revealed: The first player (choose 1): deals 1 damage to all allies in play and Followed by Night gains surge, or all enemies engaged with players make an immediate attack, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9012.Name: Goblin Gate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9012.Text: While Goblin Gate is the active location, the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round gains ambush. If that enemy engages a player, it makes an immediate attack (deal and resolve a shadow card).

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9013.Name: Goblin Taskmaster
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9013.Text: Forced: After Goblin Taskmaster engages a player, that player deals 2 damage to 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9014.Name: Hail of Stones
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9014.Text: Action: Exhaust X characters to deal X damage to an enemy in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9016.Name: Orc Ambush
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9016.Text: When Revealed: All Orc enemies in the staging area engage the first player. If there are no Orc enemies in the staging area, return all Orc enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9017.Name: Orc Outpost
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9017.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Goblin Gate and add it to the staging area, if able. Then, if there is no active location, Goblin Gate becomes the active location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9019.Name: Orc Raiders
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9019.Text: Forced: After Orc Raiders engages a player, that player discards 2 attachments he controls, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9020.Name: Out of the Wild
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9020.Text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for any 1 non-objective card worth no victory points and add it to your victory display. Shuffle the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9021.Name: Pathless Country
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9021.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each ally in play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9021.Text: Forced: After at least 1 progress token is placed on Pathless Country, remove 1 progress token from it.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9022.Name: Rider of the Mark
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9022.Text:
Action: Spend 1 Ê resource to give control of Rider of the Mark to another player. (Limit once per round.)

Response: After Rider of the Mark changes control, discard a shadow card dealt to an enemy you are engaged with.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9023.Keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. Restricted.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9023.Name: Rivendell Blade
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9023.Text: When attached character attacks an enemy, that enemy gets -2 Ú until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9024.Name: Ruined Road
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9024.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9024.Text: Response: After you travel to Ruined Road, the first player places 2 progress tokens on it or readies 1 hero he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9025.Name: Sleeping Sentry
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9025.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must discard all exhausted characters he controls.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9025.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. Then, exhaust all ready characters.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9026.Name: Song of Eärendil
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9026.Text:
Response: After Song of Earendil enters play, draw 1 card.

Response: After another player raises his threat, raise your threat by 1 to reduce that player's threat by 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9027.Name: The End Comes
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9027.Text: Response: After a Dwarf character leaves play, shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9028.Name: Wild Bear
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801209c9028.Text: Forced: After Wild Bear engages a player, it makes an immediate attack.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9001.Name: Aragorn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9001.Text: Refresh Action: Reduce your threat to your starting threat level. (Limit once per game.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9002.Name: Arwen Undómiel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9002.Text: Response: After Arwen Undómiel exhausts, choose a character. That character gains sentinel and gets +1 Ú until the end of the round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9004.Name: Doors of Durin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9004.Text:
Progress tokens that would be placed on Doors of Durin are instead placed on the current quest card.

Action: Each player may discard any number of cards from his hand. Then, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the first letter of the encounter card's title matches that of one of the discarded player cards, add Doors of Durin to your victory display. (Limit once per round.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9005.Name: Elrond's Counsel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9005.Text: Action: If you control a unique Noldor character, give another character +1 Ò until the end of the phase and lower your threat by 3.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9006.Name: Grasping Tentacle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9006.Text: Forced: When Grasping Tentacle is attacked, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy, attach this card to an attacking character as a Tentacle attachment with the text: "Attached character's Û and Ú are reduced to 0."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9007.Name: Grave Cairn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9007.Text: Response: After a character leaves play, add its Û to another character's Û until the end of the round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9008.Name: Ill Purpose
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9008.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if it is a Tentacle.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9008.Text: When Revealed: All enemies in the staging area engage the player with the highest threat. Then, each player raises his threat by the total $ of all cards in the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9009.Name: Legacy of Durin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9009.Text: Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, draw 1 card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9010.Name: Makeshift Passage
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9010.Text: Forced: After you travel to Makeshift Passage, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest card, bypassing any active location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9011.Name: Perilous Swamp
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9011.Shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9011.Text: No more than 1 progress token can be placed on Perilous Swamp each round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9012.Name: Resourceful
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9012.Text:
Attach to a hero you control.

Attached hero collects 1 additional resource during the resource phase each round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9013.Name: Rivendell Bow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9013.Text:
Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character, or to Aragorn. Limit 1 per character.

Attached character gains ranged.

If attached character has a printed ranged keyword, it gets +1 Û during a ranged attack.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9014.Name: Short Cut
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9014.Text: Response: After a location enters play, exhaust a Hobbit character to shuffle that location back into the encounter deck. Then, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9015.Name: Stagnant Creek
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9015.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is a Tentacle enemy, add that card to the staging area and raise each player's threat by 5.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9016.Name: Stair Falls
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9016.Shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9016.Text: Travel: The first player must exhaust 2 characters to travel here.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9017.Name: Striking Tentacle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9017.Text: Forced: When Striking Tentacle attacks, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy, this attack is considered undefended.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9018.Name: Sword that was Broken
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9018.Text:
Attached hero gains a Ì resource icon.

If attached hero is Aragorn, each character you control gets +1 Ò.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9019.Name: The Seething Lake
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9019.Text:
When Revealed: Add The Watcher to the staging area. Doors of Durin becomes the active location, moving any previous active location to the staging area. Shuffle all Tentacle cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

If the players have at least 3 victory points and defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9021.Name: The Watcher
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9021.Text:
While there is another Tentacle enemy in play, The Watcher cannot be optionally engaged.

If The Watcher is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase, each player must deal 3 damage to 1 character he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9022.Name: Thrashing Tentacle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9022.Text: Forced: When Thrashing Tentacle is attacked, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy, deal the damage from the attack to 1 character an attacking player controls (ignoring defense).

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9023.Name: To the West-door
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9023.Text: When Revealed: Reveal cards from the encounter deck and add them to the staging area until there is at least X $ in the staging area. X is twice the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9025.Name: Watcher of the Bruinen
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9025.Text:
Watcher of the Bruinen does not exhaust to defend.

Forced: After Watcher of the Bruinen defends, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9026.Name: Wrapped!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801210c9026.Text: When Revealed: The first player attaches Wrapped! to a hero he controls. (Counts as a Tentacle attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot exhaust or ready. At the end of the round, discard attached hero from play. Combat Action: Exhaust a hero you control without a Tentacle attachment to discard Wrapped!.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9001.Name: Abandoned Mine
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9001.Text: Lost: Return the top 2 Goblin enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9002.Name: Cave Spider
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9002.Text:
When Revealed: The first player draws 1 card. Then, that player must choose and discard 4 cards from his hand, if able.

Forced: After Cave Spider engages a player, that player must choose and discard 1 card from his hand, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9003.Name: Continuing Eastward
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9003.Text:
When Revealed: The first player makes a locate test. If this test is failed, reveal cards from the encounter deck equal to the number of players in the game and add them to the staging area. Then, trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

If the players quest unsuccessfully, trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9005.Name: Durin's Greaves
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9005.Text:
When Revealed: The first player attaches Durin's Greaves to a hero of his choice as an attachment.

Attached hero gets +1 Ú.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9006.Name: Dwarven Forge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9006.Text: Lost: Each player must choose and discard 1 card from his hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9007.Name: Erebor Battle Master
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9007.Text: Erebor Battle Master gets +1 Û for each other Dwarf ally you control.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9008.Name: Erestor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9008.Text: Action: Choose and discard 1 card from your hand to draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9009.Name: Ever My Heart Rises
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9009.Text: Response: After you travel to a Mountain or Underground location, ready attached character and reduce your threat by 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9010.Name: Fatigue
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9010.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player must exhaust 1 character he controls, if able.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9010.Text: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust 1 character he controls, if able. Then, if any player controls no unexhausted characters, Fatigue gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9011.Name: Foul Air
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9011.Text: When Revealed: The first player makes a locate test. If this test is failed, deal 2 damage to all characters and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9012.Name: Fresh Tracks
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9012.Text: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area, deal 1 damage to that enemy. Players ignore that enemy while making engagement checks this round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9013.Name: Gathering Ground
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9013.Text: When Revealed: Attach this card to a location in the staging area with the highest combined threat and remaining quest points. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Each enemy revealed from the encounter deck gains surge.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9014.Name: Goblin Sneak
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9014.Shadow: Shadow: Add Goblin Sneak to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9014.Text: Forced: After Goblin Sneak engages a player, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If it is a treachery card, Goblin Sneak engages the next player, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9015.Name: Goblin Warlord
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9015.Shadow: Shadow: Trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9015.Text: Lost: Each player must choose and discard 1 ally he controls from play, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9016.Name: Hama
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9016.Text: Response: After Hama is declared as an attacker, return a Ï event from your discard pile to your hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9017.Name: Journey in the Black Pit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9017.Text:
When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard X locations, where X is one less than the number of players in the game (minimum of 1). Add those locations to the staging area, and shuffle the other discarded cards back into the encounter deck.

Each location gets +1 $. If the players quest unsuccessfully, trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9019.Keywords: Attach to a Î hero. Limit 1 per hero.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9019.Name: Love of Tales
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9019.Text: Response: After a Song card is played, add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9020.Name: Out of Sight
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9020.Text: Action: Enemies engaged with you cannot attack you this phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9021.Keywords: Attach to a Dwarf or Hobbit character. Restricted.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9021.Name: Ring Mail
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9021.Text: Attached character gets +1 hit point and +1 Ú.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9022.Name: Rock Adder
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9022.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, the defending player must discard 1 character he controls from play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9022.Text: Rock Adder cannot be attacked unless it has dealt at least 1 damage this round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9024.Name: Twisting Passage
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9024.Text: Forced: Before placing progress tokens on Twisting Passage, the first player must make a locate test. If this test is failed, do not place any progress tokens on Twisting Passage and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9025.Name: Vast and Intricate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9025.Text: When Revealed: The first player makes a locate test. If this test is failed, raise each player's threat by 7, remove all progress tokens from play, and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9026.Name: Warden of Healing
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9026.Text: Action: Exhaust Warden of Healing to heal 1 damage on up to 2 different characters. Then, you may pay 2 Î resources to ready Warden of Healing.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9027.Name: Word of Command
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801211c9027.Text: Action: Exhaust an Istari character to search your deck for 1 card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9001.Keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9001.Name: Asfaloth
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9001.Text: Action: Exhaust Asfaloth to place 1 progress token on any location. (2 tokens instead if attached hero is Glorfindel.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9002.Name: Below the Mines
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9002.Text:
When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Reveal 4 cards from the encounter deck and add them to your staging area.

Forced: After the 5th progress token is placed on Old One Lair, join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player, all players continue on to stage 5 together.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9004.Name: Below the Mines
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9004.Text:
When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Reveal 2 cards from the encounter deck and add them to your staging area.

Forced: After the 11th progress token is placed on Sheltered Rocks, join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player, all players continue on to stage 5 together.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9006.Name: Below the Mines
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9006.Text:
When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Discard all resources from your heroes.

Forced: After the 17th progress token is placed on The Endless Caves, join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player, all players continue on to stage 5 together.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9008.Name: Below the Mines
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9008.Text:
When Revealed: Create your own staging area. Discard your hand. Reveal 2 cards from the encounter deck and add them to your staging area.

Forced: After the 7th progress token is placed on The Shivering Bank, join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player, all players continue on to stage 5 together.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9010.Name: Daeron's Runes
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9010.Text: Action: Draw 2 cards. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9011.Name: Deep Deep Dark
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9011.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Nameless, the defending player must discard his hand.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9011.Text: When Revealed: Attach 1 card from the top of the first player's deck to each Nameless enemy in play, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9012.Name: Drowned Treasury
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9012.Text:
If Drowned Treasury is the active location at the end of the quest phase, each player must discard 1 character he controls.

Response: After Drowned Treasury leaves play as an explored location, each player may draw 2 cards or claim 1 objective in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9013.Name: Durin's Axe
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9013.Text:
Attached hero gets +3 Û. If attached hero is a Dwarf, it gets +1 Ò.

Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then, attach Durin's Axe to that hero as an attachment.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9014.Name: Durin's Helm
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9014.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 Ú. If attached hero is a Dwarf, it gets +2 hit points.

Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective. Then, attach Durin's Helm to that hero as an attachment.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9015.Name: Elder Nameless Thing
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9015.Text:
Forced: After Elder Nameless Thing engages a player, attach the top 3 cards of that player's deck to it.

X is the printed cost of all attached cards on this card. If there are no cards attached, X is 4.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9016.Name: Glorfindel
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9016.Text: Forced: After Glorfindel exhausts to commit to a quest, raise your threat by 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9017.Name: Healing Herbs
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9017.Text: Action: Discard Healing Herbs and exhaust attached hero to heal all damage on 1 character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9018.Name: Heavy Stroke
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9018.Text: Response: After a Dwarf deals X damage to an enemy during combat, deal an additional X damage to that enemy. (Limit once per phase.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9019.Name: Imladris Stargazer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9019.Text: Action: Exhaust Imladris Stargazer to choose a player. That player looks at the top 5 cards of his deck and then returns them to the top of his deck in any order.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9020.Keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9020.Name: Light of Valinor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9020.Text: Attached hero does not exhaust to commit to a quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9021.Name: Longbeard Elder
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9021.Text: Response: After Longbeard Elder commits to a quest, look at the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a location, place 1 progress token on the current quest. Otherwise, Longbeard Elder gets -1 Ò until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9022.Name: Lost and Alone
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9022.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Nameless, the defending player must discard his hand.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9022.Text: When Revealed: Each player chooses and shuffles a hero he controls into his deck. When he draws that hero, he puts it into play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9023.Name: Mithril Lode
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9023.Text: While Mithril Lode is the active location, it gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust a character you control to place X progress tokens on the current quest card, bypassing any active location. X is the exhausted character's Ò. (Limit once per round.)"

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9024.Name: Moria Bats
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9024.Text:
Only characters with ranged can attack or defend against Moria Bats.

While Moria Bats is engaged with a player, it gets +1 Û for each other enemy engaged with that player.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9025.Name: Nameless Thing
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9025.Text:
Forced: After Nameless Thing engages a player, attach the top 2 cards of that player's deck to it.

X is the printed cost of all attached cards on this card. If there are no cards attached, X is 3.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9026.Name: Out of the Depths
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9026.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add it to the staging area.

Each player cannot commit more allies to the quest than the number of heroes he is also committing to the quest.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9028.Keywords: Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a location.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9028.Name: Path of Need
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9028.Text: Heroes do not exhaust to attack, defend, or commit to a quest while attached location is the active location.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9029.Name: The Dripping Walls
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9029.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player, and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9031.Name: The Water's Edge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9031.Text: Forced: After a player commits characters to the quest, he must discard the top 2 cards of his deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9033.Name: Trollshaw Scout
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9033.Text:
Trollshaw Scout does not exhaust to attack.

Forced: After Trollshaw Scout attacks, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9034.Name: Washed Away!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801212c9034.Text: When Revealed: Discard all Item, Armor, Weapon, Light cards and all encounter deck cards from play. Shuffle all enemy and treachery cards in the encounter discard pile together with the Foundations of Stone encounter set. This deck becomes the new encounter deck. remove all other encounter deck cards from the game. Then, starting with the first player, each player draws a random stage 4 quest card. Remove all other stage 4 quest cards from the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9001.Name: Counter-Spell
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9001.Text: When Revealed: Attach Counter-spell to Durin's Bane. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: When a player plays an event, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a treachery card, cancel the effects of the event, discard the event player's hand, and discard Counter-spell from play.")

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9002.Name: Dark Pit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9002.Text: While Dark Pit is the active location it gains: "Refresh Action: Exhaust X characters (maximum 3) you control to discard the top X cards of your deck. If all discarded cards have a higher combined printed cost than the remaining hit points of Durin's Bane, discard Durin's Bane from play."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9003.Name: Durin's Bane
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9003.Text:
Players cannot play attachments on Durin's Bane.

Durin's Bane cannot leave the staging area, is considered to be engaged with each player whose threat is 1 or greater, and attacks each of those players in turn during the combat phase (deal and discard a new shadow card each attack).

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9004.Name: Elrond
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9004.Text:
You may spend resources from Elrond's resource pool to pay for Ê, Ì, and Ï allies.

Response: After a character is healed by another card effect, heal 1 damage on it.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9005.Name: Fiery Sword
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9005.Text: When Revealed: Attach Fiery Sword to Durin's Bane as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Attached enemy gets +3 Û."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9006.Name: Fires in the Deep
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9006.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player discards 1 ally he controls, if able.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9006.Text: When Revealed: Each player must discard 1 ally he controls, if able. If Fires in the Deep discarded no allies, it gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9007.Name: Hands Upon the Bow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9007.Text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with ranged to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against an enemy in the staging area. It gets +1 Û during this attack.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9008.Name: Hardy Leadership
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9008.Text: Each Dwarf character gets +1 hit point.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9009.Name: Inner Flame
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9009.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Durin's Bane, it gets +3 Û.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9009.Text: When Revealed: Durin's Bane gets +3 Û until the end of the round. The first player may remove 1 questing hero he controls from the quest to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9010.Name: Inner Shadow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9010.Text: When Revealed: Heal 5 damage from Durin's Bane, if able. The first player may remove 1 questing hero he controls from the quest to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9011.Name: Last Lord of Moria
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9011.Text:
When Revealed: Durin's Bane makes an immediate attack on the first player. Add Dark Pit to the staging area.

Players cannot win the game while Durin's Bane is in play. If Durin's Bane leaves play by the effect on Dark Pit, the players have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9013.Name: Leaping Flame
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9013.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Durin's Bane, it gets +3 Û.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9013.Text: When Revealed: Durin's Bane makes an immediate attack against the first player (deal and resolve a shadow card).

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9014.Name: Many Thonged Whip
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9014.Text: When Revealed: Attach Many Thonged Whip to Durin's Bane as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Forced: When Durin's Bane attacks, the defending player must discard 1 card at random from his hand."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9015.Name: Master of the Forge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9015.Text: Action: Exhaust Master of the Forge to search the top 5 cards of your deck for any 1 attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9016.Name: Miruvor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9016.Text: Action: Discard Miruvor to (choose two): ready attached hero, add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool, attached hero gets +1 Ò until the end of the round, or put Miruvor on the top of your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9017.Name: Nearing the Gate
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9017.Text: When Revealed: Reduce each player's threat to 0. Reveal X cards from the encounter deck, where X is one less than the number of players in the game, and add them to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9019.Name: O Elbereth! Gilthonial!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9019.Text: Response: After an enemy attacks you, put that enemy on the bottom of the encounter deck. If your threat is lower than that enemy's engagement cost, set your threat equal to the engagement cost of that enemy.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9020.Name: Peace, and Thought
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9020.Text: Refresh Action: Exhaust 2 heroes to draw 5 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9021.Name: Ranging Goblin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9021.Text:
When Revealed: Each player must deal 1 damage to a hero he controls.

Forced: After a character leaves play, shuffle Ranging Goblin and the top card in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9022.Name: Risk Some Light
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9022.Text: Action: Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. You may select 1 card and move it to the bottom of the encounter deck. Return any unselected cards to the top of the encounter deck, in any order.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9023.Name: Second Deep
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9023.Text: While Durin's Bane has no damage on it, progress tokens cannot be placed on Second Deep.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9024.Name: Second Hall
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9024.Text: While Second Hall is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a character leaves play, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9025.Name: The Rear Guard
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9025.Text:
Forced: If at least 1 hero committed to the quest this round, place 4 progress tokens on The Rear Guard (bypassing any active location) at the end of the quest phase.

If Durin's Bane has 0 hit points, advance to the next stage of the scenario immediately.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9027.Keywords: Attach to Elrond. He gains a Ê resource icon.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9027.Name: Vilya
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9027.Text: Action: Exhaust Elrond and Vilya to reveal the top card of your deck. You can immediately play or put into play the revealed card for no cost, if able. Otherwise, move the revealed card to the bottom of your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9028.Name: We Are Not Idle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9028.Text: Action: Exhaust X Dwarf characters to add X resources to a hero's resource pool and draw 1 card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9029.Name: Whip Lash
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9029.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Durin's Bane, the defending player discards all attachments he controls.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-0801213c9029.Text: When Revealed: Each player must discard 1 attachment he controls, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9001.Keywords: Players cannot play attachments on The Witch-king.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9001.Name: The Witch-king
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9001.Text:
While The Witch-king is in the staging area, each character gets -1 Ò.

Forced: After The Witch-king attacks, he returns to the staging area unless the defending player raises his threat by 3.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9002.Name: Snaga Scouts
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9002.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, all copies of Snaga Scouts engage the player with the lowest threat. (The first player chooses in case of a tie.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9003.Name: Wolves from Mordor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9003.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to the defending character.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9003.Text: Forced: After Wolves from Mordor attack and destroy a character, shuffle Wolves from Mordor into the encounter deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9004.Name: Wainriders
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9004.Text: Each damage dealt by Wainriders raises the defending player's threat by 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9005.Name: Wainrider Captain
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9005.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, attacking enemy gets +2 Û if it is a Scout.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9005.Text: When Revealed: Move the top Scout enemy from the encounter discard pile to the staging area. (Top 2 Scout enemies instead if the players have crossed the Anduin.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9006.Name: Uruk Vanguard
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9006.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if players have crossed the Anduin).
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9006.Text: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Uruk Vanguard gets +3 Û.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9007.Name: Captured Watchtower
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9007.Shadow: Shadow: Remove all defending characters from combat. This attack is considered undefended.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9007.Text: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Captured Watchtower gets +3 $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9008.Name: Emyn Arnen Overlook
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9008.Text: The first Scout enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round gains surge and doomed 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9009.Name: Morgulduin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9009.Shadow: Shadow: If the players have not yet crossed the Anduin, return any current active location to the staging area. Morgulduin becomes the active location.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9009.Text: While Morgulduin is the active Location, it gains: 'Forced: When a character commits to a Quest, deal 1 damage to that character.'

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9010.Name: Pelennor Fields
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9010.Text: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Pelennor Fields gains: 'When faced with the option to travel, the players must either travel to Pelennor Fields or raise each player's threat by 3.'

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9011.Name: Ruins of Osgiliath
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9011.Text: If the players have crossed the Anduin, Ruins of Osgiliath gets +3 $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9012.Name: Cut Off
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9012.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must discard 1 ally card from his hand or attacking enemy gets +3 Û. (2 allies instead if this attack is undefended.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9012.Text: When Revealed: Each player must discard all ally cards from his hand, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9013.Name: Dark Pursuit
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9013.Text: When Revealed: Raise the total $ of the staging area by 1 for each Scout enemy in play. If there are no Scout enemies in play, Dark Pursuit gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9014.Name: Massing at Osgiliath
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9014.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, each card revealed by the encounter deck gains doomed 1. (Doomed 3 instead if the players have crossed the Anduin.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9015.Name: Ranger of Ithilien
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9015.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to attacking enemy. The defending player may exhaust a character he controls to take control of Ranger of Ithilien.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9015.Text: When Revealed: The first player takes control of Ranger of Ithilien, exhausted and committed to the quest. Then, Ranger of Ithilien gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9016.Name: Beyond Expectations
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9016.Text: Players cannot travel to West Bank locations.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9018.Name: Through the Ruins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9018.Text:
Players cannot travel to West Bank locations.

Each player cannot play or put into play more than 1 card from his hand each round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9020.Name: Anduin Crossing
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9020.Text:
Progress tokens from card effects cannot be placed on this quest card or the active location.

Players cannot travel to East Bank or West Bank locations.

In order to commit characters to the Quest, a player must first choose a hero or 1 Ranger of Ithilien card he controls. Discard each chosen card from play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9022.Name: Race to Minas Tirith
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801202c9022.Text:
When Revealed: Add The Witch-king to the staging area. Players have now crossed the Anduin. Players cannot travel to East Bank locations.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9001.Name: Catching Fire
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9001.Text: When Revealed: Choose and shuffle 1 Pier location from the victory display back into the encounter deck. If no location was shuffled into the encounter deck by this effect, Catching Fire gains surge

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9002.Name: Close to the Flame
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9002.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each character in play. Any player may discard a hero to cancel this effect
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9002.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character in play

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9003.Name: Dire Magnificence
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9003.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, Smaug engages the next player and makes an immediate attack against that player.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9003.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and discard 1 ally he controls if able. Deal 2 damage to Lake-town for each player that cannot.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9005.Name: Esgaroth Wharf
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9005.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +2 Û. Then it make an additional attack after this one.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9005.Text: All locations are immune to player card effects.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9006.Name: Fire and Water
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9006.Text:
Smaug cannot have more than 12 damage on him.

When the players quest successfully and number of progress tokens that would be placed on this quest may instead be discarded to remove the same number of damage from Lake-town.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9008.Name: Fisherman's Dock
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9008.Shadow: Shadow: Add this location to the staging area.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9008.Text: Travel: If there is 1 active location exhaust a hero to travel here (There are now 2 active locations)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9009.Name: Great Bridge
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9009.Text: When Revealed: Discard X cards from each player's deck. X is the ammount of damage on Lake-town. (If no cards are discarded by this effect, Great Bridge gains surge.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9010.Name: Great House
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9010.Text: When Revealed: Resolve all burn damage from all locations in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9011.Name: Lake-town
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9011.Text: If Lake-town has 50 or more damage on it, Lake-town has completely burned and the players have lost the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9012.Name: Merchant's District
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9012.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to Lake-town (4 damage instead if undefended.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9012.Text: Travel Action: Deal 2 damage per player to Lake-town to add this location to the victory display.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9014.Name: Reckless in His Rage
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9014.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, resolve all burn damage on locations in play.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9014.Text: When Revealed: If Smaug is in play, he gets +2 $, +2 Û, -2 Ú and gains the text: 'Allies cannot be declared as defenders'. This effect lasts until the end of the round

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9015.Name: Scorching Blast
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9015.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve this card's 'When Revealed' effect. Any player may discard a hero to cancell this effect.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9015.Text: When Revealed: Resolve all burn damage from all locations in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9016.Name: Smaug the Magnificent
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9016.Text:
Excess damage from attacks by Smaug the Magnificent must be assigned to Lake-town.

When Revealed: Move 3 damage from Smaug the Magnificent to Lake-town.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9017.Name: Smaug the Mighty
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9017.Text: When Revealed: Smaug the Mighty makes an immediate attack against each player (deal and resolve a shodow card for each attack).

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9018.Name: Smaug the Terrible
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9018.Text: When Revealed: Resolve all burn damage from all locations in play

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9019.Name: South Pier
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9019.Text: When faced with the option to travel, players cannot travel to other locations.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9020.Name: Terror from the Mountain
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9020.Text:
Smaug cannot have more than 6 damage on him.

When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to Lake-town for each player in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9022.Name: The Dragon's Wrath
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9022.Text:
Forced: During the quest phase, reveal 1 additional card from the encounter deck

Refresh Action: Reset the quest deck to stage 2B.

The players must defeat Smaug to defeat this stage. When Smaug is defeated, compare the number of damage tokens on Lake-town with the number of victory points in the victory display. If the players have more victory points, they have won the game. Otherwise, Lake-town has burned and the players have lost.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9024.Name: The Master's Manor
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9024.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, defending player discards his hand.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9024.Text: When Revealed: Move all damage from Smaug to Lake-town

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9025.Name: The Old Thrush
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9025.Text:
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective and attach it to that hero when it is free of encounters. (Counts as an attachment with the text:
'If detached discard The Old Thrush
Response: After attached hero exhausts to attack Smaug, discard X cards from hand to reduce Smaug's Ú by X.')

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9026.Name: Town-Baiting
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9026.Text: When Revealed: Smaug make an attack against Lake-town. The last player may declare a defender against this attack. Excess damage from this attack must be placed on Lake-town. This effect cannot be canceled.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9027.Name: West Pier
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801203c9027.Text: Each location in play gains Burn 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9001.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9001.Name: A Deep Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9001.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Ò without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9002.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9002.Name: A Foul Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9002.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the most attachments without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9003.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9003.Name: A Large Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9003.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed hit points without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9004.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9004.Name: A Nice Pickle
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9004.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9004.Text: When Revealed: Place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is equal to twice the number of players in the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9005.Name: A Short Rest
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9005.Text: When Revealed: Each player may search his deck for 1 treasure card and add it to his hand, then shuffle his deck. Advance to stage 2A.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9007.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9007.Name: A Smelly Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9007.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to the ally (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed cost without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9008.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9008.Name: A Strong Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9008.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Û without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9009.Name: A Suspicious Crow
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9009.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack deals at least 1 damage, shuffle this card back into the encounter deck.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9009.Text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area, if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9010.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9010.Name: A Tough Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9010.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to the character (excluding Gandalf) with the highest printed Ú without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9011.Name: A Very Good Tale
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9011.Text: Action: Exhaust 2 allies you control to shuffle your deck and discard the top 5 cards. Put up to 2 allies discarded by this effect into play under your control. The total cost of the allies put into play cannot exceed the total cost of the allies exhausted to pay for this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9012.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9012.Name: A Worn Sack
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9012.Text:
When Sacked: Attach to hero with the most resources without a Sack attached.

Attached character cannot ready, attack, defend, commit to quests, or trigger effects. If this Sack card is removed, shuffle it into the sack deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9013.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9013.Name: An Unexpected Party
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9013.Text: Setup: Remove and shuffle the 7 Sack cards into a Sack deck and set it aside face down. Remove the 3 Troll enemies and the Troll Cave from the encounter deck and set them aside out of play. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Each player reveals 1 card from the top of the encounter deck and adds it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9015.Name: Beorn
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9015.Text:
Immune to player card effects.

Beorn does not exhaust to defend.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9016.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9016.Name: Bert
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9016.Text:
Players cannot play attachment cards on Troll enemies.

Forced: After Bert engages a player, sack 1.

Forced: Return Bert to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9017.Name: Bilbo Baggins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9017.Text:
The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins. Bilbo Baggins cannot gain resources from player card effects.

If Bilbo Baggins leaves play, the players lose the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9018.Name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9018.Text:
Action: When answering a riddle, spend 1 Í resource to discard an additional player card from the top of your deck.

Action: Exhaust Bilbo's Magic Ring and raise each player's threat by 2 to add 1 Í resource to Bilbo Baggins' resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9019.Name: Bofur
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9019.Text: Action: Exhaust Bofur to search the top 5 cards of your deck for 1 Weapon attachment. Add that card to your hand and shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9020.Name: Burglar Baggins
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9020.Text: Action: Bilbo Baggins gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú until the end of the phase. (You may spend a Í resource from Bilbo Baggins' resource pool to play this card even if you do not control Bilbo Baggins.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9021.Name: Cave Entrance
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9021.Text: While Cave Entrance is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: At the end of the round, place the top X cards of the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9022.Name: Chaos in the Cavern
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9022.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy is returned to the staging area after its attack resolves.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9022.Text: When Revealed: All engaged enemies return to the staging area. Then, each Goblin enemy gets +1 $ until the end of the phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9023.Name: Come down little bird
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9023.Text:
When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must search the encounter deck and encounter discard pile for 1 Creature enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.

Riddle: The first player names a card type and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9024.Name: Cram
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9024.Text: Action: Discard Cram to ready attached hero.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9025.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9025.Name: Dawn Take You All
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9025.Text:
When Revealed: Remove all Troll enemies and Sack cards from the game. If Troll Cave is in the victory display, the players have discovered the treasure cards Sting, Glamdring, and Orcrist.

The players have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9027.Name: Dori
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9027.Text: Response: After a hero is assigned any amount of damage, exhaust Dori to place that damage on Dori instead.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9028.Name: Down, Down to Goblin Town
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9028.Text:
Players cannot defeat this stage unless The Great Goblin is in the victory display.

When Revealed: Reveal 3 encounter cards per player. Bilbo Baggins may spend X resources to reduce the total number of encounter cards revealed by X. (To a minimum of 1.)

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9030.Name: Dreary Hills
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9030.Text:
Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Dreary Hills, each player must discard 1 card at random from his hand.

Response: After Dreary Hills leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9031.Name: Expecting Mischief
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9031.Text:
Play during the quest phase, before the staging step.

Action: Deal 2 damage to the first enemy revealed from the encounter deck this phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9032.Name: Fili
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9032.Text: Response: After you play Fili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Kili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9033.Name: Foe-hammer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9033.Text: Response: After a hero you control attacks and destroys an enemy, exhaust a Weapon card attached to that hero to draw 3 cards.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9034.Name: Front Porch
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9034.Text:
While Front Porch is the active location, players cannot attack Goblin enemies.

Action: The first player may spend 2 Í resources to treat Front Porch's printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9035.Name: Galloping Boulders
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9035.Shadow: Shadow: Put this card on top of the encounter deck.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9035.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a questing character. That character takes 3 damage and is removed from the quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9036.Name: Gandalf
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9036.Text:
Gandalf does not exhaust to commit to a quest.

Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, discard Gandalf from play. You may raise your threat by 2 to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9037.Keywords: Attach to a hero or Gandalf. Restricted.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9037.Name: Glamdring
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9037.Text:
Attached character gets +2 Û.

Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9038.Name: Goblin Axeman
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9038.Text: Goblin Axeman gets +1 Û for each Cave location in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9039.Name: Goblin Bent-Swords
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9039.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if The Great Goblin is in the victory display.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9039.Text: If The Great Goblin is in the victory display, this card gains surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9040.Name: Goblin Driver
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9040.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player exhausts 1 character he controls.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9040.Text: When Revealed: The first player exhausts 1 character he controls.
