51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9041.Name: Goblin Miners
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9041.Text: Goblin Miners gets +1 Ú for each Cave location in play.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9042.Name: Goblin Runners
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9042.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy makes an additional attack immediately after this one. (Deal a new shadow card for that attack.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9043.Name: Goblin-cleaver
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9043.Text: Combat Action: Exhaust a Weapon card attached to a hero you control to choose an enemy engaged with you. Deal 2 damage to that enemy. (Deal 3 damage instead if the enemy is an Orc.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9044.Name: Gollum
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9044.Text: Forced: After the first player answers a riddle and fails to find at least 1 match, Gollum attacks Bilbo Baggins. (Do not deal a shadow card for this attack.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9045.Name: Great Cavern Room
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9045.Text:
While Great Cavern Room is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a player engages a Goblin enemy, he must deal 1 damage to a character he controls."

Forced: When faced with the option to travel, if The Great Goblin is in the victory display the players must travel to Great Cavern Room if able.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9046.Name: Great Gray Wolf
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9046.Text:
Forced: If Great Gray Wolf is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, return all Creature enemies to the staging area at the end of the combat phase.

Riddle: The first player names a card type, sphere and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches all three items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9047.Name: Grip, grab! Pinch, nab!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9047.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player deals damage among characters he controls equal to the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9047.Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must choose 1 Goblin enemy from the discard pile and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9048.Name: Guffawing of Giants
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9048.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 Stone-giant in the staging area. At the end of the quest phase, that Stone-giant engages the player with the highest threat. If there are no Stone-giant cards in the staging area, search the encounter deck for 1 Stone-giant and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9049.Name: Hiding in the Trees
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9049.Text:
When Revealed: Characters get -1 Ò and cannot attack until the end of the round.

Riddle: The first player names a card type and sphere, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 3 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9050.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9050.Name: Hobbit-lands
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9050.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must put the top card of the encounter deck discard pile on top of the encounter deck.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9050.Text: Response: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Hobbit-lands, the first player draws 1 card.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9051.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9051.Name: Hungry Troll
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9051.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 4 damage to each character with a Sack card attached. (The first player may spend 2 Í resources to cancel this effect.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9051.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a Troll enemy in the staging area and engages that enemy. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Surge.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9052.Name: Into the Fire
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9052.Text:
When Revealed: The first player gains control of Bilbo Baggins. Reveal 1 encounter card per player and add it to the staging area.

Gollum engages the first player. Damage from undefended attacks made by Gollum must be placed on Bilbo Baggins.

All riddle effects are ignored. Treachery cards gain surge.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9054.Name: It Likes Riddles?
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9054.Text:
When Revealed: The first player must choose to answer the riddle on this card. If he finds at least 1 match, discard cards from the encounter deck until another card with a riddle is discarded. Then, answer that riddle.

Riddle: The first player names a cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9055.Name: Kili
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9055.Text: Response: After you play Kili from your hand during the planning phase, search your deck for Fili and put him into play under your control. Then, shuffle your deck.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9056.Keywords: X is twice the number of players in the game.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9056.Name: Lake in the Cavern
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9056.Text:
Players cannot travel here.

Immune to player card effects.

Forced: After players advance to stage 3, remove Lake in the Cavern from the game.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9057.Name: Late Adventurer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9057.Text: Quest Action: Exhaust a character you control that is not committed to the quest to commit that character to the quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9058.Name: Lone-Lands
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9058.Text:
Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Lone-Lands, each player removes 1 resource from one of his hero's resource pools, if able.

Response: After Lone-Lands leaves play as an explored location, Bilbo Baggins gains 1 resource.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9059.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9059.Name: Lots or None at All
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9059.Shadow: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Troll, Sack 1. (The first player may spend 1 Í resource to cancel this effect.)
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9059.Text: When Revealed: If there is a Troll enemy in the staging area, Sack 1. If there are no Troll enemies in the staging area, this card gains Doomed 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9060.Name: More Like a Grocer
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9060.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve this card's "When Revealed" effect.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9060.Text: When Revealed: Discard all Í resources.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9061.Name: No Campfire
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9061.Shadow: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 2.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9061.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose one: increase his threat by 4, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9062.Name: Nori
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9062.Text: Response: After you play a Dwarf character from your hand, reduce your threat by 1.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9063.Name: Not fair! Not fair!
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9063.Text: When Revealed: The first player names a card type and then discards the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. For each of those cards that does not match the named type, remove 1 progress token from stage 2. This effect cannot be canceled.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9064.Name: Orcrist
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9064.Text:
Attached character gets +2 Û.

Response: After attached hero destroys an Orc enemy, add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9065.Name: Ori
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9065.Text: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, draw 1 additional card at the beginning of the resource phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9066.Name: Out of the Frying Pan
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9066.Text:
Players cannot advance to stage 3A unless both 1B and 2B are complete.

Forced: Reveal 1 additional encounter card per player during the staging step.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9068.Name: Overhanging Rock
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9068.Text: While Overhanging Rock is the active location, it gains: "Action: Spend 1 Í resource to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those to your hand and discard the other."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9069.Name: Riddles in the Dark
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9069.Text:
Players cannot advance to stage 3A unless both 1B and 2B are complete.

Progress tokens cannot be added to, or removed from, this quest except by answering riddles.

Cards in the riddle area are immune to player card effects and cannot leave the riddle area except by quest effects.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9071.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9071.Name: Roast 'Em or Boil 'Em?
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9071.Shadow: Shadow: Search the encounter deck for Troll Camp and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9071.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each ally. (2 damage instead if there is a Troll enemy in the staging area.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9072.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9072.Name: Roast Mutton
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9072.Text:
Forced: If there are no Troll enemies left in play, or if there are no cards left in the encounter deck, advance to the next stage.

Any time players would place progress tokens on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9074.Name: Spare Hood and Cloak
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9074.Text: Action: Exhaust Spare Hood and Cloak and exhaust attached character to ready another character. Then, attach Spare Hood and Cloak to that character.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9075.Name: Sting
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9075.Text:
Bilbo Baggins gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.

Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card's $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9076.Name: Stone-Giant
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9076.Text:
While at least one Stone-Giant is in the staging area, the Galloping Boulders card gains surge.

Forced: After Stone-Giant engages a player, that player chooses and discards 1 ally he controls.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9077.Name: The Goblins' Caves
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9077.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by X. X is the number of Goblin enemies engaged with him.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9077.Text: While The Goblins' Caves is the active location, Goblin enemies get +1 $.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9078.Name: The Great Goblin
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9078.Text: Forced: After The Great Goblin attacks, discard X cards from the encounter deck where X is the number of players in the game. Add each Goblin enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9079.Name: The High Pass
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9079.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.

Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress tokens from the current quest.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9080.Name: The Mountain Pass
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9080.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Stone-giant and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9082.Name: The Wargs' Glade
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9082.Text:
Forced: After a character takes damage from an attack made by a Creature enemy, remove 1 progress from the current quest.

Riddle: The first player names a sphere, shuffles his deck, and discards the top card. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9083.Name: Thorin Oakenshield
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9083.Text: If you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, add 1 additional resource to Thorin Oakenshield's pool when you collect resources during the resource phase.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9084.Name: Thrór's Map
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9084.Text: Travel Action: Exhaust Thrór's Map to choose a location in the staging area. Make that location the active location. (If there is another active location, return it to the staging area.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9085.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9085.Name: Tom
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9085.Text:
Troll enemies can only be attacked by one character at a time.

Forced: After Tom engages a player, sack 1.

Forced: Return Tom to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9086.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9086.Name: Troll Camp
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9086.Text:
While Troll Camp is in the staging area, Troll enemies get +1 $ for each player in the game.

While Troll Camp is in play, Bilbo Baggins gains: "Action: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins and spend 1 Í resource to remove 1 Sack card from a character. Bilbo Baggins may trigger this effect even with a Sack card attached to him."

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9087.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9087.Name: Troll Cave
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9087.Text: Players cannot travel to Troll Cave unless Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Key attached and the first player spends 5 Í resources. (2 Í resources instead if Bilbo Baggins has the Troll Purse attached.)

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9088.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9088.Name: Troll Key
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9088.Text:
If Troll Key is discarded, add it to the staging area.
If Troll Key is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.

Response: After attached Troll enemy takes damage as the result of an attack, the first player may exhaust Bilbo Baggins to claim this objective and attach it to him.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9089.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9089.Name: Troll Purse
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9089.Text:
If Troll Purse is discarded, add it to the staging area.
If Troll Purse is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Troll enemy, if able.

Response: After attached Troll enemy is destroyed, the first player may spend 1 Í resource to claim this objective and attach it to Bilbo Baggins.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9090.Name: What's In My Pocket?
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9090.Text:
When Revealed: The first player must choose to answer the riddle on this card. This effect cannot be canceled.

Riddle: The first player names a sphere and cost, shuffles his deck, then discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches both items, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9091.Name: Wild Wargs
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9091.Text:
Forced: If Wild Wargs is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, it gets +2 Û.

Riddle: The first player names a card type, shuffles his deck, and discards the top 2 cards. For each of those cards that matches, place 1 progress token on stage 2.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9092.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9092.Name: William
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9092.Text:
Troll enemies not engaged with a player cannot take damage.

Forced: After William engages a player, sack 2.

Forced: Return William to the staging area at the end of the combat phase. The engaged player may raise his threat by 1 to cancel this effect.

51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9093.Name: Wind-whipped Rain
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9093.Shadow: Shadow: The defending character gets -1 Ú.
51223bd0-ffd1-11df-a976-1801204c9093.Text: When Revealed: Discard all non-treasure, non-objective attachments in play.

51681809-60af-4819-bfa0-3f568987f4ea.Name: Constant Tail
51681809-60af-4819-bfa0-3f568987f4ea.Text: When Revealed: Return all engaged enemies to the staging area. Then, the first player either removes 1 time counter from the current quest or each Spy enemy in the staging area gets +2 $ until the end of the phase.

516b75d8-9abe-423e-9ef1-a92f1c87c86f.Name: Cold-wight
516b75d8-9abe-423e-9ef1-a92f1c87c86f.Text:
While Cold-wight is engaged with a player, that player cannot draw cards from card effects.

Forced: After Cold-wight attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller discards a random card from his hand.

516f4454-d448-4bc3-8af3-665a0d50256d.Name: Scaling Ladders
516f4454-d448-4bc3-8af3-665a0d50256d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, place 1 progress on the current quest.
516f4454-d448-4bc3-8af3-665a0d50256d.Text:
Surge.
When Revealed: Attach to the active location. (Counts as a Siege attachment with the text: “Each enemy gets +1 $.”)

518f546e-a3ce-4af8-b89d-2e1a6b765857.Name: Wolf-pelt Jake
518f546e-a3ce-4af8-b89d-2e1a6b765857.Text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: After Wolf-pelt Jake attacks and destroys an ally, return him to the staging area.

51a1050d-f8d5-48aa-8f96-ef96e1e836da.Name: Abandoned Mine
51a1050d-f8d5-48aa-8f96-ef96e1e836da.Text:
While Abandoned Mine is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area not named Abandoned Mine.
Forced: When resolving the Discover keyword on Abandoned Mine, look at X additional cards where X is the number of players in the game.

51b6030d-3ce7-4139-b3bc-a408949533e2.Name: Morgul Vale
51b6030d-3ce7-4139-b3bc-a408949533e2.Text: Forced: After Morgul Vale is explored, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Morgul Wraith and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Then, the first player must either exhaust The One Ring, or discard 1 random card from each player’s hand.

51e187ea-691c-46bc-b74f-c03d110d02cd.Name: Captives of Gornákh
51e187ea-691c-46bc-b74f-c03d110d02cd.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack damages a character, capture that character underneath the attacking enemy instead of dealing damage.
51e187ea-691c-46bc-b74f-c03d110d02cd.Text: When Revealed: Each player chooses one of their allies and captures it underneath the encounter card with the highest $.

5205f00e-c538-4b5e-976c-5db99d33bc4e.Name: Na’asiyah
5205f00e-c538-4b5e-976c-5db99d33bc4e.Text: Resources in Na’asiyah’s resource pool cannot be used to pay for allies. Action: While Na’asiyah is attacking or defending, spend 1 resource from her resource pool to give her +2 Û or +2 Ú for this attack.

5211f81c-288a-4243-889d-6e294fbc3b8c.Name: A Great Host
5211f81c-288a-4243-889d-6e294fbc3b8c.Text: When Revealed: Each player returns each enemy engaged with him to the staging area. Either search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for Orc Rearguard and reveal it, or each player must deal 4 damage to a character he controls. Shuffle the encounter deck.

52248807-32d1-422b-b4b2-01097405e49f.Name: Secret Chamber
52248807-32d1-422b-b4b2-01097405e49f.Text:
Response: After the players travel to Secret Chamber, if no Loot objective is attached to Secret Chamber, search the encounter discard pile for a Loot objective and attach it to Secret Chamber as a guarded objective.

Travel: Raise each player's threat by 2.

5273452f-2d35-4a1c-91db-5bde684ed4a7.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
5273452f-2d35-4a1c-91db-5bde684ed4a7.Name: Orc Wight
5273452f-2d35-4a1c-91db-5bde684ed4a7.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy has at least 1 other shadow card currently dealt to it, return it to the staging area after this attack.
5273452f-2d35-4a1c-91db-5bde684ed4a7.Text: Forced: After Orc Wight enters play, deal it 2 shadow cards.

52754c5f-30b8-4d55-b9c2-5dfa8020ead3.Name: The Bridge of Kazad-dûm
52754c5f-30b8-4d55-b9c2-5dfa8020ead3.Text:
No more than 5 progress can be placed on this stage each round.

The players cannot defeat this stage while The Great Bridge is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

5277b186-0c76-4ec6-9615-20cdceb49241.Name: Western Hall
5277b186-0c76-4ec6-9615-20cdceb49241.Text:
Each Goblin enemy gets +1 $ for each resource on it. This ability does not stack with other copies of Western Hall.
Travel: Add 1 resource to each Goblin enemy in play.

528afc17-e78f-4b02-8080-e936955a77b9.Name: Borders of Bree-land
528afc17-e78f-4b02-8080-e936955a77b9.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets –1 Ú for each quest stage in play.
528afc17-e78f-4b02-8080-e936955a77b9.Text: While Borders of Bree-land is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, return 1 enemy engaged with a player to the staging area.”

528de9d6-9da4-4ac4-b265-773f70d68102.Name: Forewarned
528de9d6-9da4-4ac4-b265-773f70d68102.Text:
Setup: Attach to a Ranger hero.

Response: After attached hero is declared as a defender against a non-unique enemy, exhaust Forewarned to discard 1 shadow card from that enemy.

529bb9e4-36c3-45bd-bac0-1ce5de6a581d.Name: Ruined Plaza
529bb9e4-36c3-45bd-bac0-1ce5de6a581d.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of cards underneath The Orcs’ Search.
529bb9e4-36c3-45bd-bac0-1ce5de6a581d.Text: Forced: After Ruined Plaza enters the staging area, place 1 damage here.

52b151e9-f13b-4f85-961c-62838d25b97a.Name: Halbarad
52b151e9-f13b-4f85-961c-62838d25b97a.Text:
While you are engaged with an enemy, Halbarad does not exhaust to commit to a quest. 

You may optionally engage 1 additional enemy during the encounter phase.

52b5e077-36f2-4c13-89fb-4f7b3d73463b.Name: Tower of the Heron
52b5e077-36f2-4c13-89fb-4f7b3d73463b.Text: If Tower of the Heron is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. While Tower of the Heron is controlled by the players, reduce the archery total by 4.

52e217a6-ddc0-4082-9ec2-09d92e8c25c7.Name: Galdor of the Havens
52e217a6-ddc0-4082-9ec2-09d92e8c25c7.Text:
Response: After drawing your setup hand, instead of taking a mulligan, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. Then, draw that many cards.
Action: If you have no cards in your hand, draw 6 cards. (Limit once per game.)

530e7365-0a5a-46e5-9720-5377dfa1a01b.Name: Thaurdir
530e7365-0a5a-46e5-9720-5377dfa1a01b.Text: Forced: After a treachery card with the Sorcery trait is revealed from the encounter deck, Thaurdir heals 3 damage and makes an immediate attack against the first player.

536c80ba-ad8b-447e-b378-1684508eb0f9.Name: Mirlonde
536c80ba-ad8b-447e-b378-1684508eb0f9.Text: Each hero you control with a printed Î resource icon gets -1 threat cost.

536cee93-e3d5-42fd-8182-0a939fd19f46.Name: Stalking the Ruins
536cee93-e3d5-42fd-8182-0a939fd19f46.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 progress token on Stalking the Ruins. Then, if there are at least 3 resources here, add or return Naurlhûg to the staging area.

Forced: When the players advance to a new quest stage, discard all tokens from Stalking the Ruins. Then, set Naurlhûg aside, out of play.

536fa3c6-a078-4e79-b316-70cdc826e5d7.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
536fa3c6-a078-4e79-b316-70cdc826e5d7.Name: Fallen Stones
536fa3c6-a078-4e79-b316-70cdc826e5d7.Text:
Travel: Deal 3 damage to each ready character. The first player may spend up to 3 Í resources to reduce the damage dealt to each character by 1 for each Í resource spent.

Riddle: The first player names a card title, shuffles his deck, and discards the top 5 cards. For each card that matches, place 1 progress on stage 2.

5388683d-3240-433a-9602-a7367e428406.Name: Make Camp
5388683d-3240-433a-9602-a7367e428406.Text:
Characters cannot be healed.

Response: After Make Camp is defeated, each player heals up to 3 damage from a hero he controls.

53ac8ba6-0487-4b1f-91e9-cf7ca9e7c1d0.Name: Bucklebury Ferry
53ac8ba6-0487-4b1f-91e9-cf7ca9e7c1d0.Text:
While there is at least 1 other location in play, the players cannot travel here.

Travel: The first player must make a Hide 3 test to travel here.

After Bucklebury Ferry leaves play as an explored location, the players win the game.

53b038f1-01c5-40d9-b583-7501b0d7c8df.Name: Primeval Thing
53b038f1-01c5-40d9-b583-7501b0d7c8df.Text:
Forced: When Primeval Thing enters play, attach cards from the top of the first player's deck to it until the total printed cost of all attached cards is 6 or higher. 

X is the printed cost of all attached cards on this card. If there are no cards attached, X is 6.

54014fda-7adc-49b0-96ac-656e849eaf7b.Name: Into the Abyss
54014fda-7adc-49b0-96ac-656e849eaf7b.Shadow: Shadow: If the active location is Underwater, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Creature enemy, and add it to the staging area.
54014fda-7adc-49b0-96ac-656e849eaf7b.Text: When Revealed: Each player chooses a card type and discards each card in his hand that is not of the chosen card type. If no cards are discarded by this effect, Into the Abyss gains surge.

540e3fbc-a066-4dc6-a156-598f1b2751c0.Name: The Spider's Pass
540e3fbc-a066-4dc6-a156-598f1b2751c0.Text:
Shelob cannot leave the staging area and Smeagol cannot attack or defend. 
Each player cannot play, or put into play, more than 1 ally each round.
No more than 4 progress can be placed on this stage each round.

54665391-02fa-4402-b7ea-2f8b5aa95a57.Name: Blue Mountain Gem
54665391-02fa-4402-b7ea-2f8b5aa95a57.Text:
If unattached, the fist player claims Blue Mountain Gem and attaches it to a hero he controls.

Action: Exhaust Blue Mountain Gem to choose a player. Reduce that player's threat by 1.

5497d938-1549-498c-abeb-2ed617222b76.Name: Lurking Malice
5497d938-1549-498c-abeb-2ed617222b76.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Shelob, place 1 resource on her. Then, she gets +1 Û for each resource on her.
5497d938-1549-498c-abeb-2ed617222b76.Text: When Revealed: Either place 1 resource on Shelob, or she makes an immediate attack against you.

54981b6b-c247-40f9-9321-fd7913b897dd.Name: Storm of Howls
54981b6b-c247-40f9-9321-fd7913b897dd.Text: When Revealed: Either the Warg enemy in the staging area with the highest engagement cost attacks you, or each Warg enemy gets -20 engagement cost until the end of the round. If no Warg enemy is in the staging area, Storm of Howls gains surge.

54a26608-eebd-4bd6-855a-ceccb4507bab.Name: Raven Country
54a26608-eebd-4bd6-855a-ceccb4507bab.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the Time X value on the active location.
54a26608-eebd-4bd6-855a-ceccb4507bab.Text: Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, each player raises his threat by the number of cards in his hand.

54b219c4-a359-435f-9988-336cad0384b2.Name: Longbeard Sentry
54b219c4-a359-435f-9988-336cad0384b2.Text: Action: Discard 2 cards from the top of your deck to give Longbeard Sentry sentinel and +1 Ú until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

54c734a4-b6a9-4c51-a69d-aaa0b7fc2147.Name: Ramshackle Manor
54c734a4-b6a9-4c51-a69d-aaa0b7fc2147.Text: When a player card effect reduces a player's threat by any amount, reducd that amount to 1. Travel: Raise each player's threat by 1 to travel here.

54c8ecae-73b1-4c42-84ed-0411551c363a.Name: Long Trailer
54c8ecae-73b1-4c42-84ed-0411551c363a.Text: While Long Trailer is in the staging area it gains: "Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location, Long Trailer makes an immediate attack against the first player."

54e3ccfe-4e9b-4593-a3ef-e045b1a0c4a9.Name: Dockside Street
54e3ccfe-4e9b-4593-a3ef-e045b1a0c4a9.Text:
While Dockside Street is in the staging area, enemies in the staging area cannot be damaged or optionally engaged.
Travel: Exhaust the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached to travel here.

54ed3453-1df4-458d-bc7d-e1f7c10de237.Name: The Defense of Ravenhill
54ed3453-1df4-458d-bc7d-e1f7c10de237.Text:
Players cannot advance from this stage unless stage 2 and stage 3 are complete.

Forced: If there is no progress on this stage at the end of the round, each player must discard all resources from each hero's resource pool.

550e9f11-14bb-4fac-806a-3f43035b30c9.Name: The House of Tom Bombadil
550e9f11-14bb-4fac-806a-3f43035b30c9.Text:
Skip the quest phase.

Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 progress on this stage.

5542dd91-98bd-4a72-bd19-f706f3440ab8.Name: Gríma
5542dd91-98bd-4a72-bd19-f706f3440ab8.Text:
If free of encounters, the first player gains control of Grima.

Action: Exhaust Grima to draw a card.

If Grima leaves play, the players lose the game.

555dcce7-e705-4ba1-ba58-4880b449c178.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
555dcce7-e705-4ba1-ba58-4880b449c178.Name: Rot and Vapors
555dcce7-e705-4ba1-ba58-4880b449c178.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, place 1 mire token on the active location.
555dcce7-e705-4ba1-ba58-4880b449c178.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1 for each questing character you control, or deal 1 damage to each character you control.

5571b159-9889-4fcd-bc0e-13bea7443348.Name: Forecastle Deck
5571b159-9889-4fcd-bc0e-13bea7443348.Text: Forced: After you travel to Forecastle Deck, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

5585680f-0609-4cc4-96b5-37e53992af56.Name: Helm of the Stormcaller
5585680f-0609-4cc4-96b5-37e53992af56.Text:
Helm of the Stormcaller gets +1 quest point for each resource token on a Raider enemy in play.
Forced: When Helm of the Stormcaller becomes the active location, add Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah to the staging area from out of play (enemy side faceup).

55c8245d-e0f3-4d11-90f5-617caf78f079.Name: Wolfpelt Goblin
55c8245d-e0f3-4d11-90f5-617caf78f079.Text: Forced: After engaging Wolfpelt Goblin , the engaged player must deal X damage to 1 character he controls, where X is the active location's remaining quest points. Then, remove 2 progress from the active location, if able.

55d8f78d-2dd7-4b44-80db-fb539ff05f00.Name: Craft Remedy
55d8f78d-2dd7-4b44-80db-fb539ff05f00.Text:
Treat the printed text box of each damaged character as if it were blank (except for Traits).
Response: When this is defeated, heal 1 damage from each character in play.

55dd30df-7b57-4cc9-b778-f8a4bfe72431.Name: Curse of Angmar
55dd30df-7b57-4cc9-b778-f8a4bfe72431.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards each card in his hand that has the same title as a card in his discard pile. If no cards are discarded by this effect, Curse of Angmar gains surge.

5604685f-3fac-40da-8999-62a9b69a153b.Name: Hold the Line
5604685f-3fac-40da-8999-62a9b69a153b.Text: Response: When an enemy attacks a player, that player may declare up to 3 eligible characters as defenders against this attack. Then, the players as a group may spend 2 Ï resources to ready each defending character that takes no damage from this attack.

56243a40-0019-406a-b502-34dd17d8b6cf.Name: Dunlending Horde
56243a40-0019-406a-b502-34dd17d8b6cf.Text:
Cannot have attachments or take non-combat damage.
Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards, heal all damage from Dunlending Horde.

565ab52d-0390-4f39-8e6d-7809444b53af.Name: Mirkwood Long-knife
565ab52d-0390-4f39-8e6d-7809444b53af.Text: Attach to a Silvan hero. Restricted.Attached hero gets +1 Ò and +1 Û.

566898f1-9e85-4463-b220-6924d5106447.Name: Discovered!
566898f1-9e85-4463-b220-6924d5106447.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, place that character facedown underneath The Orcs’ Search.
566898f1-9e85-4463-b220-6924d5106447.Text: When Revealed: Either trigger each Scour effect currently in play, or each player places a random card from his hand facedown underneath The Orcs’ Search.

56e98bd5-c952-436e-b552-832031d4bb20.Name: Vanguard of Bolg
56e98bd5-c952-436e-b552-832031d4bb20.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.
56e98bd5-c952-436e-b552-832031d4bb20.Text: This enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú for each quest stage in play with no progress on it.

56fbff9f-2518-4ea3-918b-caf14a93738d.Name: The Tower Beckons
56fbff9f-2518-4ea3-918b-caf14a93738d.Shadow: Shadow: Place 1 progress token on To the Tower.
56fbff9f-2518-4ea3-918b-caf14a93738d.Text: When Revealed: Place 1 progress token on To the Tower. Until the end of the phase, The Towers Beckons adds X $ to the total $ in the staging area, where X is the number of progress tokens on To the Tower.

57107fd1-0092-41d3-ae9d-8ff6c06933eb.Name: Black Rider
57107fd1-0092-41d3-ae9d-8ff6c06933eb.Text: Forced: After engaged player fails a Hide test, Black Rider makes an immediate attack.

573eebae-82fc-4e41-a3a8-343194c893bc.Name: Narrow Fissure
573eebae-82fc-4e41-a3a8-343194c893bc.Text:
Each Dark location in play gets +2 quest points.
While Cave Torch is ready, progress cannot be placed on Narrow Fissure.

57658f13-fb9c-4a87-bb05-965a022cc69d.Keywords: Limit 3 copies of Leave No Trace in the victory display.
57658f13-fb9c-4a87-bb05-965a022cc69d.Name: Leave No Trace
57658f13-fb9c-4a87-bb05-965a022cc69d.Text: Response: After a non-unique location is explored, add Leave No Trace to the victory display to add that location to the victory display.

57b1cf62-1841-4f65-b9eb-fc82b1eac918.Name: Werewolf of Angmar
57b1cf62-1841-4f65-b9eb-fc82b1eac918.Text:
Forced: After an event card is played, deal 1 shadow card to Werewolf of Angmar. 

Forced: If there are 3 shadow cards dealt to Werewolf of Angmar and it is in the staging area, it engages the first player and makes an immediate attack (do not deal it another shadow card for this attack).

57f80fa2-0fdb-47b1-a441-939ee4cc6b4e.Name: Bellach's Marauder
57f80fa2-0fdb-47b1-a441-939ee4cc6b4e.Shadow: Shadow: Remove 1 time counter from the current quest.
57f80fa2-0fdb-47b1-a441-939ee4cc6b4e.Text: While Bellach's Marauder is engaged with a player, it gains: "Forced: After a time counter is removed from the current quest, deal Bellach's Marauder 2 shadow cards."

57fc374c-ca6d-4556-9181-c1b578d7a01d.Name: A Warm Welcome
57fc374c-ca6d-4556-9181-c1b578d7a01d.Text:
Skip the Quest phase.

Forced: At the end of round, advance to stage 2.

57fdb41b-3a17-477d-89e7-b3b139d58642.Name: Fallen into Evil
57fdb41b-3a17-477d-89e7-b3b139d58642.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero and move it to the first player's staging area. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero loses the hero card type and gains the enemy card type with $ equal to its Ò and engagement cost equal to its threat cost. If Fallen into Evil is discarded, return attached hero to its owner's control."

58001a33-adef-4766-872d-334b2570e167.Name: Palantír of Orthanc
58001a33-adef-4766-872d-334b2570e167.Text: Quest Action: Exhaust Aragorn and Palantír of Orthanc to discard the top card of the encounter deck. If Aragorn’s Ò is greater than the discarded card’s $, you may add Palantír of Orthanc to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool to choose a player. That player reveals 1 fewer encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0).

5842e027-3789-4253-a382-27527ec4fe8a.Name: Raven War-camp
5842e027-3789-4253-a382-27527ec4fe8a.Text: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, starting with the first player, each player draws the top card of the Raven deck and puts it into play engaged with him.

5855e76e-e807-4a8c-9035-de7b9cb4366e.Name: Southron Camp
5855e76e-e807-4a8c-9035-de7b9cb4366e.Text: While Southron Camp is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the end of the round, remove all progress from each location in play.” Travel: Raise each player’s threat by 1 to travel here.

58615245-a21c-4f45-9636-9f76e2a7f19e.Name: Bellach's Bodyguard
58615245-a21c-4f45-9636-9f76e2a7f19e.Shadow: Attacking enemy cannot take damage until the end of the phase.
58615245-a21c-4f45-9636-9f76e2a7f19e.Text:
Bellach cannot take damage.
Scour: Heal all damage from Bellach's Bodyguard.

58616050-8a7f-4a9b-a8dc-e0d09e383741.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
58616050-8a7f-4a9b-a8dc-e0d09e383741.Name: Retreat from Osgiliath
58616050-8a7f-4a9b-a8dc-e0d09e383741.Text: X is the total cost of each ally in the staging area.  Allies in the staging area are treated as if their text box is blank, are immune to player card effects, and are under no player’s control. Forced: At the end of the round, assign damage among allies in the staging area equal to the number of enemies in the staging area.

58aa1ac7-961f-4a44-ad11-7613d87d4eab.Name: The Cabals's Champion
58aa1ac7-961f-4a44-ad11-7613d87d4eab.Text: If The Cabal's Champion is unattached and in the staging area, attach it to a Villian enemy, if able. (Counts as a Title attachment with the text: "Attached enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, +1 Ú and +2 hit points.")

58d90f80-eb1a-46d9-a5c1-2e7b8c5b8451.Name: The Haven of Umbar
58d90f80-eb1a-46d9-a5c1-2e7b8c5b8451.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for The Shattered Monument and Captain Sahír, and set them aside, out of play. Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 enemy and 1 location, and adds them to the staging area. If the Stormcaller was not destroyed during stage 1, add 1 resource to each Raider enemy in play.

58f1cb80-d8de-4f96-98d0-0fdf61988da3.Name: Undersea Grotto
58f1cb80-d8de-4f96-98d0-0fdf61988da3.Text:
While Dark Abyss is the active location, characters cannot attack.

Forced: If Dark Abyss is the active location at the end of the quest phase, deal 1 damage to each character in play. Then, you may flip Dark Abyss to its Grotto side.

590dd523-5743-4c36-b905-c34c021c2676.Name: Uruk Pursuer
590dd523-5743-4c36-b905-c34c021c2676.Shadow: Shadow: If the players are not at the same stage as the Orcs, put Uruk Pursuer into play engaged with you.
590dd523-5743-4c36-b905-c34c021c2676.Text: When Revealed: Add Uruk Pursuer to the Orc’s area. If the players are not at the same stage as the Orcs, Uruk Pursuer gains surge.

595c34f1-60e3-401a-bd65-df6dda627896.Name: Hidden Cove
595c34f1-60e3-401a-bd65-df6dda627896.Text:
Travel: Move 2 progress from the main quest to the Stormcaller's quest stage. 

Response: After Hidden Cove becomes the active location, heal 4 damage from each Ship objective.

5963e5c4-0f2e-43c4-afa2-a9b2cfde73d1.Name: Doors of Durin
5963e5c4-0f2e-43c4-afa2-a9b2cfde73d1.Text:
Progress must be placed on each other active location before it can be placed here. Progress cannot be placed here unless the first player controls the Ring-bearer.

If there are 9 damage tokens here, the players lose the game.

59c6b564-b927-481f-b505-ca9b1fe4f524.Name: Blast of Sorcery
59c6b564-b927-481f-b505-ca9b1fe4f524.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending player has 1 or fewer cards in his hand).
59c6b564-b927-481f-b505-ca9b1fe4f524.Text: When Revealed: Assign X damage among characters committed to the quest. X is 1 more than the number of players in the game.

59cd2c5f-1986-4065-ad2c-8423d6b200e2.Keywords: Attach to a unique ally belonging to any sphere of influence.
59cd2c5f-1986-4065-ad2c-8423d6b200e2.Name: Sword-thain
59cd2c5f-1986-4065-ad2c-8423d6b200e2.Text: Attached character loses the ally card type and gains the hero card type.

5a3a6917-900b-4878-9545-56c297a50248.Name: Tamed Mumak
5a3a6917-900b-4878-9545-56c297a50248.Text:
Immune to player card effects.
Damage from undefended attacks against you must be assigned to Tamed Mumak.
If Tamed Mumak leaves play, the controlling player is eliminated.

5a3d198a-5c72-42ec-b5ae-f183194632cf.Name: West Gate
5a3d198a-5c72-42ec-b5ae-f183194632cf.Text:
Action: If there is no active location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Osgiliath location, reveal it and add it to the staging area. Then, make West Gate the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Forced: After the player who controls West Gate lets an attack go undefended, return West Gate to the staging area.

5a4545c3-8b25-4fad-9798-b67921c9e7d3.Name: Hold Steady!
5a4545c3-8b25-4fad-9798-b67921c9e7d3.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character has 0 Ú, discard it. Otherwise, the defending character gets -2 Ú for this attack.
5a4545c3-8b25-4fad-9798-b67921c9e7d3.Text: When Revealed: Exhaust each character with 1 or less Ú.

5a654416-4449-4d0c-add8-8b3ca04bb401.Name: Southern Road
5a654416-4449-4d0c-add8-8b3ca04bb401.Text: Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

5a6f59a4-5beb-4281-898e-f4607056a160.Name: Icy Cavern
5a6f59a4-5beb-4281-898e-f4607056a160.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ò. Deal the attacking enemy 1 additional shadow card.
5a6f59a4-5beb-4281-898e-f4607056a160.Text:
X is the number of Snow cards in the staging area. 

Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Freezing Cold and reveal it to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck.

5a90429e-d5cf-442f-b8d8-af144b3ea861.Keywords: Fornost Square gets +1 $ for each resource token on it.
5a90429e-d5cf-442f-b8d8-af144b3ea861.Name: Fornost Square
5a90429e-d5cf-442f-b8d8-af144b3ea861.Text: Forced: After the first player discards any number of cards from the top of his deck, place 1 resource token here.

5ab2daa0-b88d-47f2-8896-75bb6e76c350.Name: The Road to Isengard
5ab2daa0-b88d-47f2-8896-75bb6e76c350.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: When Ent of Fangorn leaves play, remove it from the game.

5ababdc3-8d6c-47ad-aa1a-d21f5c96bbda.Name: Galadhrim Weaver
5ababdc3-8d6c-47ad-aa1a-d21f5c96bbda.Text: Response: After Galadhrim Weaver enters play, shuffle the top card of your discard pile into your deck.

5ae90f6e-1b35-4f08-9f10-912bc9cdd3d1.Name: Harad Road
5ae90f6e-1b35-4f08-9f10-912bc9cdd3d1.Shadow: Shadow: If the players are not at the same stage as the Orcs, move attacking enemy to the Orc’s area after this attack.
5ae90f6e-1b35-4f08-9f10-912bc9cdd3d1.Text: When Revealed: Add Harad Road to the Orc’s area.

5afd0c41-3fe9-40a1-bdfc-f5e8bc323958.Name: Giant Cave Centipede
5afd0c41-3fe9-40a1-bdfc-f5e8bc323958.Text:
When Revealed: Each player at this stage shuffles the card in his hand with the highest printed cost back into his deck. 

Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if Giant Centipede is engaged with a player, that player chooses and adds it to a different player's staging area.

5b015ce5-9282-402f-8fae-2ee819bd1545.Name: Resource Phase
5b015ce5-9282-402f-8fae-2ee819bd1545.Text: All players may play events or trigger actions and responses

5b038648-7a06-4014-b207-a5d68c99e76d.Name: Fat Spider
5b038648-7a06-4014-b207-a5d68c99e76d.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets 1 poison. (Give 2 poison to a character you control if undefended.)
5b038648-7a06-4014-b207-a5d68c99e76d.Text: This enemy gets +3 Û while engaged with a player who controls at least 1 poisoned character.

5b883ef3-a7f1-4c88-870b-af254e9d2151.Name: Orc of the White Hand
5b883ef3-a7f1-4c88-870b-af254e9d2151.Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, increase the pursuit value by 1.
5b883ef3-a7f1-4c88-870b-af254e9d2151.Text: Forced: After Orc of the White Hand attacks and destroys a character, increase the pursuit value by 1.

5c0a0aea-af43-441b-9d7f-86a1dfd09f00.Name: Umbar Harbor
5c0a0aea-af43-441b-9d7f-86a1dfd09f00.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Raider, move 1 resource from a hero you control to attacking enemy.
5c0a0aea-af43-441b-9d7f-86a1dfd09f00.Text: While Umbar Harbor is the active location, Corsair enemies get +2 Ú.

5c31f690-9802-4638-8316-5380ef32575b.Name: Fell Rider
5c31f690-9802-4638-8316-5380ef32575b.Text: While Fell Rider is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, the first player must either reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1 or engage Fell Rider."

5c4fb1ac-a989-463d-a622-367882c56d4e.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
5c4fb1ac-a989-463d-a622-367882c56d4e.Name: One by One
5c4fb1ac-a989-463d-a622-367882c56d4e.Text: When Revealed: Choose and destroy a character with a Sack card attached. Then, return that Sack card to the top of the Sack deck and Sack 1.

5c525922-8f10-4793-b7c8-3fec9b3ce3f6.Name: Raven Stronghold
5c525922-8f10-4793-b7c8-3fec9b3ce3f6.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, each player reveals the top card of the Raven deck and adds it to the staging area.
Forced: When this location is explored, add the top card of the Raven deck to the staging area.

5c5ce14a-332a-40fe-8f55-cfa2f53e8592.Name: Wight of Rhudaur
5c5ce14a-332a-40fe-8f55-cfa2f53e8592.Text:
While the current quest has 1 or more progress on it, Wight of Rhudaur gains surge.

While the current quest has 0 progress on it, Wight of Rhudaur gains doomed 2.

5c6b9d23-79fe-482c-8122-66b185cd476e.Name: Rune-master
5c6b9d23-79fe-482c-8122-66b185cd476e.Text: Attach to a Ranger or Ì hero. Response: After a Signal attachment is attached to a hero, exhaust Rune-master to add 1 resource to that hero’s resource pool.

5c7a6b89-0439-4b46-b9f1-09189f981a0d.Name: Trained for War
5c7a6b89-0439-4b46-b9f1-09189f981a0d.Text:
Play only if each hero you control has the printed Ï resource icon.

Action: Until the end of the phase, if the current quest has no keyword it gains battle. (Characters quest using Û instead of Ò.)

5ce0a255-9914-4a4f-9630-d1fe8e00bbc0.Name: Rage and Hunger
5ce0a255-9914-4a4f-9630-d1fe8e00bbc0.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Shelob, she makes an additional attack against you after this one.
5ce0a255-9914-4a4f-9630-d1fe8e00bbc0.Text: When Revealed: Shelob gets +2 Û until the end of the phase. Then, she makes an immediate attack against each player, in player order.

5ce149ca-3cca-41ce-9756-bf137d910966.Name: Patrol Sentry
5ce149ca-3cca-41ce-9756-bf137d910966.Shadow: Add Patrol Sentry to the staging area.
5ce149ca-3cca-41ce-9756-bf137d910966.Text: Forced: After Cave Torch exhausts, Patrol Sentry makes an immediate attack against the engaged player, if able.

5d0085bd-ebb9-46a7-ae28-698da3d11ae6.Name: Hills of Hollin
5d0085bd-ebb9-46a7-ae28-698da3d11ae6.Text:
While Hills of Hollin is the active location, each enemy in the staging area gets +5 engagement cost.

Forced: When Hills of Hollin is explored, each player raises his threat by 1 for each damage here.

5d1c8757-7409-41da-9e12-454af06e8946.Keywords: Attach to a hero with sentinel.
5d1c8757-7409-41da-9e12-454af06e8946.Name: The Day's Rising
5d1c8757-7409-41da-9e12-454af06e8946.Text: Response: After attached hero defends against an attack and takes no damage while defending that attack, exhaust Day's Rising to add 1 resource to the attached hero's resource pool.

5d491420-2c69-41b8-8023-a7020f5a33df.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
5d491420-2c69-41b8-8023-a7020f5a33df.Name: Corsair Pyromaniac

5d75d4dd-7300-43d7-87f2-963271c9c904.Name: Fatty Bolger
5d75d4dd-7300-43d7-87f2-963271c9c904.Text: Action: Exhaust Fatty Bolger to choose an enemy in the staging area and raise you threat by that enemy's $. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its $. (Limit once per round.)

5d811a82-3729-4b54-8748-e0abffd96e90.Name: From the Depths
5d811a82-3729-4b54-8748-e0abffd96e90.Shadow: Shadow: Assign damage among characters you control equal to the number of enemies grappled with locations in the staging area.
5d811a82-3729-4b54-8748-e0abffd96e90.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Resolve the Grapple keyword on each enemy discarded by this effect.

5d991933-f49d-4ece-a288-7484ebc75d14.Name: Surprise Attack
5d991933-f49d-4ece-a288-7484ebc75d14.Text: Damage from undefended attacks must be dealt to a hero in the staging area, if able.The first card each player plays each phase does not require a resource match.Forced: After placing progress from questing successfully, each player chooses a hero he owns in the staging area and, takes control of that hero, and exhausts it. Advance to stage 2A.

5da26e76-9e95-4129-aea1-a3460f7b2132.Name: Rain of Arrows
5da26e76-9e95-4129-aea1-a3460f7b2132.Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
5da26e76-9e95-4129-aea1-a3460f7b2132.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 resource token from the Defense of Helm's Deep, or each location in the staging area gains archery 1 until the end of the round.

5ddb243e-ee43-45fd-b4c2-2b197fdf70a9.Name: Giant Scorpion
5ddb243e-ee43-45fd-b4c2-2b197fdf70a9.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack deals damage, the defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.
5ddb243e-ee43-45fd-b4c2-2b197fdf70a9.Text: Forced: After Giant Scorpion damages a character, that character cannot ready until the end of the round.

5df1bf1c-8dc0-4534-9380-6af6812dc6f8.Name: Amarthiúl
5df1bf1c-8dc0-4534-9380-6af6812dc6f8.Text:
Response: After an enemy engages a player, give control of Amarthiúl to that player.

If Amarthiúl leaves play, the players lose the game.

5e0ecd2d-d63e-4507-8707-641b974398ff.Name: Assault on Osgiliath
5e0ecd2d-d63e-4507-8707-641b974398ff.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Setup: Add Palace Remains to the staging area. If there are more Osgiliath locations in the staging area than players in the game, this card gains: "Response: At the beginning of the quest phase, choose 1 non-unique location. If the players quest successfully this phase, remaining progress made beyond the active location's quest points is placed on the chosen location

5e24cde4-29e5-4f8f-82c5-67f96f9c3283.Name: Vigilant Orc
5e24cde4-29e5-4f8f-82c5-67f96f9c3283.Text: Forced: After Vigilant Orc enters the staging area, it makes an immediate attack against the first player. If this attack destroys a character, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

5e39ebfc-287a-49d5-9369-49dbfb0fd665.Name: Roots of Mindolluin
5e39ebfc-287a-49d5-9369-49dbfb0fd665.Text: Each location in the staging area gets +2 quest points.

5e6ece32-827a-4af7-af6b-0d21a0477c99.Name: Fell Rider
5e6ece32-827a-4af7-af6b-0d21a0477c99.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if The One Ring is exhausted).
5e6ece32-827a-4af7-af6b-0d21a0477c99.Text: Forced: After Fell Rider attacks and destroys a character, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.

5e7c36de-a2bb-44e3-951b-80123788d571.Name: The Dead Ride Behind
5e7c36de-a2bb-44e3-951b-80123788d571.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character with less than 2 Ò (Dusk. less than 3 Ò instead. Midnight. less than 4 Ò instead).

5e8714e3-0581-4b6f-bf45-414098819626.Name: Call of the Ring
5e8714e3-0581-4b6f-bf45-414098819626.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
5e8714e3-0581-4b6f-bf45-414098819626.Text: When Revealed: The first player must choose: either search the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for a Nazgul enemy and add it to the staging area, or exhaust The One Ring and reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

5ed5e5a0-8924-424a-a49f-527fe91c6374.Name: Search for an Exit
5ed5e5a0-8924-424a-a49f-527fe91c6374.Text:
The Nameless Fear attacks each player in turn order during the combat phase (deal and discard a new shadow card for each attack). Characters are eligible to attack The Nameless Fear while it is in the staging area.
Side B: The Nameless Fear attacks each player in turn order during the combat phase (deal and discard a new shadow card for each attack). Characters are eligible to attack The Nameless Fear while it is in the staging area.
If The Nameless Fear has 10 or more damage on it, remove all damage from it and advance to the next stage. Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

5ee5fd66-eb6f-4958-a5a0-cc8dbb54142c.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
5ee5fd66-eb6f-4958-a5a0-cc8dbb54142c.Name: The Watcher
5ee5fd66-eb6f-4958-a5a0-cc8dbb54142c.Text:
While The Watcher is in the staging area, it cannot be damage by player card effects. 

If The Watcher is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase, each player must deal 3 damage to 1 character he controls.

5f18c4ca-fcda-46d2-874b-3a1a73ef7c53.Name: Low on Provisions
5f18c4ca-fcda-46d2-874b-3a1a73ef7c53.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û(+2 Û instead if the defending character is undamaged.)
5f18c4ca-fcda-46d2-874b-3a1a73ef7c53.Text: When Revealed:  Each player must assign X damage among characters he controls where X is the number of characters that player controls.

5f93b0c2-fa71-43e3-bfd6-c68c283e5328.Name: Quicksand
5f93b0c2-fa71-43e3-bfd6-c68c283e5328.Shadow: Defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.
5f93b0c2-fa71-43e3-bfd6-c68c283e5328.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 time counter from the current quest or remove each character with 3 or more Ò from the quest.

5fd07c1e-b086-4618-aa6e-89ff34f85c28.Name: Rotten Stench
5fd07c1e-b086-4618-aa6e-89ff34f85c28.Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
5fd07c1e-b086-4618-aa6e-89ff34f85c28.Text: When Revealed: Return the topmost location in the encounter discard pile to the staging area. Until the end of the phase, each location in the staging area gets +1 $.

5fd6638a-3135-460f-bf5e-b3cb0128f939.Name: Daechanar's Will
5fd6638a-3135-460f-bf5e-b3cb0128f939.Shadow: Shadow: Flip Thaurdir after this attack.
5fd6638a-3135-460f-bf5e-b3cb0128f939.Text: When Revealed: Flip Thaurdir. Then, if he is Captain side face-up, Daechanar's Will gains surge.

6008ab23-bedb-4501-aa1a-35bc555f905b.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
6008ab23-bedb-4501-aa1a-35bc555f905b.Name: Thaurdir's Elite
6008ab23-bedb-4501-aa1a-35bc555f905b.Shadow: Shadow: Either raise your threat by 4, or discard an ally you control.
6008ab23-bedb-4501-aa1a-35bc555f905b.Text: Forced: If there are 3 shadow cards dealt to Thaurdir's Elite, discard all shadow cards dealt to it and each player must discard an ally he controls.

60546e25-329e-4846-852d-65c1a6ee6c5c.Name: Bitter Cold
60546e25-329e-4846-852d-65c1a6ee6c5c.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
60546e25-329e-4846-852d-65c1a6ee6c5c.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard each ally he controls, or raise his threat by 1 for each ally he controls.

606ee31e-a9cf-4ccf-8eed-003c006e5168.Keywords: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.
606ee31e-a9cf-4ccf-8eed-003c006e5168.Name: Lórien Rope
606ee31e-a9cf-4ccf-8eed-003c006e5168.Text: Action: Add Lórien Rope to the victory display, and remove it from the campaign pool to give each location in the staging area -2 $ until the end of the phase.

60725069-031c-4251-9b2c-3f368545e9ac.Name: Caldara
60725069-031c-4251-9b2c-3f368545e9ac.Text: Action: Discard Caldara to put 1 Spirit ally from your discard pile into play for each other hero you control with a printed Spirit resource icon.

607c3e44-5add-4c80-bb3b-55b016b6cd0e.Keywords:
Archery 2. Prowl X.

X is the number of players in the game.
607c3e44-5add-4c80-bb3b-55b016b6cd0e.Name: Drúadan Elite
607c3e44-5add-4c80-bb3b-55b016b6cd0e.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks unless any player pays 1 resource.

608ac037-89dd-4aac-8b6d-057bd0fa7507.Name: Galdor of the Havens
608ac037-89dd-4aac-8b6d-057bd0fa7507.Text: Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from your hand, draw 1 card. Limit once per round.

60de774d-eafb-4faa-851e-c28ce6d62f9f.Name: The Prancing Pony
60de774d-eafb-4faa-851e-c28ce6d62f9f.Text: Forced: When the Prancing Pony is explored, the first player must choose: either look at the top 2 cards of the Investigation deck, or each player draws 2 cards.

60e40838-a6f2-4dbd-8ed2-88ba94d9ac0b.Name: Strangling Python
60e40838-a6f2-4dbd-8ed2-88ba94d9ac0b.Text: Forced: After Strangling Python damages a character, attach it to that character. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached character cannot ready.”)

610f3112-1123-4956-a955-df9d42b937bf.Name: Pursuers from Mordor
610f3112-1123-4956-a955-df9d42b937bf.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, place 2 progress on the Orc’s stage.
610f3112-1123-4956-a955-df9d42b937bf.Text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an Orc enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the Orc’s area.

617ce2f8-f33e-4898-9fa4-38787ee9c2b6.Name: Faithless Desecrator
617ce2f8-f33e-4898-9fa4-38787ee9c2b6.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead of the active location is a Ruins location).
617ce2f8-f33e-4898-9fa4-38787ee9c2b6.Text: While engaged with a player, Faithless Desecrator contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area.

61963ddc-1260-471f-afdf-96581602a444.Name: The Passage of the Marshes
61963ddc-1260-471f-afdf-96581602a444.Text: Resolution: Each player must choose: either take a permanent +2 starting threat penalty, or earn 1 copy of The Seatching Eye. Record each player's choice in the campaign log.

61b6316c-dfbd-4f90-ab71-99eee8056047.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
61b6316c-dfbd-4f90-ab71-99eee8056047.Name: Weather Hills
61b6316c-dfbd-4f90-ab71-99eee8056047.Text:
While the players are at stage 1, progress cannot be placed here.
While The One Ring is exhausted, Weather Hills gets +2 $.

6238c12d-b4c0-478f-bd7e-b59ef9b4e86f.Name: Prince Imrahil
6238c12d-b4c0-478f-bd7e-b59ef9b4e86f.Text: While there is a hero card in your discard pile, Prince Imrahil loses the ally card type and gains the hero card type.

624d5999-1a76-4783-b4e4-d9b596242d18.Name: Bolg
624d5999-1a76-4783-b4e4-d9b596242d18.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.

Cannot leave the staging area.

The first Goblin revealed each round gains surge.

6259c002-16d5-4499-baa8-f0e9b8b2ffda.Name: Greenway Path
6259c002-16d5-4499-baa8-f0e9b8b2ffda.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
6259c002-16d5-4499-baa8-f0e9b8b2ffda.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, if Greenway Path is in the staging area, search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for Shadow the War Party, and reveal it.

62ceb94f-5838-4c5c-9547-8786c4c64051.Name: Henneth Annun
62ceb94f-5838-4c5c-9547-8786c4c64051.Text:
While Henneth Annun is the active location, skip both the encounter phase and combat phase, and  ignore the Forced effects on stage 1B and The Black Gate.

Forced: After Henneth Annun becomes the active location, return each engaged enemy to the staging area.

62dd5a22-ccf4-4612-be1f-ea13d7da3ced.Keywords: Attach to a hero with sentinel. Limit 1 per hero.
62dd5a22-ccf4-4612-be1f-ea13d7da3ced.Name: Raven-winged Helm
62dd5a22-ccf4-4612-be1f-ea13d7da3ced.Text: Response: Exhaust Raven-winged Helm to cancel 1 point of damage just dealt to attached character.

62dea330-3ec7-4db0-bea7-382cb3454f83.Name: Man of Harad
62dea330-3ec7-4db0-bea7-382cb3454f83.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 random card from your hand.
62dea330-3ec7-4db0-bea7-382cb3454f83.Text: Forced: After Man of Harad engages you, discard 1 random card from your hand.

6302e603-fade-43b3-a6b3-235af412fdfa.Name: The Havens Burn
6302e603-fade-43b3-a6b3-235af412fdfa.Text:
Forced: When a card is placed underneath The Havens Burn, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
If there are X or more cards underneath The Havens Burn, the Corsairs have destroyed the Elven fleet and the players lose the game. X is 3 more than the number of players in the game.

63284aea-d814-4ceb-bb8e-57f402edc54d.Name: Greenway Footpad
63284aea-d814-4ceb-bb8e-57f402edc54d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if your threat is 35 or higher).
63284aea-d814-4ceb-bb8e-57f402edc54d.Text: When Revealed: Either raise each player's threat by 2 or Greenway Footpad makes an immediate attack against the first player.

638638f0-8177-410a-bce8-9e2bbf5ad81f.Keywords: At the end of the round, discard Elrond from play.
638638f0-8177-410a-bce8-9e2bbf5ad81f.Name: Elrond
638638f0-8177-410a-bce8-9e2bbf5ad81f.Text: Response: After Elrond enters play, choose one: heal all damage on a hero, discard a Condition attachment, or each player draws 1 card.

63b0498f-9180-4e62-83c1-b9aa29f24712.Name: Stranded in Umbar
63b0498f-9180-4e62-83c1-b9aa29f24712.Text: Alarm bells ring from high watchtowers and the city guard shouts for you to lay down your arms and surrender. You must run or be captured!This stage cannot have more than 15 progress tokens on it.While at least 1 player is engaged with an enemy, the players cannot defeat this stage.

63b5d3fe-227a-4781-b9ef-52dc6fb656d5.Name: Drums of the Wild Men
63b5d3fe-227a-4781-b9ef-52dc6fb656d5.Text: When Revealed: Each player must trigger the prowl keyword on each enemy engaged with him, as if that enemy had just been revealed from the encounter deck. Then, return each engaged Wose enemy to the staging area.  If no enemies are returned to the staging area by the effect, Drums of the Wild Men gains surge.

63c6bd3a-5566-412d-9199-3929d2fc3cf2.Name: Scroll of Isildur
63c6bd3a-5566-412d-9199-3929d2fc3cf2.Text:
Reduce the cost to play Scroll of Isildur by 1 for each hero you control with a printed resource Î icon.

Action: Discard Scroll of Isildur to play any Î event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

6461b502-cb47-4528-b18a-db45988f1692.Name: Ride Them Down
6461b502-cb47-4528-b18a-db45988f1692.Text: Quest Action: Choose a non-unique enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, progress would be placed on the quest for questing successfully is instead assigned as damage to the chosen enemy. (Progress must still be placed on any active location first.)

647578d4-8c8d-44d7-8ef5-9c5d962369f0.Name: They're Getting Away!
647578d4-8c8d-44d7-8ef5-9c5d962369f0.Text: When Revealed: If Alcaron's Scroll is attached to an enemy, choose one: either add 1 progress token to that enemy, or each card in the staging area gets +2 $ until the end of the phase.

65407141-e013-4d1c-8f70-4328e707d0cc.Name: The Lucky Number
65407141-e013-4d1c-8f70-4328e707d0cc.Text: Action: Choose a character in play (other than Bilbo Baggins). Add Bilbo Baggins' total Ò, Û, and Ú to that character's Ò, Û, and Ú respectively until the end of the phase.

656f896c-f45f-4ee4-bc44-aa8fd1eada55.Name: Quest Phase - Commit characters
656f896c-f45f-4ee4-bc44-aa8fd1eada55.Text: In player order, exhaust to commit characters to the quest

657e60d4-788e-4064-a8c3-e62584320872.Name: The Fall of Gil-Galad
657e60d4-788e-4064-a8c3-e62584320872.Text:
Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a hero.  
  
 Response: When attached hero is destroyed, add The Fall of Gil-galad to the victory display to reduce your threat by X, where X is the attached hero’s threat cost.

65ad784f-d82e-4659-8d1c-53d2e4d19336.Keywords: Indestructible. Immune to player card effects.
65ad784f-d82e-4659-8d1c-53d2e4d19336.Name: Smaug the Magnificent
65ad784f-d82e-4659-8d1c-53d2e4d19336.Text:
Cannot leave the staging area (except by quest effect) but is considered to be engaged with the first player.

Forced: If Smaug the Magnificent is dealt a shadow card with a burgle effect, he makes an additional attack immediately after this one.

65c93e63-0284-4449-8158-717d763b3023.Name: Many Openings
65c93e63-0284-4449-8158-717d763b3023.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the active location’s $.
65c93e63-0284-4449-8158-717d763b3023.Text: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the round. If the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, reveal an additional encounter card.

65d3b334-df93-43c6-9525-12674bbb7f06.Name: Children of the Sea
65d3b334-df93-43c6-9525-12674bbb7f06.Text: Action: Choose a Silvan or Noldor ally you control. That ally gets +2 Willpower until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, shuffle that ally into its owner's deck if it is still in play.

65f48337-cec0-41a1-84ff-490c4f563ce4.Name: Restless Dead
65f48337-cec0-41a1-84ff-490c4f563ce4.Text: When Revealed: Return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

663a47fc-e264-485b-832d-2c327aa1a493.Name: Interrogation
663a47fc-e264-485b-832d-2c327aa1a493.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle 2 random cards from your hand into your captured deck.
663a47fc-e264-485b-832d-2c327aa1a493.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top card of his captured deck and raises his threat by that card’s printed resource cost. If at least 1 player discarded no cards from this effect, Interrogation gains doomed 2.

6646bb07-0b44-4051-94a7-39c600b38481.Keywords: Attach to a hero or Legolas
6646bb07-0b44-4051-94a7-39c600b38481.Name: Arod
6646bb07-0b44-4051-94a7-39c600b38481.Text: Response: After attached character participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Arod to place 1 progress token on any location.

6651f8a6-e442-4eba-a8b5-13fab4c1e93c.Name: Mumak Trail
6651f8a6-e442-4eba-a8b5-13fab4c1e93c.Text: While Mumak Trail is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Mumak Trail leaves play as an explored location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Wild Mumak and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.”

665b16ad-accf-45c9-8725-f3f5d0818310.Keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
665b16ad-accf-45c9-8725-f3f5d0818310.Name: Booming Ent
665b16ad-accf-45c9-8725-f3f5d0818310.Text: Booming Ent gets +1 Û for each damaged Ent character you control.

66812347-fac2-4a76-aa69-ac0861071c0d.Name: Bodyguard of Bolg
66812347-fac2-4a76-aa69-ac0861071c0d.Text: Forced: When this enemy attacks, deal it an additional shadow card for each quest stage in play with no progress tokens on it.

66a0dc1a-4913-425d-9d94-15b3e505bb40.Name: Eldahir
66a0dc1a-4913-425d-9d94-15b3e505bb40.Text: Action: Spend 1 Î resource to look at a facedown shadow card dealt to an engaged enemy. If that card has a shadow effect, Eldahir gets +2 Ú until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this action. (Limit once per phase.)

66bcd2b8-fcc7-402b-94b2-a45a6c469981.Name: Halbarad
66bcd2b8-fcc7-402b-94b2-a45a6c469981.Text: Reduce the cost to play Halbarad by 1 for each enemy engaged with you. Each enemy engaged with you gets +10 engagement cost.

66cf39b5-015f-4bae-b304-4a61b5d1bedf.Name: Prince Imrahil
66cf39b5-015f-4bae-b304-4a61b5d1bedf.Text: Combat Action: Spend 1 resource from Prince Imrahil’s resource pool to search the top 5 cards of your deck for an ally who shares at least 1 Trait with him, and put that ally into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, shuffle it into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

66d1d599-0c19-46d2-9335-02d68c59a99f.Name: Raid Golfimbul's Vault
66d1d599-0c19-46d2-9335-02d68c59a99f.Text:
Forced: After a card is captured by another card effect, capture a random card from each player's hand underneath Raid Golfimbul's Vault.
Forced: When the captured cards underneath Raid Golfimbul's Vault are rescued, put each rescued Item card into its owner's hand and discard the rest.

66d8e628-8ca8-4605-9017-aece027f054f.Keywords: Attach to a Rohan character. Restricted.
66d8e628-8ca8-4605-9017-aece027f054f.Name: Spear of the Mark
66d8e628-8ca8-4605-9017-aece027f054f.Text: Attached character gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if attacking an enemy in the staging area.)

66f66c2e-36e7-4d97-aebb-1ca413f9edeb.Name: Bombur
66f66c2e-36e7-4d97-aebb-1ca413f9edeb.Text: When counting the number of Dwarf characters you control, Bombur counts as two.

66fc0634-c88c-4af2-a009-8ade84806f98.Name: Gather Your Courage
66fc0634-c88c-4af2-a009-8ade84806f98.Text:
Battling the dead drains your spirit as well as your body.
Surge.
When Revealed: Each player places the top 8 cards of his deck facedown under this quest.
Forced: When this quest is defeated, shuffle each card under this quest into its owner's deck.

6709bafa-87b5-483e-9895-0f2edea7e47a.Name: Quiet the Spirits
6709bafa-87b5-483e-9895-0f2edea7e47a.Text:
Action: Exhaust Amarthiúl or a hero to claim Daechanar’s Brand. Then, attach Daechanar’s Brand to that character.

Attached character gets +1 Û while attacking Undead enemies.

6778eb01-6b07-4dbe-87f1-e854ab548813.Name: Gloin
6778eb01-6b07-4dbe-87f1-e854ab548813.Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, Gloin gains: "Response: After you play Gloin from your hand, choose a hero. Add 2 resources to that hero's resource pool."

67c97a60-a53c-4624-83ec-2122a74ea730.Keywords: While Wooded Shoreline is in the staging area, it gains archery 2.
67c97a60-a53c-4624-83ec-2122a74ea730.Name: Wooded Shoreline
67c97a60-a53c-4624-83ec-2122a74ea730.Text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck.

6805d08f-84e0-412d-a728-35a42ea9a091.Name: The Wicked Willow
6805d08f-84e0-412d-a728-35a42ea9a091.Text:
Old Man Willow cannot leave the staging area but is considered to be engaged with each player and attacks each player in turn order during the combat phase (deal and resolve a shadow card for each attack). 

If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

68384cac-543c-4e62-9866-e066f2ad27f0.Name: Tharbad Patrol
68384cac-543c-4e62-9866-e066f2ad27f0.Text: When Revealed: Attach Tharbad Patrol to a non-unique location in the staging area without a copy of Tharbad Patrol attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After the players travel to attached location, each player must discard the top 2 cards from the encounter deck and engage each enemy he discarded in this way.")

6840ef99-d0e6-4450-b46f-ad04fee2e78c.Name: Blue Mountain Trader
6840ef99-d0e6-4450-b46f-ad04fee2e78c.Text: Action: Choose another player. That player gains control of Blue Mountain Trader. Then, that player moves 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero he controls to the resource pool of a hero you control, or Blue Mountain Trader is discarded.

687c526e-85b5-47e3-b596-37148772c013.Keywords: Play only if you control a Dúnedain hero.
687c526e-85b5-47e3-b596-37148772c013.Name: Ranger Summons
687c526e-85b5-47e3-b596-37148772c013.Text: Planning Action: Shuffle 1 of your set aside Ranger of the North allies with the encounter keyword into the encounter deck. Then, remove Ranger Summons from the game.

687ca930-b64c-4a5c-b6a3-bc3b12d8641d.Name: Flooded Hall
687ca930-b64c-4a5c-b6a3-bc3b12d8641d.Text:
While Flooded Hall is in the staging area, increase the cost to play each ally by 1.

Forced: When resolving the Discover keyword on Flooded Hall, the first player reveals an additional looked at Hazard card for each other player in the game.

688d04e8-80d8-4ea8-9274-0712f26fac9b.Name: Port of Pelargir
688d04e8-80d8-4ea8-9274-0712f26fac9b.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack damages a character, that character cannot ready until the end of the round.
688d04e8-80d8-4ea8-9274-0712f26fac9b.Text: While Port of Pelargir is in the staging area, no more than 1 damage can be healed from each character each round.

688f685a-c89d-46d5-92b6-d827e3ee83d9.Name: Escape from Mount Gram
688f685a-c89d-46d5-92b6-d827e3ee83d9.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: After choosing a starting hero and randomly setting another hero aside facedown, instead of the standard captured deck setup, shuffle any remaining heroes into your captured dec, then place the facedown set aside hero on the bottom of your captured deck.
The players cannot win the game while a hero is captured (underneath an encounter card, or in their captured deck).

68a9d6cc-13a2-417a-ad87-f213ddc2bf48.Keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
68a9d6cc-13a2-417a-ad87-f213ddc2bf48.Name: Wellinghall Preserver
68a9d6cc-13a2-417a-ad87-f213ddc2bf48.Text: Response: After Wellinghall Preserver readies, heal 1 damage from an Ent character.

68ddf4d3-6336-40ed-862c-c68ae97ffb28.Name: Undead Horde
68ddf4d3-6336-40ed-862c-c68ae97ffb28.Text:
Cannot have attachments.
Fore each excess point of combat damage dealt by Undead Horde (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) you must discard 1 card from the top of your deck.

694650d0-9ba6-4573-bf13-10ca8eb7995d.Name: A Fell Light
694650d0-9ba6-4573-bf13-10ca8eb7995d.Shadow: Shadow: Return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.
694650d0-9ba6-4573-bf13-10ca8eb7995d.Text:
Peril.
When Revealed: Put the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile into play engaged with you. Each Undead enemy engaged with you makes an immediate attack.

6950e7ae-27be-4def-954c-8dabe8dd612b.Name: The King Rides Out
6950e7ae-27be-4def-954c-8dabe8dd612b.Text:
Skip the quest phase. Players cannot reduce their threat.

If there are no enemies in play, the players win the game.

697e1c80-a218-4dc7-b0c3-06921e879b81.Name: Robin Smallburrow
697e1c80-a218-4dc7-b0c3-06921e879b81.Text: Response: After you travel to a location, spend 1 Ê resource to raise the engagement cost of each enemy in play by X until the end of the round, where X is that location's quest points. Any player may trigger this response.

6987d363-bcba-4f34-97b1-d26f080c843e.Name: Morgul Tracker
6987d363-bcba-4f34-97b1-d26f080c843e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If undefended, place 1 progress token on To the Tower as well.
6987d363-bcba-4f34-97b1-d26f080c843e.Text: Forced: When Morgul Tracker is optionally engaged, place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

69a257ff-3223-4511-a20f-81cb08655081.Name: Song of Hope
69a257ff-3223-4511-a20f-81cb08655081.Text: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero’s pool to give attached hero +1 Ò until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

69a3ace6-7588-4ec4-91de-780b56502d8a.Keywords: While you are engaged with Soulless Cadaver, your deck cannot be searched.
69a3ace6-7588-4ec4-91de-780b56502d8a.Name: Soulless Cadaver
69a3ace6-7588-4ec4-91de-780b56502d8a.Text: Forced: When Soulless Cadaver engages you, place each card in your hand with printed cost 2 or less on the bottom of your deck.

69a5def2-08da-498c-83d6-406ecbd6bc04.Name: Patrolling Orcs
69a5def2-08da-498c-83d6-406ecbd6bc04.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Forced: After a player engages an enemy, he must either exhaust a character he controls, or remove 1 time counter from the current quest.')

69b6719b-07f5-4514-b747-21fd0e2e9463.Name: Enchanted Land
69b6719b-07f5-4514-b747-21fd0e2e9463.Shadow: Either increase the pursuit value by 1, or attacking enemy cannot take damage until the end of the round.
69b6719b-07f5-4514-b747-21fd0e2e9463.Text: Forced: After an encounter card effect is canceled, increase the pursuit value by 1.

6a3ae84d-6c74-4fbf-9254-b8c1d17c8384.Name: Cursed Caverns
6a3ae84d-6c74-4fbf-9254-b8c1d17c8384.Text:
While Twisting Hollow is the active location, characters cannot ready from card effects.

Forced: If Twisting Hollow is the active location at the end of the quest phase, each player must discard 1 character. Then, you may flip Twisting Hollow to its Grotto side.

6a3e1c91-accd-476b-9ecc-ace35274a052.Keywords: Players cannot optionally engage Bill Ferny.
6a3e1c91-accd-476b-9ecc-ace35274a052.Name: Bill Ferny
6a3e1c91-accd-476b-9ecc-ace35274a052.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the staging step, either shuffle 1 out of play Ringwraith into the encounter deck or each player raises his threat by 1 for each non-☺ hero he committed to the quest.

6a4b0ba7-c80b-4580-bc43-d5369b0c44aa.Name: Black Númenorean
6a4b0ba7-c80b-4580-bc43-d5369b0c44aa.Text: X is the total number of hidden cards in the game. Forced: At the end of the round, each player must raise his threat by 1 for each hiddien card in his play area.

6a768da7-6c40-4002-ad01-e405edd4f286.Name: Eastern Shore
6a768da7-6c40-4002-ad01-e405edd4f286.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.
6a768da7-6c40-4002-ad01-e405edd4f286.Text: While Eastern Shore is in the staging area, each player cannot play more than 1 even each round.

6a871e9e-fa3e-4556-8730-09aed1a3ec40.Name: Hidden Cache
6a871e9e-fa3e-4556-8730-09aed1a3ec40.Text:
Response: After Hidden Cache is discarded from your deck, add 2 resources to the resource pool of a hero you control.

Action: Action: Spend 1 resource to draw 1 card.

6a9ff9c1-64d2-4ed5-a793-9e93e8d605b7.Name: Gimli
6a9ff9c1-64d2-4ed5-a793-9e93e8d605b7.Text: Response: After an enemy is revealed from the encounter deck, ready Gimli.

6ad8ed6c-4b09-4a2a-bc5f-a44b4f180b8e.Name: Spider Broodling
6ad8ed6c-4b09-4a2a-bc5f-a44b4f180b8e.Shadow: Shadow: If On Track is in play, put Spider Broodling into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card.
6ad8ed6c-4b09-4a2a-bc5f-a44b4f180b8e.Text: While On Track is in play, Spider Broodling gains surge.

6b1a56ae-f173-4842-984c-d07b0545ad23.Name: Chief Turch
6b1a56ae-f173-4842-984c-d07b0545ad23.Text:
Cannot have attachments. 
  
 Cannot leave play. 
  
 Chief Turch engages the first player. 
  
Forced: After an enemy engages a player, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

6b2673af-c764-4599-a265-6e43d3b75310.Name: Race To Rivendell
6b2673af-c764-4599-a265-6e43d3b75310.Text:
When Revealed: Add Ford of Bruinen and The Witch-king to the staging area.

While at least 1 Nazgul enemy is in play, Race to Rivendell gets +15 quest points.

Forced: At the end of the round. Reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

6b34adb4-b510-4db9-aaba-9a1876626dce.Name: Three is Company
6b34adb4-b510-4db9-aaba-9a1876626dce.Text:
When a player fails a Hide test, each Nazgul enemy in the staging area engages that player. (Trigger Forced effects after resolving this effect.)

The players cannot advance unless Bag End is in the victory display.

6b828300-4558-4a8b-a591-a9865202a630.Name: Spider Burrow
6b828300-4558-4a8b-a591-a9865202a630.Text:
Immune to player card effects. 
Forced: After Spider Burrow becomes the active location, flip the Search objective to On Track and add Brood Mother to the staging area. 
Forced: When Spider Burrow leaves play as an explored location, set Brood Mother aside, out of play (unless the players are at stage 3B).

6b86cf8e-1708-434d-90a5-93163f3d61ea.Keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. Restricted.
6b86cf8e-1708-434d-90a5-93163f3d61ea.Name: Elven Mail
6b86cf8e-1708-434d-90a5-93163f3d61ea.Text: Attached character gets +2 hit points and gains sentinel.

6b8ca34a-1f6f-4eed-841c-a5d0db80619a.Name: Mugash
6b8ca34a-1f6f-4eed-841c-a5d0db80619a.Text: Forced: After Mugash is defeated, the first player attaches him to a hero he controls and exhausts that hero.  (Counts as a Captive attachment with the text: 'Attached hero cannot ready. If attached hero leaves play, the players lose the game.')

6b928a6d-c90b-4e94-931e-ba5f8f1ebaf4.Keywords: Archery X. X is the number of locations controlled by the first player.
6b928a6d-c90b-4e94-931e-ba5f8f1ebaf4.Name: Haradhrim Warrior
6b928a6d-c90b-4e94-931e-ba5f8f1ebaf4.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to defending character.
6b928a6d-c90b-4e94-931e-ba5f8f1ebaf4.Text: Forced: After Haradhrim Elite engages a player, it gets +X Û and +X Ú until the end of the round.

6ba569dd-92d4-4de4-bfa4-385e2d50eddb.Keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan hero. Restricted.
6ba569dd-92d4-4de4-bfa4-385e2d50eddb.Name: Elven Spear
