6ba569dd-92d4-4de4-bfa4-385e2d50eddb.Text: Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached hero +1 Û until the end of the phase. Limit 3 times per phase.

6c01519b-bb2c-4c8b-b5d3-4951d2a32d13.Name: Misty Mountain Warg
6c01519b-bb2c-4c8b-b5d3-4951d2a32d13.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, place 1 damage on an active location.
6c01519b-bb2c-4c8b-b5d3-4951d2a32d13.Text: When Revealed: Misty Mountain Warg makes an immediate attack against you. If it destroys a character, place 2 damage on each active location.

6c04a40a-0666-4b4f-a768-ddff46857cf0.Keywords: The first player gains control of Gildor Inglorian.
6c04a40a-0666-4b4f-a768-ddff46857cf0.Name: Gildor Inglorian
6c04a40a-0666-4b4f-a768-ddff46857cf0.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, discard Gildor Inglorion.  The first player may spend 1 ☺ resource to cancel this effect.

6c86b76e-003d-40aa-af57-bd0e6536a2f6.Name: Eilenach
6c86b76e-003d-40aa-af57-bd0e6536a2f6.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character has no resources, deal it 1 damage.
6c86b76e-003d-40aa-af57-bd0e6536a2f6.Text: Players cannot travel to Eilenach unless there is at least 1 resource in each hero's resource pool.

6c9419b0-e016-4ba8-b90a-575d4378984e.Name: Search for an Exit
6c9419b0-e016-4ba8-b90a-575d4378984e.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, shuffle the discard pile into the encounter deck and discard the top 5 cards. Resolve the "when revealed" effects of each copy of A Foe Beyond discarded by this effect
No more than 1 progress can be placed on this stage each round.
If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.
Players may bypass this quest card at the end of the combat phase.

6c97c646-1952-4080-ae56-ab7caeafb28f.Name: Balin's Doom
6c97c646-1952-4080-ae56-ab7caeafb28f.Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Goblin, add 1 resource to it.
6c97c646-1952-4080-ae56-ab7caeafb28f.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 resource to each Goblin enemy in play.

6c9c2d37-2ca5-4753-8e1d-655fa5cd3ae7.Name: Hateful Search
6c9c2d37-2ca5-4753-8e1d-655fa5cd3ae7.Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls.
6c9c2d37-2ca5-4753-8e1d-655fa5cd3ae7.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, each damaged location gets +1 $. If there are no locations in the staging area, Hateful Search gains surge.

6cb224c2-d164-484e-b20d-fede3dd640d5.Name: Beasts of Legend
6cb224c2-d164-484e-b20d-fede3dd640d5.Text: During the quest phase, add X $ to the total $ in the staging area, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.Forced: At the end of the round, increase the temperature by 4. While at least 1 Were-worm is in play, the players cannot defeat this stage. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game. If the temperature is 60 or higher, the players lose the game.

6cf22f3e-29bd-4bbb-8459-92b7b4bc6b02.Keywords: Limit 3 copies of None Return in the victory display.
6cf22f3e-29bd-4bbb-8459-92b7b4bc6b02.Name: None Return
6cf22f3e-29bd-4bbb-8459-92b7b4bc6b02.Text: Response: After a non-unique enemy is destroyed, add None Return to the victory display to add that enemy to the victory display.

6cfc4fa5-bbcc-4c99-82b7-bb6359d24750.Name: Southron Soldier
6cfc4fa5-bbcc-4c99-82b7-bb6359d24750.Shadow: Shadow: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Engage it and deal it a shadow card.
6cfc4fa5-bbcc-4c99-82b7-bb6359d24750.Text: Forced: After Southron Soldier engages you, either remove 2 progress tokens from the main quest, or Southron Soldier makes an immediate attack.

6d1eb802-0cb1-427a-9aa3-4e0c3b403681.Name: Overseer Marûl
6d1eb802-0cb1-427a-9aa3-4e0c3b403681.Text:
Overseer Marûl gets +X $, +X Û and +X Ú, where X is the highest number of resources on a Goblin enemy in play.
The players cannot win the game unless Overseer Marûl is in the victory display.

6d2cbe18-4504-46df-821c-d3ce588bcb3f.Name: Heat Exhaustion
6d2cbe18-4504-46df-821c-d3ce588bcb3f.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
6d2cbe18-4504-46df-821c-d3ce588bcb3f.Text: When Revealed: Each player exhausts a character he controls and deals 1 damage to that character.

6d442a61-e9e9-4729-bac1-da3d76af6afa.Name: Ravens of the Mountain
6d442a61-e9e9-4729-bac1-da3d76af6afa.Text: Action: Exhaust a hero you control to shuffle the encounter deck and look at its top card. Place progress tokens on the current quest equal to the revealed card's $. Then, put that card back on top of the encounter deck.

6d4c7a3b-e0e7-4267-8f53-6ba99054892c.Name: River Anduin
6d4c7a3b-e0e7-4267-8f53-6ba99054892c.Text: While River Anduin is in the staging area it gains: "Forced: At the end of the travel phase, each player at this stage raises his threat by 1. Then, River Anduin moves to the staging area to the left, if able."

6d567c10-864f-48a8-8104-14882b2b254e.Name: Western Quarter
6d567c10-864f-48a8-8104-14882b2b254e.Text:
Forced: When you take control of Western Quarter, discard the highest cost attachment you control. 

While a player controls Western Quarter it gains: "Forced: After the 'when revealed' effect of a treachery is canceled, return Western Quarter to the staging area."

6d6d2d0f-7672-4f92-bb07-6a764f655306.Name: The Roots of Ered Luin
6d6d2d0f-7672-4f92-bb07-6a764f655306.Text:
The Discover value on the active location is increased by 1. During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able.

Forced: When this stage is defeated, if Map of Ered Luin is attached to a hero advance to stage 4A. Otherwise, advance to stage 3E.

6da65b9b-39a7-425d-baa1-00b406bcae36.Name: The Spider's Lair
6da65b9b-39a7-425d-baa1-00b406bcae36.Text:
Forced: When The Spider’s Lair is explored, remove 1 resource from Shelob.

Forced: After The Spider’s Lair becomes the active location, Shelob makes an attack against the first player.

6dc19efc-af54-4eff-b9ee-ee45e9fd4072.Name: Éowyn
6dc19efc-af54-4eff-b9ee-ee45e9fd4072.Text: Setup: Reduce your threat by 3. Action: Raise your threat by 3 to ready Éowyn. She gets +9 Û until the end of the phase. (Limit once per game for the group.)

6def55a1-ee80-4570-831b-d591e6effc11.Name: Sandstorm
6def55a1-ee80-4570-831b-d591e6effc11.Shadow: Shadow: Either discard the highest cost attachment you control, or assign X damage among characters you control where X is the number of attachments you control.
6def55a1-ee80-4570-831b-d591e6effc11.Text: When Revealed: Each player either discards his hand, or assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of cards in his hand.

6df2979e-ad8d-4c3b-a27c-5ed4b9b2f948.Name: Tunnels of Mount Gram
6df2979e-ad8d-4c3b-a27c-5ed4b9b2f948.Shadow: Shadow: Capture each attachment attached to the defending character underneath the attacking enemy.
6df2979e-ad8d-4c3b-a27c-5ed4b9b2f948.Text: X is the number of cards captured underneath Tunnels of Mount Gram.

6e193811-584d-4888-a1b8-5296522b5cd1.Name: Misty Mountain Eagle
6e193811-584d-4888-a1b8-5296522b5cd1.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 3 damage to attacking enemy.
6e193811-584d-4888-a1b8-5296522b5cd1.Text: Action: The first player may spend 2 Í resources to (choose one): take control of Misty Mountain Eagle, or discard this ally to discard a non-unique enemy in the staging area.

6e38a878-8211-4bbc-ba7c-ed460874fd67.Name: Life Drain
6e38a878-8211-4bbc-ba7c-ed460874fd67.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is Thaurdir, he gets +3 Û. If this attack destroys a character, attach Life Drain to Thaurdir. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Thaurdir gets +3 hit points.")
6e38a878-8211-4bbc-ba7c-ed460874fd67.Text: Deal Life Drain to Thaurdir, as a shadow card.

6e42b5b8-c708-4f2e-a483-4984db0d1084.Name: Old Stone Troll
6e42b5b8-c708-4f2e-a483-4984db0d1084.Text:
Old Stone Troll gets -10 engagement cost for each Loot objective attached to a hero.
Only the engaged player can declare attackers against Old Stone Troll.

6e449166-50ab-4ec5-875f-3cc8adcbb64e.Name: The Shades of Angmar
6e449166-50ab-4ec5-875f-3cc8adcbb64e.Text:
When Revealed: Each player musst search the encounter deck for a Baleful Shade and put it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck and reveal 1 encounter card per player.

Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, each player discards the top card of his deck.

If a player has no cards in his deck, he is eliminated from the game.

6e4985a3-5501-41ef-bd15-ec58eadba12c.Name: Mithril Seeker
6e4985a3-5501-41ef-bd15-ec58eadba12c.Text:
Mithril Seeker gets +1 Û for each resource on it. 

Forced: When Mithril Seeker attacks, move 1 resource from each of the defending player's heroes to Mithril Seeker.

6e765a17-9c2e-4b30-b023-5f08450553c4.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
6e765a17-9c2e-4b30-b023-5f08450553c4.Name: Sudden Assault

6e82330b-ca0d-4d6b-a796-024de152ca56.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
6e82330b-ca0d-4d6b-a796-024de152ca56.Name: Rotting Thing
6e82330b-ca0d-4d6b-a796-024de152ca56.Text:
Cannot have attachments.
The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.
Forced: After Rotting Thing attacks and destroys a character, place 1 mire token on the active location for each excess point of damage.

6e85113d-a2a6-44a7-895c-ca5115f7b7d2.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
6e85113d-a2a6-44a7-895c-ca5115f7b7d2.Name: Fell Beast
6e85113d-a2a6-44a7-895c-ca5115f7b7d2.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a Nazgul enemy. Limit 1 per enemy. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: “Attached enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, +1 Ú and -10 engagement cost. Forced: At the end of the round, return attached enemy to the staging area.”)

6e97a705-2458-4aa1-ad90-f3cd8200ca5a.Name: Mirror of Galadriel
6e97a705-2458-4aa1-ad90-f3cd8200ca5a.Text: Action: Exhaust Mirror of Galadriel to search the top 10 cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the rest back into your deck. Then, discard a random card from your hand.

6f300089-29ce-42e7-9bd4-2dda667cdd4a.Name: Pelargir Ringleader
6f300089-29ce-42e7-9bd4-2dda667cdd4a.Text: Forced: When Pelargir Ringleader engages a player, return the topmost Brigand enemy in the encounter discard pile to play, engaged with that player.

6f333a3e-6c2f-4f69-9c93-c5f46dc4f339.Name: Orthanc Guard
6f333a3e-6c2f-4f69-9c93-c5f46dc4f339.Text: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, ready Orthanc Guard.

6f7cdfa5-f61f-44b1-8b6c-2b3f477f7557.Name: City Remains
6f7cdfa5-f61f-44b1-8b6c-2b3f477f7557.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player’s threat by 1 for each card underneath The Orcs’ Search.
6f7cdfa5-f61f-44b1-8b6c-2b3f477f7557.Text: Forced: After placing any amount of progress here, trigger the topmost Scour effect in the discard pile, if able.

6f8508d7-bb11-4d5c-a077-80a35e00105e.Keywords: Attach to a Ï or Rohan hero. Restricted.
6f8508d7-bb11-4d5c-a077-80a35e00105e.Name: Rohan Warhorse
6f8508d7-bb11-4d5c-a077-80a35e00105e.Text: Response: After attached hero participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, exhaust Rohan Warhorse to ready attached hero.

6f999889-bd70-42c9-ad2a-b159a5e2f73c.Name: Belching Fire
6f999889-bd70-42c9-ad2a-b159a5e2f73c.Text:
When Revealed: Each Dragon enemy in the staging area makes an immediate attack against the player with the highest total Ò committed to the quest. (Do not deal a shadow card for this attack.)

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 1 card from his hand that matches the revealed card's type and cost.

6fa385cc-3430-44ce-9761-d0558e2b569d.Name: Livery of the Tower
6fa385cc-3430-44ce-9761-d0558e2b569d.Text: Attach to a Gondor hero. Limit 1 per hero. Response: Spend X resource from attached hero’s pool to cancel X damage just dealt to attached hero.

6fe8d036-9b7a-4ca4-bab4-272d2a6a8949.Name: Turned Around
6fe8d036-9b7a-4ca4-bab4-272d2a6a8949.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, return the active location to the staging area.
6fe8d036-9b7a-4ca4-bab4-272d2a6a8949.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 time counter from a card in play, or return the active location to the staging area.

700e2c2e-bb49-40a9-a9ea-f51be3ffe5b4.Name: Refresh phase
700e2c2e-bb49-40a9-a9ea-f51be3ffe5b4.Text: All players may play events or trigger actions and responses

70494c1c-405f-481a-b330-12643c80587e.Name: The Servants of Morgoth
70494c1c-405f-481a-b330-12643c80587e.Text: The first Hazard card revealed each round gains surge. During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able. Forced: When this stage is defeated, if Dwarven Torch is attached to a hero, advance to stage 4A. Otherwise advance to stage 3C.

7056509d-298d-4a21-be0c-9780f30b149e.Name: Grievous Wound
7056509d-298d-4a21-be0c-9780f30b149e.Text:
Setup: Add Grievous Wound to the staging area.
Forced: After a hero takes damage, if Grievous Wound is unattached, attach to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After attached hero exhausts, deal 1 damage to it.")

7068731b-3837-40f3-9e98-6c996af4dddc.Name: Lust for the Ring
7068731b-3837-40f3-9e98-6c996af4dddc.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a non-☺ hero in play. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After The One Ring exhausts, raise each player's threat by 1 and reduce attached hero's Ò to 0 until the end of the round."

70cc4fe9-8e97-4d83-8f48-06dc6a43c43e.Name: Ruins of Arnor
70cc4fe9-8e97-4d83-8f48-06dc6a43c43e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, the defending player raises his threat by 2.
70cc4fe9-8e97-4d83-8f48-06dc6a43c43e.Text: Forced: After the “when revealed” effect of a treachery card is canceled, raise each player’s threat by 2.

70decac2-b07f-4c96-9684-4c008f19610b.Name: The Ford of Harnen
70decac2-b07f-4c96-9684-4c008f19610b.Text:
Forced: After characters are committed to quest, no more than 5 progress can be placed here this round (10 progress instead if each Tamed Mumak in play is committed to the quest).
Forced: After an enemy attacks and destroys a character, place 1 progress on the Orc’s stage.
If you defeat this stage, you have escaped the Orcs and win the game.

70e85866-2f0a-4f4b-b39d-34d36adfc7ab.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
70e85866-2f0a-4f4b-b39d-34d36adfc7ab.Name: Shadow of Mordor
70e85866-2f0a-4f4b-b39d-34d36adfc7ab.Text: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a hero he controls. Until the end of the round, treat the printed text box of each damaged character as if it were blank, except for Traits.

70fc56ec-dca4-485a-8c5e-7d0cf4e17038.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
70fc56ec-dca4-485a-8c5e-7d0cf4e17038.Name: Deadly Road
70fc56ec-dca4-485a-8c5e-7d0cf4e17038.Text: While Deadly Road is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a ‘when revealed’ effect is canceled, raise each player’s threat by 1.” Travel: Spend 1 ☺ resource to travel here.

71079813-3afe-41b7-8746-92dcc1f91084.Name: The Pursuit
71079813-3afe-41b7-8746-92dcc1f91084.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player and add it to the staging area.

7114f4a4-aed2-4b6e-87bc-c0e564e55d67.Name: Dunedain Pathfinder
7114f4a4-aed2-4b6e-87bc-c0e564e55d67.Text: Forced: After this ally enters play, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a non-unique location and add it to the staging area. If no location enters play by this effect, discard Dunedain Pathfinder. Shuffle the encounter deck.

711c92f7-1fe3-4820-82af-9f4e3f7f9647.Name: Inspiring Presence
711c92f7-1fe3-4820-82af-9f4e3f7f9647.Text: Action: Choose a hero you control. Each hero with lower threat cost than the chosen hero gets +2 Ú until the end of the phase. Then, the players as a group may spend 2 Ì resources to give +2 Û to each hero with lower threat cost than the chosen hero until the end of the phase.

715625a1-320e-478c-afd3-bec7111105f2.Name: River Harnen
715625a1-320e-478c-afd3-bec7111105f2.Text:
Immune to player card effects.
The players cannot travel here unless there are at least 20 progress tokens on stage 4B.
Travel: Reveal 1 encounter card per player.
Stage 4B cannot be defeated while River Harnen is in play.

715a7c96-17de-4e8d-8771-a8ae0e36e732.Name: Orc Seeker
715a7c96-17de-4e8d-8771-a8ae0e36e732.Shadow: Reduce each player's threat elimination level by 2 (5 instead if undefended).
715a7c96-17de-4e8d-8771-a8ae0e36e732.Text: When Revealed: Either reduce each player's threat elimination level by 2, or Orc Seeker engages the first player and makes an immediate attack.

718d940a-2b58-4986-af10-06a81546bc9f.Name: Sheltered Valley
718d940a-2b58-4986-af10-06a81546bc9f.Text:
While Sheltered Valley is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Sheltered Valley is explored, heal all damage from 1 character.” 

Travel: Remove 1 resource token from the Mission objective.

71a2ca21-ff50-4a8a-b30b-7c8eaf6bf6b6.Keywords: Attach to the Ring-bearer. Attached hero cannot be healed.
71a2ca21-ff50-4a8a-b30b-7c8eaf6bf6b6.Name: An Evil Wound
71a2ca21-ff50-4a8a-b30b-7c8eaf6bf6b6.Text:
When attached hero would take any amount of damage, reduce the Ring-bearer's life an equal amount instead.

If the Ring-bearer's life reaches zero, the players lose the game.

71d7dd78-a967-43dd-ab73-e46a5d4d4519.Name: Winds of Wrath
71d7dd78-a967-43dd-ab73-e46a5d4d4519.Shadow: Shadow: Either shift your heading off‑course or treat this attack as undefended.
71d7dd78-a967-43dd-ab73-e46a5d4d4519.Text: When Revealed: If you are off-course, deal 1 damage to each character in play. If your heading is at the worst setting (¾), this effect cannot be canceled.

71f1436f-bc66-4bf9-ac87-369ddea7dc64.Name: Fanuidhol
71f1436f-bc66-4bf9-ac87-369ddea7dc64.Text: While Fanuidhol is the active loction, heroes must spend 1 resource from their resource pool to count their Ò during the quest phase.

720b2482-f69c-4a88-8352-721d854704d2.Name: Foes of Ecthelion
720b2482-f69c-4a88-8352-721d854704d2.Text: When Revealed: Add 2 resources to a Raider enemy in the staging area. Each Raider enemy in the staging area gets +1 $ for each resource on it until the end of the phase. If there are no Raider enemies in the staging area, Foes of Ecthelion gains surge.

72230f13-1064-464a-aa14-283a1c61e2e6.Name: Foundations of Stone
72230f13-1064-464a-aa14-283a1c61e2e6.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Forced: When stage 3B is revealed, discard all Mount and Artifact cards from play. Each player must also discard allies he controls until the total printed cost of allies he controls is 6 or less.

72276508-67e0-4133-8b9f-41fb8d44ffa9.Name: Parth Galen
72276508-67e0-4133-8b9f-41fb8d44ffa9.Text:
Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck.
While Parth Galen is in play, the players cannot win the game.

726db6b7-4ff6-4ebc-b1c3-0e52b0fd3c95.Name: Entwood
726db6b7-4ff6-4ebc-b1c3-0e52b0fd3c95.Text: While Entwood is in the staging area, each Huron enemy in the staging area gains: 'Immune to player card effects.' Travel: The first player engages the highest engagement cost Huorn enemy in the staging area.

7271da0e-570b-461c-b632-b6f82ab2c146.Name: Raven Skirmisher
7271da0e-570b-461c-b632-b6f82ab2c146.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the Time X value on the active location.
7271da0e-570b-461c-b632-b6f82ab2c146.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 time counter from the active location, or reveal an additional encounter card.

7275de5f-3f2f-47e0-a90a-58fc45c3bdcf.Name: Saruman's Staff
7275de5f-3f2f-47e0-a90a-58fc45c3bdcf.Text:
Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, Saruman attacks that player. Deal and resolve 2 shadow cards for this attack. Then, remove 1 damage from Saruman. 

While Saruman has any hit points remaining, the players cannot win the game.

728f17db-d741-4f1b-92da-8aac3d78432d.Name: Groping Horror
728f17db-d741-4f1b-92da-8aac3d78432d.Text:
When Revealed: The first player must choose: skip the next travel phase, or each player must pass his hand to the player on his left (discard your hand instead if you are the only player in the game).

Midnight. Groping Horror gains surge.

7295a9fb-961f-42ad-b07d-33793e2f2274.Name: Seal the Tomb
7295a9fb-961f-42ad-b07d-33793e2f2274.Text: Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

72b4cfd3-457b-4574-b638-c0fcce49dd68.Name: Jagged Reef
72b4cfd3-457b-4574-b638-c0fcce49dd68.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the travel phase, if you are on-course (º), place 2 progress on Jagged Reef. If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), deal 2 damage to each Ship objective instead.

72cb5c31-c62f-4870-a5f4-099cdec1d4a7.Name: Map of Earnil
72cb5c31-c62f-4870-a5f4-099cdec1d4a7.Text:
Reduce the cost to play Map of Earnil by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Ê resource icon. 

Action: Discard Map of Earnil to play any Ê event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

72ec977b-6d24-459c-aaa8-49c2a01f0766.Name: Courage Awakened
72ec977b-6d24-459c-aaa8-49c2a01f0766.Text: Action: Choose a hero. That hero gets +2 Ò until the end of the phase. Then, if your threat is 20 or less and this is the first time you played a copy of Courage Awakened this round, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.

7309efbd-ea6a-45d5-bfec-2a4e0fc8d3b7.Keywords: Glorfindel can be played from your discard pile.
7309efbd-ea6a-45d5-bfec-2a4e0fc8d3b7.Name: Glorfindel
7309efbd-ea6a-45d5-bfec-2a4e0fc8d3b7.Text: Action: Discard a card from your hand to ready Glorfindel. (Limit once per phase.)

730dcb7f-df08-450a-8e28-9b436e11bce8.Name: Sauron's Agent
730dcb7f-df08-450a-8e28-9b436e11bce8.Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
730dcb7f-df08-450a-8e28-9b436e11bce8.Text: When Revealed: Bellach makes an immediate attack against each player in turn order. Then, deal 1 damage to the active location for each character destroyed by this effect.

734fd50d-e708-4cc7-82e1-53809f6e7867.Name: The Hordes of Angmar
734fd50d-e708-4cc7-82e1-53809f6e7867.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
734fd50d-e708-4cc7-82e1-53809f6e7867.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either return the highest $ enemy engaged with you to the staging area, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and put it into play engaged with you.

73611bf0-cc37-418a-88bc-ed01624ab33d.Name: Cormallen Fields
73611bf0-cc37-418a-88bc-ed01624ab33d.Text:
While the current quest has battle, Cormallen Fields gets +2 $.
While the current quest has siege, when faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to Cormallen Fields, if able.

7367d16a-2b23-4a95-9050-266e93d8ab50.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
7367d16a-2b23-4a95-9050-266e93d8ab50.Name: Fighting in the Fields
7367d16a-2b23-4a95-9050-266e93d8ab50.Text: The Witch-king and encounter cards dealt to The Witch-king are immune to player card effects. Forced: When an enemy attacks and destroys a character, deal 1 damage to Minas Tirith. The players cannot defeat this stage unless Aragorn is in play and The Witch-king is in the victory display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

7371cfea-03d0-4bc0-98a1-d99e0acdbf88.Name: Escape to Buckland
7371cfea-03d0-4bc0-98a1-d99e0acdbf88.Text:
When Revealed: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Black Rider, reveals it (cannot be cancelled), and adds it to the staging area.  Shuffle the encounter deck.

When a player fails a Hide test, each Nazgul enemy in the staging area engages that player. (Trigger Forced effects after resolving this effect.)

Response: After a player makes a successful Hide test, place X progress on a non-unique location in play.  X is twice the number of players in the game.

73752e58-5dc1-40ea-b294-3c8f1998142d.Name: Dead Things
73752e58-5dc1-40ea-b294-3c8f1998142d.Shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by 1 for each Undead enemy engaged with you.
73752e58-5dc1-40ea-b294-3c8f1998142d.Text:
The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.
Forced: After Dead Things destroys a character, the defending player must raise his threat by 3.

737724a5-2603-40b0-8a0b-4e72dbb3775e.Name: Giant Centipede
737724a5-2603-40b0-8a0b-4e72dbb3775e.Shadow: Shadow: Treat the defending character’s text box as blank until the end of the round.
737724a5-2603-40b0-8a0b-4e72dbb3775e.Text: Forced: After Giant Centipede damages a character, treat that character’s text box as if it were blank until the end of the round (except for Traits).

737a8d5f-2f82-47e4-844e-52fdae95ccf5.Name: Snowdrifts
737a8d5f-2f82-47e4-844e-52fdae95ccf5.Text:
When Revealed: Shuffle 1 more copy of Snowstorm into the encounter deck than the number of players in the game.

Forced: After placing the 11th progress token on Snowdrifts, discard any active location. Caradhras becomes the active location.

73867364-ecad-451c-b75f-3da7ea1f1b48.Name: Hunting Hawk
73867364-ecad-451c-b75f-3da7ea1f1b48.Text:
Cannot have attachments or be optionally engaged,
While Hunting Hawk is in the staging area it gains, "Forced" AFter a player plays an ally, he must either exhaust it, or place 1 damage on an active location."

738b3bad-7a2b-47ad-a34f-503028f4f4c1.Keywords:
X is the number of players in the game.
Immune to player card effects.
738b3bad-7a2b-47ad-a34f-503028f4f4c1.Name: The Secret Chamber
738b3bad-7a2b-47ad-a34f-503028f4f4c1.Text:
Travel: Remove 3 progress from the current quest to travel here.

If The Secret Chamber is placed underneath The Orcs’ Search, the players lose the game.

73969b8e-9591-4ab0-bd28-75c7780875b0.Name: Daechanar's Fall
73969b8e-9591-4ab0-bd28-75c7780875b0.Text:
Reanimated Dead are Undead enemies with 2 $, 2 Û, 2 Ú and 2 hit points.

Progress that would be placed on this quest is instead placed on locations in the staging area, divided as you choose.

Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if there are any locations in play, deal 1 damage to all characters in play. If there are no locations in play, the players have escaped Carn Dûm, and win the game.

740357cb-f22e-4888-aed5-ccc67728b69d.Name: Orc Captor
740357cb-f22e-4888-aed5-ccc67728b69d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +3 Ú until the end of the combat phase.
740357cb-f22e-4888-aed5-ccc67728b69d.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, if Orc Captor is in the staging area, place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

7445051f-ca99-4a2c-8a8c-656f325fa227.Name: Oppressive Forest
7445051f-ca99-4a2c-8a8c-656f325fa227.Shadow: Shadow: If there are no locations in the staging area, add this location to the staging area.
7445051f-ca99-4a2c-8a8c-656f325fa227.Text: While Oppressive Forest is in the staging area, each player cannot play more than 1 card each round.

745919b3-e323-4368-a4ad-25d3bd5baab1.Name: Goblin Trapper
745919b3-e323-4368-a4ad-25d3bd5baab1.Shadow: Shadow: Add Goblin Trapper to the staging area.
745919b3-e323-4368-a4ad-25d3bd5baab1.Text: Forced: After Goblin Trapper engages a player, that player must exhaust a character he controls.

7465c18b-440e-4a90-8ac0-c50c0de03b5d.Name: Desperate Alliance
7465c18b-440e-4a90-8ac0-c50c0de03b5d.Text: Action: Choose a hero you control. Until the end of the phase, give control of that hero and all resources in that hero's resource pool to another player. (Limit 1 per phase.)

74c7150c-c65d-480b-8673-cd2509fc992b.Name: Track the Orcs
74c7150c-c65d-480b-8673-cd2509fc992b.Text:
The weather makes the Orcs difficult to track. It requires all of your skill to read the signs in the rough terrain.
Each enemy gets +10 engagement cost and cannot be optionally engaged.
When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Orc deck (reveal the top 2 cards instead if there are 3 or more players in the game).

74c7a9e0-940f-4b66-bc23-c938eef5587f.Name: Lost Underground
74c7a9e0-940f-4b66-bc23-c938eef5587f.Text:
When Revealed: Flip the Search objective to Off Track. While Lost Underground is in play, the Search objective cannot flip. (Do not resolve the Track keyword.) 
Response: When this stage is defeated, flip the Search objective to On Track and ignore its Forced effect until the end of the phase.

74d1310a-6c88-49cd-bac1-a1d4b5bbbcdc.Name: Morgul Wraith
74d1310a-6c88-49cd-bac1-a1d4b5bbbcdc.Text: While The One Ring is exhausted, Morgul Wraith gets -30 engagement cost and gains “immune to player card effects.”

74f297ed-3cb6-4c2d-83d8-c27b447a9250.Name: Fight at the Fords
74f297ed-3cb6-4c2d-83d8-c27b447a9250.Text:
Time 5. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard Grima from play.

The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Grima.

74f47fcd-31fb-4034-924c-034e1615a3c4.Name: Crebain from Dunland
74f47fcd-31fb-4034-924c-034e1615a3c4.Text:
When Revealed: Either exhaust a hero you control, or engage Crebain from Dunland.
Forced: After Crebain from Dunland engages a player, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

750a1952-58d9-4ab7-aa3f-8cc5fd2ea040.Name: Goblin Skirmisher
750a1952-58d9-4ab7-aa3f-8cc5fd2ea040.Shadow: Deal X damage to defending character. X is the number of resources on attacking enemy.
750a1952-58d9-4ab7-aa3f-8cc5fd2ea040.Text: Each Goblin enemy gets +1 Û for each resource on it. This ability does not stack with other copies of Goblin Skirmisher.

753a527a-63b0-490e-9342-4ee4ac19bc1c.Name: Giant Beetle
753a527a-63b0-490e-9342-4ee4ac19bc1c.Text:
While Giant Beetle is engaged with a player, it gains: "As an additional cost to travel to a safe location, Giant Beetle makes an immediate attack against the engaged player."
Damaged characters cannot be declared as attackers or defenders against Giant Beetle.

7595e0f2-391c-4c39-9147-888d53031784.Name: Lugdush
7595e0f2-391c-4c39-9147-888d53031784.Shadow: If attacking enemy is unique, it cannot take damage until the end of the round.
7595e0f2-391c-4c39-9147-888d53031784.Text: While Lugdush is engaged with a player, each other enemy cannot take damage.

75b111c9-fb49-4a53-ac50-729ff2d06abe.Name: Tom Bombadil
75b111c9-fb49-4a53-ac50-729ff2d06abe.Text: When Revealed: Choose a player. That player gains control of Tom Bombadil, ready and committed to the quest. At the end of the round, discard Tom Bombadil. Then Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. This effect cannot be canceled.

75c1d9eb-9ade-4c71-a918-74cf5b526ff2.Name: Arrows Thick in the Air
75c1d9eb-9ade-4c71-a918-74cf5b526ff2.Shadow: Shadow: Either place attacking enemy facedown under The Black Gate after this attack, or it makes an additional attack against you after this one.
75c1d9eb-9ade-4c71-a918-74cf5b526ff2.Text: When Revealed: Each Harad enemy gains Archery 2 until the end of the round.

75ed364b-fa2c-469e-8af2-289643bef9e7.Name: Lieutenant of Angmar
75ed364b-fa2c-469e-8af2-289643bef9e7.Text:
Lieutenant of Angmar cannot take damage unless there is at least 10 progress on the main quest.

Forced: At the end of the round, Lieutenant of Angmar moves to the staging area with the lowest total $ and makes an immediate attack against the first player.

761f5564-29b7-413e-9e7f-5d3c63c173d7.Name: Angmar Warg-rider
761f5564-29b7-413e-9e7f-5d3c63c173d7.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
761f5564-29b7-413e-9e7f-5d3c63c173d7.Text: Forced: After Angmar Warg-rider engages you, either remove 2 progress from the main quest, or it makes an immediate attack.

76506b8b-4bd1-478f-bc04-512f2b1fc13f.Keywords: While Deeping Wall is the active location, each hero gets +1 Ú.
76506b8b-4bd1-478f-bc04-512f2b1fc13f.Name: Deeping Wall
76506b8b-4bd1-478f-bc04-512f2b1fc13f.Text: Forced: When Deeping Wall is explored, raise each player’s threat by 4.

766735f8-3b17-4b50-aee3-a869837f986c.Name: Mithlond Harbor
766735f8-3b17-4b50-aee3-a869837f986c.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damage token on the active location.
766735f8-3b17-4b50-aee3-a869837f986c.Text: While Mithlond Harbor is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

768ae041-2d15-44a3-a928-62838536a160.Name: Take No Notice
768ae041-2d15-44a3-a928-62838536a160.Text:
Lower the cost to play Take No Notice by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control.

Action: Add 5 to each enemy's engagement cost until the end of the round.

768bab66-1707-41a4-adf3-3baad2e7daad.Name: Decipher Ancient Texts
768bab66-1707-41a4-adf3-3baad2e7daad.Text:
Action: Exhaust Amarthiúl or a hero to claim Orders from Angmar. Then, attach Orders from Angmar to that character.

Attached character gets +1 Ú while defending against Undead enemies.

7691fb33-603e-4460-9f09-5f96bc05c2bb.Name: Sudden Storms
7691fb33-603e-4460-9f09-5f96bc05c2bb.Shadow: Shadow: Excess damage from this attack is dealt to a Ship objective you control.
7691fb33-603e-4460-9f09-5f96bc05c2bb.Text: When Revealed: Either shift your heading off-course or deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

76951dec-233c-41aa-83d2-36497e89e7be.Name: Ghân-buri-Ghân
76951dec-233c-41aa-83d2-36497e89e7be.Text: X is the $ of the active location. Travel Action: Discard Ghân-buri-Ghân to travel to a location without resolving its Travel cost.

769838b7-51c6-4a7e-8f10-c39524b3a9c5.Name: Follow the Orcs
769838b7-51c6-4a7e-8f10-c39524b3a9c5.Text:
X is the pursuit value.

Uglúk cannot leave the staging area or take damage.

Forced: At the end of the combat phase, increase the pursuit value by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

76a512ea-3a6a-4c99-8c29-d980dea802ff.Name: The Fires Spread
76a512ea-3a6a-4c99-8c29-d980dea802ff.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, deal 1 damage to each Aflame location in play.
76a512ea-3a6a-4c99-8c29-d980dea802ff.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each Aflame location in play. If less than 3 total damage is dealt by this effect, The Fires Spread gains surge.

76ee3df4-3ebe-4d2d-9d7f-a0bbe759358a.Name: Círdan the Shipwright
76ee3df4-3ebe-4d2d-9d7f-a0bbe759358a.Text: Draw 1 additional card at the beginning of the resource phase. Forced: After drawing cards at the beginning of the resource phase, choose and discard 1 of those cards.

771c6c83-a602-4c35-92f6-5ac349c4ec8c.Name: Gundabad Climber
771c6c83-a602-4c35-92f6-5ac349c4ec8c.Text: When Revealed: Remove 1 progress from every quest stage in play. (2 progress instead if 3 or more players in the game.)

77414e71-92e8-4237-a627-4d92c02cddbc.Name: Daechannar's Curse
77414e71-92e8-4237-a627-4d92c02cddbc.Text: When Revealed: Attach Daechanar's Curse to the top of the first player's deck. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "The next time a player would draw 1 or more cards from attached deck, reanimate those cards instead. Then, discard Daechanar's Curse.")

775422b6-68bd-4ae3-8229-ce65e38465a9.Name: Mighty Warrior
775422b6-68bd-4ae3-8229-ce65e38465a9.Text:
Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. 
Attached hero gains the Warrior trait.
Response: After you play Mighty Warrior from your hand, draw a card.

778cf45f-cc72-424d-a7b3-09373328dd1b.Name: Windfola
778cf45f-cc72-424d-a7b3-09373328dd1b.Text: Attach to a Ê hero, or to Éowyn. Restricted. Attached character gets +1 Ò. Response: After attached character is removed from the quest, exhaust Windfola to commit attached hero to the quest.

7791cd04-7ffe-41f3-9633-cf57ad3a34ca.Keywords: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Restricted.
7791cd04-7ffe-41f3-9633-cf57ad3a34ca.Name: Sting
7791cd04-7ffe-41f3-9633-cf57ad3a34ca.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.

Response: After attached hero exhausts to defend an attack, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card’s $.

77a7f095-bd59-45a1-a866-d58e17e3bd6d.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
77a7f095-bd59-45a1-a866-d58e17e3bd6d.Name: The Garrison of Gondor

77bb0328-fe88-42a2-af25-2452c51d5e18.Text: Response: Cancel X damage just dealt to a hero.

77dccc28-9be1-41ec-98c2-8b9099678660.Text: While Concealed Woods is the active location, the first enemy with the ambush keyword revealed from the encounter deck each round gains surge.

Forced: When Festering Mire is discarded by the Mire keyword, each player discards his hand.

783ecb94-e005-4ff7-8bc3-76196bba9249.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a Ship objective. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: When attached objective exhausts, deal 2 damage to it. Action: Exhaust 3 characters you control to discard Taking on Water.”)

784aedb3-8bc3-437c-ba35-2a94949c498d.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
784aedb3-8bc3-437c-ba35-2a94949c498d.Name: Sniffing and Hissing
784aedb3-8bc3-437c-ba35-2a94949c498d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by 3.
784aedb3-8bc3-437c-ba35-2a94949c498d.Text: When Revealed: The first player must either exhaust the One Ring and reveal an encounter card, or make a Hide 3 test.

78520dc7-5891-47f3-8782-ca930c434374.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
78520dc7-5891-47f3-8782-ca930c434374.Name: Dead Man of Dunharrow
78520dc7-5891-47f3-8782-ca930c434374.Text: Forced: After Dead Man of Dunharrow engages you, either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or raise your threat by 2.

785367f7-6475-4935-979f-abec23c596f2.Name: Sam Gamgee
785367f7-6475-4935-979f-abec23c596f2.Text:
Reduce the cost to play Sam Gamgee by 2 if you control Frodo Baggins.
Response: After a player raises his threat, that player may spend 1 Ê resource to ready Sam Gamgee. He gets +1 Ò, +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

789fbae0-a33e-4ea0-a34f-adfe3b62dba7.Text:
While you control 2 or fewer heroes, attached hero does not exhaust to commit to the quest.

While you control 5 or fewer characters, attached hero gets +2 Ò.

78fd9e40-f68d-46c9-b6bf-8fec3b77bfcf.Name: Regiments of Crows
78fd9e40-f68d-46c9-b6bf-8fec3b77bfcf.Shadow: Shadow: Undefended damage from this attack must be assigned to the active location.
78fd9e40-f68d-46c9-b6bf-8fec3b77bfcf.Text: When Revealed: Place 3 damage on each active location.

791c7f2d-26ce-4719-a9ca-eaaa11b10924.Name: Pillaging Orc.

791c7f2d-26ce-4719-a9ca-eaaa11b10924.Text: When Revealed: Either discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers, or reveal an additional encounter card.

795579db-249d-4c9d-850f-6f39bc96c063.Name: Squint-Eyed Southerner
795579db-249d-4c9d-850f-6f39bc96c063.Text: When Revealed: You must either shuffle an out of play Ringwraith into the encounter deck or reveal an additional encounter card.

796c0aee-2aea-4999-931d-253fafe7fb26.Name: Blue Mountain Goblin
796c0aee-2aea-4999-931d-253fafe7fb26.Shadow: Shadow: If you control a Loot objective, put Blue Mountain Goblin into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card.
796c0aee-2aea-4999-931d-253fafe7fb26.Text: While a Loot objective is attached to a hero, Blue Mountain Goblin gains surge.

797a1805-f347-4eb3-9f77-5c9e6b6a850f.Name: Southern Belfalas
797a1805-f347-4eb3-9f77-5c9e6b6a850f.Text: Travel: One player must reveal the top card of the Corsair deck and engage it to travel here.Shadow Text:Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard an ally controlled by the defending player.󲂐

797f8633-3df6-4e0e-b42e-c088f34e488f.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Setup: Place 1 Southron Warrior per player facedown under The Cross-roads, then shuffle the facedown cards under The Cross-roads. Set any remaining Southron Warriors aside, out of play.

7991d705-7e2d-4303-abbc-f9999b2d2502.Name: Curse of the Wild Men
7991d705-7e2d-4303-abbc-f9999b2d2502.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each Key objective the players control.
7991d705-7e2d-4303-abbc-f9999b2d2502.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each non-unique character in play. If the players control 3 Key objectives, Curse of the Wild Men gains surge.

79a32e57-7973-43bb-92d2-a0da9c13c5c6.Name: Old Warehouse
79a32e57-7973-43bb-92d2-a0da9c13c5c6.Text: Forced: When triggering the Investigate keyword on Old Warehouse, the first player must choose: either look at 2 additional card, or reduce each player's threat by 3. Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

79b22351-0e03-4bb9-87cb-b0cbefbefb60.Name: Celebrimbor's Secret
79b22351-0e03-4bb9-87cb-b0cbefbefb60.Text:
You are playing Nightmare more.
Forced: When any amount of progress would be placed on a location in the staging area, reduce that amount to 1.
Scour Deal 1 damage to a location in play.

79b5dd16-2427-4950-94e9-46905eebe56d.Name: Crawling Towards Him
79b5dd16-2427-4950-94e9-46905eebe56d.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
79b5dd16-2427-4950-94e9-46905eebe56d.Text: When Revealed: If you have failed a Hide test this phase, remove each character you control form the quest.

79cb32f4-053c-47e1-983d-59d64b493a76.Name: Waters of Nimrodel
79cb32f4-053c-47e1-983d-59d64b493a76.Text: Action: Heal all damage on each character in play.

79d5dc52-cfee-49f9-8a3d-1d4a7a749af2.Name: Drowned Dead
79d5dc52-cfee-49f9-8a3d-1d4a7a749af2.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys an ally, place that ally on the bottom of its owners's deck.
79d5dc52-cfee-49f9-8a3d-1d4a7a749af2.Text: Forced: When Drowned Dead attacks and destroys an ally, place that ally on the bottom of its owner's deck.

79f789a1-8a89-468b-8fb1-7a0292cc963f.Keywords: The first player gains control of Nalir.

79f789a1-8a89-468b-8fb1-7a0292cc963f.Text:

If Nalir leaves play, the players lose the game.

7a165c5c-caba-4af1-880e-845a124344d7.Text: When Revealed: Choose a hero to be removed from the quest and make that hero unconscious. If no hero was removed from the quest by this effect, this card gains surge.

7a2f15bc-d05d-4891-9558-02396affc32b.Name: Servant of the Deceiver
7a2f15bc-d05d-4891-9558-02396affc32b.Text: Forced: When Servant of the Deceiver engages you, look at the top card of your deck. If it is printed cost 2 or less, place it on the bottom of your deck and Servant of the Deceiver gets +2 Û until the end of the round.

7a3411df-76a0-432b-a64a-d499b0b1ae50.Name: Haunted Valley
7a3411df-76a0-432b-a64a-d499b0b1ae50.Text:
While this location is in the staging area, all ready heroes lose all Î, Ì, Ê, and Ï icons.

Planning Action: Exhaust a hero. Any player may trigger this action.

7a5671ee-27e0-4d04-95e3-77fe26a8a88b.Text: While Haradrim Estate is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed here.Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Harad enemy and put it into play engaged with the first player. Then, place 1 progress on the main quest, bypassing the active location. Shuffle the encounter deck.

7a8a2dbe-5a97-42da-a3c9-283724783145.Keywords: Attach to an enemy. Limit 1 per enemy. Attached enemy gets -1 $.

7a8a2dbe-5a97-42da-a3c9-283724783145.Text: Response: When attached enemy is destroyed, reduce each player’s threat by the attached enemy’s printed $.

7a8f5eb3-4c89-4516-974b-812b589cb818.Text:
Response: Exhaust Honour Guard to cancel 1 point of damage just dealt to a character.

Valour Response: Exhaust and discard Honour Guard to cancel up to 5 points of damage just dealt to a character.

7aa7f695-f5b5-4fb4-9296-53ec517d6a30.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by the destroyed character’s Ò.
7aa7f695-f5b5-4fb4-9296-53ec517d6a30.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. The first player must either remove X progress from among the quests in play, or assign X damage among characters he controls. X is the total $ of the discarded cards.

7aa9b24a-7b10-4457-be9e-5bfb78bff865.Name: Centuries of Sorrow

7aa9b24a-7b10-4457-be9e-5bfb78bff865.Text: When Revealed: The first player must choose a new quest to be the current quest, if able.

7ab75169-a42a-49a2-821f-a383a90ad7c0.Name: City Wall
7ab75169-a42a-49a2-821f-a383a90ad7c0.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource on City Wall. Then, if there are 3 resources here, discard City Wall to deal 4 damage to Annúminas and reveal an encounter card.

Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

7ac077eb-0879-4230-8e27-97549f46eb4b.Name: The Serpent’s Redoubt
7ac077eb-0879-4230-8e27-97549f46eb4b.Text: While The Serpent’s Redoubt is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a player plays an ally from his hand, either remove 1 progress from the main quest, or exhaust that ally.” Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

7adc49c0-640d-4934-89c5-312ab584b77c.Name: Thror's Hunting Bow
7adc49c0-640d-4934-89c5-312ab584b77c.Text:
Attached hero gains Ranged.

When making a ranged attack, attached hero gets +2 Û.

7b0eb4e5-962c-4041-baea-3a09a83fb996.Name: Relic from the Dark Years
7b0eb4e5-962c-4041-baea-3a09a83fb996.Text: Midnight. Action: Claim this objective and attach it to a hero you control. Counts as an Artifact attachment with the text: "When attached hero attacks an Oathbreaker, that enemy loses the Spectral keyword until the end of the phase."

7b1fb1e7-481d-4a14-85b1-d5d2c60087b6.Keywords: Attach to a Dúnedain or Healer hero.

7b1fb1e7-481d-4a14-85b1-d5d2c60087b6.Text: Action: Discard Athelas and exhaust attached character to heal all damage on a character. You may discard a Condition attachment from that character.

7b41bc67-160e-4d01-90ba-d00481aa3b81.Name: Southron Rearguard
7b41bc67-160e-4d01-90ba-d00481aa3b81.Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area.
7b41bc67-160e-4d01-90ba-d00481aa3b81.Text:
Cannot have attachments or be placed under The Black Gate.
Southron Rearguard gets –1 engagement cost for each progress token on stage 1B.

7b491dcc-668a-431f-b0a1-ec2bf34840a7.Name: Dunland Raider

7b491dcc-668a-431f-b0a1-ec2bf34840a7.Text: Forced: After Dunland Raider engages a player, that player must deal X damage divided among characters he controls where X equals the number of cards in his hand.

7b4b95f6-5b2d-47ff-b6cb-7bc6c9504b08.Name: Traitor of Many Colors
7b4b95f6-5b2d-47ff-b6cb-7bc6c9504b08.Shadow: Either discard 1 random card from your hand, or attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
7b4b95f6-5b2d-47ff-b6cb-7bc6c9504b08.Text: When Revealed: If Saruman is in play, he makes an immediate attack against you.

7b60b869-4232-40cf-bbc5-6856edeef419.Name: Backtrack
7b60b869-4232-40cf-bbc5-6856edeef419.Text:
Play only if the main quest has no keywords.
Action: Remove X progress from the main quest to place X progress on a location in the staging area.

7b8369b4-cca1-4076-8985-1c7be238ccb0.Name: Final Confrontation
7b8369b4-cca1-4076-8985-1c7be238ccb0.Text: While another enemy has resources on it, Captain Sahír gains indestructible. Forced: When a hero or enemy is destroyed, add its resources to Captain Sahír. If Captain Sahír is destroyed, the players have finally put an end to the Corsairs’ treacherous plot and win the game.

7b9dd852-ed19-4a00-b09e-f6c2cee549fa.Name: The Lord of the Dead
7b9dd852-ed19-4a00-b09e-f6c2cee549fa.Text: While you are engaged with The Lord of the Dead, treat all printed text boxes on characters you control as if they were blank (except for Traits).

7bae4f1a-42b7-46ab-bfbb-0078ed0842a4.Name: Sword of Belegost
7bae4f1a-42b7-46ab-bfbb-0078ed0842a4.Text:
If unattached, the first player claims Sword of Belegost and attaches it to a hero he controls. 
Attached hero gets +4 Û.

Response: Exhaust Sword of Belegost to cancel a shadow effect just triggered.

7c01b52d-35ed-449a-83d1-5879f608ef42.Name: Weather-torn Valley
7c01b52d-35ed-449a-83d1-5879f608ef42.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on Weather-torn Valley while it is the staging area.
While Weather torn Valley is the active location, Weather cards cannot be canceled.

7c069b32-99b8-42b7-a310-893d925c8ca7.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
7c069b32-99b8-42b7-a310-893d925c8ca7.Name: City Wall
7c069b32-99b8-42b7-a310-893d925c8ca7.Text: While City Wall is the active location, damage that would be placed on Minas Tirith must be placed here first. Forced: When City Wall has damage equal to its quest points, discard it. Then, each player raises his threat by 3.

7c463bf7-9a1a-4d8a-879b-f966f19d0695.Name: Prowling Wolf
7c463bf7-9a1a-4d8a-879b-f966f19d0695.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player exhausts a character he controls.
7c463bf7-9a1a-4d8a-879b-f966f19d0695.Text: While engaged with a player, Prowling Wolf gets +1 Û for each location in the staging area

7c5f503a-61aa-4f12-acdf-e52fc51e295f.Name: Sahír's Advance
7c5f503a-61aa-4f12-acdf-e52fc51e295f.Text:
Any time players would place progress on this quest, remove an equal amount of damage from locations in play instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.) 
Each Raider enemy revealed by the encounter deck enters play with 1 resource on it.
If Captain Sahír is in the victory display and each location in play has no damage, the players win the game.

7c7912dc-4d55-4c40-98a0-befbbff24c90.Keywords: You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.
7c7912dc-4d55-4c40-98a0-befbbff24c90.Name: Shadows Give Way

7c92fba9-f79a-4004-886b-eb36698d1d34.Name: Plains of Enedwaith
7c92fba9-f79a-4004-886b-eb36698d1d34.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if undefended).
7c92fba9-f79a-4004-886b-eb36698d1d34.Text: While Plains of Enedwaith is the active location, players do not draw a card during the resource phase.

7cae1eb0-8693-4eb8-b5f0-86a35a271410.Name: Rouse the Ents
7cae1eb0-8693-4eb8-b5f0-86a35a271410.Text:
Players cannot draw cards or gain resources. Do not commit characters to the quest or reveal encounter cards during the quest phase. 
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource here. Then, the players may advance to stage 2. If the players advance, the first player shuffles the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and reveals 1 encounter card for each resource here. Then, remove each Ent objective in the staging area from the game.

7cbf23fd-28c4-494c-97aa-b7fed050ad8b.Name: Stars in Sky
7cbf23fd-28c4-494c-97aa-b7fed050ad8b.Shadow: Shadow: Discard all resources from the defending character's resource pool.
7cbf23fd-28c4-494c-97aa-b7fed050ad8b.Text: When Revealed: Each questing hero must pay 1 resource or it is removed from the quest.

7cf91fea-06b4-43f3-ae5d-96f00884fd71.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
7cf91fea-06b4-43f3-ae5d-96f00884fd71.Name: Blood Runs Chill
7cf91fea-06b4-43f3-ae5d-96f00884fd71.Shadow: Shadow: If your threat is 35 or higher, defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.
7cf91fea-06b4-43f3-ae5d-96f00884fd71.Text: When Revealed: Each player with threat 35 or higher deals 1 damage to each exhausted character he controls.

7d0387db-eba6-44e0-8602-b031a2927ca4.Name: Racing North
7d0387db-eba6-44e0-8602-b031a2927ca4.Text:
Uruk Chieftain cannot take damage.
Forced: After characters are committed to quest, no more than 5 progress can be placed here this round (10 progress instead if each Tamed Mumak in play is committed to the quest).

7d2b321b-d4e6-4dd4-a124-028c772592ee.Name: Weight of Responsibility
7d2b321b-d4e6-4dd4-a124-028c772592ee.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards 1 attachment he controls for each quest card in play.
7d2b321b-d4e6-4dd4-a124-028c772592ee.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card for each quest card in play.

7d3ef70c-4107-4747-9913-048224ba6e76.Name: Swish, smack! Whip crack!

7d3ef70c-4107-4747-9913-048224ba6e76.Text: When Revealed: Each player must assign damage among characters he controls equal to the total number of Goblin enemies engaged with him and in the staging area.

7d55e738-cc23-4e78-9a88-2a25fa4f3ca4.Name: Mugash's Guard
7d55e738-cc23-4e78-9a88-2a25fa4f3ca4.Text:
While a player controls a hero with Mugash attached, Mugash's Guard engages that player.

Forced: After Mugash's Guard destroys a character, if Mugash is attached to a hero, return Mugash to the staging area.

7d5b9903-3521-4ecc-9225-e6216147e020.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
7d5b9903-3521-4ecc-9225-e6216147e020.Name: Blade Tip
7d5b9903-3521-4ecc-9225-e6216147e020.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character is damaged by this attack, attach Blade Tip to that character. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, raise your threat by 2.")

7d76b849-a3c7-4e2d-ab9d-f02ff0cca709.Encounter Set: Over the Misty Mountains Grim - Nightmare
7d76b849-a3c7-4e2d-ab9d-f02ff0cca709.Name: Dim Valley
7d76b849-a3c7-4e2d-ab9d-f02ff0cca709.Text:
Action: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins and spend 1 Í resource to place 5 progress on Dim Valley.

Forced: At the end of the round, each player must discard a random card from his hand.

7d906063-149f-4b7d-b271-e1532afea7c0.Name: Horn's Cry
7d906063-149f-4b7d-b271-e1532afea7c0.Text:
Action:All enemies get -1 Û until the end of the phase.

Valour Action: Choose a player. Each enemy engaged with that player gets -3 Û until the end of the phase.

7dbe33ca-5c8f-411a-ae21-d4b8ceb46f00.Name: The Seat of Amon Hen
7dbe33ca-5c8f-411a-ae21-d4b8ceb46f00.Text:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.

Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.

Response: After you quest successfully, choose a player. That player draws 2 cards and lowers his threat by 2.

7dcb70a6-4be1-4436-8e38-9ebdcc12d165.Name: Blind Wrath
7dcb70a6-4be1-4436-8e38-9ebdcc12d165.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
7dcb70a6-4be1-4436-8e38-9ebdcc12d165.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, each Harad enemy in the staging area gets +2 $, –30 engagement cost, and cannot be optionally engaged.

7ddffdc0-bb6f-4ab3-a6df-c2df039062e8.Name: Palace Ruins
7ddffdc0-bb6f-4ab3-a6df-c2df039062e8.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 card from the top of your deck for each Undead enemy engaged with you.
7ddffdc0-bb6f-4ab3-a6df-c2df039062e8.Text: Discard the top X cards of your deck to reduce Palace Ruins $ by X until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this action. (Limit once per phase.)

7e1db97c-f6dc-43e1-a6f3-7ab600845e93.Name: Ceorl
7e1db97c-f6dc-43e1-a6f3-7ab600845e93.Text: Action: Spend 1 Ê resource to ready Ceorl. Then, you may give control of Ceorl to another player. Any player may trigger this action. (Limit once per phase).

7e20690f-d1bb-4ac3-b2bf-da55f1f95bcc.Name: The Hosts of Isengard
7e20690f-d1bb-4ac3-b2bf-da55f1f95bcc.Text:
Defense.

Forced: After resolving the quest, if the encounter deck did not place at least 1 progress on this stage as the result of questing, the first player reveals 1 encounter card.

7e470346-1828-49c0-b241-58d0dbf27b4b.Name: Piercing Cry
7e470346-1828-49c0-b241-58d0dbf27b4b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
7e470346-1828-49c0-b241-58d0dbf27b4b.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Nazgul enemy. Either add it to the staging area or put it into play engaged with the first player.  Shuffle the encounter deck.

7e8c1439-0d73-459d-b3d9-29c7c2c56e76.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
7e8c1439-0d73-459d-b3d9-29c7c2c56e76.Keywords: Aflame 8. Immune to player card effects.
7e8c1439-0d73-459d-b3d9-29c7c2c56e76.Name: Dawn Star

7e99e1de-9c4f-4dec-9703-359426ba6463.Name: Rising Body Count
7e99e1de-9c4f-4dec-9703-359426ba6463.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, either raise your threat by 2, or shuffle Rising Body Count into the Investigation deck.
7e99e1de-9c4f-4dec-9703-359426ba6463.Text: When Revealed: Either raise each player's threat by 2, or shuffle Rising Body Count into the Investigation deck.

7e9a0e02-59cd-46de-83a8-4b8fe49c7021.Name: Cut Off
7e9a0e02-59cd-46de-83a8-4b8fe49c7021.Text: When Revealed: If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the quest.

7ea102d6-77de-431f-9475-c9be874a5195.Name: Attack on Pelargir
7ea102d6-77de-431f-9475-c9be874a5195.Text: Each Ship location in the staging area is immune to player card effects. The players cannot defeat this stage while Great Corsair Ship is in play. When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

7f0e7969-bca4-48a3-99b5-ba055bd376af.Name: Umbar Patrol
7f0e7969-bca4-48a3-99b5-ba055bd376af.Text: When Revealed: Each player returns an enemy engaged with him to the staging area. Until the end of the round, enemies cannot be optionally engaged. If there are no enemies in the staging area, search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area.

7f16112f-596c-43aa-b73e-3870f0325d66.Name: Raven Talisman
7f16112f-596c-43aa-b73e-3870f0325d66.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, discard your hand and draw three cards.
7f16112f-596c-43aa-b73e-3870f0325d66.Text: When Revealed: Each player draws 1 card. Until the end of the round, add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each card in the first player's hand.

7f458303-66c1-45db-bf3f-20669fea6ff4.Name: Haunting Fog
7f458303-66c1-45db-bf3f-20669fea6ff4.Text: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust a character he controls. Attach Haunting Fog to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached quest gets +6 quest points.”)

7fa34ed7-6c3d-41a2-9c03-d8a766a35ece.Name: White Ship
7fa34ed7-6c3d-41a2-9c03-d8a766a35ece.Text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Corsair enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Forced: When White Ship is placed underneath The Havens Burn, place 1 resource on each Raider enemy in play.

7fb1c173-03d7-4136-af14-58eedb58fcab.Name: Warg of Carn Dûm
7fb1c173-03d7-4136-af14-58eedb58fcab.Text: Forced: After Warg of Carn Dûm engages you, either remove 1 progress from the main quest, or exhaust a charater you control.

7fc629f3-3115-47df-b997-4a5026d97d2b.Name: Off Track
7fc629f3-3115-47df-b997-4a5026d97d2b.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a location in play. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per location. Attached location gets +2 quest points and gains: 'Forced: Remove and additional time counter from the current quest at the end of each refresh phase, if able.'"

7fdde250-5b13-4c94-a9b8-4a3a0029928a.Name: The Taming of Smeagol
7fdde250-5b13-4c94-a9b8-4a3a0029928a.Text:
The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Smeagol.

Forced: After a player declares any number of attackers against Gollum, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Gollum gets +X Ú for this attack, where X is the discarded card's $.

7fe0f143-9d3b-461a-b6bd-bc86e1491311.Name: Dreadful Song
7fe0f143-9d3b-461a-b6bd-bc86e1491311.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a questing character you control. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero's Ò is reduced to 0. Forced: At the end of the round, raise your threat by 1 for each Wight enemy engaged with you."

7fe4a83b-8654-4599-ab5d-6c06e56a7cdc.Name: Southron Warror
7fe4a83b-8654-4599-ab5d-6c06e56a7cdc.Shadow: Atacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character is damaged).
7fe4a83b-8654-4599-ab5d-6c06e56a7cdc.Text: Forced: After Southron Warrior engages you, discard an ally you control.

801078c6-56a9-45f2-b5a4-7e38cb5bc507.Name: Glade of Cleansing
801078c6-56a9-45f2-b5a4-7e38cb5bc507.Text:
Each Wose enemy gains Archery 1.

X is equal to the total archery value of the highest archery Wose enemy in play.

8042f7de-6fed-49cf-95be-450f0fae1601.Name: Banks of Entwash
8042f7de-6fed-49cf-95be-450f0fae1601.Shadow: Shadow: Either increase the pursuit value by 1, or this attack is considered undefended.
8042f7de-6fed-49cf-95be-450f0fae1601.Text: Forced: After any amount of progress is placed on Banks of Entwash, increase the pursuit value by 1.

804e57bd-26e8-495b-9676-2e39f009baba.Name: The Seventh Level
804e57bd-26e8-495b-9676-2e39f009baba.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Setup: Set Overseer Maurûl and Chamber of Records aside, out of play.
Forced: When stage 2B is revealed, make Chamber of Records the active location (returning any currently active location to the staging area) and add Overseer Maurûl to the staging area. Then, shuffle all copies of Balin's Doom in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

8073dade-022c-4ad6-8891-5cb116506ed1.Name: Scavenging Stone-troll
8073dade-022c-4ad6-8891-5cb116506ed1.Text:
You cannot travel to a safe location while Scavenging Stone-troll has no damage on it.
While Scavenging Stone-troll is in the staging area, cards in each player's discard pile cannot leave the discard pile.

807c78ee-ec6b-4df0-9721-1e475f0d04dc.Name: Growing Stench
807c78ee-ec6b-4df0-9721-1e475f0d04dc.Shadow: Defending character cannot ready. If the attacking enemy is Shelob and this attack destroys a character, place 1 resource on Shelob.
807c78ee-ec6b-4df0-9721-1e475f0d04dc.Text: When Revealed: Deal Growing Stench to Shelob as a facedown shadow card.

808f60ad-a63f-4504-9b67-4fd45d630add.Name: Ithilien Woods
808f60ad-a63f-4504-9b67-4fd45d630add.Text:
While Ithilien Woods is the active location, it gains: “Forced: After a player engages a Harad enemy, he readies a character he controls.”

Travel: The first player reveals the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

809470ac-05c2-4578-9556-8c64b84d4619.Name: Hope Rekindled
809470ac-05c2-4578-9556-8c64b84d4619.Text:
Action: Lower the cost of the next event that has a Valour trigger you play this phase by 2.

Valour Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an event that has a Valour trigger and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

809ff5de-8273-4491-adfb-3a27d4b316f3.Keywords:
Prowl 1. Archery X.

X is the number of heroes in play with no resources in their resource pool.
809ff5de-8273-4491-adfb-3a27d4b316f3.Name: Drúadan Hunter

80a03178-4039-4b2c-a2c4-2d546aa9b0b2.Name: Ranger Spear
80a03178-4039-4b2c-a2c4-2d546aa9b0b2.Text: Attach to a Ranger character. Restricted.Attached character gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead when attacking an enemy with an attachment on it).

80af82a2-4377-4049-bb9d-2d79ad66d1db.Name: Dark Alley
80af82a2-4377-4049-bb9d-2d79ad66d1db.Text: Enemies in the staging area cannot take damage. Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards until an enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

80cdd2b5-60cf-4d47-afe7-505b79abcb1b.Name: Forth Eorlingas!
80cdd2b5-60cf-4d47-afe7-505b79abcb1b.Text: Combat Action: Each Rohan hero can be declared as an attacker against enemies in the staging area this phase.

8103129a-77e7-47a2-a039-b0eddf305184.Name: Chetwood Campsite
8103129a-77e7-47a2-a039-b0eddf305184.Text: Immune to player card effects. While Chetwood Campsite is in the victory display, each Suspect gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú. Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Chetwood Outlaw and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

8124f5ac-6f03-4629-96f5-b8775ec8a7c4.Name: Legolas
8124f5ac-6f03-4629-96f5-b8775ec8a7c4.Text: Response: After Legolas commits to a quest, discard a card from your hand to ready another hero. If that hero is Gimli, he gets +1 Ò until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

812dce54-8a84-4a44-94ee-5b2cd2bf1997.Name: Sudden Onslaught
812dce54-8a84-4a44-94ee-5b2cd2bf1997.Shadow: Shadow: Take 1 hidden card. Then, turn 1 hidden card in your play area faceup.
812dce54-8a84-4a44-94ee-5b2cd2bf1997.Text: When Revealed: Each player turns each hidden card in his play area faceup. Each player then takes hidden cards equal to the number of hidden cards he just turned faceup.

81632d10-625e-42f0-9e6b-09574a9ffbc3.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel.
81632d10-625e-42f0-9e6b-09574a9ffbc3.Name: Dawn Star
81632d10-625e-42f0-9e6b-09574a9ffbc3.Text:
Raise your starting threat by 3.
Draw 1 additional card during the resource phase.
If the Dawn Star is destroyed, its controller is eliminated from the game.

8174f1b9-6fd0-4eeb-971d-98b2d7a4eaf4.Name: Summons from Mordor
8174f1b9-6fd0-4eeb-971d-98b2d7a4eaf4.Text: Guarded (location). While Summons from Mordor is attached to an encounter card, each player’s threat cannot be reduced. Action: Exhaust Summons from Mordor and raise your threat by 1 to add 1 resource to attached hero’s pool.

81779961-8776-4c1d-953d-ed7bf1324fbf.Name: Defend the Ship!
81779961-8776-4c1d-953d-ed7bf1324fbf.Text:
During the travel phase, the players may travel to a location in the staging area even if another location is currently active. If they do, return the currently active location to the staging area.
At the end of the round, if the total $ of any one Ship location is 9 or higher, the Stormcaller is destroyed, and the players lose the game.
When Thing in the Depths is destroyed, the players win the game.

818e2f2f-4070-4056-85bd-5e729ccbad30.Name: Forest Stream
818e2f2f-4070-4056-85bd-5e729ccbad30.Text:
While Forest Stream is the active location, poisoned characters cannot quest.

Response: After Forest Stream leaves play as an explored location, discard 4 poison.

81907a30-abb2-44de-b3be-eb44e43977d8.Name: Stalked by Dunlendings
81907a30-abb2-44de-b3be-eb44e43977d8.Shadow: Put the topmost enemy in the discard pile into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card.
81907a30-abb2-44de-b3be-eb44e43977d8.Text: When Revealed: Each player draws 1 card. Until the end of the round, add X $ to the total $ in the staging area. X is the number of cards in the first player's hand.

81b31016-bcc3-4445-8f4d-64187e99aff3.Keywords: Indestructible. Immune to player card effects.
81b31016-bcc3-4445-8f4d-64187e99aff3.Name: Smaug the Golden
81b31016-bcc3-4445-8f4d-64187e99aff3.Text:
Cannot be engaged.

X is the number of non-Burglar characters committed to the quest.

Forced: After the 6th progress token is placed here, the players advance to stage 4A.

81da79b7-cf26-462e-a6e5-36f01f0145f5.Name: Cruel Torment
81da79b7-cf26-462e-a6e5-36f01f0145f5.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Each player cannot have more than 6 cards in his hand. (Each player with more than 6 cards in his hand must immediately discard cards until he has 6 cards in his hand.)"

81de0a94-a871-42af-8497-d66b900c9620.Name: Burnt Sands
81de0a94-a871-42af-8497-d66b900c9620.Text: While the temperature is 40 or higher, Burnt Sands gets +2 $.Forced: After Burnt Sands becomes the active location, increase the temperature by 2.

81e81787-13b1-4bbf-a9ef-b8516deebbbc.Name: Battle in the Dale
81e81787-13b1-4bbf-a9ef-b8516deebbbc.Text:
Players cannot advance from this stage unless stage 2 and stage 4 are complete.

Forced: If there is no progress on this stage at the end of the round, the first player adds the topmost enemy in the discard pile to the staging area, if able.

820e2015-fc9c-4547-8e93-d4eb7cd79691.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
820e2015-fc9c-4547-8e93-d4eb7cd79691.Name: The Paths of the Dead
820e2015-fc9c-4547-8e93-d4eb7cd79691.Text: X is the threat of the player with the highest threat. Each player cannot reduce his threat below his initial threat level. Forced: At the beginning of the planning phase each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1, or you cannot play cards this phase.

82141d38-fb53-472c-a5e8-6a495447c9ad.Name: Prowling Orc
82141d38-fb53-472c-a5e8-6a495447c9ad.Text:
Forced: After Prowling Orc attacks, place 1 damage on the active location.

Scour: Prowling Orc engages the player with the highest threat and makes an immediate attack.

821a078b-ae42-4b69-bd49-cc235916be77.Name: Stricken Dumb
821a078b-ae42-4b69-bd49-cc235916be77.Text: When Revealed: You must either shuffle the top card of the burden deck into the encounter deck and reveal an additional encounter card, or raise each player's threat by 3 and immediately end the quest phase (do not resolve the quest).

822ca699-4763-4b8c-baff-d8d828c002a9.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. X is twice the number of players in the game.
822ca699-4763-4b8c-baff-d8d828c002a9.Name: The Stone of Erech
822ca699-4763-4b8c-baff-d8d828c002a9.Text:
While The Stone of Erech is the active location, characters with less than 2 Ò cannot ready.

Travel: Exhaust each character with less than 2 Ò.

8239e81a-f779-4c7c-b586-cd5ad732f061.Name: The Confrontation
8239e81a-f779-4c7c-b586-cd5ad732f061.Text:
When Revealed: Shuffle the underworld deck into the encounter deck. The players cannot defeat this stage while a Villain is in play.

If this stage is defeated, the players have won the game.

82514713-7cc4-4b76-a5f2-42a69ccff76b.Name: The Clouds Burst
82514713-7cc4-4b76-a5f2-42a69ccff76b.Text:
When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Bodyguard of Bolg and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Progress cannot be placed on this stage. While Bolg is in the staging area, it is considered to be engaged with the first player.

If Bolg is destroyed, the players win the game.

825dfbbb-6ba7-44ad-8327-d06ff46830eb.Name: Grimbold
825dfbbb-6ba7-44ad-8327-d06ff46830eb.Text: Combat Action: Discard Grimbold to choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack that player this phase.

8275a439-ebcd-4cc3-907b-1e217d222806.Name: Don’t let them escape!
8275a439-ebcd-4cc3-907b-1e217d222806.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, discard all progress from the main quest. Forced: After this quest is chosen as the current quest, reveal an encounter card.

82c68020-eb2e-4853-9919-df3066d13721.Name: Bamfurlong
82c68020-eb2e-4853-9919-df3066d13721.Text: Response: After the players travel to Bamfurlong, each player engaged with a Nazgul enemy may ready a hero he controls.

82ca7902-f8fa-4352-8f54-f5f6a8875c51.Name: Broken Battlements
82ca7902-f8fa-4352-8f54-f5f6a8875c51.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from Broken Battlements, each player discards the top 5 cards of his deck and places 1 time counter here.

Travel: Each player discards the top card of his deck.

82f9180c-0d38-4485-b99b-d15ed7910e17.Name: Savage Hillman
82f9180c-0d38-4485-b99b-d15ed7910e17.Text: While the engaged player has 3 or more cards in hand, Savage Hillman cannot take damage. While the engaged player has 5 or more cards in hand, Savage Hillman gets +2 Attack.

8304616a-8990-4d45-855e-3c106e5c76a7.Name: Taken by Surprise
8304616a-8990-4d45-855e-3c106e5c76a7.Text: Forced: When a player looks at any number of cards from the Investigation deck, if Taken by Surprise is among the looked at cards, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards until an enemy is discarded. Put the discarded enemy into play engaged with the first player. Then remove Taken by Surprise from the game.

833664a0-6bab-4e93-b5f1-88e7b6456569.Keywords: Attach to a hero with the printed Ranged keyword. Restricted.
833664a0-6bab-4e93-b5f1-88e7b6456569.Name: Great Yew Bow
833664a0-6bab-4e93-b5f1-88e7b6456569.Text: Combat Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Exhaust Great Yew Bow and attached hero to make a ranged attack against that enemy. Declare attached hero as the attacker. No other attackers can be declared for this attack.

8345c4ad-4c5e-484d-bc6f-d1e4bc27805f.Name: Uruk-hai Fighter
8345c4ad-4c5e-484d-bc6f-d1e4bc27805f.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
8345c4ad-4c5e-484d-bc6f-d1e4bc27805f.Text: Forced: After Uruk-hai Fighter attacks and destroys a character, return it to the staging area.

8351cce0-b16e-4eba-93f2-24015bbc54c1.Name: The Spider’s Hive
8351cce0-b16e-4eba-93f2-24015bbc54c1.Text:
While there are at least 5 progress tokens on this stage, Brood Mother loses the text: “Cannot take damage.” 
Forced: After the Search objective is flipped to Off Track, remove all progress tokens from this stage. 
This stage cannot be defeated while Brood Mother is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

836a759d-d768-4119-929f-cfe874ba944a.Keywords: Weathered Hilltop gets +1 $ for each resource token on it.
836a759d-d768-4119-929f-cfe874ba944a.Name: Weathered Hilltop
836a759d-d768-4119-929f-cfe874ba944a.Text: Forced: After a Weather treachery is revealed from the encounter deck, place 1 resource token here.

836d10fb-8bca-4dee-bea7-0164667b7a61.Name: Dwarven Sellsword
836d10fb-8bca-4dee-bea7-0164667b7a61.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, discard Dwarven Sellsword unless the players as a group spend 1 Î resource.

83842580-bfe9-4d56-addf-e1d290eb7bcf.Name: Heir of Mardil
83842580-bfe9-4d56-addf-e1d290eb7bcf.Text: Response: After attached hero gains any number of resources from a card effect, exhaust Heir of Mardil to ready attached hero.

838eebac-81db-4f00-aaba-024d70a1582d.Name: Broken Lands
838eebac-81db-4f00-aaba-024d70a1582d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each location in the staging area.
838eebac-81db-4f00-aaba-024d70a1582d.Text: While Broken Lands is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

83a77d46-89f5-4eeb-970b-8c1cd7d5eb4a.Name: Sentinel of the Deep
83a77d46-89f5-4eeb-970b-8c1cd7d5eb4a.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and trigger 1 'Lost:' effect in play.
83a77d46-89f5-4eeb-970b-8c1cd7d5eb4a.Text: While Sentinel of the Deep is engaged with a player, that player cannot draw cards from card effects.

83d7214f-d8ae-47f8-bd0a-c48f9a187568.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
83d7214f-d8ae-47f8-bd0a-c48f9a187568.Name: Orc of the Eye
83d7214f-d8ae-47f8-bd0a-c48f9a187568.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it is an Orc).
83d7214f-d8ae-47f8-bd0a-c48f9a187568.Text: When Revealed: Either deal 2 damage to a hero you control, or deal 2 damage to Minas Tirith.

83dd1a59-118c-468d-a47e-e472b066ff3e.Name: Great Corsair Ship
83dd1a59-118c-468d-a47e-e472b066ff3e.Text: X is the number of resources on The Corsiar Fleet. The players cannot travel here unless there are at least 3 Ship locations in the victory display. Travel: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Corsair enemy and adds it to the staging area. One of those enemies must be Corsair Captain, if able.

83febe3a-95e8-4c38-8de7-4c1b1d43c917.Name: Roheryn
83febe3a-95e8-4c38-8de7-4c1b1d43c917.Text: Attach to a Dunedain hero. If attached hero is Aragorn, he gains the Ï icon. Response: After you optionally engage an enemy, exhaust Roheryn and attached hero to declare that hero as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against that enemy.

84202632-1548-4926-b307-c2d771abb97d.Name: Dunedain Lookout
84202632-1548-4926-b307-c2d771abb97d.Text: Response: Discard Dunedain Lookout to cancel the ‘when revealed’ effects on an enemy just revealed from the encounter deck.

846e56e8-ac94-41e0-b29a-aacf7ca8d39e.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
846e56e8-ac94-41e0-b29a-aacf7ca8d39e.Name: The Siege of Cair Andros
846e56e8-ac94-41e0-b29a-aacf7ca8d39e.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Until the end of the game, player cards in the victory display do not contribure their victory points.

8471389d-5424-41f9-8ed8-e7f29e9e78f4.Name: Spider Bite
8471389d-5424-41f9-8ed8-e7f29e9e78f4.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero that is not unconscious. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, give attached hero 1 poison. When attached hero becomes unconscious, discard Spider Bite.")

8472068c-fdd7-4197-8046-b9da12c29135.Name: Searching for Mugash
8472068c-fdd7-4197-8046-b9da12c29135.Text:
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, shuffle the discard pile into the encounter deck and reveal 2 encounter cards per player. Place 2 time counters on this stage.

Response: After questing successfully, cancel all progress that would be placed on this stage. Then, place 1 time counter on this stage. Or, if Mugash is in play, advance to stage 3.

847e6b9c-f795-4625-86d3-4ab6460ccdfe.Name: Old Orc-eyes
847e6b9c-f795-4625-86d3-4ab6460ccdfe.Text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: After an attack resolves in which Old Orc-eyes was dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect, he makes an additional attack against you. Do not deal Old Orc-eyes a shadow cad for this attack.

84877af6-0720-4ef8-802b-69b792c32e15.Name: Find Water
84877af6-0720-4ef8-802b-69b792c32e15.Text:
Characters cannot be readied by player card effects.
Response: When this stage is defeated, each player readies 1 hero he controls.

85045e14-3abc-4d58-824f-249b1fb3643d.Name: Drúadan Thief
85045e14-3abc-4d58-824f-249b1fb3643d.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after it attacks unless any player pays 1 resource.

8527856a-e0eb-4799-9985-e73f1ee5281a.Name: Deep Fissure
8527856a-e0eb-4799-9985-e73f1ee5281a.Text: When Revealed: Remove a character you control from the quest and discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that character's printed Ò is less than the discarded card's $, discard that character.

8534990f-7384-4667-b7fc-c22dcfdd6bba.Name: Village Stable
8534990f-7384-4667-b7fc-c22dcfdd6bba.Text: Response: After triggering the Investigate keyword on Village Stable, if the looked at card is a Suspect or a Hideout, add Village Stable to the victory display to add that card to the staging area. Travel: Each player discards 1 random card from his hand to travel here.

855580e2-87b1-444c-b37a-1062c050d9ee.Name: Biting Insects
855580e2-87b1-444c-b37a-1062c050d9ee.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a random card from your hand and assign X damage among characters you control. X is the discarded card’s cost.
855580e2-87b1-444c-b37a-1062c050d9ee.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards a random card from his hand and assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the discarded card’s cost.

85699571-9cc3-4ccc-98b0-0e1664893ef5.Name: Hirluin the Fair
85699571-9cc3-4ccc-98b0-0e1664893ef5.Text: You may use resources from Hirluin the Fair's resource pool to pay for Outlands ally cards of any sphere.

857d6dc8-ba1e-4839-8e96-a8a0136a2302.Name: Thror's Battle Axe
857d6dc8-ba1e-4839-8e96-a8a0136a2302.Text:
Attached hero gets +2 Û.

Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another enemy engaged with you.

857da3db-7159-4dfa-a925-8547fb6df455.Name: Fierce Folk
857da3db-7159-4dfa-a925-8547fb6df455.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, remove 1 time counter from the active location.
857da3db-7159-4dfa-a925-8547fb6df455.Text: When Revealed: Each player draws 3 cards. Until the end of the round, players cannot play events.

8588e98f-1aaf-4e90-95b9-48b76c0fc4be.Name: Hold Your Ground!
8588e98f-1aaf-4e90-95b9-48b76c0fc4be.Text:
Action: Choose and ready a sentinel character.

Valour Action: Ready all sentinel characters.

85a269eb-63f1-4f63-83c9-30b718d364f6.Name: Sailor of Lune
85a269eb-63f1-4f63-83c9-30b718d364f6.Text: While the top card of your discard pile is an event, Sailor of Lune gets +1 Ò and gains “Cannot be damaged while committed to the quest.”

85eb724c-a258-4d94-83ba-5e9f21d82491.Name: Orc Rearguard
85eb724c-a258-4d94-83ba-5e9f21d82491.Text:
No more than 3 progress tokens can be placed on the current quest each round.

While Orc Rearguard is the current quest it gains: “Forced: At the end of the staging step, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck.”

85ee1e86-178d-40cf-81d3-c86f5a1f2678.Name: Ephel Dúath
85ee1e86-178d-40cf-81d3-c86f5a1f2678.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must either place 1 progress token on To the Tower or treat this attack as undefended.
85ee1e86-178d-40cf-81d3-c86f5a1f2678.Text: While Ephel Dúath is in the staging area, each Captain enemy gets +2 Û.

8607dbe8-720a-436f-a946-af666e5db568.Name: Venomous Spider
8607dbe8-720a-436f-a946-af666e5db568.Shadow: Shadow: Give 2 poison to the defending character.
8607dbe8-720a-436f-a946-af666e5db568.Text: Forced: After a character is declared as a defender against Venomous Spider, give it 1 poison.
