8657c425-d50d-4a14-b7c8-b528463376e6.Name: Orc Taskmaster
8657c425-d50d-4a14-b7c8-b528463376e6.Text:
When Revealed: Add 1 resource to each Goblin enemy in play.
Forced: When a Goblin enemy with at least 1 resource on it is dealt any amount of damage, remove 1 resource from that enemy and cancel all damage just dealt to it.

86583668-7581-4bca-ba10-a4752878740e.Name: Expert Trackers
86583668-7581-4bca-ba10-a4752878740e.Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, exhaust a Scout or Ranger character to place X progress tokens on a location. X is the engaged enemy’s printed $.

866767a4-a4e9-4f61-b8eb-88f21e2fe6f2.Name: Mountains of Shadow
866767a4-a4e9-4f61-b8eb-88f21e2fe6f2.Shadow: Shadow: Either take 2 hidden cards, or this attack is considered undefended.
866767a4-a4e9-4f61-b8eb-88f21e2fe6f2.Text: While Mountains of Shadow is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After you turn 1 or more hidden cards faceup, take 1 hidden card."

867b61a1-4e23-4426-ad94-b912e89055b8.Name: Redhorn Foothills
867b61a1-4e23-4426-ad94-b912e89055b8.Text:
While Redhorn Foothills is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After an enemy is added to the staging area, it gets -5 engagement cost until the end of the round."

Forced: When Redhorn Foothills is explored, each player must discard X cards from his hand at random. X is the number of damage here.

86e0fbfc-04da-46b0-807b-ac58bd60248b.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
86e0fbfc-04da-46b0-807b-ac58bd60248b.Name: Followed by Shadows
86e0fbfc-04da-46b0-807b-ac58bd60248b.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending player has failed a Hide test this round, this attack is considered undefended.
86e0fbfc-04da-46b0-807b-ac58bd60248b.Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player makes a Hide 2 test. Each player who fails this Hide test raises his threat by 5.

86e1977f-0a24-46c8-a7ee-d5d78410f1a3.Name: Dwarf Pipe
86e1977f-0a24-46c8-a7ee-d5d78410f1a3.Text: Attach to a Dwarf character. Limit 1 per character.

86e8724b-32cb-4d63-b918-5754d39d2249.Name: Serpent’s Tail
86e8724b-32cb-4d63-b918-5754d39d2249.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 shadow card to each Ship enemy in play. Then, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each Ship enemy in play gets –10 engagement cost until the end of the round.

86edf661-e3d8-4372-9325-f2d2d5ac354a.Name: Ithilien Lookout
86edf661-e3d8-4372-9325-f2d2d5ac354a.Text: Response: After Ithilien Lookout enters play, look at the top card of the encounter deck. If it is an enemy, you may discard it.

86fb45b5-6fd4-44ce-98d7-ab8a7fe3b611.Name: Slab-bearer
86fb45b5-6fd4-44ce-98d7-ab8a7fe3b611.Text:
Cannot have attachments.
Forced: When Slab-bearer is destroyed, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is an enemy, add it to the staging area.

86fe0f99-d978-40be-8f39-136bec2a3d58.Name: Spirit of the Wild
86fe0f99-d978-40be-8f39-136bec2a3d58.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each Key objective the players control.
86fe0f99-d978-40be-8f39-136bec2a3d58.Text: Spirit of the Wild gets +1 $ and +1 Û for each Key objective the players control.

87025e60-afc4-410b-9b97-c5f527b524c8.Name: Peat Bog
87025e60-afc4-410b-9b97-c5f527b524c8.Text: While Peat Bog is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After the players advance to a quest stage, each player discards 1 random card from his hand."

8741c7a7-be7d-462a-b39a-0c9bfe4042a3.Keywords: Attach to a Ê or Noldor hero. Restricted.
8741c7a7-be7d-462a-b39a-0c9bfe4042a3.Name: Steed of Imladris
8741c7a7-be7d-462a-b39a-0c9bfe4042a3.Text: Response: After attached hero commits to the quest, discard a card from your hand to place 2 progress on the active location.

87464aa2-e890-4151-8a93-55c2be3e44b2.Name: Corsair Captain
87464aa2-e890-4151-8a93-55c2be3e44b2.Text: Cannot be optionally engaged. If the active location is a Ship, Corsair Captain gets -30 engagement cost and gains: “Forced: When Corsair Captain engages you, it makes an immediate attack.”

874a98ba-9b90-49b3-9cd4-c06464696b5b.Name: Fleeing from Tharbad
874a98ba-9b90-49b3-9cd4-c06464696b5b.Text: When Revealed: Advance to a random stage 2A.

874c52e0-e186-49dd-bb4b-7289bf1ecc6f.Name: Deep-Mines
874c52e0-e186-49dd-bb4b-7289bf1ecc6f.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Then if attacking enemy is a Goblin, deal it another shadow card.
874c52e0-e186-49dd-bb4b-7289bf1ecc6f.Text: Forced: When a Goblin enemy enters play, add 1 resource to that enemy if Deep-Mines is in the staging area.

87539fa5-677d-4163-aff5-321841981cd4.Name: Orcs of the White Hand
87539fa5-677d-4163-aff5-321841981cd4.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy, this attack is considered undefended.
87539fa5-677d-4163-aff5-321841981cd4.Text: When Revealed: Remove all damage from each enemy at this stage. Each enemy at this stage gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

877a0217-9708-4139-b305-14c1b83c1d14.Name: Key of the Raven
877a0217-9708-4139-b305-14c1b83c1d14.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle Key of the Raven back into the encounter deck.
877a0217-9708-4139-b305-14c1b83c1d14.Text:
If unattached, the first player must claim Key of the Raven and attach it to a hero he controls.

If Key of the Raven is discarded, add it to the staging area.

877df84f-3f61-41e0-96ad-aab2aae56048.Name: Swarming Goblins
877df84f-3f61-41e0-96ad-aab2aae56048.Text: While you are engaged with Swarming Goblins, it gains: "Forced: When a quest card is bypassed, search the encounter discard pile for a copy of Goblin Spearman and put it into play engaged with you."

87b6ecff-219c-4002-b46b-ca683cb4c25b.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
87b6ecff-219c-4002-b46b-ca683cb4c25b.Name: Stock Woods
87b6ecff-219c-4002-b46b-ca683cb4c25b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û (+3 Û instead if you have failed a Hide test this round).
87b6ecff-219c-4002-b46b-ca683cb4c25b.Text:
While Stock Woods is in the staging area, players cannot commit more than 2 characters to a Hide test.
Travel: The first player makes a Hide 1 test.

87c33692-599d-4914-a513-4353906fc6d4.Name: Daechanar's Brand
87c33692-599d-4914-a513-4353906fc6d4.Text:
Action: Exhaust Amarthiúl or a hero to claim Daechanar’s Brand. Then, attach Daechanar’s Brand to that character.

Attached character gets +1 Û while attacking Undead enemies.

87c80644-57bb-4c66-8df6-c60cadc32d32.Name: Orc Territory
87c80644-57bb-4c66-8df6-c60cadc32d32.Text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a location and adds it to the staging area.  If the total $ in the staging area is less than the total Ò of all characters committed to the quest, each Orc enemy engaged with a player makes an immediate attack.

87ca18e7-934a-4da9-bbb0-3a66f3d1b4c3.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
87ca18e7-934a-4da9-bbb0-3a66f3d1b4c3.Name: Trysting Place
87ca18e7-934a-4da9-bbb0-3a66f3d1b4c3.Text: While Trysting Place is in the staging area, each enemy in the staging area cannot take damage. Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Oathbreaker enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

87d2f0c4-8874-4910-9bb4-4f2d06c64168.Name: Hatred Rekindled
87d2f0c4-8874-4910-9bb4-4f2d06c64168.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack immediately after this one.
87d2f0c4-8874-4910-9bb4-4f2d06c64168.Text: When Revealed: Each enemy engaged with a player makes an immediate attack. Do not deal shadow cards for attacks made by this effect. If no attacks were made by this effect, this card gains surge.

8815a340-fc16-41c5-ac2c-d647876c2bbd.Name: Lazy Lob
8815a340-fc16-41c5-ac2c-d647876c2bbd.Shadow: Shadow: If defending character is poisoned, make that character unconscious.
8815a340-fc16-41c5-ac2c-d647876c2bbd.Text: When Revealed: Each character committed to the quest gets 1 poison.

8830070b-b918-4b74-8dfb-dced3866e53b.Name: Steep Plateau
8830070b-b918-4b74-8dfb-dced3866e53b.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of the defending player’s deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
8830070b-b918-4b74-8dfb-dced3866e53b.Text: Response: After Steep Plateau is explored, look at the facedown side of an Uncharted location in the staging area.

8893eba4-1f9c-4661-bfc2-bb485e023066.Keywords:
Surge.
Mire 1. Forced: When Shifting Quagmire is discarded by the Mire keyword, either return a random location from the victory display to the staging area, or raise each player’s threat by 1 for each location in the victory display.
8893eba4-1f9c-4661-bfc2-bb485e023066.Name: Shifting Quagmire
8893eba4-1f9c-4661-bfc2-bb485e023066.Text: Travel: Spend 1 ☺ resource to travel here.

88a7e17c-4733-48c1-ad95-c2b01b8db5df.Name: Glittering Caves
88a7e17c-4733-48c1-ad95-c2b01b8db5df.Text:
Immmune to player card effects.
The players cannot travel here unless they are at stage 4B.
While Glittering Caves is the active location, it gains: "Skip the combat phase. Forced: At the end of the round, add Glittering Caves to the victory display and raise each player's threat by 2."

88df7c56-ee11-48f0-b6a0-0486e0a8ce92.Name: Tarlang's Neck
88df7c56-ee11-48f0-b6a0-0486e0a8ce92.Text: While Tarlang's Neck is the active location, it gains, "Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, the players must either immediately end the encounter phase, or the first player must engage all enemies in the staging area."

8948aa81-f7fb-4979-9add-555598df529a.Name: Seat of Seeing
8948aa81-f7fb-4979-9add-555598df529a.Text: Response: When Seat of Seeing is explored, choose a burden card in play, in the encounter deck, or in the discard pile, and remove it from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. (If you are playing campaign mode, remove that card from the Campaign Pool.)

898579aa-324e-4e58-920e-30ab29c8700a.Name: Silent Guardian
898579aa-324e-4e58-920e-30ab29c8700a.Text: While you are engaged with Silent Guardian it gains: "Forced: The first time you play an event card each round, instead of discarding that card after playing it, reanimate it."

89a39894-f5d2-42a5-9927-fb057db778f4.Name: Hunted in Hollin
89a39894-f5d2-42a5-9927-fb057db778f4.Text: When Revealed: Either raise your threat by 6, or engage the lowest engagement cost enemy in the staging area and reveal an encounter card.

89f263b0-c4a5-43ea-b59d-6207f9f65954.Name: A Fell Wraith
89f263b0-c4a5-43ea-b59d-6207f9f65954.Text:
Forced: After Thaurdir attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller must either discard the top 3 cards of his deck, or return Thaurdir to the staging area.

If a player has no cards in his deck, he is eliminated from the game. The players cannot defeat this stage while Thaurdir has any hit points remaining. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

8a0a834b-d10c-43b1-a43c-75b459c18374.Name: Uruks of the Eye
8a0a834b-d10c-43b1-a43c-75b459c18374.Text:
Each Orc enemy in the staging area gets -5 engagement cost.
Each Orc enemy engaged with a player gets +1 $.

8a0c8aef-d820-495f-b8f6-f2148f0786ba.Name: The Trial of Intuition
8a0c8aef-d820-495f-b8f6-f2148f0786ba.Text:
Each Guardian enemy engages the first player. Any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.)

When the players control the current trial’s Key objective, add all Guardian enemies and Barrow locations in play to the victory display and immediately advance to a stage 2A of the players’ choice. If all stage 2 quests have been
defeated, advance to stage 3A, instead.

8a236d16-1b31-474c-992b-3a2cd91a3b71.Name: The Free Peoples
8a236d16-1b31-474c-992b-3a2cd91a3b71.Text:
Play only if the characters you control have a total of at least 9 different Traits among them. 
Action: Ready each character in play. Until the end of the phase, each character you control gets +1 Ò.

8a2a900e-3e98-4724-9350-93afa955016a.Name: Methedras Peak
8a2a900e-3e98-4724-9350-93afa955016a.Text: X is the number of characters controlled by the first player. Forced: After Methedras Peak leaves play as an explored location, each player searches 3.

8a2d9c58-cf82-4e3f-90df-240e2bebb5e9.Name: Biting Wind
8a2d9c58-cf82-4e3f-90df-240e2bebb5e9.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
8a2d9c58-cf82-4e3f-90df-240e2bebb5e9.Text: When Revealed: Assign X damage among characters committed to the quest. X is the number of characters committed to the quest.

8a4aebc3-32db-4b2f-965c-548058440a7c.Name: Decrepit Rooftops
8a4aebc3-32db-4b2f-965c-548058440a7c.Text:
While Decrepit Rooftops is the active location, enemies get +1 $ and do not make engagement checks.

Forced: After traveling to Decrepit Rooftops, return all engaged enemies to the staging area.

8a5f4d2e-9558-413f-9913-376ec6a0c184.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
8a5f4d2e-9558-413f-9913-376ec6a0c184.Name: Shadow Host
8a5f4d2e-9558-413f-9913-376ec6a0c184.Text: Forced: After Shadow Host engages you, either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or it makes an immediate attack.

8a5ff815-56cf-4d5f-a649-a111e736a9f1.Name: Flame of Anor
8a5ff815-56cf-4d5f-a649-a111e736a9f1.Text: Action: Add Flame of Anor to the victory display and discard the top card of your deck to ready an Istari character you control. That character gets +X Û until the end of the phase where X is the discarded card's cost.

8a6566b1-2425-442b-8e44-f8a3aa4590fe.Keywords: Attach to a Dúnedain or Gondor hero. Restricted.
8a6566b1-2425-442b-8e44-f8a3aa4590fe.Name: Sword of Númenor
8a6566b1-2425-442b-8e44-f8a3aa4590fe.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 Û.

Response: After attached hero participates in an attack that destroys an enemy with 5 or more printed hit points, exhaust Sword of Númenor to add 1 resource to attached hero’s resource pool.

8ab1b53d-df75-487e-9351-60690fba1df5.Name: Steaming Vent
8ab1b53d-df75-487e-9351-60690fba1df5.Text:
While Steaming Vent is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a player commits characters to the quest, he deals 1 damage to a questing character he controls.” 

Wizardry: Assign X damage among characters in play. X is 1 more than the number of players in the game.

8ab3701c-7814-403c-be93-21cdff4283ed.Name: Dunlending Bandit
8ab3701c-7814-403c-be93-21cdff4283ed.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending player has at least 3 cards in his hand).
8ab3701c-7814-403c-be93-21cdff4283ed.Text: While engaged with a player, Dunlending Bandit gets +1 Û for each card in that player's hand

8ac2d3ea-7e6d-4e9e-9cc5-70b65b24b835.Name: The Dead City Looms
8ac2d3ea-7e6d-4e9e-9cc5-70b65b24b835.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each progress token on To the Tower.
8ac2d3ea-7e6d-4e9e-9cc5-70b65b24b835.Text: When Revealed: Raise each player's threat by the number of progress tokens on To the Tower. If there are no progress tokens on To the Tower, The Dead City Looms gains surge.

8ad1cefa-21c5-435c-8865-6417de0e5ba6.Name: Prepare for Battle
8ad1cefa-21c5-435c-8865-6417de0e5ba6.Text: Response: At the beginning of the quest phase, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy and put it into play engaged with you. Then, reveal one less encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0). Shuffle the encounter deck.

8ae15724-e823-4f55-a9e8-c75b3e795e9a.Keywords:
Attach to Círdan the Shipwright or Gandalf.
Attached character gains a Ì resource icon.
8ae15724-e823-4f55-a9e8-c75b3e795e9a.Name: Narya
8ae15724-e823-4f55-a9e8-c75b3e795e9a.Text: Action: Exhaust Narya and attached character to choose and ready up to 2 allies. Each of those allies gets +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

8aea2aaf-8320-4694-bc64-fc264b409bab.Name: Argalad
8aea2aaf-8320-4694-bc64-fc264b409bab.Text: Action: Exhaust Argalad to choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that enemy gets -X $, where X is Argalad's Û. If this effect reduces the enemy's $ to 0, deal 1 damage to it. (Limit once per round.)

8af079b1-fe2f-407e-a66c-0c9421ffe5d6.Name: Vicious Trackers
8af079b1-fe2f-407e-a66c-0c9421ffe5d6.Text: While Vicious Tracker is engaged with a player, that player is considered to have +20 threat for purposes of engagement checks only.

8affd994-f7f5-4341-8437-899f9a31b094.Name: Lying in Wait
8affd994-f7f5-4341-8437-899f9a31b094.Text: When Revealed: The first player turns each hidden card in his play area faceup. Resolve the "When Revealed" effects of each encounter cards turned faceup by this effect. If a location is turned faceup, add it to the staging area.

8b083bb8-0ada-484a-9f83-6c8f431170b5.Name: Carrion Bird
8b083bb8-0ada-484a-9f83-6c8f431170b5.Text: Carrion Bird gets -1 engagement cost for each damaged character in play.Forced: After Carrion Bird engages you, discard a damaged character you control.

8b15901c-c6b2-421e-8c6d-3200558e3609.Keywords: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.
8b15901c-c6b2-421e-8c6d-3200558e3609.Name: Leaf-wrapped Lembas
8b15901c-c6b2-421e-8c6d-3200558e3609.Text: Action: Add Leaf-wrapped Lembas to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool, to ready all heroes in play.

8b203ead-9fb6-4734-9109-3633fc24d1a9.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. Cannot leave the staging area.
8b203ead-9fb6-4734-9109-3633fc24d1a9.Name: The Crossing at Tharbad
8b203ead-9fb6-4734-9109-3633fc24d1a9.Text:
The Crossing at Tharbad gets +2 quest points for each player in the game.

When The Crossing at Tharbad is explored, the players win the game.

8b225bb2-a809-45ce-af4a-aa98f1d53e82.Name: Eastern Mines
8b225bb2-a809-45ce-af4a-aa98f1d53e82.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must choose and trigger 1 "Lost:" effect in play.
8b225bb2-a809-45ce-af4a-aa98f1d53e82.Text: Travel: The first player must make a locate test to travel here. If this test is failed, return Eastern Mines to the staging area and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.

8b4dd0c5-3847-46f6-a69b-a4c7ee2b21c8.Name: The Morgul Rider
8b4dd0c5-3847-46f6-a69b-a4c7ee2b21c8.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

Nazgûl of Minas Morgul cannot leave play unless destroyed.

If Nazgûl of Minas Morgul is defeated, the players have won the game.

8b5a0dda-9a9c-431b-9363-be586969d493.Name: Unlikely Friendship
8b5a0dda-9a9c-431b-9363-be586969d493.Text: Play only if you control a unique character with the Silvan trait and another unique character with the Dwarf trait.Action: Draw 1 card and add 1 resource to the resource pool of a hero you control.

8b7c17f3-09d1-45a4-93ff-3b17a3285f35.Name: Witch of Angmar
8b7c17f3-09d1-45a4-93ff-3b17a3285f35.Text: Forced: When you resolve shadow cards dealt to Witch of Angmar, if they have the Sorcery trait, resolve their “when revealed” effects. (Resolve any shadow effects first.)

8b95d0c6-eda4-4820-8279-6bdddae7b499.Name: East Road Ranger
8b95d0c6-eda4-4820-8279-6bdddae7b499.Text: East Road Ranger gets +2 Ò while committed to a side quest.

8b9b03e6-0036-473a-bdb7-d2d8e74edc69.Keywords: The Searching Eye functions like a player card.
8b9b03e6-0036-473a-bdb7-d2d8e74edc69.Name: The Searching Eye
8b9b03e6-0036-473a-bdb7-d2d8e74edc69.Text: Forced: After you draw this card, either exhaust each hero you control, or reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

8b9da56f-6713-457f-8f73-6fdc8168348f.Name: Heir of Valandil
8b9da56f-6713-457f-8f73-6fdc8168348f.Text: Planning Action: Exhaust Heir of Valandil to reduce the cost of the next Dúnedain ally you play this phase by 1 for each enemy engaged with you.

8ba47620-aead-42a5-a057-41cb038f5234.Name: Morgul Orc
8ba47620-aead-42a5-a057-41cb038f5234.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 random card from your hand.
8ba47620-aead-42a5-a057-41cb038f5234.Text: When Revealed: Either discard 1 random card from your hand, or reveal an additional encounter card.

8bb270a0-72b4-49d5-a4d3-a962edd5f67b.Name: Daechanar
8bb270a0-72b4-49d5-a4d3-a962edd5f67b.Text:
Cannot have attachments.

Daechanar gets +1 Û for each Sorcery card in play, and gains indestructible while at least 1 Sorcery card is in play.

Forced: When Daechanar is damaged, if there is at least 1 Sorcery card in play, cancel all damage just dealt and remove a Sorcery card from the game.

8bc37a15-f097-4471-8259-ac6f2cac3bc3.Name: Cunning Wolves
8bc37a15-f097-4471-8259-ac6f2cac3bc3.Shadow: Shadow: If it is Night, deal attacking enemy 2 additional shadow cards.
8bc37a15-f097-4471-8259-ac6f2cac3bc3.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached quest gets +3 quest points. Each Warg enemy cannot be optionally engaged.")

8bd2808a-55d4-41f7-946a-2726a3583eaf.Name: Wolf's Guardian
8bd2808a-55d4-41f7-946a-2726a3583eaf.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from Wolf’s Guardian, it makes an immediate attack against the engaged player. Place
3 time counters on Wolf’s Guardian.

8bf452c7-09ab-482b-b44c-0861b7e63ecc.Name: Concealed Orc-camp
8bf452c7-09ab-482b-b44c-0861b7e63ecc.Text:
While Concealed Orc-camp is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Concealed Orc-camp is explored, place 1 resource token on the Mission objective.” 

Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Orc enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

8bfb1224-0a31-4ced-9e68-cb0b9d438035.Name: Shrouded Wilderness
8bfb1224-0a31-4ced-9e68-cb0b9d438035.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Then, if it is Night, deal attacking enemy another shadow card.
8bfb1224-0a31-4ced-9e68-cb0b9d438035.Text:
While it is Night, progress cannot be placed on Shrouded Wilderness.
Travel: Flip the Time objective from Daybreak to Nightfall.

8bfc0f18-87f6-410b-b3b1-8486ca3627c7.Name: Eastemnet
8bfc0f18-87f6-410b-b3b1-8486ca3627c7.Text:
While Eastemnet is the active location, it gains: “Response: After Eastemnet is explored, add 1 resource to each hero’s resource pool.” 

Travel: Increase the pursuit value by 1.

8c15fd9d-0956-474a-9051-51f36890c7a5.Name: Forced Off Track
8c15fd9d-0956-474a-9051-51f36890c7a5.Shadow: Shadow: If On Track is in play, attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
8c15fd9d-0956-474a-9051-51f36890c7a5.Text: When Revealed: Either flip the Search objective to Off Track, or deal 1 damage to each questing character.

8c6be9f6-f97c-40a9-88da-2f3ba7f640ed.Name: Herald of Anórien
8c6be9f6-f97c-40a9-88da-2f3ba7f640ed.Text: You may give Herald of Anórien doomed 2 when you play it from your hand. If you do, it gains: "Response: After you play Herald of Anórien, choose a player. That player may put into play 1 ally from his hand with a printed cost of 2 or lower."

8c7077ad-6b73-4ffc-86a4-891f9e4b839e.Keywords: Play only before the staging step.
8c7077ad-6b73-4ffc-86a4-891f9e4b839e.Name: Battle-Fury
8c7077ad-6b73-4ffc-86a4-891f9e4b839e.Text: Quest Action: Exhaust a hero you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against any eligible enemy target. Then, the players as a group may spend 1 Ê resource to commit that hero to the quest.

8c844d0e-74df-4def-a1e7-cb5d2e255908.Name: Drúadan Stalker
8c844d0e-74df-4def-a1e7-cb5d2e255908.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û.  X is that enemy's prowl value.
8c844d0e-74df-4def-a1e7-cb5d2e255908.Text: As an assitional cost to optionally engage Drúadan Stalker, you must spend 2 resources.

8c9df134-1740-42a5-a69e-32cd928e884f.Name: Tumultuous Assault
8c9df134-1740-42a5-a69e-32cd928e884f.Text: When Revealed: Return each engaged enemy with the ambush keyword to the staging area. Each player makes engagement checks against each enemy in the staging area, as if it were the encounter phase. If there are no enemies with the ambush keyword in play, Tumultuous Assault gains surge.

8cc366fb-68f0-4401-9df9-20f9258a728c.Name: Spy from Mordor
8cc366fb-68f0-4401-9df9-20f9258a728c.Text: Forced: When Spy from Mordor attacks, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

8d3c19e0-28f2-4a3d-91b2-8e9911ac4c91.Name: Umbar Pirate Crew
8d3c19e0-28f2-4a3d-91b2-8e9911ac4c91.Shadow: Shadow: If the active location is a Ship, return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
8d3c19e0-28f2-4a3d-91b2-8e9911ac4c91.Text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: When Umbar Pirate Crew engages you, exhaust a character you control.

8d55b746-417d-4996-b69b-01c80a7e4602.Name: Cobwebbed Cavern
8d55b746-417d-4996-b69b-01c80a7e4602.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
8d55b746-417d-4996-b69b-01c80a7e4602.Text: While On Track is in play, Cobwebbed Cavern gets +2 $.

8d6a15a8-e363-46bb-8e49-0af45a1ea0d1.Name: Galadriel
8d6a15a8-e363-46bb-8e49-0af45a1ea0d1.Text:
Galadriel cannot quest, attack, or defend. Allies you control do not exhaust to commit to the quest during the round they enter play.

Action: Exhaust Galadriel to choose a player. That player reduces his threat by 1 and draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

8d99a2be-18d6-4bfb-85ab-7be54a18e6b7.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
8d99a2be-18d6-4bfb-85ab-7be54a18e6b7.Name: Black Mare
8d99a2be-18d6-4bfb-85ab-7be54a18e6b7.Shadow: Shadow: Attach Black Mare to Thaurdir.
8d99a2be-18d6-4bfb-85ab-7be54a18e6b7.Text: When Revealed: Attach to Thaurdir. (Counts as a Mount attachment with the text: "Black Mare remains attached even if Thaurdir flips. Thaurdir gets +3 hit points. Forced: After Thaurdir is flipped, raise each player's threat by 1.")

8da00775-fb2b-4abe-bde9-39ecce643d5d.Name: Secret Tunnel
8da00775-fb2b-4abe-bde9-39ecce643d5d.Text:
Forced: After a player fails a burgle attempt, each player raises his threat by 2.

Travel: Exhaust Bilbo Baggins and spend 1 Í resource to travel here.

8dad9a85-eae9-4a39-a823-1c58d8c0f86b.Name: Mugash's Lair
8dad9a85-eae9-4a39-a823-1c58d8c0f86b.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards an attachment he controls.
8dad9a85-eae9-4a39-a823-1c58d8c0f86b.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, reveal the top card of each player's out-of-play deck.  Add each revealed enemy to the staging area and discard the rest.

8db8a9b7-402f-40fe-943e-8a3e58662b38.Name: The Ring Goes South
8db8a9b7-402f-40fe-943e-8a3e58662b38.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Setup: Set each copy of Pale-green Tentacle aside, out of play.
Forced: When the players advance to stage 4B, each player puts 1 copy of Pale-green Tentacle into play engaged with him. Shuffle any remaining copies, and the encounter discard pile, into the encounter deck.

8df24501-bfd8-4602-92e1-61f5d5cf7035.Name: Stock Road
8df24501-bfd8-4602-92e1-61f5d5cf7035.Text:
While Stock Road is in the staging area, add 2 to the total $ of the discarded cards when a player resolves a Hide test.

Travel: The first player must make a Hide 1 test to travel here.

8df497f3-7857-4573-8467-8cf2e16fbc3f.Name: Caradhras the Cruel
8df497f3-7857-4573-8467-8cf2e16fbc3f.Text: When Revealed: Return all Snow cards in the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck, in random order. Reveal the top card of the encounter deck (reveal the top 2 cards instead if there are 3 or 4 players in the game).

8e15ba46-125f-44fc-b67b-6006b96b20ea.Name: Dwarven Torch
8e15ba46-125f-44fc-b67b-6006b96b20ea.Text:
If unattached, the fist player claims Dwarven Torch and attaches it to a hero he controls. 
Action: Exhaust Dwarven Torch to choose a non-unique enemy. That enemy gets -1 Û and -1 Ú until the end of the phase.

8e16a07f-d6c1-4040-b05c-bb2bc1ab92c8.Name: Thaurdir's Damned
8e16a07f-d6c1-4040-b05c-bb2bc1ab92c8.Text: Forced: After Thaurdir’s Damned engages you, discard the top 2 cards of your deck and assign X damage among characters you control. X is the combined printed cost of the discarded cards.

8e49ea86-375a-472e-b497-16a1164ae27f.Keywords: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 1 per hero.
8e49ea86-375a-472e-b497-16a1164ae27f.Name: Hobbit Cloak
8e49ea86-375a-472e-b497-16a1164ae27f.Text: Attached hero gets +2 Ú while defending against an attack made by an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat.

8e6fe06e-36a6-491d-ae17-6580ddfd8014.Name: The Trial of Strength
8e6fe06e-36a6-491d-ae17-6580ddfd8014.Text:
Each Guardian enemy engages the first player. Barrow locations cannot be the active location and are immune to player card effects.

When the players control the current trial’s Key objective, add all Barrow locations in play to the victory display and immediately advance to a stage 2A of the players’ choice. If all stage 2 quests have been defeated, advance to stage 3A, instead.

8e7e5c8d-0ea4-46df-ae38-d8d2fee7ca8b.Name: Halfling Determination
8e7e5c8d-0ea4-46df-ae38-d8d2fee7ca8b.Text: Action: Choose a Hobbit character. That character gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú until the end of the phase.

8e8c68df-88b4-43b3-a4ea-d93713193ee3.Name: Enemy Camp
8e8c68df-88b4-43b3-a4ea-d93713193ee3.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, if Enemy Camp is in play, discard 1 random facedown hero from under each stage 3. If Enemy Camp is in the victory display, return each hero under each stage 3 to its owner's control instead.

Travel: Reveal 1 encounter card per player to travel here.

8eb1ca03-da9e-4e84-abf2-090804eeb1aa.Name: Northern Road
8eb1ca03-da9e-4e84-abf2-090804eeb1aa.Text: Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

8ece887c-6ca7-467d-80d4-3f28afa13433.Name: Shadow-man
8ece887c-6ca7-467d-80d4-3f28afa13433.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (Dusk. +2 Û instead. Midnight. +3 Û instead)
8ece887c-6ca7-467d-80d4-3f28afa13433.Text: When Revealed: Players cannot play events until the end of the round.

8ef56cb3-b483-4b38-b208-6c16e16bdb6d.Name: Neekerbreekers
8ef56cb3-b483-4b38-b208-6c16e16bdb6d.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
8ef56cb3-b483-4b38-b208-6c16e16bdb6d.Text: Forced: After any number of time counters are removed from the current quest, the engaged player must deal 2 damage to an ally he controls.

8f106a70-0102-41ad-8752-fb5667748850.Name: Orc Ambusher
8f106a70-0102-41ad-8752-fb5667748850.Shadow: Attack enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if undefended).
8f106a70-0102-41ad-8752-fb5667748850.Text: Forced: After Orc Ambusher engages you, discard 1 non-objective ally you control, if able.

8f133b99-75d7-43b8-acec-3e298724134a.Name: Orc Hunting
8f133b99-75d7-43b8-acec-3e298724134a.Text:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.

Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.

Response: After you quest successfully, discard an enemy engaged with a player.

8f3395ff-bccf-4620-beec-581c585682f2.Name: Take Cover!
8f3395ff-bccf-4620-beec-581c585682f2.Text: When Revealed: Either deal 1 damage to each exhausted character or remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

8f38ca4f-5893-4bd4-854d-6788a3ada41f.Keywords: Idestructible. Immune to player card effects.
8f38ca4f-5893-4bd4-854d-6788a3ada41f.Name: Watcher in the Water
8f38ca4f-5893-4bd4-854d-6788a3ada41f.Text:
Cannot leave the staging area but is considered to be engaged with each player.
Forced: After placing the 6th damage here, the first player takes control of the Ring-bearer, exhausted with 1 damage on it.

8f449385-efbb-4f99-b0c6-984e7b522674.Name: Ancient Evils Disturbed
8f449385-efbb-4f99-b0c6-984e7b522674.Text:
The players cannot advance unless they control at least 2 Loot objectives and Lurker of the Depths is in the victory display.

Forced: When this stage is defeated, if Book of Aulë's Children is attached to a hero, advance to stage 3C. Otherwise, advance to stage 3A.

8f5cdb72-aeae-49f7-bcc8-a2288b6bfb95.Name: Assault on Helm's Deep
8f5cdb72-aeae-49f7-bcc8-a2288b6bfb95.Text:
Defense. 
Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if the number of enemies in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, the first player reveals an encounter card.

Forced: At the end of the round place 1 progress here for each enemy in the staging area (bypassing any active location).

8f6254c0-a723-4e66-bdc7-4c92eed415f8.Keywords: X is the number of players in the game.
8f6254c0-a723-4e66-bdc7-4c92eed415f8.Name: Bellach
8f6254c0-a723-4e66-bdc7-4c92eed415f8.Text:
Orc and Creature enemies get -30 engagement cost and +1 $.

Forced: When Bellach is destroyed, shuffle him into the encounter deck.

8f937f89-b248-4261-9b00-4e3cd9763299.Name: Faramir
8f937f89-b248-4261-9b00-4e3cd9763299.Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, ready an ally you control. (Limit once per phase.)

8fa4b202-cb8e-470d-ae2b-aa945ac652c5.Name: Foothills of Ephel Duath
8fa4b202-cb8e-470d-ae2b-aa945ac652c5.Text:
While Foothills of Ephel Duath is the active location, each Harad enemy gets -1 $.

Travel: The first player engages an enemy in the staging area to travel here.

90203b8d-a359-4f18-8314-12815090a9d0.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
90203b8d-a359-4f18-8314-12815090a9d0.Name: The Dead are Following
90203b8d-a359-4f18-8314-12815090a9d0.Text: While Stone of Erech is the active location, each Oathbreaker enemy loses the Phantom keyword and gets -20 engagement cost. When The Stone of Erech leaves play as an explored location, the players win the game.

905dbe88-7974-4b0c-9a82-f96ba4dd866f.Name: Woodland Courier
905dbe88-7974-4b0c-9a82-f96ba4dd866f.Text: Response: After Woodland Courier enters play, place 1 progress on a location (2 progress instead if that location has the Forest trait).

90b5e33a-3708-40ab-8d20-5a997237e536.Keywords: Island Watcher cannot be optionally engaged.
90b5e33a-3708-40ab-8d20-5a997237e536.Name: Island Watcher
90b5e33a-3708-40ab-8d20-5a997237e536.Text: While Island Watcher is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, if the active location has the Ruins trait, Island Watcher engages the player with the highest threat. Then, deal it 2 shadow cards.”

90ba49e5-142b-4c40-8085-8087342d9b92.Name: Dunlending Ambush
90ba49e5-142b-4c40-8085-8087342d9b92.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the active location. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Limit 1 per location. Forced: After attached location is explored, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dunland enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.')

90d300da-a557-44b1-a634-d54782ff5e48.Keywords: Attach to a Gondor or Rohan character.
90d300da-a557-44b1-a634-d54782ff5e48.Name: Steed of the Mark
90d300da-a557-44b1-a634-d54782ff5e48.Text: Response: After attached hero commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to ready attached hero.

90d620e5-d7be-42e6-9756-b92761ecd8c9.Name: Midgewater
90d620e5-d7be-42e6-9756-b92761ecd8c9.Text:
While Midgewater is the active location, enemies cannot attack, take damage, or be engaged.

Forced: After Midgewater becomes the active location, return each engaged enemy in play to the staging area.

90d64456-eceb-423b-866f-ece8ceb98ec3.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
90d64456-eceb-423b-866f-ece8ceb98ec3.Name: Menacing Wraith
90d64456-eceb-423b-866f-ece8ceb98ec3.Text: Forced: After The One Ring is exhausted, Menacing Weath engages the first player and makes an immediate attack.

90f60cd2-e787-4b40-8b3a-35be274d0e9b.Name: Captive Villager
90f60cd2-e787-4b40-8b3a-35be274d0e9b.Text:
Forced: After Captive Villager enters play, reveal the top card of the Orc deck and attach it to Captive Villager, guarding it.
While Captive Villager is free of encounters, the first player gains control of it and is considered to have +5 threat while making engagement checks.

90fe2776-1001-4871-a5ae-679b91992e7e.Name: Night Without End
90fe2776-1001-4871-a5ae-679b91992e7e.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
90fe2776-1001-4871-a5ae-679b91992e7e.Text:
Peril. Doomed 2.
When Revealed: Either remove 1 resource token from The Defense of Helm’s Deep, or reveal 2 additional encounter cards.

91143aee-41e7-4cac-8ec2-e112689fcc17.Name: Put to the Torch
91143aee-41e7-4cac-8ec2-e112689fcc17.Shadow: Shadow: If the active location has the Aflame keyword, either deal it 3 damage or deal the defending character 1 damage.
91143aee-41e7-4cac-8ec2-e112689fcc17.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either deal 3 damage to a character he controls, or to an Aflame location in play.

9128a94e-546a-4b89-8bec-6c2739af0c6e.Name: Vigilant Guard
9128a94e-546a-4b89-8bec-6c2739af0c6e.Text: Attach to a Warrior character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 hit points. Response: When another character would be assigned any amount of damage, place 1 of that damage on attached character instead.

9152834a-5355-42ba-9592-1a3c1940d1a8.Name: King Under the Mountain
9152834a-5355-42ba-9592-1a3c1940d1a8.Text: Action: Exhaust King Under the Mountain to look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the other.

91735f73-7dc8-48ee-8a61-b7c9648f5def.Name: The Long Dark of Moria
91735f73-7dc8-48ee-8a61-b7c9648f5def.Text: Forced: After a player optionally engages an enemy, remove 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom.

918c4387-bf40-48f1-bf65-5ad5acb91784.Name: Scattered Among the Hills
918c4387-bf40-48f1-bf65-5ad5acb91784.Text:
The first Weather treachery revealed each round gains surge.

Forced: After the active location is explored, reveal the top card of the Orc deck and resolve its staging as if it was just revealed from the encounter deck (the top 2 cards instead if there are 3 or more players in the game).

91c6862b-0fe6-44bd-8745-a685f03ab6ed.Name: Soldier of Dol Amroth
91c6862b-0fe6-44bd-8745-a685f03ab6ed.Text: Response: After Soldier of Dol Amroth enters play, reduce the cost of the next Ï card you play this phase by 1.

91d379b3-bbcb-48d1-81df-7b50e321e768.Name: Malevolent Forces
91d379b3-bbcb-48d1-81df-7b50e321e768.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, heal all damage from each Undead enemy in play.
91d379b3-bbcb-48d1-81df-7b50e321e768.Text: When Revealed: Remove the questing character with the highest Ò from the quest. The player who controls that character raises his threat by an amount equal to that character's Ò.

91f28bdf-4b78-4750-9853-65e783e4cb15.Name: Strength of Arms
91f28bdf-4b78-4750-9853-65e783e4cb15.Text:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed Ì resource icon.

Action: Ready each ally in play.

921ba9dd-32c3-4dae-892c-4452c298459e.Name: Swift and Silent
921ba9dd-32c3-4dae-892c-4452c298459e.Text: Action: Ready a hero you control. Then, if your threat is 20 or less and this is the first time you played a copy of Swift and Silent this round, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.

9220dbae-e7fc-43fc-b772-043af7d4bda1.Name: Orophin
9220dbae-e7fc-43fc-b772-043af7d4bda1.Text: Response: After Orophin enters play, return a Silvan ally from your discard pile to your hand.

92576b76-6b3a-4bee-84dc-82f927e1caa1.Name: Harbor Brute
92576b76-6b3a-4bee-84dc-82f927e1caa1.Text: When Revealed: If Alcaron's Scroll is attached to an enemy, detach it from that enemy and attach it to Harbor Brute.  Move all progress tokens from that enemy to Harbor Brute.

926d92fd-b7b8-4f13-8018-3f632c84a3d7.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
926d92fd-b7b8-4f13-8018-3f632c84a3d7.Name: Overcome by Fear
926d92fd-b7b8-4f13-8018-3f632c84a3d7.Text: Setup: Attach to your threat dial. Limit 1 per threat dial.  Your threat cannot be reduced. Forced: At the end of the round, raise your threat by 1. Then, you may spend 1 ☺ resource to detach Overcome by Fear and set it aside, out of play.

92d3dcbb-8ce7-40fa-9df1-44617ebf08b4.Name: Patch of Midnight
92d3dcbb-8ce7-40fa-9df1-44617ebf08b4.Shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by 1 for each poisoned character you control.
92d3dcbb-8ce7-40fa-9df1-44617ebf08b4.Text: While Patch of Midnight is the active location, treat the text box of each poisoned character as if it were blank (except for Traits).

92ef70d1-b46c-454d-ab7d-2ab56227d9be.Name: Predatory Wolves
92ef70d1-b46c-454d-ab7d-2ab56227d9be.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
92ef70d1-b46c-454d-ab7d-2ab56227d9be.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard the highest cost ally he controls, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Warg enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

92fec8c5-53e7-477a-9c47-8d97578bc1e7.Name: Ruins of Ages Past
92fec8c5-53e7-477a-9c47-8d97578bc1e7.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 copy of Lost Island from the top of the Uncharted deck to the staging area. Remove all progress from each Uncharted location in the staging area and shuffle them so that the players do not know which one is which.

9317bbd9-12e5-47e1-a038-360df6c837b1.Name: Followed by Night
9317bbd9-12e5-47e1-a038-360df6c837b1.Text: When Revealed: Put the topmost enemy of the encounter deck discard pile into play engaged with you.

93a364f6-2a0f-4872-9770-aa7a1bd30d3d.Name: Westfold Outrider
93a364f6-2a0f-4872-9770-aa7a1bd30d3d.Text: Action: Discard Westfold Outrider to choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage the chosen enemy.

93bf98f7-fe0f-4c03-bd93-2f8d5753acce.Name: East Quarter
93bf98f7-fe0f-4c03-bd93-2f8d5753acce.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, that character's controller must return a location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area.
93bf98f7-fe0f-4c03-bd93-2f8d5753acce.Text: While East Quarter is the active location, the current quest gains battle. (Characters quest using Û instead of Ò.)

93ece501-fae4-46e8-9720-316383b86688.Name: Dunlending Attack
93ece501-fae4-46e8-9720-316383b86688.Text:
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 different Dunland enemy and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the Encounter Deck.

Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls where X is the number of cards in his hand. Place 2 time counters on this stage.

9418c634-54c6-47de-9aae-798038a4a35b.Name: Smoke Rings
9418c634-54c6-47de-9aae-798038a4a35b.Text: Action: Reduce your threat by 1 for each Pipe you control.  Each hero with a Pipe attachment gets +1 Ò until the end of the phase.

944aaafa-17e2-4352-9a04-384673089ee6.Name: Remnants of Elder Days
944aaafa-17e2-4352-9a04-384673089ee6.Text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Creature enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck. Cannot be canceled.

9463354a-3f6d-43e5-acee-0ea42f8b4403.Name: Silver Lamp
9463354a-3f6d-43e5-acee-0ea42f8b4403.Text: While attached hero is ready, shadow cards dealt to enemies engaged with you are dealt face up. (Shadow card effects are still resolved when resolving enemy attacks.)

94726dff-4b95-4c7c-9542-320b45652d7a.Name: Amarthiúl
94726dff-4b95-4c7c-9542-320b45652d7a.Text:
While you are engaged with at least 1 enemy, Amarthiúl gains the Ï resource icon.

While you are engaged with at least 2 enemies, add 1 additional resource to Amarthiúl's resource pool when you collect resources during the resource phase.

94727856-c487-4cf8-b8d5-8c18a3bca3d8.Keywords: Play only if you control a Noldor hero.
94727856-c487-4cf8-b8d5-8c18a3bca3d8.Name: Revealed in Wrath
94727856-c487-4cf8-b8d5-8c18a3bca3d8.Text: Action: Choose a non-unique enemy. Until the end of the phase, treat the chosen enemy’s printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

947e9e24-08bb-4193-98dc-88eb72107b7c.Name: Planning Phase
947e9e24-08bb-4193-98dc-88eb72107b7c.Text: In player order, play allys and attachments

947f8b80-5d96-43eb-89ac-95b7738f2d55.Name: Find the Others
947f8b80-5d96-43eb-89ac-95b7738f2d55.Text: Damage from undefended attacks must be dealt to a hero in the staging area, if able.The first card each player plays each phase does not require a resource match. Forced: When this stage is defeated, each player chooses a hero he owns in the staging area, takes control of that hero, and exhausts it.

94923076-b890-4a15-b576-5bba2e2ab2b4.Name: The Uruk-hai
94923076-b890-4a15-b576-5bba2e2ab2b4.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Each captive is immune to player card effects.
Setup: Set Mauhúr aside, out of play.
Forced: When the players advance to stage 2A, add Mauhúr to the staging area.

9497ef98-8f38-4647-bf77-28d8007a911a.Name: Rescue Iârion
9497ef98-8f38-4647-bf77-28d8007a911a.Text:
Time 4. When Revealed: The first player loses control of Iârion and places him facedown underneath this stage. When this stage is defeated, the first player takes control of Iârion and exhausts him. 

Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard Iârion.

949e2607-cbb5-4ae3-af26-f9d7e00e09d2.Name: The Siege of Gondor
949e2607-cbb5-4ae3-af26-f9d7e00e09d2.Text: Resolution: Count the number of resources on The Corsair Fleet and record that number in the notes section of the quest log. Remove Army of the Dead from the campaign pool.
949e2607-cbb5-4ae3-af26-f9d7e00e09d2.Traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 14

94befa92-9e5f-4838-b1e1-0b54d698bcb3.Name: Cursed Forest
94befa92-9e5f-4838-b1e1-0b54d698bcb3.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove a time counter from an enemy, if able.
94befa92-9e5f-4838-b1e1-0b54d698bcb3.Text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Spirit enemy and add it to the staging area.

94c35d99-945d-470d-9914-331e480c8cce.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
94c35d99-945d-470d-9914-331e480c8cce.Name: The Lower Gate
94c35d99-945d-470d-9914-331e480c8cce.Text:
No more than 4 progress can be placed on the current quest each round.

Creature enemies get +1 Û.

Goblin enemies get +1 Ú.

94df6677-1e7c-4ccc-932c-f750b51a769c.Name: Warden of the Havens
94df6677-1e7c-4ccc-932c-f750b51a769c.Text: While the top card of your discard pile is an attachment, Warden of the Havens gets +2 Ú and gains sentinel.

94ef148f-62f7-4659-8a49-9c42b9ed7cef.Name: Haunted Keep
94ef148f-62f7-4659-8a49-9c42b9ed7cef.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards the top card of his deck. Attacking enemy gets +X Û where X is the discarded card’s printed cost.
94ef148f-62f7-4659-8a49-9c42b9ed7cef.Text: While Haunted Keep is the active location, the first Undead enemy revealed each round gains surge.

94f6738a-c946-4415-9b38-0ce3a443fa33.Name: Treebeard
94f6738a-c946-4415-9b38-0ce3a443fa33.Text: Action: Deal 1 damage on Treebeard to give him +1 Ò and +1 Û until the end of the phase. (Limit 5 times per phase.)

9511bcf2-9c06-413e-bf09-3bc076eb76d4.Name: The Black Serpent
9511bcf2-9c06-413e-bf09-3bc076eb76d4.Text: Cannot leave the staging area or take damage. X is the stage number of the main quest. The Black Serpent gets +X $, +X Û and +X Ú. Forced: At the end of the encounter phase, either remove X progress from the main quest, or The Black Serpent makes an immediate attack against the first player.

952277e0-9e7c-423f-b034-0f39b5e77eab.Name: Hunting Party
952277e0-9e7c-423f-b034-0f39b5e77eab.Text:
Play only if you control a unique character with the Warrior trait and another unique character with the Scout trait. 
 
Response: After the players have committed characters to the quest, discard a non-unique enemy in the staging area. Then, reveal an encounter card.

95375f6e-942c-4609-9ebd-8a86ce3ab8af.Keywords: Play only if you control 2 or fewer heroes.
95375f6e-942c-4609-9ebd-8a86ce3ab8af.Name: Vanish from Sight
95375f6e-942c-4609-9ebd-8a86ce3ab8af.Text: Action: Until the end of the phase, if your threat is higher than 20, treat your threat as if it is 20.

953f3b7f-f4ca-4f6f-92d5-8d4b465231df.Name: Proud Hunters
953f3b7f-f4ca-4f6f-92d5-8d4b465231df.Text:
Play only if you control a unique character with the Noble trait and another unique character with the Ranger trait.
Response: After a hero you control participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, add X resources to that hero’s pool. X is the just destroyed enemy’s printed $.

9550172a-c624-40fd-b654-f2430ed93df1.Name: The King of the Golden Hall
9550172a-c624-40fd-b654-f2430ed93df1.Text:
When Revealed: Each player chooses 1 ally in his hand that matches the sphere of a hero he controls and puts it into play under his control.

Skip the quest phase and combat phase.

Forced: At the end of the round, advance to stage 2A.

955203ad-c973-4bdb-ade7-2e4f0fd43e9c.Name: Fortress of Isengard
955203ad-c973-4bdb-ade7-2e4f0fd43e9c.Text:
While Fortress of Isengard is in the staging area, each Orc enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û and +1 Ú.
Wizardry: Return the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

955a36c0-f348-400e-8ba4-16adcab07444.Name: Fireside Song
955a36c0-f348-400e-8ba4-16adcab07444.Text:
Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 1 per hero. 
Attached hero gets +1 Ò for each Song attachment attached to it.

958e2ca4-208c-4235-be56-afc463e9eb2f.Name: Slopes of Hithaeglir
958e2ca4-208c-4235-be56-afc463e9eb2f.Text:
Forced: After a "when revealed' effect is cancelled, place 1 damage on each active location.
Forced: When Slopes of Hithaeglir is explored, each player raises his threat by 1 for each damage here.

95d26956-eda3-43b2-b68b-6f8010d076bd.Name: Cornered Animals
95d26956-eda3-43b2-b68b-6f8010d076bd.Text:
Each damaged character gets -1 Ò.

Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, either discard 1 resource token from Savage Counter-attack, or reveal an additional encounter card this phase.

If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

95f2f7ac-5d85-43e5-930d-d866b00bef26.Name: The White Bridge
95f2f7ac-5d85-43e5-930d-d866b00bef26.Text: X is the number of progress tokens on To the Tower.

95fd357a-c0f1-4046-8b7a-4baf9abf36fc.Name: Travel phase
95fd357a-c0f1-4046-8b7a-4baf9abf36fc.Text: If there is no active location the first player may pick a location to become active. All players may play events or trigger actions and responses.

962991f0-44af-47ba-9ff0-0f7ed302a543.Name: Man Overboard!
962991f0-44af-47ba-9ff0-0f7ed302a543.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is The Stormcaller's current quest stage.
962991f0-44af-47ba-9ff0-0f7ed302a543.Text: When Revealed: Each player contributing at least 8 Ò to the quest must discard a questing character. If your heading is at the worst setting (¾), this effect cannot be canceled.

96350b97-5c68-4033-bb2f-4305696a7ae7.Name: Frodo's Intuition
96350b97-5c68-4033-bb2f-4305696a7ae7.Text: Action: Each hero you control gets +1 Ò until the end of the round.  Draw 1 card for each Hobbit hero you control.

964209a4-0219-4fc0-a734-b89abd3074f0.Name: Pack Hunters
964209a4-0219-4fc0-a734-b89abd3074f0.Text:
While it is Night, Pack Hunters gets -30 engagement cost.
Forced: When you engage Pack Hunters, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a Warg enemy, and put it into play engaged with you (top 10 cards instead if it is Night). Shuffle the encounter deck.

96580016-f869-4375-8937-3fb14dc0e264.Keywords: While Postern Door is the active location, each hero gets +1 Û.
96580016-f869-4375-8937-3fb14dc0e264.Name: Postern Door
96580016-f869-4375-8937-3fb14dc0e264.Text: Forced: When Postern Door is explored, until the end of the round, players cannot declare attacks.

96f8534a-2683-4c8f-981d-daa470b792b7.Name: Siege Ship
96f8534a-2683-4c8f-981d-daa470b792b7.Text: Cannot have attachments. While Siege Ship is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if Siege Ship is not guarding an objective and there is an unguarded objective in the staging area, attach Siege Ship to that objective, guarding it.”

97016882-11f8-428c-9f3f-43bb51aacb38.Name: Good Meal
97016882-11f8-428c-9f3f-43bb51aacb38.Text: Action: Discard Good Meal to lower the cost of the next event you play this round that matches attached hero's sphere by 2.

97584fc2-835e-411c-aae3-eb841c90fc43.Name: A Fateful Discovery
97584fc2-835e-411c-aae3-eb841c90fc43.Text:
Forced: After a location is explored, if it would be shuffled into the Uncharted deck, add it to the victory display, instead.
The players cannot defeat this stage unless Shrine to Morgoth is in the victory display. When Shrine to Morgoth is added to the victory display, the players win the game.

976d7409-0e67-43f1-b1bd-56cdeac073ef.Keywords:
Guarded. Safe.
Immune to player card effects.
976d7409-0e67-43f1-b1bd-56cdeac073ef.Name: Patch of Woods
976d7409-0e67-43f1-b1bd-56cdeac073ef.Text: Response: After you travel to Patch of Woods, each player adds 1 resource to each of his heroes’ resource pools.

97bf780d-cd76-492f-a970-37f78273c5bb.Keywords: The first player gains control of Captain Sahír.
97bf780d-cd76-492f-a970-37f78273c5bb.Name: Captain Sahír
97bf780d-cd76-492f-a970-37f78273c5bb.Text:
Captain Sahír gets +1 Ò and +1 Û for each resource on him (max +6).
Action: Spend 1 resource from a hero you control to place 1 resource on Captain Sahír. (Limit once per round).
If Captain Sahír leaves play, the players lose.

97d09901-724d-4932-ac51-59df1ef1dbec.Name: Rally the West
97d09901-724d-4932-ac51-59df1ef1dbec.Text: “Foes and fire are before you, and your homes far behind. Yet, though you fight upon an alien field, the glory that you reap there shall be your own forever.” -Theoden, The Return of the King Limit 1 copy of Rally the West in the victory display. While this side quest is in the victory display, each hero gets +1 Ò.

97f3e5c2-8ba8-44f9-a3e3-3bad40fd67e8.Name: Serpent Guard
97f3e5c2-8ba8-44f9-a3e3-3bad40fd67e8.Shadow: Shadow: Either remove 2 progress from main quest, or attacking enemy cannot take damage this round.
97f3e5c2-8ba8-44f9-a3e3-3bad40fd67e8.Text: Forced: After The Serpent’s Guard engages you, either remove 2 progress from the main quest, or enemies engaged with you cannot take damage until the end of the round.

97f3e879-eeee-4cc2-beb9-dc7c49c681ac.Name: Savage Trollspawn
97f3e879-eeee-4cc2-beb9-dc7c49c681ac.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damaged character the defending player controls.
97f3e879-eeee-4cc2-beb9-dc7c49c681ac.Text: Savage Trollspawn gets +1 Û for each damaged character the engaged player controls.

9825aa22-f197-4320-972d-e2487197d989.Name: Legolas
9825aa22-f197-4320-972d-e2487197d989.Text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, draw 1 card.

9834324f-1ad0-4922-a708-d07ca671d9b3.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
9834324f-1ad0-4922-a708-d07ca671d9b3.Name: Forsaken Inn
9834324f-1ad0-4922-a708-d07ca671d9b3.Text:
X is the number of characters the first player controls.
Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Spy enemy, reveals it, and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

984d2a01-f12a-4e8b-800c-6a04b1904049.Name: The Prancing Pony
984d2a01-f12a-4e8b-800c-6a04b1904049.Text:
Response: After the players travel here, the first player puts 1 ally into play from his hand.

Forced: After the Prancing Pony leaves play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until X enemies have been discarded.  X is the number of players in the game. Put each enemy discarded by this effect into play engaged with the first player.

98763910-365c-452a-b7ed-24512c3962a8.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
98763910-365c-452a-b7ed-24512c3962a8.Name: Burning Tower

98a2fb10-f2fc-462c-9f2e-8945419d9c4f.Name: The Nine are Abroad
98a2fb10-f2fc-462c-9f2e-8945419d9c4f.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
98a2fb10-f2fc-462c-9f2e-8945419d9c4f.Text: When Revealed: Treat the text box of each character in play as blank (except for Traits) until the end of the round.  If there is a Nazgul enemy in the staging area, The Nine are Abroad gains surge.

98a48eec-841f-48da-83e7-fa148a03de8b.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
98a48eec-841f-48da-83e7-fa148a03de8b.Name: The White City Besieged
98a48eec-841f-48da-83e7-fa148a03de8b.Text: Assault.  The White City Besieged gets +4 quest points for each player.  The players cannot travel to Pelennor locations. Forced: When an enemy is destroyed, place progress on this stage equal to its total $ (progress must be placed on any active location first).

98ba9e54-d6c3-41ff-b886-81a29e29eb64.Name: Sword of Morthond
98ba9e54-d6c3-41ff-b886-81a29e29eb64.Text: Attached ally gains the Outlands trait.

98bf5fdc-ff74-48e2-88c8-0e4134fd6984.Name: Pain Assailed Him
98bf5fdc-ff74-48e2-88c8-0e4134fd6984.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.
98bf5fdc-ff74-48e2-88c8-0e4134fd6984.Text: When Revealed: Reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.  Then, reduce the Ring-bearers Ò, Û, and Ú to 0 until the end of the round.

98cc592d-6e3e-494a-bddf-ef5e0908c279.Name: Free the Captives
98cc592d-6e3e-494a-bddf-ef5e0908c279.Text: While an enemy is guarding a hero it gets +1 $, +1 Û, +1 Ú and is immune to player card effects.Forced: When the enemy guarding a hero is defeated, that hero’s owner takes control of that hero and exhausts it.This stage cannot be defeated while an enemy is guarding a hero.

98dff367-a068-4aac-a46b-7dc201aff42d.Name: Green Hill Country
98dff367-a068-4aac-a46b-7dc201aff42d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you have failed a Hide test this round).
98dff367-a068-4aac-a46b-7dc201aff42d.Text: While Green Hill Country is the active location, characters get +1 Ò while committed to Hide tests.

98ff43a9-a592-42da-8ea2-75558d0f7dea.Name: Goblin Patrol
98ff43a9-a592-42da-8ea2-75558d0f7dea.Shadow: Shadow: Capture 3 random cards from your hand underneath attacking enemy.
98ff43a9-a592-42da-8ea2-75558d0f7dea.Text: When Revealed: Each player may capture any number of random cards from his hand underneath the current quest. Each player raises his threat by the number of cards in his hand.

990e60bb-a627-4758-8230-81b40a57a382.Keywords: X is 1 more than the number of allies controlled by the first player.
990e60bb-a627-4758-8230-81b40a57a382.Name: Deeping Culvert
990e60bb-a627-4758-8230-81b40a57a382.Text: Forced: When Deeping Culvert is explored, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy, reveals it, and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

9945fdee-b56e-488d-a5bf-33d5a82afdad.Name: Through the Marsh
9945fdee-b56e-488d-a5bf-33d5a82afdad.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 2A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck.

In order to commit characters to the quest, a player must first discard a card at random from his hand.

Forced: When the players defeat this stage, advance to a random stage 3A.

99bdb330-27f2-4534-a355-0bb9f1682a8d.Name: Into the Woods
99bdb330-27f2-4534-a355-0bb9f1682a8d.Text:
Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, shuffle Mugash into the encounter deck and advance to stage 3.

The players cannot advance to stage 2 unless Mugash is attached to a hero.

99d7fe5f-dcb5-43e2-9b73-8d47e661e6be.Name: City of Spies
99d7fe5f-dcb5-43e2-9b73-8d47e661e6be.Text: While City of Spies is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: When you commit a character to the quest, raise your threat by 1. This effect does not stack with other copies of City of Spies."

9a29c251-6119-47b2-8e10-ba4d33c0747e.Name: Raven's Guardian
9a29c251-6119-47b2-8e10-ba4d33c0747e.Text: Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from Raven’s Guardian, deal 1 damage to each character controlled by the engaged player. Place 4 time counters on Raven’s Guardian.

9a37677f-6bb6-4ff1-bf0e-8d0798e268c9.Name: A Bare Patch
9a37677f-6bb6-4ff1-bf0e-8d0798e268c9.Text:
While attached, Smaug the Magnificent gets -3 Ú.

Response: After the players quest successfully, the first player makes a burgle attempt. If successful, attach A Bare Patch to Smaug the Magnificent.

9a5fb929-296c-41ef-a0df-1d670d1c356d.Name: Long Groping Arm
9a5fb929-296c-41ef-a0df-1d670d1c356d.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, each Wight enemy engaged with you contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area. If no enemies are engaged with you, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Wight enemy and put it into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck.

9ad3750c-5cb8-45c7-be04-b454f1d7de82.Name: Lost in the Swanfleet
9ad3750c-5cb8-45c7-be04-b454f1d7de82.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 3A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck. 
Treachery card effects cannot be canceled.

9afed95c-399f-4823-a277-342ece74a9e4.Name: Hive Guardian
9afed95c-399f-4823-a277-342ece74a9e4.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if On Track is in play).
9afed95c-399f-4823-a277-342ece74a9e4.Text: While On Track is in play, Hive Guardian gets +2 Û and -5 engagement cost.

9b0f5fb4-4f7f-4e89-8565-b327980f2627.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
9b0f5fb4-4f7f-4e89-8565-b327980f2627.Name: Gollum's Rage
9b0f5fb4-4f7f-4e89-8565-b327980f2627.Shadow: If attacking enemy is Gollum, it gets +1 Û and makes an additional attack against you after this one.
9b0f5fb4-4f7f-4e89-8565-b327980f2627.Text: When Revealed: Deal Gollum's Rage to Gollum as a facedown shadow card, if able.

9b135a59-15f9-4e3b-be8e-76b7f5841658.Name: Key of the Wolf
9b135a59-15f9-4e3b-be8e-76b7f5841658.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle Key of the Wolf back into the encounter deck.
9b135a59-15f9-4e3b-be8e-76b7f5841658.Text:
If unattached, the first player must claim Key of the Wolf and attach it to a hero he controls.

If Key of the Wolf is discarded, add it to the staging area.

9b2302dc-3084-447f-8104-a4569fd26e38.Keywords: The current quest card gains siege (and loses battle).
9b2302dc-3084-447f-8104-a4569fd26e38.Name: The Cross-roads
9b2302dc-3084-447f-8104-a4569fd26e38.Text: X is the number of players in the game. Travel: The first player must take 1 hidden card to travel here.

9b75695b-8431-40ea-8041-afaaa34dc3f4.Name: The Raven Clan
9b75695b-8431-40ea-8041-afaaa34dc3f4.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, reveal the top card of the Raven deck and add it to the staging area. Place 3 time counters on this stage.

Each location in the staging area gets +2 quest points.

9bb32f2c-29fb-43ba-b7ba-2227b28f7b58.Name: Elf-stone
9bb32f2c-29fb-43ba-b7ba-2227b28f7b58.Text:
Attach to the active location.  Attached location gets +1 quest point.

Response: After attached location leaves play as an explored location, the first player puts 1 ally into play from his hand.

9bba91a8-d375-4935-9956-9cb4cc4716c5.Name: Uruk-hai Tracker
9bba91a8-d375-4935-9956-9cb4cc4716c5.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
9bba91a8-d375-4935-9956-9cb4cc4716c5.Text: Uruk-hai Tracker gets +2 Û against characters with 2 or fewer printed hit points.

9be86dec-0c44-4468-ac29-260dedaca54b.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
9be86dec-0c44-4468-ac29-260dedaca54b.Name: The Black Serpent
9be86dec-0c44-4468-ac29-260dedaca54b.Text: Cannot have attachments or be attacked by more than 1 character at a time. When Revealed: The Black Serpent makes an immediate attack against the first player.

9c0f0325-4262-4a1d-8b1d-f415a6910f03.Name: Combat phase - defend
9c0f0325-4262-4a1d-8b1d-f415a6910f03.Text: Deal shadow cards then in player order, for each engaged enemy declare defender and resolve shadow card

9c3c6e43-7548-4eaf-8225-2f51ecafbc4a.Name: Thrashing Arm
9c3c6e43-7548-4eaf-8225-2f51ecafbc4a.Text: Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if Thrashing Arm is engaged with you, deal 3 damage to a character you control.

9c42d496-267e-4822-8df4-6fcc7ae4c2d1.Name: Elven Jeweler
9c42d496-267e-4822-8df4-6fcc7ae4c2d1.Text: Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand to put Elven Jeweler into play from your hand, under your control.

9c455b1a-a2d4-44f7-a9d3-9a3134c21a2a.Keywords: Attach to a Hobbit. Limit 1 per character.
9c455b1a-a2d4-44f7-a9d3-9a3134c21a2a.Name: Hobbit Pipe
9c455b1a-a2d4-44f7-a9d3-9a3134c21a2a.Text: Response. After your threat is reduced by an event card effect, exhaust Hobbit Pipe to draw a card.

9c5bec2f-cd2d-4d22-b8d3-b5dfb4e3345b.Name: Ithilien Overlook
9c5bec2f-cd2d-4d22-b8d3-b5dfb4e3345b.Text: When assigning archery damage to a character, you must continue assigning archery damage to that character until that character is destroyed or there is no more archery damage to assign.

9c6798e3-9c5a-4609-b499-e6b1d6ae567b.Name: Water-Logged Halls
9c6798e3-9c5a-4609-b499-e6b1d6ae567b.Text:
While Dark Abyss is the active location, characters cannot attack.

Forced: If Dark Abyss is the active location at the end of the quest phase, deal 1 damage to each character in play. Then, you may flip Dark Abyss to its Grotto side.

9c6c003c-b9c7-4240-9e59-414d31b4be3c.Name: Corsair Dromon
9c6c003c-b9c7-4240-9e59-414d31b4be3c.Text: While Corsair Dromon is the active location, each Corsair enemy gains Archery 1. Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Corsair enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

9c81c18a-b143-48ae-a22c-821f52efc229.Name: The Great Bridge
9c81c18a-b143-48ae-a22c-821f52efc229.Text: Response: When The Great Bridge is explored, discard a hero from play to deal X damage to The Balrog. X is that hero's threat cost. Then, The Balrog loses all keywords for the remainder of the game. Any player may trigger this response.

9cafb8f6-1718-4f7f-a37f-9209ed68a92a.Name: Linhir Sea-captain
9cafb8f6-1718-4f7f-a37f-9209ed68a92a.Text: Response: After you play Linhir Sea-captain from your hand, if you paid all of its resource cost from a single hero’s resource pool, both that hero and Linhir Sea-captain do not exhaust to quest this round.

9cb0fd46-5ff4-4286-9843-f598723bc51b.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
9cb0fd46-5ff4-4286-9843-f598723bc51b.Name: The Battle of Carn Dûm
9cb0fd46-5ff4-4286-9843-f598723bc51b.Text:
Begin with the standard quest deck and encounter deck for The Battle of Carn Dûm scenario.
Remove the following cards, in the specified quantities, from the standard encounter deck:
1x Vile Affliction
1x Furious Charge
1x Orc Ambush
1x Angmar Orc
3x Angmar Marauder
3x Terror of the North
2x Accursed Battlefield
1x Blight of Carn Dûm
Then, shuffle the encounter cards in this Nightmare Deck into the remainder of the standard The Battle of Carn Dûm encounter deck.
Finally, flip this setup card over and place it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.
Keyword: Siege
If a quest card has the siege keyword, when characters are committed to that quest, they count their total Ú instead of their total Ò when resolving the quest. Enemies and locations in the staging area still use their $ in opposition to this quest attempt.

9cb47ff2-5dff-404f-8fed-6ec0b6478ded.Name: Breaking Isengard
9cb47ff2-5dff-404f-8fed-6ec0b6478ded.Text:
The players cannot travel to Orthanc. 

Forced: After a non-unique location is explored, place 1 damage here. Then, if there are 5 damage tokens here, advance to stage 3A. 

Quest Action: Exhaust Ent of Fangorn to place 2 progress on a non-unique location.

9ccbe47b-b30f-468a-a867-60314e3b5d61.Name: Dwarven Shield
9ccbe47b-b30f-468a-a867-60314e3b5d61.Text: Attach to a Dwarf hero. Restricted.Attached hero gets +1 Ú.Response: After attached hero takes any amount of damage from an enemy attack, exhaust Dwarven Shield to add 1 resource to attached hero’s pool.

9ccd6851-ec1e-4d47-9e8d-486365c261e2.Name: Uruk-hai Captain
9ccd6851-ec1e-4d47-9e8d-486365c261e2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
9ccd6851-ec1e-4d47-9e8d-486365c261e2.Text: Allies with fewer printed hit points than Uruk-hai Captain cannot defend against Uruk-hai Captain.

9d2926dc-ab14-492a-8f1e-b07c1b32b2d8.Name: Evil Crow
9d2926dc-ab14-492a-8f1e-b07c1b32b2d8.Text: Forced: When Evil Crow engages a player, that player takes 1 hidden card.

9d451960-2db3-43df-9cd8-d525ef58cf55.Name: Defeat the Serpent
9d451960-2db3-43df-9cd8-d525ef58cf55.Text:
If a Harad objective is not attached, the first player claims it and attaches it to a hero he controls.

While there are at least 6 progress tokens on this stage, the Black Serpent loses the text: “Cannot leave the staging area or take damage.”

This stage cannot be defeated unless each Harad objective in play is attached to a hero. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

9d460d1a-45d9-4828-a40e-2dbddc51c086.Name: Deadman's Dike
9d460d1a-45d9-4828-a40e-2dbddc51c086.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Each player's deck cannot include more than 50 total cards.
Setup: Each player searches the encounter deck for a copy of Cursed Dead and places it in the encounter discard pile. Shuffle the encounter deck.

9d548a43-0ef8-45e6-ab95-7356d218d203.Name: Haldir of Lórien
9d548a43-0ef8-45e6-ab95-7356d218d203.Text: Combat Action: If you have not engaged an enemy this round, exhaust Haldir of Lórien to declare him as an attacker (and resolve his attack) against an enemy not engaged with you. Limit once per round.

9d58de28-c518-4888-8e91-a52bb5c3e663.Name: Eastern Road
9d58de28-c518-4888-8e91-a52bb5c3e663.Text: Eastern Road gets +5 quest points while it is in the staging area. Travel: The first player must take 2 hidden cards to travel here.

9d5d2136-f1e7-40fd-9a0f-fbac3c87f8f6.Name: Angmar Orc
9d5d2136-f1e7-40fd-9a0f-fbac3c87f8f6.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys an ally, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
9d5d2136-f1e7-40fd-9a0f-fbac3c87f8f6.Text: When Revealed: Either discard 1 ally from play, or reveal an additional encounter card.

9d65d755-9d41-47d8-84f5-ea725fba1d2f.Keywords: Immune to player card effects, Cannot take damage.
9d65d755-9d41-47d8-84f5-ea725fba1d2f.Name: Naurlhûg
9d65d755-9d41-47d8-84f5-ea725fba1d2f.Text:
X is the number of resources on Stalking the Ruins.

Forced: When Naurlhûg makes an attack, the defending player assigns X damage among characters he controls.

9d8ccd1a-48d3-4123-bcca-3c0ab88347ec.Name: Farmer Maggot
9d8ccd1a-48d3-4123-bcca-3c0ab88347ec.Text: Response: After Farmer Maggot enters play, deal 1 damage to an enemy engaged with you. (Deal 2 damage instead if that enemy's engagement cost is higher than your threat.)

9dae9a06-1a90-4a9f-be69-b6451e4a1883.Name: Chill Fog
9dae9a06-1a90-4a9f-be69-b6451e4a1883.Shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by 1 for each damage dealt by this attack.
9dae9a06-1a90-4a9f-be69-b6451e4a1883.Text: When Revealed: Discard all resources in play. Each player raises his threat by 1 for each resource he discarded this way. If no resources were discarded this way, Chill Fog gains surge.

9db89c44-e692-4afa-ac07-d4ac35165cb7.Name: Cold from Angmar
9db89c44-e692-4afa-ac07-d4ac35165cb7.Text: When Revealed: Each player deals 1 damage to a hero he controls. Then, attach Cold from Angmar to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Treat each damaged character’s printed text box as if it were blank, except for keywords and Traits.”)

9dd6bf3e-e090-4ebf-a056-765c94e8a199.Name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
9dd6bf3e-e090-4ebf-a056-765c94e8a199.Text:
Action: Exhaust Bilbo's Magic Ring and raise your threat by 1 to gain 1 Í resource. (Limit once per round.)

Response: After Bilbo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust Bilbo's Magic Ring and raise your threat by 3 to cancel all damage from this attack.

9dda3cf1-e5bd-4cab-8c3b-b29db1220249.Name: Leaves on Tree
9dda3cf1-e5bd-4cab-8c3b-b29db1220249.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment from the defending character.
9dda3cf1-e5bd-4cab-8c3b-b29db1220249.Text: When Revealed: Each player must pay 1 resource for each attachment he controls or discard all attachments he controls.

9de50e07-a3a3-4049-908c-c0463aabf91f.Name: The Seeing-stone
9de50e07-a3a3-4049-908c-c0463aabf91f.Text: Action: Search your deck for a card with the Doomed keyword and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

9e0bb4e8-9b4f-4780-9b83-ea6bc86745ae.Name: Carn Dûm Garrison
9e0bb4e8-9b4f-4780-9b83-ea6bc86745ae.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each shadow card currently dealt to it.
9e0bb4e8-9b4f-4780-9b83-ea6bc86745ae.Text: Carn Dûm Garrison gets +1 $ for each shadow card currently dealt to it.

9e3a4b3b-7bb7-4403-984c-411af5ec8467.Name: Mablung
9e3a4b3b-7bb7-4403-984c-411af5ec8467.Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, add 1 resource to Mablung's resource pool. (Limit once per phase.)

9e678947-2687-4b3b-b98c-f05f289793ff.Name: The Nine Walkers
9e678947-2687-4b3b-b98c-f05f289793ff.Text:
During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able.

Forced: After an enemy engages a player, place 1 damage on the active location, if able.

9e944f47-14b0-4890-98d2-584e0abe0eda.Name: Gamling
9e944f47-14b0-4890-98d2-584e0abe0eda.Text: Response: After a Rohan ally you control is discarded from play, exhaust Gamling to return that character to your hand.

9e9e76b7-ef3c-4c7c-baf2-061dc0d2ccd0.Name: The Ruins of Ost-in-Edhil
9e9e76b7-ef3c-4c7c-baf2-061dc0d2ccd0.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, trigger each Scour effect currently in play. Place 3 time counters on this stage.

Bellach is immune to player card effects and cannot be engaged.

The players cannot advance unless Celebrimbor’s Mould is attached to a hero.

9eac32f5-dd08-4d1e-99bd-0722984cd32f.Name: Shores of Lake Nenuial
9eac32f5-dd08-4d1e-99bd-0722984cd32f.Text:
While Shores of Lake Nenuial is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on other locations in the staging area.

Travel: Raise each player's threat by 2 to travel here.

9eb0298a-cb92-426d-87c6-37749aaae44b.Name: Orthanc
9eb0298a-cb92-426d-87c6-37749aaae44b.Text: While Orthanc is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After the players quest successfully, the first player looks at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck, reveals 1, and discards the others.”

9eb45361-6325-4e39-9029-9a8401d0d294.Name: Esquire of Rohan
9eb45361-6325-4e39-9029-9a8401d0d294.Text: Setup: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Rohan trait. Attached hero gets +1 Û while attacking with another Rohan character.

9f1f5ce8-2fa6-40e3-ba7c-34fb94db014b.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
9f1f5ce8-2fa6-40e3-ba7c-34fb94db014b.Name: Black Dart
9f1f5ce8-2fa6-40e3-ba7c-34fb94db014b.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack damages a hero, attach Black Dart to that hero.
9f1f5ce8-2fa6-40e3-ba7c-34fb94db014b.Text: When Revealed: Remove a hero you control from the quest and attach Black Dark to that hero. Limit 1 per hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to attached hero.”)

9f4fa8d5-eaa4-4089-82aa-1ea4563a237b.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
9f4fa8d5-eaa4-4089-82aa-1ea4563a237b.Name: The Passage of the Marshes
9f4fa8d5-eaa4-4089-82aa-1ea4563a237b.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: When a location in the staging area is explored, raise each player's threat by X, where X is that location's Mire value.

9f61eee8-cff2-43ad-8f82-7c4efb5ed9b8.Name: Shadowfax
9f61eee8-cff2-43ad-8f82-7c4efb5ed9b8.Text:
Gandalf gains ranged and sentinel. 

Action: Exhaust Shadowfax to ready Gandalf.

9fb6747a-1dd1-4a38-8c55-9459fda296c1.Name: Trouble in Tharbad
9fb6747a-1dd1-4a38-8c55-9459fda296c1.Text:
You are playing Nightmare Mode.
Setup: Raise each player's starting threat by 5.
Progress cannot be placed on The Crossing at Tharbad while Bellach is in play.

9fce5e18-37dc-45c2-8398-df8b5018cb54.Keywords: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted.
9fce5e18-37dc-45c2-8398-df8b5018cb54.Name: Herugrim
9fce5e18-37dc-45c2-8398-df8b5018cb54.Text: Reduce the cost to play Herugrim on Théoden by 1. Response: After attached hero is declared as an attacker, exhaust Herugrim to add attached hero's Ò to its Û for this attack.

9feef7b4-4ca7-4adc-aeb7-56947254588a.Name: Blood-thirsty Warg
9feef7b4-4ca7-4adc-aeb7-56947254588a.Text: While Blood-thirsty Warg is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: When it becomes Night, Blood-thirsty Warg engages the first player and makes an immediate attack.”

a0417d08-1905-46f9-bd65-067c1c59f0a3.Name: Jubayr
a0417d08-1905-46f9-bd65-067c1c59f0a3.Text:
Response: After Jubayr is declared as a defender, discard 1 facedown shadow card from a non-unique enemy. (Limit once per phase.)
If Jubayr leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

a067986f-6c42-446d-8a23-58d0190c39f0.Name: Save Us!
a067986f-6c42-446d-8a23-58d0190c39f0.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Deal it another shadow card.
a067986f-6c42-446d-8a23-58d0190c39f0.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard 2 villager tokens from Rescued Villagers, or search the encounter deck and sicard pile for an enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

a073c291-5f86-4b49-821e-d965baf369fa.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 5
a073c291-5f86-4b49-821e-d965baf369fa.Name: Journey in the Dark
a073c291-5f86-4b49-821e-d965baf369fa.Text: Resolution: The first player must choose one of the burden treachery cards (Pursued by the Enemy or Shadow of Fear), and one of the burden objective cards (Grevious Wound or Overcome by Grief) to add to the Campaign Pool. If The Balrog is still in play, the first player must choose all 4 burden cards instead. The chosen burdens have been earned by the players.

a09013c9-0eeb-459d-b7fc-d803d1b0ad1d.Keywords: Lindon Navigator does not exhaust to commit to a quest, and can commit to quests while exhausted.
a09013c9-0eeb-459d-b7fc-d803d1b0ad1d.Name: Lindon Navigator
a09013c9-0eeb-459d-b7fc-d803d1b0ad1d.Text: Forced: After resolving a quest to which Lindon Navigator was committed, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

a09670b1-ccfe-449a-8743-e468c9d76782.Name: Ill Fate
a09670b1-ccfe-449a-8743-e468c9d76782.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero you control. (Counts as a Condition Attachment with the text: "Forced: After a character you control is destroyed, raise your threat by 2.")

a0a4d2cf-ed07-4942-9588-8fca05f75bbf.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
a0a4d2cf-ed07-4942-9588-8fca05f75bbf.Name: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim
a0a4d2cf-ed07-4942-9588-8fca05f75bbf.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Gollum cannot take damage.

Setup: Search the encounter deck for The Lower Gate and set it aside, out of play.

Forced: When stage 3B is revealed, add The Lower Gate to the staging area.

a0d5be90-8618-4fe4-a917-d8d969c11264.Name: Old Hatreds
a0d5be90-8618-4fe4-a917-d8d969c11264.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, raise his threat by 1.')

a0e1e091-fbbb-459e-9cb7-2cc63bd85711.Name: Kahliel
a0e1e091-fbbb-459e-9cb7-2cc63bd85711.Text:
Response: At the beginning of the planning phase, add 1 resource to a hero’s resource pool. 
If Kahliel leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

a0e456e0-5681-41fb-bf0c-06b42d4929de.Name: Helm's Gate
a0e456e0-5681-41fb-bf0c-06b42d4929de.Text:
While Helm’s Gate is the active location, if any player is not engaged with an enemy, the first player reveals an encounter card at the end of each staging step. 

Forced: When Helm’s Gate is explored, each enemy gets –20 engagement cost and +2 Û until the end of the round.

a0f5082c-acc7-4884-a3d4-a7eed0f053e6.Name: Shifting Marshland
a0f5082c-acc7-4884-a3d4-a7eed0f053e6.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
a0f5082c-acc7-4884-a3d4-a7eed0f053e6.Text: When Revealed: Remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

a11ea1e0-372e-4932-86e4-f84737e842e9.Name: Uruk-hai Hunter
a11ea1e0-372e-4932-86e4-f84737e842e9.Text: When Revealed: Either choose a player to reveal an encounter card, or Uruk-hai Hunter makes an immediate attack against you.

a11f08ac-541b-46ba-9528-467dcbdc90c6.Name: Racing North
a11f08ac-541b-46ba-9528-467dcbdc90c6.Text:
