While the players are at stage 3B, Uruk Chieftain cannot leave the Orc’s area.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, return Uruk Chieftain to the Orc’s area and discard the top card of the encounter deck. Place X progress on this stage, where X is the discarded card’s $ plus the total $ in the Orc’s area.
If you are at stage 2B when this stage is defeated, you lose the game.

a142205c-6aa0-4fed-be81-312c2dd33673.Name: Cursed Burden
a142205c-6aa0-4fed-be81-312c2dd33673.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero with a Key objective attached, if able. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot commit to the quest, and cannot attack or defend against enemies with a Trait shared by any of that hero's attached Key objectives.")

a17465f5-e6f5-4699-b0d7-79355286a065.Keywords: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character.
a17465f5-e6f5-4699-b0d7-79355286a065.Name: Entmoot
a17465f5-e6f5-4699-b0d7-79355286a065.Text: Action: Search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of Ent cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

a1827b45-42bd-44b3-a86d-d773e60ac1b5.Name: Misleading Path
a1827b45-42bd-44b3-a86d-d773e60ac1b5.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards each ally card in his hand.
a1827b45-42bd-44b3-a86d-d773e60ac1b5.Text: When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to Misleading Path if there is no active location.

a1893a93-326b-429c-acd4-cd569b12bf18.Name: Hoarwell River Serpent
a1893a93-326b-429c-acd4-cd569b12bf18.Text:
As an additional cost to travel to a safe location, one player must engage Hoarwell River Serpent.
Forced: When you engage Hoarwell River Serpent, deal 1 damage to each damaged character you control.

a1a8bd6e-4cd1-4641-9cb1-f693f053f62e.Name: Eerie Halls
a1a8bd6e-4cd1-4641-9cb1-f693f053f62e.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending player does not control at least 1 Clue objective, the attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
a1a8bd6e-4cd1-4641-9cb1-f693f053f62e.Text: Action: Raise your threat by 1 to lower the $ of Eerie Halls by 1 until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this action.

a1e74757-c5c8-4b81-a01a-6406410f661d.Name: White-flowered Fields
a1e74757-c5c8-4b81-a01a-6406410f661d.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
a1e74757-c5c8-4b81-a01a-6406410f661d.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, each player must either exhaust a hero he controls or place 1 progress token on To the Tower.

a1f5a577-30bf-44ed-b60b-e733b5f26d55.Keywords: Attach to a non-objective unique ally in play.
a1f5a577-30bf-44ed-b60b-e733b5f26d55.Name: Defender of the West
a1f5a577-30bf-44ed-b60b-e733b5f26d55.Text:
The first player gains control of attached ally

Damage from undefended attacks against you may be assigned to attached ally.

a203a422-201a-4b2a-b9bd-687258687479.Name: Snowy Badlands
a203a422-201a-4b2a-b9bd-687258687479.Text:
While Snow Badlands is in the staging area, each enemy in the staging area cannot take damage.
Travel: Each player deals 1 damage to an exhausted character he controls to travel here (2 damage instead if it is Night).

a25b4139-f1d0-4466-83f2-f06fa3e0c30b.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
a25b4139-f1d0-4466-83f2-f06fa3e0c30b.Name: Army of the Dead
a25b4139-f1d0-4466-83f2-f06fa3e0c30b.Text: Immune to player card effects. X is twice the number of players in the game. Forced: When Army of the Dead attacks, you must either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or discard an ally you control.

a25c47a4-3a9c-4883-a7a7-c40df596650c.Name: Dori
a25c47a4-3a9c-4883-a7a7-c40df596650c.Text: Response: After another hero is declared as a defender, exhaust Dori to add his Ú to the defending hero’s Ú for this attack.

a25d1abc-f24e-4ce7-bf14-cb5adb007a4d.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
a25d1abc-f24e-4ce7-bf14-cb5adb007a4d.Name: Lower Gate Sentries
a25d1abc-f24e-4ce7-bf14-cb5adb007a4d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+3 Û instead if Bilbo's Magic Ring is exhausted.)
a25d1abc-f24e-4ce7-bf14-cb5adb007a4d.Text: Bilbo's Magic Ring does not ready during the refresh phase.

a264930c-e083-484a-bbe8-9b615942e83a.Keywords:
Doomed 2.
X is the number of players in the game.
a264930c-e083-484a-bbe8-9b615942e83a.Name: Grim Foothills
a264930c-e083-484a-bbe8-9b615942e83a.Text: While Grim Foothills is in the staging area, progress must be placed on Grim Foothills before it can be placed on the active location.

a2b6cb8b-dacf-4c82-9097-2206610192ac.Name: Coast of Anfalas
a2b6cb8b-dacf-4c82-9097-2206610192ac.Shadow: Shadow: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
a2b6cb8b-dacf-4c82-9097-2206610192ac.Text: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), Coast of Anfalas gets +2 $. Travel: Exhaust a Ship objective to travel here.

a2d440c4-6150-4b6f-9a36-faa51ace7908.Name: Men of the West
a2d440c4-6150-4b6f-9a36-faa51ace7908.Text: Action: Return X Outlands allies from your discard pile to your hand.

a305f78f-0d26-4a56-9d5b-7fb0210e6bd4.Name: Murzag
a305f78f-0d26-4a56-9d5b-7fb0210e6bd4.Text: Forced: After Murzag attacks, reveal the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, put it into play engaged with the defending player.

a312e181-9209-4460-b6ba-c90c99e011fe.Name: Corsair Warship
a312e181-9209-4460-b6ba-c90c99e011fe.Text: While Corsair Warship is in the staging area, it cannot be damaged and gains archery 4.

a3173fc4-1ddb-470d-ae12-a35e24ea63a3.Name: Corsair Waters
a3173fc4-1ddb-470d-ae12-a35e24ea63a3.Text: While Corsair Waters is the active location, no more than 1 ally can enter play each round.Shadow Text:Shadow: Either shift your heading off-course, or treat this attack as undefended.󲂐

a33274da-588d-4430-b730-0e82942c0605.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
a33274da-588d-4430-b730-0e82942c0605.Name: Raid on the Grey Havens

a34ffb4e-c821-42aa-8dab-2914d274b3b1.Name: Umbar Sentry
a34ffb4e-c821-42aa-8dab-2914d274b3b1.Text: Forced: When Umbar Sentry attacks, either remove 1 progress token from the main quest, or it gets +2 Û for this attack.

a39f7fcf-952c-4789-91a2-ef12bc6a8f43.Name: Poisonous Shaft
a39f7fcf-952c-4789-91a2-ef12bc6a8f43.Text:
While Poisonous Shaft is in the staging area, damaged characters cannot be readed by player card effects.
Wizardry: Each player discards a damaged character he controls.

a3f162a7-847d-47ed-8a05-4e930806765b.Name: Western Emyn Muil
a3f162a7-847d-47ed-8a05-4e930806765b.Text:
While Western Emyn Muil is in the staging area, each Uruk-hai enemy at this stage gains Toughness 1.
Travel: A player at this stage must engage the highest toughness enemy in the staging area to travel here.

a40aef89-ca91-467c-93f3-9afc97bdbc24.Keywords: Permanent. Setup: Attach to the Ring-bearer.
a40aef89-ca91-467c-93f3-9afc97bdbc24.Name: A Heavy Burden
a40aef89-ca91-467c-93f3-9afc97bdbc24.Text: Forced: At the end of the planning phase, either raise each player’s threat by 1, or exhaust the Ring-bearer.

a44d6ee9-79a6-4e55-ab8a-a165c4dbb882.Name: Machines of Isengard
a44d6ee9-79a6-4e55-ab8a-a165c4dbb882.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 random card from your hand.
a44d6ee9-79a6-4e55-ab8a-a165c4dbb882.Text: When Revealed: Trigger the Wizardry effect on the active location. If no Wizardry effect is triggered this way, Machines of Isengard gains surge.

a46578d6-303e-4f35-9a11-8b9f807427ba.Name: Hunting For The Ring
a46578d6-303e-4f35-9a11-8b9f807427ba.Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player much either return a Nazgul enemy engaged with him to the staging area or make a Hide 2 test.

a4df63d1-cb3d-4510-9e26-3b734632f456.Name: The Dimrill Stair
a4df63d1-cb3d-4510-9e26-3b734632f456.Text: Travel: Reshuffle all locations in the discard pile and victory display back into the encounter deck. If you reshuffled at least two locations, reduce each player's threat by 11 and discard all copies of Freezing Cold from play.

a4e67c29-716e-4221-b300-e7c03f339a96.Name: Shadow and Flame
a4e67c29-716e-4221-b300-e7c03f339a96.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Setup: Shuffle the 10 encounter cards with the Attack trait into a separate 'Balrog deck.' 

When Durin's Bane would be dealt a shadow card, deal it from the Balrog deck instead of the encounter deck. Shadow cards dealt from the Balrog deck are discarded into a separate Balrog discard pile. 

At the beginning of each combat phase (or if the Balrog deck runs out of cards), shuffle the Balrog discard pile back into the Balrog deck.

a4ffb8cd-fd95-4b47-95d1-637bd2bd78a1.Name: Lost in the Dark
a4ffb8cd-fd95-4b47-95d1-637bd2bd78a1.Text: When Revealed: Reveal stage 3 and create a separate staging area for the first player using that stage. If there are no other players in the game, discard this stage and each card in its staging area. All other players advance to stage 4.

a516b400-b53f-4c21-8e44-c0a889caa8d5.Name: Snow Warg
a516b400-b53f-4c21-8e44-c0a889caa8d5.Text:
Allies cannot defend while Snow Warg is attacking.

Forced: After a character is declared as a defender against Snow Warg, deal 1 damage to the defending character, if able.

a531dc43-7feb-4e63-96ad-a33cdb3b717a.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
a531dc43-7feb-4e63-96ad-a33cdb3b717a.Name: The Rammas is Breached
a531dc43-7feb-4e63-96ad-a33cdb3b717a.Shadow: Shadow: Either deal 3 damage to Minas Tirith, or attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
a531dc43-7feb-4e63-96ad-a33cdb3b717a.Text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and puts it into play engaged with him.

a53e4587-03e4-4120-8aa5-9601a7069edd.Name: Broken Courtyard
a53e4587-03e4-4120-8aa5-9601a7069edd.Shadow: Shadow: Either remove 2 progress from main quest, or return attacking enemy to staging area after this attack.
a53e4587-03e4-4120-8aa5-9601a7069edd.Text: While Broken Courtyard is in the staging area, the main quest cannot have progress tokens beyond its printed quest points value.

a54706fb-776c-4c00-b0ef-454b21673bcb.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 7
a54706fb-776c-4c00-b0ef-454b21673bcb.Name: The Uruk-hai
a54706fb-776c-4c00-b0ef-454b21673bcb.Text: Resolution: If the pursuit value is 25 or lower, the players must choose: either each player earns one of the Skill boons (Intimidation, Hands of a Healer, Forewarned, or Leader of Men) and attaches it to a hero he controls, or one player earns the boon, Beyond All Hope, and chooses a hero from the list of fallen heroes. That player takes control of the chosen hero (removing it from the list of fallen heroes) and attaches Beyond all Hope to it. If a player controls more than 3 non-☺ heroes, he must remove heroes from the Campaign Log until he controls only 3 heroes. Changing heroes as a result of earning Beyond All Hope does not incur a +1 threat penalty. Add the earned cards to the Campaign Pool.

a55bc730-259b-4d52-8c98-648d43840738.Keywords: Attach to a Ì or sentinel hero. Restricted.
a55bc730-259b-4d52-8c98-648d43840738.Name: Armored Destrier
a55bc730-259b-4d52-8c98-648d43840738.Text: Response: After attached hero defends against an attack, exhaust Armored Destrier to ready attached hero. Then, discard a shadow card from another enemy engaged with the defending player.

a56cab99-d482-4aa3-b5e4-b1e5b857515f.Keywords:
The first player gains control of Chief Turch.
Immune to player card effects. Chief Turch does not exhaust to defend.
a56cab99-d482-4aa3-b5e4-b1e5b857515f.Name: Chief Turch
a56cab99-d482-4aa3-b5e4-b1e5b857515f.Text: If Chief Turch leaves play, the players lose the game.

a58a4337-b935-4b6c-b6fb-72e71e8bb9a8.Name: Wold of Rohan
a58a4337-b935-4b6c-b6fb-72e71e8bb9a8.Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
a58a4337-b935-4b6c-b6fb-72e71e8bb9a8.Text: Action: Increase the pursuit value by 1 to place 1 progress on Wold of Rohan.

a58dc702-4b9f-41ee-be83-136eda08906d.Name: Haradrim Captain
a58dc702-4b9f-41ee-be83-136eda08906d.Shadow: Shadow: Attaching enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û in stead if it has the Harad trait).
a58dc702-4b9f-41ee-be83-136eda08906d.Text:
Each Harad enemy in the staging area gains archery 1.
Each engaged Harad enemy gets +1 Ú.

a5aef3fe-7bb9-4165-ba0f-91127d8f21e3.Name: Grabbed by Spiders
a5aef3fe-7bb9-4165-ba0f-91127d8f21e3.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the main quest. Limit 1 per quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: After the Search objective is flipped to Off Track, each player discards an ally he controls. Then, discard Grabbed by Spiders.”)

a5e60892-b524-43cf-a501-372a624e785e.Name: Norbury Tombs
a5e60892-b524-43cf-a501-372a624e785e.Text:
While Norbury Tombs is the active location, it gains: “Response: When Norbury Tombs is explored, each player shuffl es the top 5 cards of his discard pile back into his deck.”

Travel: Return the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

a62b42dc-ab4a-4573-a281-53742e2739f5.Keywords: Indestructible. Cannot be optionally engaged. The Balrog and shadow cards dealt to The Balrog are immune to player card effects.
a62b42dc-ab4a-4573-a281-53742e2739f5.Name: The Balrog
a62b42dc-ab4a-4573-a281-53742e2739f5.Text: While in the staging area, The Balrog is considered to be engaged with the first player and only the first player can declare attackers against The Balrog.

a6993cad-4a32-48f4-b5fc-289d39faf740.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
a6993cad-4a32-48f4-b5fc-289d39faf740.Name: Candle-lit Pool
a6993cad-4a32-48f4-b5fc-289d39faf740.Text:
Forced: When Candle-lit Pool is discarded by the Mire keyword, each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy and puts it into play engaged with him.
Travel: Spend 2 ? resources to travel here.

a6dd52d0-375a-41ea-ae77-b0fd9bcb6629.Name: To the Tower
a6dd52d0-375a-41ea-ae77-b0fd9bcb6629.Text:
To the Tower cannot leave the staging area.

Remove Faramir from the game.

If 10 or more progress tokens are on To the Tower, the players have lost the game.

a6ea339d-aec3-4ec7-9374-c1442385c260.Name: Heavy Curse
a6ea339d-aec3-4ec7-9374-c1442385c260.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “When a player plays a card, increase its cost by 1 if there is a card that has the same title in its owner’s discard pile.”)

a7231cbd-0620-4b15-9c2c-68d4e7c79a8f.Name: Secrets of Rhudaur
a7231cbd-0620-4b15-9c2c-68d4e7c79a8f.Text:
Time 5. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from Secrets of Rhudaur, remove each Treachery of Rhudaur side quest from the game and immediately advance to stage 2.

During the quest phase, Secrets of Rhudaur cannot be chosen as the current quest.

If there are no Treachery of Rhudaur side quests in play, immediately advance to stage 2.

a727d1ec-2bbf-452b-9e7d-92fffc39acd2.Name: I'm Waiting for You!
a727d1ec-2bbf-452b-9e7d-92fffc39acd2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if the defending character is an ally).
a727d1ec-2bbf-452b-9e7d-92fffc39acd2.Text: When Revealed: Each Wight enemy engaged with a player makes an immediate attack. If no attacks were made this way, I'm Waiting for You! Gains surge.

a73ea798-1d91-4bda-86d9-1085739d9cb4.Name: Burst into Song
a73ea798-1d91-4bda-86d9-1085739d9cb4.Text: Action: Ready each hero with a Song attachment.

a753e0fd-510a-40e2-8a87-ed306f156358.Name: Fangorn's Anger
a753e0fd-510a-40e2-8a87-ed306f156358.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, if Mugash is attached to a hero, attacking enemy engages the player who controls that hero.
a753e0fd-510a-40e2-8a87-ed306f156358.Text: When Revealed: If Mugash is attached to a hero, deal 2 damage to that hero. If Mugash is not attached to a hero, Fangorn's Anger gains surge and doomed 2.

a78c13d9-8acb-42eb-82a0-a216de3ed87a.Name: An Evil Fortune
a78c13d9-8acb-42eb-82a0-a216de3ed87a.Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, add this card to the victory display.
a78c13d9-8acb-42eb-82a0-a216de3ed87a.Text: When Revealed: Add this card to the victory display.

a7907eca-8205-40a3-95ba-f30e31aaad82.Name: Cave Barrow
a7907eca-8205-40a3-95ba-f30e31aaad82.Text: The players, as a group, cannot have more than 5 allies in play. (If there are more than 5 allies in play, discard allies until only 5 remain.)

a7a8a783-8a22-49fd-a1b7-42e92a44f78c.Name: Raiding the Coasts
a7a8a783-8a22-49fd-a1b7-42e92a44f78c.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, discard an attachment you control.
a7a8a783-8a22-49fd-a1b7-42e92a44f78c.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either add 3 to the total $ in the staging area until the end of the phase, or discard the highest cost attachment you control.

a7ac2b78-52a7-4bd9-b37f-3d424876c7d8.Name: Fell Folk of Umbar
a7ac2b78-52a7-4bd9-b37f-3d424876c7d8.Text: When Revealed: Either return each Corsair enemy engaged with you to the staging area, or discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Corsair enemy is discarded and put that enemy into play engaged with you.

a7d52939-2989-44d2-b81b-571db0ee8c16.Name: Shadow Host Captain
a7d52939-2989-44d2-b81b-571db0ee8c16.Text:
Dusk. Shadow Host Captain gets +1 Û and +1 Ú.

Midnight. Shadow Host Captain gains +2 Û and +2 Ú.

a7f12d87-5f28-46ca-a301-0ac48ca5e471.Keywords: Attach to a Gondor or Dunedain hero.
a7f12d87-5f28-46ca-a301-0ac48ca5e471.Name: Gondorian Fire
a7f12d87-5f28-46ca-a301-0ac48ca5e471.Text: Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to give attached hero +1 Û for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

a7f5f1b7-6510-4c0f-9198-fd109e19a5c3.Name: The Ford of Harnen
a7f5f1b7-6510-4c0f-9198-fd109e19a5c3.Text:
Uruk Chieftain cannot take damage while River Harnen is in the staging area.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Place X progress on this stage, where X is the discarded card’s $ plus the total $ of each engaged enemy.
If the Orcs defeat this stage, the Orcs have caught you and you lose the game.

a835576b-6a6c-4407-8f40-0151b70f5902.Name: Orc Hunter
a835576b-6a6c-4407-8f40-0151b70f5902.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes and additional attack after this one.
a835576b-6a6c-4407-8f40-0151b70f5902.Text: When Revealed:  Either reveal an additional encounter card, or remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

a83a5cb2-b557-4e10-baea-957318cbea95.Name: Dúnedain Remedy
a83a5cb2-b557-4e10-baea-957318cbea95.Text:
Response: After Dúnedain Remedy is attached to a hero, heal 1 damage on that hero.

Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to attach Dúnedain Remedy to another hero.

a8494d53-c8a4-4f74-b3e1-2e4183aeea2a.Name: A Scrap of History
a8494d53-c8a4-4f74-b3e1-2e4183aeea2a.Text: Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective, add it to the victory display, and place 1 resource token on the current quest.

a870e2b3-4b9d-46ea-bc37-425fd682f114.Name: Mablung
a870e2b3-4b9d-46ea-bc37-425fd682f114.Text: Response: After Mablung enters play, choose an enemy to get +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, you may engage that enemy, or return it to the staging area.

a87da7c6-14fe-4213-b66f-43836531e213.Name: Golden Shield
a87da7c6-14fe-4213-b66f-43836531e213.Text: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted. Response: After attached hero is declared as a defender, exhaust Golden Shield to add attached hero’s Ò to its Ú for this attack.

a8918c80-f092-4649-bb5c-9f7fde3cef75.Name: Aimless Wandering
a8918c80-f092-4649-bb5c-9f7fde3cef75.Text: When Revealed: The players, as a group, must remove characters with a total of at least X Ò from the quest. X is the number of Uncharted locations in the staging area. The first player may give Aimless Wandering doomed 2 to look at the facedown side of an Uncharted location in the staging area.

a8980fe0-a42b-4de5-a8ab-388bea8038b1.Name: Into the Ettenmoors
a8980fe0-a42b-4de5-a8ab-388bea8038b1.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if there are no encounter side quests in play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side quest is discarded, and add it to the staging area.

Forced: When a side quest is defeated, place progress tokens on Into the Ettenmoors equal to that side quest's quest points.

a9321cbd-897f-4a77-a548-85ad00112273.Name: Ancient Depths
a9321cbd-897f-4a77-a548-85ad00112273.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking Enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the active location is Underwater).
a9321cbd-897f-4a77-a548-85ad00112273.Text: When Revealed: Add the top location from the Grotto deck to the staging area and flip that location to its Underwater side. This effect cannot be canceled.

a933917f-4c7e-416e-8b08-ee2e60f6ab5f.Name: Warden of Annúminas
a933917f-4c7e-416e-8b08-ee2e60f6ab5f.Text: Warden of Annúminas gets +1 Ò for each enemy engaged with you.

a944e2e1-56e4-461d-b703-db991b673b9b.Name: Inside Information
a944e2e1-56e4-461d-b703-db991b673b9b.Text:
Players cannot defeat this stage while Smaug the Magnificent is in play.

Forced: If the total number of progress on this stage is greater than the total remaining hit points on Smaug the Magnificent, remove Smaug the Magnificent from play.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game and discovered any treasure successfully burgled from The Lonely Mountain.

a9502ae6-2df9-419a-b562-43550926cd73.Name: Spawn of Thangorodrim
a9502ae6-2df9-419a-b562-43550926cd73.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
a9502ae6-2df9-419a-b562-43550926cd73.Text: When Revealed: If Naurlhûg is in play, it makes an immediate attack against the first player. If Naurlhûg is not in play, place 1 resource on Stalking the Ruins. Then, if there are at least 3 resources on Stalking the Ruins, add Naurlhûg to the staging area.

a961751d-414b-4a53-9da4-5708f8b7bb1f.Name: Pillaged Ship
a961751d-414b-4a53-9da4-5708f8b7bb1f.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Raider, move all resources from defending character to attacking enemy.
a961751d-414b-4a53-9da4-5708f8b7bb1f.Text: When Revealed: Either deal 3 damage to Pillaged Ship, or add the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

a9d496bb-46b8-4660-8ae8-430a4cafb997.Name: Cursed Dead
a9d496bb-46b8-4660-8ae8-430a4cafb997.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if there is a copy of the defending character in its owner's discard pile).
a9d496bb-46b8-4660-8ae8-430a4cafb997.Text: When Revealed: Put each copy of Cursed Dead in the discard pile into play in the staging area.

aa3355cb-57e1-4d8b-8a1b-9be22581a9f3.Name: The Eastern Spur
aa3355cb-57e1-4d8b-8a1b-9be22581a9f3.Text:
Players cannot advance from this stage unless stage 3 and stage 4 are complete.

Forced: If there is no progress on this stage at the end of the round, each player must discard 1 random card from his hand.

aa632825-0b60-4dc7-9733-8aa554631d6e.Name: Stone Ring
aa632825-0b60-4dc7-9733-8aa554631d6e.Text: While Stone Ring is in the staging area, each Wight enemy engaged with a player gets +1 Û and +1 Ú and applies the first sentence of its game text to each player at this stage as if it were engaged with him.

aa6914e2-4b79-4a95-ab3e-386d6a924bee.Name: Dead Lord
aa6914e2-4b79-4a95-ab3e-386d6a924bee.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, reveal 1 encounter card.
aa6914e2-4b79-4a95-ab3e-386d6a924bee.Text: Forced: After Dead Lord engages you, put the topmost Undead enemy in the discard pile into play engaged with you.

aa7977bd-06af-4a8f-bc94-7162250eff7a.Name: Arrows in the Night
aa7977bd-06af-4a8f-bc94-7162250eff7a.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 random card from your hand.
aa7977bd-06af-4a8f-bc94-7162250eff7a.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, add 6 to the archery total at this stage. You may discard X cards from hand to reduce the archery total at this stage by X until the end of the round.

aa7cd6b1-910c-49cb-9606-771889d1dc77.Name: Halfling Bounder
aa7cd6b1-910c-49cb-9606-771889d1dc77.Text: While there is a side quest in the victory display, Halfling Bounder gains: “Response: Discard Halfling Bounder to cancel the ‘when revealed’ effects of an encounter card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.”

aa8cd34c-cf6a-440e-a05f-c05f84446a72.Name: Combat - Actions
aa8cd34c-cf6a-440e-a05f-c05f84446a72.Text: All players may play events or trigger actions and responses

aac8023b-431b-4cfa-8f6e-659a4e8dd04e.Keywords: X is the number of poison in play.
aac8023b-431b-4cfa-8f6e-659a4e8dd04e.Name: Mirkwood Path
aac8023b-431b-4cfa-8f6e-659a4e8dd04e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each poisoned character you control.
aac8023b-431b-4cfa-8f6e-659a4e8dd04e.Text: Forced: When this location is explored, make 1 hero unconscious.

aae56769-69c1-4693-bcbe-dcd282c29568.Name: To Catch an Orc
aae56769-69c1-4693-bcbe-dcd282c29568.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Setup: Each player shuffles 1 copy of Vigilant Orc into his out of play deck. Set both copiues of Mugash's Rage and any remaining copies of Vigilant Orc aside, out of play. Forced: When the players advance to stage 3A, shuffle both copies of Mugash's Rage into the encounter deck.

ab2ac791-b266-43b2-b6ee-0d412a1100bc.Keywords: The first player gains control of Faramir.
ab2ac791-b266-43b2-b6ee-0d412a1100bc.Name: Faramir
ab2ac791-b266-43b2-b6ee-0d412a1100bc.Text: Combat Action: Exhaust Faramir to turn 1 hidden card faceup. If that card is an enemy, deal 3 damage to it. If Faramir leaves play, the players have lost the game.

ab5fec4c-b353-47e5-ae47-db7daf7f9088.Name: Curse of the Downfallen
ab5fec4c-b353-47e5-ae47-db7daf7f9088.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of your deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
ab5fec4c-b353-47e5-ae47-db7daf7f9088.Text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each non‑objective ally with printed cost 2 or less. Place each ally destroyed by this effect on the bottom of its owner’s deck.

ab7ef031-1d13-4623-a9c3-2f6e3ce15d38.Name: The Living Forest
ab7ef031-1d13-4623-a9c3-2f6e3ce15d38.Text:
Forced: At the end of the planning phase, each player much exhaust a hero he controls.

Forced: After placing progress as the result of questing successfully, if there are X or more total victory points on locations in the victory display, advance to stage 3A. Otherwise, advance to a different random stagfe 2A. X is the number of players in the game times 5.

aba39503-0700-40c9-9c06-729e82bf67fe.Name: Ramming Speed!
aba39503-0700-40c9-9c06-729e82bf67fe.Text: When Revealed: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), the engaged Ship enemy with the highest Û makes an immediate attack. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each damage dealt by this attack. If no attack is made as a result of this effect, Ramming Speed! gains doomed 2.

abb76690-2b56-4a51-af0d-10c292621697.Name: Uruk Elf-Stalker
abb76690-2b56-4a51-af0d-10c292621697.Text: Forced: When Uruk Elf-stalker attacks and destroys a character, deal 1 damage to Arwen Undómiel.

abc54411-1805-4ef4-8c47-517ffe72312e.Name: The Wall is Breached!
abc54411-1805-4ef4-8c47-517ffe72312e.Text:
Defense. 
Forced: After a character is destroyed, place 1 progress on this stage (bypassing any active location). 

If this stage is defeated, the players lose the game.

abcc9a29-c485-4f0b-ac1e-c3fb452e0478.Name: Market Square
abcc9a29-c485-4f0b-ac1e-c3fb452e0478.Text: Forced: After a player places any amount of progress on a location in the staging area, he raises his threat by 1. Travel: Each player spends 1 resource to travel here.

abd56f0e-0238-432b-84b2-7c715d96477b.Name: Desecrated Ruins
abd56f0e-0238-432b-84b2-7c715d96477b.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys an ally, place X damage on the active location. X is that ally’s cost.
abd56f0e-0238-432b-84b2-7c715d96477b.Text: When Revealed: Place 3 damage on the active location. If there is no active location, Desecrated Ruins gains surge.

abd919a4-de0d-4f7f-8cc1-787ab31980c9.Name: Wild Hillman
abd919a4-de0d-4f7f-8cc1-787ab31980c9.Shadow: Shadow: Place 1 progress on the active location. Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each progress on the active location.
abd919a4-de0d-4f7f-8cc1-787ab31980c9.Text: Forced: After Wild Hillman attacks, place 1 progress on the active location.

abe7a278-0c8e-4b1b-b45a-4da86dd3a3db.Name: Silvertine Marauder
abe7a278-0c8e-4b1b-b45a-4da86dd3a3db.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û  if the defending character has less than 2 Ò   .
abe7a278-0c8e-4b1b-b45a-4da86dd3a3db.Text: While attacking, Silvertine Marauder gets +2 Û  if the defending character has less than 2 Ò   .

abebff49-8219-4ae0-bd26-266db57bdfc3.Keywords: Elven-light can only be played from your discard pile.
abebff49-8219-4ae0-bd26-266db57bdfc3.Name: Elven-light
abebff49-8219-4ae0-bd26-266db57bdfc3.Text: Action: Return Elven-light to your hand from your discard pile. Then, draw 1 card.

abeec7e9-ccf6-4145-ae1a-d7179c5a4b4d.Name: Corsair Pursuit
abeec7e9-ccf6-4145-ae1a-d7179c5a4b4d.Text:
Sailing.
You cannot place progress on Corsair Pursuit unless you are on-course (º).
If there are no Ship enemies in play, you have defeated your pursuers, and win the game. If this stage has 10 or more progress on it, you have lost your pursuers, and win the game.

abfe3930-7bca-4ce8-9594-038ad4846205.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
abfe3930-7bca-4ce8-9594-038ad4846205.Name: Faithless Dead
abfe3930-7bca-4ce8-9594-038ad4846205.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û and loses the Phantom keyword for this attack.
abfe3930-7bca-4ce8-9594-038ad4846205.Text: When Revealed: Either raise each player’s threat by 2, or reveal an additional encounter card.

ac2d3796-1d68-4d27-9e5e-4a09a535c0b7.Name: Taking Initiative
ac2d3796-1d68-4d27-9e5e-4a09a535c0b7.Text: Action: Discard the top card of your deck. If the discarded card's printed cost is equal to or higher than the number of characters you control, draw 2 cards and deal 2 damage to any enemy.

ac4724db-a3cc-4984-bef5-f51b0f4421f8.Name: Goblins are Upon You!
ac4724db-a3cc-4984-bef5-f51b0f4421f8.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each Goblin enemy engaged with you.
ac4724db-a3cc-4984-bef5-f51b0f4421f8.Text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Goblin enemy and put it into play, engaged with him. Then, shuffle the encounter deck. (This effect cannot be canceled.)

ac4da79d-d966-45bf-b1d3-c4d0a348dd7e.Name: Palace Remains
ac4da79d-d966-45bf-b1d3-c4d0a348dd7e.Text:
Immune to player card effects. Palace Remains gets +1 $ for each resource token on it. 

The players cannot travel here unless there are at least 5 resource tokens on Palace Remains. 
While Palace Remains is in the staging area, it gains "Forced: After a player takes control of a location, place 1 resource token here."

ac5c7c07-591f-4ac0-9080-e46433a50ff3.Name: The Witch-King's Gift
ac5c7c07-591f-4ac0-9080-e46433a50ff3.Text:
Daechanar is powerful in the art of necromancy. His army will not rest until you join them in death.
Time 5. Forced: When the last time counter is removed from this quest, reanimate each card in each player's discard pile. Then, remove the Witch-king's Gift from the game.
When this quest is defeated, place it in the encounter discard pile.

aca1ee7f-ad29-4218-8dd5-f7f7a8e617fe.Name: Morgul Bodyguard
aca1ee7f-ad29-4218-8dd5-f7f7a8e617fe.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy engages the next player and makes an immediate attack, if able.
aca1ee7f-ad29-4218-8dd5-f7f7a8e617fe.Text: Any damage that would be dealt to a Captain is dealt to 1 Morgul Bodyguard instead.

ad09f848-9430-41c8-8723-671f08b79078.Name: Weathertop
ad09f848-9430-41c8-8723-671f08b79078.Text:
While Weathertop is in the victory display, each enemy in play gets -1 $.

Travel: The first player must exhaust The One Ring to travel here.

ad0cbc82-6807-4a5a-ada8-97952cb02c5f.Name: Send for Aid
ad0cbc82-6807-4a5a-ada8-97952cb02c5f.Text: Response: When this stage is defeated, each player may search the top 10 cards of his deck for an ally and put it into play under his control. Each player who did shuffles his deck.

ad251ffd-8653-4a45-b88e-def2ffecc2dc.Name: Uruk of Mordor
ad251ffd-8653-4a45-b88e-def2ffecc2dc.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if its $ is greater than the defending character’s Ò).
ad251ffd-8653-4a45-b88e-def2ffecc2dc.Text: Each ally with less Ò than Uruk of Mordor’s $ cannot defend against Uruk of Mordor.

ad7fc95f-4a8d-4a15-b170-b0db3c3002f0.Name: The Savage South
ad7fc95f-4a8d-4a15-b170-b0db3c3002f0.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
ad7fc95f-4a8d-4a15-b170-b0db3c3002f0.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of his deck. Each player discards each card he controls that shares a title with any of the 5 cards he just discarded.

adc3e6f6-da67-4cc1-9767-8e87dfc91b99.Name: Háma
adc3e6f6-da67-4cc1-9767-8e87dfc91b99.Text: Combat Action: Ready Háma. He gets +3 Ú until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Háma. (Limit once per round.)

add42229-f5d1-4c39-a5dd-ec00ad7d0d76.Name: Gaining Strength
add42229-f5d1-4c39-a5dd-ec00ad7d0d76.Text: Action: Discard 2 resources from your hero's resource pool to add 3 resources to that hero's resource pool.

adeb3985-c342-4d9e-acd6-2c7cf35dafe6.Name: Keys of Belegost
adeb3985-c342-4d9e-acd6-2c7cf35dafe6.Text:
If unattached, the fist player claims Keys of Belegost and attaches it to a hero he controls.
Action: Exhaust Keys of Belegost to choose a hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

adf2480a-644a-47ee-8deb-bd08ff32bf31.Name: Welcome to the Jungle
adf2480a-644a-47ee-8deb-bd08ff32bf31.Text: Forced: After the active location leaves play as an explored location, shuffle 1 set aside Wild Mûmak into the encounter deck. The players cannot advance unless the number of Wild Mûmak in play is equal to the number of players.

ae16236d-886e-4f65-9129-5ead1d373bfe.Keywords: Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a hero with Ranged.
ae16236d-886e-4f65-9129-5ead1d373bfe.Name: Black Arrow
ae16236d-886e-4f65-9129-5ead1d373bfe.Text: Response: After attached hero declares an attack, add Black Arrow to the victory display to give attached hero +5 Û for this attack.

ae16b39f-ed64-4aa9-b6b8-1fbfbda70e6f.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
ae16b39f-ed64-4aa9-b6b8-1fbfbda70e6f.Name: War Mumak
ae16b39f-ed64-4aa9-b6b8-1fbfbda70e6f.Text: Cannot have attachments or take more than 3 damage each round. Forced: When War Mumak is defeated, reduce each player’s threat by 4.

ae2c5145-f34a-4367-bd41-1e5e7749fb68.Name: Saruman's Voice
ae2c5145-f34a-4367-bd41-1e5e7749fb68.Text: When Revealed: Remove a hero from the quest and attach Saruman’s Voice to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: When attached hero commits to the quest, is declared as an attacker or defender, or triggers its ability, its controller must discard 1 card from his hand.”)

ae32eeef-ea88-48f7-9563-0eff62d02499.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
ae32eeef-ea88-48f7-9563-0eff62d02499.Name: Choking Tentacle
ae32eeef-ea88-48f7-9563-0eff62d02499.Text: Forced: After resolving an attack made by Choking Tentacle , discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card has a shadow effect or is a Tentacle enemy, attach Choking Tentacle to a character the defending player controls as a Tentacle attachment with the text: "Forced: After attached character readies. deal it 1 damage."

ae435070-552a-43a9-816f-9f23f1a6dbba.Name: Ettenmoors
ae435070-552a-43a9-816f-9f23f1a6dbba.Text:
While Ettenmoors is the active location, do not deal Nazgul enemies a shadow card during the combat phase.

Forced: After any amount of progress is placed on Ettenmoors, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.

ae49dd35-f2c7-4ab5-b34d-0cc8e5fb1f6e.Name: Kahliel
ae49dd35-f2c7-4ab5-b34d-0cc8e5fb1f6e.Text: You may use resources from Kahliel’s pool to pay for Harad ally cards of any sphere.

ae49e8e5-98f1-4562-935f-5e1ab64631e0.Name: Deep Dark Passage
ae49e8e5-98f1-4562-935f-5e1ab64631e0.Text:
While Deep Dark Passage is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: When any amount of progress would be placed on a location in the staging area, reduce that amount by 1.”

Travel: Exhaust Smeagol to travel here.

ae5727cb-4d88-4a28-99be-84a565292b67.Name: Ruined Tower
ae5727cb-4d88-4a28-99be-84a565292b67.Text:
Travel: If there is 1 active location, exhaust a character to travel here. (There are now 2 active locations.)

Forced: After the player who controls Ruined Tower loses control of a location, return Ruined Tower to the staging area.

ae774680-c6e9-49eb-96b8-fcdebe90b49d.Name: The Arkenstone
ae774680-c6e9-49eb-96b8-fcdebe90b49d.Text: Action: Exhaust The Arkenstone and raise your threat by X to lower by X the cost of the next ally you play this phase that matches the attached hero's sphere.

ae807a4c-d656-42a1-bf2c-024eaffc9fc6.Name: Oath of Eorl
ae807a4c-d656-42a1-bf2c-024eaffc9fc6.Text: Play only if you control a unique character with the Rohan trait and another unique character with the Gondor trait. Response: At the beginning of the combat phase, you resolve the step in which you attack enemies before resolving enemy attacks this phase. (Each other player resolves the combat phase as normal after you resolve your attacks.)

aeba0e59-8dde-4422-bfb5-911ae8de42a1.Name: Growing Threat
aeba0e59-8dde-4422-bfb5-911ae8de42a1.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, move attacking enemy to the first player's staging area.
aeba0e59-8dde-4422-bfb5-911ae8de42a1.Text: When Revealed: Either move 1 enemy engaged with you to the first player's staging area, or Growing Threat gains doomed 2 and surge.

aebb2c2f-859e-4f08-9017-1fcc4a4cc528.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
aebb2c2f-859e-4f08-9017-1fcc4a4cc528.Name: Mince Them Fine
aebb2c2f-859e-4f08-9017-1fcc4a4cc528.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, return it to the staging area after this attack.
aebb2c2f-859e-4f08-9017-1fcc4a4cc528.Text: When Revealed: Each engaged Troll enemy makes an immediate attack. If the players are at stage 1, immediately advance to stage 2A.

aede410a-9d4c-4abd-9f55-143f5027f9c4.Name: Cursed Mists
aede410a-9d4c-4abd-9f55-143f5027f9c4.Text:
Sailing.
While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each non-Ship ally gets –2 Ò.
When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

af49e5ea-c6a2-4be4-bbf3-ac53c100e887.Name: Noble Hero
af49e5ea-c6a2-4be4-bbf3-ac53c100e887.Text:
Setup: Attach to a hero.

Attached hero gets +1 Ò and gains the Noble trait.

af53407e-c51f-4b41-bd25-312f681149e1.Name: Elven Wave-runner
af53407e-c51f-4b41-bd25-312f681149e1.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Raider, discard a card at random from your hand and place 1 resource on attacking enemy.
af53407e-c51f-4b41-bd25-312f681149e1.Text: Response: After Elven Wave-runner is added to the victory display, each player draws 1 card.

af74e00e-a04e-4a15-a538-d36539bfb751.Name: Pursuing the Enemy
af74e00e-a04e-4a15-a538-d36539bfb751.Text: Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

af787868-59d6-48be-983f-447ba0523f46.Name: Eregion
af787868-59d6-48be-983f-447ba0523f46.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls.
af787868-59d6-48be-983f-447ba0523f46.Text: Forced: When Eregion is explored, the players as a group must discard X allies from play. X is the number of damage here.

afd48fc2-1bca-44d1-9b30-380d2035f2fb.Name: Mountains of Angmar
afd48fc2-1bca-44d1-9b30-380d2035f2fb.Shadow: Shadow: Raise defending player's threat by 2.
afd48fc2-1bca-44d1-9b30-380d2035f2fb.Text: While Mountains of Angmar is the active location, each shadow card with no shadow effect gains "Shadow: Raise defending player's threat by 2."

b002c7a6-f827-4a7d-8432-c3f2f995089e.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
b002c7a6-f827-4a7d-8432-c3f2f995089e.Name: The Corsair Fleet
b002c7a6-f827-4a7d-8432-c3f2f995089e.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, remove 1 resource from The Corsair Fleet. Then, if there are no resources here, the first player takes control of Aragorn and adds The Corsair Fleet to the victory display.

b00c623e-2aaa-4286-9fba-499fe39eb204.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. The players cannot win the game while Withywindle is in play.
b00c623e-2aaa-4286-9fba-499fe39eb204.Name: Withywindle
b00c623e-2aaa-4286-9fba-499fe39eb204.Text: While Withywindle is the active location, the first player reveals 1 additional encounter card during the quest phase.

b028411b-ab1d-4a54-a9d0-38cb70489f98.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
b028411b-ab1d-4a54-a9d0-38cb70489f98.Name: Frenzied Warg-Rider
b028411b-ab1d-4a54-a9d0-38cb70489f98.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character (2 damage instead if the current quest has no progress on it).
b028411b-ab1d-4a54-a9d0-38cb70489f98.Text: Forced: When Frenzied Warg-Rider attacks, remove 1 progress from each quest stage.

b03a007c-42bc-433c-bd0e-efbf65a8696d.Name: Lingering Malevolence
b03a007c-42bc-433c-bd0e-efbf65a8696d.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of the defending player’s deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
b03a007c-42bc-433c-bd0e-efbf65a8696d.Text: When Revealed: The first player discards the bottom card of his deck. Then, he discards each card in his hand with a printed cost higher than that of the discarded card.

b06030a9-7ab9-48a6-b7da-5ffd8ce3a1a6.Name: Crazy Cob
b06030a9-7ab9-48a6-b7da-5ffd8ce3a1a6.Text: When Revealed: This enemy attacks the character with the most poison attached.

b09288fe-e0a4-4395-8345-4505530fbe4c.Name: Terrible to Behold
b09288fe-e0a4-4395-8345-4505530fbe4c.Text: Response: After you declare a Noble character as a defender against an attack made by an engaged enemy, return that enemy to the staging area. Then, cancel the attack.

b0a1f83b-f1b0-4945-afc8-91a1c25063e2.Name: Mysterious Fog
b0a1f83b-f1b0-4945-afc8-91a1c25063e2.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of your deck. If that card's printed cost is 2 or less, exhaust a character you control.
b0a1f83b-f1b0-4945-afc8-91a1c25063e2.Text: When Revealed: Either each player must exhaust a character he controls, or each Lost Island in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase.

b0b64e9f-0a9f-42f1-9ad0-0e54db93dc47.Name: They Are Coming!
b0b64e9f-0a9f-42f1-9ad0-0e54db93dc47.Text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded. X is the number of players in the game. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

b0caeaa6-2c96-4d92-9cca-7cb55387d8c0.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
b0caeaa6-2c96-4d92-9cca-7cb55387d8c0.Name: Wicked Wolf
b0caeaa6-2c96-4d92-9cca-7cb55387d8c0.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
b0caeaa6-2c96-4d92-9cca-7cb55387d8c0.Text: Forced: If Wicked Wolf is dealt a shadow card with a riddle, the defending player must exhaust a character he controls.

b0d31a1c-2155-4a97-a5ff-912e32a4809e.Name: Old Tomnoddy
b0d31a1c-2155-4a97-a5ff-912e32a4809e.Text: Forced: At the end of each round, each player must give a hero he controls 1 poison.

b0e4169e-0dd1-4abc-a021-e6b16ebc0bd2.Name: Dense Thickets
b0e4169e-0dd1-4abc-a021-e6b16ebc0bd2.Shadow: Shadow: Excess damage dealt by this attack(damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by this attack) must be assigned to a Ranger objective in play.
b0e4169e-0dd1-4abc-a021-e6b16ebc0bd2.Text: While Dense Thickets is in the staging area, each Forest location in play gets +1 $.

b0ed537a-1e96-4b46-af9b-3449be219781.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
b0ed537a-1e96-4b46-af9b-3449be219781.Name: In the Name of Mordor!
b0ed537a-1e96-4b46-af9b-3449be219781.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After a player fails a Hide test, he discards a random card from his hand.")

b11ff1d9-c9e9-4cc1-b329-8226b73dd429.Name: Delay the Enemy
b11ff1d9-c9e9-4cc1-b329-8226b73dd429.Text: Response: When this stage is defeated, each player may choose and discard a non-unique enemy engaged with him.

b1217b87-40bd-442d-b7c8-0d9b7d262b04.Name: The Long Dark
b1217b87-40bd-442d-b7c8-0d9b7d262b04.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Durin's Greaves gains surge. 

Lost: The first player must choose and discard an ally in play.

b1584166-c8b3-4984-bfdc-06c33f31e153.Keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
b1584166-c8b3-4984-bfdc-06c33f31e153.Name: Beechbone
b1584166-c8b3-4984-bfdc-06c33f31e153.Text: Response: After Beechbone is declared as an attacker, deal 1 damage to him to deal X damage to the defending enemy. X is the amount of damage on Beechbone.

b1662195-6d46-474c-9ee9-ccbf14c7b70e.Name: The Clutches of Carn Dûm
b1662195-6d46-474c-9ee9-ccbf14c7b70e.Text:
Thaurdir cannot leave the staging area and cannot take damage. At the end of the round, if Thaurdir is Champion side face-up, flip him.

Do not discard unresolved shadow cards at the end of the combat phase.

Forced: If there are 3 shadow cards dealt to Thaurdir, flip him.

b171f1fa-a603-43ab-97c9-f950ee3b3599.Name: Southron Sailor
b171f1fa-a603-43ab-97c9-f950ee3b3599.Text: While Southron Sailor is engaged with you, each Ship enemy engaged with you contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area.

b188f729-0314-4664-95a0-7f93f4d44133.Name: Erestor
b188f729-0314-4664-95a0-7f93f4d44133.Text:
Draw 3 additional cards at the beginning of the resource phase.

At the end of the round, discard all cards in your hand.

b1898a55-730c-493e-9fcd-24a51d817b64.Name: Lashing Tentacles
b1898a55-730c-493e-9fcd-24a51d817b64.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, The Thing in the Depths makes an attack against the defending player (deal a shadow card for this attack).
b1898a55-730c-493e-9fcd-24a51d817b64.Text: When Revealed: The Thing in the Depths attacks each player in turn order from the staging area (deal and resolve a shadow card for each attack).

b194fe1c-18c8-47d2-a674-8e209339c7e2.Name: Woody End
b194fe1c-18c8-47d2-a674-8e209339c7e2.Text: While Woody End is the Active location, reduce each Hide X value by 1.

b1f8c611-99a3-4bab-9805-832853d52d4d.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
b1f8c611-99a3-4bab-9805-832853d52d4d.Name: Lost Island
b1f8c611-99a3-4bab-9805-832853d52d4d.Text: Forced: After Forbidden Coast is flipped over while active, each player may draw a card. Then, each player chooses a card from his hand and places it on the bottom of his deck.

b2113592-2485-4324-98c8-ab4bec23deae.Encounter Set: The Passage of the Marshes - Nightmare
b2113592-2485-4324-98c8-ab4bec23deae.Name: Pale Faces
b2113592-2485-4324-98c8-ab4bec23deae.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, when X is the Mire X value of the active location.
b2113592-2485-4324-98c8-ab4bec23deae.Text:
The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.
Forced: When Pale Faces attacks, raise your threat by 4.

b21850eb-ca62-47d8-b7aa-6d6c5ff29867.Name: Hunted in Harad
b21850eb-ca62-47d8-b7aa-6d6c5ff29867.Text:
While the players are at stage 4B, Uruk Chieftain cannot leave the Orc’s area and each enemy at this stage gets +1 $.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, return Uruk Chieftain to the Orc’s area and discard the top card of the encounter deck. Place X progress on this stage, where X is the total $ of the discarded card plus the total $ in the Orc’s area.
If you are at stage 3B when this stage is defeated, you lose the game.

b21a2af5-7443-4630-9503-1b334ae51c6e.Name: Oin
b21a2af5-7443-4630-9503-1b334ae51c6e.Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, Oin gets +1 Û and gains the Ï resource icon.

b2acb892-ab3b-4037-8751-c036f9f6f8bd.Keywords: Underworld X. X is the number of players in the game.
b2acb892-ab3b-4037-8751-c036f9f6f8bd.Name: The Fourth Star
b2acb892-ab3b-4037-8751-c036f9f6f8bd.Text: Response: When The Fourth Star leaves play as an explored location, each player may draw 1 card.

b2df0294-f962-4e05-998a-d824d88cc13c.Name: Esquire of Gondor
b2df0294-f962-4e05-998a-d824d88cc13c.Text: Setup: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Gondor trait. Attached hero gets +1 Ò while committed to the quest with another Gondor character.

b2fcd022-5409-4a2f-9775-390d2c3ce7d2.Name: Angmar Marauder
b2fcd022-5409-4a2f-9775-390d2c3ce7d2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each ally the defending player controls.
b2fcd022-5409-4a2f-9775-390d2c3ce7d2.Text: Forced: After Angmar Marauder attacks and destroys an ally, return it to the staging area.

b2ff9ad8-c9c6-42bb-a5cd-cb2af0b006a0.Name: Sand Viper
b2ff9ad8-c9c6-42bb-a5cd-cb2af0b006a0.Text: Players cannot declare defenders against Sand Viper.Forced: After the players travel to a location, Sand Viper engages the first player.

b309f3a1-af3e-4c2e-9fce-59e8d88fbd7b.Name: Moria Archer
b309f3a1-af3e-4c2e-9fce-59e8d88fbd7b.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.

When Revealed: Assign X damage among characters you control.

b313de3d-897e-4e74-afc5-d31fceaa6162.Name: Weather Hills Watchman
b313de3d-897e-4e74-afc5-d31fceaa6162.Text: Response: After Weather Hills Watchman enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Signal card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

b32e4536-aa58-4a09-8025-12028cd28288.Name: Ambush the Men of Harad
b32e4536-aa58-4a09-8025-12028cd28288.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, reveal the top card facedown card from under The Cross­roads and add it to the staging area.

The players cannot defeat this stage while The Cross­roads is in play. When The Cross­ roads is explored, the players win the game.

b34e79d4-7806-4fd9-b12d-bb291e44f354.Name: Ancient Marsh-dweller
b34e79d4-7806-4fd9-b12d-bb291e44f354.Text:
Ancient Marsh-dweller gets +1 $ and +1 Û for each resource token on it.

Forced: After any number of time counters are removed from the current quest, place a resource token here.

b35ad07f-7862-4479-bc04-7dcf76e7cbc5.Name: Beseiged Homestead
b35ad07f-7862-4479-bc04-7dcf76e7cbc5.Text:
Forced: When any amount of progress is placed on a location in the staging area, discard 1 villager token from that location.
Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck for an enemy, reveals it, and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

b3ab2d77-ada8-42cb-9a87-dfac20d3a9f8.Name: The Desert of Harad
b3ab2d77-ada8-42cb-9a87-dfac20d3a9f8.Text: As the sun climbs into the sky, you can feel the rising heat begin to take its toll on you...Forced: After an ally enters play, either exhaust it, or deal 1 damage to it.Forced: At the end of the round, increase the temperature by 4. If the temperature is 60 or higher, the players lose the game.

b3e3e174-5406-475f-aed9-dd583e8b3652.Name: Doughty Ranger
b3e3e174-5406-475f-aed9-dd583e8b3652.Text:
Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. 
Attached hero gains the Ranger trait. 
Response: After you play Doughty Ranger from your hand, draw a card.

b3ecfc10-176d-4971-820d-6d1227697d23.Name: Combat phase - Attack
b3ecfc10-176d-4971-820d-6d1227697d23.Text: In player order, for each enemy declare attackers and deal damage

b41e6b34-4d6a-47de-9b07-b039013efbc5.Name: The Hornburg
b41e6b34-4d6a-47de-9b07-b039013efbc5.Text:
While The Hornburg is the active location, reduce the archery total by 1 for each player in the game.

Forced: When The Hornburg is explored, assign X damage among characters in play. X is the number of enemies in play.

b432d02a-d0ca-496c-96c0-e8f5753b2e17.Name: The Twilight World
b432d02a-d0ca-496c-96c0-e8f5753b2e17.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the Ring-bearer. Limit 1 per hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the beginning of the planning phase, either exhaust The One Ring, or reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.")

b442354c-887d-403e-815b-a11f10a8760d.Name: Lay of Nimrodel
b442354c-887d-403e-815b-a11f10a8760d.Text: Action: Choose a Ê hero. Until the end of the phase, that hero gets +1 Ò for each resource in its resource pool.

b4543d6e-168b-4ac6-ae65-022e13ce4098.Name: Umbar Street
b4543d6e-168b-4ac6-ae65-022e13ce4098.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
b4543d6e-168b-4ac6-ae65-022e13ce4098.Text: While Street of Umbar is the active location, each enemy gets -1 engagement cost for each progress token on the main quest.

b4769083-91fb-4e9c-9736-17e8c28ff971.Name: Fury and Malice
b4769083-91fb-4e9c-9736-17e8c28ff971.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 resource to each engaged Raider enemy. Then, each player assigns damage among characters he controls equal to the number of resource tokens on Raider enemies engaged with him. If no damage is assigned by this effect, Fury and Malice gains surge.

b477d0be-d70a-4eb4-8c35-89c17199cab3.Name: Lost in the Fog
b477d0be-d70a-4eb4-8c35-89c17199cab3.Text:
Progress cannot be placed here while Great Barrow is in play.

Forced: After a player is eliminated (at any stage), raise the threat of each player at this stage by 10.

The players cannot defeat this stage unless each player in the game is at this stage and Standing Stones is in the victory display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

b490fe8e-4367-424d-8a5c-bc7b8e1a56a7.Name: Sentry of the White Bridge
b490fe8e-4367-424d-8a5c-bc7b8e1a56a7.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, place 1 progress on To the Tower.
b490fe8e-4367-424d-8a5c-bc7b8e1a56a7.Text: X is the number of progress tokens on To the Tower.

b49b5be7-5bfc-4e65-bced-862a409e097d.Name: Out of the Swamp
b49b5be7-5bfc-4e65-bced-862a409e097d.Text:
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, Ancient Marsh-dweller makes an attack against each player in order. Place 2 time counters on this stage. 

When Ancient Marsh-dweller is defeated, the players win the game.

b49c3563-b3cd-4f33-b706-c2a721028891.Name: Gríma
b49c3563-b3cd-4f33-b706-c2a721028891.Text: Action: Lower the cost of the next card you play from your hand this round by 1. That card gains Doomed 1. (Limit once per round.)

b4bdb916-7538-461f-9aa5-141ff2809254.Name: Half-orc of Isengard
b4bdb916-7538-461f-9aa5-141ff2809254.Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 random card from your hand.
b4bdb916-7538-461f-9aa5-141ff2809254.Text: Forced: When Half-orc of Isengard attacks, either discard 1 random card from your hand, or Half-orc of Isengard gets +3 Û for this attack.

b4d93180-0ebc-4a9b-9817-e761068570e3.Name: O Lórien!
b4d93180-0ebc-4a9b-9817-e761068570e3.Text: Action: Exhaust O Lórien! To lower the cost of the next Silvan ally played this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

b4dcd330-15c0-4700-b1aa-d235f253b1de.Name: Run for your Lives!
b4dcd330-15c0-4700-b1aa-d235f253b1de.Shadow: Shadow: Either discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers, or this attack is considered undefended.
b4dcd330-15c0-4700-b1aa-d235f253b1de.Text: When Revealed: Discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers. Assign X damage among characters in play. X is the number of damage tokens on Dead Villagers.

b509154c-7596-4a48-941e-0dfa7277d0cf.Name: Stonewain Valley
b509154c-7596-4a48-941e-0dfa7277d0cf.Text:
While Stonewain Valley is in the staging area, resources discard or spent by the first player for any reason are placed on Stonewain Valley.
Stonewain Valley gets +1 $ for each resource on it.

b520fbc1-3cb9-49aa-9b37-2dad3b3ba333.Name: Noiseless Movement
b520fbc1-3cb9-49aa-9b37-2dad3b3ba333.Text:
Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. That enemy does not make engagement checks this round. Then, if your threat is 20 or less
and this is the first time you played a copy of Noiseless Movement this round, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.

b52b72ae-574d-4736-96d6-3531a0aae7ae.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
b52b72ae-574d-4736-96d6-3531a0aae7ae.Name: Infiltration

b53fd0fc-5734-4bdc-b26f-c2133da31c3d.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. Cannot be engaged.
b53fd0fc-5734-4bdc-b26f-c2133da31c3d.Name: The Thing in the Depths
b53fd0fc-5734-4bdc-b26f-c2133da31c3d.Text:
The Thing in the Depths gets +3 hit points per player.
Forced: When a Creature enemy is destroyed, deal damage to The Thing in the Depths equal to that enemy’s $.

b546c9b7-7721-4275-ba8b-ba28364aeb95.Name: Firyal
b546c9b7-7721-4275-ba8b-ba28364aeb95.Text:
Response: After Firyal commits to a quest, look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may discard that card.
If Firyal leaves play, you are eliminated from the game.

b585f28e-7612-4f07-83f7-0fed8d391e3d.Name: Dol Amroth Warship
b585f28e-7612-4f07-83f7-0fed8d391e3d.Text:
Immune to player card effects.  If you are on-course (º),  Dol Amroth Warship gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú.
Forced: When Dol Amroth Warship is destroyed, set it aside, out of play.

b59afed1-a224-4793-b149-0a6aadc9ba7e.Name: Drowned Cave
b59afed1-a224-4793-b149-0a6aadc9ba7e.Text:
While Drowned Cave is the active location, Undead enemies cannot be engaged (return any engaged Undead enemies to the staging area).

Forced: If Drowned Cave is the active location at the end of the quest phase, each player must discard the top 10 cards of his deck. Then, you may return Drowned Cave to the staging area.

b5afe22c-f57f-4e26-993f-ef40fba8e105.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
b5afe22c-f57f-4e26-993f-ef40fba8e105.Name: Siege Tower
b5afe22c-f57f-4e26-993f-ef40fba8e105.Text: While Siege Tower is in the staging area, it gains Archery 3. Forced: After Siege Tower becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until an enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

b5c7bf41-7642-4d25-9794-cb247f540182.Name: West Quarter
b5c7bf41-7642-4d25-9794-cb247f540182.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, that character's controller must return a location he controls with the highest $ to the staging area.
b5c7bf41-7642-4d25-9794-cb247f540182.Text: While West Quarter is the active location, the current quest gains siege. (Characters quest using Ú instead of Ò.)

b640a0b7-f23e-4859-96fb-b558274b90a8.Name: Starlit Sea
b640a0b7-f23e-4859-96fb-b558274b90a8.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you are off-course).
b640a0b7-f23e-4859-96fb-b558274b90a8.Text: While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), Uncharted Ocean gains: “Travel: Raise each player’s threat by 3.”

b644346d-3791-41f4-9d8a-0fd281e36b8b.Name: Wolf Spirit
b644346d-3791-41f4-9d8a-0fd281e36b8b.Text:
If Wolf's Guardian is in play or in the victory display, each Wolf enemy gets +1 Û.
Forced" At the beginning of the encounter phase, Wolf Spirit engages the player who controls Key of the Wolf or is engaged with Wolf's Gaurdian, if able.

b64d2e55-f304-4356-a491-7ee80e149c5c.Name: Hill Barrow
b64d2e55-f304-4356-a491-7ee80e149c5c.Text: Forced: When a Guardian enemy attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card.

b658345f-6282-440d-9004-35fd6ef2e0b7.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
b658345f-6282-440d-9004-35fd6ef2e0b7.Name: Pulled Under
b658345f-6282-440d-9004-35fd6ef2e0b7.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character has a Tentacle attachment, discard that character.
b658345f-6282-440d-9004-35fd6ef2e0b7.Text: When Revealed: Deal 3 damage to each character with a Tentacle attachment. If no characters were damaged by this effect, Pulled Under gains surge.

b659e2a1-55b1-4562-ab2c-0e36772d8183.Name: Midwinter's Crux
b659e2a1-55b1-4562-ab2c-0e36772d8183.Text:
Thaurdir cannot leave the staging area, is considered to be engaged with each player, and attacks each player in turn during the combat phase (deal and discard a new shadow card for each attack). At the end of the round, if Thaurdir is Captain side face-up, flip him.

While Sever the Head has 15 or more progress on it, Thaurdir loses Indestructible.

You cannot defeat this stage while Thaurdir is in play. If Thaurdir is defeated, you win the game.

b66a9091-9fa2-48a8-8353-1c1716b9bf4d.Name: Standard Game Mode
b66a9091-9fa2-48a8-8353-1c1716b9bf4d.Text:
Forced: When the players advance to stage 2A (and before resolving its 'when revealed' effect), shuffle each set aside Dúnedain of Annúminas into the encounter deck. Then, shuffle X copies of Host of Angmar into the encounter deck, where X is one less than the number of players in the game, to a minimum of 1.

If a player is eliminated from the game, deal 9 damage to Annúminas.

b6729381-3bfc-41fa-abd1-99f410eb19b8.Name: The Evening Star
b6729381-3bfc-41fa-abd1-99f410eb19b8.Text: Action: Place 2 progress on any location. Resolve that effect again for each copy of The Evening Star currently in your discard pile (you may choose different targets).

b69bdceb-a155-4aa6-b7e8-b0265f5d0928.Name: We Cannot Get Out
b69bdceb-a155-4aa6-b7e8-b0265f5d0928.Shadow: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control. X is the number of enemies engaged with you.
b69bdceb-a155-4aa6-b7e8-b0265f5d0928.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of exhausted characters he controls.

b6af7b48-e072-45e8-a745-4de2ac8ded8c.Name: Across the Wastes
b6af7b48-e072-45e8-a745-4de2ac8ded8c.Text:
While it is Day, heroes get +1 Ò.

Forced: When it becomes Night, raise each player's threat by 1.

b70846d1-3216-421a-9098-af2a4540b530.Name: Coldfell Giant
b70846d1-3216-421a-9098-af2a4540b530.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character has at least 1 damage token on it, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
b70846d1-3216-421a-9098-af2a4540b530.Text: Forced: After Coldfell Giant engages you, deal 1 damage to 3 different characters you control.

b73f14e3-f528-4a8f-bf3b-06936eeea9fd.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
b73f14e3-f528-4a8f-bf3b-06936eeea9fd.Name: Southern Spy
b73f14e3-f528-4a8f-bf3b-06936eeea9fd.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ú (-3 Ú instead if The One Ring is exhausted).
b73f14e3-f528-4a8f-bf3b-06936eeea9fd.Text: When Revealed: Either shuffle an out of play Ringwraith into the encounter deck, or Southern Spy makes an immediate attack against you.

b774e6b4-461c-46eb-9398-dcb2af4cfab5.Name: Marching Up the Road
b774e6b4-461c-46eb-9398-dcb2af4cfab5.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, place attacking enemy facedown under The Black Gate.
b774e6b4-461c-46eb-9398-dcb2af4cfab5.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either return an enemy engaged with him to the staging area, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Harad enemy and put it into play engaged with him.

b77620fa-89a8-4f09-8552-ba4204e472d2.Name: Calphon’s Divination
b77620fa-89a8-4f09-8552-ba4204e472d2.Text:
Sailing.
While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each Ship enemy gains Boarding 1.
When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

b793d1f1-012e-4e13-aad0-d91833f6f8c6.Name: Forage for Food
b793d1f1-012e-4e13-aad0-d91833f6f8c6.Text:
Forced: After 1 or more resources are spent from a hero’s resource pool, deal 1 damage to that hero.

Response: After this stage is defeated, heal 1 damage from each hero.

b79d8300-714b-4699-8a0c-48b12b7ac145.Name: Blinding Blizzard
b79d8300-714b-4699-8a0c-48b12b7ac145.Text:
While Blinding Blizzard is in play, heroes do not collect resources during the resource phase. 

When Revealed: Add Blinding Blizzard to the staging area. Progress that would be placed on the current quest or on Snow locations are instead placed on Blinding Blizzard. When the 5th progress is placed on Blinding Blizzard, discard it.

b79e8b2a-0ebe-4698-bc6d-43c19d44202d.Name: Freezing Blast
b79e8b2a-0ebe-4698-bc6d-43c19d44202d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damaged character the defending player controls.
b79e8b2a-0ebe-4698-bc6d-43c19d44202d.Text: When Revealed: Remove each damaged character from the quest.

b7b62c58-7d5d-483d-807e-f4d7e2869579.Name: Pretending to Sleep
b7b62c58-7d5d-483d-807e-f4d7e2869579.Text:
When Revealed: Put 1 progress token on Smaug the Golden. Then, spend X Í resources or advance to stage 4A. X is the number of progress tokens on Smaug the Golden.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 2 cards from his hand that match the revealed card's type.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0061.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0061.Name: The Hills of Emyn Muil
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0061.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

No more than 1 progress may be placed on each location in the staging area each round.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0063.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0063.Name: Tunneling Nameless Thing
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0063.Text:
Forced: After the players travel to a location, Tunneling Nameless Thing engages the first player.

If there is no active location, return Tunneling Nameless Thing to the staging area.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0064.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0064.Name: Orc Interceptor
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0064.Text:
Orc Interceptor gets +1 $ and +1 Û for each resource token on it.

Forced: After a location leaves play as an explored location, place a resource token on Orc Interceptor.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0065.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0065.Name: Brambles and Thorns
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0065.Text: Forced: After a character commits to the quest, deal 1 damage to that character if it has not been dealt damage by another copy of Brambles and Thorns this round.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0066.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0066.Name: Sarn Gebir Rapids
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0066.Text: While Sarn Gebir Rapids is the active location, the "when revealed" effects of Hazard cards cannot be canceled.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0067.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0067.Name: A Hurrying Darkness
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0067.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û. X is the $ of the active location.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0067.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either increase his threat by 5, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0068.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0068.Name: Blast of Savage Wind
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0068.Shadow: Shadow: Remove all progress from each Emyn Muil location in play.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0068.Text: When Revealed: Remove all progress from each Emyn Muil location in play. Each Eymn Muil location gets +2 $ until the end of the round.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0069.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0069.Name: Hazardous Terrain
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0069.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle all Hazard cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck. Then, deal another shadow card for this attack.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0069.Text: When Revealed: Shuffle all Hazard cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0070.Encounter Set: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0070.Name: Retraced Steps
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0070.Text: When Revealed: Discard a random Emyn Muil location from the victory display.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0071.Name: The Dead Marshes
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0071.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Players cannot reduce their threat.

Setup: Search the encounter deck for The Mere of Dead Faces, and add it to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

Forced: After Gollum is placed in the discard pile, shuffle him into the encounter deck.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0072.Name: The Mere of Dead Faces
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0072.Text:
X is the number of resource tokens here. Cannot leave the staging area.

If Gollum is not in play, any resource tokens that would be placed on Gollum are placed here instead.

Forced: After Gollum enters play, place 2 resource tokens on Gollum, then move all resource tokens from The Mere of Dead Faces to Gollum.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0073.Name: Stagnant Quagmire
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0073.Shadow: Shadow: Perform an escape test, dealing 1 card from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, discard defending character.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0073.Text:
While Stagnant Quagmire is in play, it adds its Escape value to all escape tests.

Escape: 2

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0074.Name: Things in the Pools
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0074.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if attacking enemy is Undead).
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0074.Text: Forced: After a character commits to an escape test, deal 1 damage to that character.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0075.Name: Marsh-wight
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0075.Text: Forced: After Marsh-wight engages a player, that player makes an escape test, dealing 3 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 2 resource tokens on Gollum and Marsh-wight make an immediate attack.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0076.Name: Lost Soul of Lórien
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0076.Text: Forced: After Lost Soul of Lórien is destroyed, attach it to a hero with 1 or more Ò, if able. (Counts as a condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero's Ò is reduced to 0.")

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0077.Name: Ill-fated Guard
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0077.Shadow: Shadow: Discard all attachments from each characater you control with 3 or more Ò.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0077.Text: While Ill-fated Guard is engaged with a player, that player cannot commit more than 1 character to each escape test.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0078.Name: Candles of Corpses
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0078.Text:
When Revealed: Each player makes an escape test, dealing 1 card from the encounter deck. Each player who fails this test must either discard a hero he controls from play or raise his threat by 5.

Escape: 5

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0079.Name: Swarming Mosquitoes
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0079.Text:
When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test counting Ú instead of Ò, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 1 resource token on Gollum and deal 1 damage to each character in play.

Escape: 3

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0080.Name: Devilry of the Dark Land
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0080.Text:
When Revealed: Return the top X Undead enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, where X is the number of players. If no enemies were returned to the staging area as a result of this effect, Devilry of the Dark Land gains surge.

Escape: 10

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0081.Name: Return to Mirkwood
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0081.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, the player who is guarding Gollum must either exhaust a hero he controls or resolve the "when revealed" effect of the topmost Tantrum card in the encounter discard pile.

Forced: When Stage 4A is revealed, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Attercop, Attercop and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0082.Name: Ambushing Orcs
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0082.Text: When Ambushing Orcs is dealt a shadow card that targets the player guarding Gollum, that shadow card also targets each other player.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0083.Name: Pursuing Warg-rider
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0083.Text: Forced: After the player guarding Gollum changes, Pursuing Warg-rider engages the player Guarding Gollum and makes an immediate attack against that player.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0084.Name: Web-spinner
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0084.Shadow: Shadow: the player guarding Gollum must exhaust a character he controls.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0084.Text: When Revealed: The player guarding Gollum must either exhaust a hero he controls, or Web-spinner gains surge.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0085.Name: Deceptive Path
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0085.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on Deceptive Path while it is in the staging area.

Forced: After Deceptive Path becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a location is discarded. Reveal that location and make it the active location. Then, discard Deceptive Path.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0086.Name: Web-wall
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0086.Shadow: Shadow: The player guarding Gollum must discard all resources from each of his heroes' resource pools.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0086.Text: When Revealed: Reveal the topmost Spider enemy in the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0087.Name: Isolation
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0087.Text: When Revealed: Attach Isolation to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "All characters lose the ranged and sentinel keywords. The player guarding Gollum cannot choose a new player to guard Gollum.")

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0088.Name: Befouled Equipment
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0088.Shadow: Shadow: Discard all attachments controlled by the player guarding Gollum.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0088.Text: When Revealed: Discard all attachments controlled by the player guarding Gollum. Then, remove all cards in that player's discard pile from the game. If no attachments are discarded as a result of this effect, Befouled Equipment gains surge.

b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0089.Name: Wickedness and Mischief
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0089.Shadow: Shadow: Deal the topmost Tantrum card in the encounter discard pile as a new shadow card for this attack, if able.
b7bd7ec2-fd79-4f9c-aba8-5bbb50cc0089.Text: When Revealed: The player guarding Gollum must either reveal the topmost Tantrum card in the encounter discard pile, or reveal 2 additional encounter cards from the encounter deck.

b7be2ad3-5ea1-4cc5-98dc-c7d3cf45cb71.Name: Encounter at Amon Dîn
b7be2ad3-5ea1-4cc5-98dc-c7d3cf45cb71.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Ghulat cannot take damage unless there are at least 15 progress tokens on Protect the Villagers.
Setup: Place 1 villager token on Rescued Villagers.
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, either discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers, or reveal an encounter card.

b7c19049-9587-48bc-8807-5cc7334399b9.Name: Angmar Awakened
b7c19049-9587-48bc-8807-5cc7334399b9.Text:
Reanimated Dead are Undead enemies with 2 $, 2 Û, 2 Ú and 2 hit points.

When Daechanar is defeated, advance to the next stage.

b7f8b82b-c448-4f43-a025-bf6b7e6f0310.Name: Harbor Master
b7f8b82b-c448-4f43-a025-bf6b7e6f0310.Text: Response: After a card effect adds any number of resources to the resource pool of a hero you control, Harbor Master gains +1 Ú until the end of the round.

b81a014a-af32-41a9-abdf-8dbebf29f685.Keywords:
Guarded. Safe.
Immune to player card effects.
b81a014a-af32-41a9-abdf-8dbebf29f685.Name: The Hoarwell
b81a014a-af32-41a9-abdf-8dbebf29f685.Text: Response: After you travel to The Hoarwell, heal 1 damage from each character in play.

b86ba0f8-11f9-4694-b421-17b683bd4325.Keywords: Play only if you control at least 1 Ent character.
b86ba0f8-11f9-4694-b421-17b683bd4325.Name: Ent Draught
b86ba0f8-11f9-4694-b421-17b683bd4325.Text: Attach to a character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 hit points.

b86c3959-86af-4ce4-927f-769b873e4774.Name: Follow Me!
b86c3959-86af-4ce4-927f-769b873e4774.Text: Action: Take control of the first player token and draw 1 card.

b86d305d-12ba-43bb-9356-fd424f63ace5.Name: Those Now Sundered
b86d305d-12ba-43bb-9356-fd424f63ace5.Text: When Revealed: Attach to Rescued Villagers. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the end of the round, discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers.")

b89a5a01-88c0-434a-a061-1654c6f84477.Name: Storehouse
b89a5a01-88c0-434a-a061-1654c6f84477.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if undefended.)

b89d39c4-1017-4707-95c3-d60f352d4e95.Keywords: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted.
b89d39c4-1017-4707-95c3-d60f352d4e95.Name: Snowmane
b89d39c4-1017-4707-95c3-d60f352d4e95.Text:
If attached hero is Theoden, Snowmane loses the restricted keyword.
Response: After the players quest successfully, ready attached hero.

b8caa465-cf1c-4be2-a32a-cab116ff0886.Name: Savage Fray
b8caa465-cf1c-4be2-a32a-cab116ff0886.Text: When Revealed:  If the current quest has a keyword, until the end of the round, switch that keyword to battle or siege, or siege to battle, if able.  If the current quest does not have a keyword, Savage Fray gains surge.

b8d832c5-e9f8-4690-a60c-07c09980ea27.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
b8d832c5-e9f8-4690-a60c-07c09980ea27.Name: Morgul Captain
b8d832c5-e9f8-4690-a60c-07c09980ea27.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
b8d832c5-e9f8-4690-a60c-07c09980ea27.Text: When Revealed: Put the topmost Orc enemy in the discard pile into play engaged with you.

b8f063e3-9278-4e55-a237-26bf3a79689c.Name: Vigilant Dunadan
b8f063e3-9278-4e55-a237-26bf3a79689c.Text: While there is a side quest in the victory display, Vigilant Dunadan does not exhaust to defend.

b8f5c0b1-a11e-41f5-b0bd-8dab7d537feb.Name: Keep Watch
b8f5c0b1-a11e-41f5-b0bd-8dab7d537feb.Text:
Limit 1 copy of Keep Watch in the victory display. 
While this side quest is in the victory display, each non-unique enemy engaged with a player gets -1 Û.

b91ba94d-e6b9-41f6-89ed-df1fb1f22335.Name: Defender of the Naith
b91ba94d-e6b9-41f6-89ed-df1fb1f22335.Text: Response: After a Silvan ally you control leaves play, ready Defender of the Naith.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0001.Name: The Hunt for Gollum
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0001.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, choose an unclaimed Clue card not attached to a Mordor enemy and attach it to a Mordor enemy, if able. (If it was guarded, detach the encounter guarding if first. The newly attached Mordor enemy is now guarding it.)

If at any point there are four or more Clue cards attached to Mordor enemies, the players lose the game.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0003.Name: The Enemy's Trail
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0003.Shadow: Shadow: Search the encounter discard pile for a Clue card and attach it to a Mordor enemy in play, if able.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0003.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter discard pile for a Clue card and attach it to a Mordor enemy in play, if able. If no card is attached by this effect, The Enemy's Trail gains surge.
