b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0004.Name: Restless Hunters
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0004.Shadow: Shadow: Damage from this attack must be applied to a hero you control with a Clue card attached, if able.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0004.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a Clue card attached to a hero and attaches it to a Mordor enemy in play, if able.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0005.Name: The Trail Goes Cold
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0005.Text:
When Revealed: Attach to the active location and remove all progress from that location. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per location. Attached location contributes its $ during the quest phase as if it were in the staging area.")

If The Trail Goes Cold does not attach to a location as a result of its effect, it gains surge.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0006.Name: Ravenous Hawk
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0006.Text: Forced: When a card effect instructs a player to "look" at cards in the encounter deck and Ravenous Hawk is among those cards, that player must put Ravenous Hawk into play engaged with him. (This does not satisfy the Forced effect of stage 1B or 2B).

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0007.Name: Hunting Warg
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0007.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, if Hunting Warg entered play this round, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Hunters from Morder and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0008.Name: Watched Path
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0008.Shadow: Shadow: If you do not control at least 1 Clue card, discard all cards from your hand.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0008.Text: Each player who does not control at least 1 Clue card cannot draw cards through card effects.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0009.Name: Hunter's Lookout
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0009.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Ú for each Clue card in play until the end of the round.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0009.Text: Each Mordor enemy with at least 1 Clue card attached gets +2 Ú.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0010.Name: Dark Pools
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0010.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on Dark Pools while it is in the staging area.

Forced: After Dark Pools becomes the active location, each player must discard an ally with the highest printed cost among the allies he controls.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0031.Name: A Journey to Rhosgobel
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0031.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.

Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Goblin Eagle-hunter and add it to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.

Forced: The first Creature enemy revealed during each quest phase gains surge.

Response: After an Athelas card is placed in the discard pile, you may shuffle it into the encounter deck.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0033.Name: Goblin Eagle-hunter
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0033.Shadow: Shadow: If Wilyador has 10 or less damage on him, deal 2 damage to Wilyador.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0033.Text:
Goblin Eagle-hunter gets +1 hit point per player.

Forced: At the end of the combat phase, deal 1 damage to Wilyador.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0034.Name: Shot from the Sky
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0034.Shadow: Shadow: Resolve the "when revealed" effect of Shot from the Sky.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0034.Text: When Revealed: Attach to an Eagle character. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per character. Attached character loses the Eagle trait, and takes 1 damage each time it readies.")

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0035.Name: Dark-wood Grove
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0035.Shadow: Shadow: If defending player controls at least 1 Athelas card, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0035.Text: Dark-wood Grove gets +1 $ and +1 quest point for each Athelas card in play.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0036.Name: Noxious Supplies
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0036.Text: When Revealed: Attach to Wilyador. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: When attached character is healed by a card effect other than Athelas, the amount of damage healed is reduced to 1. Then, discard Noxious Supplies.")

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0037.Name: Labyrinthine Woods
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0037.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player and makes an additional attack.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0037.Text: While Labyrinthine Woods is in the staging area, Creature enemies get +1 $ and +1 Û.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0038.Name: Pitch-dark Thicket
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0038.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy cannot be attacked by characters with the ranged keyword until the end of the phase.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0038.Text: While Pitch-dark Thicket is the active location, all characters lose the ranged keyword.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0039.Name: Treetop Bird-eater
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0039.Text:
While Treetop Bird-eater is engaged with a player, characters controlled by that player cannot be healed.

Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Treetop Bird-eater engages the player who controls Wilyador (regardless of threat).

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0041.Name: Conflict at the Carrock
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0041.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Stage 1A should read, "Remove 5 unique Troll cards" instead of 4.

Stage 2B should read, "When Revealed: Place Louis, Morris, Rupert and Stuart into the staging area."

Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed on the current quest this phase, place 1 progress on the current quest (bypassing the active location).

Response: After defeating a unique Troll enemy, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0043.Name: Grimbeorn's Folly
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0043.Text: When Rob & Bob have been defeated, the players have rescued Grimbeorn the Old from certain death, and have won the game.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0045.Name: Savage Hill-troll
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0045.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, defending character does not ready during the refresh phase this round.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0045.Text: While Savage Hill-troll is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gets +1 hit point.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0046.Name: Rob & Bob
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0046.Text: Forced: After Rob & Bob makes its first attack each round, if there are two or more players, it engages the next player and makes an additional attack (discard and deal a new shadow card for this attack).

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0047.Name: Louis
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0047.Text:
Forced: After Louis attacks, the defending player must raise his threat by 3.

While Louis is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gains, "Forced: After this enemy attacks, the defending player must raise his threat by 1."

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0048.Name: Morris
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0048.Text:
Immune to player events.

While Morris is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gets +1 Û and gains "Immune to player events."

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0049.Name: Rupert
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0049.Text:
Rupert's Ú cannot be reduced.

While Rupert is in the victory display, the Ú of each Troll enemy cannot be reduced.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0050.Name: Stuart
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0050.Text:
Cannot have player attachments.

While Stuart is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gets +1 Ú and gains "Cannot have player attachments."

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0051.Name: Time for Supper
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0051.Text: When Revealed: The first player chooses a hero in any player's discard pile and removes that hero from the game. Then, heal all damage from each Troll enemy in play. If no damage is removed from any Troll enemy as a result of this effect, Time for Supper gains surge.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0052.Name: Troll Lair
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0052.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, remove 4 damage tokens from it.
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0052.Text: While Troll Lair is in the staging area, players cannot reduce their threat.

b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0053.Name: Hives and Hives
b91cc63a-7fa3-46b4-b5b2-9da1663f0053.Text: Forced: After any amount of progress is placed on Hives and Hives, deal 1 damage to each character in play.

b9339072-5665-45c7-a2ca-a8c844c5762d.Keywords: You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.
b9339072-5665-45c7-a2ca-a8c844c5762d.Name: Reinforcements
b9339072-5665-45c7-a2ca-a8c844c5762d.Text: Action: The players, as a group, can put up to 2 allies into play from their hands. Each of these allies may enter play under any player's control. At the end of the phase, return each of those allies that are still in play to their owners' hands.

b94e993e-27a6-4ef4-b6f6-a7719928aceb.Name: Terrible Strength
b94e993e-27a6-4ef4-b6f6-a7719928aceb.Shadow: Shadow: For each excess point of combat damage dealt by this attack (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by this attack) you must damage another character you control. Exhaust all characters damaged by this effect.

b9acdd61-8007-41be-b986-e9809a587a70.Name: Into the Ettenmoors
b9acdd61-8007-41be-b986-e9809a587a70.Text:
You have escaped from the prisons of Mount Gram, but you are not safe yet.
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if there are no encounter side quests in play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side quest is discarded, reveal it, and add it to the staging area.

b9e3d591-5973-4f35-90b8-d74d0aeabcc7.Name: Legacy of Númenor
b9e3d591-5973-4f35-90b8-d74d0aeabcc7.Text: Action: Add 1 resource to each hero's resource pool.

ba2e4a33-edc6-4638-a3f5-b818b080aea8.Name: The One Ring
ba2e4a33-edc6-4638-a3f5-b818b080aea8.Text:
Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer. 
Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero. 

If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

ba6d53fd-277c-4796-814b-ada9ff23cafd.Name: Jubayr
ba6d53fd-277c-4796-814b-ada9ff23cafd.Text: Response: After Jubayr exhausts to defend an attack, discard 1 facedown shadow card from a non-unique enemy. (Limit once per phase.)

babeedb8-f7cd-4e8a-a5c4-fbfdd57238fb.Name: Croaking Crows
babeedb8-f7cd-4e8a-a5c4-fbfdd57238fb.Text:
Forced: When a location is revealed from the encounter deck, put 1 progress on Smaug the Golden.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 1 card from his hand that matches the revealed card's sphere and type.

bb102bb7-e667-444c-b036-a65015452060.Name: Rise To Power
bb102bb7-e667-444c-b036-a65015452060.Text:
Rise to Power contributes X $ to the staging area during the quest phase, where X is the number of resources on it.
Forced: At the end of the round, place 2 resources on Rise to Power.

bb1652ba-37e4-4a59-a7c7-39f398c0ab19.Name: Lost and Witless
bb1652ba-37e4-4a59-a7c7-39f398c0ab19.Text: When Revealed: Discard all progress from each location in the staging area. If there is a non-unique active location, randomly choose a location in the staging area and switch it with the active location.

bb38c7cf-8c76-4b87-b218-5516bc366470.Name: Ent of Fangorn
bb38c7cf-8c76-4b87-b218-5516bc366470.Text: While Ent of Fangorn is in the staging area, it gains: “Quest Action: Exhaust a hero you control to discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that hero’s Ò is greater than the discarded card’s $, place 1 resource here. Then, if there are 3 resources here, discard them to take control of Ent of Fangorn. Any player may trigger this effect.”

bb58f446-da73-47e3-98e8-70f69ee77d34.Name: Lost in the Swanfleet
bb58f446-da73-47e3-98e8-70f69ee77d34.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 3A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck.

Each player cannot ready more than 5 characters during the refresh phase.

bb5d1d76-663f-4261-94ec-7a9bfc025acf.Name: Dense Jungle
bb5d1d76-663f-4261-94ec-7a9bfc025acf.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a random card from your hand.
bb5d1d76-663f-4261-94ec-7a9bfc025acf.Text: Forced: When Dense Jungle is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a location, add that location to the staging area.

bb81a9e4-3458-4893-bb85-788ef3f02184.Name: Captain of Mordor
bb81a9e4-3458-4893-bb85-788ef3f02184.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, attacking enemy cannot take damage this round.

bb89cc13-3049-4001-bd85-916438c6d629.Keywords: Play Ambush into the staging area unattached. If unattached, attach Ambush to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
bb89cc13-3049-4001-bd85-916438c6d629.Name: Ambush
bb89cc13-3049-4001-bd85-916438c6d629.Text: Combat Action: The engaged player discards Ambush to declare an attack against the attached enemy.

bbbad333-b966-4826-b98d-1a9e8b6a1c45.Name: Murderous Turncoat
bbbad333-b966-4826-b98d-1a9e8b6a1c45.Text:
When Revealed: Murderous Turncoat makes an immediate attack against the first player.
Forced: At the end of the combat phase, place Murderous Turncoat facedown underneath the active location if you are not at stage 3.

bc041e0b-dd7f-4b82-8eb0-d155b1b08398.Name: Orc Hunting Party
bc041e0b-dd7f-4b82-8eb0-d155b1b08398.Text: When Revealed: Deal each Orc enemy in play a shadow card.  Each Orc enemy gets -15 engagement cost until the end of the round.  If there are no Orc enemies in the staging area, Orc Hunting Party gains surge.

bc43ae57-6010-4924-919c-b37d1e33b958.Name: The Last Bridge
bc43ae57-6010-4924-919c-b37d1e33b958.Text:
X is the number of players in the game.

Travel: The first player must reveal the top card of the burden deck and resolve that card as if it were just revealed from the encounter deck to travel here.

bc4f2e17-197c-4131-ad81-b892fe66ad88.Name: Old South Road
bc4f2e17-197c-4131-ad81-b892fe66ad88.Text: Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

bc629269-aa5b-4f5c-b071-c1413f85d24c.Name: Boar Spirit
bc629269-aa5b-4f5c-b071-c1413f85d24c.Text:
If Boar's Guardian is in play or in the victory display, each Boar enemy gets +1 Ù.
Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Boar Spirit engages the player who controls Key of the Boar or is engaged with Boar's Guardian, if able.

bc8020d9-4c85-4cf5-899f-3547d9d7efeb.Name: Cursed Halls
bc8020d9-4c85-4cf5-899f-3547d9d7efeb.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the phase, attacking enemy gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for each Reanimated Dead engaged with you.
bc8020d9-4c85-4cf5-899f-3547d9d7efeb.Text: While Cursed Halls is in the staging area, Sorcery attachments are immune to player card effects.

bcd69c86-8dd5-4c60-8f0f-5d19985ce913.Name: Orc of Thaurdir
bcd69c86-8dd5-4c60-8f0f-5d19985ce913.Shadow: Shadow: For each damage dealt by this attack discard the top card of your captured deck.
bcd69c86-8dd5-4c60-8f0f-5d19985ce913.Text: Forced: When Orc of Thaurdir attacks you, either discard the top 2 cards of your captured deck, or deal Orc of Thaurdir 2 additional shadow cards.

bcfbcf8a-9df0-4fd4-92a4-9cdd8c9def53.Name: Guardian of Rivendell
bcfbcf8a-9df0-4fd4-92a4-9cdd8c9def53.Text: As an additional cost to play Guardian of Rivendell from your hand, you must discard 2 cards from your hand.

bcfbd822-5a8d-4090-9c36-e721488be682.Name: Crashing Thunder
bcfbd822-5a8d-4090-9c36-e721488be682.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle each Weather card from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
bcfbd822-5a8d-4090-9c36-e721488be682.Text: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of quests in play. Exhaust each damaged character in play.

bd20ff6a-d77f-47d8-81dd-202e5f21cfaf.Name: Timely Aid
bd20ff6a-d77f-47d8-81dd-202e5f21cfaf.Text: Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put 1 revealed ally into play, if able. Shuffle all other revealed cards back into your deck.

bd30f509-04f8-4135-a5e9-20d3cbbe7cd8.Name: Darkened Stairway
bd30f509-04f8-4135-a5e9-20d3cbbe7cd8.Text: Forced: After Darkened Stairway is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is a location, add it to the staging area.

bd3686ef-e3d2-4dea-9fc3-aa039918f0b1.Name: Skyward Volley
bd3686ef-e3d2-4dea-9fc3-aa039918f0b1.Text:
As an additional cost to play Skyward Volley, exhaust a ranged character you control.
Combat Action: Deal 2 damage to an enemy engaged with a player. Resolve that effect again for each copy of Skyward Volley currently in your discard pile (you may choose different targets).

bd44e9b4-5226-4fb5-a300-dffc9b35f6d4.Name: Ugluk's Command
bd44e9b4-5226-4fb5-a300-dffc9b35f6d4.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the tens digit of the pursuit value.
bd44e9b4-5226-4fb5-a300-dffc9b35f6d4.Text: When Revealed: Either increase the pursuit value by 4, or Uglúk makes an immediate attack against you.

bd81ff6a-9c8f-415e-85fb-da84c21ef2a4.Name: Galadhrim Minstrel
bd81ff6a-9c8f-415e-85fb-da84c21ef2a4.Text: Response: After Galadhrim Minstrel enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event card and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

be2d2c3f-db7a-43bc-b0e8-43587dfce5c9.Name: Dark Pathway
be2d2c3f-db7a-43bc-b0e8-43587dfce5c9.Shadow: Either remove 1 time counter from the current quest or treat this attack as undefended.
be2d2c3f-db7a-43bc-b0e8-43587dfce5c9.Text: While Dark Pathway is the active location, the first treachery card without the printed surge keyword revealed during the quest phase gains surge.

be3ca12f-2550-48b4-9384-e71a1b401d4e.Name: Stop the War Party
be3ca12f-2550-48b4-9384-e71a1b401d4e.Text:
Enemies do not make engagement checks.

Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, raise each player's threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

If the players control Iarion and defeat this stage, they win the game.

be43a52a-370a-4481-bc84-8e004ecbfdca.Name: The Trial of Perseverance
be43a52a-370a-4481-bc84-8e004ecbfdca.Text:
Each Guardian enemy engages the first player. Guardian enemies cannot be damaged or leave play except by quest effect.

When the players control the current trial’s Key objective, add all Guardian enemies in play to the victory display and immediately advance to a stage 2A of the players’ choice. If all stage 2 quests have been defeated, advance to stage 3A, instead.

be6cf29d-bb8b-494a-9635-85ee9322a690.Name: Tangled Woods
be6cf29d-bb8b-494a-9635-85ee9322a690.Text: While Tangled Woods is in the staging area, each Forest location in play gains: 'Travel: Exhaust a hero to travel here'.  This ability does not stack with other copies of Tangled Woods.

be784402-7f83-43aa-9e77-c2aac8dd3526.Name: Fortress Walls
be784402-7f83-43aa-9e77-c2aac8dd3526.Shadow: Shadow: If your threat is 40 or higher, attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
be784402-7f83-43aa-9e77-c2aac8dd3526.Text: While Fortress Walls is the active location, for each resource spent by a player, raise that player’s threat by 1.

be9453b3-7576-4893-88d5-d62f0331411e.Name: Highlands of Dunland
be9453b3-7576-4893-88d5-d62f0331411e.Shadow: Either remove 1 time counter from a location in play, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
be9453b3-7576-4893-88d5-d62f0331411e.Text: Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, return each enemy in play to the staging area.

befbd3c9-45b3-4e68-b19e-5981a6571835.Name: Powerful Undertow
befbd3c9-45b3-4e68-b19e-5981a6571835.Text: When Revealed: You cannot flip the active location this round. If the active location is Underwater, resolve its Forced effect as if it is the end of the quest phase. If there is no Underwater active location, Powerful Undertow gains doomed 3, instead.

bf2cb5a8-2ec6-4366-89f6-7e3010686a85.Name: Balin
bf2cb5a8-2ec6-4366-89f6-7e3010686a85.Text: Response: Pay 1 resource from Balin's resource pool to cancel a shadow effect just triggered during an attack. Then, deal the attacking enemy another shadow card. (Limit once per attack.)

bf56e98f-1aa5-4e79-a116-d99bf2408e07.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
bf56e98f-1aa5-4e79-a116-d99bf2408e07.Name: Fire-filled Trench
bf56e98f-1aa5-4e79-a116-d99bf2408e07.Text: Forced: When a player plays an event that would cancel the effects of a treachery card just revealed from the encounter deck, cancel the effects of that event. Then, discard Fire-filled Trench.

bf925a7c-b427-4fb6-ba6b-dbc86304a69f.Name: Sift Through the Debris
bf925a7c-b427-4fb6-ba6b-dbc86304a69f.Text:
Action: Exhaust Amarthiúl or a hero to claim Heirloom of Iârchon. Then, attach Heirloom of Iârchon to that character.

Attached character gets +1 Ò.

bfa3b9da-d0e3-4ad6-8d1d-f32975f69551.Name: Uruk Lieutenant
bfa3b9da-d0e3-4ad6-8d1d-f32975f69551.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards an attachment he controls. (All attachments he controls instead if undefended.)
bfa3b9da-d0e3-4ad6-8d1d-f32975f69551.Text: When Revealed: Add the topmost Orc enemy from the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

bfd46195-4981-47f4-95c1-84f9ec2cadc2.Name: Shadow the War Party
bfd46195-4981-47f4-95c1-84f9ec2cadc2.Text:
You're close to the war party but you don't want to rush in. You quietly shadow the Orcs to determine how many there are before you attack.
Each copy of Orc War Party cannot be engaged, cannot be dealt damage, and gets +2 $.
When Revealed: Return each engaged Orc War Party to the staging area.

c00844d6-1c3c-4e8c-a46c-8de15b8408df.Name: Knights of the Swan
c00844d6-1c3c-4e8c-a46c-8de15b8408df.Text: Each Outlands character you control gets +1 Û.

c00bdeff-c186-4d83-bf24-2142fdd39b19.Name: Bofur
c00bdeff-c186-4d83-bf24-2142fdd39b19.Text: Quest Action: Spend 1 Ê resource to put Bofur into play from your hand, exhausted and committed to a quest. If you quest successfully this phase and Bofur is still in play, return him to your hand.

c03a693c-4fcf-4df5-868b-88e1df8531d9.Name: Shelob
c03a693c-4fcf-4df5-868b-88e1df8531d9.Text:
Shelob gets +1 $ for each resource on her.

Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, either place 1 resource on Shelob, or she makes an immediate attack against the first player.

c04f4018-e001-4a31-a003-9914e3f585ee.Keywords: Archery X. X is the number of players in the game.
c04f4018-e001-4a31-a003-9914e3f585ee.Name: Haradrim Archer
c04f4018-e001-4a31-a003-9914e3f585ee.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
c04f4018-e001-4a31-a003-9914e3f585ee.Text: Forced: After Haradrim Archer engages you, assign X damage among characters you control.

c057b0ef-eb85-4afc-9ca8-60a0cca92bcc.Name: Battle-Hardened
c057b0ef-eb85-4afc-9ca8-60a0cca92bcc.Shadow: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Raider, place 2 resources on it.
c057b0ef-eb85-4afc-9ca8-60a0cca92bcc.Text: When Revealed: Place 1 resource on each Raider enemy in play. Each engaged non-Ship enemy makes an immediate attack. If there are no engaged non-Ship enemies, Battle-Hardened gains surge.

c08310b6-5201-4c70-975e-61a2e7ff329b.Name: Poisoned Spear
c08310b6-5201-4c70-975e-61a2e7ff329b.Text: Response: After the players quest successfully, the engaged player discards the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card’s $ is equal to or greater than the attached enemy’s remaining hit points, add Poisoned Spear and attached enemy to the victory display.

c084e998-a5c8-4efd-a6ed-441f9f912c99.Name: Swift Raider
c084e998-a5c8-4efd-a6ed-441f9f912c99.Text: While Swift Raider is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a player commits 4 or more characters to a Sailing test or to the quest, Swift Raider engages that player.”

c0b9de2b-ada7-468b-9dc5-08bb28c07c3d.Name: Dreadful Deep
c0b9de2b-ada7-468b-9dc5-08bb28c07c3d.Shadow: Shadow: Make a locate test. If this test is failed, return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack and trigger all "Lost:" effects in play.
c0b9de2b-ada7-468b-9dc5-08bb28c07c3d.Text: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must choose and trigger a different "Lost:" effect in play.

c0d85826-dc42-4ac8-851c-4ed671917e9d.Name: Tangling and Grasping
c0d85826-dc42-4ac8-851c-4ed671917e9d.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
c0d85826-dc42-4ac8-851c-4ed671917e9d.Text: When Revealed: Each player must remove a character from the quest. If the active location is Underwater, deal 2 damage to each character removed from the quest by this effect.

c0fd82d5-1d87-4120-9b4b-37f81c1b2c9c.Name: Uglúk
c0fd82d5-1d87-4120-9b4b-37f81c1b2c9c.Text: Allies cannot be declared as attackers or defenders against Uglúk.

c101383e-807d-44b7-992d-a8299c4402a0.Name: Attercop
c101383e-807d-44b7-992d-a8299c4402a0.Text:
Attercop gets -1 engagement cost for each poison in play.
Poisoned characters cannot be declared as attackers or defenders against Attercop.

c10ac747-573f-46c7-a228-8b6d1cd8875a.Name: The Ring-bearer Sets Out
c10ac747-573f-46c7-a228-8b6d1cd8875a.Text:
During the quest phase, reveal 1 additional encounter card for each player in the game.
Response: After an enemy is revealed at this stage, raise your threat by X to engage that enemy. X is that enemy's $. Each player (at any stage) may trigger this ability once per round.

When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

c12057ee-64d0-419a-adb8-17632e3182b0.Name: Morgul Sorcerer
c12057ee-64d0-419a-adb8-17632e3182b0.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player must place 1 progress token on To the Tower or treat this attack as undefended.
c12057ee-64d0-419a-adb8-17632e3182b0.Text: Forced: After any number of progress tokens are placed on To the Tower, deal Morgul Sorcerer a shadow card.

c1273c2f-a616-45ee-804d-a16c28b6e63d.Name: Light Cruiser
c1273c2f-a616-45ee-804d-a16c28b6e63d.Text: Each Raider enemy revealed from the Corsair deck by Light Cruiser’s boarding keyword enters play with 1 resource on it.

c1554b49-597c-4d1b-8871-dfbe867253d5.Keywords: The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.
c1554b49-597c-4d1b-8871-dfbe867253d5.Name: Candle-bearer
c1554b49-597c-4d1b-8871-dfbe867253d5.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, attacking enemy cannot take damage.
c1554b49-597c-4d1b-8871-dfbe867253d5.Text: Forced: After Candle-bearer destroys a character, it cannot take damage until the end of the round.

c167ea82-42c5-4f08-a1ce-cfffdbf24af4.Name: Apostate of Angmar
c167ea82-42c5-4f08-a1ce-cfffdbf24af4.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is that card's printed $.
c167ea82-42c5-4f08-a1ce-cfffdbf24af4.Text: While you are engaged with Apostate of Angmar, you cannot attack Thaurdir.

c179ea26-838b-449c-b0a0-f2049e20b01f.Name: Village Hut
c179ea26-838b-449c-b0a0-f2049e20b01f.Text: Response: After the players travel to Village Hut, the first player discards the top card of his deck. If that card is an ally, he puts it into play under his control, exhausted.Travel: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, add it to the staging area.

c1b934af-a47f-4886-846f-c319b2efeca0.Name: Shelterless Land
c1b934af-a47f-4886-846f-c319b2efeca0.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damage on each active location.
c1b934af-a47f-4886-846f-c319b2efeca0.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each damage on each active location.

c1c21875-2650-4e7d-b8c7-c0c0970ce8b0.Name: Unseen Strike
c1c21875-2650-4e7d-b8c7-c0c0970ce8b0.Text: Action: Choose a character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 Û while attacking an enemy with a higher engagement cost than your threat.

c1db9a5b-1377-49b2-833f-4d8e95928b60.Name: Goblin Pursuer
c1db9a5b-1377-49b2-833f-4d8e95928b60.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if this attack is undefended).
c1db9a5b-1377-49b2-833f-4d8e95928b60.Text: Damaged characters cannot be declared as attackers or defenders against Golbin Pursuer.

c2181617-ad55-4bf7-a6f3-60979d112ce6.Keywords: Progress cannot be placed on Streets of Tharbad while it is in the staging area.
c2181617-ad55-4bf7-a6f3-60979d112ce6.Name: Streets of Tharbad
c2181617-ad55-4bf7-a6f3-60979d112ce6.Text: While Streets of Tharbad is the active location, enemeis get -20 engagement cost.

c23266f8-cd28-4e21-8983-1c6180531e18.Name: Bottomless Chasm
c23266f8-cd28-4e21-8983-1c6180531e18.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, the defending player discards all cards in his hand.
c23266f8-cd28-4e21-8983-1c6180531e18.Text: For each point of progress that is placed on Bottomless Chasm, the players must choose and discard 1 card from a player's hand, if able.

c266126d-cf2d-4a61-aac7-28bac2d1ea0d.Keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Treebeard enters play exhausted and collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Ent cards played from your hand.
c266126d-cf2d-4a61-aac7-28bac2d1ea0d.Name: Treebeard
c266126d-cf2d-4a61-aac7-28bac2d1ea0d.Text: Action: Pay 2 resources from Treebeard's pool to ready an Ent character.

c29c98de-5660-498c-a5cc-a1800985d221.Name: Midnight Throng
c29c98de-5660-498c-a5cc-a1800985d221.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (Dusk. +2 Û instead. Midnight. +3 Û instead)
c29c98de-5660-498c-a5cc-a1800985d221.Text:
When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

Midnight. This effect cannot be canceled.

c2a753b8-dfb3-4bdf-a0b4-523323c52f43.Name: Drû-buri-Drû
c2a753b8-dfb3-4bdf-a0b4-523323c52f43.Text:
Drû-buri-Drû cannot take more than 1 damage each round.
While Dru-buri-Dru is in play, other Wose enemies gets +1 Û and +1 Ú.
Unless Drû-buri-Drû is in the victory display, the players cannot win.

c2a79823-e4f9-4449-b467-5916d7e58979.Name: Straight Shot
c2a79823-e4f9-4449-b467-5916d7e58979.Text: Action: Exhaust a Weapon attachment to choose a non-unique enemy with 0 Ú. Discard the chosen enemy.

c2c8d69a-6639-49af-89ed-86f2ffc8c096.Name: Ered Luin Miner
c2c8d69a-6639-49af-89ed-86f2ffc8c096.Text: Response: After Ered Luin Miner is discarded from the top of your deck, put it into play under your control.

c319315a-e506-45a2-8ec0-c98e4bd9bad5.Name: Ancient Forest
c319315a-e506-45a2-8ec0-c98e4bd9bad5.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player exhausts a character he controls.
c319315a-e506-45a2-8ec0-c98e4bd9bad5.Text: While Ancient Forest is in the staging area, each Forest location in the staging area gets +1 $ and +3 quest points.  This ability does not stack with other copies of Ancient Forest.

c34384a8-44de-4c55-8d49-ec68a69fc3f0.Name: Munuv Dûv Ravine
c34384a8-44de-4c55-8d49-ec68a69fc3f0.Text: Dunland enemies get +1 Û and +1 Ú.

c354e410-e15a-4999-bb14-696b5e89cee9.Name: Captain Sahír
c354e410-e15a-4999-bb14-696b5e89cee9.Text: Captain Sahír engages the first player.For each point of damage Captain Sahír would take, discard 1 resource from him and cancel that damage.For every 5 resources on Captain Sahír, he makes an additional attack against the engaged player each combat phase.

c35f2635-fa68-44be-9ce9-80446831f0e0.Name: Ghostly Ruins
c35f2635-fa68-44be-9ce9-80446831f0e0.Text:
Any time the encounter deck runs out of cards, return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area before resetting the encounter deck.

Travel: Return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

c3907d39-6fd7-4b33-8fe2-215fd9f90be2.Name: Heart of Fangorn
c3907d39-6fd7-4b33-8fe2-215fd9f90be2.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
c3907d39-6fd7-4b33-8fe2-215fd9f90be2.Text: While Heart of Fangorn is in the staging area, each player cannot refresh more than 5 characters during the refresh phase

c3b3a3e0-1575-4094-a6b3-853b569f8046.Name: Glowing Fissure
c3b3a3e0-1575-4094-a6b3-853b569f8046.Text:
X is 1 more than the number of damaged characters.
Forced: After a player commits characters to the quest, he deals 1 damage to a character he controls.

c3c34a86-6089-4a3f-b1b6-f81d8cbc2caa.Name: Outlying Homestead
c3c34a86-6089-4a3f-b1b6-f81d8cbc2caa.Text:
While Outlying Homestead is in the staging area, players cannot reduce their threat. 

Travel: Reveal a card from the encounter deck.

c3e07d8f-3af3-4f21-8951-d3300ca376fa.Name: The Power of Angmar
c3e07d8f-3af3-4f21-8951-d3300ca376fa.Text:
Cards in each player’s discard pile cannot leave that player’s discard pile by player card effect.

Forced: After this stage is defeated, each player shuffl es the top 5 cards of his discard pile back into his deck.

c3f9965f-711d-4c51-b9aa-a0b5d5953b49.Name: The Crossroad’s Fort
c3f9965f-711d-4c51-b9aa-a0b5d5953b49.Text:
If a Harad objective is not attached, the first player claims it and attaches it to a hero he controls.

This stage cannot be defeated unless each Harad objective in play is attached to a hero.

c4218a3e-6a6b-47a0-88c5-cdbcda3fb5eb.Name: A Knife in the Back
c4218a3e-6a6b-47a0-88c5-cdbcda3fb5eb.Text: When Revealed: Randomly select 1 ally controlled by the first player, if able. The first player deals X damage to one of his heroes, where X is that ally's Û. Then discard that ally. If no ally is discarded by this effect, A Knife in the Back gains surge.

c444788b-73ea-4729-a07a-593220479639.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
c444788b-73ea-4729-a07a-593220479639.Name: The Passing of the Grey Company
c444788b-73ea-4729-a07a-593220479639.Text: Resolution: Add each copy of Overcome by Fear attached to a player's threat dial to the campaign pool and record the name of each player it was attached to. If Army of the Dead is in the victory display, add the Army of the Dead boon to the campaign pool. The players have earned each card added to the campaign pool.
c444788b-73ea-4729-a07a-593220479639.Traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 13

c459cbdb-9831-4803-91b0-e791e349ace8.Name: Sauron’s Enforcers
c459cbdb-9831-4803-91b0-e791e349ace8.Text: X is the sequence number on the main quest.Forced: At the end of the round, assign X damage among characters in play.

c45dc401-bb07-42ec-ba4c-ee9105a3f349.Name: Stormcaller
c45dc401-bb07-42ec-ba4c-ee9105a3f349.Text: Boarding 1. Cannot have attachments.Forced: At the end of the round, if the Stormcaller is engaged with a player, either return it to the staging area or shift your heading off-course.

c460b9c0-0239-4a74-99cb-3c302429db44.Name: Telemnar's Bane
c460b9c0-0239-4a74-99cb-3c302429db44.Text:
Forced: When Telemnar's Bane attacks, discard the top 3 cards of each player's deck.

Forced: After a player plays an event card, Telemnar's Bane makes an immediate attack against the first player.

c46688bb-24ac-4ee9-a23e-2bd481e8e56c.Name: Cobas Haven
c46688bb-24ac-4ee9-a23e-2bd481e8e56c.Shadow: Shadow: If you are off-course, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.
c46688bb-24ac-4ee9-a23e-2bd481e8e56c.Text: While Cobas Haven is the active location, reduce the Boarding X value on each Ship enemy by 1.

c46c37c3-b2e7-4e28-9466-e3a371417c8b.Name: Retake the City
c46c37c3-b2e7-4e28-9466-e3a371417c8b.Text:
Forced: When an Osgiliath location leaves play as an explored location, the first player takes control of that location.

If the players control all Osgiliath locations in play at the end of the round, they have won the game.

c48b1c7f-f3df-4e5c-ad63-a68efc66c02c.Name: Doom Hangs Still
c48b1c7f-f3df-4e5c-ad63-a68efc66c02c.Text:
Planning Action: Until the end of the round, players do not raise their threat from questing unsuccessfully.

Valour Planning Action: Skip the quest phase this round.

c4993a31-1e07-469c-a3cb-13e90e44253f.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
c4993a31-1e07-469c-a3cb-13e90e44253f.Name: Corsair Pillager

c49ec585-e306-4fda-a55b-497cb0fd1174.Name: Sea-Scorpion
c49ec585-e306-4fda-a55b-497cb0fd1174.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking Enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the active location is Underwater).
c49ec585-e306-4fda-a55b-497cb0fd1174.Text: Sea-Scorpion gets +2 Û if the active location is Underwater.

c4b959f5-92a9-4f46-8656-f9da08a5cb86.Name: Bifur
c4b959f5-92a9-4f46-8656-f9da08a5cb86.Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, Bifur gains: "Response: After you play Bifur from your hand, draw 2 cards."

c4efe804-2832-42f1-bebf-45d3072cc70f.Name: Unspeakable Thing
c4efe804-2832-42f1-bebf-45d3072cc70f.Text:
Forced: When Unspeakable Thing enages a player or attacks a player, attach the top card of that player's deck to it. 

X is the printed cost of all attached cards on this card. If there are no cards attached, X is 5.

c5215a42-f064-46cc-a9a2-75ef4d57fcd2.Name: No Way Out
c5215a42-f064-46cc-a9a2-75ef4d57fcd2.Text:
Time X. X is 5 times the number of players in the game. 
  
  If a hero is destroyed at this stage, the players lose the game.  
  
Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, the players make engagement checks. Then, each engaged enemy makes an attack. If no heroes are destroyed by these attacks, the players win the game.

c52272ad-0a46-4867-9873-e7ed1ffee0dd.Name: Rocky Foothills
c52272ad-0a46-4867-9873-e7ed1ffee0dd.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damage on the defending character.
c52272ad-0a46-4867-9873-e7ed1ffee0dd.Text:
When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to Rocky Foothills, if able.
Rocky Foothills gets +2 quest points for each quest in play.

c52c00b2-ab39-4ffa-898d-ab9c8246bd00.Name: Curious Brandybuck
c52c00b2-ab39-4ffa-898d-ab9c8246bd00.Text:
Forced: When the active location is explored, place Curious Brandybuck on the bottom of its owner’s deck.

Response: After you travel to a location, put Curious Brandybuck into play from your hand, under any player’s control.

c541b65a-d6d4-4b2c-8925-96c31d52aa1c.Name: Celduin Traveler
c541b65a-d6d4-4b2c-8925-96c31d52aa1c.Text: Response: After Celduin Traveler enters play, look at the top card of the encounter deck. If it is a location, you may discard it.

c5657436-d6c8-400d-ba1f-a723799ac685.Name: The Witch-king
c5657436-d6c8-400d-ba1f-a723799ac685.Text:
The Witch-king gets -30 engagement cost while The One Ring is exhausted.

Characters with 1 Ò or less cannot defend attacks made by The Witch-king.

c5711d74-8adb-427a-b0fe-e7a8c373659b.Name: Inner Sanctum
c5711d74-8adb-427a-b0fe-e7a8c373659b.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on Inner Sanctum while it is in the staging area.
Travel: Discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Resolve the 'when revealed' effects of each Sorcery card discarded by this effect.

c57661b7-62f9-4906-b2eb-73af91fd8252.Name: Vale of Shadows
c57661b7-62f9-4906-b2eb-73af91fd8252.Text:
When Revealed: Make Vale of Shadows the active location. If another location is currently active, return it to the staging area.

Dusk. Vale of Shadows gets +2 quest points.

Midnight. Vale of Shadows gets +4 quest points.

c5d1793e-a4e2-4a40-97e9-e5e6f8b1cdfb.Name: Celebrimbor's Mould
c5d1793e-a4e2-4a40-97e9-e5e6f8b1cdfb.Text:
If Celebrimbor’s Mould is free of encounters, the first player claims it and attaches it to a hero he controls.

If the attached hero leaves play, the players lose the game.

c5d9d3c6-9321-4909-918d-2b81d7aa296d.Name: Saruman's Orders
c5d9d3c6-9321-4909-918d-2b81d7aa296d.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
c5d9d3c6-9321-4909-918d-2b81d7aa296d.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either return an enemy engaged with him to the staging area, or reveal an encounter card.

c5e24012-cbaf-40aa-b4af-28d3464e72a7.Name: Tangled Forest
c5e24012-cbaf-40aa-b4af-28d3464e72a7.Text: While Tangled Forest is in the staging area, it gains: 'Forced: After any amount of progress is removed from the current quest, assign X damage amoung characters in play. X is the number of progress just removed. This ability does not stack with other copies of Tangled Forest.'

c5f58852-7f2a-4828-bd59-0b20c3059c40.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
c5f58852-7f2a-4828-bd59-0b20c3059c40.Name: Stronghold Tower
c5f58852-7f2a-4828-bd59-0b20c3059c40.Text:
While Stronghold Tower is in the staging area, shadow effects cannot be canceled.
Travel: Each player must deal 2 damage to a character he controls to travel here.

c60642b2-4ce3-42e8-8cb5-41c9ac9251fb.Name: Strange Woods
c60642b2-4ce3-42e8-8cb5-41c9ac9251fb.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player's threat by 2.
c60642b2-4ce3-42e8-8cb5-41c9ac9251fb.Text: While Strange Woods is in the staging area, characters cannot be healed.

c616d30d-9242-401b-b386-4fe0660dc97b.Name: Hollow Circle
c616d30d-9242-401b-b386-4fe0660dc97b.Text: Travel: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Wight enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

c6204e5d-7020-4360-b2ad-7db4edcc7303.Keywords: Add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each resource token here.
c6204e5d-7020-4360-b2ad-7db4edcc7303.Name: The Defense of Helm's Deep
c6204e5d-7020-4360-b2ad-7db4edcc7303.Text:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, place 1 resource token here. 

If there are 8 resource tokens here, add The Defense of Helm’s Deep to the victory display and advance to stage 5A.

c6582860-80cf-48d6-92f3-dde5e3e31333.Name: Goblin Prowler
c6582860-80cf-48d6-92f3-dde5e3e31333.Text:
Goblin Prowler gets -30 engagement cost if The Great Goblin is in the victory display.

Forced: When Goblin Prowler engages you, discard a character you control.

c66638a7-95ae-4913-bf11-2e8dcf8d6104.Name: Dwalin
c66638a7-95ae-4913-bf11-2e8dcf8d6104.Text: While you control at least 5 Dwarf characters, lower the cost to play Dwalin by 2.

c69c1fe9-076a-4a5b-8388-9f653015d84d.Keywords: Aflame 5. Burning Piers gets +1 $ for each damage on it.
c69c1fe9-076a-4a5b-8388-9f653015d84d.Name: Burning Piers
c69c1fe9-076a-4a5b-8388-9f653015d84d.Shadow: Shadow: Add Burning Piers to the staging area.
c69c1fe9-076a-4a5b-8388-9f653015d84d.Text: Forced: When Burning Piers is placed underneath The Havens Burn, deal 3 damage to The Dream‑chaser.

c6adadf8-569a-4943-817b-44bf1418e07e.Name: Snaga
c6adadf8-569a-4943-817b-44bf1418e07e.Text: When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand. Snaga gets +X $ until the end of the round, where X is the discarded card’s cost.

c6ae1840-dd7d-46ea-baf8-6d30614506de.Name: Forlong
c6ae1840-dd7d-46ea-baf8-6d30614506de.Text: While you control Outlands allies that belong to 4 different spheres, ready Forlong at the beginning of each phase.

c6b1e2eb-9ce9-419c-a210-723f3891720d.Name: Beats and Echoes
c6b1e2eb-9ce9-419c-a210-723f3891720d.Text: When Revealed: Reveal the top X cards of the encounter deck, adding all enemies to the staging area. Discard the other revealed cards without resolving them. X is 2 plus the number of players not engaged with a Goblin enemy.

c6df7ee6-41e2-4b24-91d6-f4f9f1bd7d94.Name: The Wizard's Voice
c6df7ee6-41e2-4b24-91d6-f4f9f1bd7d94.Text: Action: Each player chooses 1 enemy engaged with him. Until the end of the phase, each chosen enemy cannot attack the player that chose it.

c6ed1453-51ad-4daf-a1da-d59c78758c3a.Name: Dúnedain of Annúminas
c6ed1453-51ad-4daf-a1da-d59c78758c3a.Shadow: Shadow: Ready the defending character and give it +2 Ú for this attack.
c6ed1453-51ad-4daf-a1da-d59c78758c3a.Text: When Revealed: Any player may spend 1 resource to take control of Dúnedain of Annúminas. Otherwise, discard it.

c71fa40c-524e-43ec-b058-7ea239fdfd1d.Name: The Wizard's Prize
c71fa40c-524e-43ec-b058-7ea239fdfd1d.Text:
Time 3.  Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, return Mugash to the staging area and reveal X encounter cards.  X is the number of players in the game minus 1.  Place 3 time counters on this stage.

Progress cannot be placed on this stage unless Mugash is attached to a hero.

If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

c73317e6-133e-4e35-af48-ad3ffc9f252d.Name: Thaurdir
c73317e6-133e-4e35-af48-ad3ffc9f252d.Text:
Each other enemy has -10 engagement cost.
Forced: After Thaurdir is flipped or a treachery card with the Sorcery trait is revealed, Thaurdir heals 3 damage and makes an immediate attack against the first player.

c749f16f-1b34-48ce-ba8e-45f36b8b8229.Name: Dunland Tribesman
c749f16f-1b34-48ce-ba8e-45f36b8b8229.Text:
When Revealed: Each player draws a card.

Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, Dunland Tribesman gets +1 $ until the end of the round.

c75056aa-907b-40b8-a54a-18ea07b33dc3.Name: Mirkwood Pioneer
c75056aa-907b-40b8-a54a-18ea07b33dc3.Text: You may give Mirkwood Pioneer doomed 1 when you play it from your hand. If you do, it gains: "Response: After you play Mirkwood Pioneer, choose a card in the staging area. Until the end of the round, the chosen card does not contribute its $.

c759124f-3bf2-4820-a1af-285c740c4a5b.Keywords: Play only if you control the Ring-bearer.
c759124f-3bf2-4820-a1af-285c740c4a5b.Name: Brace of Conies
c759124f-3bf2-4820-a1af-285c740c4a5b.Text: Planning Action: Add Brace of Conies to the victory display to (choose 2): heal up to 2 damage from a hero, add 2 resources to a hero’s pool, choose a player to draw 2 cards, or reduce a player's threat by 2.

c75d2227-2fa6-4dba-a48a-64938b632efd.Name: Troll-fells
c75d2227-2fa6-4dba-a48a-64938b632efd.Text:
While Troll-fells is the active location, Weather cards gain doomed 1.

When Revealed: If Troll-fells is not revealed guarding a safe location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a location with the safe keyword and attach it to Troll-fells, guarded. Shuffle the encounter deck.

c760eeaf-d923-4d98-af5c-eb7cb2d2f4d9.Name: Lost in the Swanfleet
c760eeaf-d923-4d98-af5c-eb7cb2d2f4d9.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 3A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck.

Each enemy in the staging area gets –20 engagement cost.

c7777cad-8e18-49b3-bff7-290a241dd84c.Name: Road to Rivendell
c7777cad-8e18-49b3-bff7-290a241dd84c.Text:
You are playing in Nightmare mode.

Forced: When an enemy with the ambush keyword engages a player during the quest phase, it contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area until the end of the phase.

c792fec6-5840-4aba-8dcd-36b1632d58fa.Keywords: Aflame 12. Immune to player card effects.
c792fec6-5840-4aba-8dcd-36b1632d58fa.Name: Dream-chaser
c792fec6-5840-4aba-8dcd-36b1632d58fa.Text:
The players cannot travel to The Dream-chaser.
When The Dream-chaser is placed underneath The Havens Burn, the players lose the game.

c79ff551-f816-4106-9c55-e22d175e544c.Name: The Coast of Umbar
c79ff551-f816-4106-9c55-e22d175e544c.Text: Sailing.Progress cannot be placed on The Coast of Umbar if the players are off-course (󲂒, 󲂓, or 󲂔).If the Stormcaller is destroyed (or if this stage has 15 or more progress on it), advance to stage 2.

c7ada690-5aa3-4855-b2c1-35e30336edac.Keywords: Poisoned Counsels functions like a player card.
c7ada690-5aa3-4855-b2c1-35e30336edac.Name: Poisoned Counsels
c7ada690-5aa3-4855-b2c1-35e30336edac.Text: Forced: After you draw this card, discard all other cards in your hand.

c7bb88f6-a6b7-44f3-8bc2-8c4be788e7da.Keywords: While Lush Jungle is in the staging area, characters get –1 Û and lose ranged.
c7bb88f6-a6b7-44f3-8bc2-8c4be788e7da.Name: Lost Island
c7bb88f6-a6b7-44f3-8bc2-8c4be788e7da.Text: Forced: After Lush Jungle is flipped over while active, return it to the staging area unless each player exhausts each ready hero he controls.

c7bcb6fc-dde8-4df0-bd0e-3791b0fef4d0.Name: The Weather Turns Foul
c7bcb6fc-dde8-4df0-bd0e-3791b0fef4d0.Text:
If the players are off-course (Cloudy, Rainy, or Stormy), the Stormcaller gets +2 $.
No more than 8 damage may be placed on the Stormcaller each round. 
Forced: At the end of the round, discard the top card of the encounter deck. the Stormcaller places progress on this stage equal to its $ plus the $ of the discarded card.

c7c503b9-a804-4e37-8554-927d0095e7b1.Name: Old Toby
c7c503b9-a804-4e37-8554-927d0095e7b1.Text: Action: Draw 1 card for each Pipe you control. Heal 1 damage from each hero with a Pipe attachment.

c7c7761f-a4dd-4f09-ac10-f0483d0c931d.Name: Flaming Sword
c7c7761f-a4dd-4f09-ac10-f0483d0c931d.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is the Balrog, attach Flaming Sword to it.
c7c7761f-a4dd-4f09-ac10-f0483d0c931d.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the Balrog (even if out of play) as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Attached enemy gets +1 Û and gains Regenerate 4. (At the end of the refresh phase, remove 4 damage from the attached enemy.)"

c7e3bde9-8348-41d6-8272-aa733f60a108.Name: Escape from Fangorn
c7e3bde9-8348-41d6-8272-aa733f60a108.Text:
Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, shuffle Mugash into the encounter deck and advance to stage 3A.

The players cannot defeat this stage unless Mugash is attached to a hero.

If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

c7ef7b6e-4346-4b4c-a9fa-2b42e3c2ab5c.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
c7ef7b6e-4346-4b4c-a9fa-2b42e3c2ab5c.Name: The Passing of the Grey Company
c7ef7b6e-4346-4b4c-a9fa-2b42e3c2ab5c.Text: Phantom: During the "determine combat damage" step of an attack made by an enemy with Phantom, if any damage would be dealt by the attack, it is cancelled and the defending player raises his threat by an equal amount instead.

c7f5eac0-dbda-419f-994c-c182775682b3.Keywords: Attach to a Warrior hero or Gandalf. Restricted.
c7f5eac0-dbda-419f-994c-c182775682b3.Name: Glamdring
c7f5eac0-dbda-419f-994c-c182775682b3.Text:
Attached hero gets +2 Û.
Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

c828d0d2-0d82-49c2-b18d-7a819ee103b2.Name: Crippling Weariness
c828d0d2-0d82-49c2-b18d-7a819ee103b2.Shadow: Until the end of the round, defending character cannot ready.
c828d0d2-0d82-49c2-b18d-7a819ee103b2.Text: When Revealed: Each player exhausts a character he controls. Until the end of the round, characters cannot be readied by player card effects.

c857d5a3-2b1f-4ef9-a5c7-2368ec28d15c.Name: Hunting the Ring
c857d5a3-2b1f-4ef9-a5c7-2368ec28d15c.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: At the end of the round, each player at this stage raises his threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area. Then, discard Hunting the Ring and move each enemy in this staging area to the first player's staging area.")

c86cc6c9-8c50-4069-aa85-4d1cc11f796d.Keywords:
Attach to a Gondor or Hobbit hero.
Restricted.
c86cc6c9-8c50-4069-aa85-4d1cc11f796d.Name: Staff of Lebethron
c86cc6c9-8c50-4069-aa85-4d1cc11f796d.Text: Response: After attached hero exhausts to defend an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, exhaust Staff of Lebethron to discard a shadow card from that enemy.

c898c9f0-d4a7-4821-b075-1e412cde86a7.Name: Scavenge for Supplies
c898c9f0-d4a7-4821-b075-1e412cde86a7.Text:
The cost to play each player card is increased by 1.

Forced: When this stage is defeated, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Troll enemy and put it into play engaged with the player with the highest threat. Each player may play a card from his hand, at no cost.

c8a7cd39-10e0-4d50-a75b-e8a7ac24e32f.Name: Raven Spirit
c8a7cd39-10e0-4d50-a75b-e8a7ac24e32f.Text:
If Raven's Guardian is in play or in the victory display, each Raven enemy gets +1 $.
Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Raven Spirit engages the player who controls Key of the Raven or is engaged with Raven's Guardian, if able.

c8b5dd1c-82bc-4733-be1a-484a6e87c3c0.Name: Anborn
c8b5dd1c-82bc-4733-be1a-484a6e87c3c0.Text: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area, exhaust Anborn to give that enemy +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

c8decb35-cb3e-4dc9-ad15-d0cc80c157cb.Name: Deeper into the Ruins
c8decb35-cb3e-4dc9-ad15-d0cc80c157cb.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, add X $ to the total $ in the staging area. X is the total $ of all locations to the left of the active location (in its row). If X is 0, Deeper into the Ruins gains Doomed 1.

c9139d8c-0d9d-4d34-bfb5-8d40ca455bfc.Keywords: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel. Ranged.
c9139d8c-0d9d-4d34-bfb5-8d40ca455bfc.Name: Silver Wing
c9139d8c-0d9d-4d34-bfb5-8d40ca455bfc.Text:
Reduce your starting threat by 3.
Each hero you control gets +1 Û.
If the Silver Wing is destroyed, its controller is eliminated from the game.

c91a6d23-7dea-4efd-9f2b-326b74f9a935.Name: Uruk-hai Archer
c91a6d23-7dea-4efd-9f2b-326b74f9a935.Text:
X is the number of players at this stage.

When Revealed: Discard an ally you control.

c9575426-59ea-4863-bf6a-407e9eae3f33.Name: The One Ring
c9575426-59ea-4863-bf6a-407e9eae3f33.Text:
Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer.

Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of the attached hero.

If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

c95b4c6a-3dd0-4f11-8620-df7af65c11bc.Name: Undersea Grotto
c95b4c6a-3dd0-4f11-8620-df7af65c11bc.Text:
While Twisting Hollow is the active location, characters cannot ready from card effects.

Forced: If Twisting Hollow is the active location at the end of the quest phase, each player must discard 1 character. Then, you may flip Twisting Hollow to its Grotto side.

c9604830-bb2f-4016-b914-7c41248513b5.Name: Invading Orc
c9604830-bb2f-4016-b914-7c41248513b5.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return a location you control to the staging area.
c9604830-bb2f-4016-b914-7c41248513b5.Text: Forced: After Invading Orc attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller returns a location he controls to the staging area.

c9b1ad84-a3ea-4ab5-9db1-4addb4ae383d.Name: Roofless Tower
c9b1ad84-a3ea-4ab5-9db1-4addb4ae383d.Text: While Roofless Tower is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: When a player plays an event, either remove 1 progress from the main quest, or cancel the effects of that event.” Travel: Exhaust a hero to travel here.

c9bd8efc-b0df-4ab9-aeb2-07796818ff7d.Name: Hunted in Harad
c9bd8efc-b0df-4ab9-aeb2-07796818ff7d.Text:
Uruk Chieftain cannot take damage.
Reveal an additional encounter card during the quest phase if Uruk Chieftain is at stage 2D.
Forced: After characters are committed to quest, no more than 5 progress can be placed here this round (10 progress instead if each Tamed Mumak in play is committed to the quest).

c9c2b094-c895-4714-bb2e-c6558c82a153.Name: The Last Stage
c9c2b094-c895-4714-bb2e-c6558c82a153.Text:
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, each engaged enemy makes an attack. Place 2 time counters on this stage.

At the end of the round, if Raven Chief is in the victory display, the players win the game.

c9cdf75b-7535-4d17-804f-0f22569812c7.Keywords: Attach to a player's threat dial. Limit 1 per player.
c9cdf75b-7535-4d17-804f-0f22569812c7.Name: Favor of the Valar
c9cdf75b-7535-4d17-804f-0f22569812c7.Text: Forced: When you would be eliminated by reaching your threat elimination level, instead discard Favor of the Valar and reduce your threat to 5 lower than your threat elimination level. You are not eliminated.

c9e280a4-06b8-48bb-918d-da247e15157c.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
c9e280a4-06b8-48bb-918d-da247e15157c.Name: Besieged Courtyard
c9e280a4-06b8-48bb-918d-da247e15157c.Shadow: Shadow: Choose one: either attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one, or deal 10 damage to a Battleground location.
c9e280a4-06b8-48bb-918d-da247e15157c.Text: If Beseiged Courtyard has 5 or more damage, discard it and exhaust each ready character.

c9f0d8a8-fd7d-40d9-b040-deb48b6325b9.Name: Raise the Levee
c9f0d8a8-fd7d-40d9-b040-deb48b6325b9.Text:
You race along the shores of Lake Nenuial to gather the Dúnedain inside the walls. "To arms!" you shout. "Everyone into the city! Angmar approaches!"

Forced: at the beginning of the round (before the resource phase), place 1 resource here. Then, if there are 4 resources here, advance to stage 2.

Response: At the end of the round, remove 10 progress from this stage. Then, the first player at each stage takes control of a set aside Dúnedain of Annúminas.

ca18c3fa-ebda-4cf9-99bb-2ce47c9160a1.Keywords: While Tree-crowned Hill is the active location, each enemy gets -1 $.
ca18c3fa-ebda-4cf9-99bb-2ce47c9160a1.Name: Tree-crowned Hill
ca18c3fa-ebda-4cf9-99bb-2ce47c9160a1.Text: Forced: When Tree-crowned Hill is explored, the players, as a group, exhaust X characters in play. X is the number of damage here.

ca24cab1-1489-4c4d-8cea-50d076c020b8.Name: Snowdrifts
ca24cab1-1489-4c4d-8cea-50d076c020b8.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the active location. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text, "Limit 1 per location. No more than 3 progress can be placed on attached location each round.") If Snowdrifts is not attached to the active location, it gains surge.

ca41e49b-6bf0-42dc-8f83-83d7c8aaba1c.Name: Mountain Troll
ca41e49b-6bf0-42dc-8f83-83d7c8aaba1c.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if the active location is a Mountain.)
ca41e49b-6bf0-42dc-8f83-83d7c8aaba1c.Text: Mountain Troll gets +1 Û for each Mountain location in the staging area.

ca56ccc2-279f-4610-94c9-1c0897adf1c8.Name: Siege Tunnel
ca56ccc2-279f-4610-94c9-1c0897adf1c8.Text:
Forced: At the end or the round, each team discards cards from the top of their encounter deck until an enemy is discarded and adds that enemy to their staging area.

Travel: Reveal 1 encounter card per player to travel here.

ca60c111-b903-4859-9825-0958cfd7b7a5.Name: Army of the Dead
ca60c111-b903-4859-9825-0958cfd7b7a5.Text: Immune to player card effects. The first player gains control of Army of the Dead. If Army of the Dead leaves play, remove it from the game.

cac948bb-b3dc-423d-8082-340e2596d623.Name: Corsair Seafarer
cac948bb-b3dc-423d-8082-340e2596d623.Text: Corsair Seafarer gets +1 Attack for each resource on it. Forced: After the engaged player commits a hero to a Sailing test or to a quest, move 1 resource from that hero's resource pool to Corsair Seafarer.

cafa6a4e-1994-4a22-a465-3c03f1c0a425.Name: Hidden Alleyway
cafa6a4e-1994-4a22-a465-3c03f1c0a425.Text:
Travel: Raise each player's threat by X to travel here. X is the number of enemies in play.

Forced: After traveling to Hidden Alleyway, add 1 time counter to the current quest.

cb2d88e5-d469-43c6-9d69-e0cf36e2862e.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 9
cb2d88e5-d469-43c6-9d69-e0cf36e2862e.Name: The Road to Isengard
cb2d88e5-d469-43c6-9d69-e0cf36e2862e.Text: Resolution: If any player has 3 or fewer cards in his hand, the players have earned the Saruman’s Voice burden card. If any player has 3 or more cards in his hand, the players have earned the Palantír of Orthanc boon card. Add the earned cards to the Campaign Pool.

cb3ca114-400e-4abf-87e6-124b75e92cb4.Name: Water-Logged Halls
cb3ca114-400e-4abf-87e6-124b75e92cb4.Text:
While Sunken Temple is the active location, treat each attachment as if its printed text box is blank (except for Traits).

Forced: If Sunken Temple is the active location at the end of the quest phase, discard 1 resource from each objective-ally and each hero's resource pool. Then, you may flip Sunken Temple to its Grotto side.

cb77d46f-e8af-42f0-9619-da6e077ade04.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
cb77d46f-e8af-42f0-9619-da6e077ade04.Name: Gates of Carn Dûm
cb77d46f-e8af-42f0-9619-da6e077ade04.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û and cannot take damage this round.
cb77d46f-e8af-42f0-9619-da6e077ade04.Text: Forced: After Gates of Carn Dûm is explored, deal it as shadow card to the enemy in the staging area with the lowest engagement cost.

cbbc2de7-c8ab-4c7b-8b83-8d29debf1696.Name: Swarms of Mosquitoes
cbbc2de7-c8ab-4c7b-8b83-8d29debf1696.Text:
Cannot have attachments.
While Swarms of Mosquitoes is in the victory display, it gains: "Forced: After the players advance to a quest stage, return Swarms of Mosquitoes to the staging area."

cbbcf9d4-f9d8-448a-9454-3e36c493a31e.Name: Surprising Speed
cbbcf9d4-f9d8-448a-9454-3e36c493a31e.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
cbbcf9d4-f9d8-448a-9454-3e36c493a31e.Text: When Revealed: Each player returns 1 enemy engaged with him to the staging area. If no enemy was returned to the staging area this way, Surprising Speed gains surge and doomed 1.

cc13ea34-ab19-474e-afe5-29c8651126d0.Name: Angmar Captain
cc13ea34-ab19-474e-afe5-29c8651126d0.Text: Forced: After Angmar Captain attacks and destroys an ally, discard the top card of the defending player’s deck. If the discarded card is an ally, Angmar Captain makes an additional attack against the defending player.

cc2f73af-86c8-4d81-b706-14127adc0b37.Name: The Hammer-stroke
cc2f73af-86c8-4d81-b706-14127adc0b37.Text: Encounter Action: Engage each enemy in play.

cc4b0912-ba4a-44b6-b7c5-2c0f0b325ebf.Name: Message from Elrond
cc4b0912-ba4a-44b6-b7c5-2c0f0b325ebf.Text: Action: Choose a player. That player may choose 1 card from his hand and add it to another player’s hand. At the end of the round, if the chosen card is in that player's hand or in play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

cc73532b-e891-49b6-9544-468b5977149a.Name: Ranger of Cardolan
cc73532b-e891-49b6-9544-468b5977149a.Text: Response: After you engage an enemy, if you control at least 1 Dunedain hero, spend 1 resource to put Ranger of Cardolan into play from your hand, under your control. At the end of the round, if Ranger of Cardolan is still in play, shuffle it into its owner’s deck.

cc77ab8d-1968-4607-b18d-7db3c3c186c7.Name: Shelob's Lair
cc77ab8d-1968-4607-b18d-7db3c3c186c7.Text: Resolution: Add A Heavy Burden to the campaign pool. The players have earned that burden.

cc7beee8-1f42-4926-8c45-8a50f3a87c57.Name: Elrohir
cc7beee8-1f42-4926-8c45-8a50f3a87c57.Text:
While Elladan is in play, Elrohir gets +2 Ú.

Response: After Elrohir is declared as a defender, pay 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

ccba3aa6-5129-47d8-839c-b20aff126e62.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
ccba3aa6-5129-47d8-839c-b20aff126e62.Name: Sahir's Advance

cd23a6ca-9c2d-429f-9926-2fc75a67603b.Name: Forced off Track
cd23a6ca-9c2d-429f-9926-2fc75a67603b.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress from the main quest, where X is the number of Warg enemies in play.
Response: When this quest is defeated, discard a non-unique Warg enemy in the staging area.

cd628acc-acdf-48c5-a9cc-136eb9bc3095.Name: Deadly Huorn
cd628acc-acdf-48c5-a9cc-136eb9bc3095.Text: Forced:  At the beginning of each resource phase, the engaged player must deal 3 damage to a character he controls.

cd883a3f-65b8-473e-97f7-b8ac12f91194.Name: Methedras Orc
cd883a3f-65b8-473e-97f7-b8ac12f91194.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove 1 time counter from the current quest.
cd883a3f-65b8-473e-97f7-b8ac12f91194.Text: Forced: When Methedras Orc attacks, the defending player shuffles 1 random card from his hand into his out-of-play deck.

cd974fa4-7f3a-4b46-b2d0-b99d086fe98a.Name: Seek Shade
cd974fa4-7f3a-4b46-b2d0-b99d086fe98a.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, remove X progress from the main quest. X is the tens digit of the temperature.
Response: When Seek Shade is defeated, reduce the temperature by 10.

cda0276f-d412-47f6-aecf-02ae8dc64c9a.Keywords: Play only before the resolving enemy attacks step.
cda0276f-d412-47f6-aecf-02ae8dc64c9a.Name: Tireless Hunters
cda0276f-d412-47f6-aecf-02ae8dc64c9a.Text: Combat Action: Choose an enemy not engaged with you. Engage that enemy. Then, discard a shadow card from that enemy, if able.

cdc303cb-bb1a-4409-a479-aa4155bd8ed5.Name: Overcome by Terror
cdc303cb-bb1a-4409-a479-aa4155bd8ed5.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards 1 card at random from his hand.
cdc303cb-bb1a-4409-a479-aa4155bd8ed5.Text: When Revealed: The first player must exhaust The One Ring. If The One Ring is already exhausted, the first player must discard 2 cards at random from his hand.

cde8957d-c9c8-4dab-a38f-7fa262247092.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
cde8957d-c9c8-4dab-a38f-7fa262247092.Name: Protect the Flanks
cde8957d-c9c8-4dab-a38f-7fa262247092.Text: Forced: At the end of the combat phase, assign X damage among characters in play, where X is the total number of shadow cards dealt to enemies in the staging area.

cdeea6e4-3167-4b43-bbf9-47d33e61fd6d.Name: Gate of Annúminas
cdeea6e4-3167-4b43-bbf9-47d33e61fd6d.Text:
X is 1 more than the number of enemies in play.

Travel: Each player engages an enemy in the staging area to travel here.

cdf8dee9-b2ac-4e5f-bf4c-0b9c15cac142.Name: Driven by Fear
cdf8dee9-b2ac-4e5f-bf4c-0b9c15cac142.Text: When Revealed: The first player attaches Driven by Fear to a hero he controls. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached character's Ò is reduced to 0. Treat attached character's text box as if it was blank (except for Traits.)"

ce3322ab-b890-40e0-852a-a4638796a122.Name: Crumbling Stairs
ce3322ab-b890-40e0-852a-a4638796a122.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, the defending player must discard all event cards in his hand.
ce3322ab-b890-40e0-852a-a4638796a122.Text: While Crumbling Stairs is in the staging area, event cards cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.

ce96b767-c569-48b8-a998-d8009b0143c7.Name: Pippin
ce96b767-c569-48b8-a998-d8009b0143c7.Text:
Each enemy in play gets +1 engagement cost for each Hobbit hero you control.

Response: After you engage an enemy with a engagement cost higher than your threat, draw a card.

ceb5ede8-0acc-40b6-ac43-b9f1ff006d9e.Name: Dunland Chieftain
ceb5ede8-0acc-40b6-ac43-b9f1ff006d9e.Text: Forced: After Dunland Cheieftain engages a player, discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck where X is the number of cards in the engaged player's hand.  Put the topmost Dunland enemy discarded this way into play engaged with that player

cedfcb4c-9f28-46c6-b6ec-7986be79f7b1.Name: Corsair Arsonist
cedfcb4c-9f28-46c6-b6ec-7986be79f7b1.Text: When Revealed: Either deal 2 damage to an Aflame location in play, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Aflame location with the highest Aflame value, and add it to the staging area.

cf070c26-dd32-4ee8-bd6c-ffe9c011bd64.Name: Vast Coastland
cf070c26-dd32-4ee8-bd6c-ffe9c011bd64.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û if you are at the same stage as the Stormcaller.
cf070c26-dd32-4ee8-bd6c-ffe9c011bd64.Text: When Revealed: Add Vast Coastland to the Stormcaller’s area.

cf123545-659f-41b9-8051-8ed29302ca2c.Name: Rearguard Ambusher
cf123545-659f-41b9-8051-8ed29302ca2c.Text:
Cannot be optionally engaged.
Forced: After Rearguard Ambusher engages you, exhaust each damaged character you control.

cf24afc6-3fa7-4b43-8ff6-75b78aab16e0.Name: Jailor Gornakh
cf24afc6-3fa7-4b43-8ff6-75b78aab16e0.Text:
Forced: After Jailor Gornakh enters play, each player searches his captured deck for each hero and captures them underneath Jailor Gornakh.
Forced: After a player rescues any number of cards, Jailor Gornakh attacks that player.

cf33276f-22e5-467d-9543-6b345d17e7bc.Name: Sudden Darkness
cf33276f-22e5-467d-9543-6b345d17e7bc.Shadow: Shadow: Put the topmost Warg enemy from the discard pile into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card.
cf33276f-22e5-467d-9543-6b345d17e7bc.Text: When Revealed: If it is Night, raise each player's threat by 4. If it is Day, flip the Time objective to Nightfall.

cf5fad0e-e1c3-4340-a467-567ff0611c6f.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 8
cf5fad0e-e1c3-4340-a467-567ff0611c6f.Name: Helm's Deep
cf5fad0e-e1c3-4340-a467-567ff0611c6f.Text: Resolution: Each player with a copy of Poisoned Counsels in his hand, deck or discard pile has earned that burden. Add the earned cards to the campaign pool.

cf6094fe-6a58-4784-8e41-1ad546f8b6aa.Name: Enfeebled
cf6094fe-6a58-4784-8e41-1ad546f8b6aa.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, defending character cannot ready.
cf6094fe-6a58-4784-8e41-1ad546f8b6aa.Text: When Revealed: Each player exhausts a character he controls. Until the end of the combat phase, exhausted characters cannot ready.

cf6114ac-f795-4085-b135-4cca76fb8608.Name: Echoes in the Dark
cf6114ac-f795-4085-b135-4cca76fb8608.Shadow: Shadow: Discard 1 random card from your hand. If the discarded card is an event, attacking enemy gets +2 Û
cf6114ac-f795-4085-b135-4cca76fb8608.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each character controlled by the first player until the end of the phase.

cfa94470-c25c-4af3-ba71-941d1fa48a9c.Name: Take the Ship!
cfa94470-c25c-4af3-ba71-941d1fa48a9c.Text:
Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah gain indestructible.
Forced: At the end of the round, if Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah are not in play, add 1 resource to each of them.
Progress cannot be placed on this stage unless Helm of the Stormcaller is in the victory display.

cfcee6c8-9eee-4623-afd1-a49ea77e2322.Name: Fear of Mordor
cfcee6c8-9eee-4623-afd1-a49ea77e2322.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy’s $ is greater than the defending character’s Ò, it makes an additional attack after this one.
cfcee6c8-9eee-4623-afd1-a49ea77e2322.Text: When Revealed: Each ally in play gets -1 Ò, -1 Û, and -1 Ú until the end of the round.

d0180ea8-15e3-4a9a-80c6-dfd6549753c9.Name: To the Sea, to the Sea!
d0180ea8-15e3-4a9a-80c6-dfd6549753c9.Text: Action: Exhaust To the Sea, to the Sea! and discard X cards from your hand to reduce the cost of the next Noldor ally played this phase by X (to a minimum of 1).

d03bdefa-cc39-43b6-9af9-feeb33858958.Keywords: Umbar Raider gets +1 Û for each resource on it.
d03bdefa-cc39-43b6-9af9-feeb33858958.Name: Umbar Raider
d03bdefa-cc39-43b6-9af9-feeb33858958.Text: Forced: After Umbar Raider attacks you, move 1 resource from one of your heroes’ resource pools to Umbar Raider.

d057a6d6-8eda-4aa2-8d2d-8f2af6b6eeb8.Name: Annúminas
d057a6d6-8eda-4aa2-8d2d-8f2af6b6eeb8.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to Annúminas for each enemy at each stage.

If the city strength of Annúminas reaches 0, the city is overrun by the forces of Angmar and all teams lose the game.

d0968637-1ffc-4365-855f-ee35704a8128.Name: All is Lost
d0968637-1ffc-4365-855f-ee35704a8128.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Reanimated Dead, it attacks again after this attack.
d0968637-1ffc-4365-855f-ee35704a8128.Text: When Revealed: Attach All is Lost to the first player's threat dial. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Each time you attack a Reanimated Dead, raise your threat by 1.")

d0b6992d-9dc4-41fa-a483-b4ad0a3d60b3.Name: Trouble in Bree
d0b6992d-9dc4-41fa-a483-b4ad0a3d60b3.Text: The players cannot advance while The Prancing Pony is in play.

d0bf9c82-d626-4602-a383-4a5660a08c5f.Name: Outmaneuver the Enemy
d0bf9c82-d626-4602-a383-4a5660a08c5f.Text: Sailing. Forced: When a Ship enemy engages you, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), deal 2 damage to a Ship objective you control. If you are on-course (º), deal 2 damage to that Ship enemy instead. If your current heading is at the worst setting (¾), Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost.

d0ed393c-162a-4715-bed4-e338c24e9e36.Name: Mr. Underhill
d0ed393c-162a-4715-bed4-e338c24e9e36.Text:
Setup: Attach to the Ring-bearer.

Action: Add Mr. Underhill to the Victory display to choose an enemy engaged with you.  Until the end of the round, that enemy cannot attack you.

d12e280f-44f3-469e-a2e8-e3bfd541f909.Name: Fierce Southrons
d12e280f-44f3-469e-a2e8-e3bfd541f909.Text: When Revealed: Either place the lowest $ Harad enemy in the staging area facedown under The Black Gate and reveal an additional encounter card, or each enemy in the staging area makes an immediate attack against you.

d15c0cc8-19c0-49d8-915f-c423e993c03b.Name: Dúnedain Hunter
d15c0cc8-19c0-49d8-915f-c423e993c03b.Text: Forced: After Dúnedain Hunter enters play, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a non-unique enemy and put it into play engaged with you. If no enemy enters play by this effect, discard Dúnedain Hunter. Shuffle the encounter deck.

d16a5c80-ba9e-482f-81ce-effaad09f893.Name: Rescue the Captives
d16a5c80-ba9e-482f-81ce-effaad09f893.Text:
Progress cannot be placed here while Enemy Camp is in play.

Response: At the end of the round, raise each players's threat by 1 and reveal an encounter card to choose a non-unique enemy worth no victory points at another stage. Discard the chosen enemy.

If Lieutenant of Angmar is in a victory display at the end of the round, the players have routed the enemy and win the game.

d198aa74-21ec-462a-ac1a-f9c2fcf526cb.Name: Tower of the Gull
d198aa74-21ec-462a-ac1a-f9c2fcf526cb.Text: If Tower of the Gull is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. Combat Action: If the players control Tower of the Gull, exhaust it to deal 2 damage to a non-unique Ship enemy. Any player may trigger this action.

d1a3a535-7679-4757-871c-80c50c003cff.Name: Unexpected Rescue
d1a3a535-7679-4757-871c-80c50c003cff.Text: When Revealed: Each player creates his own staging area and advances to a different stage 2A.

d1cc0af9-7ab3-449b-baa2-da0bfdf6c987.Name: Open Pit
d1cc0af9-7ab3-449b-baa2-da0bfdf6c987.Text:
While Open Pit is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After a player draws any number of cards from a player card effect, he raises his threat by 2.”

Wizardry: Each player raises his threat by 2.

d1cc7784-d659-4b87-8ce5-ffea723ee715.Name: Fornost Street
d1cc7784-d659-4b87-8ce5-ffea723ee715.Shadow: Shadow: Each Undead enemy engaged with you gets +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the phase.
d1cc7784-d659-4b87-8ce5-ffea723ee715.Text:
While Fornost Street is in the staging area, each other Fornost location gets +1 $.
Travel: Return the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

d25dfbee-85c4-42f8-9653-c0536d3e5095.Name: Elwing's Flight
d25dfbee-85c4-42f8-9653-c0536d3e5095.Text: Quest Action: Ready a questing character and give that character +1 Ò until the end of the phase. Resolve that effect again for each copy of Elwing’s Flight currently in your discard pile (you may choose different targets).

d26e6602-0c2d-440e-8065-10cfa89687c1.Name: Isen River
d26e6602-0c2d-440e-8065-10cfa89687c1.Text: While Isen River is in the staging area, each player cannot discard cards from his hand. Forced: After Isen River becomes the active location, each player draws a card.

d2bf00ad-2e1e-4537-b662-f6f20f9a1cfe.Name: Captured!
d2bf00ad-2e1e-4537-b662-f6f20f9a1cfe.Text: At the beginning of the quest phase, each player takes 1 hidden card. If a player has 5 hidden cards, he must turn them faceup. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

d2cd3802-0667-4124-b7b6-5e753ff71ec3.Name: Army of Flies
d2cd3802-0667-4124-b7b6-5e753ff71ec3.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls.
d2cd3802-0667-4124-b7b6-5e753ff71ec3.Text: Forced: After Army of Flies engages a player, that player discards a non-objective attachment he controls.

d2e0ef58-b688-4cf7-9289-246b0af56ba8.Keywords:
Archery X.
X is the highest number of hidden cards in any player's play area.
d2e0ef58-b688-4cf7-9289-246b0af56ba8.Name: Edge of Ithilien
d2e0ef58-b688-4cf7-9289-246b0af56ba8.Shadow: Shadow: Turn 1 hidden card in your play area faceup. If it is a treachery card, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

d2e3342e-f2eb-47fe-a653-2b1824b808dc.Name: Shadow of Fear
d2e3342e-f2eb-47fe-a653-2b1824b808dc.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character does not count its Ú.
d2e3342e-f2eb-47fe-a653-2b1824b808dc.Text: When Revealed: Treat the printed text box of each character in play as blank (except for Traits) until the end of the round.

d2e57235-6df7-40fc-9a47-1ad06b4ed7a3.Name: Uruk from Mordor
d2e57235-6df7-40fc-9a47-1ad06b4ed7a3.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, attacking enemy makes an additional attack.
d2e57235-6df7-40fc-9a47-1ad06b4ed7a3.Text: When Revealed: Uruk from Mordor makes an attack against the first player.

d30fcccc-2f1a-43bb-8bc4-ce0fccdd4a0f.Keywords: X is the number of players in the game.
d30fcccc-2f1a-43bb-8bc4-ce0fccdd4a0f.Name: Plain of Isengard
d30fcccc-2f1a-43bb-8bc4-ce0fccdd4a0f.Text:
While Plain of Isengard is in the staging area, archery damage must be assigned to allies, if able. 

Wizardry: Each player discards 1 ally he controls.

d30fd38a-65fe-464d-acac-47d0f02deb05.Name: Greenwood Archer
d30fd38a-65fe-464d-acac-47d0f02deb05.Text: Response: After Greenwood Archer enters play, ready a hero.

d32ba7ec-fa7d-4a1a-b157-da4186e62ea6.Name: The Great River
d32ba7ec-fa7d-4a1a-b157-da4186e62ea6.Text:
Enemies get +2 Ú and cannot be engaged. Skip the encounter phase.

The players cannot advance while The Argonath is in play.

d33ef89b-13c9-49b2-a921-a527f27a415a.Name: The Gloaming
d33ef89b-13c9-49b2-a921-a527f27a415a.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 progress to the current Night objective.

d34c9025-6380-4294-be3f-01c992922830.Name: Fog on the Barrow-downs
d34c9025-6380-4294-be3f-01c992922830.Text: Resolution: The players have earned the Ho! Tom Bombadil! boon card.
d34c9025-6380-4294-be3f-01c992922830.Traits: The Lord of the Rings Part 1.2

d3650ee1-5225-4a8f-9114-e1123d941228.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
d3650ee1-5225-4a8f-9114-e1123d941228.Name: The Old Road
d3650ee1-5225-4a8f-9114-e1123d941228.Text:
The Old Road enters play with 3 resource tokens on it.
Forced: At the end of the round, discard 1 resource token here. Then, if there are no resource tokens here, shuffle 1 out of play Ringwraith into the encounter deck.

d3a3d024-2321-4707-b319-eb62537e6d92.Name: Vile Affliction
d3a3d024-2321-4707-b319-eb62537e6d92.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys an ally, search your deck for another copy of that ally and discard it, if able.
d3a3d024-2321-4707-b319-eb62537e6d92.Text: When Revealed: Each player must distribute damage among questing characters he controls equal to the printed cost of the highest cost card in that player’s discard pile.

d3a5ad2f-39b9-4ec8-b1f2-da2049c470b4.Name: Journey in the Dark
d3a5ad2f-39b9-4ec8-b1f2-da2049c470b4.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Each hero in each player's discard pile cannot leave the discard pile.
The players cannot defeat stage 3B unless The Balrog is in the victory display.

d3c68791-c3f9-4e8d-9515-2496f9ca1895.Name: Dusk
d3c68791-c3f9-4e8d-9515-2496f9ca1895.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 progress on Dusk.

If there are 4 or more progress on Dusk, add it to the victory display and put Midnight into play.

d413aeaa-974a-478f-8a06-bd12d4ab661f.Name: Decrepit City
d413aeaa-974a-478f-8a06-bd12d4ab661f.Shadow: Shadow: Either discard 3 cards from the top of your deck, or this attack is considered undefended.
d413aeaa-974a-478f-8a06-bd12d4ab661f.Text: While Decrepit City is the active location, 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

d4309384-8472-4385-8122-163d6c4c8396.Encounter Set: The Battle of Five Armies - Nightmare
d4309384-8472-4385-8122-163d6c4c8396.Name: Great Warg
d4309384-8472-4385-8122-163d6c4c8396.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards 1 attachment he controls.
d4309384-8472-4385-8122-163d6c4c8396.Text: Forced: After Great Warg attacks and destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.

d43b2298-a255-4afa-a95b-f7f1c8420757.Name: Outskirts of Archet
