d43b2298-a255-4afa-a95b-f7f1c8420757.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise your threat by 3.
d43b2298-a255-4afa-a95b-f7f1c8420757.Text: Travel: Search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for Protect the Breelanders, and reveal it.

d47ece86-2645-4d35-8ab7-c439d12abe65.Name: Unwanted Attention
d47ece86-2645-4d35-8ab7-c439d12abe65.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
d47ece86-2645-4d35-8ab7-c439d12abe65.Text: When Revealed: You must either remove 2 heroes you control from the quest or shuffle an out of play Ringwraith into the encounter deck.

d490e091-b01c-4067-9c60-01f2b41ad6cf.Name: Intimidation
d490e091-b01c-4067-9c60-01f2b41ad6cf.Text:
Setup: Attach to a Warrior hero. 

Response: After attached hero is declared as the only attacker against a non-unique enemy, exhaust Intimidation to give that enemy –2 Ú for this attack.

d495b495-db4b-496a-9294-c956afd1db9f.Name: Into Fangorn
d495b495-db4b-496a-9294-c956afd1db9f.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Setup: Each player searches the encounter deck for a Huorn enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck. The Player cannot defeat stage 1B or 2B unless Edge of Fangorn is in the victory display.

d4afa945-f35f-4ae3-adb5-c90ed54f5e91.Name: Dusty Labyrinth
d4afa945-f35f-4ae3-adb5-c90ed54f5e91.Text:
Dusty Labyrinth gets +1 $ for each damage on it.
Scour: Deal 2 damage to Dusty Labyrinth.
Travel: The first player must place a card from his hand facedown underneath The Orcs' Search to travel here.

d4b4c172-dec4-4d31-91f8-24f3e3127713.Name: Servant of Flame
d4b4c172-dec4-4d31-91f8-24f3e3127713.Shadow: Shadow: Search the encounter deck for a treachery card with the Shadow or Flame trait and reveal it, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.
d4b4c172-dec4-4d31-91f8-24f3e3127713.Text: Forced: While Durin's Bane has no damage, Servant of Flame gets +2 Û and +2 Ú.

d4b810a1-7d10-4610-9609-fb7f7568e5f5.Name: Crumbled Battlements
d4b810a1-7d10-4610-9609-fb7f7568e5f5.Text: Forced: When you take control of Crumbled Battlements, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Put the discarded enemy into play engaged with you.

d4e4ab9d-d5ea-4d33-89f1-d8d24d166002.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
d4e4ab9d-d5ea-4d33-89f1-d8d24d166002.Name: Dark Door
d4e4ab9d-d5ea-4d33-89f1-d8d24d166002.Text: While Dark Door is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area. Travel: The first player reveals an encounter card to travel here.

d4f034b0-2444-4b61-a249-8d86e8856f7c.Name: Squire of the Citadel
d4f034b0-2444-4b61-a249-8d86e8856f7c.Text: Response: After Squire of the Citadel leaves play, add 1 resource to a Gondor hero's resource pool.

d5134ddf-8c78-4e68-a603-7df5d48f5016.Keywords: The first player gains control of Nalir.
d5134ddf-8c78-4e68-a603-7df5d48f5016.Name: Nalir
d5134ddf-8c78-4e68-a603-7df5d48f5016.Text:
Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, raise your threat by 1 for each player in the game.

If Nalir leaves play, the players lose the game.

d51db5d2-cd6d-4e28-9c46-c5f0a1c242d9.Name: Archet Trading Post
d51db5d2-cd6d-4e28-9c46-c5f0a1c242d9.Text: Immune to player card effects. While Archet Trading Post is in the victory display, each Suspect cannot take more than 5 damage each round. Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Bree-land Informant and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

d54a293d-7e36-4dab-98e9-71fa23df2355.Name: Dúnedain Message
d54a293d-7e36-4dab-98e9-71fa23df2355.Text: Action: Search your deck for a side quest and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

d5500d57-03af-4152-9ad0-620aeb4fd50b.Name: Marksman of Lórien
d5500d57-03af-4152-9ad0-620aeb4fd50b.Text: Response: After Marksman of Lórien enters play, choose an enemy. That enemy gets -2 Ú until the end of the round.

d5f09d24-be50-4958-b0d0-41b1ad09b7af.Name: Fellowship of the Ring
d5f09d24-be50-4958-b0d0-41b1ad09b7af.Text:
Each hero gets +1 Ò.

Forced: After a character is destroyed, discard Fellowship of the Ring.

d63f87da-45b4-4c5c-b3b5-970a4277c263.Name: Across the Marshes
d63f87da-45b4-4c5c-b3b5-970a4277c263.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Smeagol and there are at least 4 locations in the victory display.

Forced: At the end of the staging step, if the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

d658967b-662e-4dfb-afb6-4b3444074b79.Name: Thaurdir
d658967b-662e-4dfb-afb6-4b3444074b79.Text: Forced: After a treachery card with the Sorcery trait is revealed from the encounter deck, Thaurdir heals 3 damage and makes an immediate attack against the first player.

d664e3bd-3f0d-47d8-91bb-d61b27a13c22.Name: Terror of the North
d664e3bd-3f0d-47d8-91bb-d61b27a13c22.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards the top 3 cards of his deck. Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each different card type discarded this way.
d664e3bd-3f0d-47d8-91bb-d61b27a13c22.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 3 cards of his deck. Until the end of the round, add 2 to the total $ in the staging area for each different card type discarded this way.

d69092af-f96b-4885-a194-5d5f31d90e6d.Name: Feeble and Weary
d69092af-f96b-4885-a194-5d5f31d90e6d.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
d69092af-f96b-4885-a194-5d5f31d90e6d.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either deal 1 damage to each exhausted character he controls, or remove each exhausted character he controls from the quest.

d6d15b55-0418-48a4-8571-9495c1e52232.Name: The Morgul Vale
d6d15b55-0418-48a4-8571-9495c1e52232.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Setup: Place 1 progress on To the Tower.

d6d4ea3a-402c-413b-9732-a07a21dd15b0.Name: Banner of the Serpent
d6d4ea3a-402c-413b-9732-a07a21dd15b0.Text: Guarded (enemy or location). While Banner of the Serpent is attached to an encounter card, each Harad enemy gets +1 Û. Action: Exhaust Banner of the Serpent and raise your threat by 1 to give each Harad enemy engaged with you -1 Û until the end of the phase.

d70f1956-fa20-4237-8a75-ab7678ed9840.Encounter Set: Over the Misty Mountains Grim - Nightmare
d70f1956-fa20-4237-8a75-ab7678ed9840.Name: Over the Misty Mountains Grim
d70f1956-fa20-4237-8a75-ab7678ed9840.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

When resolving the "when revealed" effect of stage 3B, no more than X resources may be spent from Bilbo Baggins's resource pool, where X is the number of players in the game.

d74119d9-703c-4d5a-998b-4788230254c9.Name: Pressed on All Sides
d74119d9-703c-4d5a-998b-4788230254c9.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each location you control.
d74119d9-703c-4d5a-998b-4788230254c9.Text: When Revealed: If the total $ of locations controlled by players is greater than the total $ in the staging area, raise each player's threat by 2 and immediately end the quest phase without resolving the quest.

d75bd61b-ec33-431a-880f-cf9357314ea2.Name: Charred Cellar
d75bd61b-ec33-431a-880f-cf9357314ea2.Text: While Charred Cellar is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a player's threat is increased by an encounter card effect, that player must deal 2 damage to a character he controls."

d760ba6c-e377-4d22-ac46-04bfb2b3c65f.Name: Southern Gate
d760ba6c-e377-4d22-ac46-04bfb2b3c65f.Text:
While Southern Gate is the active location, each Orc enemy gets +2 Û.

Forced: After Souther Gate becomes the active location, each player with less than 35 threat must raise their threat to 35.

d77287d1-d4d2-49bd-93c1-ae9d2590b8f7.Name: Snow-Giant
d77287d1-d4d2-49bd-93c1-ae9d2590b8f7.Text:
While Snow-Giant is in the staging area, it attacks the first player during the combat phase, as if it were engaged. 

Forced: After Snow-Giant engages you, discard the ally you control with the highest  Ò .

d7885efa-3af6-48e6-8eb1-5750892fdb34.Name: Corsair Infiltrator
d7885efa-3af6-48e6-8eb1-5750892fdb34.Text:
Forced: When Corsair Infiltrator attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card for each resource on it.

Forced: After the engaged player collects resources at the beginning of the resource phase, that player moves 1 resource from one of his heroes' pools to Corsair Infiltrator.

d7a51190-1d0e-4363-b71d-6bb44a133e1b.Encounter Set: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
d7a51190-1d0e-4363-b71d-6bb44a133e1b.Name: Mordor Orc
d7a51190-1d0e-4363-b71d-6bb44a133e1b.Shadow: Shadow: If Minas Tirith is in play, engage Mordor Orc and deal it a shadow card.
d7a51190-1d0e-4363-b71d-6bb44a133e1b.Text: While Minas Tirith is in play, undefended damage dealt by Mordor Orc must be assigned to Minas Tirith.

d7d1581c-74a4-4c6f-acf9-e2d598ccb276.Name: North Downs
d7d1581c-74a4-4c6f-acf9-e2d598ccb276.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player's threat by 2.
d7d1581c-74a4-4c6f-acf9-e2d598ccb276.Text: While North Downs is in the staging area, characters use their Ò instead of Ú when defending against Wight enemies.

d7e2e209-7730-48fe-87c7-e226143e462b.Name: Explore Secret Ways
d7e2e209-7730-48fe-87c7-e226143e462b.Text:
Limit 1 copy of Explore Secret Ways in the victory display.
While this side quest is in the victory display, each location in the staging area with the same title as the active location does not contribute its $ to the total $ of the staging area.

d7ef4ad0-93f1-4c03-a04b-cdfe6339eb41.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
d7ef4ad0-93f1-4c03-a04b-cdfe6339eb41.Name: Lost Island
d7ef4ad0-93f1-4c03-a04b-cdfe6339eb41.Text: Forced: After Drowned Graves is flipped over while active, discard the top X cards of the encounter deck. Each player adds an Undead enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area. X is 2 more than the number of players in the game.

d7fd973b-6b4e-4f4b-9fc5-4886dcf80996.Name: Quarter Deck
d7fd973b-6b4e-4f4b-9fc5-4886dcf80996.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
d7fd973b-6b4e-4f4b-9fc5-4886dcf80996.Text: While Quarter Deck is the active location, deal each enemy an additional shadow card at the beginning of the combat phase.

d80a5ca5-20d8-4c4b-814c-0c91bba40d43.Name: Dunland Prowler
d80a5ca5-20d8-4c4b-814c-0c91bba40d43.Text:
While any player has 3 or more cards in hand, Dunland Prowler gains surge.

While any player has 5 or more cards in hand, Dunland Prowler gets +1 $

d87344c3-d234-44c8-89b1-249f5c88bfab.Name: Fastred
d87344c3-d234-44c8-89b1-249f5c88bfab.Text: Response: After Fastred defends an enemy attack, return that enemy to the staging area to reduce your threat by 2. (Limit once per phase.)

d8c6d8df-9856-4fad-ba85-a96d17b67cfd.Name: The Angry Forest
d8c6d8df-9856-4fad-ba85-a96d17b67cfd.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Each player must choose an enemy or objective in the discard pile, reveal it, and add it to the staging area. Place 3 time counters on this stage.

Forced: After placing progress here, if there is at least 6 progress on this stage and Mugash is attached to a hero, advance to stage 2A.

d8cfafbd-7976-4a87-bdb3-a12c87503cd3.Name: Sarn Gebir
d8cfafbd-7976-4a87-bdb3-a12c87503cd3.Text: Forced: When Sarn Gebir is explored, deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

d8d1e7b4-3639-4ca0-bc83-daa7f78554b2.Name: Pelargir Shipwright
d8d1e7b4-3639-4ca0-bc83-daa7f78554b2.Text: Pelargir Shipwright gets +1 Ò for each hero you control with a printed Ê resource icon.

d95a6076-3ead-4ff6-a1ba-ca320d2bd4e1.Name: Gandalf's Delay
d95a6076-3ead-4ff6-a1ba-ca320d2bd4e1.Text:
Setup: Add Gandalf's Delay to the staging area.

Each player draws 1 less card in his starting hand.

d960e5a1-73eb-4699-b3c1-2eadeb2c6f23.Keywords: While it is Night, North Downs gets +2 $.
d960e5a1-73eb-4699-b3c1-2eadeb2c6f23.Name: North Downs
d960e5a1-73eb-4699-b3c1-2eadeb2c6f23.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.

d985a0cd-4c06-4e2e-b05a-ad0ac9ac86be.Name: The Fords of Isen
d985a0cd-4c06-4e2e-b05a-ad0ac9ac86be.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Forced: After the players advance to a new quest stage, each player with fewer than 3 cards in his hand draws 3 cards.

d99e07f6-7a57-4b5f-a108-13bd7ce6fa4b.Name: Captured by Spiders
d99e07f6-7a57-4b5f-a108-13bd7ce6fa4b.Text:
Unconscious characters cannot quest, attack, defend, collect resources, trigger abilities, be poisoned, or ready (except by effects that target unconscious characters).

Do not pass the first player token. When this stage is complete, do not advance to stage 4 until the end of the quest phase. (Combine staging areas if necessary.)

Action: Spend 2 Í resources to ready an unconscious character you control.

d9a1e647-cd77-43b5-97a4-686564697225.Name: Torture Chamber
d9a1e647-cd77-43b5-97a4-686564697225.Text:
X is twice number of cards captured underneath Torture Chamber.
Forced: At the end of the combat phase, if Torture Chamber is in the staging area, deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

d9bde488-6391-492f-b3df-6dd6dbe4f9e9.Name: Belfalas Islet
d9bde488-6391-492f-b3df-6dd6dbe4f9e9.Text: You cannot travel to Belfalas Islet if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾). Response: After you travel to Belfalas Islet, choose a Ship enemy that is not guarding an objective. While Belfalas Islet is the active location, the chosen enemy is considered to be out of play.

d9c04b71-93cd-455d-9f6e-4ee16cf7d1b4.Name: Orders from Angmar
d9c04b71-93cd-455d-9f6e-4ee16cf7d1b4.Text:
Action: Exhaust Amarthiúl or a hero to claim Orders from Angmar. Then, attach Orders from Angmar to that character.

Attached character gets +1 Ú while defending against Undead enemies.

d9da588c-c96d-4971-813a-40e439e46764.Name: Journey's End
d9da588c-c96d-4971-813a-40e439e46764.Text:
Each damaged character gets –2 Ò unless there is an active location with
the safe keyword.

If the players defeat this stage, they have escaped the Ettenmoors
with their lives, and win the game.

da109a2a-65fe-410e-93b4-e09695966fe5.Name: The Stairs of Cirith Ungol
da109a2a-65fe-410e-93b4-e09695966fe5.Text:
Progress cannot be placed on Underground locations.

Response: After Smeagol’s Secret Way is explored, discard 3 random cards from each player’s hand to discard each Nazgul enemy in the staging area.

Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if Smeagol’s Secret Way is in the victory display, advance to stage 2A.

da177cbd-31e7-42ea-b051-e61f28dbb749.Name: Black Feathered Arrows
da177cbd-31e7-42ea-b051-e61f28dbb749.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy).
da177cbd-31e7-42ea-b051-e61f28dbb749.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, add 1 to the archery total at this stage for each ally currently at this stage.

da46fcb3-2810-4c21-9070-43969532ef9b.Name: Known to an Ounce
da46fcb3-2810-4c21-9070-43969532ef9b.Text:
When Revealed: Each player discards 2 random cards from hand. Until the end of the phase, each Dragon enemy in play gets +1 $ for each event discarded by this effect.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 1 card from his hand that matches the revealed card's sphere and cost.

da4c926c-7917-4b6d-a1be-cc90fbdce597.Name: Beregond
da4c926c-7917-4b6d-a1be-cc90fbdce597.Text: Response: After Beregond defends an attack and takes no damage, reduce the defending player’s threat by 1. (Limit once per round.)

da69a930-1102-4f2d-80ff-257354f3f701.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
da69a930-1102-4f2d-80ff-257354f3f701.Name: Hideous Depths
da69a930-1102-4f2d-80ff-257354f3f701.Text:
Forced: After a player looks at one or more cards in the encounter deck, shuffle the encounter deck. 

Travel: Reveal the topmost Tentacle enemy in the encounter discard pile to travel here.

da6d1bd2-575b-4292-9757-3792b79a4b78.Name: Hunting Pack
da6d1bd2-575b-4292-9757-3792b79a4b78.Text: When a player is making an engagement check against Hunting Pack, it gets –1 engagement cost for each damaged character that player controls.

da95d039-0f3f-452b-9ff5-60c03432facc.Keywords: Peril. Immune to player card effects. The players cannot travel here.
da95d039-0f3f-452b-9ff5-60c03432facc.Name: Great Barrow
da95d039-0f3f-452b-9ff5-60c03432facc.Text: Forced: After Great Barrow enters the staging area, remove each character you control from the quest and create your own staging area. Then, advance to a separate stage 4A by yourself.

dad6e885-d535-4100-bd9f-4726ea7c7465.Name: Naith Guide
dad6e885-d535-4100-bd9f-4726ea7c7465.Text: Response: After Naith Guide enters play, choose a hero. That hero does not exhaust to quest this round.

daf23298-67fa-41c5-aff6-a3b7fef2014e.Name: Súlien
daf23298-67fa-41c5-aff6-a3b7fef2014e.Text: Dúnedain. Scout.Action: Spend 1 Î resource to exhaust Súlien. Then, each location in the staging area gets –1 $ until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this action.

db1ee7dd-d43c-40a0-9e89-89a5b233af70.Name: Fords of Isen
db1ee7dd-d43c-40a0-9e89-89a5b233af70.Text:
While Fords of Isen is in the staging area, players cannot gain resources from card effects.

Forced: After Fords of Isen becomes the active location, each player with fewer than 5 cards in his hand draws cards until he has 5 in his hand

db512bcc-1bc7-4008-ba2b-18d56abc3b67.Name: Crushing Arm
db512bcc-1bc7-4008-ba2b-18d56abc3b67.Text: Forced: After Crushing Arm is detached from a location, it makes an immediate attack against the first player.

db6355c7-3edd-4573-a63c-1b6fc08bb8fa.Name: Dragon-Spell
db6355c7-3edd-4573-a63c-1b6fc08bb8fa.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the hero with the most resources without Dragon-Spell attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero gets -1 Ò for each resource in its resource pool. Forced: When attached hero spends resources, attached hero takes X damage. X is equal to the number of resources spent.")

db7a5fb4-f390-49c2-b555-d963350cd8ff.Name: Rain-washed Tracks
db7a5fb4-f390-49c2-b555-d963350cd8ff.Shadow: Shadow: Either remove 1 resource token from the Mission objective, or attacking enemy gets +3 Û.
db7a5fb4-f390-49c2-b555-d963350cd8ff.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 1 resource token from the Mission objective, or add 8 to the total $ in the staging area this phase.

dba87655-87e0-44b6-ba45-caf86ce723eb.Name: Guardian of Ithilien
dba87655-87e0-44b6-ba45-caf86ce723eb.Text: Response: After Guardian of Ithilien enters play, return an enemy engaged with you to the staging area.

dbdb65b4-924c-4d74-adcc-14b6d8e1e2f8.Name: Bellach's Scout
dbdb65b4-924c-4d74-adcc-14b6d8e1e2f8.Shadow: Shadow: Place 1 damage on the active location.
dbdb65b4-924c-4d74-adcc-14b6d8e1e2f8.Text:
When Revealed: Either place 3 damage on the active
location, or reveal an additional encounter card.

Scour: Place 1 damage on the active location.

dc2da597-7d44-4654-a3f4-860e3f7117d6.Name: Fiery Whip
dc2da597-7d44-4654-a3f4-860e3f7117d6.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is the Balrog, attach Fiery Whip to it.
dc2da597-7d44-4654-a3f4-860e3f7117d6.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the Balrog (even if out of play) as a Weapon attachment with the text: "Attached enemy gets +1 Ú and gains Archery 4."

dc5c51d1-7528-46b4-b438-aae0cb744e29.Name: Bedlam In The Streets
dc5c51d1-7528-46b4-b438-aae0cb744e29.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either remove a hero he controls from the quest or engage an enemy in the staging area. Each enemy engaged by this effect makes an immediate attack.

dc8f31b6-73af-4aec-be26-8d297909d14d.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
dc8f31b6-73af-4aec-be26-8d297909d14d.Name: Lost Island
dc8f31b6-73af-4aec-be26-8d297909d14d.Text:
While Jungle Path is the active location, the locations immediately above and below it are not considered to be in the staging area.
Forced: When Jungle Path is flipped over while active, each player must exhaust a character with at least 2 Û.

dce8ff38-bcc7-49b4-ba27-ae3e2cac1d32.Name: Secret Map
dce8ff38-bcc7-49b4-ba27-ae3e2cac1d32.Text:
Action: Exhaust a hero to claim this objective and attach it to that hero.

Action: If attached to a hero, add Secret Map to the victory display to place 3 progress tokens on the active location.

dd1a7167-8988-4ec7-a9ae-8e3becbc58d0.Name: Haradrim Spear
dd1a7167-8988-4ec7-a9ae-8e3becbc58d0.Text:
Attach to a Harad character. 
 
Attached character gets +1 Û. 
Response: After attached character is declared as an attacker, it gets +3 Û for this attack. After this attack resolves, discard Haradrim Spear.

dd28d391-8eca-4a12-9455-3d705adb46a5.Name: Isolated
dd28d391-8eca-4a12-9455-3d705adb46a5.Text:
Caught in a dense fog, you suddenly find yourself separated from your companions.
Surge. Players cannot draw cards by card effects.
Forced: When this stage is defeated, each player draws 1 card.

dd394c76-c2b9-4b1c-8948-a056de97b779.Name: Streets of Umbar
dd394c76-c2b9-4b1c-8948-a056de97b779.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Raider, deal it an additional shadow card for each resource token on it, to a maximum of 3 additional shadow cards.
dd394c76-c2b9-4b1c-8948-a056de97b779.Text: When faced with the option to travel, if Streets of Umbar is in the staging area, the players must either travel to a location named Streets of Umbar or add 2 resources to a Raider enemy in play.

dd64881e-99d9-4505-9f9f-67dfc8c8ffc1.Name: Anchor Watch
dd64881e-99d9-4505-9f9f-67dfc8c8ffc1.Text: Response: After an enemy is declared as an attacker against you, declare an exhausted character you control as the defender. Resolve that effect again for each copy of Anchor Watch currently in your discard pile (all chosen characters are defending against this attack).

dd71d27f-b53e-453b-bcbc-bb479104461a.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
dd71d27f-b53e-453b-bcbc-bb479104461a.Name: Khamûl the Easterling
dd71d27f-b53e-453b-bcbc-bb479104461a.Text:
Khamûl the Easterling gets -30 engagement cost while The One Ring is exhausted.
Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, the engaged player makes a Hide 2 test. If the engaged player fails the hide test, Khamûl the Easterling makes an immediate attack.

dd7ca673-fc3c-4caf-859a-ca32722e68dc.Name: Savage Attack
dd7ca673-fc3c-4caf-859a-ca32722e68dc.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.
dd7ca673-fc3c-4caf-859a-ca32722e68dc.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard the highest cost ally you control, or reveal an encounter card.

ddac1c59-4e5d-4a90-9666-0753133d4de9.Name: Spies from Mordor
ddac1c59-4e5d-4a90-9666-0753133d4de9.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls.
ddac1c59-4e5d-4a90-9666-0753133d4de9.Text: When Revealed: Each player must exhaust X characters he controls. X is the number of cards underneath The Orcs’ Search. If no characters are exhausted this way, Spies from Mordor gains surge.

ddb20145-e570-4099-8d8a-11d64895939b.Name: Weather Hills
ddb20145-e570-4099-8d8a-11d64895939b.Text:
Response: After the players travel here, place 1 non-unique enemy in play facedown under this location.  While an enemy is under this location, it is out of play.

Forced: After this location leaves play, return each enemy under it to the staging area face-up.

de09949d-6bc8-470c-a500-6b1fd4a5f391.Name: Hills of Ithilien
de09949d-6bc8-470c-a500-6b1fd4a5f391.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a non­objective attachment you control.
de09949d-6bc8-470c-a500-6b1fd4a5f391.Text: While Hills of Ithilien is the active location, it gains: “Forced: After a player engages a Harad enemy, deal 1 damage to that enemy.”

de212258-f124-4cda-baab-4f696c2b5766.Name: Orc Cave
de212258-f124-4cda-baab-4f696c2b5766.Text:
Forced: After Orc Cave leaves play as an explored location, the first player Searches 5.

Travel: Discard the top X cards of the encounter deck to travel here.  X is the number of players in the game. Add each Orc enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

de744bed-1461-4442-b9a1-193d00fd39a3.Name: Change of Plans
de744bed-1461-4442-b9a1-193d00fd39a3.Text: When Revealed: Flip Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah to their objective sides, removing all tokens from them. Search the encounter deck, discard pile and all play areas for each encounter card from the Corsair Raiders encounter set and remove each of those cards from the game. Add The Thing in the Depths to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter discard pile and the set aside The Thing in the Depths encounter set into the encounter deck. Advance to stage 3.

de8d68fc-15c4-4689-933e-1b2ca638cd78.Name: Secret Entrance
de8d68fc-15c4-4689-933e-1b2ca638cd78.Text:
While Secret Entrance is the active location, The Lonely Mountain's $ is reduced by half (round up).

Travel: The first player must exhaust a hero and name a card type to travel here. Then, reveal the top card of the encounter deck. If the revealed card is not the named type, return Secret Entrance to the staging area. (The players cannot travel again this round.)

de903b76-e5e1-478b-a782-1e91f5a7261e.Name: Cargo Hold
de903b76-e5e1-478b-a782-1e91f5a7261e.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the phase, attacking enemy gets +2 Ú.
de903b76-e5e1-478b-a782-1e91f5a7261e.Text: While Cargo Hold is the active location, each enemy gets +1 Ú.

ded946a7-99f0-42bf-92f6-a2c46ca64d98.Name: Orc Skirmisher
ded946a7-99f0-42bf-92f6-a2c46ca64d98.Text: Forced: After Orc Skirmisher engages a player, that player must either deal 3 damage to a character he controls, or remove 1 time counter form the current quest.

def7d5a8-3af5-428d-ac94-485c33388ff9.Name: Dunland Berserker
def7d5a8-3af5-428d-ac94-485c33388ff9.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
def7d5a8-3af5-428d-ac94-485c33388ff9.Text: Forced: After the engaged player draws any number of cards, Dunland Berserker makes an attack.

df23bd50-5ca3-4a0e-a83c-a349632b0ff4.Name: Chetwood
df23bd50-5ca3-4a0e-a83c-a349632b0ff4.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player discards 1 random card from his hand.
df23bd50-5ca3-4a0e-a83c-a349632b0ff4.Text: While Chetwood is in the staging area, Spy enemies get +1 $ and +1 Û.

df2b2070-240c-4b38-b4c8-29a0d2c789cf.Keywords: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
df2b2070-240c-4b38-b4c8-29a0d2c789cf.Name: Skinbark
df2b2070-240c-4b38-b4c8-29a0d2c789cf.Text: While Skinbark is attacking alone against an Orc enemy, that enemy does not count its Ú.

df69b078-0073-44b6-9f18-1fed38f9711c.Name: Terrible Fever
df69b078-0073-44b6-9f18-1fed38f9711c.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character cannot ready until the end of the round.
df69b078-0073-44b6-9f18-1fed38f9711c.Text: When Revealed: Remove a hero from the quest and attach Terrible Fever to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: At the end of the round, deal 1 damage to attached character.”)

df908f24-8927-42cf-a6dd-9dfc41de74c1.Name: Scorched Hamada
df908f24-8927-42cf-a6dd-9dfc41de74c1.Shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by X, where X is the tens digit of the temperature.
df908f24-8927-42cf-a6dd-9dfc41de74c1.Text: X is the tens digit of the temperature.Forced: After Scorched Hamada becomes the active location, assign X damage among characters in play.

df9683da-d86f-46c9-9ef5-66001753dad5.Name: Idraen
df9683da-d86f-46c9-9ef5-66001753dad5.Text: Response: After a location is explored, ready Idraen.

dfb04502-e86f-41bc-83a0-b77048b9668c.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 6
dfb04502-e86f-41bc-83a0-b77048b9668c.Name: Breaking of the Fellowship
dfb04502-e86f-41bc-83a0-b77048b9668c.Text:
Resolution: If Fallen into Evil is attached to a hero, add that hero to the list of Fallen Heroes in the Campaign Log.

The first player chooses either Followed by Night or Ill Fate to be added to the Campaign Pool. The chosen burden card has been earned by the players.

Each player chooses 1 hero he controls (other than the Ring-bearer or Aragorn) to be taken captive. Record the name of each "captive" in the Notes section of the Campaign Log.

dfd05c9f-1dc1-4af6-a22f-fe39969c6371.Name: The Gathering of the Clouds
dfd05c9f-1dc1-4af6-a22f-fe39969c6371.Text: When Revealed: Put stage 2, stage 3, and stage 4 into play at the same time. Then, remove this stage from play.

dfd0e951-2ba4-45c5-bed9-24caf8ae868f.Name: Poisoned Vapour
dfd0e951-2ba4-45c5-bed9-24caf8ae868f.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
dfd0e951-2ba4-45c5-bed9-24caf8ae868f.Text:
Surge.
When Revealed: Exhaust each damaged character. Until the end of the combat phase, treat each damaged character’s text box as if was blank.

e02cc17b-80e4-4a8f-ba55-1df74aac816d.Name: Bilbo Baggins
e02cc17b-80e4-4a8f-ba55-1df74aac816d.Text: Response: After Bilbo Baggins enters play, search your deck for a Pipe attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

e02f317e-736c-40a0-8d73-45509fce9ef8.Name: A Good Harvest
e02f317e-736c-40a0-8d73-45509fce9ef8.Text: Action: Name a sphere. Until the end of the phase, you can spend resources of any sphere when paying for cards that belong to the named sphere.

e07f95e5-8cae-4b4a-b3e7-92da7ddb1d68.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
e07f95e5-8cae-4b4a-b3e7-92da7ddb1d68.Name: Eastfarthing
e07f95e5-8cae-4b4a-b3e7-92da7ddb1d68.Text:
Eastfarthing gets +2 $ for each resource token on it.
Forced: After a player fails a Hide test, place 1 resource token here.

e0c17eeb-3231-49a4-a807-1e176247573c.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
e0c17eeb-3231-49a4-a807-1e176247573c.Keywords: Aflame 10. Immune to player card effects.
e0c17eeb-3231-49a4-a807-1e176247573c.Name: Nárelenya

e1001736-68fc-4e7b-a7df-23230876eb92.Name: The Star’s Guidance
e1001736-68fc-4e7b-a7df-23230876eb92.Text:
Sailing.
While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each Ocean location gets +1 $.
When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

e1479aa5-7a6d-426a-930b-64ae24143733.Name: Raising the Cry
e1479aa5-7a6d-426a-930b-64ae24143733.Text: When Revealed: Remove 1 time counter from each location in play. Place X time counters on each location in play with no time counters on it. X is the “Time X” value on that location. If there are no locations in the staging area, Raising the Cry gains surge.

e15ba98d-806f-4847-823c-ca90c0f58f0b.Name: Cruel Torturer
e15ba98d-806f-4847-823c-ca90c0f58f0b.Text: Forced: When Cruel Torturer would damage a character by an attack, capture that character underneath Cruel Torturer instead.

e176b4d7-2fae-4025-8a71-5c3bc843e2e1.Name: Morgul Vale
e176b4d7-2fae-4025-8a71-5c3bc843e2e1.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, place 1 progress token on To the Tower.
e176b4d7-2fae-4025-8a71-5c3bc843e2e1.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, each player returns 1 enemy engaged with him to the staging area.

e1b0b7ba-c097-481b-baba-53755545cbbe.Name: Nest of Vermin
e1b0b7ba-c097-481b-baba-53755545cbbe.Text: Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Creature enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

e1edac2f-1d9c-44e6-af0a-10c3101f2709.Name: Traitorous Wight
e1edac2f-1d9c-44e6-af0a-10c3101f2709.Shadow: Shadow: For each point of damage dealt by this attack, remove 1 progress from each quest in play.
e1edac2f-1d9c-44e6-af0a-10c3101f2709.Text: Forced: When Traitorous Wight engages a player, remove 2 progress from each quest card in play.

e1ff74ae-0c48-4f6c-86c8-9ac7339eb554.Name: Tighten Our Belts
e1ff74ae-0c48-4f6c-86c8-9ac7339eb554.Text: Refresh Action: Choose a player. Each hero that player controls that did not spend any resources this round gains 1 resource. Only 1 copy of Tighten Our Belts can be played by the players each round.

e22fc95d-9729-40ea-b81c-1432a4a57e41.Keywords: Indestructible. Immune to player card effects. Cannot leave the staging area.
e22fc95d-9729-40ea-b81c-1432a4a57e41.Name: Saruman
e22fc95d-9729-40ea-b81c-1432a4a57e41.Text: Forced: When Saruman is dealt a shadow card with the Wizardry keyword, the defending player resolves its effect as if he is the only player in the game.

e25328c2-1a6b-4dda-866e-02685eff4a88.Keywords:
Mire 3.
Forced: When Evil­smelling Fens is discarded by the Mire keyword, deal 1 damage to each character.
e25328c2-1a6b-4dda-866e-02685eff4a88.Name: Evil-smelling Fens
e25328c2-1a6b-4dda-866e-02685eff4a88.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to defending character.
e25328c2-1a6b-4dda-866e-02685eff4a88.Text: Travel: Raise each player’s threat by 1 to travel here.

e2763cc3-019b-4397-b6f8-f647bf3fdf43.Keywords: X is the number of quest cards in play.
e2763cc3-019b-4397-b6f8-f647bf3fdf43.Name: Shrouded Hills
e2763cc3-019b-4397-b6f8-f647bf3fdf43.Text: While there is only 1 quest card in play, Shrouded Hills gains surge.

e2a70b1d-2d38-48bd-a591-cd2844fe50fd.Name: Key of the Boar
e2a70b1d-2d38-48bd-a591-cd2844fe50fd.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle Key of the Boar back into the encounter deck.
e2a70b1d-2d38-48bd-a591-cd2844fe50fd.Text:
If unattached, the first player must claim Key of the Boar and attach it to a hero he controls.

If Key of the Boar is discarded, add it to the staging area.

e2c02f11-fdfb-402b-89de-1729d1364e4c.Name: Drúadan Drummer
e2c02f11-fdfb-402b-89de-1729d1364e4c.Shadow: Shadow: Each Wose enemy engaged with the defending player gets +1 Û.
e2c02f11-fdfb-402b-89de-1729d1364e4c.Text: Each Wose enemy in the staging area gets +2 $.

e2c4a5fe-dc9d-481b-b46b-91613e62d250.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
e2c4a5fe-dc9d-481b-b46b-91613e62d250.Name: Rally the Fighters
e2c4a5fe-dc9d-481b-b46b-91613e62d250.Text:
Your task seems hopeless and your fate dire, but somehow you must inspire your companions to fight onward!
Shadow cards are immune to player card effects.
Response: After this quest is defeated, discard 1 shadow card from each enemy in play.

e2cf87be-ccdc-48e9-8127-57bee67d4a0c.Name: Bard the Bowman
e2cf87be-ccdc-48e9-8127-57bee67d4a0c.Text: When Bard the Bowman makes a ranged attack, the enemy he attacks gets -2 Ú until the end of the phase.

e2daba5a-f5ac-4fcb-a508-45b3b3cae5a9.Name: Speak Your Promise!
e2daba5a-f5ac-4fcb-a508-45b3b3cae5a9.Text: Action: Ready the Ring-bearer to choose an enemy engaged with you. If the Ring-bearer's Ò is greater than that enemy's $, lower that enemy's Û and Ú by the difference until the end of the phase.

e2e8fe14-f019-4fd9-af2c-81f1a4282660.Name: A Fell Dread
e2e8fe14-f019-4fd9-af2c-81f1a4282660.Text: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat must attach A Fell Dread to a hero he controls without A Fell Dread attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached hero’s Ò is reduced to 0. During the quest phase, attached hero must commit to the quest, if able.”)

e2f901ad-f5bc-4d29-b6c3-50c261e5668a.Name: The Catacombs of Carn Dûm
e2f901ad-f5bc-4d29-b6c3-50c261e5668a.Text:
Reanimated Dead are Undead enemies with 2 $, 2 Û, 2 Ú and 2 hit points. 

When the players advance to stage 2, all Sorcery cards attached to this stage are attached to stage 2B.

e3219c93-d920-43a5-ae8f-743745c3b949.Name: Bree-land Informant
e3219c93-d920-43a5-ae8f-743745c3b949.Text: Response: After Bree-land Information makes an attack against you, if it was dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect, raise your threat by 1 and spend 1 resource to look at the bottom card of the Investigation deck. Then, discard Bree-land Informant.

e347f103-7444-4681-ae57-49c7b84dd3c0.Keywords: Each Orc enemy gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.
e347f103-7444-4681-ae57-49c7b84dd3c0.Name: Orc Ambush
e347f103-7444-4681-ae57-49c7b84dd3c0.Text: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Orc enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

e35e9d1e-48bb-41f3-95c9-402f84e46ef8.Name: Ruthless Hill-troll
e35e9d1e-48bb-41f3-95c9-402f84e46ef8.Shadow: Shadow: Shuffle 1 location with the safe keyword (but not its attached encounter) back into the encounter deck.
e35e9d1e-48bb-41f3-95c9-402f84e46ef8.Text: Ruthless Hill-troll gets +2 Û and +2 Ú while it has 3 or more damage on it.

e3adad02-fa99-4905-bb20-d414ba76f75f.Name: Battle in the Bay
e3adad02-fa99-4905-bb20-d414ba76f75f.Text: Sailing. If your current heading is at the worst setting (¾), Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost. You cannot advance while at least 1 objective is guarded by an encounter.

e3bc9212-fbc0-48e0-b1c5-42b80ee58b5e.Name: Battle in the Camp
e3bc9212-fbc0-48e0-b1c5-42b80ee58b5e.Text:
If a Harad objective is not attached, the first player claims it and attaches it to a hero he controls.

The Black Serpent is considered to be engaged with each player who controls a Harad objective.

This stage cannot be defeated unless each Harad objective in play is attached to a hero.

e3d50c1b-4626-4bff-a247-f965166f9d2f.Name: Gornákh's Dungeons
e3d50c1b-4626-4bff-a247-f965166f9d2f.Text:
Any time players would place progress tokens on this quest, rescue an equal number of captured cards at random from underneath it instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.) 

Forced: If there are no captured cards underneath Gornákh’s Dungeons, join another player at the beginning of the travel phase. If you cannot join another player, all players advance to stage 3A together.

e3d50fbb-2b94-481a-a1e5-7925ca8384ff.Name: The Shadow World
e3d50fbb-2b94-481a-a1e5-7925ca8384ff.Text: Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, each player discards the top X cards of his deck, where X is the number of Undead enemies engaged with him.

e3de3669-64a9-4ab5-a21c-7805e6259267.Name: Blocked Tunnel
e3de3669-64a9-4ab5-a21c-7805e6259267.Text:
When Revealed: Make Blocked Tunnel the active location, returning any other active location to the staging area.

Action: Exhaust a character with a Weapon attachment to place 3 progress on Blocked Tunnel. (Any player may trigger this effect.)

e40770a1-7b1b-4257-afca-443c55701850.Name: "Don't Look at the Lights!"
e40770a1-7b1b-4257-afca-443c55701850.Text:
While any player is engaged with an Undead enemy, progress cannot be placed on this stage.

The players cannot defeat this stage unless the first player controls Smeagol. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

e4660d9f-4779-4103-ad48-36337065931b.Name: Zirakzigil Archer
e4660d9f-4779-4103-ad48-36337065931b.Text: When Revealed: Discard a random card from your hand. Assign X damage among characters you control, where X is the cost of the discarded card.

e46a15c0-abbe-4a2e-8951-0e9950aa0288.Name: The Old Bridge
e46a15c0-abbe-4a2e-8951-0e9950aa0288.Text:
Planning Action: Spend 2 resources to place 1 progress token on The Old Bridge. (1 resource instead if there is another Osgiliath location in the staging area.)

Forced: After the player who controls The Old Bridge lets an attack go undefended, return The Old Bridge to the staging area.

e476b426-a9db-4d95-ab93-a32f4a5b7f48.Name: Howling Warg
e476b426-a9db-4d95-ab93-a32f4a5b7f48.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destoys a character, place 1 damage on an active location.
e476b426-a9db-4d95-ab93-a32f4a5b7f48.Text: Forced: When Howling Warg attacks, place 1 damage on an active location.

e48c7313-d1cb-4291-9dc1-9fff6fb23e83.Name: Sahír's Betrayal
e48c7313-d1cb-4291-9dc1-9fff6fb23e83.Text:
You dive at Sahír, but he swiftly runs to the entrance, laughing as he seals you in. "Captain?! What about me?" Na'asiyah screams angrily. As soon as the entrance is sealed shut, the walls shudder, and water begins to leak in rapidly from the ceiling and walls. "We have to get out of here!" the heroes shout, as the water level starts to rise.

While an Underwater location is the active location, players cannot play attachments or allies.

e496a120-ce3f-47f8-9087-d9c156744ac9.Name: Reckless Hate
e496a120-ce3f-47f8-9087-d9c156744ac9.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
e496a120-ce3f-47f8-9087-d9c156744ac9.Text:
Peril.
When Revealed: The enemy in the staging area with the highest Û makes an immediate attack against you. If no attack is made this way, Reckless Hate gains surge.

e49be9ae-10f1-44fe-a1b8-fc931be2d208.Name: Wolf of Angmar
e49be9ae-10f1-44fe-a1b8-fc931be2d208.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it is Night).
e49be9ae-10f1-44fe-a1b8-fc931be2d208.Text: While it is Night, Wolf of Angmar gets +2 Û.

e4af5d7f-9af5-41bb-b22a-cce8b91ac791.Name: The Disappearance
e4af5d7f-9af5-41bb-b22a-cce8b91ac791.Text:
When Revealed: Reveal 1 encounter card per player, adding them to the staging area.

Players cannot defeat this stage while Tarlang's Neck is in play.

e4f6c61b-afb1-4f12-81d5-4edd14a90d32.Keywords:
X is the number of players in the game.
Immune to player card effects. Cannot be optionally engaged.
e4f6c61b-afb1-4f12-81d5-4edd14a90d32.Name: Temple Guardian
e4f6c61b-afb1-4f12-81d5-4edd14a90d32.Text: Temple Guardian gets –50 engagement cost while Cursed Temple is the active location.

e4fd6e25-982a-464f-82d8-812269864d46.Name: Silvan Refugee
e4fd6e25-982a-464f-82d8-812269864d46.Text: Forced: After a character leaves play, discard Silvan Refugee from play.

e542f4f9-420f-40eb-8c95-d648f2589511.Name: Orc War Party
e542f4f9-420f-40eb-8c95-d648f2589511.Text:
While Orc War Party is in the staging area, enemies in the staging area cannot take damage.
The players cannot win the game while Orc War Party is in play.

e562d744-bf7d-4325-97ba-424bf3ca3ca8.Keywords:
Sentinel.
Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.
e562d744-bf7d-4325-97ba-424bf3ca3ca8.Name: Derndingle Warrior
e562d744-bf7d-4325-97ba-424bf3ca3ca8.Text: While Derndingle Warrior is defending, it gains: “Action: Deal 1 damage to Derndingle Warrior to give it +3 Ú for this attack.” (Limit once per attack.)

e62b817f-7806-40ad-95e3-a7c3e805e95d.Name: Ruined Watch-tower
e62b817f-7806-40ad-95e3-a7c3e805e95d.Text:
While Ruined Watch-tower is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: When an Orc enemy is revealed, each player must deal 1 damage to a character he controls."
While Ruined Watch -tower is the active location, each enemy gets +3 Ú.

e6721e44-5706-4a0f-a895-ced75f9c6219.Name: Black Breath
e6721e44-5706-4a0f-a895-ced75f9c6219.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a hero you control.  (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Reduce attached hero's Ò, Û, and Ú to 0.")

e678be7e-8048-458d-b4f9-25c2a718fabb.Name: Advance Warning
e678be7e-8048-458d-b4f9-25c2a718fabb.Text:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed Î resource icon.

Action: Until the end of the phase, enemies do not make engagement checks

e679dcf1-ac02-46f1-b07f-b66e540df9d5.Name: Bill Ferny's House
e679dcf1-ac02-46f1-b07f-b66e540df9d5.Text: Immune to player card effects. While Bill Ferny's House is in the victory display, each Suspect, and each shadow card dealt to a Suspect, is immune to player card effects. Travel: Search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for Bill Ferny and add him to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

e6808a55-528f-444e-bf61-67748e7261e9.Name: Snowstorm
e6808a55-528f-444e-bf61-67748e7261e9.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the phase, characters defending this attack get -1 Ò and are discarded if their Ò is 0.
e6808a55-528f-444e-bf61-67748e7261e9.Text: When Revealed: Each questing character gets -1 Ò until the end of the phase.

e6b1a8ef-b595-4bca-9afb-3afbbd52d16e.Name: Drums in the Deep
e6b1a8ef-b595-4bca-9afb-3afbbd52d16e.Text:
If there are no enemies in the staging area at the beginning of the quest phase, the first player reveals an additional encounter card during the staging step.

The players cannot advance unless there are X resource tokens on this stage. X is the number of players times 3.

Forced: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 resource token on this stage.

e6e7d9de-4b7d-422c-b367-8f2c65982468.Keywords: Cannot have attachments. Allies cannot defend against Orc-chieftan.
e6e7d9de-4b7d-422c-b367-8f2c65982468.Name: Orc-chieftan
e6e7d9de-4b7d-422c-b367-8f2c65982468.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Orc-chieftan engages the first player.

e6ee53f4-36e4-4671-9d76-8974134d052e.Name: Keys of Orthanc
e6ee53f4-36e4-4671-9d76-8974134d052e.Text: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, exhaust Keys of Othanc to add 1 resource to attached hero's resource pool.

e6fea7ff-7fdf-4938-a57b-6be82af1c152.Name: Doom, Doom, Doom
e6fea7ff-7fdf-4938-a57b-6be82af1c152.Text:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, remove 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom. Then, if there are no damage tokens here, add The Balrog to the staging area.

Forced: At the end of the quest phase, The Balrog makes an attack if it is in play.

e70dc756-86c4-460a-97cd-1d2c65b1e874.Name: Johnny Goblin-fingers
e70dc756-86c4-460a-97cd-1d2c65b1e874.Text: Cannot have attachments. Forced: When Johnny Goblin-finders attacks, the defending player discards 1 random card from his hand and raises his threat by X, where X is the printed cost of the discarded card.

e73ef9d3-e2a1-400b-9ed7-bfdfd0a3bc2a.Name: Wait No Longer
e73ef9d3-e2a1-400b-9ed7-bfdfd0a3bc2a.Text: Response: At the beginning of the staging step, search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy and put it into play engaged with you. Then, reveal 1 less encounter card this phase (to a minimum of 0). Shuffle the encounter deck.

e7413cb0-3443-40d4-88f4-06d7cfa1ab1d.Name: Jungle Trail
e7413cb0-3443-40d4-88f4-06d7cfa1ab1d.Text: While Jungle Trail is the active location, each location in the staging area gets -1 $.Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

e7995075-7f11-4f8f-ab16-e7455b67afc2.Name: Kill Them!
e7995075-7f11-4f8f-ab16-e7455b67afc2.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for a copy of Orc War Party and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Either remove all progress from the main quest, or each Orc War Party in the staging area makes an immediate attack against the player with the highest threat.

e7df2c09-6d38-4f92-9279-eba5f41370cd.Name: Steed of the North
e7df2c09-6d38-4f92-9279-eba5f41370cd.Text:
Attach to a Dunedain or Ranger hero. 
Response: After you engage an enemy, exhaust Steed of the North to ready attached hero.

e7f523e1-c898-42f8-93c2-889038de230f.Name: Combe Storehouse
e7f523e1-c898-42f8-93c2-889038de230f.Text: Immune to player card effects. While Combe Storehouse is in the victory display, each Suspect gains: 'Forced: After this enemy engages a player, it makes an immediate attack.' Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Lawless Ruffian and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

e7faf287-1288-48c2-86be-82449aa05193.Name: Ambush in the Night
e7faf287-1288-48c2-86be-82449aa05193.Text:
When Revealed: The first player loses control of Arwen Undómiel and attaches her to Goblin Gate (she is now guarded by Goblin Gate). While she is guarded, the first player cannot gain control of Arwen Undómiel.

Goblin Gate gets +1 quest point for each enemy engaged with a player.

Progress cannot be placed on this stage unless the players control Arwen Undómiel.

e8046e94-bc12-4055-b5f1-2cd34640b85e.Encounter Set: A Knife in the Dark - Nightmare
e8046e94-bc12-4055-b5f1-2cd34640b85e.Name: Weathertop
e8046e94-bc12-4055-b5f1-2cd34640b85e.Text:
The Witch-king cannot be damaged.
Forced: After Weathertop becomes the active location, exhaust The One Ring. The One Ring cannot ready while Weathertop is the active location.

e83f33da-6723-4730-8691-8d1a48b1f8e0.Name: Flight from Mount Gram
e83f33da-6723-4730-8691-8d1a48b1f8e0.Text:
Players cannot travel to Southern Gate unless there is at least 14 progress on this stage.

Players cannot defeat this stage while Southern Gate is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they have escaped Mount Gram and win the game.

e84369a8-89c8-4866-bd21-7c25ece2ca3f.Name: Shadow-Fall
e84369a8-89c8-4866-bd21-7c25ece2ca3f.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +3 Ú this phase.
e84369a8-89c8-4866-bd21-7c25ece2ca3f.Text: When Revealed: Attach to a non-Dark location in play. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached location gains the Dark trait and gets +3 quest points")

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5001.Name: Passage Through Mirkwood
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5001.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Forced: During setup, each player reveals 1 card from the encounter deck and adds it to the staging area.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5003.Name: Journey Along the Anduin
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5003.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

All Troll enemies gain the text: "Cannot have attachments."

If the encounter deck is empty (at any time), shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5005.Name: Escape from Dol Guldur
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5005.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode. 

Forced: When stage 1B is revealed, the number of random heroes captured is determined by the number of players, as follows: 1-2 players = 1 hero captured, 3 players = 2 heroes captured, 4 players = 3 heroes captured. All captured heroes are turned face down and considered "the prisoner," cannot be used, cannot be damaged, and do not collect resources until they are rescued. (A single player cannot have more than 1 hero captured by this effect.)

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5006.Name: Abandoned Camp
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5006.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, discard all attachment cards players control.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5006.Text: Forced: After Abandoned Camp leaves play, each player must deal 2 damage to each exhausted character he controls.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5007.Name: A Flooded Ford
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5007.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, put A Flooded Ford into the staging area with 1 progress token on it.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5007.Text: Each card revealed by the encounter deck gains doomed X. X is the number of progress tokens on this card.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5008.Name: Anduin Troll Spawn
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5008.Text:
If there is no Hill Troll in play, Anduin Troll Spawn gains surge.

Forced: At the beginning of the combat phase, Anduin Troll Spawn engages a player engaged with a Hill Troll.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5009.Name: Backtrack!
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5009.Shadow: Shadow: Deal and resolve the topmost Shadow effect in the encounter discard pile for this attack.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5009.Text: When Revealed: The topmost enemy or location card in the encounter discard pile is returned to the staging area.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5010.Keywords: Brown Water Rats cannot be damaged.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5010.Name: Brown Water Rats
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5010.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy cannot be damaged this round.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5010.Text: Forced: If the players are on stage 3 and all remaining enemies have the printed Rat trait, discard Brown Water Rats from play.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5011.Name: Catacomb Inspection
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5011.Shadow: Shadow: If there is a Dol Guldur location in the staging area, move 1 resource token from each of your heroes' resource pools to that location. (Resolve this effect for each Dol Guldur location.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5011.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 resource token to each Dol Guldur location in play.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5012.Name: Crazed Captive
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5012.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is not defeated this phase, raise defending player's threat by 7 at the end of the phase.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5012.Text: Forced: If Crazed Captive is defeated, raise each player's threat by 7.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5013.Name: Dark Interrogation
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5013.Shadow: Shadow: Discard each card you control that has at least 1 copy of itself in your discard pile. (If this attack is undefended, each player must resolve this effect.)
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5013.Text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and discard cards from hand until he has only 2 cards in hand. (Each player with 2 or fewer cards in hand must instead reveal 1 card from the encounter deck.)

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5014.Name: Dungeon Labyrinth
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5014.Text:
Dungeon Labyrinth gets +1 $ and +1 quest point for each resource token on it.

Forced: At the end of each round, place 1 resource token on Dungeon Labyrinth for each player in the game.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5015.Name: Forest Flies
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5015.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is an Insect, deal it 2 additional Shadow cards.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5015.Text: Forced: After you engage Forest Flies, deal 1 damage to each exhausted character you control.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5016.Name: Gladden Marshlands
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5016.Shadow: Shadow: Each enemy engaged with the defending character gets +1 Û until the end of the phase. (+2 Û instead if this attack is undefended.)
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5016.Text: Action: Deal 1 damage to a hero you control to reduce Gladden Marshlands' $ by 1 until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this effect.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5017.Name: Glade of the Spawn
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5017.Text: When Glade of the Spawn is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After a Spider enemy enters play, each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls."

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5018.Name: Marshland Outlaws
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5018.Shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by X. X is the amount of damage dealt by this attack.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5018.Text: If you are engaged with this enemy, you cannot attack or deal damage (through effects) to enemies with a title other than Marshland Outlaws.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5019.Name: Pursuit on the Shore
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5019.Text: When Revealed: Search the victory display and encounter discard pile for the enemy with the most hit points. Return that enemy to the staging area. If no enemy is returned by this effect, Pursuit on the Shore gains surge. (Cannot be canceled.)

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5020.Name: Sentinel of Shadow
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5020.Text: When Revealed: The staging area gets +X $ until the end of the phase, where X is twice the number of players in the game. If the players quest unsuccessfully this phase, put the Nazul of Dol Guldur into play (from any out of play area), engaged with the first player. (Cannot be canceled.)

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5021.Name: Smoking Blood
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5021.Shadow: Shadow: Move all damage on this enemy to the defending character. (If undefended, move the damage to the hero damaged by this attack.)
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5021.Text: When Revealed: Remove all damage from all enemies. Then, each player raises his threat by the amount of damage just removed from his engaged enemies. If no damage is removed by this effect, Smoking Blood gains surge.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5022.Name: Spider of Dol Guldur
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5022.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +3 Û for each unclaimed objective in play.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5022.Text: If there are any unclaimed objectives in play, Spider of Dol Guldur gains surge.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5023.Name: Spiders of Mirkwood
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5023.Shadow: Shadow: Choose and exhaust 1 character you control. If this attack was undefended, also deal that character 2 damage.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5023.Text: While it is engaged with you, Spiders of Mirkwood gets +1 Û for each exhausted character you control.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5024.Name: The Spider's Web
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5024.Text: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat exhausts all heroes he controls. Then, attach this card to one of that player's heroes. (Counts as a condition attachment with the text, "Each time attached hero readies, deal it 1 damage.")

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5025.Name: Torture Chamber
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5025.Text:
If Torture Chamber has 4 or more resource tokens on it, all "prisoners" were killed, and the players have lost the game.

Forced: At the end of each round, place 1 resource on each Dol Guldur location in play.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5026.Name: Torture Master
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5026.Shadow: Shadow: Any hero damaged (but not defeated) by this attack is turned face down, as a "prisoner." Then, if the players are on stage 3, return to stage 2B of the quest.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5026.Text: When Revealed: Add 1 resource token to each Dol Guldur location in play.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5027.Name: Troll Attack
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5027.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, resolve this attack against each player. (Attack is undefended against each player not engaged with this enemy.)
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5027.Text: When Revealed: All engaged Troll enemies attack. If no Troll enemies are engaged, Troll Attack gains surge.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5028.Name: Ungoliant's Brood
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5028.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, exhaust all characters you control.
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5028.Text: Forced: After you engage Ungoliant's Brood, your cards cannot ready for the remainder of the round.

e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5029.Name: Ungoliant's Spawn
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5029.Shadow: Shadow: Raise the defending player's theat by 5. (Raise the defending player's threat by 10 instead if undefended.)
e84f94bf-201b-4adf-95d2-0012e0bb5029.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, each character currently committed to the quest gets -2 Ò and is discarded if its Ò is 0.

e86c303c-eefb-448d-bbac-87ceb702f837.Encounter Set: The Watcher in the Water - Nightmare
e86c303c-eefb-448d-bbac-87ceb702f837.Name: Rippling From Beneath
e86c303c-eefb-448d-bbac-87ceb702f837.Text: When Revealed: Shuffle X Tentacle enemies from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Heal X damage from The Watcher, if it is in play. X is the number of players in the game.

e88d7165-821c-4b04-9869-80ee1f33905c.Name: Tome of Atanatar
e88d7165-821c-4b04-9869-80ee1f33905c.Text: Reduce the cost to play Tome of Atanatar by 1 for each you control with the printed Leadership resource icon. Action: Discard Tome of Atanatar to play any Leadership event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

e8b7ad31-b448-42ac-9f72-defcbe2303e9.Name: Pit Goblin
e8b7ad31-b448-42ac-9f72-defcbe2303e9.Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Goblin, add 1 resource to it.
e8b7ad31-b448-42ac-9f72-defcbe2303e9.Text: When Revealed: Add 2 resources to Pit Goblin.

e8c78f25-00d0-4b3b-8cac-03e533edfe41.Name: Desert Bastion
e8c78f25-00d0-4b3b-8cac-03e533edfe41.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each Harad objective the players control.
e8c78f25-00d0-4b3b-8cac-03e533edfe41.Text: Desert Bastion gets +1 $ for each Harad objective attached to a hero.

e8d205e0-5951-403b-b36e-f992e1b9de7e.Name: Scorching Sun
e8d205e0-5951-403b-b36e-f992e1b9de7e.Shadow: Shadow: Either raise the temperature by 2, or return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
e8d205e0-5951-403b-b36e-f992e1b9de7e.Text: When Revealed: Increase the temperature by 4.

e8f413bf-3593-47fc-8813-4553d55dbb2a.Name: Eaten Alive!
e8f413bf-3593-47fc-8813-4553d55dbb2a.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.
e8f413bf-3593-47fc-8813-4553d55dbb2a.Text: When Revealed: The first player must deal X damage divided among heroes he controls where X is the number of players in the game.

e920ecab-29dc-48a6-908d-f4919d5b468d.Name: Dungeon Guard
e920ecab-29dc-48a6-908d-f4919d5b468d.Text: Response: After the captured card(s) underneath Dungeon Guard are rescued, the players may put 1 of them into play at no cost.

ea09c696-81a1-4e2f-95ec-3b8c6d9b8d0b.Name: Isengard Archer
ea09c696-81a1-4e2f-95ec-3b8c6d9b8d0b.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to an ally you control.
ea09c696-81a1-4e2f-95ec-3b8c6d9b8d0b.Text: Forced: After Isengard Archer enters the staging area, each player at this stage deals 2 damage to a character he controls.

ea225b12-75e1-4253-9458-c71c1c304a8f.Name: Amon Forn
ea225b12-75e1-4253-9458-c71c1c304a8f.Text: While Amon Forn is the active location, it gains: “Forced: After an Orc enemy is added to the staging area, it makes an immediate attack against the first player.” The players cannot win while Amon Forn is in play.

ea6e8450-215c-4a7c-86a3-fe1b8da3791e.Name: Smoke and Mirrors
ea6e8450-215c-4a7c-86a3-fe1b8da3791e.Shadow: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.
ea6e8450-215c-4a7c-86a3-fe1b8da3791e.Text: When Revealed: Discard the top X cards of the encounter deck, where X is 1 more than the Investigate value of the active location. Until the end of the phase, add the Threat of each card discarded by this effect to the total Threat in the staging area.

ea7a8cd4-6e75-4ea7-85d1-9f89a66c9d19.Name: Orc-draught
ea7a8cd4-6e75-4ea7-85d1-9f89a66c9d19.Text: When Revealed: Either discard an ally you control, or increase the pursuit value by 1.

ea80a2db-6a72-41c1-a26e-73929197506f.Name: Tides of Fate
ea80a2db-6a72-41c1-a26e-73929197506f.Text: Response: When a shadow card increases an enemy’s Û by any amount, increase the defending character's Ú by 3 for that attack. Then, the players as a group may spend 2 Ïresources to ready the defending character and give it +3 Û for its next attack this phase.

eaad2b4a-3ac0-4672-ad43-036152d81322.Name: Tharbad Hideout
eaad2b4a-3ac0-4672-ad43-036152d81322.Text:
While Tharbad Hideout is the active location, time counters cannot be removed from the current quest.

Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, place 1 progress on Tharbad Hideout.

eaaececf-9322-43b5-a190-bdfadd7a695e.Keywords: Cannot have attachments. While Raven Chief’s Camp is in play, Raven Chief cannot be damaged.
eaaececf-9322-43b5-a190-bdfadd7a695e.Name: Raven Chief
eaaececf-9322-43b5-a190-bdfadd7a695e.Text: Forced: When Raven Chief attacks, remove 1 time counter from the active location, if able.

ead7703f-43e0-464e-ac09-304b86a54b50.Name: Seedy Inn
ead7703f-43e0-464e-ac09-304b86a54b50.Shadow: Shadow: Raise the defending player's threat by X, where X is the amount of damage dealt by this attack.
ead7703f-43e0-464e-ac09-304b86a54b50.Text: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Spy enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

eaeb6bc6-0064-4816-951c-b836e979fe01.Name: Raiding Party
eaeb6bc6-0064-4816-951c-b836e979fe01.Text: Forced: After Raiding Party engages a player, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck, starting with the first player. Each player who discards an enemy with the ambush keyword must make an engagement check against that enemy.

eb01e452-e7ed-4617-9f4d-913d82753886.Name: Daunting Power
eb01e452-e7ed-4617-9f4d-913d82753886.Shadow: Until the end of the round, defending character cannot ready.
eb01e452-e7ed-4617-9f4d-913d82753886.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, characters cannot be declared as attackers. If there are no engaged enemies, raise each player's threat by 4.

eb232287-e39e-4358-b37f-23b2c45ca6a8.Keywords: Surge. Immune to non-☺ player card effects.
eb232287-e39e-4358-b37f-23b2c45ca6a8.Name: Gollum

eb353293-1a80-445c-b4a9-422c83dadfd5.Name: Giant Web
eb353293-1a80-445c-b4a9-422c83dadfd5.Text:
While Giant Web is the active location, each character gets -1 Ò, -1 Û, and -1 Ú for each poison it has.

Response: After Giant Web leaves play as an explored location, ready an unconscious character.

eb3b5fc0-02a5-4e28-8744-c1e1b4553763.Name: The Wold
eb3b5fc0-02a5-4e28-8744-c1e1b4553763.Text:
While The Wold is the active location, it gains: “Response: After The Wold is explored, each player draws 1 card.” 

Travel: Increase the pursuit value by 1.

eb4d41de-acaf-4cca-813b-3f1465cb5d4f.Name: Traitors' Den
eb4d41de-acaf-4cca-813b-3f1465cb5d4f.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource token on Traitors' Den. Then, if it has 4 or more resource tokens on it, remove all token from it and reveal at random one of the Plot cards removed from the game during setup.  Add that card to the staging area.

eb9f723d-0f74-4d10-89e7-b046313a1e91.Name: Underworld Dissident
eb9f723d-0f74-4d10-89e7-b046313a1e91.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, remove 1 token from the current quest.
eb9f723d-0f74-4d10-89e7-b046313a1e91.Text: Underworld Dissident gets +1 Û for each Underworld location in play.

ebcb133a-1777-49cf-a7d4-137a65b2c2d5.Keywords: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Restricted.
ebcb133a-1777-49cf-a7d4-137a65b2c2d5.Name: Hobbit Pony
ebcb133a-1777-49cf-a7d4-137a65b2c2d5.Text: Quest Action: If attached hero is not committed to the quest, exhaust Hobbit Pony and attached hero to commit attached hero to the quest.

ebd1944a-928c-40ff-88de-dfebdfcf633c.Name: Redhorn Pass
ebd1944a-928c-40ff-88de-dfebdfcf633c.Text: Forced: When Redhorn Pass is explored, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of damage here.

ebf0f1f6-8627-4d7d-986e-fd7ae9a2de55.Keywords: While Dark Colony is the active location, poisoned characters cannot ready.
ebf0f1f6-8627-4d7d-986e-fd7ae9a2de55.Name: Dark Colony
ebf0f1f6-8627-4d7d-986e-fd7ae9a2de55.Text: Travel: A player at this stage must give 1 poison to a hero he controls to travel here.

ec0c1c07-2d48-4fa8-948c-51d976ffe559.Name: Make a Stand
ec0c1c07-2d48-4fa8-948c-51d976ffe559.Text:
When Revealed: If it is Day, flip the Time objective to Nightfall.
The Time objective cannot flip to Daybreak.
Response: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 resource token on Make a Stand. Then, if there are 2 resource tokens per player on Make a Stand, or if there are no enemies in play, add Make a Stand to the victory display.

ec1a2268-5e9d-4875-8089-2692d22fa180.Name: Goblin Lurker
ec1a2268-5e9d-4875-8089-2692d22fa180.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if the active location is a Dark location.
ec1a2268-5e9d-4875-8089-2692d22fa180.Text:
Cannot be optionally engaged.
If the active location is a Dark location, Goblin Lurker gets +3 Û and -40 engagement cost.

ec1ed9c8-349b-4782-8d81-820f14ba51c6.Name: Master Ironsmith
ec1ed9c8-349b-4782-8d81-820f14ba51c6.Text: Response: After you play Master Ironsmith from your hand, if you paid all of its resource cost from a single hero’s resource pool, attach a Weapon or Armor attachment from your hand or discard pile to that hero without paying its resource cost.

ec21ab35-cc55-4e35-9ed7-b143bd94f17e.Name: Through the Marshes
ec21ab35-cc55-4e35-9ed7-b143bd94f17e.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 2A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck. 
Allies enter play exhausted.
Forced: When the players defeat this stage, advance to a random stage 3A.

ec2f100d-22c8-4cc6-82d9-fb4f07446b0f.Name: Rolling Seas
ec2f100d-22c8-4cc6-82d9-fb4f07446b0f.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack deals damage to a Ship objective, shift your heading off-course.
ec2f100d-22c8-4cc6-82d9-fb4f07446b0f.Text: Travel: Shift your heading off-course to travel here.

ec97b3a4-4904-42ac-beb0-9d4d935241fb.Name: Southron Boma
ec97b3a4-4904-42ac-beb0-9d4d935241fb.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending character is an objective-hero, ready it and cancel all damage from this attack.
ec97b3a4-4904-42ac-beb0-9d4d935241fb.Text: X is the stage number of the main quest.Travel: Each player spends 1 resource to travel here.

ec9d7726-89fa-41ee-a6ad-30761a6b79d3.Name: Weather Deck
ec9d7726-89fa-41ee-a6ad-30761a6b79d3.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
ec9d7726-89fa-41ee-a6ad-30761a6b79d3.Text: While Weather Deck is in the staging area, each other Deck location in play gains "Travel: Each player must exhaust a character he controls to travel here."

ecc8fd11-b2b9-4adc-91eb-6fcc1212e7ce.Name: Terror of the Dead
ecc8fd11-b2b9-4adc-91eb-6fcc1212e7ce.Text: Forced: At the beginning of each round, the players must choose: each player skips the next planning phase, or heroes do not collect resources during the resource phase this round.

eccef05c-0f43-4cfa-91c6-e9eaf0eff7c9.Name: Dark-Hearted Huorn
eccef05c-0f43-4cfa-91c6-e9eaf0eff7c9.Text: Forced:  At the beginning of each resource phase, the engaged player must raise his threat by 2.

ece25a80-d4c6-4032-90eb-ca485da5373d.Name: Lust for Treasure
ece25a80-d4c6-4032-90eb-ca485da5373d.Text:
When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each attachment attached to a character he controls.

Burgle: The first player shuffles his deck and reveals the top card. He may discard 1 card from his hand that matches the revealed card's sphere, type, and cost.

ed12d29f-d8f8-4689-8097-417b4d31f214.Keywords: Progress cannot be placed on Fiery Depths while it is in the staging area.
ed12d29f-d8f8-4689-8097-417b4d31f214.Name: Fiery Depths
ed12d29f-d8f8-4689-8097-417b4d31f214.Text: Travel: Each player must move 1 damage from Durin's Bane to a hero to travel here.

ed3c4835-2741-406c-b43e-0ad72f6b2496.Name: Across the Downs
ed3c4835-2741-406c-b43e-0ad72f6b2496.Text:
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, raise each player's threat by 1.

The players cannot defeat this stage unless Hollow Circle is in the victory display.

ed458b9f-c913-4cb6-9f47-7760bba94c5b.Name: The Antlered Crown
ed458b9f-c913-4cb6-9f47-7760bba94c5b.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Locations with time counters on them cannot be discarded from play by player card effect.

edae55ef-8025-4553-9ff8-e81526effd59.Name: The Old Road
edae55ef-8025-4553-9ff8-e81526effd59.Text: Action: Place the top card of the burden deck on the encounter deck to place 4 progress on The Old Road. (Use this action only if you are playing campaign mode.)

edc600d3-b128-45a9-9f15-9a651901a90a.Name: Stifling Woods
edc600d3-b128-45a9-9f15-9a651901a90a.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.
edc600d3-b128-45a9-9f15-9a651901a90a.Text: When Revealed: Either remove 6 progress from the current quest, or remove 1 time counter from the current quest.

ede00b4b-15e0-4469-aaf6-ea60c9376898.Keywords: Reduce the cost to play Keen as Lanches by 1 for each card worth no victory points in the victory display.
ede00b4b-15e0-4469-aaf6-ea60c9376898.Name: Keen as Lances
ede00b4b-15e0-4469-aaf6-ea60c9376898.Text: Action: Add Keen as Lances to the victory display. Then, choose one: add 2 resources to a hero’s resource pool, draw 3 cards, or lower your threat by 4.

edfe479c-dc2b-43d0-9d4b-708e96320748.Name: Fog Bank
edfe479c-dc2b-43d0-9d4b-708e96320748.Shadow: Shadow: If your heading is at the worst setting (¾), attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
edfe479c-dc2b-43d0-9d4b-708e96320748.Text: While Fog Bank is the active location, Ship enemies do not make engagement checks, cannot attack, and cannot be attacked.

ee30a928-cdf8-40c0-87b3-13115bc16cd3.Name: Sinister Dungeon
ee30a928-cdf8-40c0-87b3-13115bc16cd3.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Resolve the “when revealed” effects of each Sorcery card discarded by this effect.
ee30a928-cdf8-40c0-87b3-13115bc16cd3.Text: Forced: When Sinister Dungeon is explored, the first player reanimates a random card from his hand and deals Sinister Dungeon to it as a shadow card.

ee451e81-d7ee-40a6-9079-7f6538a26a26.Name: Ruins of Dale
ee451e81-d7ee-40a6-9079-7f6538a26a26.Text:
Forced: Remove 2 progress from stage 3B at the end of each round, if able.

Travel: Spend 3 Í resources to travel here. (1 Í instead if stage 3B is the current quest.)

eec35e8e-281e-4dc7-8a76-b4823de3cb71.Name: The Dark Woods
eec35e8e-281e-4dc7-8a76-b4823de3cb71.Text: X is the number of players in the game. Forced: After The Dark Woods leaves play as an explored location, the first player discards 1 hidden card.

ef014a91-c2d9-44ca-acd0-cc1a339c051f.Name: Tireless Ranger
ef014a91-c2d9-44ca-acd0-cc1a339c051f.Text:
Setup: Attach to a hero.

Attached hero gets +1 Ú and gains the Ranger trait.

ef0a0467-656b-4cef-baf2-e60037d69472.Name: Avalanche!
ef0a0467-656b-4cef-baf2-e60037d69472.Text: When Revealed: Exhaust each ready character and if it is the quest phase commit them to the quest.

ef533832-523e-40ff-9116-163485826c5b.Name: Renewed Friendship
ef533832-523e-40ff-9116-163485826c5b.Text: Response: After another player plays an attachment on a hero you control, you may (choose 1): ready 1 of that player's heroes, have that player draw 1 card, or lower that player's threat by 2.

ef815939-8e88-4a70-a4f4-bdf36a84ea77.Name: Many-pillard Hall
ef815939-8e88-4a70-a4f4-bdf36a84ea77.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending player's threat is 35 or higher).
ef815939-8e88-4a70-a4f4-bdf36a84ea77.Text: Many-pillard Hall gets +1 $ for each Many-pillared Hall in play.

ef8aec20-e0c9-4d02-9dea-20b6e7c2278b.Name: Anborn
ef8aec20-e0c9-4d02-9dea-20b6e7c2278b.Text: Action: Exhaust Anborn to return 1 Trap card from your discard pile to your hand.

ef8af2c9-e9c7-463a-8853-c9ccfc3eff69.Name: Orc Trickster
ef8af2c9-e9c7-463a-8853-c9ccfc3eff69.Text:
Forced: After Orc Trickster is turned faceup as a hidden card, it makes an immediate attack against the engaged player.

Forced: When Orc Trickster would be damaged, a random player takes it facedown as a hidden card in his play area instead.

ef975c81-544a-4f1b-a3c4-d0bc42ef636c.Name: Wild Men of Dunland
ef975c81-544a-4f1b-a3c4-d0bc42ef636c.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest.(Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: 'Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, that player deals 1 damage to a character he controls.'

ef990329-db00-441a-8c7d-8b464321f093.Name: Underground Armoury
ef990329-db00-441a-8c7d-8b464321f093.Text:
While Underground Armoury is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After an enemy engages a player, deal it a shadow card.” 

Wizardry: Each player exhausts a character he controls.

efb4a7ca-6892-43e8-9de4-ab8d2ffc7cdc.Name: Plains of Dunland
efb4a7ca-6892-43e8-9de4-ab8d2ffc7cdc.Text:
While Plains of Dunland is in the staging area, each Dunland enemy gets -20 engagement cost and cannot be optionally engaged.
Travel: The first player engages the highest Û enemy in the staging area to travel here.

efcd8672-26f1-4c32-b6ef-5a06f80e406a.Name: Lost in the Wilderness
efcd8672-26f1-4c32-b6ef-5a06f80e406a.Text:
When Revealed: Each player places all cards in his hand facedown underneath Lost in the Wilderness.

Forced: When Lost in the Wilderness is defeated, return each card underneath to its owner’s hand.

efd4cef9-ce8b-4985-8825-853ba98baa2b.Name: The Shadow Host
efd4cef9-ce8b-4985-8825-853ba98baa2b.Text:
Players cannot place progress on this stage unless they control Derufin.

If the players defeat this stage, they have escaped the Blackroot Vale with Derufin and won the game.

efe062c5-dcdc-47fb-a66a-5c31f4ed5f7c.Name: The Lonely Mountain
efe062c5-dcdc-47fb-a66a-5c31f4ed5f7c.Text:
You are playing Nightmare Mode.

While there is at least 1 card stacked underneath The Lonely Mountain, the players cannot advance to stage 3.
Smaug the Magnificent cannot take damage unless A Bare Patch is attached to him.

eff34048-3186-4613-b841-0cc29cfd357b.Name: Uglúk's Uruk-hai
eff34048-3186-4613-b841-0cc29cfd357b.Text: When Revealed: Either increase the pursuit value by 3, or reveal an additional encounter card.

f02f15ee-3262-435a-b894-8f4003068c32.Name: Pitch Black Tunnel
f02f15ee-3262-435a-b894-8f4003068c32.Text:
X is the number of characters controlled by the first player. 
Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

f036c797-cede-404b-8cc3-d975a9f86ebc.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
f036c797-cede-404b-8cc3-d975a9f86ebc.Name: Wicked Hilltops
f036c797-cede-404b-8cc3-d975a9f86ebc.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û. (+3 Û instead if attacking enemy is a Troll.)
f036c797-cede-404b-8cc3-d975a9f86ebc.Text: Forced: After placing 1 or more progress tokens on Wicked Hilltops, each player must discard an ally he controls without an attached Sack card.

f041d625-2075-4501-ad40-f17042c3d3df.Name: Guardians of the Jungle
f041d625-2075-4501-ad40-f17042c3d3df.Text: The great apes of the jungle gather in the trees around you. They shadow your steps and slow your progress.

f079c496-20bf-4ce4-a5ca-d644172d83fe.Name: Regretful Shade
f079c496-20bf-4ce4-a5ca-d644172d83fe.Shadow: Shadow: Deal attacking enemy 1 additional shadow card (Dusk. 2 additional cards instead. Midnight. 3 additional cards instead).

f07ea741-4991-46c9-9c6a-439dc186cec6.Keywords: Play only after making engagement checks.
f07ea741-4991-46c9-9c6a-439dc186cec6.Name: Arrows from the Trees
f07ea741-4991-46c9-9c6a-439dc186cec6.Text: Encounter Action: If no enemies were engaged this phase, deal 1 damage to each enemy in the staging area. Then, the players as a group may spend 3 Ï resources to deal 2 additional damage to each enemy in the staging area.

f096ca9b-c50e-4897-b0c6-216c9c520bee.Name: The Three Trials
f096ca9b-c50e-4897-b0c6-216c9c520bee.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Each engaged Guardian enemy contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area.
While the Trial of Intuition is the current trial, each Guardian enemy cannot be damaged, and each Barrow location cannot be the active location and is immune to player card effects.

f0a7b02f-4d0f-49c6-8c27-1600af0022e7.Name: Closing In
f0a7b02f-4d0f-49c6-8c27-1600af0022e7.Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each card underneath The Orcs' Search.
f0a7b02f-4d0f-49c6-8c27-1600af0022e7.Text: When Revealed: Place Closing In facedown underneath The Orcs' Search.

f0d30258-7122-4004-a689-9ff50a00b3af.Keywords: The last player gains control of Na’asiyah.
f0d30258-7122-4004-a689-9ff50a00b3af.Name: Na'asiyah
f0d30258-7122-4004-a689-9ff50a00b3af.Text:
Action: While Na’asiyah is attacking or defending, spend 1 resource from her to give her +2 Û or +2 Ú for this attack.
Action: Spend 1 resource from a hero you control to place 1 resource on Na’asiyah. (Limit once per round).
If Na’asiyah leaves play, the players lose.

f0eb44aa-e060-4d5d-b66b-39bd1f0801d7.Name: False Accusations
f0eb44aa-e060-4d5d-b66b-39bd1f0801d7.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, return attacking enemy to the staging area.  Then, it makes engagement checks against each player.
f0eb44aa-e060-4d5d-b66b-39bd1f0801d7.Text: When Revealed: Each player must either raise his threat by 5 or exhaust each ready character he controls.

f1112857-2210-4087-b262-5862aed26b68.Name: Warrior of Nurn
f1112857-2210-4087-b262-5862aed26b68.Shadow: Shadow: Heal all damage from each Captain enemy in play.
f1112857-2210-4087-b262-5862aed26b68.Text: Each Captain enemy gets +1 Ú. Forced: At the end of the round, heal all damage from each Captain enemy in play.

f16aabcd-6a98-4e4a-89ca-0f0d69407d85.Name: Horse-hair Lasso
f16aabcd-6a98-4e4a-89ca-0f0d69407d85.Text: Response: After the attached enemy is dealt any amount of damage, the engaged player shuffles his deck and discards the top card.
