If the discarded card’s cost is equal to or greater than the attached enemy’s remaining hit points, add Horse-hair Lasso and attached enemy to the victory display.

f16bf495-bb88-4c5e-9a3f-5ba2d8bb916a.Encounter Set: The Siege of Cair Andros - Nightmare
f16bf495-bb88-4c5e-9a3f-5ba2d8bb916a.Name: Anduin Wharf
f16bf495-bb88-4c5e-9a3f-5ba2d8bb916a.Text:
If Anduin Wharf has 6 or more damage, discard it and reveal 2 cards from the top of the encounter deck.
While Anduin Wharf is the active location, allies cost 1 additional matching resource to play from hand.

f186de1a-4463-482a-bdee-a3cd058823b6.Name: Delay the Enemy
f186de1a-4463-482a-bdee-a3cd058823b6.Text:
It's up to you to harry the Orcs and slow their approach to the city.

Forced: At the beginning of the round (before the resource phase), place 1 resource here. Then, if there are 4 resources here, advance to stage 2.

Response: At the end of the round, remove 10 progress from this stage, then the players at each other stage reveal 1 fewer encounter card during their next quest phase (to a minimum of 0).

f18b362f-1669-4743-8802-daf58e638198.Name: Frozen by Fear
f18b362f-1669-4743-8802-daf58e638198.Shadow: Shadow: Until the end of the round, attacking enemy cannot take damage.
f18b362f-1669-4743-8802-daf58e638198.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, players cannot trigger Action or Response effects.

f1d2d99e-27e6-44d3-ad3d-ef727fa9ddc2.Keywords: If Frodo's Choice is discarded, reveal it instead.
f1d2d99e-27e6-44d3-ad3d-ef727fa9ddc2.Name: Frodo's Choice
f1d2d99e-27e6-44d3-ad3d-ef727fa9ddc2.Text: When Revealed: Take control of the first player token and the Ring-bearer (and each card attached to it). Attach to the Ring-bearer. For the rest of the game, you cannot lose control of the first player token.

f1dda3f9-e4cc-4c36-8167-a31dfdce2637.Name: Sacred Forest
f1dda3f9-e4cc-4c36-8167-a31dfdce2637.Text:
While Sacred Forest is in the staging area, each Guardian enemy gains: "Forced: After any number of time counters are removed from this enemy, heal 2 damage on it for each time counter removed."
Travel: Remove each time counter from an enemy in play to travel here.

f214f533-374b-423c-86b5-dca1ab5d048f.Name: Creeping Marshes
f214f533-374b-423c-86b5-dca1ab5d048f.Text: When Revealed: Attach to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, place 1 mire token on each location in the staging area. Then, discard Creeping Marshes.”)

f2484786-8e29-4d43-866e-31c4adae3b1f.Name: Southern Spur
f2484786-8e29-4d43-866e-31c4adae3b1f.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û. If this attack destroys a character, raise each player's threat by 3.
f2484786-8e29-4d43-866e-31c4adae3b1f.Text: Forced: At the end of the planning phase, each player who played at least 1 ally this phase must raise his threat by 1.

f24f8d3e-3193-4111-9fea-ecdbbafd921a.Name: Wild Tenacity
f24f8d3e-3193-4111-9fea-ecdbbafd921a.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Guardian, deal it 2 additional shadow cards for this attack.
f24f8d3e-3193-4111-9fea-ecdbbafd921a.Text: When Revealed: Remove X time counters from each enemy in play with the time keyword, where X is the number of players.

f28dc579-14b5-4623-848a-0a9383162b4c.Name: Fighting Uruk-hai
f28dc579-14b5-4623-848a-0a9383162b4c.Text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Uruk-hai enemy, reveal it, and put it into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck. Until the end of the round, each enemy engaged with you adds its $ to the total $ in the staging area.

f29b2736-9499-4e1d-9e53-96be59f78741.Name: Ravenous Warg
f29b2736-9499-4e1d-9e53-96be59f78741.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ú for each quest stage in play with no progress on it.
f29b2736-9499-4e1d-9e53-96be59f78741.Text: Forced: When Ravenous Warg attacks, the defending player must declare the character he controls with the most damage as the defender. (Even if exhausted.)

f2a282eb-eab1-472d-b7fb-71429a1a4855.Name: Erkenbrand
f2a282eb-eab1-472d-b7fb-71429a1a4855.Text: While Erkenbrand is defending, he gains: "Response: Deal 1 damage to Erkenbrand to cancel a shadow effect just triggered."

f2a34148-f5af-4a16-a1ae-953ea5d5482f.Name: Tragic Discovery
f2a34148-f5af-4a16-a1ae-953ea5d5482f.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player either raises his threat by 3, or this attack is considered undefended.
f2a34148-f5af-4a16-a1ae-953ea5d5482f.Text: When Revealed: Raise each player’s threat by the $ of the active location.

f2bb7a4e-eca9-4889-b908-1da95fbb089f.Name: The Living Forest
f2bb7a4e-eca9-4889-b908-1da95fbb089f.Text:
Forced: At the end of the round, discard a random location from the victory display.

Forced: After placing progress as the result of questing successfully, if there are X or more total victory points on locations in the victory display, advance to stage 3A. Otherwise, advance to a different random stage 2A. X is the number of players in the game times 5.

f2f7e1d5-9be6-4a8a-bb46-50ae4da2cb16.Name: Munuv Dûv River
f2f7e1d5-9be6-4a8a-bb46-50ae4da2cb16.Shadow: Raise your threat by 1 for each enemy engaged with you.
f2f7e1d5-9be6-4a8a-bb46-50ae4da2cb16.Text: While Munuv Dûv River is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a player draws any number of cards, he deals 1 shadow card to an enemy engaged with him."

f309210e-c505-411f-b748-c6828a028ad4.Name: Rider of Rohan
f309210e-c505-411f-b748-c6828a028ad4.Text: While a side quest is in the victory display, Rider of Rohan ally does not exhaust to quest.

f310684a-aa58-46f5-aa43-a6289e7c7b66.Name: Langflood River
f310684a-aa58-46f5-aa43-a6289e7c7b66.Text:
While Langflood River is in the staging area, no more than 4 progress can be placed on this quest stage each round.
Forced: When Langflood River leaves play as an explored location, add it to the staging area to the left, if able.

f330efb5-6263-48a1-9f08-0911f214bd96.Name: The Sky Darkens
f330efb5-6263-48a1-9f08-0911f214bd96.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a random card from the defending player's hand.
f330efb5-6263-48a1-9f08-0911f214bd96.Text: When Revealed: Each player must discard a random card from his hand. Each player then searches his deck for each other copy of the card he discarded, and discards those as well. Shuffle each searched deck.

f35e7236-2e03-4e03-aa92-7c4803e79acf.Name: Wild Mumak
f35e7236-2e03-4e03-aa92-7c4803e79acf.Text:
Immune to player card effects.
Cannot take more than 3 damage each round.

f376de21-bb3f-49dc-94e5-ce57216963e7.Name: Morgoth's Bidding
f376de21-bb3f-49dc-94e5-ce57216963e7.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, Durin's Bane makes an additional attack against the defending player after this one.

f37fc371-5a6e-4a24-85a1-2afef11c6841.Keywords: Cannot have attachments. Enters play exhausted.
f37fc371-5a6e-4a24-85a1-2afef11c6841.Name: Quickbeam
f37fc371-5a6e-4a24-85a1-2afef11c6841.Text: Response: After Quickbeam enters play, deal 1 damage to him to ready him.

f388bf8b-461c-4478-8155-74775bf27714.Name: Ravenhill
f388bf8b-461c-4478-8155-74775bf27714.Text:
Forced: Remove 2 progress from stage 4B at the end of each round, if able.

Travel: Spend 3 Í resources to travel here. (1 Í instead if stage 4B is the current quest.)

f38caab3-61dc-45e2-9b31-533ba3b9fbd9.Name: Getting Closer
f38caab3-61dc-45e2-9b31-533ba3b9fbd9.Text: While On Track is in play, encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

f39eaad9-134d-406b-9111-e03c33e0cd16.Name: The Tree People
f39eaad9-134d-406b-9111-e03c33e0cd16.Text: Action: Return a Silvan ally you control to your hand to search the top 5 cards of your deck for a Silvan ally. Put that ally into play and shuffle the other cards back into your deck. You can only play 1 copy of The Tree People each phase.

f3bc3759-1f94-4983-bebb-66c7d9e3e0b3.Name: Temple of the Deceived
f3bc3759-1f94-4983-bebb-66c7d9e3e0b3.Text:
Forced: When The Grotto’s Entrance is flipped over while active, put Temple Guardian into play from the victory display, engaged with the player with the highest threat.
When the 8th progress is placed on The Grotto’s Entrance, the players have found the sunken ruins and win the game.

f3d71c42-c368-45c1-9228-b58cf9c54ff5.Name: The Enemy's Servant
f3d71c42-c368-45c1-9228-b58cf9c54ff5.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, trigger each Scour effect currently in play. Place 3 time counters on this stage.

Unless there is at least 12 progress on this stage, Bellach is immune to player card effects and cannot be engaged.
The players cannot win unless Celebrimbor’s Mould is attached to a hero. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

f3d88160-30f2-4b8b-9e83-c42e62851bbc.Name: Théoden
f3d88160-30f2-4b8b-9e83-c42e62851bbc.Text: Lower the cost of the first Rohan ally you play from your hand each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

f3efc356-9e7d-40e3-a8ff-0ad47d8b9d67.Name: Nameless Cave Dweller
f3efc356-9e7d-40e3-a8ff-0ad47d8b9d67.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you control a Loot objective).
f3efc356-9e7d-40e3-a8ff-0ad47d8b9d67.Text: X is 1 more than the Discover value on the active location.

f3ffbb95-5024-41d4-b783-d5fbff5bfa32.Name: Umbar War Galley
f3ffbb95-5024-41d4-b783-d5fbff5bfa32.Text: While Umbar War Galley is the active location, each Corsair enemy gets -10 engagement cost. Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Corsair enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

f40cc90c-02df-464b-a401-6640aa93e2f8.Keywords: Attach to a Noldor or Silvan character. Limit 1 per character.
f40cc90c-02df-464b-a401-6640aa93e2f8.Name: Cloak of Lorien
f40cc90c-02df-464b-a401-6640aa93e2f8.Text: Attached character gets +1 Ú (+2 Ú instead if the active location has the Forest trait).

f40d0756-8603-4bf3-ad66-2890552bd60e.Encounter Set: Raid on the Grey Havens - Nightmare
f40d0756-8603-4bf3-ad66-2890552bd60e.Keywords: Aflame 6. Immune to player card effects.
f40d0756-8603-4bf3-ad66-2890552bd60e.Name: Silver Wing

f410480c-ac41-431a-8db1-693746a7570e.Name: The Beacon
f410480c-ac41-431a-8db1-693746a7570e.Text: If The Beacon is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. Planning Action: If the players control The Beacon, exhaust it and spend 5 resources to take control of 1 set aside copy of Dol Amroth Warship. Any player may trigger this action.

f41fb428-d21c-47b2-9bd7-cc97202c2a7e.Name: Orc Grunts
f41fb428-d21c-47b2-9bd7-cc97202c2a7e.Shadow: Shadow: Add Orc Grunts to the staging area.
f41fb428-d21c-47b2-9bd7-cc97202c2a7e.Text: Any time progress is placed on the current quest, reduce the amount of progress placed by 1.

f433a8a8-00ee-45d3-b0ac-1643216a2422.Name: Caradhras
f433a8a8-00ee-45d3-b0ac-1643216a2422.Text:
While Caradhras is the active location, questing characters get -1 Ò.

Players cannot travel to Caradhras except by quest card effects.

f4490261-317e-4e9e-9440-a5c58dcddcbf.Name: Thror's Key
f4490261-317e-4e9e-9440-a5c58dcddcbf.Text: Response: After a location is added to the staging area, attach Thror's Key to that location. While attached to a location, Thror's Key gains: "Treat attached location's printed text box as blank, except for traits."

f47bffb2-d4cc-404c-bd53-5e91be0dc254.Name: Brood Mother
f47bffb2-d4cc-404c-bd53-5e91be0dc254.Text:
Cannot have attachments. Cannot take damage. 
Brood Mother engages the first player. 
Forced: At the end of the round, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Spider Broodling and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

f49b1e33-6190-4e21-8779-ecfb3a39bb75.Name: Accursed Battlefield
f49b1e33-6190-4e21-8779-ecfb3a39bb75.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if the defending player's threat is higher than the attacking enemy's engagement cost).
f49b1e33-6190-4e21-8779-ecfb3a39bb75.Text: While Accursed Battlefield is the active location, each quest card in play gains the battle keyword.

f4b2af17-b589-49c1-a884-ecd4570d8545.Name: Boomed and Trumpeted
f4b2af17-b589-49c1-a884-ecd4570d8545.Text: Response: After an Ent character takes any amount of damage, ready it. That character gets +2 Û until the end of the phase.

f4b35e95-7f32-490d-9591-ac9eb050bb7e.Name: Conflict at the Crossroads
f4b35e95-7f32-490d-9591-ac9eb050bb7e.Text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, Orc enemies engaged with players add their Threat to the staging area. If no Orc enemies are engaged with players, Conflict at the Crossroads gains surge.

f4d94f3d-d3af-44d6-9896-764484302bb1.Name: Double Back
f4d94f3d-d3af-44d6-9896-764484302bb1.Text: Response: When this stage is defeated, reduce each player's threat by 5.

f4e81861-8cf6-41e7-b347-af7879fa8b06.Name: Guard the Hobbits
f4e81861-8cf6-41e7-b347-af7879fa8b06.Text:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.

Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.

Response: After you quest successfully, choose a player. Ready each of that player's heroes.

f4ec0320-6977-4cec-af29-1037e18f4dca.Name: Imladris Caregiver
f4ec0320-6977-4cec-af29-1037e18f4dca.Text: Action: Discard a card from your hand to heal 1 damage on any 1 character. (Limit twice per round).

f4f20186-79fb-4d53-9431-ecd719fd152b.Encounter Set: We Must Away, Ere Break of Day - Nightmare
f4f20186-79fb-4d53-9431-ecd719fd152b.Name: Comfortable Light
f4f20186-79fb-4d53-9431-ecd719fd152b.Text:
Progress cannot be placed here.

Travel: Sack 1

Forced: After Comfortable Light becomes the active location, discard it.

f5178135-1485-43c5-9660-99232a4cdca8.Name: Aragorn
f5178135-1485-43c5-9660-99232a4cdca8.Text:
The first player gains control of Aragorn. If Aragorn leaves play, the players lose the game. 

Action: Spend 2 resources from Aragorn’s resource pool to ready a hero.

f53cd455-26e0-419c-967d-45ecc9990bab.Name: Dunland Assassin
f53cd455-26e0-419c-967d-45ecc9990bab.Text: Dunland Assassin cannot be optionally engaged by a player with 3 or more cards in his hand. While Dunland Assassin is in the staging area, it gains: 'Forced: After the first player draws any number of cards, Dunland Assassin makes an immediate attack against him.'

f542bca1-68d1-4975-aea9-3ff3e7801be5.Name: Finger of Glanduin
f542bca1-68d1-4975-aea9-3ff3e7801be5.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove all progress from the current quest.
f542bca1-68d1-4975-aea9-3ff3e7801be5.Text: While Finger of Glanduin is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the end of each round, remove 1 progress from each location in play.”

f5a08708-ed75-45a0-91a1-59e10eeebfc9.Name: The Beast of Belegost
f5a08708-ed75-45a0-91a1-59e10eeebfc9.Text:
While Naurlhûg's Lair is in the victory display, Naurlhûg loses the text: "Cannot take damage."

Forced: After Naurlhûg attacks, if it was dealt a shadow card with no shadow effect, it engages the next player. Then, it makes an immediate attack. Do not deal it a shadow card for this attack.

When Naurlhûg is defeated, the players win the game.

f5ba58db-76fc-497e-b0d7-0382c0b9c0c0.Name: Parched Wadi
f5ba58db-76fc-497e-b0d7-0382c0b9c0c0.Text: While Parched Wadi is in the staging area, each Creature enemy gets +1 $ and +1 Û.Forced: After Parched Wadi becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Creature enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the staging area.

f5bf16fb-3244-40a4-8800-3e38c979c18c.Name: Andrath Guardsman
f5bf16fb-3244-40a4-8800-3e38c979c18c.Text: Response: After you play Andrath Guardsman from your hand, choose a non-unique enemy engaged with you. That enemy cannot attack you this round.

f5f06bf8-82ae-437f-95e9-1d67312a78f2.Name: Boar Clan Ambusher
f5f06bf8-82ae-437f-95e9-1d67312a78f2.Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard a random card from your hand.
f5f06bf8-82ae-437f-95e9-1d67312a78f2.Text: Forced: After Boar Clan Ambusher attacks and destroys a character, discard a random card from your hand.

f60662b4-ebfe-4b89-9d1e-124976e6c5b7.Name: Deadly Accusations
f60662b4-ebfe-4b89-9d1e-124976e6c5b7.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the Investigate value of the active location.
f60662b4-ebfe-4b89-9d1e-124976e6c5b7.Text: When Revealed: Raise each player's threat by X, where X is 1 more than the Investigate value of the active location.

f631b06f-1f0c-45aa-b5af-c4f9b9a41455.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
f631b06f-1f0c-45aa-b5af-c4f9b9a41455.Name: Where isss It?
f631b06f-1f0c-45aa-b5af-c4f9b9a41455.Text:
When Revealed: Discard 2 resources from Bilbo Baggins's resource pool, or Gollum makes an attack against Bilbo Baggins.

Riddle: The first player names a sphere, a cost, and a card type, shuffles his deck, and discards the top 3 cards. For each card that matches all three items, place 1 progress on stage 2.

f63cbcf5-e846-476f-abc6-a9e86e89a2fd.Name: Uruk Warg-Rider
f63cbcf5-e846-476f-abc6-a9e86e89a2fd.Shadow: Shadow: Return attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
f63cbcf5-e846-476f-abc6-a9e86e89a2fd.Text: Uruk Warg-Rider gets +X Û while attacking a character with less Ò than Uruk Warg-rider’s $. X is the difference.

f63da56c-6598-4e01-b245-a9fe49f2251a.Keywords: Play only after the resolving enemy attacks step is complete.
f63da56c-6598-4e01-b245-a9fe49f2251a.Name: Helm! Helm!
f63da56c-6598-4e01-b245-a9fe49f2251a.Text: Combat Action: Exhaust and discard a Rohan ally you control to choose and discard a non-unique enemy engaged with you.

f642149c-2bfe-44c1-b4d6-dbf30ef5c988.Name: Western Shore
f642149c-2bfe-44c1-b4d6-dbf30ef5c988.Shadow: Shadow: If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this attack is considered undefended.
f642149c-2bfe-44c1-b4d6-dbf30ef5c988.Text: X is the number of cards in the first player's hand. While Western Shore is in the staging area, each enemy gets -X enegagement cost.

f6578eb7-1b94-458b-aba1-82b406507a4d.Name: The Passage Out
f6578eb7-1b94-458b-aba1-82b406507a4d.Text:
Characters use their Ò instead of Û when attacking enemies. If an enemy would be damaged this way, place progress tokens on it instead of damage tokens. When an enemy has progress equal to its hit points, add it to the victory display and place those progress tokens on the quest.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

f6b545d9-8d93-4b10-866a-bfa15351ac69.Name: The Treachery of Rhudaur
f6b545d9-8d93-4b10-866a-bfa15351ac69.Text:
You are playing Nightmare mode:
Setup: Set the Sift through the Debris, Decipher Ancient Texts, and Quiet the Spirits encounter sets aside, out of play. These sets are indicated by the following icons, respectively:

Forced: After you advance to stage 2b, for each of the above sidequests that was not defeated, shuffle the encounter set that matches its title into the encounter deck, and shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

f6f49c59-637f-4ca2-b51f-e00c4332d33b.Name: Dismay and Fear
f6f49c59-637f-4ca2-b51f-e00c4332d33b.Shadow: Discard each attachment you control with a cost less than The Nameless Fear's $.
f6f49c59-637f-4ca2-b51f-e00c4332d33b.Text: When Revealed: Choose and remove characters from the quest until the total Ò of characters removed from the quest is equal to or higher than The Nameless Fear's $.

f774288a-fe38-4da1-ba57-3c3c2ada62a1.Name: Cobwebbed Tunnel
f774288a-fe38-4da1-ba57-3c3c2ada62a1.Text:
Immune to player card effects.
While Cobwebbed Tunnel is in the staging area, each Underground location in the staging area gets +1 $ and +5 quest points.
Travel: The first player reveals an encounter card to travel here.

f774ffb1-1c80-40a1-a474-eb021e225b19.Name: Captain's Wisdom.
f774ffb1-1c80-40a1-a474-eb021e225b19.Text: Resource Action: Exhaust a Noble hero you control to add 2 resources to that hero’s resource pool.

f77579e7-23f0-4c27-a4e3-e1edcc529e1e.Name: Exhalation of Decay
f77579e7-23f0-4c27-a4e3-e1edcc529e1e.Shadow: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.
f77579e7-23f0-4c27-a4e3-e1edcc529e1e.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards 1 random card from his hand and 1 non-objective attachment he controls.

f7a42b56-2a8e-4c6f-b60c-5031ad2a99db.Name: Dark Passages
f7a42b56-2a8e-4c6f-b60c-5031ad2a99db.Text:
When Revealed: Choose a location in the staging area with a title other than Dark Passages and make it the active location. (If there was already an active location, there are now 2 active locations.)

Travel: Raise each player's threat by X to travel here, where X is the number of Cave locations in the staging area.

f7f5ca4e-42db-48f9-b4a5-efe419f53fa3.Keywords:
X is the number of quest cards in play. 
The first player gains control of Iârion.
f7f5ca4e-42db-48f9-b4a5-efe419f53fa3.Name: Iârion
f7f5ca4e-42db-48f9-b4a5-efe419f53fa3.Text:
Response: After a side quest is revealed from the encounter deck, ready Iârion.
If Iârion leaves play, the players lose the game.

f810a9d2-b2c2-49fd-966a-7bf9f0827030.Name: Ring-wall of Isengard
f810a9d2-b2c2-49fd-966a-7bf9f0827030.Text:
While Ring-wall of Isengard is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: After any amount of damage is healed from a character, its owner discards 1 card from his hand.” 

Wizardry: Each player discards 1 random card from his hand.

f811f153-81f4-4688-8b4d-400215e6748a.Name: The Shattered Monument
f811f153-81f4-4688-8b4d-400215e6748a.Text: Each Raider enemy with at least 1 resource on it is immune to player events.Forced: At the beginning of the resource phase, add 1 resource to each Raider enemy in play.

f86ea37a-d70d-4ff2-ac36-2a0ff1f7ffa9.Keywords:
Play only if you control a Noldor or Silvan hero.

Attach to a hero.
f86ea37a-d70d-4ff2-ac36-2a0ff1f7ffa9.Name: Lembas
f86ea37a-d70d-4ff2-ac36-2a0ff1f7ffa9.Text: Action: Discard Lembas to ready attached hero and heal 3 damage from it.

f86ef645-bc8b-41a0-b288-80118f5433cc.Name: Escape from Tharbad
f86ef645-bc8b-41a0-b288-80118f5433cc.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this quest, either raise each player's threat by 3 or Bellach makes an immediate attack against Nalir. Then, place 3 time counters on this stage.

Progress that would be placed on this quest are instead placed on The Crossing of Tharbad.

Forced: After a character leaves play, raise its controller's threat by 2.

f88c0606-5076-4df7-beed-a7182af0dece.Name: Hour of Wrath
f88c0606-5076-4df7-beed-a7182af0dece.Text:
Action: Choose a hero. Until the end of the phase, the chosen hero does not exhaust to attack or defend.

Valour Action: Until the end of the phase, heroes do not exhaust to attack or defend.

f89b8962-1081-4f61-bc08-b2ca4eb08ba8.Name: Uruk Soldier
f89b8962-1081-4f61-bc08-b2ca4eb08ba8.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by 1 for each location he controls.
f89b8962-1081-4f61-bc08-b2ca4eb08ba8.Text: Forced: After Uruk Soldier attacks and destroys a character, that character's controller returns a location he controls to the staging area, if able.

f8a3acfb-3b0d-414b-b5d0-2612d33c193d.Name: Scout Ahead
f8a3acfb-3b0d-414b-b5d0-2612d33c193d.Text: Response: When this stage is defeated, the first player searches the top X cards of the encounter deck for 1 non-objective card worth no victory points and adds it to the victory display. Put the remaining cards back in any order. X is the number of players in the game plus 4.

f8a95ed4-415f-41a2-90db-ce8de7071883.Name: Ruins of the First Age
f8a95ed4-415f-41a2-90db-ce8de7071883.Text:
The player cannot advance unless they control at least 1 Loot objective. 

Forced: At the beginning of the travel phase, if there are no locations in play, return the topmost location in the encounter discard pile to the staging area. 

Forced: When this stage is defeated, if Keys of Belegost is attached to a hero, advace to stage 2C. Otherwise, advance to Stage 2A.

f8d69554-7cc1-4adc-b021-b6d3601e777d.Name: Dark Sorcery
f8d69554-7cc1-4adc-b021-b6d3601e777d.Shadow: Shadow: Discard the defending character if there is a copy of that character in its owner’s discard pile.
f8d69554-7cc1-4adc-b021-b6d3601e777d.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards each ally he controls that has the same title as a card in his discard pile.

f8edfe48-aeda-41ea-bef9-db49d4781e7b.Name: Rocky Crags
f8edfe48-aeda-41ea-bef9-db49d4781e7b.Shadow: Shadow: attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each progress token on the active location.
f8edfe48-aeda-41ea-bef9-db49d4781e7b.Text: Travel: Each player must deal 2 damage to 1 character he controls to travel here.

f9196cda-8f50-4cc5-9aad-1c56cb677bca.Name: Frodo Baggins
f9196cda-8f50-4cc5-9aad-1c56cb677bca.Text: Response: After Frodo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust The One Ring and spend 1 ☺ resource to target the attacking enemy. Then, this attack deals no damage and each player raises his threat by 2.

f92ddbe7-0db6-494f-bdab-b5bd20439c18.Name: Jailor Gornákh
f92ddbe7-0db6-494f-bdab-b5bd20439c18.Text: Forced: When 1 or more captured cards are rescued, Jailor Gornákh engages the player with the highest threat and makes an immediate attack.

f9351811-479d-4bad-a6b3-ac745739b63f.Keywords: Lower the cost to play In the Shadows by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control.
f9351811-479d-4bad-a6b3-ac745739b63f.Name: In the Shadows
f9351811-479d-4bad-a6b3-ac745739b63f.Text: Combat Action: Each enemy engaged with you with engagement cost higher than your threat gets -1 Û and -1 Ú until the end of the phase.

f93a8fda-7383-41c9-b86d-c5ba1fec760d.Name: Derufin
f93a8fda-7383-41c9-b86d-c5ba1fec760d.Text:
Forced: After the players travel to The Stone of Erech, the first player gains control of Derufin.

Dusk. Derufin gets -1 Ò.

Midnight. Derufin gets -2 Ò.

If Derufin leaves play, the players lose the game.

f951fa4a-6087-442d-a8cf-0e80facba040.Name: Orc of Minas Morgul
f951fa4a-6087-442d-a8cf-0e80facba040.Text: When Revealed: Either discard a random card from your hand, or engage Orc of Minas Morgul and reveal an additional encounter card.

f9824e39-fda8-4e4b-bc74-83b4bd40c72d.Name: Pursued by the Enemy
f9824e39-fda8-4e4b-bc74-83b4bd40c72d.Text:
The players cannot advance unless The Last Bridge is in the victory display.

Forced: At the end of the round, reduce the Ring-bearer's life by 1.

f985bda2-5029-4c34-91f7-721f830cbd9c.Name: Murmurs of Dread
f985bda2-5029-4c34-91f7-721f830cbd9c.Shadow:
Shadow: Dusk/Midnight. Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.
Midnight. This effect cannot be canceled.
f985bda2-5029-4c34-91f7-721f830cbd9c.Text: When Revealed: All character get -1 Ò until the end of the round.

f9865446-f3a4-4a9f-bb1e-68565720511b.Name: Galadhrim Healer
f9865446-f3a4-4a9f-bb1e-68565720511b.Text: Response: After Galadhrim Healer enters play, choose a player. Heal 1 damage from each hero controlled by that player.

f9a62ed6-f066-478d-9af0-0c39dea250dd.Name: Drúadan Warrior
f9a62ed6-f066-478d-9af0-0c39dea250dd.Text: Each hero with no resources in its resource pool cannot be declared as an attacker or defender against Drúadan Warrior.

f9b39223-3b12-4682-8db5-9ef4116b4919.Name: Warden of Arnor
f9b39223-3b12-4682-8db5-9ef4116b4919.Text: While attached character is committed to the quest, place 1 progress on the first location revealed by the encounter deck each round.

f9d0fb76-13bc-44f9-853f-8d2e417d0098.Name: Chetwood Forest
f9d0fb76-13bc-44f9-853f-8d2e417d0098.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player either exhausts a hero he controls, or returns attacking enemy to the staging area after this attack.
f9d0fb76-13bc-44f9-853f-8d2e417d0098.Text: Travel: One player chooses and engages an enemy in the staging area.

f9e9bc93-8044-474c-8f80-d3787edbca5f.Name: Lost in the Swanfleet
f9e9bc93-8044-474c-8f80-d3787edbca5f.Text:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, advance to a different stage 3A at random. Return this stage to the quest deck. 

Each location in play gets +1 $.

f9f464e9-188c-42aa-bbea-b325a6d0f16d.Name: The Door is Closed!
f9f464e9-188c-42aa-bbea-b325a6d0f16d.Text: Response: After an encounter card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its effects and discard it if there is a card with the same title in the victory display.

fa005422-98d7-4350-b080-b5fe31fce9b0.Name: Frozen Silverlode
fa005422-98d7-4350-b080-b5fe31fce9b0.Shadow: Shadow: Defending character gets -1 Ò. Deal the attacking enemy 1 additional shadow card.
fa005422-98d7-4350-b080-b5fe31fce9b0.Text: While Frozen Silverlode is in the staging area, characters cannot gain  Ò from player card effects.

fa005ccd-cf35-4d49-8259-23f3c8035954.Name: The Dragon's Ire
fa005ccd-cf35-4d49-8259-23f3c8035954.Text: When Revealed: Each Dragon enemy in play makes an immediate attack against each player in turn order. Do not deal shadow cards for these attacks. For each character that is destroyed by one of these attacks, place 1 progress on each Dragon enemy in play.

fa377dbc-a99e-4554-8c99-51835697ff8a.Encounter Set: The Battle of Carn Dûm - Nightmare
fa377dbc-a99e-4554-8c99-51835697ff8a.Name: Sever the Head
fa377dbc-a99e-4554-8c99-51835697ff8a.Text:
Your adversary Thaurdir will not let you interrupt his master's ritual. Only by fighting through his ranks of Orcs can you hope to do battle with the wraith himself.
Thaurdir gets +2 $, +2 Û, and cannot take damage.

fa3a740d-36b7-4fa9-b5d5-6d70aa50f078.Name: Mordor Looms
fa3a740d-36b7-4fa9-b5d5-6d70aa50f078.Shadow: If this attack destoys a characters, that character's controller turns each of his hidden cards faceup.
fa3a740d-36b7-4fa9-b5d5-6d70aa50f078.Text: When Revealed: Each player takes 1 hidden card.

fa4aaa97-c06d-42d5-b796-2f6200d9a404.Keywords: The first player gains control of Lord Alcaron.
fa4aaa97-c06d-42d5-b796-2f6200d9a404.Name: Lord Alcaron
fa4aaa97-c06d-42d5-b796-2f6200d9a404.Text: Action: Exhaust Lord Alcaron to return an enemy engaged with you to the staging area. If Lord Alcaron leaves play, the players have lost the game.

fa85988c-4530-414e-95a6-066002e0ef7a.Name: Standing Stones
fa85988c-4530-414e-95a6-066002e0ef7a.Text: Travel: The first player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and victory display for a Great Barrow and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

fa8e0538-d920-4f0e-9810-103c5186531f.Name: Setting Out
fa8e0538-d920-4f0e-9810-103c5186531f.Text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 different location and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 2A.

fa961100-1d40-4614-b405-faf9c00e2a83.Name: Blood Hound
fa961100-1d40-4614-b405-faf9c00e2a83.Shadow: Either raise your threat by 10, or attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.
fa961100-1d40-4614-b405-faf9c00e2a83.Text: Forced: When Blood Hound engages you, raise your threat by 5.

fa9df618-126b-4ea9-95d7-22cd5dad6d2f.Name: The King's Library
fa9df618-126b-4ea9-95d7-22cd5dad6d2f.Text:
Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.

Forced: After the player who controls The King's Library lets an attack go undefended, return The King's Library to the staging area.

faacffc1-0c11-42ea-aca9-96982cc80e7a.Encounter Set: The Passing of the Grey Company
faacffc1-0c11-42ea-aca9-96982cc80e7a.Name: The Way is Shut
faacffc1-0c11-42ea-aca9-96982cc80e7a.Text: When Revealed: Either attach a set aside Overcome by Fear to your threat dial, or progress cannot be placed on the current quest until the end of the round.

fab3e5a6-f889-41f6-9877-169127ac4cb9.Keywords:
Archery 2.

Immune to player card effects.
fab3e5a6-f889-41f6-9877-169127ac4cb9.Name: Host of Angmar
fab3e5a6-f889-41f6-9877-169127ac4cb9.Text: Forced: After Host of Angmar attacks and destroys a character, either remove 2 progress from the main quest, or return Host of Angmar to the staging area.

fab58a26-eaa6-4e6b-aa59-575bab8a2599.Name: The Corsairs' Assault
fab58a26-eaa6-4e6b-aa59-575bab8a2599.Text: Forced: At the end of the combat phase, deal X damage to the Aflame location in play with the lowest Aflame value. X is the number of Corsair enemies in play.

fac30859-0ad6-4d07-8b73-b5e2af044a52.Name: Battle with the Pack
fac30859-0ad6-4d07-8b73-b5e2af044a52.Text:
Pack Leader cannot take damage unless there are at least 5 progress tokens on this stage.

Forced: When it becomes Day, discard all progress from this stage.

The players cannot defeat this stage while Pack Leader is in play. If Pack Leader is destroyed, the players win the game.

fae22b80-f5aa-43b3-81dd-6c24c8a44a0d.Name: Helm's Dike
fae22b80-f5aa-43b3-81dd-6c24c8a44a0d.Text:
While Helm's Dike is the active location, each enemy gets -10 engagement cost.
Forced: When Helm's Dike is explored, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until an enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

faf4a518-7e63-4675-9337-8cc5095c5a91.Name: Hills of Evendim
faf4a518-7e63-4675-9337-8cc5095c5a91.Text:
While Hills of Evendim is in the staging area, 'when revealed' effects cannot be canceled.

Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until an enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area to travel here.

fb0f51c6-c96e-44f1-9f67-1235eb2351dc.Encounter Set: The Lord of the Rings Part 4
fb0f51c6-c96e-44f1-9f67-1235eb2351dc.Name: The Ring Goes South
fb0f51c6-c96e-44f1-9f67-1235eb2351dc.Text: Resolution: If Lust for the Ring is attached to a hero, the players have earned that burden.

fb301d7d-7936-49b6-a938-40ff0ca549cb.Name: Ruined Square
fb301d7d-7936-49b6-a938-40ff0ca549cb.Text:
Response: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 progress token on Ruined Square.

Forced: If a player controls Ruined Square when a character leaves play, return Ruined Square to the staging area.

fb36c038-bbb8-454f-a4a6-1f8d8fcbd112.Keywords: X is the number of cards underneath The Orc’s Search.
fb36c038-bbb8-454f-a4a6-1f8d8fcbd112.Name: Bellach
fb36c038-bbb8-454f-a4a6-1f8d8fcbd112.Text: Scour: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Orc enemy and add it to the staging area.

fb40f70e-0d36-4d18-ae51-23be5f1a3260.Name: Possession
fb40f70e-0d36-4d18-ae51-23be5f1a3260.Text: When Revealed: Destroy the highest cost ally in play. That ally’s controller reanimates that character, adds it to the staging area, and attaches Possession to it. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “If Possession is discarded, the attached card is also discarded.”)

fb5e0cb9-914f-49ee-8e21-534e89bc5533.Keywords: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.
fb5e0cb9-914f-49ee-8e21-534e89bc5533.Name: Lost Island
fb5e0cb9-914f-49ee-8e21-534e89bc5533.Text: While Flooded Ruins is the active location, it contributes its $ to the staging area.

fb7d55c5-7198-45c5-97d7-be4c6a26fa68.Name: Searching the Island
fb7d55c5-7198-45c5-97d7-be4c6a26fa68.Text:
Exploration.
For each progress that would be placed on Searching the Island, you may place it on a location in the staging area, instead.

fb951af8-2bc7-4529-8e16-ca85a362aac1.Encounter Set: Dungeons Deep and Caverns Dim - Nightmare
fb951af8-2bc7-4529-8e16-ca85a362aac1.Name: We Hates It!
fb951af8-2bc7-4529-8e16-ca85a362aac1.Text:
When Revealed: Attach We Hates It! to Gollum. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "If the players are on stage 3, Gollum gets +2 Û.")

Riddle: THe first player names a Trait, shuffles his deck, and discards the top card. For each card that has at least 1 matching Trait, place 1 progress on stage 2.

fba9d635-eeba-4cc1-b9fb-d6666a3a1cdf.Name: Covered Pit
fba9d635-eeba-4cc1-b9fb-d6666a3a1cdf.Shadow: Shadow: If attacking enemy is non-unique, attach a Loot objective you control to it as a guarded objective. If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
fba9d635-eeba-4cc1-b9fb-d6666a3a1cdf.Text: When Revealed: Each player discards an ally he controls.

fbc17c02-086a-45d5-897b-d3732818b42f.Name: Encounter phase
fbc17c02-086a-45d5-897b-d3732818b42f.Text: Each player may optionally engage 1 enemy then, in player order, make engagement checks

fbff9077-b7c2-4670-92ea-8ebaed5fc477.Name: Pelargir Alley
fbff9077-b7c2-4670-92ea-8ebaed5fc477.Shadow: Shadow: If the defending player controls a hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached, attach Alcaron's Scroll to the attacking enemy.
fbff9077-b7c2-4670-92ea-8ebaed5fc477.Text: While Alcaron's Scroll is not attached to a hero, Pelargir Alley gets +3 $.

fc145eae-9671-4697-8d28-473f3b138295.Name: Great Cave-troll
fc145eae-9671-4697-8d28-473f3b138295.Text: For each point of excess combat damage dealt by Great Cave-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) remove 1 progress from the current quest.

fc2ed0de-aba1-49ad-94b3-94024116eeeb.Name: Wolf of Isengard
fc2ed0de-aba1-49ad-94b3-94024116eeeb.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to defending character.
fc2ed0de-aba1-49ad-94b3-94024116eeeb.Text: Forced: When Wolf of Isengard is dealt a shadow card with the Wizardry keyword, either discard 1 card from your hand, or Wolf of Isengard makes an additional attack against you after this one.

fc351158-b618-41f2-8ba0-a3ab18eb7dd3.Name: Arched Tunnel
fc351158-b618-41f2-8ba0-a3ab18eb7dd3.Text: Travel: Reveal all facedown cards underneath Arched Tunnel, one at a time.  Then, place the top cards of the underworld deck facedown underneath Arched Tunnel, if able.

fc351b81-fc50-40a5-9f94-7ab885cb7a8c.Name: Noose of Vines
fc351b81-fc50-40a5-9f94-7ab885cb7a8c.Text: Response: After a character defends an attack against the attached enemy, if the defending character has more remaining hit points than the attached enemy, add Noose of Vines and attached enemy to the victory display.

fc3ec643-ec75-4d49-beca-57f11d6b641a.Name: Trapdoor Spider
fc3ec643-ec75-4d49-beca-57f11d6b641a.Text:
Forced: If Trapdoor Spider damage a character, discard that character from play. 

Lost: Trapdoor Spider engages the last player and makes an immediate attack.

fc4f9f69-7870-4449-b89b-cd7b4dc158d0.Name: Unwelcome Discovery
fc4f9f69-7870-4449-b89b-cd7b4dc158d0.Text: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the underworld deck and add it to the staging area. If it is a Clue card, discard it instead.

fc54b033-56cc-4ca9-8e0f-7f1c7b82bd6a.Name: Blackroot Graves
fc54b033-56cc-4ca9-8e0f-7f1c7b82bd6a.Shadow: Shadow: If defending character has 0 Ò, deal 2 damage to that character.
fc54b033-56cc-4ca9-8e0f-7f1c7b82bd6a.Text: Forced: When Blackroot Graves is explored, return the topmost Undead enemy in the encounter discard pile to play, engaged with the first player.

fc6d1863-5007-4705-9d47-99d6d118e5ca.Name: Capture the Mumakil
fc6d1863-5007-4705-9d47-99d6d118e5ca.Text: Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if there is no active location, reveal an additional encounter card this phase. This stage cannot be defeated while there are any Capture objectives in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

fc6e412d-eeca-432e-bd91-378c1ae72c9f.Name: Ioreth
fc6e412d-eeca-432e-bd91-378c1ae72c9f.Text: Cannot attack or defend. Action: Spend 1 Î resource to exhaust Ioreth. Then, heal 3 points of damage on a character. Any player may trigger this action.

fc7041f2-b7f8-44a2-bf4c-beadd8016470.Name: Captain of Harad
fc7041f2-b7f8-44a2-bf4c-beadd8016470.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, return attacking enemy to the staging area.
fc7041f2-b7f8-44a2-bf4c-beadd8016470.Text: Forced: After Captain of Harad engages you, each Harad enemy gets +1 Û and ­10 engagement cost until the end of the round.

fca6840a-ae90-42c7-b0cb-79ef8c7de099.Name: Gundabad Archer
fca6840a-ae90-42c7-b0cb-79ef8c7de099.Shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to defending character for each quest stage in play with no progress on it.
fca6840a-ae90-42c7-b0cb-79ef8c7de099.Text: When Revealed: Each player must deal 2 damage to a character he controls.

fcc8ad22-ca1f-4fd1-8f84-4955bb683f50.Name: Bitter Reek
fcc8ad22-ca1f-4fd1-8f84-4955bb683f50.Shadow: Shadow: Raise your threat by the attacking enemy’s $.
fcc8ad22-ca1f-4fd1-8f84-4955bb683f50.Text:
Peril.
When Revealed: Either raise your threat by 1 for each character you control that is committed to the quest, or deal 1 damage to each character committed to the quest.

fcf26273-b39d-413c-aece-0c007888e527.Name: Mugash's Rage
fcf26273-b39d-413c-aece-0c007888e527.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy cannot take damage until the end of the round.
fcf26273-b39d-413c-aece-0c007888e527.Text: When Revealed: If Mugash is attached to a hero, the player who controls that hero unattaches Mugash and engages it. Then, Mugash makes an immediate attack.

fcf4a99e-38f0-4809-8eb1-a1120776722b.Encounter Set: A Shadow of the Past - Nightmare
fcf4a99e-38f0-4809-8eb1-a1120776722b.Keywords: Peril. Hide 2. Cannot have non-Morgul attachments.
fcf4a99e-38f0-4809-8eb1-a1120776722b.Name: Dark Horseman
fcf4a99e-38f0-4809-8eb1-a1120776722b.Text: While Dark Horseman is engaged with you, characters you control get -1 Ò during Hide tests.

fcf56ddf-cbff-4441-95f4-951cc5ae82c2.Name: Banner of Elendil
fcf56ddf-cbff-4441-95f4-951cc5ae82c2.Text: Attach to Aragorn. While Aragorn is questing, each other questing character you control gets +1 Ò. While Aragorn is attacking, each other attacking character you control gets +1 Û.

fcfc6d7e-40eb-43b4-a72a-b529931f12ea.Keywords: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero.
fcfc6d7e-40eb-43b4-a72a-b529931f12ea.Name: Keeping Count
fcfc6d7e-40eb-43b4-a72a-b529931f12ea.Text:
Attached hero gets +1 Û for each resource token on another copy of Keeping Count that is above the current number of resource tokens on this card.

Forced: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1 resource token on this card.

fd1ed69d-287a-49bc-973c-93216ab4d674.Name: Map of Ered Luin
fd1ed69d-287a-49bc-973c-93216ab4d674.Text:
If unattached, the fist player claims Map of Ered Luin and attaches it to a hero he controls.

Action: Exhaust Map of Ered Luin to choose a non-unique location. That location gets -2 $ until the end of the phase.

fd2014e3-43df-4378-9c67-61f99353f87f.Name: Pressing Needs
fd2014e3-43df-4378-9c67-61f99353f87f.Text: When Revealed: Either search the encounter deck and discard pile for an encounter side quest and reveal it, or choose a different quest card in play to be the current quest until the end of the phase. Shuffle the encounter deck.

fd3e323b-0fea-49ce-90d2-cbfea27be8cd.Name: Decrepit Remains
fd3e323b-0fea-49ce-90d2-cbfea27be8cd.Shadow: Shadow: For each point of damage dealt by this attack, remove 1 progress from each quest in play.
fd3e323b-0fea-49ce-90d2-cbfea27be8cd.Text: While Decrepit Remains is in the staging area, each location and quest in the staging area gets +2 quest points.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90021.Name: Pippin
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90021.Text: If each hero you control has the Hobbit trait, Pippin gains: "Response: After an enemy engages you, raise your threat by 3 to return it to the staging area. Until the end of the round, that enemy cannot engage you."

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90022.Name: Denethor
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90022.Text:
Denethor gets -1 Ò for each damaged hero you control.

Discard Denethor if his Ò is 0 or less.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90023.Keywords: Attach to a Gondor or Outlands hero.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90023.Name: Lord of Morthond
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90023.Text: If each hero you control has a printed Ì resource icon, Lord of Morthond gains: "Response: After you play a Î, Ê, or Ï ally, draw 1 card."

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90024.Name: Book of Eldacar
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90024.Text:
Reduce the cost to play Book of Eldacar by 1 for each hero you control with a printed Ï resource icon.

Action: Discard Book of Eldacar to play any Ï event card in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of your deck.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90025.Name: Gondorian Discipline
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90025.Text: Response: Cancel up to 2 points of damage just dealt to a Gondor character.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90026.Name: Minas Tirith Lampwright
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90026.Text: Response: After an encounter card with surge is revealed, discard Minas Tirith Lampwright to name enemy, location, or treachery. If the next encounter card revealed is the named type, discard it without resolving its effects.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90027.Name: Small Target
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90027.Text: Response: After a Hobbit hero you control exhausts to defend an attack, choose another enemy engaged with you and reveal the attacking enemy's shadow card. If that shadow card has no shadow effect, resolve this enemy's attack against the chosen enemy. If that shadow card has a shadow effect, resolve this attack as normal.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90028.Name: Ithilien Archer
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90028.Text: Response: After Ithilien Archer attacks and damages an enemy, return that enemy to the staging area.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90029.Name: Ithilien Pit
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90029.Text:
Play Ithilien Pit into the staging area unattached.

If unattached, attach Ithilien Pit to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.

Any character may choose attached enemy as the target of an attack.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90030.Keywords: Play only if each of your heroes is a Hobbit.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90030.Name: Hobbit-sense
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a90030.Text: Combat Action: Enemies engaged with you do not attack this round. You cannot declare attacks this round.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93001.Name: Savagery of the Orcs
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93001.Text:
When progress would be placed on Savagery of the Orcs, move an equal number of villager tokens from this quest onto Rescued Villagers instead.

If there are no villager tokens on Savagery of the Orcs, advance to the next stage.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93002.Name: Protect the Villagers
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93002.Text:
If an attack goes undefended, discard X villager tokens from Rescued Villagers instead of damaging a hero. X is the amount of damage that would have been dealt.

When the players defeat this stage, end the game. Compare the number of tokens on Rescued Villagers to the number of tokens on Dead Villagers.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93068.Name: Rescued Villagers
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93068.Text:
If a location leaves play as an explored location, move any villager tokens from that location to Rescued Villagers.

At the end of the game, if there are more villager tokens here than damage tokens on Dead Vilagers, the players have won.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93069.Name: Dead Villagers
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93069.Text:
If a villager token is discarded from a location, objective or quest stage, place a damage token on Dead Villagers.

At the end of the game, if there are more damage tokens here than villager tokens on Rescued Villagers, the players have lost.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93070.Keywords: The first player gains control of Lord Alcaron.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93070.Name: Lord Alcaron
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93070.Text:
Response: After a villager token is discarded, exhaust Lord Alcaron to place that villager token on a location instead.

If Lord Alcaron leaves play, the players have lost the game.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93071.Keywords: X is the number of damage tokens on Dead Villagers.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93071.Name: Ghulat
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93071.Text:
Forced: When Ghulat attacks, place 1 damage token on Dead Villagers.

While Ghulat is in play, the game cannot end.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93072.Name: Marauding Orc
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93072.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93072.Text: Forced: After Marauding Orc attacks and destroys a character, place 1 damage token on Dead Villagers.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93073.Name: Orc Ravager
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93073.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if undefended.)
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93073.Text: When Revealed: Discard 1 villager token from the active location. If no villager token is discarded by this effect, Orc Ravager gains surge.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93074.Name: Craven Eagle
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93074.Text: When Revealed: Discard the character with the fewest remaining hit points. That character's controller may discard 3 cards at random from his hand to prevent this effect.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93075.Name: Burning Farmhouse
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93075.Text: Forced: At the end of the round, discard 1 villager token from Burning Farmhouse.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93076.Name: Gondorian Hamlet
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93076.Text: While Gondorian Hamlet is in the staging area it gains: "Forced: After a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, discard 1 villager token from Gondorian Hamlet."

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93077.Name: Secluded Farmhouse
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93077.Text: Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93078.Name: Burnt Homestead
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93078.Shadow: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by 1 for each damage token on Dead Villagers.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93078.Text: When Revealed: Raise each player's threat by the number of damage tokens on Dead Villagers.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93079.Name: Trapped Inside
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93079.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, discard 1 villager token from Rescued Villagers.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93079.Text: When Revealed: Discard 1 villager token from the active location for each player in the game. If no villager tokens were removed by this effect, Trapped Inside gains surge.

fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93080.Name: Panicked!
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93080.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damage token on Dead Villagers.
fd89bdbf-7475-4f3e-96fc-8f5315a93080.Text: When Revealed: Each player must take a villager token from Rescued Villagers and place it on a location in the staging area, if able. If no villager tokens were placed on a location by this effect, Panicked! gains surge.

fd9a5cdb-071c-4a2c-aa1e-b25d22d06a10.Name: Expanse of Hollin
fd9a5cdb-071c-4a2c-aa1e-b25d22d06a10.Text:
X is 1 more than the number of enemies in play.
Forced: When Expanse of Hollin is explored, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Then, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each damage here. Add each enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

fdabde61-0341-4dae-9a9b-de9f0b955078.Name: Éothain
fdabde61-0341-4dae-9a9b-de9f0b955078.Text: Response: After a Rohan ally is discarded from play by a card effect, ready Éothain.

fdd55ddc-2f18-4ae6-89bb-e54827a1bbdc.Name: Thaurdir's Pursuit
fdd55ddc-2f18-4ae6-89bb-e54827a1bbdc.Text:
Thaurdir’s Pursuit has –5 quest points for each Clue objective attached to a character.

This stage cannot be defeated while Thaurdir has any hit points remaining. When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

fddb01e7-102e-44c8-a469-e920e76a79e0.Name: Quick Ears
fddb01e7-102e-44c8-a469-e920e76a79e0.Text: Response: Exhaust a Dúnedain or Ranger hero to cancel an enemy card just revealed from the encounter deck. Then, shuffle it back into the encounter deck and reveal an additional encounter card.

fdfc404e-67b0-44d6-a1e7-a5e568ac0265.Name: Deep Gulley
fdfc404e-67b0-44d6-a1e7-a5e568ac0265.Text: While Deep Gulley is in the staging area, it gains: "Forced: After a player optionally engages an enemy, that player raises his threat by X, where X is the engaged enemy's Û."

fe1a0aef-10bd-441b-a27b-0527810fef57.Keywords: Attach to a Ì or a Scout character.
fe1a0aef-10bd-441b-a27b-0527810fef57.Name: Mariner's Compass
fe1a0aef-10bd-441b-a27b-0527810fef57.Text: Response: At the beginning of the travel phase, exhaust Mariner's Compass and attached character to search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a location. Switch that location with a location in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

fe419fec-bc64-493c-aa23-fa3e62c57768.Name: Baleful Shade
fe419fec-bc64-493c-aa23-fa3e62c57768.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.
fe419fec-bc64-493c-aa23-fa3e62c57768.Text: Forced: When Baleful Shade attacks, the defending player discards the top card of his deck. If the discarded card is an ally, Baleful Shade gets +2 Û for this attack.

fe544acb-93c9-4f7a-8743-9526c8b57943.Name: Vast Troll-fells
fe544acb-93c9-4f7a-8743-9526c8b57943.Shadow: Shadow: If no progress was placed on a side quest this round, attacking enemy gets +4 Û.
fe544acb-93c9-4f7a-8743-9526c8b57943.Text:
As an additional cost to travel to a safe location, each player must spend 1 resource.
Heroes cannot gain resources by card effects.

fe58a6d3-7028-41c1-ab00-5e33e7d77b5f.Name: Frodo Baggins
fe58a6d3-7028-41c1-ab00-5e33e7d77b5f.Text: Action:Spend 1 ☺ resource and exhaust The One Ring to give Frodo Baggins +2 Ò and +2 Û until the end of the round.

fe5ce9b0-2dd0-49f7-b3d3-6df03d367b33.Name: Soldier of Angmar
fe5ce9b0-2dd0-49f7-b3d3-6df03d367b33.Text: Forced: After Soldier of Angmar attacks and destroys an ally, search the encounter deck, discard pile and victory display for Orc Ambush and reveal it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

fe60620b-9ea1-4bf8-8d41-e7fd81a28427.Name: Isengard Messenger
fe60620b-9ea1-4bf8-8d41-e7fd81a28427.Text: Response: After you raise your threat from the Doomed keyword, Isengard Messenger gets +1 Ò until the end of the round. (Limit twice per round.)

fe7448a2-e2e2-4e81-95f4-2ac585160433.Name: False Lead
fe7448a2-e2e2-4e81-95f4-2ac585160433.Shadow: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, remove all tokens from the current quest.
fe7448a2-e2e2-4e81-95f4-2ac585160433.Text: When Revealed: End the quest phase without resolving the quest.

fe815306-f89c-4ed1-b2aa-c3f8fa7dfc42.Name: Stop the Attack
fe815306-f89c-4ed1-b2aa-c3f8fa7dfc42.Text:
Progress cannot be placed here while Siege Tunnel is in play.

Response: At the end of the round, raise each players's threat by 1 and reveal an encounter card to choose a non-unique enemy worth no victory points at another stage. Discard the chosen enemy.

If Lieutenant of Angmar is in a victory display at the end of the round, the players have routed the enemy and win the game.

fea90493-29cd-4668-9e3b-eb3150cdc339.Name: Boar Clan Assault
fea90493-29cd-4668-9e3b-eb3150cdc339.Shadow: Each enemy engaged with you gets +1 Û until the end of the phase.
fea90493-29cd-4668-9e3b-eb3150cdc339.Text: When Revealed: Each engaged enemy makes an immediate attack. If no attacks are made this way, Boar Clan Assault gains surge.

fed61900-b526-41e6-b072-9c5eae29bc77.Name: Isengard Uruk
fed61900-b526-41e6-b072-9c5eae29bc77.Text: When Revealed: Either assign 3 damage among characters you control, or reveal an additional encounter card.

ff265d76-021b-4f23-9e62-a57e16b3e77d.Keywords: Lords of the Eldar can only be played from your discard pile.
ff265d76-021b-4f23-9e62-a57e16b3e77d.Name: Lords of the Eldar
ff265d76-021b-4f23-9e62-a57e16b3e77d.Text: Action: Place Lords of the Eldar on the bottom of your deck from your discard pile. Then, until the end of the round all Noldor characters get +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.

ff3794e8-d8b1-48dc-a9f8-97ea7d6b3874.Name: Galadriel's Handmaiden
ff3794e8-d8b1-48dc-a9f8-97ea7d6b3874.Text: Response: After Galadriel's Handmaiden enters play, choose a player. That player reduces his threat by 1.

ff4c59d7-6ad7-4fa7-80da-97fd5f8f3169.Name: Ancient Causeway
ff4c59d7-6ad7-4fa7-80da-97fd5f8f3169.Text: Forced: When Ancient Causeway is explored, raise each player's threat by 2.

ff574390-bd68-4277-9065-dd9dbf552d00.Name: Valiant Warrior
ff574390-bd68-4277-9065-dd9dbf552d00.Text:
Setup: Attach to a hero.

Attached hero gets +1 Û and gains the Warrior trait.

ff597a85-6a02-4301-a9dc-4dcb4cf9b626.Name: Evil Crow
ff597a85-6a02-4301-a9dc-4dcb4cf9b626.Shadow: Shadow: If you have failed a Hide test this round, this attack is considered undefended.
ff597a85-6a02-4301-a9dc-4dcb4cf9b626.Text: While Evil Crow is engaged with a player, that player adds 1 to the Hide value for each Hide test he makes.

ff7b0b9d-f8ae-4464-9db3-7205c5ae4db7.Name: Thror's Golden Cup
ff7b0b9d-f8ae-4464-9db3-7205c5ae4db7.Text: Action: Add Thror's Golden Cup to the victory display to draw 3 cards.

ffbf96c9-ee9f-4462-b1c5-1acf8609015a.Name: Hithaeglir Woods
ffbf96c9-ee9f-4462-b1c5-1acf8609015a.Text:
While Hithaeglir Woods is in the staging area, each Dunland enemy in the staging area cannot take damage. 
Travel: Deal each Dunland enemy a shadow card to travel here.

ffc5f529-5d18-4870-970b-7503c176f56b.Name: Overrun Defenses
ffc5f529-5d18-4870-970b-7503c176f56b.Shadow: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control (2 characters instead of you control 4 or more locations).
ffc5f529-5d18-4870-970b-7503c176f56b.Text: When Revealed: Add X to the total $ in the staging area this phase. X is the number of locations the players control. If X is less than 4, Overrun Defenses gains doomed 2.

ffd14d9f-b3e4-46c4-b7b1-f7fcba350ba0.Name: Isengard Tracker
ffd14d9f-b3e4-46c4-b7b1-f7fcba350ba0.Shadow: Shadow: After this attack, move attacking enemy to the first player's staging area.
ffd14d9f-b3e4-46c4-b7b1-f7fcba350ba0.Text: Forced: After Isengard Tracker destroys a character, move it to the first player's staging area.

ffd2cfe7-e5fc-4f47-b85e-19e8b2df5171.Name: Grasping Root
ffd2cfe7-e5fc-4f47-b85e-19e8b2df5171.Text: Forced: After Grasping Root engages a player, that player must assign X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of locations in the victory display.

ffe307bf-dd8e-4df3-9355-55564137d311.Name: Fighting Among Friends
ffe307bf-dd8e-4df3-9355-55564137d311.Shadow: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. (+2 Û instead if undefended.)
ffe307bf-dd8e-4df3-9355-55564137d311.Text: When Revealed: The first player names a sphere. Then, all non-Baggins characters who do not belong to the named sphere are removed from the quest.
